vn_meaning: tước đoan, bỏ lại, từ bỏ
eng_explanation: This means to give up or relinquish something.
example: The company abandoned the project.
He abandoned his old life.

vn_meaning: khả năng, năng lực
eng_explanation: Refers to someone's capacity or skill.
example: She has great ability to learn new languages.
He possesses a remarkable ability to solve problems.

vn_meaning: có khả năng, có thể
eng_explanation: Indicates the presence of capability.
example: He is able to run fast.
They are able to finish the task.

vn_meaning: bãi bỏ, loại bỏ
eng_explanation: To completely remove something.
example: The government plans to abolish slavery.
The company plans to abolish the policy.

vn_meaning: đẻ con cái, phá thai
eng_explanation: The termination of a pregnancy.
example: She had an abortion after the birth of her child.
The clinic offered an abortion service.

vn_meaning: về, liên quan đến
eng_explanation: Indicates a topic or subject.
example: What about tomorrow?
The meeting is about the budget.

vn_meaning: trên, cao hơn
eng_explanation: Describes a position or location.
example: The bird is above the tree.
The building is above the rest.

vn_meaning: ngoài nước, ở nước ngoài
eng_explanation: Describes a location outside of one's country.
example: We are going abroad for vacation.
He is an abroad traveler.

vn_meaning: tránh, vắng mặt
eng_explanation: Refers to a lack of presence.
example: She felt an absence of her family.
The company experienced an absence of employees.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự vắng mặt; tính từ: không có, vắng mặt (người, sự vật)
eng_explanation: Adjective: Not present; noun: the state of being away.
example: The student was absent from class due to illness.
There was an absent look in his eyes.
He was absent from the meeting without prior notice.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự tuyệt đối; tính từ: tuyệt đối, hoàn toàn
eng_explanation: Adjective: Complete; noun: the state of being total or entire.
example: He demanded an absolute guarantee.
She achieved absolute silence in the room.
The absolute temperature is zero Kelvin.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: hoàn toàn, tuyệt đối
eng_explanation: Adverb: Completely; expressing emphasis or certainty.
example: I absolutely love chocolate cake.
She absolutely refused to help him.
The weather is absolutely beautiful today.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự hút, hấp thụ; động từ: hút, hấp thụ, thu hút
eng_explanation: Verb: To soak up; noun: the act of taking in.
example: The sponge absorbs water quickly.
The book absorbed my attention completely.
The soil absorbs nutrients from the rain.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tư tưởng trừu tượng; tính từ: trừu tượng, không cụ thể
eng_explanation: Adjective: Existing in thought or not in reality; noun: an idea or concept.
example: Abstract art often lacks recognizable forms.
He presented an abstract theory of economics.
She had an abstract thought about the meaning of life.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự vô lý, phi lý; tính từ: vô lý, phi lý
eng_explanation: Adjective: Wildly unreasonable, illogical, or inappropriate.
example: The situation was completely absurd.
His behavior was absurd and confusing.
It's absurd to think that he could win the lottery.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự dư thừa, phong phú
eng_explanation: Noun: A large quantity or supply; an excess.
example: There was an abundance of fruit in the garden.
The company enjoyed an abundance of profits.
The river provided an abundance of fish.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lạm dụng, bạo hành; động từ: lạm dụng, bạo hành
eng_explanation: Noun: Improper use; verb: To mistreat or misuse.
example: He was subjected to verbal abuse.
The company engaged in environmental abuse.
Don't abuse your privileges.

vn_meaning: danh từ: học thuật; tính từ: liên quan đến học thuật
eng_explanation: Adjective: Relating to education or scholarship; noun: a scholar or academic.
example: The academic journal published the research.
He is an academic specializing in history.
Academic freedom is essential for research.

vn_meaning: danh từ: học viện, trường đại học danh dự
eng_explanation: Noun: An institution of learning or a group of scholars.
example: She attended the Royal Academy of Music.
The academy awarded him an honorary degree.
The academy is dedicated to promoting scientific research.

vn_meaning: động từ: tăng tốc (vận tốc, tốc độ); đẩy nhanh (tiến trình).
eng_explanation: verb: to increase the speed or rate of something; to hasten.
example: The driver accelerated to overtake the truck.
The new policy is expected to accelerate economic growth.
Scientists are working to accelerate the development of a vaccine.

vn_meaning: danh từ: giọng (nói); dấu trọng âm.
eng_explanation: noun: a distinctive way of pronouncing a language; stress in a word.
example: She has a strong Scottish accent.
The word 'present' has two possible accents.
His accent made it difficult to understand him at first.

vn_meaning: động từ: chấp nhận; đón nhận.
eng_explanation: verb: to agree to receive or deal with something; to take something offered.
example: I accept your apology.
Please accept this gift as a token of my appreciation.
She refused to accept defeat.

vn_meaning: tính từ: được chấp nhận; thỏa đáng.
eng_explanation: adjective: satisfactory or good enough; meeting requirements.
example: The quality of the work is acceptable.
This is an acceptable solution to the problem.
The terms of the contract are acceptable to both parties.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự chấp nhận; sự đồng ý.
eng_explanation: noun: the act of accepting something; agreement or approval.
example: Her acceptance into the university was a great relief.
The acceptance of new ideas can be challenging.
He expressed his acceptance of the responsibility.

vn_meaning: danh từ: quyền tiếp cận; lối vào; khả năng tiếp cận. động từ: tiếp cận; truy cập.
eng_explanation: noun: the ability or right to enter or use something; a way to get to a place. verb: to reach or enter a place.
example: She has access to confidential information.
The library provides access to a wide range of resources.
We need to improve access for people with disabilities.

vn_meaning: tính từ: dễ tiếp cận; dễ dàng tiếp cận được.
eng_explanation: adjective: easy to reach or enter; obtainable or understandable.
example: The building is accessible to wheelchairs.
The information is readily accessible online.
The remote area is not easily accessible by car.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tai nạn; sự cố.
eng_explanation: noun: an unplanned event that causes harm or damage.
example: He was involved in a car accident.
The factory suffered an industrial accident.
It was an unfortunate accident.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: vô tình; bất ngờ.
eng_explanation: adverb: unintentionally; by chance.
example: I accidentally deleted the file.
She accidentally bumped into him.
He accidentally overheard their conversation.

vn_meaning: động từ: chứa đựng; chứa chấp; điều chỉnh để phù hợp.
eng_explanation: verb: to provide lodging or space for; to adjust to meet someone's needs.
example: The hotel can accommodate up to 200 guests.
The company tried to accommodate his request.
We need to accommodate the changing market conditions.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người kế toán (trong doanh nghiệp, tổ chức)
eng_explanation: n. A professional who keeps and inspects financial accounts (PoS: noun).
example: She hired a skilled accountant to manage her taxes.
The accountant prepared the annual financial statements.
Becoming a certified public accountant requires years of study.

vn_meaning: danh từ: công tác kế toán; hệ thống kế toán; tính toán, thanh toán; tính toán, giải trình (về một hành động).
eng_explanation: n. The process of recording, classifying, and summarizing financial transactions (PoS: noun).
example: She has a degree in accounting.
The company's accounting practices were audited.
Forensic accounting can uncover financial fraud.

vn_meaning: động từ: tích lũy, tích tụ (tài sản, kiến thức, kinh nghiệm); gộp lại, dồn lại.
eng_explanation: v. To gather or collect gradually over time (PoS: verb).
example: Savings accumulate over time with regular deposits.
Dust can accumulate quickly in neglected areas.
He accumulated a wealth of knowledge throughout his career.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự tích lũy, sự tích tụ; số lượng đã tích lũy.
eng_explanation: n. The gradual gathering of something over time (PoS: noun).
example: The accumulation of debt led to financial problems.
Snow accumulation caused travel delays.
The museum displays an impressive accumulation of artifacts.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự chính xác, độ chính xác.
eng_explanation: n. The quality or state of being correct or precise (PoS: noun).
example: The accuracy of the data is crucial for the report.
She checked her work for accuracy.
Scientific research demands a high degree of accuracy.

vn_meaning: tính từ: chính xác, đúng đắn, xác thực.
eng_explanation: adj. Correct in all details; exact (PoS: adjective).
example: The weather forecast was surprisingly accurate.
He provided an accurate description of the suspect.
Accurate measurements are essential in engineering.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: một cách chính xác, đúng đắn.
eng_explanation: adv. In a correct or precise manner (PoS: adverb).
example: The machine measures temperature accurately.
She accurately predicted the outcome of the election.
The report was accurately documented.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự buộc tội, lời buộc tội; cáo buộc.
eng_explanation: n. A claim that someone has done something wrong (PoS: noun).
example: He denied the accusations against him.
The accusation of fraud was serious.
She faced several accusations of misconduct.

vn_meaning: động từ: buộc tội, tố cáo, lên án.
eng_explanation: v. To charge someone with an offense or crime (PoS: verb).
example: He was accused of stealing the money.
She accused him of lying to her.
Don't accuse someone without evidence.

vn_meaning: tính từ: bị buộc tội; bị cáo (trong vụ án).
eng_explanation: adj. Charged with a crime or offense (PoS: adjective).
example: The accused pleaded not guilty.
He was released after being accused but not convicted.
The accused remained silent during the trial.

vn_meaning: động từ: đạt được, đạt được mục tiêu; thành công; hoàn thành.
eng_explanation: To successfully reach a desired outcome.
example: The company aims to achieve sustainable growth.
He worked hard to achieve his academic goals.

vn_meaning: danh từ: kết quế hoặc thành công đạt được; một việc làm đáng chú ý.
eng_explanation: A notable accomplishment or success.
example: The team celebrated their significant achievement.
Her dedication led to a remarkable achievement.

vn_meaning: danh từ: một chất tạo ra ion hydro trong dung dịch; một chất ăn mòn.
eng_explanation: A substance that readily reacts with water to produce hydrogen and a solution of hydrogen ions.
example: The soil is affected by the acidic rain.
The reaction of the acid with the metal produced a strong acid.

vn_meaning: động từ: nhận ra hoặc thừa nhận; chấp nhận một điều gì đó là đúng hoặc chính xác.
eng_explanation: To formally recognize or accept something.
example: She acknowledged his apology for the mistake.
The team acknowledged the importance of the feedback.

vn_meaning: động từ: thu được hoặc nhận được; mua.
eng_explanation: To gain possession of something.
example: The company acquired a new market in Europe.
He acquired a valuable antique.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hành động thu được một thứ gì đó.
eng_explanation: The process of gaining possession of something.
example: The company is focused on expanding its acquisition strategy.
The new acquisition will significantly boost the company's revenue.

vn_meaning: danh từ: một đơn vị đất bằng mười acre.
eng_explanation: A large area of land, typically used for agriculture.
example: The farm has 10 acres of land.
The developer plans to build a large residential area.

vn_meaning: giới từ: vượt qua; qua; theo mọi hướng.
eng_explanation: Extending beyond a particular point or boundary.
example: The train crossed the river quickly.
The message crossed the country.

vn_meaning: danh từ: một hành động hoặc việc làm.
eng_explanation: A specific action or deed.
example: He performed a vital act of kindness.
The act of writing is a creative process.

vn_meaning: danh từ: một sự kiện hoặc việc làm.
eng_explanation: A specific event or deed.
example: The company took several actions to improve efficiency.
The team took decisive action to resolve the crisis.

vn_meaning: động từ: kích hoạt; (vận động) thức dậy (cơ thể)
eng_explanation: Verb: To put into operation or make effective; to awaken.
example: The system will automatically activate at midnight.
The alarm activated with a loud siren.
He activated his muscles for the weightlifting session.

vn_meaning: danh từ: quá trình kích hoạt; (của hệ thống) sự hoạt động
eng_explanation: Noun: The process of activating or becoming active; the state of being active.
example: The activation sequence began with a countdown.
The activation of the new software required a restart.
The activation of the immune system protects against infection.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tích cực; (cơ thể) khỏe mạnh; (hành động) đang làm
eng_explanation: Adjective: Energetic, engaged, or functioning; healthy and vigorous.
example: He is an active member of the community.
She is an active participant in the discussion.
Staying active helps maintain good health.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người hoạt động vì quyền lợi; người đấu tranh
eng_explanation: Noun: A person who campaigns to bring about political or social change.
example: She is an environmental activist.
The activist organized protests against the new law.
He dedicated his life to activism for human rights.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hoạt động; sự tích cực; (hoạt động thể thao) môn thể thao
eng_explanation: Noun: A course of action; a state of being active; a sport or recreational pursuit.
example: The company's main activity is software development.
Regular exercise is a healthy activity.
Swimming is a popular water activity.

vn_meaning: danh từ: diễn viên; (kỹ thuật) tác nhân
eng_explanation: Noun: A person who performs in a play, movie, or television show; a cause or agent.
example: He is a famous film actor.
The actor delivered a powerful performance.
Pollution is a major environmental actor.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nữ diễn viên
eng_explanation: Noun: A female person who performs in a play, movie, or television show.
example: She is a talented actress.
The actress received critical acclaim for her role.
The actress wore a beautiful gown to the premiere.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thực tế; (số) thực; (thời gian) thực tế
eng_explanation: Adjective: Real, existing in fact; genuine; (mathematics) representing the true value.
example: The actual cost was higher than estimated.
Let's discuss the actual situation.
The actual distance is 10 kilometers.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: thực sự; thật ra
eng_explanation: Adverb: In fact; really; truly.
example: Actually, I prefer coffee to tea.
I didn't think he would come, actually.
The weather is actually quite pleasant today.

vn_meaning: tính từ: nghiêm trọng; (bệnh) cấp tính; (cảm giác) nhạy cảm
eng_explanation: Adjective: Severe or intense; having a sharp point; highly sensitive.
example: He has an acute pain in his leg.
The hospital has an acute care unit.
She has an acute sense of hearing.

vn_meaning: tiền tố: chỉ sự hướng về, đến (thường dùng trong các từ ghép)
eng_explanation: Prefix indicating direction toward or to; often used in compound words.
example: He took an ad in the newspaper.
The ad was for a new car.
I saw an ad online for a great deal.

vn_meaning: động từ: thích nghi; sửa đổi cho phù hợp
eng_explanation: To adjust or modify to suit new conditions or a new purpose.
example: We need to adapt to the changing climate.
The company adapted its strategy to the market.
She adapted well to her new school.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự thích nghi; sự sửa đổi
eng_explanation: The process of adapting; a modification to suit new conditions.
example: The adaptation of the novel was well-received.
Climate change requires significant adaptation.
This is a clever adaptation of the original design.

vn_meaning: động từ: thêm vào; cộng (toán học); danh từ: sự thêm vào
eng_explanation: To combine or join something to something else; to sum (math).
example: Please add sugar to my coffee.
Add 5 and 7 together.
There's a small addition to the report.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự nghiện; tình trạng bị lệ thuộc vào một chất hoặc hành vi nào đó
eng_explanation: A compulsive need for a substance or behavior.
example: He is struggling with a gambling addiction.
Drug addiction is a serious problem.
She sought help for her addiction.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự thêm vào; một thứ được thêm vào
eng_explanation: The act of adding; something added.
example: The addition of new features improved the software.
This is a welcome addition to the collection.
We made a small addition to the budget.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thêm vào; bổ sung
eng_explanation: Extra; supplementary; beyond what is necessary or usual.
example: We need additional information.
There is an additional fee for shipping.
She brought additional blankets.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: hơn nữa; ngoài ra
eng_explanation: In addition; furthermore.
example: The price includes shipping; additionally, there's a handling fee.
He's a talented musician; additionally, he's a skilled writer.
We need more staff; additionally, we need better equipment.

vn_meaning: danh từ: địa chỉ; động từ: giải quyết; đề cập đến
eng_explanation: A location; to deal with or resolve an issue.
example: What is your address?
The speaker addressed the audience.
We need to address this problem immediately.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đầy đủ; thỏa đáng
eng_explanation: Sufficient; enough to meet a requirement.
example: The food supply was adequate for the refugees.
Is this explanation adequate?
He provided adequate support for his claims.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nơi ở; chỗ ở (chính thức)
eng_explanation: Noun: A place to live or stay; lodging.
example: We need to find suitable accommodation for the family.
The hotel offers a range of accommodation options.
He secured accommodation near the university.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người đi cùng; người đồng hành; tính từ: đi cùng; đồng hành
eng_explanation: Verb: To go with someone; Adjective: Traveling or happening together.
example: She accompanied him to the concert.
The band was accompanied by a string quartet.
They accompanied the refugees to safety.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thành tựu; thành quả; tính từ: hoàn thành; đạt được
eng_explanation: Verb: To achieve something; Adjective: Completed or finished.
example: He accomplished his goal through hard work.
The team accomplished a remarkable victory.
She accomplished a great deal in a short time.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thành tựu; thành quả; sự thành công
eng_explanation: Noun: An achievement or success; something accomplished.
example: Her greatest accomplishment was winning the award.
The team's accomplishment was a testament to their dedication.
He takes pride in his accomplishments.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự phù hợp; sự thống nhất; sự tuân thủ
eng_explanation: Noun: Agreement or conformity with something.
example: The contract was signed in accordance with the law.
He acted in accordance with his principles.
The results are in accordance with the predictions.

vn_meaning: cụm từ: theo; dựa trên; như
eng_explanation: Phrase: Based on or in accordance with something stated.
example: According to the weather forecast, it will rain.
According to my calculations, the answer is 42.
According to the company's policy...

vn_meaning: tính từ: tương ứng; do đó; vì vậy
eng_explanation: Adverb: Therefore; as a result; in response.
example: If you are late, you will be penalized accordingly.
She studied hard, accordingly achieving excellent grades.
He followed the instructions accordingly.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tài khoản; kế toán; sự tường thuật; tính từ: liên quan đến tài khoản
eng_explanation: Noun: A record of transactions; Verb: To report or describe.
example: Please log in to your account.
The accountant prepared the monthly account.
He gave an account of his travels.

vn_meaning: danh từ: trách nhiệm; sự giải trình; khả năng chịu trách nhiệm
eng_explanation: Noun: The state of being responsible for something.
example: He took full accountability for his actions.
Accountability is crucial in any organization.
The government faces increasing accountability for its policies.

vn_meaning: tính từ: chịu trách nhiệm; có trách nhiệm; có thể giải trình
eng_explanation: Adjective: Responsible and answerable for one's actions.
example: The manager is accountable to the board of directors.
He is accountable for the success of the project.
Employees must be accountable for their performance.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: đầy đủ, vừa đủ (để làm gì đó); một cách thích đáng.
eng_explanation: adverb - In a satisfactory or sufficient manner; sufficiently.
example: She prepared adequately for the exam and felt confident.
The room was adequately lit for reading.
The company needs to adequately address customer concerns.

vn_meaning: động từ: bám chặt; tuân thủ, tuân theo (luật, quy tắc).
eng_explanation: verb - To stick firmly to a surface; to follow a rule or belief.
example: The poster didn't adhere to the wall.
We must adhere to the company's policies.
He adheres to a strict vegetarian diet.

vn_meaning: tính từ: liền kề, kề bên; kế tiếp.
eng_explanation: adjective - Situated next to each other; close by.
example: The houses are located in adjacent neighborhoods.
The two rooms are adjacent to each other.
The adjacent forest provides a habitat for many animals.

vn_meaning: động từ: điều chỉnh; làm quen với (tình huống).
eng_explanation: verb - To change slightly; to become accustomed to a new situation.
example: Please adjust the volume of the television.
It took her a while to adjust to the new time zone.
He adjusted his glasses and continued reading.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự điều chỉnh; sự làm quen.
eng_explanation: noun - The act of modifying or correcting something; adaptation.
example: The adjustment to the new software was easy.
A small adjustment to the settings improved the picture quality.
She made an adjustment to her schedule.

vn_meaning: động từ: quản lý; điều hành; cho thuốc (y học).
eng_explanation: verb - To manage or control; to give medication.
example: She administers the company's finances.
The nurse will administer the medication.
He was appointed to administer the estate.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự quản lý; chính quyền; bộ máy hành chính.
eng_explanation: noun - The process of managing or controlling; government.
example: The administration announced new policies.
The smooth administration of the project was crucial.
The new administration faces many challenges.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thuộc về hành chính; mang tính hành chính.
eng_explanation: adjective - Relating to administration; relating to the running of an organization.
example: Administrative tasks take up a lot of her time.
The administrative staff are very efficient.
Administrative procedures need to be streamlined.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người quản lý; người điều hành; quản trị viên.
eng_explanation: noun - A person who manages or controls something; system administrator.
example: The administrator oversaw the project's progress.
He is the system administrator for the company's network.
The school administrator addressed the students.

vn_meaning: động từ: ngưỡng mộ; hâm mộ; chiêm ngưỡng.
eng_explanation: verb - To regard with respect and approval; to look at something with pleasure.
example: I admire her dedication to her work.
We admire the beauty of the mountains.
He admired the artist's skill.

vn_meaning: tính từ: bất lợi, xấu, chống lại (hoàn cảnh, điều kiện); trái ngược (ý kiến, phán quyết)
eng_explanation: adj. Preventing success or development; harmful. (Negative impact)
example: The weather was adverse to our plans.
He faced adverse criticism from the press.
Adverse conditions made driving dangerous.

vn_meaning: động từ: quảng cáo, rao bán (sản phẩm, dịch vụ)
eng_explanation: v. To promote a product or service through public media. (Marketing)
example: They advertise their products on television.
The company plans to advertise the new campaign.
Don't believe everything you advertise.

vn_meaning: danh từ: quảng cáo, bản quảng cáo
eng_explanation: n. A public notice promoting a product or service. (Marketing material)
example: We saw an advertisement for the new car.
The advertisement was very effective.
Online advertisements are becoming more common.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ngành quảng cáo; hoạt động quảng cáo
eng_explanation: n. The business of promoting products or services. (Marketing industry)
example: She works in advertising.
Advertising plays a major role in our economy.
The advertising campaign was a success.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lời khuyên
eng_explanation: n. Guidance or recommendations offered with regard to prudent future action. (Guidance)
example: I need some advice on this matter.
She gave me good advice.
Take my advice and be careful.

vn_meaning: động từ: khuyên (ai đó) làm gì
eng_explanation: v. To offer guidance or recommendations to someone. (To give counsel)
example: I advise you to think carefully before making a decision.
The doctor advised him to rest.
We advise all passengers to fasten their seatbelts.

vn_meaning: động từ: ủng hộ, đề xướng; làm luật sư bào chữa; vận động cho (một ý kiến, mục tiêu); danh từ: người ủng hộ, người đề xướng
eng_explanation: v. To publicly support or recommend. n. A person who supports a cause. (Support)
example: She advocates for animal rights.
He is a strong advocate of free speech.
The lawyer advocated on behalf of his client.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thẩm mỹ, liên quan đến vẻ đẹp; danh từ: nguyên tắc thẩm mỹ
eng_explanation: adj. Concerned with beauty or the appreciation of beauty. (Artistic)
example: The painting has a strong aesthetic appeal.
She has a good aesthetic sense.
The aesthetic qualities of the building are remarkable.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chuyện, sự việc; mối quan hệ tình cảm (ngoại tình); công việc, chuyện kinh doanh
eng_explanation: n. An event or subject of interest; a romantic relationship. (Matter/Relationship)
example: The whole affair was a disaster.
It's a private affair.
He had an affair with his secretary.

vn_meaning: động từ: ảnh hưởng đến, tác động đến (cảm xúc, tình trạng); làm thay đổi
eng_explanation: v. To have an impact on; to influence. (To influence)
example: The weather will affect our plans.
His illness affected his work.
The new law will affect everyone.

vn_meaning: tình cảm
eng_explanation: A strong feeling of love or attachment.
example: She felt a deep affection for her childhood home.
The couple shared a profound affection for each other.

vn_meaning: có thể chi trả
eng_explanation: The ability to pay for something.
example: She can afford a new car.
The company offers affordable housing options.

vn_meaning: chốt giá
eng_explanation: A price that is accessible to a wide range of people.
example: The hotel offers affordable rates for tourists.
The product is considered affordable for most consumers.

vn_meaning: feeling fear or apprehension
eng_explanation: A feeling of fear or apprehension.
example: He was afraid of the dark.
She felt afraid of the unknown.

vn_meaning: sau khi
eng_explanation: Following a previous event.
example: The meeting was held after lunch.
The rain started after the storm.

vn_meaning: tác động
eng_explanation: The results of a disaster or event.
example: The city was devastated by the flood; the aftermath was grim.
The company faced a difficult aftermath after the scandal.

vn_meaning: buổi chiều
eng_explanation: The period between midday and sunset.
example: It was a lovely afternoon.
We spent the afternoon reading.

vn_meaning: về sau
eng_explanation: Following a previous event.
example: He finished his work after the meeting.
She replied afterwards.

vn_meaning: repeatedly
eng_explanation: Repeating something.
example: He made the same mistake again.
She repeated the question again.

vn_meaning: phủ ngược
eng_explanation: Opposing something.
example: The protesters were against the new law.
He fought against the injustice.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tuổi; tính từ: già (tuổi)
eng_explanation: noun: the period of a person’s life; adjective: old in age.
example: His age is a closely guarded secret.
She is an old age.

vn_meaning: adjective: già (tuổi); quá khứ phân từ của aged
eng_explanation: adjective: elderly; past participle of age.
example: An aged gentleman walked slowly.

He had aged gracefully over the years.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cơ quan, tổ chức; tính từ: đại diện
eng_explanation: noun: a body or organization having authority or power to act; adjective: representing someone or something.
example: The government agency investigated the case.
She works for a marketing agency.
He is a representative agency.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chương trình nghị sự, nội dung
eng_explanation: noun: a list of matters to be discussed at a meeting.
example: The agenda for the meeting included several important topics.
Please review the agenda before the conference.
She prepared the agenda carefully.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đại diện, trung gian; tính từ: hoạt động, có tác dụng
eng_explanation: noun: a person or thing that acts on behalf of another; adjective: active or effective.
example: He is a real estate agent.
The drug is a powerful agent.
The agent reported the findings to the manager.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự hung hăng, tấn công
eng_explanation: noun: hostile or violent behavior or attitudes.

vn_meaning: tính từ: hung hăng, tấn công; tính từ: tích cực, chủ động
eng_explanation: adjective: ready to attack or confront; adjective: enthusiastic and assertive.
example: His aggressive behavior was unacceptable.
She is an aggressive salesperson.
The company adopted an aggressive marketing strategy.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: trước kia, đã

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự đồng ý; động từ: đồng ý, thống nhất
eng_explanation: verb: to have the same opinion; noun: a state of agreement.
example: They agreed to the terms of the contract.
I don't agree with your opinion.
The agreement was reached after much discussion.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự đồng thuận, thỏa thuận; danh từ: hiệp ước
eng_explanation: noun: a mutual understanding or arrangement; noun: a formal treaty.
example: There was no agreement between the two parties.
The agreement included several key provisions.
The peace agreement ended the conflict.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thuộc về nông nghiệp (liên quan đến sản xuất nông nghiệp); liên quan đến nông nghiệp (về kinh tế, xã hội).
eng_explanation: adjective: relating to farming or agriculture; used for cultivating plants and raising animals.
example: The agricultural sector is vital for the country's economy.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nông nghiệp (ngành sản xuất nông nghiệp).
eng_explanation: noun: the science or practice of farming, including cultivation of the soil for growing crops and raising livestock.
example: Agriculture provides food and raw materials for many industries.
Modern agriculture relies heavily on technology and machinery.
The government is investing in agriculture to improve food security.

vn_meaning: trợ từ: ồ à (bày tỏ ngạc nhiên, ngỡ ngàng, hiểu ra,...).
eng_explanation: interjection: expressing surprise, realization, or pleasure; a soft exclamation.
example: Ah, I understand now!
Ah, that's a lovely painting.
Ah, finally, the rain has stopped.

vn_meaning: giới từ: phía trước; trước (thời gian).; trạng từ: tiến lên phía trước; sớm hơn.
eng_explanation: adverb/preposition: forward; in front; sooner than expected.
example: Let's move ahead with the project.
She's several steps ahead of the competition.
The meeting is scheduled ahead of time.

vn_meaning: danh từ: viện trợ (tiền bạc, hàng hóa,...).; động từ: giúp đỡ.
eng_explanation: noun: assistance or help given to someone in need; verb: to help or support someone.
example: The country received international aid after the earthquake.
We need to aid the victims of the flood.
She aided him in finding a job.

vn_meaning: danh từ: trợ lý (người giúp việc cho một người có chức phận).
eng_explanation: noun: an assistant or helper, typically to a person in a position of authority.
example: The president's aide managed his schedule.
She worked as an aide to a member of parliament.
He is a senior aide to the governor.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hội chứng suy giảm miễn dịch mắc phải (bệnh truyền nhiễm nguy hiểm).
eng_explanation: noun: Acquired Immunodeficiency Syndrome, a disease caused by HIV that weakens the immune system.
example: AIDS is a serious global health concern.

Prevention and education are crucial in combating AIDS.

vn_meaning: danh từ: mục tiêu (điều muốn đạt tới).; động từ: nhắm (vào); hướng tới.
eng_explanation: noun: a goal or objective; verb: to point or direct something at an object.
example: Her aim is to become a doctor.
He aimed the camera at the bird.
The company's aim is to increase profits.

vn_meaning: danh từ: không khí.
eng_explanation: noun: the mixture of gases that makes up the Earth's atmosphere.

Air travel is becoming more affordable.

vn_meaning: danh từ: máy bay.
eng_explanation: noun: a vehicle designed for flight, such as an airplane or helicopter.
example: The aircraft took off on time.

The military uses various types of aircraft.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự liên kết, sự sắp xếp thẳng hàng; sự phù hợp, sự đồng thuận.

vn_meaning: tính từ: giống nhau, tương tự; (động từ) giống nhau, tương tự.
eng_explanation: adj./adv. Similar; having a resemblance. (PoS: adj., adv.)
example: The twins look very much alike.
They think alike on most issues.

vn_meaning: tính từ: còn sống, đang sống; sôi nổi, náo nhiệt.
eng_explanation: adj. Living, not dead; full of life and energy. (PoS: adj.)
example: The patient is still alive after the surgery.
The city is alive with activity at night.

vn_meaning: đại từ, tính từ, trạng từ: tất cả, toàn bộ; mọi.
eng_explanation: det./pron./adv. The whole quantity or extent of. (PoS: det., pron., adv.)
example: All the students passed the exam.
All is well.
She spent all her time studying.

vn_meaning: tính từ, trạng từ: ổn, được, đồng ý; khỏe mạnh.
eng_explanation: adj./adv. Acceptable; in good condition; expressing agreement. (PoS: adj., adv.)
example: Is everything all right?

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự cáo buộc, lời tố cáo (thường chưa được chứng minh).
eng_explanation: n. A claim or assertion that something is true, often negative. (PoS: n.)
example: He denied the allegations of fraud.

vn_meaning: động từ: cáo buộc, tuyên bố (thường không có bằng chứng).
eng_explanation: v. To assert without proof; to accuse. (PoS: v.)
example: He alleged that he was unfairly dismissed.
The newspaper alleged corruption within the government.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: được cho là, theo lời đồn (thường dùng để giảm trách nhiệm).
eng_explanation: adv. Supposedly; as claimed by someone else. (PoS: adv.)
example: He allegedly stole the money.

vn_meaning: danh từ: liên minh, sự liên kết (giữa các quốc gia, tổ chức, cá nhân).
eng_explanation: n. A union or association formed for mutual benefit. (PoS: n.)
example: The two countries formed a military alliance.
The alliance between the companies proved successful.

vn_meaning: động từ: phân bổ, chỉ định, dành (nguồn lực, thời gian, tiền bạc).
eng_explanation: v. To distribute resources for a specific purpose. (PoS: v.)
example: The government allocated funds for education.
Time was allocated for each speaker.

vn_meaning: Phân bổ nguồn lực; phân chia công việc; phân bổ tài chính; phân chia trách nhiệm; phân chia nhiệm vụ; phân bổ nguồn lực cho một mục đích cụ thể.

example: The company needs to allocate more funds for marketing.
The government is allocating resources to improve education.

vn_meaning: Cho phép; cho phép sử dụng; cho phép thực hiện; cho phép làm gì đó; cho phép (một sự kiện); cho phép (một quyền); cho phép (một hành động).
eng_explanation: Allow means to grant permission or to permit something to happen.
example: The rules allow late submissions.

vn_meaning: Phần thưởng; khoản thanh toán; khoản trợ cấp; khoản hỗ trợ; khoản bồi thường; khoản thanh toán cho một sự kiện.
eng_explanation: Allowance is a payment or benefit given for a particular purpose.
example: She received an allowance for her chores.
The company offered an allowance for employees.

vn_meaning: Bạn đồng hành; người hỗ trợ; đồng minh; người cùng có chung mục tiêu; người có liên quan.
eng_explanation: Ally means a person or group who supports or works with you.
example: He relied on his ally to help him succeed.
The two companies formed an alliance to compete.

vn_meaning: Gần như; gần như; gần như có thể; gần như không.
eng_explanation: Almost means very close to something, often implying a possibility.
example: It's almost dark outside.

vn_meaning: Độc lập; một mình; không có ai.

example: She felt alone in the crowded room.

vn_meaning: Theo đường; theo hướng; dọc theo.

vn_meaning: Bên cạnh; cùng cạnh; bên hông.
eng_explanation: Alongside means beside or alongside.

vn_meaning: Đã; đã có; đã qua.
eng_explanation: Already means previously or currently.

vn_meaning: Ngoài; cùng; cũng.
eng_explanation: Also means in addition to or together with.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự thay đổi; động từ: thay đổi, sửa đổi (cấu trúc, hình dạng, v.v.)
eng_explanation: (verb) to change or modify; (noun) a change or modification.
example: The weather can alter quickly.
He altered his plans due to unforeseen circumstances.
The sculptor altered the statue to improve its appearance.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lựa chọn thay thế; tính từ: thay thế, khác biệt
eng_explanation: (noun) a different option; (adjective) providing a substitute or alternative.

She prefers the alternative design.

vn_meaning: gLiên từ: mặc dù, tuy nhiên
eng_explanation: (conjunction) expressing a contrast or concession; despite the fact that.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: hoàn toàn, tất cả cùng nhau
eng_explanation: (adverb) completely; all together.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhôm (loại kim loại)

vn_meaning: trạng từ: luôn luôn, không bao giờ
eng_explanation: (adverb) habitually; forever.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người không chuyên nghiệp; tính từ: nghiệp dư
eng_explanation: (noun) a non-professional performer; (adjective) not professional.

vn_meaning: tính từ: ngạc nhiên, kinh ngạc
eng_explanation: (adjective) filled with surprise or wonder.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đáng kinh ngạc, tuyệt vời
eng_explanation: (adjective) causing great surprise or wonder; remarkable.
example: The view from the top was amazing.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phó tế, đại sứ
eng_explanation: (noun) a diplomatic representative of a country.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khát vọng, hoài bão (mục tiêu lớn muốn đạt được); sự mong muốn thành công (trong sự nghiệp).
eng_explanation: noun: a strong desire and determination to achieve success.
example: She has a burning ambition to become a doctor.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đầy tham vọng; có hoài bão lớn; muốn đạt được nhiều thành tựu.
eng_explanation: adjective: having or showing a strong desire and determination to succeed.
example: He's an ambitious young man with a clear plan for his career.

vn_meaning: danh từ: xe cứu thương.
eng_explanation: noun: a vehicle for transporting sick or injured people to a hospital.
example: The ambulance arrived quickly at the scene of the accident.
Call an ambulance if someone is seriously injured.
The paramedics loaded the patient into the ambulance.

vn_meaning: động từ: sửa đổi, bổ sung (văn bản, luật); cải thiện (tình hình).
eng_explanation: verb: to make minor changes in something to improve it.
example: The contract was amended to reflect the new agreement.
They need to amend their approach to solve the problem.
The law was amended to include new provisions.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sửa đổi, bổ sung (văn bản, luật); cải chính.
eng_explanation: noun: a formal change or addition to a legal or official document.
example: The proposed amendment to the constitution was debated extensively.
The amendment clarified the original wording.

vn_meaning: giới từ: giữa, trong lúc; giữa vòng.
eng_explanation: preposition: surrounded by; in the middle of.

vn_meaning: giới từ: giữa, trong số (nhiều người hoặc vật).
eng_explanation: preposition: situated more or less in the middle of; surrounded by.
example: She felt comfortable among her friends.
The lost dog was found among the trees.

vn_meaning: danh từ: số lượng; số tiền; mức độ; động từ: là, tương đương (với).
eng_explanation: noun: a quantity that can be measured; verb: to be equal to.
example: The amount of rainfall was higher than usual.

vn_meaning: tính từ: buồn cười, gây tiếng cười; thú vị.
eng_explanation: adjective: causing laughter or providing entertainment; humorous.

His amusing antics always make us laugh.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phép so sánh; sự tương đồng.
eng_explanation: noun: a comparison between two things, typically for the purpose of explanation or clarification.
example: He used an analogy to explain the complex concept.
The analogy helped me understand the relationship between the two ideas.
The speaker drew an analogy between the human body and a machine.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: một cách giận dữ, tức giận (thể hiện trạng thái)
eng_explanation: adv. In a furious or irritated manner; with anger. (10 words)
example: He slammed the door angrily.
She spoke angrily about the injustice.
The dog barked angrily at the stranger.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tức giận, giận dữ; phẫn nộ (cảm xúc); dữ dội (thời tiết).
eng_explanation: adj. Feeling or showing strong annoyance, displeasure, or hostility. (12 words)
example: She was angry about the broken vase.
He gave me an angry look.

vn_meaning: danh từ: động vật (sinh vật không có lý trí, không sản xuất ra thức ăn)
eng_explanation: n. A living organism that feeds on organic matter, typically unable to move. (13 words)
example: The zoo has a wide variety of animals.
Dogs are popular domestic animals.
Protecting endangered animals is crucial.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hoạt hình; sự làm sống động, sự khuấy động (tinh thần)
eng_explanation: n. The technique of photographing successive drawings to create an illusion of movement. (15 words)
example: Disney is famous for its animation.
The animation brought the story to life.
Her speech lacked animation and enthusiasm.

vn_meaning: danh từ: mắt cá chân (bộ phận nối bàn chân với cẳng chân)
eng_explanation: n. The joint connecting the foot to the leg. (8 words)
example: She sprained her ankle playing basketball.
He wore high boots that covered his ankles.
The bracelet adorned her delicate ankle.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ngày kỷ niệm (một sự kiện quan trọng)
eng_explanation: n. The date on which an event took place or began. (10 words)
example: We celebrated our wedding anniversary.
The company marked its 50th anniversary.
It's their tenth dating anniversary.

vn_meaning: động từ: thông báo, xưng báo (một tin tức, sự kiện)
eng_explanation: v. To make something known publicly or officially. (9 words)
example: The company will announce its new product tomorrow.
She announced her engagement to her friends.
The airport announced flight delays.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự thông báo, bản thông báo (một tin tức, sự kiện)
eng_explanation: n. A public or official statement; a notification. (9 words)
example: The school made an announcement about the snow day.
We heard the announcement on the radio.
The company's announcement surprised investors.

vn_meaning: động từ: làm phiền, chọc tức, gây khó chịu (cho ai đó)
eng_explanation: v. To cause someone to feel irritated or bothered. (9 words)
example: His constant questions annoyed me.
Don't annoy the cat.
It doesn't annoy me at all.

vn_meaning: tính từ: bực mình, khó chịu, chán nản (do bị làm phiền)
eng_explanation: adj. Slightly irritated; feeling resentment. (6 words)
example: She was annoyed by the loud music.
He sounded annoyed on the phone.
I get annoyed when people are late.

vn_meaning: Causes irritation or dissatisfaction; unpleasant.
eng_explanation: It describes something that bothers or irritates someone.
example: The traffic was incredibly annoying.
I find this software very annoying.

vn_meaning: Occurring or occurring at the same time as regular intervals.
eng_explanation: Refers to a period that repeats regularly.
example: We have an annual report every year.
The company's annual revenue is impressive.

vn_meaning: Every year; regularly.
eng_explanation: Indicates a recurring event that happens at a fixed interval.
example: The company releases its annual report every year.
We expect to receive the annual dividend.

vn_meaning: Not identifying or revealing one's identity.
eng_explanation: Means someone is not known or identified.
example: The survey results were anonymous.
We need to protect the privacy of the anonymous participants.

vn_meaning: một lần nữa
eng_explanation: Represents something that is similar to another.
example: I bought another book on the same topic.
He has another sister.

vn_meaning: Trả lời
eng_explanation: Provides an answer to a question or solves a problem.
example: What is the answer to the question?
She gave an answer to my question.

vn_meaning: dự đoán
eng_explanation: Implies expecting something to occur in the future.
example: We need to anticipate the consequences of the new policy.
She anticipated the arrival of the guests.

vn_meaning: lo lắng
eng_explanation: Describes a state of worry or nervousness.
example: I feel a lot of anxiety about the upcoming exam.
She had a lot of anxiety about her health.

vn_meaning: Worried, uneasy, or apprehensive.
eng_explanation: Expresses a state of worry or unease.
example: He was an anxious man.
She felt anxious about the situation.

vn_meaning: Every single one; all.
eng_explanation: Indicates that there is only one of something.
example: Any help would be appreciated.
I have any questions.

vn_meaning: động từ: không còn nữa; tính từ: thêm nữa (không)
eng_explanation: ‘any more’ (phrase) – indicating a lack of something or a cessation of an action.
example: There’s no need to worry about it anymore.
He doesn’t want any more sugar in his coffee.
We’ve finished eating, there’s no more food.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bất kỳ ai; tính từ: của bất kỳ ai
eng_explanation: ‘anybody’ (noun) – refers to any person, without specifying who.
example: Can anybody help me with this problem?
Anybody is welcome to join us.
Is anybody home?

vn_meaning: danh từ: bất kỳ ai; tính từ: của bất kỳ ai
eng_explanation: ‘anyone’ (noun/adjective) – similar to ‘anybody’, referring to any person.
example: Does anyone know the answer?
Anyone can learn with practice.
Is anyone coming to the party?

vn_meaning: danh từ: bất cứ thứ gì; tính từ: bất cứ thứ gì
eng_explanation: ‘anything’ (noun/adjective) – refers to any object or thing, regardless of type.
example: I don’t care about anything else.
Is there anything I can do to help?
She’s interested in anything related to art.

vn_meaning: phó từ: bất kể thế nào; bất kể gì; bất cứ cách nào
eng_explanation: ‘anyway’ (adverb) – used to introduce a change of topic or a different approach.
example: Anyway, let’s start the meeting.
I’m going anyway, even if it’s raining.
Anyway you look at it, it’s a difficult situation.

vn_meaning: tính từ: ở bất cứ đâu; trạng từ: ở bất cứ đâu
eng_explanation: ‘anywhere’ (adverb/adjective) – indicates a location without specifying a particular place.
example: I’d like to go anywhere as long as I’m with you.
You can find it anywhere.
He’s traveled anywhere he’s wanted to.

vn_meaning: tính từ: riêng biệt; tách biệt; tách rời; phó từ: ngoài ra; tách biệt
eng_explanation: ‘apart’ (adjective/adverb) – meaning separate or distinct, or indicating a location.
example: They live apart from their families.
The two houses are apart.
Let’s meet apart from the group.

vn_meaning: danh từ: căn hộ; chung cư; nhà ở
eng_explanation: ‘apartment’ (noun) – a self-contained housing unit, typically part of a larger building.
example: I’m looking for an apartment in the city center.
They live in a small apartment.
The apartment has a balcony.

vn_meaning: động từ: xin lỗi; tỏ lỗi
eng_explanation: ‘apologize’ (verb) – to express regret or remorse for something one has done.
example: I apologize for my mistake.
Please apologize to her.
He apologized profusely.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lời xin lỗi; sự xin lỗi
eng_explanation: ‘apology’ (noun) – an expression of regret or remorse for a wrongdoing.
example: He offered a sincere apology.
Her apology was not accepted.
The company issued an apology to the public.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ứng dụng (công nghệ); rút gọn của application.
eng_explanation: A mobile application; short for 'application'.
example: I downloaded a new app for learning languages.
This app helps me track my daily expenses.
The app is available for both iOS and Android devices.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thiết bị, bộ máy móc; dụng cụ phức tạp.
eng_explanation: A complex piece of equipment; a set of instruments for a specific purpose.
example: The laboratory was filled with scientific apparatus.
The surgical apparatus was sterilized before the operation.
The apparatus used in the experiment was quite sophisticated.

vn_meaning: tính từ: rõ ràng, hiển nhiên; dễ thấy.
eng_explanation: Clearly visible or understood; obvious.
example: It was apparent that he was nervous.
The damage to the car was apparent.
Her joy was apparent to everyone.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: rõ ràng là, có vẻ là; bề ngoài.
eng_explanation: Seemingly; evidently.
example: Apparently, it's going to rain later.
Apparently, she didn't know about the meeting.
Apparently, he's the best candidate for the job.

vn_meaning: danh từ: kháng cáo (pháp lý); sự hấp dẫn; lời kêu gọi; khẩn cầu.; động từ: kháng cáo; kêu gọi; hấp dẫn.
eng_explanation: A request to a higher authority; attractiveness; a plea.
example: He decided to appeal the court's decision.
The charity made an appeal for donations.
The painting's vibrant colors have a strong appeal.

vn_meaning: tính từ: hấp dẫn, quyến rũ; đáng để xem xét.
eng_explanation: Attractive or interesting; worthy of consideration.
example: The job offer was very appealing.
She found the movie surprisingly appealing.
The town has a charming and appealing atmosphere.

vn_meaning: động từ: xuất hiện; có vẻ; trông giống.
eng_explanation: To come into view; to seem to be.
example: He appeared at the party unexpectedly.
It appears that we have a problem.
She appears to be in good health.

vn_meaning: danh từ: vẻ ngoài, diện mạo; sự xuất hiện.
eng_explanation: The way someone or something looks; an act of appearing.
example: He made a grand appearance at the event.
Her appearance was striking.
The appearance of the comet was a rare sight.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự thèm ăn, khẩu vị.
eng_explanation: A natural desire to eat; enjoyment of food.
example: He has a healthy appetite.
The delicious smell stimulated her appetite.
Stress can often reduce your appetite.

vn_meaning: động từ: vỗ tay tán thưởng.
eng_explanation: To show approval or praise by clapping.
example: The audience applauded the performance.
Let's applaud their efforts.
The speaker was applauded for his inspiring speech.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thích hợp, phù hợp (với tình huống, mục đích); động từ: chiếm đoạt, lấy (của người khác) trái phép.
eng_explanation: adj. Suitable or proper; v. To take possession of (something) for one's own use. (adj, v)
example: This is an appropriate outfit for a business meeting.
It is not appropriate to interrupt someone when they are speaking.
He was accused of appropriating funds from the charity.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: một cách thích hợp, phù hợp.
eng_explanation: adv. In a suitable or proper manner. (adv)
example: She was appropriately dressed for the funeral.
He responded appropriately to the crisis.
The decorations were appropriately festive for the occasion.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự chấp thuận, sự đồng ý; sự phê duyệt.
eng_explanation: n. The action of approving something; official permission. (n)
example: The project received approval from the board of directors.
She needed her parents' approval to go on the trip.
The new law requires government approval.

vn_meaning: động từ: chấp thuận, đồng ý; phê duyệt.
eng_explanation: v. To officially agree to or accept something. (v)
example: The manager approved the budget request.
The council approved the new building plans.
Do you approve of my decision?

vn_meaning: trạng từ: xấp xỉ, gần đúng.
eng_explanation: adv. Nearly; around; in approximate terms. (adv)
example: The journey takes approximately three hours.
There were approximately 50 people at the meeting.
The cost will be approximately $100.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tháng Tư.
eng_explanation: n. The fourth month of the year. (n)
example: Her birthday is in April.
April is often a rainy month.
The flowers bloom beautifully in April.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tùy tiện, ngẫu nhiên, không có căn cứ.
eng_explanation: adj. Based on random choice or personal whim, rather than any reason. (adj)
example: The selection of winners was completely arbitrary.
There seems to be no logical reason for this arbitrary rule.
The punishment was arbitrary and unfair.

vn_meaning: danh từ: kiến trúc sư.
eng_explanation: n. A person who designs buildings and oversees their construction. (n)
example: The architect designed a beautiful modern house.
She is a renowned architect specializing in sustainable design.
The client worked closely with the architect on the project.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thuộc về kiến trúc; liên quan đến kiến trúc.
eng_explanation: adj. Relating to the design and style of buildings. (adj)
example: The city is famous for its architectural landmarks.
He studied architectural history at university.
The building has a unique architectural style.

vn_meaning: danh từ: kiến trúc; nghệ thuật xây dựng.
eng_explanation: n. The art or practice of designing and building structures. (n)
example: He is passionate about modern architecture.
The architecture of ancient Rome is impressive.
She is studying architecture at university.

vn_meaning: lưu trữ
eng_explanation: An archive is a collection of historical documents and records.
example: The university’s archive holds thousands of old books.
We need to organize the archive to find relevant information.

vn_meaning: khu vực
eng_explanation: An area refers to a specific geographical region.
example: The area is experiencing rapid economic growth.
The area is known for its beautiful beaches.

vn_meaning: a place where sports competitions are held.
eng_explanation: An arena is a large, open space for sporting events.
example: The soccer match was held in the arena.
The arena was packed with spectators.

vn_meaning: có lẽ
eng_explanation: ‘Arguably’ indicates a suggestion or a possibility.
example: Some people argue that the new policy is unfair.
The evidence is arguably insufficient to support the claim.

vn_meaning: to express disagreement or disagreement about something.
eng_explanation: To argue is to express a disagreement or debate.
example: They argued about the best way to solve the problem.
The debate was quite intense, and both sides argued vehemently.

vn_meaning: lý lẽ
eng_explanation: An argument is a discussion or debate about a topic.
example: The professor presented a complex argument for his theory.
The argument was based on logical reasoning.

vn_meaning: nảy sinh
eng_explanation: ‘Arise’ means to begin to exist or become active.
example: The storm arose suddenly.
The company’s success arose from its innovative products.

vn_meaning: tay
eng_explanation: An arm is a weapon used for defense or attack.
example: The soldiers carried rifles as arms.
The arm of the statue was covered in moss.

vn_meaning: có vũ trang
eng_explanation: ‘Armed’ means equipped with weapons or armor.
example: The soldiers were armed with rifles.
The village was defended by armed guards.

vn_meaning: weapons, especially those used for defense or attack.
eng_explanation: ‘Arms’ refers to weapons used for defense or attack.
example: The soldiers carried rifles as arms.
The battle was fought with heavy artillery.

vn_meaning: danh từ: quân đội; danh từ: đội quân (trong một môn thể thao)
eng_explanation: Noun: A large military force; also, a team in a sport.
example: The army marched towards the border.
The football team was a formidable army.
Soldiers are trained to defend their army.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: xung quanh; trạng từ: gần như; tính từ: xung quanh; trái phụ, phụ tính: xung quanh
eng_explanation: Adverb: Approximately; Preposition/Adjective: Surrounding;  indicating location or extent.
example: She walked around the park.
The house is around 100 years old.
They gathered around the campfire.

vn_meaning: động từ: sắp xếp; động từ: tổ chức; động từ: bày trí
eng_explanation: Verb: To organize or plan; to decorate or set up.
example: Please arrange the books on the shelf.
The event organizers arranged a beautiful venue.
She arranged flowers in a vase.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự sắp xếp; danh từ: thỏa thuận; danh từ: trang phục, bộ quần áo
eng_explanation: Noun: A plan or system; an agreement; a set of clothes.
example: The wedding arrangement was elaborate.
We made an arrangement to meet tomorrow.
He wore a formal arrangement for the occasion.

vn_meaning: danh từ: mảng; danh từ: hàng; danh từ: dãy
eng_explanation: Noun: A collection or row; often used in mathematics or computer science.
example: The array of colors was stunning.
The soldiers stood in an array.
The data is stored in an array.

vn_meaning: động từ: bắt giữ; động từ: gây ra (sự, hiện tượng)
eng_explanation: Verb: To take someone into custody; to cause or trigger.
example: The police arrested the suspect.
The storm caused a widespread arrest.
His actions led to an arrest of public criticism.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự đến; danh từ: người đến
eng_explanation: Noun: The act of arriving; a person who arrives.
example: The arrival of the guests was announced.
Her arrival was met with cheers.
The train's arrival was delayed.

vn_meaning: động từ: đến; động từ: xuất hiện
eng_explanation: Verb: To reach a destination; to appear.
example: I will arrive at the airport at 3 pm.
The sun arrived after a long rain.
He arrived late to the meeting.

vn_meaning: danh từ: mũi tên; danh từ: (cây) mũi tên
eng_explanation: Noun: A projectile for a bow; a slender, pointed piece of wood.
example: He shot an arrow at the target.
The museum displayed a collection of arrows.
The arrow flew through the air.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nghệ thuật; danh từ: tác phẩm nghệ thuật
eng_explanation: Noun: The expression or practice of human creative skill and imagination.
example: She is passionate about art.
The museum houses a vast collection of art.
He created a beautiful piece of art.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bài viết (báo chí, tạp chí); món hàng (trong danh mục); điều khoản (trong hiệp ước).
eng_explanation: article (n.) - a written work; a particular item in a list or category.
example: The newspaper published a detailed article about the new policy.
I added a new article to my online store.
The treaty included several articles regarding trade regulations.

vn_meaning: tính từ: rõ ràng, mạch lạc; biết diễn đạt tốt; (văn học) có văn phong trau chuốt.; động từ: diễn đạt rõ ràng, mạch lạc.
eng_explanation: articulate (adj.) - expressed clearly and effectively; (v.) - express (an idea) clearly.
example: She is an articulate speaker who can easily convey her ideas.
The author's articulate prose made the complex topic accessible.
He struggled to articulate his feelings about the situation.

vn_meaning: tính từ: nhân tạo, giả tạo; không tự nhiên.
eng_explanation: artificial (adj.) - made or produced by human beings rather than occurring naturally.
example: The flowers looked beautiful, but they were artificial.
The artificial sweetener has no calories.
The artist used artificial lighting to create a dramatic effect.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nghệ sĩ (họa sĩ, nhạc sĩ, diễn viên...).
eng_explanation: artist (n.) - a person who creates art, especially visual art; a performer.
example: The artist spent years perfecting his technique.
She is a talented artist with a unique style.
The gallery featured works by both established and emerging artists.

vn_meaning: tính từ: mang tính nghệ thuật; có óc thẩm mỹ; khéo tay.
eng_explanation: artistic (adj.) - having or revealing natural creative skill; relating to art.
example: The building's artistic design was admired by everyone.
She has an artistic flair for decorating.
The museum showcased artistic masterpieces from around the world.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tác phẩm nghệ thuật (tranh vẽ, điêu khắc...).
eng_explanation: artwork (n.) - a visual unit of creative expression; a piece of art.
example: The museum displayed a collection of modern artwork.
The artwork was valued at millions of dollars.
She carefully framed the artwork to protect it from damage.

vn_meaning: giới từ/liên từ: như; khi; vì; trong khi; bởi vì.
eng_explanation: as (conj./prep.) - in the same way; while; because.
example: She is as tall as her brother.
As I was walking home, I saw a stray cat.
He did it as a favor to his friend.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tro (cây, thuốc lá...).
eng_explanation: ash (n.) - the residue left after something is burned.
example: The fireplace was filled with ash.
He flicked the ash from his cigarette.
A layer of ash covered the ground after the forest fire.

vn_meaning: tính từ: xấu hổ, hối hận.
eng_explanation: ashamed (adj.) - feeling embarrassment or regret about something.
example: He was ashamed of his behavior.
She felt ashamed to admit her mistake.
I am ashamed to say I forgot your birthday.

vn_meaning: giới từ: sang một bên; ra ngoài.; trạng từ: thầm thì, riêng tư.
eng_explanation: aside (adv./prep.) - to one side; privately or secretly.
example: He stepped aside to let her pass.
She whispered a comment aside to her friend.
Please move your car aside.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự khẳng định, sự xác nhận (một điều gì đó là đúng); lời tuyên bố, lời khẳng định (mạnh mẽ)
eng_explanation: noun: a confident and forceful statement of fact or belief. (assertion of rights)
example: His assertion that he was innocent was met with skepticism.
The lawyer made a strong assertion on behalf of his client.
Her assertions about the company's finances were proven false.

vn_meaning: động từ: đánh giá, định giá (chất lượng, giá trị, mức độ); kiểm tra, xem xét (kỹ lưỡng)
eng_explanation: verb: evaluate or estimate the nature, ability, or quality of. (assess the risks)
example: The teacher will assess the students' progress with a final exam.
We need to assess the damage caused by the storm.
Financial advisors can help you assess your investment options.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự đánh giá, sự định giá; sự kiểm tra, sự xem xét (kỹ lưỡng); bản đánh giá, bản định giá
eng_explanation: noun: the evaluation or estimation of the nature, quality, or ability of someone or something. (risk assessment)
example: The assessment of the property's value was higher than expected.
The company conducted a thorough risk assessment.
Regular assessments help track student learning.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tài sản (có giá trị); lợi thế, điểm mạnh (của cá nhân hoặc tổ chức)
eng_explanation: noun: a valuable resource or possession. (company assets); a useful quality. (an asset to the team)
example: The company's assets include buildings, equipment, and cash.
Her strong communication skills are a valuable asset.
Real estate is often considered a long-term asset.

vn_meaning: động từ: giao (việc, nhiệm vụ); chỉ định, phân công (người làm việc); gán (quyền, trách nhiệm)
eng_explanation: verb: allocate a job or duty. (assign tasks); designate. (assign blame)
example: The manager assigned the project to a team of engineers.
The teacher assigned homework for the weekend.
He was assigned to work under the supervision of a senior officer.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự giao việc, nhiệm vụ được giao; bài tập (học sinh, sinh viên)
eng_explanation: noun: a task or piece of work assigned to someone. (homework assignment)
example: She completed the assignment on time.
The journalist was given a dangerous assignment.
The students received their writing assignments.

vn_meaning: động từ: giúp đỡ, hỗ trợ (ai đó làm việc gì đó)
eng_explanation: verb: help (someone), typically by doing a part of their work. (assist with research)
example: Can you assist me with this heavy box?
The nurse assisted the doctor during the surgery.
We are here to assist you with any questions you may have.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự giúp đỡ, sự hỗ trợ
eng_explanation: noun: the action of helping someone. (financial assistance)
example: She received assistance from a local charity.
The company provides technical assistance to its customers.
He offered his assistance with the preparations.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người trợ lý, người giúp việc (cho ai đó)
eng_explanation: noun: a person who assists another, especially in a professional capacity. (personal assistant)
example: She hired a personal assistant to help manage her schedule.
The professor's teaching assistant graded the papers.
He started his career as a research assistant.

vn_meaning: động từ: liên kết, liên tưởng (với); kết giao, giao du (với); cộng tác, hợp tác (với); danh từ: đồng nghiệp, cộng sự
eng_explanation: verb: connect or relate to. (associate colors with emotions); partner with. (associate with a firm); noun: colleague. (business associate)
example: I associate the smell of coffee with mornings.
She is an associate at the law firm.
He doesn't associate with people he dislikes.

vn_meaning: liên quan
eng_explanation: To be connected or linked to; a relationship between two things.
example: The company is associated with a major brand.
She was associated with a successful project.
The research was associated with a new theory.

vn_meaning: hiệp hội
eng_explanation: A connection or relationship between two things; a link.
example: The association between the two countries is complex.
The association between the two events was surprising.
She made an association between her feelings and her actions.

vn_meaning: giả định
eng_explanation: To suppose something to be true without proof.
example: I assume the meeting will start at 9 am.
She assumed the problem was solved.
He assumed the responsibility without confirmation.

vn_meaning: giả định
eng_explanation: A belief or assumption about something.
example: The assumption of a higher interest rate impacted the market.
She made an assumption about his intentions.
The assumption of a new law led to confusion.

vn_meaning: cam đoan
eng_explanation: A guarantee or assurance of something.
example: The company offers assurance of product quality.
She sought assurance of her safety.
He offered assurance of his commitment.

vn_meaning: khẳng định
eng_explanation: To give someone confidence or reassurance.
example: Let's assure each other that we'll be there.
She assured him of her support.
He assured her of his commitment to the project.

vn_meaning: causing great surprise or wonder
eng_explanation: Causing great surprise or wonder.
example: The discovery was astonishing.
The performance was astonishing.
The news was astonishing.

vn_meaning: nghĩa trang
eng_explanation: A place of safety or refuge.
example: She sought asylum in the country.
The building offered asylum to refugees.
He sought asylum from the storm.

vn_meaning: ở
eng_explanation: In or at a place or time.
example: I'm at home.
He's at the library.
We're at the meeting.

vn_meaning: vận động viên
eng_explanation: A person who participates in sports.
example: She's an athlete in her community.
He's an athlete in the Olympics.
The team is an athlete.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bầu không khí; khí quyển; môi trường (vận động viên); tính từ: đặc biệt (về bầu không khí)
eng_explanation: Noun: The air, especially as it relates to a particular place or situation. (n.)
example: The atmosphere in the room was tense.
The mountain atmosphere is incredibly fresh.
He enjoyed the festive atmosphere of the holiday.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tội ác khủng khiếp; hành vi tàn bạo; tội ác chiến tranh
eng_explanation: Noun: A terrible crime or act of cruelty. (n.)
example: The reports detailed the atrocities committed during the war.
The massacre was considered an unconscionable atrocity.
He spoke out against the atrocities being committed.

vn_meaning: động từ: gắn; dính; kết nối; đính kèm; liên kết (với)
eng_explanation: Verb: To fasten or join something to something else. (v.)
example: Please attach the document to the email.
He attached his resume to the job application.
She attached a photo to her message.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phụ kiện; đồ kèm; tệp đính kèm; sự gắn kết; mối quan hệ
eng_explanation: Noun: An accessory or something added to something else. (n.)
example: The handbag came with a leather attachment.
The email had an important attachment.
There was a strong attachment between them.

vn_meaning: động từ: tấn công; tấn lược; tấn công vào; biểu hiện (cơn thịnh nộ); xâm nhập (vào)
eng_explanation: Verb: To assault or attack someone or something. (v.)
example: The soldiers launched an attack on the enemy.
He felt a sudden attack of anger.
Hackers launched an attack on the website.

Do you believe in ghosts?
She believes that hard work pays off.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chuông
eng_explanation: noun: a device that makes a ringing sound, often used to signal.
example: The school bell rang at 3 pm.
She rang the bell to call for help.
He admired the antique bell.

vn_meaning: động từ: thuộc về; sở hữu; là thành viên của
eng_explanation: verb: to be owned by; to be a member of; to fit in.
example: This book belongs to me.
She belongs to a book club.

vn_meaning: tính từ: được yêu quý; thân yêu; danh từ: người yêu quý
eng_explanation: adjective: dearly loved; noun: a person who is deeply loved.
example: He was a beloved teacher.
She is my beloved wife.

vn_meaning: giới từ: bên cạnh, ở cạnh (một người hoặc vật); bên cạnh (về vị trí)
eng_explanation: prep. at the side of; next to. (adv.) close by.
example: She sat beside me during the movie.
There's a beautiful garden beside the house.
He stood beside her, offering support.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: ngoài ra, bên cạnh đó; (beside oneself) mất kiểm soát, không làm chủ được bản thân
eng_explanation: adv. in addition; also. (prep.) apart from. (idiom) extremely upset.
example: Besides English, she speaks French and Spanish.
He's a talented musician; besides, he's a great athlete.
She was besides herself with grief.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tốt nhất, tuyệt vời nhất; danh từ: những điều tốt đẹp nhất; trạng từ: tốt nhất, một cách tốt nhất
eng_explanation: adj. superlative of 'good'; most excellent. n. the highest quality. adv. most effectively.
example: This is the best coffee I've ever tasted.
I wish you all the best in your new job.
She always tries to do her best.

vn_meaning: động từ: cá cược, đánh cược; danh từ: khoản cá cược
eng_explanation: v. to risk money on an outcome. n. an agreement to pay money if a prediction is wrong.
example: I bet you five dollars that it will rain.
He won a lot of money on a bet.
Let's make a bet on the game.

vn_meaning: động từ: phản bội, lừa dối, bội ước
eng_explanation: v. to violate trust; to be disloyal to. (transitive)
example: He betrayed his friends by revealing their secrets.
She felt betrayed when she found out he was lying.
Don't betray my confidence.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tốt hơn; động từ: cải thiện, làm cho tốt hơn; trạng từ: tốt hơn
eng_explanation: adj. comparative of 'good'. v. to improve. adv. more favorably.
example: This book is better than the last one.
I hope things get better soon.
You should try to eat better.

vn_meaning: giới từ: giữa (hai hoặc nhiều đối tượng)
eng_explanation: prep. in the space separating two or more things.
example: The house is located between the park and the school.
There's a good relationship between the two countries.
Keep a secret between you and me.

vn_meaning: giới từ: vượt quá, xa hơn, ngoài tầm với; (beyond belief) khó tin
eng_explanation: prep. on the further side of; outside the range of. (idiom) unbelievable.
example: The city lies beyond the mountains.
His actions were beyond my comprehension.
The beauty of the landscape was beyond belief.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thành kiến, khuynh hướng; động từ: làm thiên vị, gây thành kiến
eng_explanation: n. a prejudice in favor of or against one thing. v. to influence unfairly.
example: The media often shows a bias towards certain political parties.
It's important to be aware of your own biases.
The judge was accused of bias.

vn_meaning: danh từ: xe đạp
eng_explanation: n. a two-wheeled vehicle propelled by pedals.
example: She rides her bicycle to work every day.
He learned to ride a bicycle when he was five.
Bicycles are a great way to get exercise.

vn_meaning: đấu giá
eng_explanation: To submit an offer for a purchase.
example: The company is offering a bid for the land.
He bid for the opportunity to work on the project.

vn_meaning: Large; considerable; significant.
eng_explanation: A large size or amount.
example: That's a big house.

vn_meaning: xe đạp
eng_explanation: A bicycle used for personal transportation.
example: I need to buy a new bike.
She enjoys cycling in the park.

vn_meaning: hóa đơn
eng_explanation: A monetary payment.
example: The government is collecting a bill for services.

eng_explanation: A very large amount of money.
example: The company is aiming for a billion-dollar profit.
The stock price surged after the news.

vn_meaning: bin
eng_explanation: A container for grouping and storing items.
example: We need to sort the items into different bins.

vn_meaning: bind
eng_explanation: To tie or attach something together.
example: The rope was bound tightly.

vn_meaning: biography
eng_explanation: A detailed account of a person's life.
example: I'm reading a biography of Shakespeare.

vn_meaning: Relating to living organisms.
eng_explanation: Concerned with the structure and function of living things.
example: The study of biological processes.

vn_meaning: biology
eng_explanation: The science of living organisms.
example: The biology department offers courses in genetics.
She is a biology student.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chim (bản tính); tính từ: chim (màu sắc)
eng_explanation: Noun: a feathered animal; Adjective: of or resembling a bird (color).
example: The bird sang a beautiful song.
A black bird flew across the sky.
She loves watching birds in her garden.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ngày sinh; danh từ: sự ra đời
eng_explanation: Noun: the day someone is born; the act of being born.
example: His birthdate is July 4th.

The hospital recorded the baby's birth.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ngày sinh nhật
eng_explanation: Noun: the day someone is born; a celebration of that day.
example: I'm celebrating my birthday with a party.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bánh quy (Anh); bánh bích quy (Việt)
eng_explanation: Noun: a small, baked cake or pastry (British); a type of cookie (Vietnamese).

vn_meaning: danh từ: giám mục (trong tôn giáo); danh từ: người có chức vụ cao (trong quân đội, tổ chức)

vn_meaning: danh từ: miếng nhỏ; danh từ: hơi (lạnh, nóng); danh từ: cuộc tấn công ngắn

vn_meaning: danh từ: cắn; danh từ: vết cắn; danh từ: cơn (giận, đau)
eng_explanation: Noun: to grasp with teeth; a tooth mark; a sudden feeling (anger, pain).

vn_meaning: tính từ: đắng (vị); tính từ: cay đắng (cảm xúc)
eng_explanation: Adjective: having a sharp, unpleasant taste; feeling or expressing resentment.
example: The coffee was too bitter.

vn_meaning: tính từ: kỳ quặc; tính từ: lạ thường
eng_explanation: Adjective: very strange or unusual; peculiar or eccentric.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đen (màu sắc); danh từ: người da đen
eng_explanation: Adjective: of the color black; a person with dark skin.
example: The cat is black.
He wore a black suit.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lưỡi (dao, kiếm); phiến (cỏ, lá); (tương tự) người dẫn đầu (trong thể thao).

vn_meaning: động từ: đổ lỗi; trách móc; danh từ: sự đổ lỗi; trách móc.
eng_explanation: verb: to assign responsibility for a fault or wrong; noun: the act of assigning responsibility.

vn_meaning: tính từ: trống rỗng; không có gì; danh từ: tờ giấy trống; khoảng trống.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chăn; tấm vải che phủ.
eng_explanation: noun: a covering of wool, cotton, or synthetic fibers used on a bed or as clothing.

vn_meaning: danh từ: vụ nổ; đợt gió mạnh; động từ: nổ; thổi mạnh.
eng_explanation: noun: a sudden, violent explosion; a strong gust of wind; verb: to explode; to blow strongly.

vn_meaning: động từ: chảy máu; danh từ: sự chảy máu.

vn_meaning: động từ: trộn lẫn; pha trộn; danh từ: sự trộn lẫn; hỗn hợp.
eng_explanation: verb: to mix or combine; noun: a mixture made by combining different things.
example: She blended the ingredients together in a bowl.

vn_meaning: động từ: ban phước; chúc phúc.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự ban phước; lời chúc phúc; điều may mắn.

vn_meaning: tính từ: mù; không thấy gì; danh từ: người mù; động từ: làm mù.

vn_meaning: động từ: sôi (nước, chất lỏng); luộc (thực phẩm); tính từ: sôi sục, nóng bỏng (cảm xúc)

vn_meaning: tính từ: táo bạo, mạnh dạn; in đậm (chữ)

vn_meaning: danh từ: bom; động từ: ném bom

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự ném bom
eng_explanation: n. the act of attacking with bombs; a heavy and continuous attack.
example: The bombing campaign lasted for weeks.

vn_meaning: danh từ: mối liên kết, sự gắn bó; trái phiếu (tài chính); động từ: gắn bó, liên kết

vn_meaning: danh từ: xương

vn_meaning: danh từ: tiền thưởng, khoản thưởng

vn_meaning: danh từ: sách; động từ: đặt vé, đặt chỗ

vn_meaning: danh từ: việc đặt vé, việc đặt chỗ
eng_explanation: n. the act of reserving something, such as a ticket or room.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tiếng nổ; sự bùng nổ, sự phát triển mạnh mẽ; động từ: nổ, bùng nổ

vn_meaning: boost
eng_explanation: To provide assistance or support to achieve a goal.

vn_meaning: a small, leather shoe worn by horses or other animals.

The horse’s boot was worn thin.

vn_meaning: border
eng_explanation: The line separating one area from another.

vn_meaning: bored
eng_explanation: A state of being uninterested or unhappy.

vn_meaning: boring
eng_explanation: Lacking excitement or interest.

vn_meaning: born
eng_explanation: The act of beginning to exist.
example: She was born on a sunny morning.

vn_meaning: to take something that belongs to someone else without asking.

vn_meaning: boss
eng_explanation: The head of a team or department.

vn_meaning: two things or people.

vn_meaning: khó chịu
eng_explanation: To cause inconvenience or annoyance.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chai (đựng nước, rượu,...); danh từ: bình (đựng thuốc, hóa chất,...)

vn_meaning: danh từ: đáy; danh từ: phần dưới; danh từ: cuối cùng (của danh sách, thời gian,...)

vn_meaning: danh từ: giới hạn; danh từ: biên giới; tính từ: sắp tới; động từ: buộc; động từ: chạy nhanh
eng_explanation: Noun: A limit or restriction; Verb: To tie or restrict; Verb: To run quickly.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ranh giới; danh từ: giới hạn; danh từ: biên

vn_meaning: danh từ: tô; danh từ: hố; danh từ: (vật thể) hình dạng như tô
eng_explanation: Noun: A deep, rounded dish; a depression or hollow.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hộp; danh từ: kiện hàng
eng_explanation: Noun: A container, typically made of cardboard, used for storing or transporting items.
example: He put the toys in a box.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nam nhi; danh từ: cậu bé
eng_explanation: Noun: A male child; a young man.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bạn trai

vn_meaning: danh từ: não (sinh học); trí tuệ, bộ óc (tư duy); ý nghĩ, kế hoạch (tinh thần)

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhánh (cây); chi nhánh (tổ chức); ngành (học vấn)
eng_explanation: noun: a part of a tree or shrub; a division of a company or organization.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhãn hiệu; dấu hiệu (đốt); tính chất, đặc điểm (tư cách)
eng_explanation: noun: a mark made by burning; a distinctive sign identifying goods.
