vn_meaning: tính từ: dũng cảm; can đảm; gan dạ; danh từ: người dũng cảm
eng_explanation: adjective: ready to face and endure danger or pain; courageous.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự vi phạm (luật, thỏa thuận); lỗ hổng (phòng thủ); sự phá vỡ (tường, đê); động từ: vi phạm, phá vỡ
eng_explanation: noun: a violation of a law, contract, or duty; a gap in a wall or defense.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bánh mì
eng_explanation: noun: a staple food made from flour, water, and yeast.

vn_meaning: động từ: bẻ, gãy; nghỉ ngơi; vượt qua (tình huống); danh từ: sự bẻ gãy; khoảng nghỉ; cơ hội
eng_explanation: verb: to separate something into two or more pieces; to take a rest; to escape from confinement.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự hỏng hóc; sự sụp đổ; sự suy sụp (tâm lý)
eng_explanation: noun: the failure of a machine or system; a complete loss of control.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bữa sáng

vn_meaning: danh từ: đột phá; khám phá quan trọng

vn_meaning: tính từ: sáng sủa (ánh sáng); thông minh, nhanh nhẹn (tính cách); tươi sáng, rực rỡ (màu sắc); hứa hẹn (tương lai).

example: The sun is very bright today.
She is a bright student.

vn_meaning: tính từ: rực rỡ, chói lọi (ánh sáng); xuất sắc, tuyệt vời (khả năng, ý tưởng); thông minh, xuất chúng (tính cách).

example: The fireworks display was brilliant.

vn_meaning: động từ: mang đến, đưa đến; gây ra, dẫn đến; giới thiệu, đề cập đến.
eng_explanation: v. To take someone or something to a place; to cause something to happen.

vn_meaning: tính từ: rộng, bề ngang lớn; rộng rãi, bao quát (phạm vi); (âm thanh) trầm, dày.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đường truyền băng thông rộng (internet).; tính từ: băng thông rộng.
eng_explanation: n. A high-speed internet connection. adj. Relating to high-speed data transmission.
example: We need to upgrade to broadband internet.

vn_meaning: động từ: phát thanh, truyền hình; phát tán, lan truyền.
eng_explanation: v. To transmit a program or information by radio or television.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người phát thanh, truyền hình; đài phát thanh, truyền hình.

vn_meaning: A formal or public event, often involving religious or traditional customs.
eng_explanation: A ceremony is a formal event with specific rituals and traditions.
example: The wedding ceremony was filled with music and dancing.

vn_meaning: Certain, definite, or reliable.
eng_explanation: Certain means that something is guaranteed to be true or happen.
example: I am certain that the test will be successful.

vn_meaning: chắc chắn
eng_explanation: Certainly indicates a strong agreement or certainty.
example: He certainly knows the answer.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự chắc chắn; tính từ: chắc chắn (về điều gì đó)
eng_explanation: Noun: the state of being sure; Adjective: absolutely sure or certain.
example: There was a great certainty in her voice.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chứng chỉ; giấy chứng nhận
eng_explanation: Noun: a document certifying that one possesses a particular skill or qualification.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chuỗi; xích; (về các mối quan hệ) liên kết; tính từ: liên kết
eng_explanation: Noun: a series of connected links; Verb: to connect or link together.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ghế; (về chức vụ) chủ tịch
eng_explanation: Noun: a seat with a back; Noun: the person presiding over a meeting.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chủ tịch (hội đồng, ủy ban, v.v.)

vn_meaning: danh từ: thử thách; thách thức; (v) thách thức
eng_explanation: Noun: a task or situation that tests someone's abilities; Verb: to dispute or question.

vn_meaning: tính từ: khó khăn; đầy thử thách; (v) thách thức
eng_explanation: Adjective: difficult or demanding; Verb: to dispute or question.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phòng; khoang; (về chính trị) phe cánh

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhà vô địch; người ủng hộ; (v) ủng hộ
eng_explanation: Noun: a winner of a competition; Verb: to support or advocate for.
example: He is a champion swimmer.

vn_meaning: danh từ: giải vô địch; cuộc thi vô địch

vn_meaning: danh từ: cơ hội (tình huống thuận lợi); khả năng (xác suất); sự may mắn (trong trò chơi).
eng_explanation: noun: possibility of something happening; opportunity for favorable outcome.
example: He took a chance and invested in the new company.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự thay đổi; sự biến đổi; tiền xu (ở Mỹ).; động từ: thay đổi; đổi; chuyển đổi.
eng_explanation: noun: an alteration in condition, method, or function; verb: to make or become different.

vn_meaning: danh từ: kênh (xương); kênh (giao thông); kênh truyền hình; động từ: dẫn (nước); truyền (thông tin).
eng_explanation: noun: a passage for conveying; a television or radio station; verb: to direct or guide something.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự hỗn loạn; sự rối loạn; sự vô trật tự.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đặc điểm; phẩm chất; tính chất.

vn_meaning: động từ: đặc trưng; mô tả; miêu tả.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khoản phí; trách nhiệm; sự tấn công; động từ: tính phí; giao phó; tấn công.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lòng từ thiện; tổ chức từ thiện; sự bố thí.

vn_meaning: động từ: cổ vũ, reo hò (cho ai đó); danh từ: tiếng reo hò, sự cổ vũ; sự vui vẻ, phấn khởi.

vn_meaning: Một dàn nhạc có nhiều người hát.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hoàn cảnh; danh từ: sự kiện; danh từ: tình huống

vn_meaning: danh từ: thành phố (nơi có nhiều người sinh sống, tập trung các hoạt động kinh tế, văn hóa); danh từ: đô thị (khái niệm chung về khu vực đông dân cư).

vn_meaning: động từ: nhấp chuột; phát ra tiếng lách tách; xảy ra nhanh chóng; danh từ: tiếng lách tách; sự nhấp chuột

The houses formed a cluster near the park.

vn_meaning: danh từ: huấn luyện viên; danh từ: xe ngựa; tính từ: huấn luyện.
eng_explanation: Noun: A person who trains athletes. Noun: A two-wheeled vehicle pulled by horses. Adjective: Relating to training.
example: The football coach motivated his team to win.
The coach drove the horse-drawn carriage.
He received coaching in public speaking.

vn_meaning: danh từ: than; danh từ: than chì; tính từ: than.
eng_explanation: Noun: A black, combustible sedimentary rock. Adjective: Made of or resembling coal.
example: The power plant burned coal to generate electricity.
Coal is used in blacksmithing.
He used coal to start the fire.

vn_meaning: danh từ: liên minh; danh từ: phe phái.
eng_explanation: Noun: A group of parties or countries that join together for a common purpose.
example: The coalition government is working on economic reforms.
The two political parties formed a coalition to win the election.
A coalition of environmental groups protested the new policy.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bờ biển; danh từ: vùng ven biển; tính từ: ven biển.
eng_explanation: Noun: The line along the edge of a sea or lake. Adjective: Situated along the coast.
example: We spent the summer vacation on the coast.
The coast is known for its beautiful beaches.
Coastal erosion is a serious problem.

vn_meaning: danh từ: vùng ven biển; tính từ: thuộc về bờ biển.
eng_explanation: Adjective: Relating to the coast or sea.
example: The coastal town is a popular tourist destination.
Coastal erosion threatens the shoreline.
Coastal winds can be strong.

vn_meaning: danh từ: áo khoác; danh từ: lớp (bảo vệ); tính từ: dày.
eng_explanation: Noun: A type of clothing worn over other garments. Noun: A protective layer. Adjective: Thick or heavy.
example: He wore a warm coat on a cold day.
The paint provided a protective coat to the wall.
She put on a coat of varnish to protect the furniture.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thức uống hỗn hợp; danh từ: (tục ngữ) kẻ gian.
eng_explanation: Noun: A mixed alcoholic drink. Noun: (Slang) A dishonest or unscrupulous person.
example: She ordered a fruity cocktail at the bar.
The detective suspected the businessman was a cocktail.
He mixed a refreshing cocktail with ice and fruit.

vn_meaning: danh từ: mã (điện toán); động từ: mã hóa (thông tin)
eng_explanation: code (n): a system of symbols used to represent data; (v): to convert into a code.
example: The programmer wrote the code for the new application.
They used a secret code to communicate.
The barcode contains a code that identifies the product.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cà phê
eng_explanation: coffee (n): a hot drink made from roasted and ground coffee beans.
example: I need a strong coffee to wake me up.
She enjoys a cup of coffee every morning.
Let's meet for coffee later.

vn_meaning: tính từ: nhận thức, liên quan đến nhận thức
eng_explanation: cognitive (adj): relating to mental processes like thinking, knowing, and remembering.
example: Cognitive therapy helps patients change negative thought patterns.
The study examined cognitive development in children.
Her cognitive abilities are remarkably sharp.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đồng xu; động từ: đúc (tiền xu)
eng_explanation: coin (n): a piece of metal currency; (v): to create or invent.
example: He found a rare coin in his grandfather's collection.
The government decided to coin a new commemorative coin.
She coined the phrase 'thinking outside the box'.

vn_meaning: động từ: trùng hợp, xảy ra cùng lúc
eng_explanation: coincide (v): happen at the same time; be the same.
example: Our birthdays coincide this year.
The two events coincided perfectly.
The witness's account coincided with the evidence.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự trùng hợp ngẫu nhiên
eng_explanation: coincidence (n): a remarkable concurrence of events or circumstances.
example: What a coincidence to meet you here!
It's a strange coincidence that we both like the same book.
The coincidence of their names was quite striking.

vn_meaning: tính từ: lạnh; trạng từ: lạnh lẽo; danh từ: bệnh cảm lạnh
eng_explanation: cold (adj): of or at a low temperature; (adv): in a cold manner; (n): a mild illness.
example: The weather is cold today.
She gave him a cold look.
I have a cold and need to rest.

vn_meaning: động từ: hợp tác
eng_explanation: collaborate (v): to work jointly on an activity, especially to produce or create something.
example: The scientists collaborated on a groundbreaking research project.
We need to collaborate to finish this report on time.
The artists collaborated to create a stunning mural.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự hợp tác
eng_explanation: collaboration (n): the action of working with someone to produce or create something.
example: The success of the project was due to excellent collaboration.
Their collaboration resulted in a beautiful piece of art.
Effective collaboration is essential for teamwork.

vn_meaning: động từ: sụp đổ; danh từ: sự sụp đổ
eng_explanation: collapse (v): fall down or give way suddenly; (n): a sudden failure of a structure or system.
example: The old bridge collapsed under the weight of the truck.
The economy is on the verge of collapse.
He suffered a sudden collapse during the race.

vn_meaning: tính từ: có màu; đã được tô màu (vật thể).
eng_explanation: adj. Having color; tinted. (British spelling of 'colored').
example: She wore a coloured dress to the party.
The artist used coloured pencils to create the drawing.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đầy màu sắc; rực rỡ; thú vị, hấp dẫn (sự kiện, câu chuyện).
eng_explanation: adj. Full of color; vivid and bright; interesting and exciting.
example: The festival was a colourful display of traditional costumes.
She told a colourful story about her travels.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cột (kiến trúc); cột báo; cột số liệu (trong bảng).
eng_explanation: n. A vertical support; a regular article in a newspaper; a list of items.
example: The ancient temple had impressive stone columns.
He writes a weekly column for the local newspaper.
The data is organized in a column format.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người viết bài thường xuyên cho báo, tạp chí.
eng_explanation: n. A journalist who writes regular articles for a newspaper or magazine.
example: The columnist is known for her witty and insightful commentary.
He became a popular columnist after writing about local politics.

vn_meaning: động từ: chiến đấu; chống lại; danh từ: cuộc chiến đấu, sự giao tranh.
eng_explanation: v. To fight; to struggle against; n. Fighting; conflict.
example: Soldiers are trained to combat the enemy.
The organization is working to combat poverty.
The battle was a fierce combat.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự kết hợp; tổ hợp.
eng_explanation: n. A mixture of two or more things; a joining together.
example: The lock required a specific combination of numbers.
This dish is a delicious combination of flavors.

vn_meaning: động từ: kết hợp; trộn lẫn; liên hợp.
eng_explanation: v. To join together; to merge; to blend.
example: Combine the flour and sugar in a bowl.
The two companies decided to combine their resources.
These ingredients combine to create a unique taste.

vn_meaning: động từ: đến; xuất hiện; xảy ra.
eng_explanation: v. To move toward; to arrive; to happen.
example: Please come to my party tonight.
Summer has come at last.
If you come across any problems, let me know.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hài kịch; sự hài hước.
eng_explanation: n. A humorous play or film; the quality of being funny.
example: She enjoys watching romantic comedies.
His performance was full of comedy and wit.
The situation had a touch of dark comedy.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự thoải mái; sự an ủi; động từ: an ủi, làm dịu.
eng_explanation: n. A state of physical ease and freedom from pain; v. To soothe; to console.
example: She found comfort in her friend's words.
The chair was designed for maximum comfort.
He tried to comfort his grieving mother.

vn_meaning: thoải mái, dễ chịu, không khó khăn
eng_explanation: It provides a sense of ease and relaxation.
example: This sofa is incredibly comfortable.
I felt comfortable in the warm room.

vn_meaning: trò truyện, truyện hài, thường có hình ảnh minh họa
eng_explanation: It's a form of entertainment involving humorous stories.
example: He enjoys reading comic books every week.
The comic book store had a wide selection of superheroes.

vn_meaning: chỉ đạo, điều khiển, quyền lực
eng_explanation: It involves giving instructions and authority.
example: The captain gave the command to turn the ship around.
He is a skilled commander in the army.

vn_meaning: người chỉ huy, người điều hành
eng_explanation: It signifies leadership and control.
example: The commander led the troops with courage.
He is a respected commander in the navy.

vn_meaning: bắt đầu, khởi động
eng_explanation: It signifies the beginning of something.
example: The meeting will commence at 9 am.
Let's commence the project immediately.

vn_meaning: phản hồi, đánh giá
eng_explanation: It's a statement or expression about something.
example: I have a comment about the presentation.
The audience offered a variety of comments.

vn_meaning: phản bình, đánh giá sâu sắc
eng_explanation: It's a detailed explanation or analysis.
example: The author provided a thoughtful commentary on the novel.
She offered a critical commentary on the artist's technique.

vn_meaning: người bình luận, người đưa ra ý kiến
eng_explanation: It refers to someone who comments on something.
example: The commentator analyzed the political situation.
He is a popular commentator on television.

vn_meaning: thương mại, kinh doanh
eng_explanation: It involves buying and selling goods or services.
example: The company is engaged in extensive commerce.
She is a successful entrepreneur in the fashion industry.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ủy ban; danh từ: khoản hoa hồng (kinh doanh); danh từ: lệnh (của nhà chức trách)
eng_explanation: Noun: A group of people or a payment for services rendered (business).
example: The company established a new commission to oversee the project.
He received a commission on the sale of the property.
The president issued a commission to investigate the scandal.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ủy viên (ủy ban); danh từ: giám sát viên (của hải quan, thuế)
eng_explanation: Noun: A member of a commission or an official responsible for overseeing a specific area.
example: The commissioner presented his report to the board.
She served as a commissioner for the environmental protection agency.
The customs commissioner inspected the goods at the port.

vn_meaning: động từ: hứa; động từ: phạm tội; động từ: cam kết; động từ: chuyển (đến)
eng_explanation: Verb: To promise, to commit a crime, or to dedicate oneself to a cause.
example: I commit to finishing the project by Friday.
He committed a serious crime and was sentenced to prison.
She committed herself to a life of service.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cam kết; danh từ: sự tận tâm; danh từ: lời hứa
eng_explanation: Noun: A pledge or dedication; a strong sense of responsibility or loyalty.
example: Her commitment to her family is unwavering.
The company made a commitment to sustainable practices.
He honored his commitment and delivered the report on time.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ủy ban; danh từ: hội đồng
eng_explanation: Noun: A group of people appointed to consider and report on a specific matter.
example: The committee will meet next week to discuss the budget.
A committee was formed to address the issue of traffic congestion.
The board appointed a committee to review the proposal.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hàng hóa; danh từ: sản phẩm thương mại
eng_explanation: Noun: A raw material or primary agricultural product used in commerce.
example: Oil is a major commodity traded globally.
The country's economy relies heavily on commodity exports.
The price of coffee is a volatile commodity.

vn_meaning: tính từ: phổ biến; tính từ: chung; tính từ: thường
eng_explanation: Adjective: Frequently occurring; shared by many; ordinary.
example: It's a common problem that many people face.
They have common interests and enjoy spending time together.
Common sense is essential for making good decisions.

vn_meaning: chi phủ: thường; chi phủ: phổ biến
eng_explanation: Adverb: Frequently; in a common manner.
example: It is commonly believed that exercise is good for health.
The product is commonly used in households.
She commonly visits her grandmother.

vn_meaning: động từ: giao tiếp; động từ: truyền đạt
eng_explanation: Verb: To convey information or ideas; to interact.
example: It's important to communicate clearly with your team.
She communicated her concerns to the manager.
The company uses various channels to communicate with its customers.

vn_meaning: danh từ: giao tiếp; danh từ: truyền thông
eng_explanation: Noun: The exchange of information or ideas; the process of conveying messages.
example: Effective communication is crucial for successful relationships.
The company invested heavily in communication technology.
She is studying communication studies at university.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người theo chủ nghĩa cộng sản (chính trị); tính từ: thuộc chủ nghĩa cộng sản (chính trị)
eng_explanation: A person advocating a classless society and public ownership (noun/adjective).
example: He is a dedicated communist, fighting for social equality.
The communist government implemented significant economic reforms.
The country adopted a communist ideology after the revolution.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cộng đồng (xã hội); nhóm người có chung đặc điểm
eng_explanation: A group of people living in the same place or having a particular characteristic (noun).
example: The local community came together to clean up the park.
She is actively involved in her online community.
The scientific community is debating the new findings.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bạn đồng hành; người bạn thân thiết; tính từ: thích hợp làm bạn đồng hành
eng_explanation: A person or animal with whom one spends a lot of time (noun/adjective).
example: He was a loyal companion on her travels.
They were close companions throughout their lives.
A good book is a wonderful companion on a long journey.

vn_meaning: danh từ: công ty (kinh doanh); đội ngũ; sự đi kèm; tính từ: thuộc về công ty
eng_explanation: A business organization; a group of people; accompaniment (noun/adjective).
example: She works for a large multinational company.
The company announced record profits this year.
They kept good company at the party.

vn_meaning: tính từ: có thể so sánh được; tương đương
eng_explanation: Similar to something else in a way that allows a comparison (adjective).
example: The two cities have a comparable population.
The cost of living is comparable in both regions.
The results were not comparable due to different methodologies.

vn_meaning: tính từ: so sánh; liên quan đến việc so sánh; đứng trước hơn (trong so sánh hơn)
eng_explanation: Relating to or used for making comparisons (adjective).
example: This is a comparative analysis of the two strategies.
The comparative study revealed significant differences.
The comparative degree of 'good' is 'better'.

vn_meaning: động từ: so sánh
eng_explanation: To examine two or more things in order to note the similarities and differences (verb).
example: Let's compare the prices of these two products.
You can compare your results with those of others.
It's difficult to compare apples and oranges.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự so sánh
eng_explanation: The act of comparing two or more things (noun).
example: A detailed comparison of the two models is provided in the report.
The comparison revealed several key differences.
The study involved a statistical comparison of the data.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lòng thương cảm; sự cảm thông
eng_explanation: Sympathetic pity and concern for the sufferings or misfortunes of others (noun).
example: She showed great compassion for the homeless.
The charity provides aid based on compassion and need.
His words were filled with compassion and understanding.

vn_meaning: động từ: buộc; ép buộc; khiến bắt buộc
eng_explanation: To force or oblige someone to do something (verb).
example: The evidence compelled him to confess.
She was compelled to attend the meeting.
Nothing could compel him to change his mind.

vn_meaning: động từ: phàn nàn, kêu ca (về điều gì đó không hài lòng); than phiền (với ai đó về điều gì đó).
eng_explanation: v. to express dissatisfaction or annoyance about something. (v.)
example: She often complains about the weather.
He complained to the manager about the poor service.
Don't just complain; try to find a solution.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lời phàn nàn, sự than phiền; đơn khiếu nại.
eng_explanation: n. an expression of dissatisfaction or annoyance; a formal expression of grievance. (n.)
example: The restaurant received several complaints about the food.
He filed a complaint with the police.
Her main complaint was the lack of communication.

vn_meaning: động từ: bổ sung cho, làm cho hoàn thiện hơn; tính từ: bổ sung, ăn nhập với nhau; danh từ: sự bổ sung, sự hoàn thiện.
eng_explanation: v. to enhance or complete something; adj. enhancing each other; n. something that completes. (v/adj/n)
example: The wine complements the cheese perfectly.
Her skills complement mine very well.
The scarf is a lovely complement to her outfit.

vn_meaning: tính từ: hoàn chỉnh, đầy đủ; động từ: hoàn thành, làm xong.
eng_explanation: adj. having all the necessary or appropriate parts; v. to finish something. (adj/v)
example: He gave me a complete list of the ingredients.
She completed the race in under two hours.
The project is now complete.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: hoàn toàn, đầy đủ, triệt để.
eng_explanation: adv. in a complete manner; totally. (adv.)
example: I completely agree with you.
The room was completely empty.
She was completely exhausted after the marathon.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự hoàn thành, sự hoàn chỉnh.
eng_explanation: n. the act of finishing something; the state of being finished. (n.)
example: The completion of the project is expected next month.
We celebrated the completion of the building.
The report is nearing completion.

vn_meaning: tính từ: phức tạp, rắc rối; nhiều bộ phận, cấu trúc phức tạp.
eng_explanation: adj. consisting of many different and connected parts; complicated. (adj.)
example: The rules of the game are quite complex.
The human brain is a complex organ.
This is a complex issue with no easy answers.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự phức tạp, tính chất phức tạp.
eng_explanation: n. the state or quality of being intricate or complicated. (n.)
example: The complexity of the problem requires careful analysis.
He appreciated the complexity of the artwork.
The system's complexity makes it difficult to understand.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự tuân thủ, sự phục tùng; sự đồng ý.
eng_explanation: n. the action or fact of complying with a wish or command. (n.)
example: The company is committed to regulatory compliance.
There was full compliance with the new rules.
Failure to achieve compliance will result in penalties.

vn_meaning: tính từ: phức tạp, rắc rối, khó hiểu.
eng_explanation: adj. consisting of many interconnecting parts or elements; intricate. (adj.)
example: The instructions were too complicated to follow.
She has a very complicated family history.
The situation is further complicated by the weather.

vn_meaning: Một sự khó khăn, vấn đề, hoặc sự bất tiện; một vấn đề phức tạp.
eng_explanation: A difficulty, problem, or complex issue.
example: The project faced several complications.
The complex problem required careful consideration.
The initial composition was riddled with complications.

vn_meaning: Tuân thủ, đáp ứng, hoặc thỏa thuận với.
eng_explanation: To comply with, follow, or agree.
example: The company must comply with all regulations.
She complied with his instructions.
The team must comply with the deadline.

vn_meaning: Một phần, thành phần, hoặc yếu tố của một hệ thống hoặc cấu trúc.
eng_explanation: A part, element, or factor of a system or structure.
example: The car has several essential components.
The software is composed of different components.
Each component plays a crucial role.

vn_meaning: Tạo ra, kết hợp, hoặc xây dựng.
eng_explanation: To create, combine, or build.
example: The chef composed a delicious meal.
She composed a beautiful poem.
The team composed a detailed report.

vn_meaning: Người tạo ra, người sáng tác.
eng_explanation: A creator, writer, or originator.
example: The composer was renowned for his innovative works.
She is a talented composer.
The team hired a new composer.

vn_meaning: Một tác phẩm, bài hát, hoặc bản đồ.
eng_explanation: A work, song, or map.
example: The orchestra performed a beautiful composition.
She wrote a compelling story.
The map provided a detailed composition of the terrain.

vn_meaning: Một tập hợp các thành phần, thường là các phần riêng biệt được kết hợp lại.
eng_explanation: A combination of parts, often separate elements combined.
example: The compound fertilizer increased crop yield.
The compound system was designed for efficiency.
The mixture of ingredients created a compound flavor.

vn_meaning: toàn diện
eng_explanation: To cover completely, to include all aspects, or to be thorough.
example: The report was comprehensive in its analysis.
She provided a comprehensive overview of the topic.
The investigation was comprehensive in its scope.

vn_meaning: Chứa, bao gồm, hoặc bao phủ.
eng_explanation: To contain, include, or cover.
example: The book comprises several chapters.
The project comprises many tasks.
The document comprises a detailed explanation.

vn_meaning: Đàm phán, thỏa hiệp, hoặc chấp nhận một điều gì đó với những điều kiện nhất định.
eng_explanation: To compromise, negotiate, or accept with conditions.
example: They reached a compromise on the budget.
She compromised her own interests.
The team had to compromise on the deadline.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nghĩa vụ; tính từ: bắt buộc; (luật) bắt buộc, bắt buộc phải.
eng_explanation: adj. required by law or rules; necessary.
example: It is compulsory to wear a seatbelt in this country.
Students must complete all compulsory assignments.
The new regulations are compulsory for all businesses.

vn_meaning: danh từ: máy tính; tính từ: liên quan đến máy tính.
eng_explanation: v. to calculate or determine by using a computer.
example: I can compute the answer quickly using a calculator.
The computer is able to compute complex equations.
Scientists use computers to compute data for research.

vn_meaning: danh từ: máy tính; (tổ chức) công ty máy tính.
eng_explanation: n. an electronic device for storing and processing data; a company that makes computers.
example: I use my computer for work and entertainment.
The computer is a powerful tool for communication.
Many people rely on computers for their daily tasks.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bí mật; tính từ: bí mật; (hành động) che giấu, ẩn giấu.
eng_explanation: v. to hide or prevent from being seen or known.
example: He tried to conceal his feelings.
The spy attempted to conceal his identity.
She concealed the evidence from the police.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự nhượng bộ; tính từ: nhượng bộ; (hành động) nhượng bộ, thừa nhận.
eng_explanation: v. to admit the truth or validity of something; to grant a request.
example: He finally conceded defeat.
The company conceded that they made a mistake.
She conceded the point after a long argument.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ý tưởng; tính từ: ý tưởng; (hành động) hình dung, tưởng tượng; (về con cái) mang thai.
eng_explanation: v. to form an idea or opinion; to become pregnant.
example: She conceived a brilliant plan.
He conceived the idea for the project.
She conceived her first child.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự tập trung; tính từ: tập trung; (hành động) tập trung, hội tụ.
eng_explanation: v. to focus one's attention; to gather or collect.
example: Please concentrate on your work.
The chemicals concentrated in the solution.
The rain concentrated on one area.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự tập trung; (hóa học) nồng độ.
eng_explanation: n. the state of being focused; the degree of purity of a substance.
example: He needs to improve his concentration.
The high concentration of sugar in the drink is unhealthy.
The scientist measured the concentration of the solution.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khái niệm; ý tưởng.
eng_explanation: n. an idea or abstract notion.
example: The concept of time is complex.
He struggled to grasp the concept.
The book explores various concepts.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ý tưởng; sự sinh ra (con cái).
eng_explanation: n. an idea or plan; the process of giving birth.
example: The conception of the project began with a simple idea.
The artist's conception was stunning.
The couple celebrated the conception of their first child.

vn_meaning: danh từ: mối quan tâm (cảm xúc); vấn đề (cần giải quyết); công ty (tổ chức).; động từ: quan tâm (đến); lo lắng (về).
eng_explanation: noun: a feeling of worry; a matter needing attention. verb: to be interested or worried about something.
example: The main concern is the rising cost of living.
I'm writing to express my concern about the proposed changes.
This is a matter of great concern to the entire community.

vn_meaning: tính từ: lo lắng; quan tâm; băn khoăn.
eng_explanation: adjective: worried, anxious; interested or involved in something.
example: She seemed very concerned about the news.
I'm concerned that he hasn't called.
He was deeply concerned for her well-being.

vn_meaning: danh từ: buổi hòa nhạc; sự phối hợp (giữa các yếu tố).
eng_explanation: noun: a live musical performance; a harmonious arrangement of elements.
example: We went to a fantastic concert last night.
The team's success was due to a concert of effort.
The concert featured a variety of musical styles.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự nhượng bộ; sự giảm giá (hàng hóa).
eng_explanation: noun: an agreement to accept something less desirable; a reduction in price.
example: The government made a significant concession to the unions.
The store is offering a concession on all winter coats.
After much negotiation, they reached a concession.

vn_meaning: động từ: kết luận; đi đến kết luận; kết thúc (một sự kiện).
eng_explanation: verb: to bring something to an end; to reach a decision after consideration.
example: Let's conclude the meeting with a summary of the key points.
The evidence leads us to conclude that he is guilty.
The speaker concluded his speech with a call to action.

vn_meaning: danh từ: kết luận; sự kết thúc.
eng_explanation: noun: a final decision or judgment; the end of something.
example: The conclusion of the report was that more research is needed.
We reached a conclusion after hours of discussion.
The play had a dramatic conclusion.

vn_meaning: tính từ: cụ thể; xác thực; bằng bê tông.; danh từ: bê tông.
eng_explanation: adjective: clearly defined; real and tangible. noun: a strong, durable building material.
example: We need to provide concrete examples to support our argument.
The building is made of concrete.
The project requires concrete planning and execution.

vn_meaning: động từ: lên án; chỉ trích gay gắt; tuyên án (hình phạt).
eng_explanation: verb: to express strong disapproval; to sentence someone to punishment.
example: The international community condemned the attack.
He was condemned for his unethical behavior.
The court condemned him to five years in prison.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tình trạng; điều kiện; sức khỏe.; động từ: đặt ra điều kiện.
eng_explanation: noun: the state of something; a requirement that must be met. verb: to set a requirement.
example: The patient's condition is improving.
The offer is subject to certain conditions.
I'm in good physical condition.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cách cư xử; sự điều khiển; sự tiến hành.; động từ: cư xử; điều khiển; tiến hành.
eng_explanation: noun: behavior; the act of directing or controlling. verb: to behave; to direct or control.
example: His conduct was unacceptable.
The conductor led the orchestra with skill.
The research was conducted over a period of five years.

vn_meaning: danh từ: xung đột, mâu thuẫn (giữa các ý kiến, lợi ích); động từ: xung đột, đấu tranh (với ai đó)
eng_explanation: n. a serious disagreement or argument; v. to be different or opposed (to).
example: The two countries were in a long-term conflict.
His ideas conflict with mine.
She often conflicts with her boss.

vn_meaning: động từ: đối mặt, đương đầu (với khó khăn, nguy hiểm); chất vấn, đối chất (với ai đó)
eng_explanation: v. to face and deal with a problem; to challenge someone directly.
example: He had to confront his fears.
She confronted him about his lies.
The team will confront a difficult challenge.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự đối đầu, xung đột trực tiếp; sự chất vấn
eng_explanation: n. a hostile or argumentative encounter between opposing parties.
example: The confrontation lasted for hours.
He avoided a direct confrontation.
The protest led to a violent confrontation.

vn_meaning: động từ: làm bối rối, gây khó hiểu; lẫn lộn (ai đó)
eng_explanation: v. to make someone unable to think clearly; to mix up or be unclear.
example: The instructions confused me.
Don't confuse the two issues.
His behavior often confuses people.

vn_meaning: tính từ: bối rối, khó hiểu; lẫn lộn
eng_explanation: adj. unable to think clearly; feeling bewildered or perplexed.
example: I was confused by the directions.
She looked confused and lost.
He felt confused after the accident.

vn_meaning: tính từ: gây bối rối, khó hiểu; khó phân biệt
eng_explanation: adj. causing confusion; difficult to understand.
example: The rules are very confusing.
It's a confusing situation.
The map was confusing and inaccurate.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự bối rối, khó hiểu; sự lẫn lộn
eng_explanation: n. the state of being bewildered or unclear; a lack of understanding.
example: There was a lot of confusion at the airport.
He spoke with great confusion.
The change caused widespread confusion.

vn_meaning: động từ: chúc mừng (ai đó)
eng_explanation: v. to express pleasure to someone on their success or good fortune.
example: I congratulated her on her promotion.
We congratulate you on your wedding.
Let me congratulate you on a job well done.

vn_meaning: danh từ: giáo đoàn, hội chúng (trong tôn giáo)
eng_explanation: n. a group of people assembled for religious worship.
example: The congregation sang hymns.
The pastor addressed the congregation.
A large congregation gathered for the service.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thuộc quốc hội, liên quan đến quốc hội
eng_explanation: adj. relating to Congress (the legislative branch of the US government).
example: He attended a congressional hearing.
The bill requires congressional approval.
She is a congressional representative.

vn_meaning: kết nối
eng_explanation: To establish a link or relationship; to associate ideas or people.
example: I need to connect with my friends.
The bridge connects the two sides of the river.
They connected the dots to solve the mystery.

vn_meaning: joined; associated; linked; related; in connection
eng_explanation: A state of being linked or associated; a relationship.
example: The two cities are connected by a railway.
The data is connected to a database.
They are connected by a strong bond.

vn_meaning: sự kết nối
eng_explanation: A link or association between things; a relationship.
example: The connection between the two countries is important.
She felt a strong connection to her family.
The connection between the ideas was profound.

vn_meaning: chiếm thắng
eng_explanation: To defeat or overcome an opponent or adversary.
example: The soldiers conquered the enemy army.
She conquered her fear of heights.
They conquered the challenge with determination.

vn_meaning: lương tâm
eng_explanation: A feeling of right and wrong; a moral sense.
example: He had a strong conscience about the injustice.
Her conscience told her to do the right thing.
The conscience of the nation is important.

vn_meaning: ý thức
eng_explanation: Aware of one's surroundings and thoughts and feelings.
example: He was a conscious traveler.
She was a conscious participant in the discussion.
The experiment was designed to be a conscious one.

vn_meaning: ý thức
eng_explanation: Awareness of one's surroundings and thoughts and feelings.
example: The study of consciousness is a complex field.
The experiment aimed to study consciousness.
His consciousness was clouded by grief.

vn_meaning: occurring one after another; in succession; in sequence
eng_explanation: Occurring one after another; in order.
example: The train was scheduled for a consecutive stop.
The events unfolded consecutively.
The consequences followed consecutively.

vn_meaning: agreement; agreement; a general agreement
eng_explanation: Agreement among a group of people.
example: The group reached a consensus on the best solution.
The decision was made through a consensus.
There was a strong consensus on the importance of environmental protection.

vn_meaning: agreement or permission; agreement; approval
eng_explanation: Agreement or permission to do something.
example: She gave her consent to the medical procedure.
The patient provided their consent.
The company sought their consent before launching the campaign.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hệ quả; hậu quả (của hành động, sự kiện)
eng_explanation: Noun: The result or effect of an action or cause. (n)
example: The consequence of his actions was severe.
What are the potential consequences of this decision?
She faced the consequences of her dishonesty.

vn_meaning: tính từ/ trạng từ: do đó; vì thế; vì vậy
eng_explanation: Adverb: As a result; therefore; consequently. (adv)
example: He was late, consequently he missed the train.
The weather was bad, consequently the game was canceled.
Consequently, we decided to postpone the meeting.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bảo tồn; giữ gìn (tài nguyên, môi trường, văn hóa)
eng_explanation: Noun: The protection and preservation of something. (n)
example: Wildlife conservation is a crucial global effort.
The national park focuses on the conservation of endangered species.
She dedicated her life to the conservation of historical sites.

vn_meaning: tính từ: bảo thủ; trung dung (trong chính trị, tư tưởng)
eng_explanation: Adjective: Holding traditional views; moderate. (adj)
example: He is a conservative politician with strong beliefs.
The company adopted a conservative approach to marketing.
She has conservative views on social issues.

vn_meaning: động từ: bảo tồn; giữ gìn; tiết kiệm (năng lượng, tài nguyên)
eng_explanation: Verb: To protect from harm or loss; to save. (v)
example: We must conserve water to protect our environment.
The organization works to conserve endangered species.
He tries to conserve energy by turning off lights.

vn_meaning: động từ: xem xét; cân nhắc; đánh giá
eng_explanation: Verb: To think carefully about something. (v)
example: Please consider my proposal carefully.
I need to consider all the options before making a decision.
She considered his request politely.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đáng kể; lớn; nhiều
eng_explanation: Adjective: Large in amount, size, or importance. (adj)
example: He has considerable experience in the field.
They received a considerable amount of money as a reward.
She has considerable talent as a musician.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đáng kể; rất; nhiều
eng_explanation: Adverb: To a large extent; greatly. (adv)
example: The price of the car has increased considerably.
He was considerably impressed by her performance.
The weather is considerably colder today.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự cân nhắc; sự xem xét; sự khoan dung
eng_explanation: Noun: Careful thought or attention. (n)
example: He showed great consideration for her feelings.
The court took into consideration all the evidence.
A moment of consideration is needed before acting.

vn_meaning: động từ: bao gồm; cấu tạo thành; hình thành từ
eng_explanation: Verb: To make up or form something. (v)
example: The team consists of five players.
The building consists of several floors.
The report consists of several sections.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tính nhất quán (tính chất chung); sự phù hợp, tương đồng (giữa các phần tử); sự đều đặn (của một quá trình).
eng_explanation: noun: the quality of being similar or the same; uniformity or regularity.
example: The consistency of her arguments was impressive.
The batter needs to have the right consistency to bake properly.
Maintaining consistency in branding is crucial for recognition.

vn_meaning: tính từ: nhất quán, đều đặn; phù hợp, không mâu thuẫn.
eng_explanation: adjective: always acting or looking the same; compatible or in agreement.
example: His actions were not consistent with his words.
The data shows a consistent upward trend.
She is a consistent performer, always delivering high-quality work.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: một cách nhất quán, đều đặn; thường xuyên, liên tục.
eng_explanation: adverb: in a consistent manner; regularly or frequently.
example: He consistently exceeded expectations.
The team played consistently well throughout the season.
She consistently arrives on time.

vn_meaning: động từ: củng cố, hợp nhất; làm cho vững chắc hơn.
eng_explanation: verb: to strengthen or combine; to make something more solid or secure.
example: The company aims to consolidate its market position.
They need to consolidate their gains before moving forward.
The government is working to consolidate power.

vn_meaning: danh từ: âm mưu, kế hoạch bí mật (thường là xấu).
eng_explanation: noun: a secret plan by a group to do something unlawful or harmful.
example: The novel revolves around a political conspiracy.
They accused him of being involved in a conspiracy.
The investigation uncovered no evidence of a conspiracy.

vn_meaning: tính từ: không đổi, liên tục; thường xuyên, đều đặn; hằng số (toán học, vật lý).; danh từ: điều không đổi, yếu tố thường xuyên.
eng_explanation: adjective: unchanging over time; occurring repeatedly; a fixed quantity or value.
example: The speed of light is a constant.
He showed constant support for his family.
She has a constant need for attention.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: liên tục, thường xuyên; không ngừng.
eng_explanation: adverb: all the time; continuously or repeatedly.
example: The phone was constantly ringing.
He was constantly interrupting the speaker.
The machine is running constantly.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khu vực bầu cử; những người ủng hộ, cử tri.
eng_explanation: noun: an area represented by an elected official; the voters in a particular area.
example: The politician visited his constituency to meet with voters.
She has a large and loyal constituency.
The constituency is concerned about rising taxes.

vn_meaning: động từ: cấu thành, tạo nên; thiết lập, thành lập.
eng_explanation: verb: to form or compose something; to establish or create something.
example: These factors constitute the main challenges.
The new law will constitute a significant change.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hiến pháp; cấu tạo, thành phần.
eng_explanation: noun: the system of fundamental principles and laws of a nation; the way something is structured.
example: The constitution guarantees freedom of speech.
The constitution of the Earth includes layers of rock and magma.
The company's constitution outlines its governance structure.

vn_meaning: động từ: liên lạc, tiếp xúc (với ai đó); danh từ: sự liên lạc, sự tiếp xúc; mối quan hệ (với ai đó)
eng_explanation: v: communicate with (someone); n: the state of communicating; a relationship. (v, n)
example: I'll contact you next week to discuss the details.
She has a lot of contacts in the industry.
Maintaining regular contact is important for a strong relationship.

vn_meaning: động từ: chứa đựng, bao gồm; kiềm chế (cảm xúc)
eng_explanation: v: hold or include (something); restrain (an emotion).
example: The box contains a variety of chocolates.
The report contains sensitive information.
He tried to contain his anger.

vn_meaning: danh từ: vật chứa, thùng chứa
eng_explanation: n: a receptacle for holding something; a shipping container.
example: The goods were shipped in a large container.
Please dispose of the waste in the designated container.
A plastic container is useful for storing leftovers.

vn_meaning: động từ: suy ngẫm, cân nhắc kỹ lưỡng
eng_explanation: v: look thoughtfully for a long time; consider carefully.
example: She contemplated her future.
He sat by the river, contemplating the scenery.
They are contemplating a move to the countryside.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đương thời, hiện đại; cùng thời
eng_explanation: adj: belonging to the present time; modern; occurring in the same period.
example: She is a contemporary artist.
The museum features contemporary paintings.
Contemporary society faces many challenges.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự khinh bỉ, sự coi thường
eng_explanation: n: the feeling that a person or thing is worthless or beneath consideration.
example: He spoke with contempt for his opponents.
Her actions showed utter contempt for the law.
She looked at him with undisguised contempt.

vn_meaning: động từ: tranh luận, đấu tranh; cạnh tranh
eng_explanation: v: struggle to surmount (a difficulty); assert (something) as a position.
example: The two candidates contend for the leadership position.
He contended that the evidence was insufficient.
She had to contend with many obstacles.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người tranh tài, đối thủ cạnh tranh
eng_explanation: n: a person who competes for something; a competitor.
example: He is a strong contender for the championship.
Several contenders are vying for the job.
She emerged as a serious contender in the election.

vn_meaning: tính từ: hài lòng, mãn nguyện; danh từ: nội dung, sự chứa đựng
eng_explanation: adj: in a state of peaceful happiness; n: the subject matter of something. (adj, n)
example: She was content with her simple life.
The book's content is both informative and engaging.
He seemed content to just sit and read.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự tranh cãi, sự tranh luận; sự khẳng định
eng_explanation: n: heated disagreement; a point or statement asserted as true.
example: The issue is a source of ongoing contention.
His contention is that the policy is unfair.
There was a strong contention over the inheritance.

vn_meaning: cuộc thi
eng_explanation: A contest involves a competition or test.
example: The international contest was a thrilling event.
She entered the contest to win a prize.

vn_meaning: bối cảnh
eng_explanation: The context provides the background for a situation or idea.
example: The historical context is important for understanding the event.
The context of the conversation revealed a surprising truth.

vn_meaning: A large landmass, typically divided into countries.
eng_explanation: The continent is a large landmass that includes many countries.
example: The African continent is known for its diverse wildlife.
The European continent is rich in history and culture.

vn_meaning: Always; repeatedly.
eng_explanation: The action of continuing repeatedly.
example: The river continues to flow through the valley.
He continues to work diligently on his project.

vn_meaning: tiếp tục
eng_explanation: To continue with a process or activity.
example: Please continue reading this book.
The train continues to move at a steady pace.

vn_meaning: Ongoing; not interrupted.
eng_explanation: Something that continues without stopping.
example: The continuous flow of information is fascinating.
The continuous process of learning is rewarding.

vn_meaning: hợp đồng
eng_explanation: A contract is a legally binding agreement.
example: The company signed a contract with its supplier.
The contract stipulated clear terms and conditions.

vn_meaning: A person who provides services to others.
eng_explanation: A contractor is someone who provides services to clients.
example: She hired a contractor to renovate the house.
The contractor completed the project on time.

vn_meaning: mâu thuẫn
eng_explanation: A contradiction is a disagreement or conflict.
example: The conflicting statements created a serious contradiction.
The contradictory evidence undermined the argument.

vn_meaning: trái ngược
eng_explanation: Something that contradicts something else.
example: The evidence contradicted his claims.
The contradictory behavior shocked everyone.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự tương phản; tính từ: tương phản (giữa hai thứ gì đó)
eng_explanation: Noun: The state of being strikingly different. Adjective: Marked by significant difference.
example: There is a strong contrast between the old city and the new skyscrapers.
The artist used a strong contrast of light and shadow in the painting.
The contrast in their personalities made them a challenging pair to work with.

vn_meaning: động từ: đóng góp; (về tài chính) đóng tiền
eng_explanation: Verb: To supply or give assistance; to provide funds to a cause.
example: I would like to contribute to your fundraising efforts.
She contributed her skills to the project's success.
The company contributes a portion of its profits to charity.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đóng góp; sự đóng góp (về tài chính, ý tưởng, v.v.)
eng_explanation: Noun: An act of giving or donating; a valuable addition or input.
example: Her contribution to the discussion was invaluable.
The company made a significant contribution to the local economy.
He made a small contribution to the charity drive.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người đóng góp; người góp phần
eng_explanation: Noun: A person who provides something, especially to a publication or project.
example: He is a regular contributor to the online magazine.
The company values its contributors' ideas.
Many contributors helped to make the event a success.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự kiểm soát; quyền kiểm soát; tính từ: kiểm soát được
eng_explanation: Noun: The power to influence or direct behavior. Adjective: Able to be controlled.
example: He lost control of the car after the accident.
The government has strict controls on immigration.
The software provides complete control over the device.

vn_meaning: tính từ: gây tranh cãi; gây tranh luận
eng_explanation: Adjective: Causing or likely to cause disagreement or argument.
example: The new policy is highly controversial.

The controversial decision divided the community.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tranh cãi; sự tranh cãi; vấn đề gây tranh cãi
eng_explanation: Noun: A strong disagreement or argument; a matter of public dispute.
example: The scandal created a major controversy.
The controversy surrounding the election results was intense.
She became the center of a media controversy.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự thuận tiện; tính từ: thuận tiện
eng_explanation: Noun: The quality of being easy to deal with. Adjective: Easy to use or access.
example: The location of the hotel is very convenient.
This new app offers a great deal of convenience.
The convenience store is open 24 hours a day.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thuận tiện; dễ dàng
eng_explanation: Adjective: Situated or occurring at a convenient time or place; easy to use.
example: It's a convenient location for shopping.
This is a convenient solution to the problem.
She found a convenient parking spot.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hội nghị; tập quán; quy ước
eng_explanation: Noun: A meeting or conference for a particular profession or organization.  Also, a traditional practice or custom.
example: The annual marketing convention was a success.
The convention established new standards for the industry.
It's a tradition to attend the family convention every year.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thông thường, theo khuôn mẫu (xã hội); truyền thống (văn hóa); thông lệ (pháp luật)
eng_explanation: adjective: conforming to accepted standards; traditional.
example: The restaurant offers a conventional menu with classic dishes.
She wore a conventional dress for the formal event.
His conventional approach to problem-solving proved effective.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cuộc trò chuyện
eng_explanation: noun: a talk between two or more people.
example: They had a pleasant conversation about their travels.
The conversation drifted to politics.
I enjoy engaging in stimulating conversations.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự chuyển đổi (tôn giáo); sự chuyển hóa (hóa học); sự chuyển đổi (tiền tệ)
eng_explanation: noun: the process of changing from one form to another.
example: The missionary's conversion to Christianity was remarkable.
The conversion of carbon dioxide into oxygen is essential for life.
The conversion rate from dollars to euros fluctuated.

vn_meaning: động từ: chuyển đổi; cải đạo
eng_explanation: verb: change something into a different form; become a member of a different religion.
example: He converted the old barn into a modern apartment.
Many people converted to Buddhism after experiencing its teachings.
The software can convert files from one format to another.

vn_meaning: động từ: truyền đạt; bộc lộ; chở (hàng hóa)
eng_explanation: verb: communicate an idea or feeling; transport goods.
example: The artist's paintings convey a sense of melancholy.
The letter conveyed his apologies for the delay.
The truck was used to convey supplies to the remote village.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tù nhân; động từ: kết tội
eng_explanation: noun: a person found guilty of a crime; verb: declare someone guilty of a crime.
example: The convict was released after serving his sentence.
The jury convicted him of fraud.
The evidence failed to convict the suspect.

vn_meaning: danh từ: niềm tin; sự kết tội (pháp lý)
eng_explanation: noun: a firmly held belief; the act of declaring someone guilty.
example: She spoke with conviction about her beliefs.
The judge announced the conviction on all charges.
His conviction in the importance of education was unwavering.

vn_meaning: động từ: thuyết phục
eng_explanation: verb: persuade someone to believe something.
example: He tried to convince her to go to the party.
The evidence convinced the jury of his innocence.
It's difficult to convince him to change his mind.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tin chắc; động từ: thuyết phục (đã)
eng_explanation: adjective: firmly believing something; verb: persuade (someone) to believe something.
example: I am convinced that he is telling the truth.
She was completely convinced by his argument.
He convinced her to try the new restaurant.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thuyết phục; đáng tin
eng_explanation: adjective: causing someone to believe something is true; believable.
example: His explanation was very convincing.
The evidence presented was convincing enough to secure a conviction.
It's a convincing argument for investing in renewable energy.

vn_meaning: động từ: đối phó, đương đầu (với khó khăn); danh từ: khả năng đối phó, sự đối phó.
eng_explanation: v: deal effectively with something difficult. n: the ability to deal with difficulties (Cope, v/n).
example: She's finding it hard to cope with her mother's death.
He has a good cope with stress.
The new regulations are difficult for small businesses to cope with.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đồng (kim loại); cảnh sát (tiếng lóng)
eng_explanation: n: a reddish-brown metal. n (informal): a police officer (Copper, n).
example: The pipes are made of copper.
The copper arrived quickly to investigate the scene.
Old copper pots can be very valuable.

vn_meaning: động từ: sao chép, sao y bản chính; danh từ: bản sao, bản sao y.
eng_explanation: v: reproduce something. n: a reproduction of an original (Copy, v/n).
example: Please copy this document.
I need a copy of the report.
He made a copy of the software illegally.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bản quyền
eng_explanation: n: the exclusive legal right to reproduce, publish, sell, or distribute a work (Copyright, n).
example: The song is protected by copyright.
Copyright laws prevent unauthorized use of intellectual property.
She owns the copyright to her novel.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lõi, trung tâm; tính từ: cốt lõi, chủ yếu.
eng_explanation: n: the central part of something. adj: most important part (Core, n/adj).
example: The core of the apple is rotten.
Reading and writing are core skills.
The core issue is funding.

vn_meaning: danh từ: góc, góc phố; động từ: dồn vào chân tường, lách qua.
eng_explanation: n: a point or angle where two lines meet. v: force someone into a difficult situation (Corner, n/v).
example: The book is on the corner of the table.
He cornered the suspect in the alley.
The shop is on the corner of Main Street.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thuộc công ty, của tập đoàn
eng_explanation: adj: relating to a large company or group (Corporate, adj).
example: corporate headquarters
corporate responsibility
corporate law

vn_meaning: danh từ: công ty, tập đoàn
eng_explanation: n: a company recognized as a legal entity (Corporation, n).
example: She works for a large corporation.
The corporation reported record profits.
It is a multinational corporation.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đúng, chính xác; động từ: sửa chữa, sửa lỗi.
eng_explanation: adj: free from error. v: to make something right (Correct, adj/v).
example: That is the correct answer.
Please correct my mistakes.
The watch shows the correct time.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự sửa chữa, sự điều chỉnh; bản sửa lỗi.
eng_explanation: n: the action of correcting something. n: a change made to correct an error (Correction, n).
example: He made several corrections to the essay.
The newspaper published a correction.
The software update included several bug corrections.

vn_meaning: chính xác
eng_explanation: to do or be in the right way; accurately
example: She correctly answered the question.
The report is correctly written.

vn_meaning: to show a relationship between two things
eng_explanation: to link two things together; to find a connection
example: The data correlated with the observed trends.
Scientists correlate environmental factors with disease outbreaks.

vn_meaning: a statistical relationship between two variables
eng_explanation: a connection between two things; a statistical relationship
example: There is a strong correlation between height and weight.
The correlation between sales and advertising spending is significant.

vn_meaning: tương ứng
eng_explanation: to agree with or be in harmony with
example: The two parties corresponded on the issue.
The correspondence between the two documents was clear.

vn_meaning: choản
eng_explanation: a written communication between two people
example: The correspondence between the two companies was formal.
She received a correspondence from the government.

vn_meaning: nguıntı
eng_explanation: a person who communicates with someone else
example: The correspondent was very helpful.
The correspondent provided the necessary information.

vn_meaning: chuyển
eng_explanation: to agree with or be in harmony with
example: The two parties corresponded on the issue.
The correspondence between the two documents was clear.

vn_meaning: dâts
eng_explanation: a passage or path between two buildings or walls
example: The corridor was narrow and dimly lit.
The corridor led to the main building.

vn_meaning: damaged or spoiled; dishonest
eng_explanation: damaged or spoiled; dishonest
example: The government is corrupt and ineffective.
The company's practices were corrupt.

vn_meaning: tích
eng_explanation: dishonest or immoral behavior
example: Corruption is a serious problem in many countries.
The government is battling corruption.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chi phí; tính từ: đắt đỏ
eng_explanation: Noun: the price of something; Adjective: expensive.
example: The cost of the project was unexpectedly high.
This shirt is a costly investment.
We need to consider the cost before making a decision.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đắt đỏ; tốn kém
eng_explanation: Adjective: expensive; involving a high cost.
example: A costly mistake can have serious consequences.
The repairs were surprisingly costly.
He made a costly error in judgment.

vn_meaning: danh từ: trang phục; bộ đồ diễn
eng_explanation: Noun: clothing worn for a particular occasion or role.
example: She wore a beautiful costume to the party.
The children dressed up in costumes for Halloween.
He designed a fantastic costume for the play.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ngôi nhà nhỏ; xích lô
eng_explanation: Noun: a small, cozy house, often in the countryside.
example: They spent their honeymoon in a charming cottage.
The cottage had a beautiful garden.
We enjoyed a peaceful weekend in a remote cottage.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sợi bông; loại vải bông
eng_explanation: Noun: a soft, white fiber from a plant used to make cloth.
example: The shirt is made of 100% cotton.
Cotton is a popular choice for summer clothing.
She spun cotton into yarn.

vn_meaning: động từ (thì khả năng): có thể; có lẽ
eng_explanation: Modal verb: expressing possibility or ability in the past or present.
example: I could swim when I was five years old.
She could speak French fluently.
He could have been right.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hội đồng; hội nghị
eng_explanation: Noun: a group of people elected to make decisions for a community.
example: The town council voted on the new budget.
She attended a city council meeting.
The council is responsible for managing the city's resources.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ủy viên hội đồng; đại biểu hội đồng
eng_explanation: Noun: a member of a council.
example: The councillor spoke passionately about the issue.
She was elected as a councillor for her district.
The councillor voted in favor of the proposal.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tư vấn; liệu pháp tâm lý
eng_explanation: Noun: professional guidance and support to help people with personal problems.
example: She is seeking counselling to deal with her anxiety.
The school offers counselling services to students.
Counselling can be a valuable tool for improving mental health.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhà tư vấn; chuyên gia tư vấn
eng_explanation: Noun: a professional who provides counselling or advice.
example: He is a qualified counsellor specializing in addiction.
She works as a school counsellor.
The counsellor helped him to overcome his fears.

vn_meaning: động từ: đếm (số lượng); tính (tính toán); số (số lượng).
eng_explanation: verb: to determine the number or amount of something; to reckon.
example: Please count how many apples are in the basket.
The company will count the votes later today.
I need to count on your support.

vn_meaning: danh từ: quầy (bán hàng); thiết bị đối trọng; đối tác; phản biện; động từ: phản bác.
eng_explanation: noun: a long bench where customers stand to be served; an opposite or balancing force; a rebuttal.
example: She works behind the counter at the bakery.
The counterweight helped stabilize the machine.
He offered a counterargument to her proposal.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đồng nghiệp; người có chức vụ tương đương; vật tương đương.
eng_explanation: noun: a person or thing that has a similar function or role; an equivalent.
example: He is the counterpart of the director in the other company.

vn_meaning: tính từ: vô số; không thể đếm được.
eng_explanation: adjective: too many to be counted; innumerable.

vn_meaning: danh từ: quốc gia; xứ sở; vùng quê.
eng_explanation: noun: a nation with its own government; a region or district.
example: She is proud to represent her country at the Olympics.

The country is known for its beautiful landscapes.

vn_meaning: danh từ: vùng nông thôn; miền quê.
eng_explanation: noun: the rural area of a country, away from towns and cities.
example: We spent the weekend exploring the countryside.
The countryside is known for its peaceful atmosphere.
She enjoys walking in the countryside.

vn_meaning: danh từ: quận; hạt (phân chia hành chính).
eng_explanation: noun: an administrative division of a state or province.
example: He lives in a small county in the Midwest.
The county government is responsible for local services.
The county fair is an annual tradition.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đảo chính; sự chuyển giao quyền lực bằng vũ lực.
eng_explanation: noun: a sudden and illegal seizure of power from a government.
example: The military staged a coup against the president.

The news of the coup shocked the international community.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đôi; cặp; hai người; hai vật; động từ: hẹn hò.
eng_explanation: noun: two people who are in a romantic relationship; a pair of things.
example: They are a lovely couple.
I bought a couple of books at the bookstore.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lòng dũng cảm; sự can đảm.
eng_explanation: noun: the ability to do something that frightens one; bravery.

The soldiers displayed great courage in battle.
She admired his courage in facing his fears.

vn_meaning: động từ: đâm; rơi; sụp đổ; (máy tính) bị lỗi, ngừng hoạt động; danh từ: vụ đâm va, tai nạn; tiếng động lớn
eng_explanation: v./n. A sudden, violent impact; (computing) to stop working abruptly. (v, n)
example: The car crashed into the tree.
The stock market crashed yesterday.
My computer keeps crashing.

vn_meaning: động từ: bò; trườn; (mạng) chạy chậm
eng_explanation: v. To move slowly on hands and knees; (internet) to move very slowly. (v)
example: The baby began to crawl across the floor.
Traffic was crawling along the highway.
The internet connection is crawling.

vn_meaning: tính từ: điên rồ; cuồng nhiệt; kỳ quặc
eng_explanation: adj. Mentally deranged; extremely enthusiastic; strange or unusual. (adj)

vn_meaning: danh từ: kem; lớp kem; phần tốt nhất; động từ: đánh bông
eng_explanation: n. A rich, fatty part of milk; a lotion; the best part. v. To beat into a soft mass. (n, v)

Apply the cream to soothe your skin.
He is the cream of the crop.

vn_meaning: động từ: tạo ra; sáng tạo; gây ra
eng_explanation: v. To bring something into existence; to invent or design. (v)

The new law will create many jobs.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự sáng tạo; sản phẩm sáng tạo; sự hình thành
eng_explanation: n. The act of bringing something into existence; something that has been created. (n)
example: The universe is a wondrous creation.

vn_meaning: tính từ: sáng tạo; có óc sáng tạo
eng_explanation: adj. Relating to or involving the use of the imagination or original ideas. (adj)
example: She is a very creative writer.
He has a creative approach to problem-solving.
The company encourages creative thinking.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự sáng tạo; khả năng sáng tạo
eng_explanation: n. The use of imagination or original ideas to create something. (n)
example: Creativity is essential for innovation.
The course aims to foster creativity in students.
She has a remarkable level of creativity.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người sáng tạo; tác giả
eng_explanation: n. A person who brings something into existence. (n)
example: God is often referred to as the creator of the universe.

He is the creator of a new software program.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sinh vật; tạo vật
eng_explanation: n. An animal; a living being; a fictional being. (n)

Dragons are mythical creatures.
He felt like a helpless creature in a dangerous world.

vn_meaning: sự tin tưởng vào tính xác thực, độ đáng tin cậy của một người, tổ chức, hoặc vật.
eng_explanation: credibility refers to the trustworthiness of someone or something.
example: The company's credibility was challenged by the scandal.

vn_meaning: đáng tin cậy, có thể tin tưởng vào.
eng_explanation: credible means reliable and trustworthy.

vn_meaning: tài khoản, sự đánh giá, hoặc sự công nhận về giá trị của một người hoặc vật.

example: He earned a lot of credit for his work.

vn_meaning: chạy theo một cách chậm chạp, lén lút, hoặc không có sự chú ý.

example: The creep in the shadows was a mysterious figure.

vn_meaning: nhóm người, thường là những người có chung một mục đích hoặc nhiệm vụ.

example: The movie had a large crew working on the set.

vn_meaning: vi phạm pháp luật, hành vi sai trái.

vn_meaning: người phạm pháp luật, thường là một kẻ gây rối, lừa đảo, hoặc có hành vi tội phạm.

example: The police are looking for a criminal suspect.

vn_meaning: một tình huống khẩn cấp, khó khăn, hoặc nguy hiểm.
eng_explanation: a crisis is a serious problem or situation.

The crisis required immediate action.

vn_meaning: một tiêu chí, một tiêu chuẩn để đánh giá hoặc lựa chọn.

example: The project's success depends on the criteria we use.

vn_meaning: người đánh giá, phê bình một tác phẩm, sản phẩm, hoặc ý tưởng.

example: The film received a critical review praising its acting.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tình thế nguy cấp; tính từ: nghiêm trọng; tính từ: quan trọng (trong đánh giá)

example: The doctor assessed the patient's condition as critical.

vn_meaning: chi phủ: một cách nghiêm khắc; một cách phê bình
eng_explanation: Adverb: in a critical manner; expressing severe judgment or evaluation.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lời phê bình; sự chỉ trích
eng_explanation: Noun: The expression of adverse or disapproving judgment; a statement of disapproval.

vn_meaning: động từ: phê bình; chỉ trích

vn_meaning: danh từ: bài phê bình; sự đánh giá chuyên sâu; động từ: đánh giá, phê bình (một tác phẩm)
eng_explanation: Noun: A critical analysis or evaluation; Verb: To evaluate or analyze critically.
example: The art critique praised the artist's technique.

The panel will critique the student's research paper.

vn_meaning: danh từ: mùa màng; sản lượng; tính từ: mỏng (về tóc)
eng_explanation: Noun: A harvest; Verb: To harvest or reduce the size of (crops).

vn_meaning: danh từ: cây thánh giá; đường chéo; cầu; động từ: băng qua
eng_explanation: Noun: A Christian symbol; Verb: To go across.
example: He wore a cross necklace.
The diagonal line is a cross.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đám đông; đám đông chen chúc
eng_explanation: Noun: A large group of people; a congested gathering.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đông đúc; chen chúc
eng_explanation: Adjective: Full of people; densely populated.
example: The subway was crowded during rush hour.

vn_meaning: danh từ: vương miện; ngai vàng; động từ: đội vương miện
eng_explanation: Noun: A ceremonial headdress; Verb: To place a crown on someone's head.
example: The queen wore a beautiful crown.
He was crowned king after the ceremony.
The crown jewels are a national treasure.

vn_meaning: tính từ: then chốt, quyết định (trong một tình huống); danh từ: yếu tố then chốt, điều kiện tiên quyết
eng_explanation: adjective: extremely important; essential for success.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thô thiển, thô sơ, nguyên sơ; thiếu tinh tế; tục tĩu
eng_explanation: adjective: in a raw or unfinished state; lacking refinement; vulgar.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tàn nhẫn, độc ác; gây đau khổ
eng_explanation: adjective: causing pain or suffering; deliberately unkind.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chuyến du ngoạn (thường bằng tàu); động từ: du ngoạn (bằng tàu)
eng_explanation: noun: a voyage for pleasure; verb: to travel on a ship for pleasure.
example: We're planning a Caribbean cruise next year.
The ship cruised along the coastline.
She enjoys cruising around the world.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự nghiền nát; sự đè nén; người hâm mộ cuồng nhiệt; động từ: nghiền nát; đè nén; làm tan vỡ trái tim
eng_explanation: noun: the act of crushing something; a devoted fan; verb: to press something until it is broken.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tiếng khóc; sự khóc lóc; động từ: khóc; rưng rức
eng_explanation: noun: the act of shedding tears; verb: to shed tears in response to sadness or pain.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tinh thể; pha lê; tính từ: tinh thể (liên quan đến cấu trúc tinh thể)
eng_explanation: noun: a solid with a regular, repeating arrangement of atoms; adjective: relating to crystals.

vn_meaning: danh từ: dấu hiệu; gợi ý; que (bi-a); động từ: gợi ý; báo hiệu
eng_explanation: noun: a signal or hint; a stick used in billiards; verb: to give a hint or signal.

vn_meaning: danh từ: giáo phái; nhóm người sùng bái một người hoặc ý tưởng nào đó
eng_explanation: noun: a system of religious veneration and devotion directed toward a specific figure or force.
example: The cult gained a large following.

He was raised in a strict religious cult.

vn_meaning: động từ: trồng trọt; vun đồi; nuôi dưỡng; phát triển (tính cách, kỹ năng)
eng_explanation: verb: to prepare and use land for crops; to develop or improve something.
example: Farmers cultivate the land to grow crops.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: hiện tại, lúc này (đang xảy ra)
eng_explanation: adv. At the present time; now. (≤ 14 words)

vn_meaning: danh từ: chương trình học (của một trường, một khóa học)
eng_explanation: n. The courses of study offered by a school or university. (≤ 12 words)

vn_meaning: danh từ: màn cửa, rèm cửa; sự che đậy, ngăn cách (ẩn dụ)
eng_explanation: n. A piece of fabric used to cover a window or divide a space. (≤ 15 words)
example: She drew the curtains to block out the sunlight.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đường cong; sự uốn lượn, khúc quanh; động từ: uốn cong, vẽ đường cong
eng_explanation: n. A rounded bend; v. To follow a curved path. (≤ 14 words)

vn_meaning: tính từ: cong, uốn lượn

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự quản thúc, sự giam giữ; quyền nuôi dưỡng (con cái)

vn_meaning: danh từ: phong tục, tập quán; thói quen; hàng hóa đặt làm

vn_meaning: danh từ: khách hàng
eng_explanation: n. A person who purchases goods or services. (≤ 9 words)

vn_meaning: động từ: cắt, chặt, rạch; danh từ: vết cắt, đường cắt; sự giảm bớt
eng_explanation: v. To divide with a sharp tool; n. An incision. (≤ 13 words)
