Despite the failed experiment, they learned valuable lessons.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự thất bại; sự hỏng hóc, trục trặc.
eng_explanation: noun: the state or condition of not succeeding; lack of success.
example: His business was a complete failure.
The failure of the engine caused the plane to crash.
She attributed her success to learning from past failures.

vn_meaning: tính từ: công bằng, hợp lý; đẹp đẽ, xinh xắn; (thực phẩm) không quá ngọt, không quá chua.
eng_explanation: adjective: just and impartial; beautiful; light in color or flavor.
example: It's not fair to judge someone before you know them.
She has fair skin and blonde hair.
The fair price for the item is $20.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: khá, tương đối; công bằng.
eng_explanation: adverb: to a reasonable extent; in a fair or just manner.
example: The movie was fairly entertaining.
He was treated fairly by his employer.
She sings fairly well for a beginner.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự công bằng, sự công lý.
eng_explanation: noun: the quality of being fair or impartial; justness.
example: She believes in fairness and equality for all.
The judge emphasized the importance of fairness in the trial.
He fought for fairness in the workplace.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đức tin; niềm tin.
eng_explanation: noun: complete trust or confidence in someone or something.
example: She has great faith in her abilities.
Religion plays an important role in his faith.
They held onto their faith during difficult times.

vn_meaning: tính từ: giả, làm nhái; không có thật.
eng_explanation: adjective: not genuine; imitation or counterfeit.
example: The painting was a fake.
He used a fake ID to buy alcohol.
Don't believe everything you read; some of it is fake news.

vn_meaning: động từ: rơi; trượt ngã; giảm xuống (nhiệt độ, giá cả).; mùa thu.
eng_explanation: verb: to drop to a lower level; to descend; to decline.
example: Be careful not to fall off the ladder.
The leaves fall from the trees in autumn.
The price of oil fell sharply.

vn_meaning: tính từ: sai, không đúng; giả dối; không chân thật.
eng_explanation: adjective: not true or correct; incorrect; deceptive.
example: That statement is false.
He gave a false impression of his qualifications.
Don't believe everything you hear; some of it is false.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nông trại, trang trại; động từ: canh tác, trồng trọt
eng_explanation: n/v: An area of land used for growing crops or raising animals; to cultivate land. (n/v)
example: We visited a dairy farm on our vacation.
My grandfather used to farm this land for many years.
Organic farms are becoming increasingly popular.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người nông dân, người làm nông trại
eng_explanation: n: A person who owns or manages a farm. (n)
example: The farmer harvested the wheat in the autumn.
Local farmers are struggling with the drought.
She comes from a family of farmers.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nghề nông, việc canh tác; tính từ: liên quan đến nông nghiệp
eng_explanation: n: The practice of cultivating land or raising animals. (n)
example: Farming is a vital part of the country's economy.
Sustainable farming practices are essential for the environment.
He is interested in a career in farming.

vn_meaning: tính từ: hấp dẫn, lôi cuốn, gây tò mò
eng_explanation: adj: Extremely interesting or attractive. (adj)
example: The museum exhibit was absolutely fascinating.
She told a fascinating story about her travels.
He is a fascinating speaker.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thời trang, mốt; động từ: thiết kế, tạo ra (thời trang)
eng_explanation: n/v: Popular styles or practices; to design or make clothes. (n/v)
example: She is very interested in fashion.
The designer is known for her innovative fashion.
He fashions beautiful dresses from recycled materials.

vn_meaning: tính từ: hợp thời trang, thịnh hành, sành điệu
eng_explanation: adj: Following the current style or trend. (adj)
example: That restaurant is very fashionable right now.
She always wears fashionable clothes.
The city is known for its fashionable boutiques.

vn_meaning: tính từ: nhanh; trạng từ: nhanh chóng; động từ: nhịn ăn, ăn chay
eng_explanation: adj/adv/v: Moving or capable of moving at high speed; to abstain from food. (adj/adv/v)
example: He drives a very fast car.
She ran very fast in the race.
Many people fast during Ramadan.

vn_meaning: động từ: cài, khóa, buộc chặt
eng_explanation: v: To attach or join something securely. (v)
example: Please fasten your seatbelts.
He fastened the rope to the tree.
She fastened her coat against the cold.

vn_meaning: tính từ: béo, mập; danh từ: mỡ, chất béo
eng_explanation: adj/n: Having a large amount of flesh; a natural oily substance. (adj/n)
example: He is a rather fat cat.
The steak had a lot of fat on it.
She is trying to reduce her fat intake.

vn_meaning: tính từ: chết người, gây chết người, hiểm nghèo
eng_explanation: adj: Causing or capable of causing death. (adj)
example: The accident was fatal.
He suffered a fatal heart attack.
The disease has a high fatality rate.

vn_meaning: số phận
eng_explanation: Fate refers to a predetermined course of events; it’s often seen as an element of destiny.
example: The weather was determined by fate.
I had a favourable outcome despite the difficult situation.

vn_meaning: cha
eng_explanation: A father is the primary male figure in a family.
example: My father is a skilled carpenter.
She is a wonderful father to her children.

vn_meaning: lỗi
eng_explanation: A fault is a flaw or imperfection in something.
example: There was a fault in the machine's mechanism.
He made a significant fault in his argument.

vn_meaning: To show kindness or goodwill towards someone.
eng_explanation: A favour is an act of kindness or generosity.
example: She offered a favour to help him with his work.
The company extended a favour to the needy.

vn_meaning: thuận lợi
eng_explanation: Favourable is a positive or advantageous situation.
example: The weather was favourable for the picnic.
It was a favourable opportunity for a new business venture.

vn_meaning: yêu thích
eng_explanation: A favourite is something that someone particularly likes.
example: My favourite colour is blue.
She has a favourite book to read.

vn_meaning: sợ hãi
eng_explanation: Fear is a feeling of apprehension or dread.
example: He felt a great fear of the dark.
She had a fear of heights.

vn_meaning: kỳ tích
eng_explanation: A feat is a notable accomplishment.
example: He achieved a great feat in his career.
She accomplished a remarkable feat in her research.

vn_meaning: A light, soft, and usually downy plume of downy feathers.
eng_explanation: A feather is a light, delicate plume of feathers.
example: The bird's feathers were a vibrant shade of red.
He carefully arranged the feathers on the wall.

vn_meaning: tính năng
eng_explanation: A feature is a noticeable aspect of something.
example: The car has several features for safety.
She noticed a new feature in the design.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tháng Hai (năm); danh từ: lễ Valentine (nếu cần thiết)
eng_explanation: noun: the second month of the year; also, Valentine's Day.
example: February is the shortest month of the year.
Many people exchange gifts on February 14th.
The weather was cold in February.

vn_meaning: danh từ: liên bang; tính từ: liên bang
eng_explanation: adjective: relating to the federal government; noun: a unit of government.
example: The federal government regulates many industries.
He works for a federal agency.
The federal reserve controls monetary policy.

vn_meaning: danh từ: học phí; phí; lệ phí; tính từ: phí
eng_explanation: noun: a payment for a service; adjective: relating to a payment.
example: The college charges a tuition fee.
There was a processing fee for the application.
He paid a lawyer's fee.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thức ăn; thức ăn cho động vật; tính từ: thức ăn
eng_explanation: verb: to provide food; noun: food for animals; adjective: food-related.
example: I need to buy some feed for the chickens.
The baby is being fed a bottle.
This is a high-protein feed for horses.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phản hồi; nhận xét; ý kiến
eng_explanation: noun: information about how satisfactory something is; response to a query.
example: I need feedback on my presentation.
The customer gave positive feedback on the service.
He received feedback on his performance.

vn_meaning: giang động: cho ăn; hoạt động cho ăn
eng_explanation: verb (gerund): the act of providing food; feeding animals.
example: The baby is currently feeding.
They are feeding the birds in the park.
The farmer is busy with the feeding.

vn_meaning: động từ: cảm thấy; có cảm giác; cảm nhận
eng_explanation: verb: to experience an emotion or sensation; to perceive with the senses.
example: I feel sad today.
I can feel the heat from the fire.
She feels nervous before the exam.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cảm xúc; cảm giác; sự cảm nhận
eng_explanation: noun: an emotion or sensation; a state of mind.
example: She has a good feeling about the future.
He expressed his feelings for her.
The feeling of warmth was comforting.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đồng sự; bạn; người cùng giới tính (nam)
eng_explanation: noun: a colleague; a male companion; a person of the same gender.
example: He is a close fellow of mine.
They are fellow students at the university.
He is a fellow traveler on the same path.

vn_meaning: tính từ: nữ; thuộc về nữ
eng_explanation: adjective: relating to or characteristic of females.
example: She is a female doctor.
The female population is smaller than the male population.
Female athletes are increasingly popular.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người theo chủ nghĩa nữ quyền (xã hội); tính từ: theo chủ nghĩa nữ quyền (chính trị)
eng_explanation: A person who supports equal rights and opportunities for all genders; advocating for women's rights.
example: She is a passionate feminist advocating for equal pay.
Feminist literature often explores themes of oppression and empowerment.
The feminist movement has significantly impacted social change.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hàng rào (vật chắn); động từ: rào (vật); động từ: do dự (trong quyết định)
eng_explanation: A barrier or enclosure; to hesitate or waver in a decision.
example: They built a wooden fence around the garden.
The children played near the fence.
He fenced about making a decision, unsure of the best course of action.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lễ hội (sự kiện); hội (lễ)
eng_explanation: A special occasion with celebrations, often religious or cultural.
example: The town celebrated its annual music festival.
They enjoyed the vibrant atmosphere of the food festival.
Diwali is a major Hindu festival.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sốt (bệnh); động từ: sốt (cơ thể)
eng_explanation: A high body temperature, often a sign of illness; to have a high temperature.
example: She had a high fever and chills.
The child's fever spiked overnight.
He felt feverish after spending too much time in the sun.

vn_meaning: tính từ/trạng từ: ít (số lượng nhỏ)
eng_explanation: A small number of; somewhat.
example: I have a few friends coming over tonight.
She felt a few butterflies in her stomach.
Only a few people attended the meeting.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sợi (vật liệu); chất xơ (thực phẩm)
eng_explanation: A threadlike structure; a type of roughage that aids digestion.
example: The sweater was made of natural fibre.
Eating plenty of fibre is good for your health.
The artist used fibre optics in his installation.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tiểu thuyết (văn học); chuyện bịa đặt
eng_explanation: Imaginary or invented events and characters in a book or story.
example: He enjoys reading historical fiction.
The book is a work of fiction, not a biography.
Science fiction explores futuristic possibilities.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cánh đồng (ruộng); lĩnh vực (hoạt động)
eng_explanation: An area of land; a sphere of activity or study.
example: The farmer plowed the field in preparation for planting.
She works in the field of medicine.
The company is expanding into new fields of business.

vn_meaning: tính từ: dữ dội; hung dữ; mãnh liệt
eng_explanation: Very strong or intense; violent or aggressive.
example: The lion was a fierce predator.
She fought with fierce determination.
The storm was incredibly fierce.

vn_meaning: số: mười lăm
eng_explanation: The number 15.
example: She is fifteen years old.
They scored fifteen points in the first quarter.
Fifteen minutes later, the train arrived.

vn_meaning: tính từ: cuối cùng, chót; danh từ: trận chung kết, kỳ thi cuối cùng
eng_explanation: adj. Last in a series; n. Concluding competition. (PoS: adj, n)
example: The final decision rests with the manager.
She passed her final exam with flying colors.
The final score was 3-2.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: cuối cùng, rốt cuộc
eng_explanation: adv. After a long time or effort; in the end. (PoS: adv)
example: We finally arrived at the destination after a long journey.
She finally admitted she was wrong.
Finally, the rain stopped.

vn_meaning: động từ: tài trợ, cung cấp vốn; danh từ: tài chính, nguồn vốn
eng_explanation: v. To fund or provide capital; n. Management of money. (PoS: v, n)
example: The company plans to finance the project with a loan.
She has a degree in finance.
Personal finance is an important skill.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thuộc về tài chính, về tiền bạc
eng_explanation: adj. Relating to money or financial matters. (PoS: adj)
example: The company is in a difficult financial situation.
He received financial support from his family.
Financial planning is crucial for a secure future.

vn_meaning: động từ: tìm thấy, phát hiện; khám phá
eng_explanation: v. To discover or locate something; to consider or deem. (PoS: v)
example: I can't find my keys anywhere.
She found a new job.
I find it difficult to believe his story.

vn_meaning: danh từ: kết quả tìm kiếm, phát hiện; sự khám phá
eng_explanation: n. A result of searching or investigating; a discovery. (PoS: n)
example: The research team published their findings.
The police made a shocking finding during the investigation.
Her findings support the original hypothesis.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tốt, đẹp, dễ chịu; danh từ: tiền phạt; động từ: phạt tiền
eng_explanation: adj. Of high quality; n. A penalty; v. To impose a penalty. (PoS: adj, n, v)
example: It was a fine day for a picnic.
He had to pay a fine for speeding.
The judge fined him $100.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ngón tay
eng_explanation: n. One of the digits on the hand. (PoS: n)
example: She injured her finger while cooking.
He pointed his finger at the suspect.
Keep your fingers crossed for good luck.

vn_meaning: động từ: hoàn thành, kết thúc
eng_explanation: v. To complete something; to bring to an end. (PoS: v)
example: I need to finish this report by tomorrow.
She finished the race in first place.
Let's finish what we started.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lửa; động từ: đốt, bắn, sa thải
eng_explanation: n. Combustion or flame; v. To ignite; to dismiss from a job. (PoS: n, v)
example: The fire destroyed the forest.
He was fired from his job for misconduct.
Don't play with fire.

vn_meaning: một loại vũ khí được thiết kế để bắn đạn, thường dùng để tấn công hoặc bảo vệ
eng_explanation: A weapon designed to fire projectiles, often used for attack or defense.
example: The firefighter used a firearm to extinguish the blaze.
The security guard carried a firearm for protection.

vn_meaning: người chữa cháy
eng_explanation: A person who fights fires.
example: The firefighter bravely rescued the trapped family.
The firefighter worked tirelessly to control the fire.

vn_meaning: một loại đèn lồng
eng_explanation: A colorful display of lights.
example: The fireworks display was spectacular, filling the night sky.
The children were delighted with the fireworks.

vn_meaning: chắc chắn, kiên định
eng_explanation: Strong and stable; resolute.
example: The company decided to form a firm commitment to the project.
He was a firm believer in his own ideas.

vn_meaning: chắc chắn, kiên định
eng_explanation: With great certainty or strength.
example: She stood firm and refused to back down.
He held the object firmly in his hand.

vn_meaning: đầu tiên
eng_explanation: The first of its kind or series.
example: The first shipment of goods arrived on time.
He was the first to make a proposal.

vn_meaning: đầu tiên
eng_explanation: Initially or first of all.
example: She explained firstly why she was late.
He offered firstly to help with the task.

vn_meaning: tôm, cá
eng_explanation: A marine animal.
example: The fisherman caught a large fish.
She enjoyed eating fresh fish.

vn_meaning: cá ngừ, cá trích
eng_explanation: The activity of catching fish.
example: The fishermen were busy fishing in the morning.
He enjoys fishing on the lake.

vn_meaning: tinh trạng, sức khỏe
eng_explanation: In good health and physical condition.
example: The athlete was fit for the competition.
She felt fit and energetic after her workout.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sức khỏe thể chất; tính từ: khỏe mạnh (về thể chất)
eng_explanation: Physical condition affecting ability to perform daily activities (noun); healthy (adjective).
example: Regular exercise improves your fitness.
Maintaining a healthy diet contributes to overall fitness.
She is dedicated to her fitness routine.

vn_meaning: danh từ: con số năm; tính từ: năm (đại lượng)
eng_explanation: The number five (noun); relating to the quantity or number five (adjective).
example: I have five siblings.
She bought five apples.
The fifth grade is challenging.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự sửa chữa; động từ: sửa chữa, khắc phục
eng_explanation: Repair (noun); to repair or correct (verb).
example: He needs to fix the broken window.
Can you fix this problem for me?
The mechanic will fix the car.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự sửa chữa xong; tính từ: đã sửa chữa, cố định
eng_explanation: A repaired item (noun); already repaired or secured (adjective).
example: The fixed window is now secure.
He has a fixed income.
The fixed price is non-negotiable.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự kiện, trận đấu; danh từ: đồ vật, phụ kiện
eng_explanation: An event or appointment (noun); a component or accessory (noun).
example: The football fixture is on Saturday.
He wore a stylish leather fixture.
The hotel room had a comfortable fixture.

vn_meaning: danh từ:ธง; động từ: biểu thị, chỉ ra
eng_explanation: A piece of cloth used as a symbol (noun); to indicate or signal (verb).
example: The flag of Vietnam is red and yellow.
She flagged down a taxi.
The protesters raised a flag of defiance.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ngọn lửa; danh từ: người yêu, tình yêu
eng_explanation: A burning body of gas (noun); a passionate lover (noun).
example: The flame of the candle flickered.
He was her flame for many years.
The fire created a dangerous flame.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tia sáng; động từ: lóe sáng, xuất hiện nhanh chóng
eng_explanation: A sudden burst of light (noun); to appear suddenly (verb).
example: A flash of lightning illuminated the sky.
Her eyes flashed with anger.
The camera flash startled the bird.

vn_meaning: danh từ: căn hộ, mặt phẳng; tính từ: bằng phẳng, đơn giản
eng_explanation: An apartment (noun); level or even (adjective).
example: They live in a small flat in the city.
The floor is flat and smooth.
He prefers a flat design over a complex one.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hương vị; danh từ: đặc điểm, tính chất
eng_explanation: The taste or smell of something (noun); a characteristic or quality (noun).
example: The cake has a delicious flavour.
The dish has a unique flavour.
He has a good flavour for leadership.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khuyết điểm, lỗi (về mặt vật chất hoặc phẩm chất); tính từ: có khuyết điểm, có lỗi.
eng_explanation: A flaw (noun) is a mark, blemish, or defect that spoils the appearance of something. It can also mean a weakness.
example: The diamond had a tiny flaw that reduced its value.
His argument contained a major flaw.
She was aware of her own flaws and worked to improve them.

vn_meaning: tính từ: có khuyết điểm, không hoàn hảo, sai sót.
eng_explanation: Flawed (adjective) means having imperfections, faults, or shortcomings; not perfect.
example: The plan was flawed from the beginning.
His flawed reasoning led to a poor decision.
The flawed system needed to be redesigned.

vn_meaning: động từ: chạy trốn, bỏ chạy.
eng_explanation: To flee (verb) means to run away from a place or situation of danger.
example: They fled the country to escape the war.
The suspect fled the scene of the crime.
Animals often flee when they sense danger.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hạm đội (tàu, máy bay); số lượng lớn (cái gì đó di chuyển nhanh).
eng_explanation: A fleet (noun) is a group of ships or aircraft. It can also refer to a large number of something moving quickly.
example: The naval fleet was prepared for battle.
A fleet of cars sped down the highway.
The company has a fleet of delivery vans.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thịt (của người hoặc động vật); phần mềm yếu, dễ bị tổn thương.
eng_explanation: Flesh (noun) refers to the soft tissue of the body. Figuratively, it can mean vulnerability.
example: The wound was deep and affected the flesh.
He felt vulnerable, like raw flesh.
The artist painted a portrait emphasizing the texture of the flesh.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự linh hoạt, mềm dẻo; khả năng thích nghi.
eng_explanation: Flexibility (noun) is the ability to bend or be easily changed; adaptability.
example: The yoga instructor emphasized flexibility.
The company showed flexibility in its negotiations.
Flexibility is key to success in a changing world.

vn_meaning: tính từ: linh hoạt, mềm dẻo; dễ thay đổi, dễ thích nghi.
eng_explanation: Flexible (adjective) means easily bent or changed; adaptable.
example: The flexible material could be molded into any shape.
He has a flexible work schedule.
The company's flexible approach allowed them to respond quickly to market changes.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chuyến bay; sự bay lượn; sự trốn chạy.
eng_explanation: Flight (noun) is the action of flying; a journey by air; an act of fleeing.
example: We have a flight to Paris tomorrow.
The birds took flight at dawn.
His flight from responsibility was disappointing.

vn_meaning: động từ: nổi; trôi; (giá cả) ổn định; danh từ: sự nổi, sự trôi.
eng_explanation: To float (verb) means to stay on the surface of water or air. It can also mean to remain stable.
example: The balloon floated gently in the sky.
The debris floated down the river.
Interest rates have been floating for several months.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lũ lụt; sự tràn lan; động từ: tràn lan, ngập lụt.
eng_explanation: A flood (noun) is an overflow of water onto land. It can also mean a large influx.
example: The flood destroyed many homes.
There was a flood of applications for the job.
The river flooded after the heavy rain.

vn_meaning: động từ: gấp (giấy, vải); gập (cánh, chân); làm cho khuất (sau vật gì); tính từ: gấp (đường, địa hình); danh từ: nếp gấp, chỗ gấp
eng_explanation: v./n. to bend or double; a bending or doubling. (v. - folded, folding)
example: She carefully folded the laundry.
The map was folded into a small square.
The sheep were penned in a fold.

vn_meaning: tính từ: có thể gấp được; đang gấp
eng_explanation: adj. capable of being folded; relating to the act of folding. (present participle)
example: a folding chair
folding screens are useful in small spaces.
The folding process requires precision.

vn_meaning: danh từ: dân chúng, người dân; (số nhiều) truyện cổ dân gian, nhạc dân gian
eng_explanation: n. people, especially traditional people; traditional stories or music. (pl. folk)
example: The folk of the village were very friendly.
She enjoys listening to folk music.
These are traditional folk tales passed down through generations.

vn_meaning: động từ: theo dõi; đi theo sau; làm theo; tuân theo; tiếp nối
eng_explanation: v. to go or come after; to obey or conform to. (followed, following)
example: Please follow me to the conference room.
He decided to follow his dreams.
The police are following several leads in the case.

vn_meaning: tính từ: theo sau; tiếp theo; danh từ: người theo dõi, môn đệ
eng_explanation: adj. coming after; n. people who admire or support someone. (present participle)
example: The following day, we will continue the discussion.
He has a large following on social media.
She is interested in the teachings of the following philosophers.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thích, yêu mến (thường dùng với 'of')
eng_explanation: adj. having an affection or liking for. (fond of)
example: She is very fond of her grandchildren.
He is fond of reading historical novels.
I am fond of spending time in nature.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thức ăn
eng_explanation: n. any nutritious substance eaten or drunk to maintain life or gain growth.
example: We need to buy some food for the party.
She is a food critic.
Healthy food is essential for a balanced diet.

vn_meaning: danh từ: kẻ ngốc; động từ: lừa gạt, đánh lừa
eng_explanation: n. a person lacking good sense; v. to trick or deceive. (fooled, fooling)
example: Don't be a fool and trust him.
He was fooled by her clever disguise.
It would be foolish to ignore the warning signs.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bàn chân; đơn vị đo chiều dài (bằng 30,48 cm)
eng_explanation: n. the lower extremity of the leg; a unit of length (12 inches). (pl. feet)
example: She injured her foot while running.
The room is ten feet long.
He walked a mile on foot.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đoạn phim, cảnh quay; số lượng vật liệu (thường là phim)
eng_explanation: n. film or video recording; amount of film or video material.
example: The news report included dramatic footage of the storm.
The documentary used archival footage.
They have hours of raw footage to edit.

vn_meaning: Một môn thể thao có bóng đá, thường chơi trên sân cỏ.
eng_explanation: Soccer is a popular sport played on grass fields.
example: I love to watch football matches.
The team is playing a fierce football match.

vn_meaning: Dùng để chỉ sự liên quan, có nghĩa là 'với', 'để', 'cho'.
eng_explanation: It means 'with', 'to', or 'for'.
example: I went for a walk in the park.
He is forgoing his holiday.

vn_meaning: Cấm, không cho phép.
eng_explanation: It means 'to prohibit' or 'to forbid'.
example: The company has forbid smoking in the workplace.
He was forbid to speak to her.

vn_meaning: Sức mạnh, áp lực, hoặc sự buộc.
eng_explanation: It refers to power, pressure, or compulsion.
example: The government imposed a force of taxes.
The driver tried to force the car out of the road.

vn_meaning: Dự đoán thời tiết.
eng_explanation: It's a prediction of the weather.
example: The weather forecast predicts rain tomorrow.
We are waiting for the forecast for the weekend.

vn_meaning: Văn hóa, ngôn ngữ, hoặc người nước ngoài.
eng_explanation: It refers to something from another country.
example: This is a foreign film.
He is a foreign traveler.

vn_meaning: Người nước ngoài.
eng_explanation: It means 'a foreigner'.
example: The tourists were amazed by the foreign people.
He is a foreigner in this country.

vn_meaning: Rừng cây.
eng_explanation: It's a forest.
example: We went into the forest to hike.
The forest is full of ancient trees.

vn_meaning: Vĩnh cửu, mãi mãi.
eng_explanation: It means 'forever'.
example: I will live forever.
He promised to be with me forever.

vn_meaning: Lò luyện kim loại.
eng_explanation: It's a blacksmith's forge.
example: The blacksmith was working in the forge.
The metal was forged into a sword.

vn_meaning: động từ: quên (điều gì đó); tính từ: lãng quên
eng_explanation: verb: to lose memory of something; adjective: characterized by forgetting.
example: I often forget to turn off the lights.
She tried to forget his betrayal.
He has a tendency to forget names.

vn_meaning: động từ: tha thứ (cho ai đó); tính từ: có lòng tha thứ
eng_explanation: verb: to pardon or excuse someone's offense; adjective: showing forgiveness.
example: I forgive you for breaking my vase.
She needs to forgive him for his hurtful words.
He was a forgiving man.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thìa; (giao thông) ngã tư đường; động từ: chia (bữa ăn)
eng_explanation: noun: a utensil for lifting food; intersection; verb: to divide a meal.
example: She used a fork to eat the spaghetti.
The cars stopped at the fork in the road.
He forked the salad into two portions.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hình dạng; mẫu đơn; tổ chức; (thể thao) môn thể thao; động từ: tạo thành; sắp xếp
eng_explanation: noun: shape or structure; a form; an organization; verb: to create or shape.
example: The statue had a strange form.
Fill out this form to apply for the job.
The athletes formed a line.

vn_meaning: tính từ: trang trọng; chính thức; nghiêm túc
eng_explanation: adjective: characterized by formality; official or conventional.
example: He gave a formal speech at the ceremony.
She wore a formal dress to the ball.
They have a formal business relationship.

vn_meaning: danh từ: định dạng; (máy tính) phần mềm định dạng; động từ: định dạng (văn bản, hình ảnh, v.v.)
eng_explanation: noun: a particular style or arrangement; software for formatting; verb: to arrange in a specific format.
example: What is the file format?
Please format the document according to the guidelines.
The software can format images.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự hình thành; (thể thao) đội hình; (geology) lớp đá
eng_explanation: noun: the process of forming; a team; a geological layer.
example: The formation of the Earth took billions of years.
The soccer team practiced their formation.
The geologist studied the rock formation.

vn_meaning: tính từ: trước đây; người từng là (ai đó)
eng_explanation: adjective: previously; a person who used to be something.
example: He was a former student of the university.
The former president gave an interview.
She is a former athlete.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: trước đây; từng
eng_explanation: adverb: previously; formerly.
example: Formerly, the town was much smaller.
He formerly worked as a teacher.
The building was formerly a school.

vn_meaning: danh từ: công thức; phương pháp; biểu thức toán học
eng_explanation: noun: a formula; a method; a mathematical expression.
example: The formula for calculating the area of a circle is πr².
He followed the recipe formula exactly.
The company's success is based on a simple formula.

vn_meaning: động từ: xây dựng, hình thành (ý tưởng, kế hoạch); diễn đạt (một cách rõ ràng, chính thức).
eng_explanation: verb: To create or develop a plan, idea, or argument; to express clearly.
example: The committee will formulate a new policy on climate change.
She needs to formulate her thoughts before speaking.
Scientists are working to formulate a vaccine against the virus.

vn_meaning: giới từ/trạng từ: ra, đi ra (từ một nơi nào đó); tiếp tục, tiến lên.
eng_explanation: preposition/adverb: Out; forward; onward.
example: He stepped forth to address the crowd.
The investigation proceeded forth with determination.
The news was released forth to the public.

vn_meaning: tính từ: cởi mở, nhiệt tình; sắp tới, sẽ có.
eng_explanation: adjective: Willing to offer information or help; appearing or happening soon.
example: She was very forthcoming with information about the project.
The company announced that a new product will be forthcoming soon.
He was always forthcoming with praise.

vn_meaning: tính từ: may mắn, hạnh phúc.
eng_explanation: adjective: Lucky; having good fortune.
example: It was fortunate that she avoided the accident.
He feels fortunate to have such a supportive family.
She had the fortunate opportunity to study abroad.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: may mắn thay, thật tốt.
eng_explanation: adverb: Luckily; fortunately.
example: Fortunately, no one was seriously injured in the collision.
Fortunately, the rain stopped just in time for the concert.
Fortunately, I remembered to bring my umbrella.

vn_meaning: danh từ: vận may, số phận; tài sản, của cải.
eng_explanation: noun: Luck; wealth; fate.
example: He lost his fortune in a risky investment.
She believes in her good fortune.
The company's fortune has improved significantly.

vn_meaning: số từ: bốn mươi.
eng_explanation: number: The number 40.
example: She is forty years old.
They have forty employees.
The price is forty dollars.

vn_meaning: danh từ: diễn đàn, hội trường; nơi để thảo luận.
eng_explanation: noun: A place or medium for open discussion; a meeting.
example: The online forum was a great place to ask questions.
The conference will be held in a large forum.
He posted his concerns on the company forum.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tiến về phía trước; hướng tới tương lai; (thể thao) tấn công.
eng_explanation: adjective: Towards the front; looking ahead; (sports) attacking.
example: Please move the chairs forward.
We need to think forward and plan for the future.
The team played a forward game.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hóa thạch.
eng_explanation: noun: The preserved remains or traces of a prehistoric organism.
example: The museum displayed a collection of fossils.
Scientists study fossils to learn about ancient life.
The fossil was found in a layer of rock.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khung (hình, tranh, cửa sổ); động từ: đóng khung, dựng lên, đặt câu hỏi (trong phiên tòa)
eng_explanation: n. structure supporting or enclosing something; v. construct or formulate (something). (n, v)
example: The picture frame is made of wood.
The lawyer tried to frame the question carefully.
He built a wooden frame for the shed.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khung sườn, hệ thống, cấu trúc cơ bản
eng_explanation: n. basic structure underlying a system, concept, or text. (n)
example: The new policy provides a framework for future development.
The theoretical framework guided the research.
We need a solid framework to support the project.

vn_meaning: danh từ: quyền nhượng quyền, đặc quyền; động từ: nhượng quyền
eng_explanation: n. right to operate a business under a recognized brand; v. grant such a right. (n, v)
example: He owns a fast-food franchise.
The company plans to franchise its business model.
She bought a franchise for a cleaning service.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: thẳng thắn, nói thật
eng_explanation: adv. in a direct and honest way; openly. (adv)
example: Frankly, I don't think it's a good idea.
She told him, frankly, that she was unhappy.
To be frank, the situation is quite serious.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự lừa đảo, hành vi gian lận
eng_explanation: n. wrongful or criminal deception intended to result in financial or personal gain. (n)
example: He was arrested for fraud.
The company was accused of insurance fraud.
Identity theft is a common type of fraud.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tự do, miễn phí; động từ: giải phóng, giải thoát
eng_explanation: adj. not under the control or power of another; not costing anything. (adj, v)
example: She is a free spirit.
The concert is free to the public.
They worked to free the prisoners.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự tự do, quyền tự do
eng_explanation: n. the power or right to act, speak, or think as one wants without hindrance. (n)
example: Freedom of speech is a fundamental right.
He fought for the freedom of his people.
She cherished her freedom and independence.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: tự do, thoải mái, không hạn chế
eng_explanation: adv. without constraint or restriction; willingly. (adv)
example: He speaks freely about his opinions.
The information is available freely online.
She laughed freely and without reservation.

vn_meaning: động từ: đóng băng, làm lạnh cóng; danh từ: sự đóng băng
eng_explanation: v. become or cause to become solid with cold; n. a period of very cold weather. (v, n)
example: The lake will freeze in winter.
The government imposed a freeze on wages.
A hard freeze damaged the crops.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tần số, sự thường xuyên
eng_explanation: n. rate at which something occurs or is repeated over a particular period. (n)
example: The frequency of the bus service is hourly.
He monitored the radio frequency.
The high frequency of errors was concerning.

vn_meaning: Thường xuyên, thường số lượng lớn; thường xuyên.
eng_explanation: Frequent means occurring often; frequently.
example: The store is very frequent.
I have a frequent visitor.

vn_meaning: Thường xuyên, thường số lượng lớn; thường xuyên.
eng_explanation: Frequently means often; regularly.
example: She frequently visits her family.
They frequently complain about the weather.

vn_meaning: Đã tươi, mới.
eng_explanation: Fresh means newly made or obtained.
example: The fruit is fresh from the orchard.
I need some fresh vegetables.

vn_meaning: Thứ bảy
eng_explanation: Friday is the day of the week.
example: I like to go to the park on Friday.
What day is your Friday?

vn_meaning: Tủ lạnh
eng_explanation: Fridge is a refrigerator.
example: Please put the milk in the fridge.
I need to buy a new fridge.

vn_meaning: Bạn bè
eng_explanation: Friend is a person you are close to.
example: I am a good friend to my family.
She is a friendly person.

vn_meaning: Thân thiện
eng_explanation: Friendly means pleasant and easy to get along with.
example: He is a friendly and helpful man.
The children are friendly and playful.

vn_meaning: Mối quan hệ bạn bè
eng_explanation: Friendship is a relationship of mutual affection.
example: The friendship between them is strong.
They shared a deep friendship.

vn_meaning: Lo sợ
eng_explanation: To frighten means to cause fear or anxiety.
example: The monster frightened him.
She tried to frighten the guests.

vn_meaning: Sợ hãi
eng_explanation: To frighten means to cause fear or anxiety.
example: He was frightened by the loud noise.
She was frightened by the ghost.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nỗi kinh hãi; tính từ: đáng sợ; (adj.) khiến người ta sợ hãi
eng_explanation: Adjective: causing fear or alarm; Noun: a feeling of fear.
example: The movie was incredibly frightening.
The dark forest was a frightening sight.
His frightening appearance made her nervous.

vn_meaning: danh từ: con phù (sống ở nước); (địa danh) vùng có phù
eng_explanation: Noun: An amphibian with a short body and long legs, typically found in water.
example: The frog jumped into the pond.
The swamp is known for its large frog population.
He caught a frog for his science project.

vn_meaning: gạt: từ; (cách) từ; (diễn vị) từ; (vận động) từ
eng_explanation: Preposition: indicating origin, source, or direction; Conjunction: introducing a clause.
example: I came from Vietnam.
He wrote a letter from Paris.
She is different from her brother.

vn_meaning: danh từ: mặt tiền; (chiến tranh) mặt trận; (đối tượng) đối tượng phía trước
eng_explanation: Noun: The foremost part of something; A line of soldiers or vehicles.
example: The front of the building is very impressive.
The soldiers advanced to the front lines.
He focused on the front of the stage.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đồ đông lạnh; tính từ: đông lạnh; (trạng thái) đông cứng
eng_explanation: Adjective: Solidified by freezing; Noun: Food that has been frozen.
example: The ice cream was completely frozen.
She bought frozen vegetables for dinner.
The lake is frozen over in the winter.

vn_meaning: danh từ: trái cây; (tôn giáo) quả lành
eng_explanation: Noun: A sweet product of a tree or plant that contains seeds.
example: I ate a delicious piece of fruit.
The orchard was full of ripe fruit.
Fruit is a healthy part of a balanced diet.

vn_meaning: tính từ: bực bội; (cảm xúc) cảm thấy bực bội
eng_explanation: Adjective: Feeling or expressing annoyance, impatience, or disappointment.
example: He was frustrated with the slow internet connection.
She felt frustrated after failing the exam.
His frustrated expression showed his annoyance.

vn_meaning: tính từ: gây bực bội; (đặc tính) có tính chất gây bực bội
eng_explanation: Adjective: Causing frustration; Characterized by frustration.
example: The frustrating traffic made him late.
The frustrating puzzle took hours to solve.
He found the situation frustrating and unfair.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự bực bội; (cảm xúc) cảm giác bực bội
eng_explanation: Noun: The state of being frustrated; A feeling of annoyance and disappointment.
example: His frustration grew with each failed attempt.
She expressed her frustration with the lack of support.
Overcoming frustration is a key to success.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cá chiên; (thực vật) cây con; (vận động) rán
eng_explanation: Noun: A fish or other animal that has been cooked by frying; Verb: To cook in hot fat.
example: I love crispy fried fish.
The fryers were busy preparing the meal.
He fried the eggs until they were golden brown.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhiên liệu (năng lượng); động từ: tiếp sức, tiếp thêm năng lượng
eng_explanation: fuel (n): a substance that is burned to produce heat or power; (v): to supply with energy.
example: The car runs on gasoline fuel.
His enthusiasm fueled the team's efforts.
Renewable energy sources like solar power can fuel our homes.

vn_meaning: động từ: hoàn thành, thực hiện đầy đủ
eng_explanation: fulfil (v): to accomplish or carry out; to satisfy a requirement.
example: She fulfilled her promise to help him.
The contract must be fulfilled by the deadline.
It's important to fulfil your responsibilities.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đầy, đủ; danh từ: số lượng đầy đủ
eng_explanation: full (adj): containing or holding as much as possible; complete.
example: The glass is full of water.
He gave it his full attention.
The restaurant was full tonight.

vn_meaning: tính từ: toàn thời gian; trạng từ: toàn thời gian
eng_explanation: full-time (adj/adv): employed for a regular number of hours per week.
example: She works full-time as a teacher.
He's looking for a full-time position.
I'm dedicating full-time to this project.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: hoàn toàn, đầy đủ
eng_explanation: fully (adv): completely; to the full extent.
example: The room was fully occupied.
I'm fully aware of the risks.
The plan was fully implemented.

vn_meaning: danh từ: niềm vui, sự thích thú; tính từ: vui vẻ
eng_explanation: fun (n): enjoyment, amusement, or lighthearted pleasure; (adj): enjoyable.
example: We had a lot of fun at the party.
It's fun to learn new things.
The movie was full of fun and laughter.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chức năng, công dụng; động từ: hoạt động, thực hiện
eng_explanation: function (n): a purpose or role; an activity or process; (v): to perform a task.
example: The function of the heart is to pump blood.
The meeting will serve a specific function.
The software functions correctly.

vn_meaning: tính từ: có chức năng, hiệu quả
eng_explanation: functional (adj): designed to be practical and useful; capable of performing a function.
example: The design is both stylish and functional.
The kitchen is fully functional.
A functional approach to problem-solving.

vn_meaning: danh từ: quỹ, nguồn tài chính; động từ: tài trợ, cấp vốn
eng_explanation: fund (n): a sum of money set aside for a particular purpose; (v): to provide financial support.
example: The charity relies on public funds.
They are trying to fund the research project.

vn_meaning: tính từ: cơ bản, nền tảng
