vn_meaning: danh từ: bài tập về nhà; công việc học tập ở nhà
eng_explanation: noun: assignments given to students to be completed at home.
example: I have a lot of homework to do tonight.
Homework is an important part of the learning process.
She struggled with her homework and asked for help from her teacher.

vn_meaning: tính từ: trung thực; thật thà; chính trực
eng_explanation: adjective: truthful and sincere; free from deceit.
example: He is an honest man and always tells the truth.
It's important to be honest with yourself and others.
She praised his honest and straightforward approach.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự trung thực; tính thật thà; lòng thành thật
eng_explanation: noun: the quality of being honest; integrity and sincerity.
example: Honesty is the best policy.
She valued honesty above all else in her relationships.
His honesty earned him the respect of his colleagues.

vn_meaning: danh từ: danh dự; vinh dự; tôn vinh; danh hiệu cao quý
eng_explanation: noun: respect and admiration; a high title or rank; a noble quality.
example: He fought with honour and courage.
She received an honour for her contributions to the community.
The knight was known for his honour and chivalry.

vn_meaning: danh từ: móc; câu; sự thu hút; điều kích thích
eng_explanation: noun: a curved piece of metal; a fishing line; something that attracts attention.
example: He used a hook to catch the fish.
The advertisement had a catchy hook to draw customers in.
She felt a hook in her heart when she saw him again.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hy vọng; niềm tin; mong muốn
eng_explanation: noun: a feeling of expectation and desire for a certain thing to happen.
example: I have hope for a brighter future.
She held onto hope even in the darkest times.
Don't lose hope; things will get better.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tràn đầy hy vọng; lạc quan
eng_explanation: adjective: feeling or expressing optimism about the future.
example: She was hopeful about her chances of winning the lottery.
Despite the challenges, he remained hopeful.
A hopeful smile lit up her face.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: hy vọng rằng; có lẽ
eng_explanation: adverb: expressing a wish that something will happen or be true.
example: Hopefully, the weather will be nice tomorrow.
I hope you are hopefully enjoying your vacation.
Hopefully, we will be able to finish the project on time.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đường chân trời (không gian); khả năng, giới hạn (thời gian, tiềm năng).
eng_explanation: noun: the apparent line that separates earth from sky; a limit to one's hopes or ambitions.
example: The sun dipped below the horizon, painting the sky with vibrant colors.
Her career ambitions stretched beyond the horizon of what seemed possible.
We're exploring new horizons in renewable energy research.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sừng (động vật); còi (xe, tàu); nhạc cụ sừng.
eng_explanation: noun: a hard, pointed growth on an animal's head; a signaling device; a brass musical instrument.
example: The rhinoceros used its horn to defend itself.
He honked his horn to alert the driver.
The band played a lively tune on their horns.

vn_meaning: tính từ: khủng khiếp, kinh tởm, ghê tởm.
eng_explanation: adjective: shockingly bad or unpleasant; terrible.
example: The movie was absolutely horrible, full of clichés and bad acting.
I had a horrible headache after the long flight.
The weather was horrible – cold, wet, and windy.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nỗi kinh hoàng, sự kinh tởm; thể loại kinh dị.
eng_explanation: noun: an intense feeling of fear, shock, or disgust; a genre of fiction dealing with the macabre.
example: The haunted house filled her with a sense of horror.
He enjoys watching horror movies on Halloween.
The news of the disaster brought horror to the entire nation.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ngựa.
eng_explanation: noun: a large, domesticated animal used for riding or pulling vehicles.
example: She rode her horse through the fields.
The horses galloped across the open plains.
He works on a horse farm, caring for the animals.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bệnh viện.
eng_explanation: noun: a place where sick or injured people receive medical care.
example: He was rushed to the hospital after the accident.
She works as a nurse at the local hospital.
The hospital is providing free flu shots to the community.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chủ nhà; người chủ trì; vật chủ (vi sinh vật).; tính từ: chủ yếu, chính.
eng_explanation: noun: a person who receives or entertains guests; a person who leads an event; a carrier of a parasite; adjective: principal or most important.
example: She was a gracious host, making sure everyone felt welcome.
He was the host of the evening's awards ceremony.
The mosquito acted as a host for the malaria parasite.

vn_meaning: danh từ: con tin.
eng_explanation: noun: a person held captive and usually demanded as ransom.
example: The kidnappers demanded a large sum of money for the hostage's release.
Negotiations are underway to secure the hostages' safe return.
She spent years as a hostage of war.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thù địch, hiếu chiến, không thân thiện.
eng_explanation: adjective: showing or feeling opposition or dislike; unfriendly.
example: The protesters were met with a hostile crowd.
Relations between the two countries remain hostile.
He received a hostile reception from the audience.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự thù địch, thái độ chống đối.
eng_explanation: noun: a hostile or antagonistic attitude or feeling.
example: There was a palpable sense of hostility in the room.
His constant criticism fueled the hostility between them.
The peace talks were undermined by ongoing hostility.

vn_meaning: tính từ: nhân đạo, từ thiện (liên quan đến việc giúp đỡ người khác, đặc biệt trong các tình huống khó khăn).
eng_explanation: adj. Concerned with or seeking to promote human welfare. (relating to aid/compassion)
example: The organization provides humanitarian aid to refugees.
She is known for her humanitarian work in disaster zones.
A humanitarian crisis is unfolding in the region.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhân loại, loài người; tính nhân đạo, lòng nhân ái (tập hợp tất cả con người; phẩm chất tốt đẹp của con người).
eng_explanation: n. All of humankind; the quality of being humane. (people collectively; compassion)
example: The future of humanity depends on our actions today.
He showed great humanity in the face of suffering.
The war threatened the very fabric of humanity.

vn_meaning: tính từ: khiêm tốn, khiêm nhường (không tự cao tự đại); thấp kém, tầm thường (về địa vị, hoàn cảnh).; động từ: hạ mình, khiêm nhường.
eng_explanation: adj. Having a modest or low view of one's own importance. (modest; unpretentious) v. Lower in status.
example: He was a humble servant of the people.
Despite his success, he remained humble.
She comes from a humble background.

vn_meaning: tính từ: hài hước, gây cười (có tính chất gây ra tiếng cười).
eng_explanation: adj. Causing laughter and amusement; funny. (funny; amusing)
example: He told a humorous story that made everyone laugh.
The play was full of humorous dialogue.
She has a humorous way of looking at life.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự hài hước, tính hài hước; tâm trạng (khả năng cảm nhận và thể hiện sự hài hước).
eng_explanation: n. The quality of being amusing; a mood. (funniness; disposition)
example: He has a good sense of humour.
She appreciated his dry humour.
He was in a cheerful humour.

vn_meaning: danh từ: một trăm (số đếm).; tính từ: hàng trăm (số lượng lớn).
eng_explanation: n. The number 100. adj. Relating to or consisting of 100. (number; quantity)
example: There were a hundred people at the concert.
She earned a hundred dollars.
He had a hundred things to do.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự đói, cơn đói (cảm giác muốn ăn).; sự thèm khát (khát vọng mạnh mẽ).
eng_explanation: n. A feeling of needing food; strong desire. (need for food; craving)
example: The children suffered from hunger.
He felt a hunger for knowledge.
Her hunger for success was insatiable.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đói (cảm thấy muốn ăn).; thèm khát (khát vọng mạnh mẽ).
eng_explanation: adj. Feeling or displaying the need for food. (feeling of needing food; eager)
example: I'm hungry – let's get something to eat.
She was hungry for adventure.
The audience was hungry for more.

vn_meaning: động từ: săn bắt (động vật); tìm kiếm (thông tin, người).; danh từ: cuộc săn bắt.
eng_explanation: v. To pursue and kill animals for food or sport; search. (pursue; seek) n. The act of hunting.
example: They went hunting in the forest.
The police are hunting for the suspect.
The hunt for treasure began.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự săn bắt (hoạt động săn bắt động vật).
eng_explanation: n. The activity of chasing and killing animals for sport or food. (the act of pursuing game)
example: Hunting is a popular sport in some countries.
He enjoys weekend hunting trips.
Big-game hunting requires skill and patience.

vn_meaning: Một cơn bão lớn, thường gây ra thiệt hại và mất mát.
eng_explanation: A powerful storm with destructive winds and heavy rain.
example: The hurricane hit the coast with fierce winds.
Scientists are studying the hurricane's impact on the ecosystem.

vn_meaning: Chạy nhanh, gấp rút.
eng_explanation: To speed up or rush quickly.
example: Please hurry, I'm waiting.
Don't hesitate, hurry up and finish.

vn_meaning: Gây thương tích, làm đau.
eng_explanation: To injure or cause pain.
example: He hurt his leg while running.
I didn't want to hurt her feelings.

vn_meaning: Người chồng.
eng_explanation: The male spouse.
example: They are getting married next month.
He is a devoted husband.

vn_meaning: Hợp chất hóa học, một trong những nguyên tố cơ bản.
eng_explanation: A chemical element, one of the basic elements.
example: Hydrogen is used in many industrial processes.
The experiment involved the study of hydrogen gas.

vn_meaning: Giả thuyết, ý tưởng.
eng_explanation: A proposed explanation for something.
example: The hypothesis was tested with a new experiment.
She presented a hypothesis about the cause of the disease.

vn_meaning: Tôi (người nói).
eng_explanation: The pronoun 'I'.
example: I am happy to be here.
He said, 'I don't know.'

vn_meaning: Lạnh, băng.
eng_explanation: Cold, frozen.
example: The ice cream was delicious.
The lake was covered in ice.

vn_meaning: Bánh kem.
eng_explanation: A frozen dessert made of ice cream.
example: I want to buy some ice cream.
She enjoyed a delicious ice cream cone.

vn_meaning: Hình ảnh, biểu tượng.
eng_explanation: A visual representation of something.
example: The icon on the computer screen is very small.
He used an icon to represent the company.

vn_meaning: danh từ: mã số định danh; danh từ: Hệ thống ID (như ID người, ID tài khoản)
eng_explanation: Noun: A unique identifier (e.g., ID number, account ID).
example: Please provide your ID for verification.
I need to update my ID information.
The system uses ID numbers to track users.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ý tưởng; tính từ: ý tưởng (về một vấn đề)
eng_explanation: Noun: A thought or suggestion; Adjective: Relating to thoughts or concepts.
example: She had a brilliant idea for a new project.
Let's discuss the idea of expanding our business.
He developed the idea into a successful product.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hình mẫu lý tưởng; tính từ: lý tưởng; tính từ: tốt nhất
eng_explanation: Noun: A perfect example; Adjective: Perfect or best; Adjective: Excellent.
example: She strives to live her life according to her ideals.
He is an ideal candidate for the position.
The company promotes an ideal of customer satisfaction.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự giống hệt; tính từ: giống hệt nhau
eng_explanation: Adjective: Exactly the same; Noun: The state of being identical.
example: The twins are identical in appearance.
The two documents are identical.
There is an identical copy of the painting.

vn_meaning: danh từ: xác định; danh từ: quá trình xác định
eng_explanation: Noun: The act of identifying; Noun: The process of recognizing someone or something.
example: The identification of the suspect led to an arrest.
The process of identification requires careful observation.
Proper identification is essential for travel.

vn_meaning: động từ: xác định; động từ: nhận ra
eng_explanation: Verb: To recognize or determine something; To establish someone's identity.
example: Can you identify the author of this book?
The police are trying to identify the missing person.
I need to identify the source of the problem.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bản sắc; danh từ: danh tính
eng_explanation: Noun: A person's sense of self; Noun: One's name or personal description.
example: Her identity was revealed after the investigation.
Maintaining a strong sense of identity is important.
He questioned his own identity.

vn_meaning: tính từ: mang tính lý thuyết; tính từ: liên quan đến lý thuyết
eng_explanation: Adjective: Relating to ideology; Based on a particular set of beliefs.
example: The speech was highly ideological and partisan.
His political views are deeply ideological.
She studied the ideological foundations of the movement.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hệ tư tưởng; danh từ: triết lý
eng_explanation: Noun: A system of ideas and beliefs; A set of principles or doctrines.
example: The government's ideology is based on socialism.
His ideology shaped his entire life.
Understanding different ideologies is crucial for political analysis.

vn_meaning: danh từ: kẻ ngốc nghếch; danh từ: người ngốc nghếch
eng_explanation: Noun: A foolish or stupid person.
example: He was called an idiot for his reckless behavior.
Don't be an idiot and waste your money.
The movie featured an idiot character.

vn_meaning: liên từ: nếu; trợ từ: nếu mà
eng_explanation: conjunction (introducing a condition); adverb (expressing contingency)
example: If it rains, we will stay inside.
I don't know if I can come.
If you need help, just ask.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự ngu dốt, sự thiếu hiểu biết
eng_explanation: lack of knowledge or awareness; state of being uninformed.
example: His ignorance of the topic was obvious.
Ignorance is no excuse for breaking the law.
She apologized for her ignorance about the culture.

vn_meaning: động từ: phớt lờ, bỏ qua
eng_explanation: to deliberately pay no attention to; disregard.
example: Please ignore the flashing light.
He ignored my question.
Don't ignore your health problems.

vn_meaning: tính từ: ốm yếu, bệnh tật; trạng từ: tồi tệ, kém
eng_explanation: affected by illness; unwell; in a bad or unsatisfactory way.
example: She felt ill after eating the bad food.
He was ill for a week.
The situation is ill-defined.

vn_meaning: tính từ: bất hợp pháp, trái pháp luật
eng_explanation: not permitted by law; unlawful.
example: It is illegal to drive without a license.
The illegal activity was quickly shut down.
Possessing these items is illegal.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bệnh tật, chứng bệnh
eng_explanation: the state of being ill; a disease or sickness.
example: She is suffering from a serious illness.
The doctor diagnosed her with an illness.
Preventative measures can reduce the risk of illness.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ảo ảnh, ảo giác
eng_explanation: a false perception; a deceptive appearance.
example: The desert seemed to shimmer with an illusion of water.
It was just an illusion.
His success was based on an illusion of grandeur.

vn_meaning: động từ: minh họa, làm rõ
eng_explanation: to explain or make clear by using examples; to draw a picture.
example: The speaker used charts to illustrate his points.
The book is beautifully illustrated.
Can you illustrate this concept with a diagram?

vn_meaning: danh từ: minh họa, hình vẽ; ví dụ
eng_explanation: a drawing, painting, or photograph that explains or decorates a text; an example.
example: The book contained many detailed illustrations.
This is just one illustration of the problem.
The magazine featured a striking illustration.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hình ảnh, ảnh; ấn tượng
eng_explanation: a likeness or representation; a mental picture.
example: The image was blurry.
He has a good image of himself.
The company is trying to improve its public image.

vn_meaning: tính từ: miễn dịch (bệnh tật); không bị ảnh hưởng (tác động)
eng_explanation: adj. Protected from infection or disease; not affected by something. (Immunity)
example: She is immune to most common illnesses.
The country is largely immune from the effects of the recession.
Vaccination can provide immunity against measles.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tác động, ảnh hưởng mạnh mẽ; va chạm (vật lý); tính từ: gây tác động lớn (ít dùng); động từ: va chạm, đập vào; tác động đến
eng_explanation: n. A strong effect; a collision. v. To affect something strongly. (Influence)
example: The new policy had a significant impact on the economy.
The car crash had a huge impact.
Climate change is expected to impact coastal regions.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thiếu kiên nhẫn, nóng nảy
eng_explanation: adj. Not willing to wait; easily annoyed. (Irritability)
example: He became increasingly impatient with the slow service.
She tapped her foot impatiently while waiting for the bus.
An impatient driver honked their horn.

vn_meaning: động từ: thực hiện, thi hành (kế hoạch, luật lệ); triển khai (công nghệ)
eng_explanation: v. To put a plan or system into effect. (Execution)
example: The company will implement a new marketing strategy.
The government is implementing new environmental regulations.
We need to implement these changes quickly.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự thực hiện, sự thi hành (kế hoạch, luật lệ); sự triển khai (công nghệ)
eng_explanation: n. The process of putting a plan or system into effect. (Execution)
example: The implementation of the new policy was challenging.
Successful implementation requires careful planning.
The project is now in the implementation phase.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hàm ý, ý nghĩa tiềm ẩn; hệ quả, ảnh hưởng gián tiếp
eng_explanation: n. A possible effect or result; something suggested without being stated. (Consequence)
example: One implication of the study is that smoking is harmful.
The implications of this decision are far-reaching.
There are serious implications for the future of the company.

vn_meaning: động từ: hàm ý, ám chỉ; gợi ý
eng_explanation: v. To suggest something without stating it directly. (Suggest)
example: Are you implying that I am dishonest?
His silence seemed to imply agreement.
The evidence implies that he was involved.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hàng nhập khẩu; động từ: nhập khẩu
eng_explanation: n. Goods brought into a country. v. To bring goods into a country. (Trade)
example: The country relies heavily on imports of oil.
We import a lot of fruit from Spain.
The new tariffs will affect imports.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tầm quan trọng, sự quan trọng
eng_explanation: n. The quality of being important; significance. (Significance)
example: The importance of education cannot be overstated.
She stressed the importance of teamwork.
He understands the importance of punctuality.

vn_meaning: tính từ: quan trọng, trọng yếu
eng_explanation: adj. Of great significance or value. (Significant)
example: This is an important decision.
She is an important member of the team.
It's important to be prepared.

vn_meaning: impose
eng_explanation: To impose means to compel or require someone to do something, often without their consent.
example: The tax laws impose a steep penalty for late payments.
The government imposed new regulations on businesses.

vn_meaning: impossible
eng_explanation: Impossible signifies something that cannot occur or be realized.
example: The experiment proved impossible to replicate.
He expressed an impossible dream of winning the lottery.

vn_meaning: impress
eng_explanation: To impress means to attract or hold someone's attention, often through beauty or skill.
example: The music was incredibly impressive.
Her paintings were incredibly impressive.

vn_meaning: impressed
eng_explanation: To be impressed means to be captivated or delighted by something.
example: She was impressed by the artist's talent.
The stunning view left him completely impressed.

vn_meaning: impression
eng_explanation: An impression is a fleeting visual or mental image.
example: The painting offered a vivid impression of the landscape.
The fleeting impression of the sunset was beautiful.

vn_meaning: impressive
eng_explanation: Impressive suggests something is exceptionally beautiful or skillful.
example: The building was an impressive example of modern architecture.
The performance was impressive in its technical skill.

vn_meaning: nhốt
eng_explanation: Imprison refers to the act of confining someone to a place or situation.
example: The prisoners were imprisoned for a crime they didn't commit.
The government imposed a harsh prison sentence.

vn_meaning: nhốt giam
eng_explanation: Imprisonment describes the state of being confined or held captive.
example: The country experienced a period of intense imprisonment.
The prisoners were subjected to harsh conditions in their prison.

vn_meaning: to make something better.
eng_explanation: To improve means to make something better.
example: We need to improve our communication skills.
The company is working to improve its efficiency.

vn_meaning: cải thiện
eng_explanation: Improvement signifies a positive change or advancement.
example: The project offered significant improvements in design.
The company is focused on making continuous improvement.

vn_meaning: tính từ: trong; ở trong; không; không có; không phải; (về thời gian) vào; (về địa điểm) ở trong; (về trạng thái) bị; (về sự vật) thuộc về; (về hành động) làm; (về sự kiện) xảy ra; danh từ: sự ở trong; (trong toán học) phần; (trong các loại hình nghệ thuật) phần; trạng từ: theo; (trong các loại hình nghệ thuật) theo cách; (về sự vật) thuộc về; (về hành động) làm.
eng_explanation: Preposition/adverb indicating location, state, or absence; noun referring to a portion.
example: The book is in the box.
He is not in trouble.
The artist used a lot of color in his painting.

vn_meaning: danh từ: không có khả năng; không thể; (về sức khỏe) yếu ớt; (về tinh thần) suy yếu.
eng_explanation: Noun: The state of being unable to do something; often related to physical or mental limitations.
example: He has an inability to learn new languages.
Her inability to walk was heartbreaking.
The patient's inability to speak was due to a stroke.

vn_meaning: tính từ: không đủ; không đáp ứng được; không thích hợp; không xứng đáng; (về chất lượng) kém.
eng_explanation: Adjective: Not sufficient or satisfactory; lacking what is needed.
example: The funding was inadequate to cover the project's costs.
His explanation was inadequate to answer my question.
The room was too small to be considered adequate.

vn_meaning: tính từ: không phù hợp; không đúng; không lịch sự; không thích hợp; (về hành vi) sai trái.
eng_explanation: Adjective: Not suitable or proper for a particular situation or context.
example: Wearing a swimsuit to a formal dinner is inappropriate.
His comment was inappropriate and offensive.
It's inappropriate to ask about someone's salary.

vn_meaning: danh từ: động lực; khuyến khích; phần thưởng; lợi ích; (về chính sách) ưu đãi.
eng_explanation: Noun: Something that motivates or encourages someone to do something.
example: The company offered a bonus as an incentive for good performance.
Financial incentives can be effective in promoting healthy behavior.
He was motivated by the incentive to win the competition.

vn_meaning: danh từ: inch (đơn vị đo); một phần tư foot; (về chiều dài) khoảng cách ngắn; (về sự di chuyển) bước chân; (về sự tiến triển) sự tiến gần.
eng_explanation: Noun: A unit of length equal to one-twelfth of a foot; a small distance.
example: The car traveled an inch.
He took an inch of progress each day.
The ruler was marked in inches.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự xảy ra; tỷ lệ; (về bệnh tật) số ca mắc bệnh; (về sự kiện) sự trùng hợp.
eng_explanation: Noun: The occurrence of something; the rate of occurrence; a coincidence.
example: The incidence of heart disease is increasing.
There was a strange incidence of accidents at that intersection.
The incidence of the disease is higher in urban areas.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự cố; sự việc; (về lịch sử) sự kiện; (về giao thông) tai nạn.
eng_explanation: Noun: An event or occurrence; a mishap or accident.
example: There was a minor incident during the flight.
The incident led to a police investigation.
The historical incident shaped the course of the war.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thích; muốn; xu hướng; nghiêng; (về địa hình) dốc; (về tư thế) cúi; (về ý định) có ý định.
eng_explanation: Adjective: Having a tendency or preference; leaning; sloping.
example: He is inclined to agree with you.
The road is inclined downwards.
She was inclined to be optimistic.

vn_meaning: động từ: bao gồm; chứa; có; (về danh sách) liệt kê; (về sự kiện) mời; (về hoạt động) bao gồm.
eng_explanation: Verb: To contain or encompass; to list or incorporate; to invite.
example: The package includes a book and a pen.
The meeting will include representatives from all departments.
The concert will include a variety of musical styles.

vn_meaning: động từ: bao gồm (trong một danh sách, nhóm); tính từ: được bao gồm (trong một danh sách, nhóm)
eng_explanation: included (v/adj) - to contain something as part of a whole; to be part of something.
example: The price of dinner included drinks and dessert.
My name is included on the list of attendees.
She felt included in the team's activities.

vn_meaning: giới từ/động từ nguyên thể: bao gồm, kể cả
eng_explanation: including (prep/v-ing) - containing or featuring something as part of a larger group.
example: The package included books, pens, and paper.
We visited several cities, including Paris and Rome.
The project is including a detailed risk assessment.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự bao gồm; sự tiếp nhận
eng_explanation: inclusion (n) - the act of including something or someone; acceptance into a group.
example: The policy promotes the inclusion of disabled people.
Her inclusion in the team was a surprise.
Diversity and inclusion are important values.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thu nhập
eng_explanation: income (n) - money received, especially on a regular basis, from work or investments.
example: His annual income is quite high.
The company's income has increased significantly.
She used her income to pay off her debts.

vn_meaning: động từ: kết hợp, tích hợp; thành lập (công ty)
eng_explanation: incorporate (v) - to include something as part of a whole; to form a corporation.
example: We need to incorporate your feedback into the design.
The company plans to incorporate new technology.
They decided to incorporate as a limited company.

vn_meaning: tính từ: không đúng, sai
eng_explanation: incorrect (adj) - not correct or true; wrong.
example: The answer to the question was incorrect.
I'm sorry, that information is incorrect.
Please check your work for any incorrect entries.

vn_meaning: động từ: tăng lên; danh từ: sự gia tăng
eng_explanation: increase (v/n) - to become larger or greater; a rise or growth in quantity or degree.
example: The price of gas is expected to increase.
There has been a significant increase in sales.
We need to find ways to increase productivity.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: ngày càng, càng lúc càng
eng_explanation: increasingly (adv) - to a greater and greater extent; more and more.
example: He is increasingly worried about the situation.
The cost of living is increasingly high.
People are increasingly reliant on technology.

vn_meaning: tính từ: phi thường, không thể tin được
eng_explanation: incredible (adj) - so extraordinary as to seem impossible; amazing.
example: The view from the top of the mountain was incredible.
She showed incredible courage during the crisis.
It's an incredible opportunity.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: phi thường, không thể tin được
eng_explanation: incredibly (adv) - to an extremely high degree; unbelievably.
example: The movie was incredibly boring.
She is incredibly talented.
The food tasted incredibly delicious.

vn_meaning: tính từ: gián tiếp, không trực tiếp (hành động, lời nói); danh từ: sự gián tiếp, cách nói vòng vo.
eng_explanation: adj. Not direct or straightforward; adv. By an indirect route. (PoS: adj, adv)
example: She made an indirect reference to his mistake.
The sunlight was indirect, filtered through the trees.
Indirect costs are those that cannot be easily traced to a specific product.

vn_meaning: tính từ: cá nhân, riêng lẻ; danh từ: cá nhân, một người.
eng_explanation: adj. Relating to a single person or thing; n. A single person or thing. (PoS: adj, n)
example: Each individual has their own unique talents.
The company values individual initiative.
He is an individual of strong character.

vn_meaning: tính từ: trong nhà, diễn ra trong nhà.
eng_explanation: adj. Situated or used inside a building; relating to activities inside. (PoS: adj)
example: We spent the afternoon playing indoor games.
The indoor pool is open year-round.
Indoor air quality is an important health concern.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: trong nhà, ở trong nhà.
eng_explanation: adv. Inside a building; at home. (PoS: adv)
example: It's too cold to play outdoors; let's stay indoors.
She prefers to spend her evenings reading indoors.
The cat stayed indoors all day.

vn_meaning: động từ: gây ra, xúi giục, khuyến khích (một trạng thái, hành động).
eng_explanation: v. To persuade someone to do something; to cause something to happen. (PoS: v)
example: The doctor induced labor.
Stress can induce headaches.
He was induced to confess by the police.

vn_meaning: động từ: chiều chuộng, nuông chiều; hưởng thụ (một thú vui).
eng_explanation: v. To allow oneself to enjoy something pleasurable; to satisfy a desire. (PoS: v)
example: She indulged in a piece of chocolate cake.
He indulged his children with expensive gifts.
Don't indulge in negative thoughts.

vn_meaning: tính từ: công nghiệp, thuộc về công nghiệp; liên quan đến sản xuất.
eng_explanation: adj. Relating to industry; concerned with manufacturing. (PoS: adj)
example: The city has a large industrial sector.
Industrial pollution is a serious problem.
He works in the industrial design field.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ngành công nghiệp; sự chăm chỉ, cần cù.
eng_explanation: n. Economic activity concerned with the processing of raw materials; diligence. (PoS: n)
example: The automotive industry is very competitive.
She is known for her hard work and industry.
The tourism industry is vital to the economy.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự bất bình đẳng, không công bằng (về thu nhập, cơ hội).
eng_explanation: n. The state of being unequal; lack of fairness. (PoS: n)
example: Income inequality is a growing problem.
Addressing social inequality requires systemic change.
Educational inequality limits opportunities for many.

vn_meaning: tính từ: không thể tránh khỏi, tất yếu xảy ra.
eng_explanation: adj. Certain to happen; unavoidable. (PoS: adj)
example: Death and taxes are inevitable.
The company's failure was almost inevitable.
With hard work, success is more inevitable.

vn_meaning: không thể tránh khỏi
eng_explanation: It suggests a natural or unavoidable outcome.
example: The rain will inevitably stop tomorrow.
The company's success is inevitable given its strong market position.
He inevitably made a mistake.

vn_meaning: Well-known for bad qualities or deeds; notorious.
eng_explanation: It denotes a reputation for shame or disgrace.
example: He was an infamous criminal.
The city was infamous for its crime rate.
She was an infamous gossip.

vn_meaning: trẻ sơ sinh
eng_explanation: Refers to a very young child.
example: The infant was crying for attention.
The baby was an infant at birth.
She is an infant now.

vn_meaning: lây nhiễm
eng_explanation: It describes the process of spreading disease.
example: The virus can infect any living organism.
The bacteria can infect the skin.
The medicine can infect the patient.

vn_meaning: nhiễm trùng
eng_explanation: It refers to the spread of disease.
example: The flu is an infection that can spread quickly.
The virus caused an infection in the patient's bloodstream.
The bacteria caused an infection in the wound.

vn_meaning: suy ra
eng_explanation: It means to assume something based on what is seen or heard.
example: The evidence suggests that he is guilty.
She inferred that he was angry.
The speaker inferred the truth from the data.

vn_meaning: lạm phát
eng_explanation: It signifies rising prices.
example: Inflation is a major concern for many economies.
The government is trying to combat inflation.
Rising inflation can erode purchasing power.

vn_meaning: gây ra
eng_explanation: It describes the act of causing pain or damage.
example: The earthquake inflicted damage on the buildings.
His careless actions inflicted a lot of stress on her.
The war inflicted suffering on the civilian population.

vn_meaning: ảnh hưởng
eng_explanation: It refers to the power to persuade or control.
example: The politician's speech had a strong influence on the voters.
Her words influenced his decision.
The company's marketing campaign influenced sales.

vn_meaning: có ảnh hưởng
eng_explanation: It denotes a powerful ability to persuade or control.
example: The CEO is an influential figure in the industry.
Her opinions are highly influential.
The documentary was highly influential in raising awareness.

vn_meaning: động từ: cung cấp thông tin; danh từ: thông tin (ngắn gọn)
eng_explanation: Noun: brief data or facts; Verb: to provide data.
example: I need more info about the project.
Can you info me about the meeting?
The website provides info on various topics.

vn_meaning: động từ: thông báo, báo cho biết; cung cấp thông tin; (tính từ): không trang trọng
eng_explanation: Verb: to tell or notify; to provide information; (adj.) not formal.
example: I will inform you of the changes.
He informed her of the news.
Let's have an informal conversation.

vn_meaning: tính từ: không trang trọng, thân mật; (danh từ): cuộc trò chuyện thân mật
eng_explanation: Adjective: not formal; (noun) a casual conversation.
example: They had an informal meeting.
Let's have an informal chat.
The informal setting made everyone feel comfortable.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thông tin, kiến thức; (tính từ): mang tính thông tin
eng_explanation: Noun: data or facts; (adj.) containing information.
example: I need more information to make a decision.
The information was accurate and reliable.
This is important information about the company.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cơ sở hạ tầng (giao thông, viễn thông, v.v.)
eng_explanation: Noun: the basic physical and organizational structures and facilities of a business, area, or system.
example: The government invested in new infrastructure.
Reliable infrastructure is crucial for economic growth.
The city's infrastructure needs upgrading.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nguyên liệu, thành phần; (tính từ): là thành phần cơ bản
eng_explanation: Noun: a component of something; (adj.) fundamental.
example: The main ingredient in the recipe is flour.
Water is an essential ingredient for life.
Each ingredient plays a vital role.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người dân, cư dân; sinh vật sống trong một nơi
eng_explanation: Noun: a person or animal living in a particular place.
example: The inhabitants of the island are friendly.
The city has a diverse population of inhabitants.
Many animals are inhabitants of the forest.

vn_meaning: tính từ: vốn có, tự nhiên; (danh từ): tính chất vốn có
eng_explanation: Adjective: existing as an essential part; (noun) an inherent quality.
example: The problem is inherent in the system.
He has an inherent talent for music.
The risk is inherent in any investment.

vn_meaning: động từ: kế thừa, thừa hưởng; (danh từ): di sản
eng_explanation: Verb: to receive something from a predecessor; (noun) legacy.
example: She will inherit her family's fortune.
He inherited his father's business.
The country's cultural heritage is a valuable inheritance.

vn_meaning: động từ: ức chế, ngăn cản; (tính từ): ức chế
eng_explanation: Verb: to restrain or prevent; (adj.) suppressing.
example: The drug inhibits the growth of cancer cells.
His behavior inhibited further discussion.
The policy inhibits competition.

vn_meaning: tính từ: ban đầu, đầu tiên (thời gian, giai đoạn); danh từ: khởi đầu, ban đầu (của một quá trình).
eng_explanation: adjective: occurring at the beginning; noun: the beginning of something.
example: The initial cost of the project was quite high.
We had an initial meeting to discuss the proposal.
The initial reaction was one of surprise.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: ban đầu, lúc đầu.
eng_explanation: adverb: at the beginning; originally.
example: Initially, I was hesitant to accept the offer.
The project was initially planned for six months.
Initially, the results seemed promising.

vn_meaning: động từ: bắt đầu, khởi xướng; đề xuất (một quy trình, dự án).
eng_explanation: verb: to begin or start something; to propose a formal process.
example: She initiated the conversation about her new job.
The company will initiate a new marketing campaign.
He initiated the process of applying for a visa.

vn_meaning: động từ: tiêm (thuốc, chất lỏng); đưa vào (tiền, vốn).
eng_explanation: verb: to force a liquid or gas into something; to introduce something.
example: The doctor will inject the patient with antibiotics.
The company injected capital into the struggling business.
He injected enthusiasm into the project.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lần tiêm; việc tiêm.
eng_explanation: noun: the act of injecting something; a dose injected.
example: She received a flu injection.
The injection was administered quickly and efficiently.
He felt a slight pain during the injection.

vn_meaning: động từ: làm bị thương; gây tổn hại.
eng_explanation: verb: to harm or damage something; to cause physical injury.
example: He injured his leg playing football.
The storm injured several buildings.
Be careful not to injure yourself.

vn_meaning: tính từ: bị thương; bị tổn hại.
eng_explanation: adjective: hurt or harmed; wounded.
example: The injured man was taken to the hospital.
The injured bird was carefully nursed back to health.
The injured economy needs immediate attention.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thương tích; tổn thương.
eng_explanation: noun: harm or damage caused to someone or something.
example: He suffered a serious injury during the game.
The company is liable for the employee's injury.
She is recovering from a knee injury.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự bất công; sự thiếu công bằng.
eng_explanation: noun: lack of fairness or justice; unjust treatment.
example: The protesters demanded an end to injustice.
She dedicated her life to fighting injustice.
The court ruling was seen as an act of injustice.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự chèn vào, sự nhét vào; hành động chèn, nhét.
eng_explanation: n. The act of inserting something; something that is inserted. (noun)
example: The insertion of the new paragraph improved the flow of the essay.
Surgical insertion of a stent opened the blocked artery.
The database supports insertion of new records.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: bên trong, ở trong; nội bộ; (thông tục) ở nhà; tính từ: bên trong, nội bộ.
eng_explanation: adv./adj. Within the limits of; relating to the interior. (adv./adj.)
example: Stay inside where it's warm.
The inside of the box was lined with velvet.
He has connections on the inside.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người nội bộ, người có thông tin mật, người có quyền lợi đặc biệt.
eng_explanation: n. A person with special access to information. (noun)
example: He was accused of insider trading.
An insider revealed the company's plans.
She's an insider in the political world.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự hiểu biết sâu sắc, tầm nhìn xa, nhận thức đúng đắn.
eng_explanation: n. A deep understanding of a person or thing. (noun)
example: Her lecture offered valuable insights into the topic.
He had an insight into her true feelings.
The book provides insights into the human condition.

vn_meaning: động từ: khăng khăng, nằng nặc, cứ đòi, yêu cầu một cách dứt khoát.
eng_explanation: v. Demand something forcefully, not allowing refusal. (verb)
example: She insisted on paying for dinner.
He insisted that he was innocent.
I insist you see a doctor.

vn_meaning: động từ: kiểm tra, thanh tra, giám sát kỹ lưỡng.
eng_explanation: v. Examine carefully and thoroughly. (verb)
example: The health inspector inspected the restaurant.
Please inspect your baggage before leaving.
The engineer inspected the bridge for damage.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự kiểm tra, sự thanh tra, cuộc giám sát.
eng_explanation: n. The act of examining or reviewing something carefully. (noun)
example: The car passed the safety inspection.
The building underwent a thorough inspection.
Customs inspection can take a long time.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người kiểm tra, thanh tra viên, giám sát viên.
eng_explanation: n. A person who officially examines and reports on something. (noun)
example: The building inspector found several code violations.
A police inspector investigated the crime scene.
She works as a quality control inspector.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự truyền cảm hứng, nguồn cảm hứng, sự khơi gợi.
eng_explanation: n. The process of being mentally stimulated to do or feel something. (noun)
example: Nature is a source of inspiration for many artists.
Her courage was an inspiration to us all.
He found inspiration in classical music.

vn_meaning: động từ: truyền cảm hứng, khơi gợi, kích thích, thúc đẩy.
eng_explanation: v. Fill someone with the urge or ability to do or feel something. (verb)
example: The teacher inspired her students to learn.
His speech inspired the crowd.
The beautiful scenery inspired me to paint.

vn_meaning: To put something into operation; to set up; to make something work.
eng_explanation: To configure or put into use.
example: I need to install the software.
The installation process took several hours.
She installed the new computer.

vn_meaning: trưng bày
eng_explanation: A procedure for bringing something into use.
example: The installation of the new operating system was smooth.
She completed the installation of the hardware.
The company is offering a free installation service.

vn_meaning: ví dụ
eng_explanation: A specific case of something.
example: There are multiple instances of the error message.
The software provides different instances for different users.
Each instance of the policy is carefully monitored.

vn_meaning: Immediate; without delay; very quick.
eng_explanation: Something that happens quickly.
example: The delivery was instant.
I need an instant response.
The service is available instantly.

vn_meaning: Without delay; very quickly.
eng_explanation: Something happens rapidly.
example: He replied instantly.
The problem was solved instantly.
The news was instantly available.

vn_meaning: thay vào đó
eng_explanation: A substitute.
example: I decided to install the new program instead.
She suggested an alternative instead of the original.
We had to install a different version instead.

vn_meaning: bản năng
eng_explanation: A feeling or reaction without conscious thought.
example: He had an instinct for danger.
The animal displayed an instinct to flee.
Her instinct told her to run.

vn_meaning: viện
eng_explanation: A formal establishment for learning or research.
example: The university institute is known for its research.
The institute is responsible for developing new technologies.
The institute offers various courses.

vn_meaning: tổ chức
eng_explanation: A structured organization.
example: The hospital is an important institution in the community.
The university is an institution of higher learning.
The legal system is an institution of justice.

vn_meaning: cơ sở
eng_explanation: Concerning a specific institution.
example: The research institution faced funding challenges.
The company's institutional policies were scrutinized.
The government established an institutional review board.

vn_meaning: động từ: hướng dẫn; chỉ cách nói, viết hoặc làm gì đó (cho người khác); mệnh lệnh (chính thức).
eng_explanation: verb (V): to give someone guidance or directions; to order formally.
example: The teacher instructed the students on how to solve the problem.
He was instructed to report to the manager immediately.
The manual instructs the user on the proper operating procedures.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hướng dẫn; lời chỉ dẫn; mệnh lệnh (chính thức).
eng_explanation: noun (N): a set of instructions; a command; guidance.
example: Please read the instructions carefully before using the product.
The instruction manual provided detailed steps for assembly.
She followed the instructor's instructions precisely.

vn_meaning: danh từ: giáo viên; người hướng dẫn; người dạy.
eng_explanation: noun (N): a person who teaches or instructs; a trainer.
example: The flight instructor helped the new pilot gain experience.
She is a yoga instructor at the local studio.
He served as an instructor at the military academy.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhạc cụ; công cụ; phương tiện; dụng cụ.
eng_explanation: noun (N): a tool or device used for a particular purpose; a musical instrument.
example: He played the guitar as an instrument.
The scientist used an instrument to measure the temperature.
The instrument was damaged in the accident.

vn_meaning: tính từ: có vai trò quan trọng; có ảnh hưởng lớn; dùng để đạt được mục đích.
eng_explanation: adjective (Adj): important or effective in bringing about a result; used to achieve something.
example: His efforts were instrumental in the project's success.
Music is instrumental in creating a relaxing atmosphere.
The new policy was instrumental in reducing crime rates.

vn_meaning: tính từ: không đủ; không đáp ứng được; thiếu.
eng_explanation: adjective (Adj): not enough; inadequate.
example: There was insufficient evidence to convict him.
The budget is insufficient to cover all the expenses.
He felt insufficient to handle the task alone.

vn_meaning: danh từ: xúc phạm; hành vi xúc phạm; lời nói thô lỗ.
eng_explanation: noun (N): an act of disrespect or offense; a rude remark.
example: He received an insult from his rival.
The comment was a cruel insult.
She refused to tolerate any insults.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bảo hiểm; sự bảo hiểm; khoản bảo hiểm.
eng_explanation: noun (N): protection against financial loss.
example: He bought car insurance to protect himself from accidents.
The company offers health insurance to its employees.
The insurance policy covers medical expenses.

vn_meaning: tính từ: còn nguyên vẹn; không bị hư hỏng; hoàn hảo.
eng_explanation: adjective (Adj): whole and undamaged; complete.
example: The building was left intact after the fire.
The antique vase was in perfect, intact condition.
He remained intact despite the challenges.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lượng nhập; đường nhập; quá trình nhập.
eng_explanation: noun (N): the amount of something that is taken in; an entrance or opening.
example: The hospital's intake of patients increased during the flu season.
The air intake for the engine was clogged.
The process involves a controlled intake of materials.

vn_meaning: tính từ: không thể tách rời, thiết yếu (toàn bộ); đại từ: nguyên thể (toán học)
eng_explanation: adjective: essential; forming an indispensable part of a whole.
example: The role of education is integral to a functioning society.
The square root is an integral part of the equation.
This component is integral to the system's operation.

vn_meaning: động từ: kết hợp, hòa nhập; tích hợp (công nghệ)
eng_explanation: verb: to combine or bring together (different things) into a unified whole.
example: The company aims to integrate new technologies into its existing systems.
She tried to integrate into the local community.
We need to integrate the data from different sources.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tích hợp, đã được kết hợp; hòa nhập
eng_explanation: adjective: combined into a single unit or system; assimilated.
example: The new system features an integrated design.
He felt fully integrated into the team.
The integrated circuit is a key component of modern electronics.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự kết hợp, sự hòa nhập; sự tích hợp
eng_explanation: noun: the process of combining or uniting different things into a whole.
example: The integration of immigrants into society is a complex process.
The company is focused on system integration.
The integration of renewable energy sources is crucial for sustainability.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự trung thực, sự chính trực; tính toàn vẹn (của vật)
eng_explanation: noun: the quality of being honest and having strong moral principles; wholeness.
example: The candidate was praised for his integrity.
The bridge's structural integrity was compromised.
Maintaining integrity in all business dealings is essential.

vn_meaning: tính từ: trí thức, liên quan đến trí tuệ; danh từ: người trí thức
eng_explanation: adjective: relating to the intellect; noun: a person who enjoys activities involving the mind.
example: He is an intellectual with a deep understanding of philosophy.
The discussion was highly intellectual.
She is a renowned intellectual in the field of astrophysics.

vn_meaning: danh từ: trí thông minh, trí tuệ; khả năng hiểu biết
eng_explanation: noun: the ability to acquire and apply knowledge and skills.
example: Artificial intelligence is rapidly advancing.
Her intelligence allowed her to solve the complex problem.
Emotional intelligence is important for building relationships.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thông minh, trí tuệ; khôn ngoan
eng_explanation: adjective: having or showing intelligence; quick to understand.
example: He is an intelligent and resourceful student.
The intelligent design of the building maximized natural light.
An intelligent solution to the problem was found.

vn_meaning: động từ: có ý định, dự định; muốn
eng_explanation: verb: to have a plan or intention to do something.
example: I intend to finish the project by Friday.
They didn't intend to cause any harm.
What do you intend to do next?

vn_meaning: tính từ: có ý định, dự định; được định sẵn; danh từ: người được định sẵn
eng_explanation: adjective: meant or designed for a particular purpose; destined.
example: This gift is intended for you.
He was the intended recipient of the scholarship.
The intended outcome of the policy was to reduce pollution.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thích thú, quan tâm (đến điều gì đó); có liên quan (đến ai đó/điều gì đó)
eng_explanation: adj. Feeling or showing curiosity or concern about something. (Also: involved)
example: She is very interested in learning Vietnamese.
Are you interested in joining our club?
He seemed interested in her story.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thú vị, hấp dẫn, gợi sự chú ý
eng_explanation: adj. Arousing curiosity or interest; holding or catching the attention.
example: That was a very interesting movie.
She has an interesting job as a wildlife photographer.
The book contains some interesting facts.

vn_meaning: danh từ: giao diện (máy tính); điểm giao tiếp, mặt tiếp xúc; giao thoa (giữa hai hệ thống)
eng_explanation: n. A point where two systems, subjects, organizations, etc. meet and interact. (Computing)
example: The software has a user-friendly interface.
The interface between the two companies was difficult to manage.
Scientists are studying the interface between the atmosphere and the ocean.

vn_meaning: động từ: can thiệp, xen vào; gây trở ngại, cản trở
eng_explanation: v. To take part in something when you are not wanted or needed; to obstruct.
example: Please don't interfere with my work.
The government interfered in the company's affairs.
I hate it when people interfere in my personal life.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự can thiệp, sự xen vào; sự gây trở ngại; nhiễu (trong truyền thông)
eng_explanation: n. The action of interfering; disturbance caused by one signal over another.
example: There was outside interference in the election.
Radio interference made it difficult to hear the broadcast.
The police investigated the interference in the investigation.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tạm thời, lâm thời; giữa các thời kỳ
eng_explanation: adj. In the meantime; temporary; provisional.
example: An interim government was established after the revolution.
She served as the interim director while they searched for a permanent replacement.
We need an interim solution to the problem.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bên trong, nội thất; tính từ: bên trong, thuộc về bên trong
eng_explanation: n. The inner part of something; the furnishings of a room. adj. Situated within.
example: The interior of the house was beautifully decorated.
The car's interior was spacious and comfortable.
She studied interior design at university.

vn_meaning: tính từ: trung gian, ở mức độ trung bình; trung cấp
eng_explanation: adj. Situated between two other points; of medium level.
example: She is an intermediate student of English.
The company is looking for intermediate-level programmers.
This is an intermediate step in the process.

vn_meaning: tính từ: bên trong, nội bộ; thuộc về bên trong
eng_explanation: adj. Situated within or inside; relating to the inside of something.
example: The company has internal regulations that all employees must follow.
She suffered internal injuries in the accident.
Internal communication is very important for a successful team.

vn_meaning: tính từ: quốc tế, giữa các quốc gia
eng_explanation: adj. Involving two or more countries; worldwide.
example: She works for an international organization.
The conference attracted participants from all over the international community.
International trade is essential for economic growth.

vn_meaning: Một mạng lưới các máy tính kết nối với nhau thông qua đường dây điện, sóng radio, hoặc sóng vô tuyến, cho phép giao tiếp và chia sẻ thông tin.
eng_explanation: The internet is a global network connecting computers.
example: I need to access the internet to search for information.
The internet has revolutionized communication worldwide.

vn_meaning: Dịch nghĩa, giải thích, hoặc hiểu ý nghĩa của một điều gì đó.
eng_explanation: To interpret means to understand the meaning of something.
example: The translator needs to interpret the complex text.
The doctor needs to interpret the patient's symptoms.

vn_meaning: Dịch nghĩa, giải thích, hoặc hiểu ý nghĩa của một điều gì đó, thường có sự khác biệt so với bản gốc.
eng_explanation: Interpretation is the process of understanding a text or message.
example: The film's interpretation of the story was controversial.
The legal interpretation of the contract is crucial.

vn_meaning: Gây gián đoạn, làm chậm hoặc dừng một hành động hoặc sự kiện.
eng_explanation: To interrupt is to delay or stop something.
example: Please interrupt me when I'm speaking.
The meeting was interrupted by a sudden phone call.

vn_meaning: Khoảng thời gian giữa các sự kiện hoặc thời điểm.
eng_explanation: An interval is the time between two events.
example: The interval between classes is 45 minutes.
We need to adjust the interval to accommodate the new schedule.

vn_meaning: Đưa vào, can dự, hoặc can thiệp vào một tình huống để giải quyết vấn đề hoặc thay đổi tình hình.
eng_explanation: To intervene means to get involved in a situation.
example: The lawyer intervened to defend her client.
The mediator intervened to resolve the conflict.

vn_meaning: Một hành động can dự, can thiệp vào một tình huống để giải quyết vấn đề hoặc thay đổi tình hình.
eng_explanation: An intervention is a situation where someone gets involved to help.
example: The government implemented an intervention to address the crisis.
The company's intervention in the community was praised.

vn_meaning: Phỏng vấn, trò chuyện với một người để thu thập thông tin.
eng_explanation: An interview is a conversation with someone to gather information.
example: I had an interview with the CEO about the company's strategy.
The journalist conducted an interview with the suspect.

vn_meaning: Gần gũi, thân mật, hoặc có tính chất cá nhân.
eng_explanation: Intimate means close and personal.
example: They shared an intimate conversation about their lives.
The film had an intimate atmosphere.

vn_meaning: Vào, vào trong, hoặc vào một nơi.
eng_explanation: Into means into or into a place.
example: Please enter the room into.
He walked into the crowd.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bí ẩn; tính từ: gây ấn tượng, hấp dẫn (một người hoặc một điều gì đó)
eng_explanation: Adjective: fascinating or evoking curiosity; Noun: something that piques interest.
example: The old house had an intriguing history.
She found the mystery novel incredibly intriguing.
His strange behavior was intriguing to the detectives.

vn_meaning: danh từ: giới thiệu; động từ: giới thiệu, làm quen (với ai đó)
eng_explanation: Verb: to present or make known; Noun: an act of presenting someone or something.
example: The speaker introduced the guest to the audience.
I want to introduce you to my friend, Sarah.
The company introduced a new product line.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lời giới thiệu; phần giới thiệu; sự giới thiệu
eng_explanation: Noun: a formal introduction or preface; the beginning of something.
example: The introduction to the book was captivating.
He gave a brief introduction of the speaker.
The introduction of the new policy caused controversy.

vn_meaning: động từ: xâm lược; tấn công (một khu vực)
eng_explanation: Verb: to enter a country or territory by force; to attack suddenly.
example: The army invaded the neighboring country.
Pirates often invade coastal towns.
The virus invaded the computer system.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cuộc xâm lược; sự tấn công
eng_explanation: Noun: an act of invading; an attack or conquest.
example: The invasion of Poland sparked World War II.
The invasion caused widespread destruction.
The country prepared for a potential invasion.

vn_meaning: động từ: sáng tạo ra, phát minh ra
eng_explanation: Verb: to create or design something new.
example: He invented a new type of engine.
Scientists are constantly inventing new technologies.
She invented a clever solution to the problem.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phát minh; sản phẩm sáng tạo
eng_explanation: Noun: something that is invented; a new device or process.
example: The invention of the printing press revolutionized communication.
His latest invention is a self-driving car.
The invention has the potential to change the world.

vn_meaning: động từ: đầu tư; điều tra (một vụ án)
eng_explanation: Verb: to put money into something with the expectation of profit; to examine carefully.
example: He invested in a new business venture.
The company invested heavily in research and development.
The police began to investigate the crime scene.

vn_meaning: động từ: điều tra (một vụ án, một vấn đề)
eng_explanation: Verb: to inquire into something systematically; to examine closely.
example: The detectives began to investigate the suspicious death.
The journalist investigated the company's financial records.
Scientists are investigating the causes of the disease.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cuộc điều tra; quá trình điều tra
eng_explanation: Noun: the process of investigating something; an inquiry.
example: The police launched an investigation into the robbery.
The investigation revealed several inconsistencies.
The investigation is ongoing.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người điều tra (pháp luật, khoa học); người thăm dò, khám phá (tinh thần).
eng_explanation: investigator (n.) - A person who examines or investigates something.
example: The police investigator carefully examined the crime scene.
A scientific investigator studies data to find new discoveries.
She is an investigator for a private detective agency.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khoản đầu tư (tiền bạc, thời gian, công sức); sự bỏ vốn.
eng_explanation: investment (n.) - The act of allocating resources, especially money, to acquire an asset.
example: He made a significant investment in the stock market.
Investing in education is an investment in the future.
The company's investment in research and development paid off.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhà đầu tư (tiền bạc, vốn).
eng_explanation: investor (n.) - A person or organization that invests money in a business or project.
example: The investor was impressed with the company's business plan.
Many investors are looking for opportunities in renewable energy.
She is a successful real estate investor.

vn_meaning: tính từ: vô hình; không thấy được; khuất tầm mắt.
eng_explanation: invisible (adj.) - Not able to be seen; imperceptible.
example: The ghost was said to be invisible.
Ultraviolet light is invisible to the human eye.
The company's problems were invisible to the public.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lời mời; giấy mời.
eng_explanation: invitation (n.) - A polite request for someone to attend something or do something.
example: I received an invitation to the wedding.
She sent out invitations to all her friends.
Please RSVP to the invitation by Friday.

vn_meaning: động từ: mời; rủ.
eng_explanation: invite (v.) - To ask someone to go somewhere or do something.
example: I want to invite you to my party.
They invited us to dinner at their house.
Please invite your friends to join us.

vn_meaning: động từ: triệu hồi; kêu gọi; viện dẫn (luật, quy định).
eng_explanation: invoke (v.) - To call upon or refer to something, especially a law or rule.
example: The lawyer invoked a legal precedent.
She invoked the power of prayer.
The treaty invokes sanctions if the agreement is broken.

vn_meaning: động từ: bao gồm; liên quan đến; lôi kéo vào.
eng_explanation: involve (v.) - To include or implicate someone in something.
example: The project will involve many different departments.
The accident involved three cars.
Don't involve yourself in their argument.

vn_meaning: tính từ: liên quan đến; bị lôi kéo vào; tham gia.
eng_explanation: involved (adj.) - Participating in or connected to something.
example: He was heavily involved in the planning of the event.
She became involved in a legal dispute.
The community is deeply involved in preserving its heritage.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự tham gia; sự liên quan; sự lôi kéo.
eng_explanation: involvement (n.) - The act of participating or being connected to something.
example: Her involvement in the charity was very rewarding.
The company denied any involvement in the scandal.
Increased community involvement is crucial for the project's success.

vn_meaning: đại từ: nó (chỉ vật, sự vật, động vật); đại từ: chuyện, tình hình (thường dùng chung chung)
eng_explanation: Pronoun: Refers to a thing, situation, or animal. Often used as a placeholder. (Pron.)
example: It is raining outside.
It seems like a good idea.
The dog wagged its tail; it was happy.

vn_meaning: đại từ: nó (chỉ vật, sự vật, động vật); đại từ: chuyện, tình hình (thường dùng chung)
eng_explanation: Pronoun: Used to refer to something previously mentioned or easily identified. (Pron.)
example: I found it very interesting.
It's a beautiful day, isn't it?
It doesn't matter.

vn_meaning: danh từ: món đồ; mục (trong danh sách, báo cáo)
eng_explanation: Noun: A single article or unit. Also, a distinct part of a list or report. (N.)
example: This is an expensive item.
Each item on the list needs to be checked.
The news item was very shocking.

vn_meaning: đại từ sở hữu: của nó (dùng cho vật, sự vật, động vật)
eng_explanation: Possessive pronoun: Belonging to or associated with a thing, animal, or organization. (Pron.)
example: The cat licked its paws.
The company announced its profits.
The car lost its wheel.

vn_meaning: đại từ phản thân: tự nó; chính nó
eng_explanation: Reflexive pronoun: Used to emphasize that the action is performed by the subject itself. (Pron.)
example: The door opened itself.
He built the house himself.
The problem solved itself.

vn_meaning: danh từ: áo khoác
eng_explanation: Noun: A garment for the upper body, usually with sleeves. (N.)
example: She wore a warm jacket.
He needs a new winter jacket.
The jacket is made of leather.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhà tù
eng_explanation: Noun: A place for the confinement of people accused or convicted of a crime. (N.)
example: He was sent to jail for theft.
The jail was overcrowded.
She visited him in jail.

vn_meaning: danh từ: mứt; tình trạng tắc nghẽn; động từ: làm tắc nghẽn
eng_explanation: Noun: A fruit preserve. Noun: A crowded condition. Verb: To obstruct. (N./V.)
example: She spread jam on her toast.
The traffic was in a complete jam.
The machine jammed.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tháng Giêng
eng_explanation: Noun: The first month of the year. (N.)
example: January is a cold month.
The new year begins in January.
Her birthday is in January.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhạc jazz; động từ: chơi nhạc jazz
eng_explanation: Noun: A type of music characterized by improvisation. Verb: To play jazz music. (N./V.)
example: He loves listening to jazz.
She can jazz up any song.
They played jazz at the concert.

vn_meaning: Denim trousers; a type of clothing made from denim fabric.
eng_explanation: Jeans are a classic and versatile garment.
example: I need to buy some new jeans.
She wore some beautiful jeans to the party.

vn_meaning: A small, fast-flying projectile, often used in aviation.
eng_explanation: A jet is a powerful engine that produces a rapid stream of air.
example: The jet plane soared through the sky.
He launched the jet to catch the ball.

vn_meaning: trang sức
eng_explanation: Jewellery is a collection of precious or semi-precious stones and metals.
example: She collected beautiful jewellery from around the world.
The jeweler created intricate jewellery designs.

vn_meaning: công việc
eng_explanation: A job is a task or responsibility someone undertakes.
example: I'm looking for a new job.
She had a challenging job as a teacher.

vn_meaning: tham gia
eng_explanation: Joining means to become part of a group or organization.
example: We need to join the team for the project.
He joined the club to make new friends.

vn_meaning: khớp nối
eng_explanation: A joint is a connection or association between two or more things.
example: The two pieces of wood joined together.
The two countries have a strong joint military alliance.

vn_meaning: trò đùa
eng_explanation: A joke is a funny or amusing story intended to elicit laughter.
example: Why did the chicken cross the playground? To get to the other slide!
He told a terrible joke that made everyone laugh.

vn_meaning: A periodical publication containing news, articles, and opinions.
eng_explanation: A journal is a publication that regularly publishes articles and research.
example: She is a journalist working for a major newspaper.
He wrote a journal about his travels.

vn_meaning: báo chí
eng_explanation: Journalism is the profession of reporting and disseminating news.
example: She is a talented journalist with a keen eye for detail.
He works as a journalist for a local newspaper.

vn_meaning: A person who reports news and gathers information.
eng_explanation: A journalist is a professional who covers news and writes stories.
example: He is a respected journalist known for his investigative work.
She is a freelance journalist covering social issues.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chuyến đi; hành trình (dài ngày); cuộc đời (tượng trưng)
eng_explanation: Noun: A long trip or journey.  It can also metaphorically represent a life's path.
example: Their journey to the summit was challenging but rewarding.
The long journey across the country took weeks.
Life is a journey, not a destination.

vn_meaning: danh từ: niềm vui; sự vui mừng; hạnh phúc
eng_explanation: Noun: A feeling of great pleasure and happiness.
example: She felt a surge of joy when she heard the news.
The children's joy was infectious.
Finding joy in simple things is important.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thẩm phán; người xét xử; đánh giá (khách quan)
eng_explanation: Noun: A person who presides over a court of law or makes a critical evaluation.
example: The judge delivered the verdict after careful consideration.
He was a respected judge known for his fairness.
The critic's judgment was harsh but accurate.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phán quyết; đánh giá (chủ quan)
eng_explanation: Noun: A decision or opinion formed after consideration.
example: The judge's judgement was based on the evidence presented.
Her judgement of his character was unfair.
A careful judgement is needed before making a decision.

vn_meaning: danh từ: liên quan đến tòa án; mang tính pháp luật
eng_explanation: Adjective: Relating to a court of law or judicial proceedings.
example: The judicial system is designed to ensure justice.
He worked as a judicial clerk.
A judicial review of the decision was ordered.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nước ép (trái cây, rau củ); năng lượng (tượng trưng)
eng_explanation: Noun: A liquid extracted from fruits or vegetables.
example: She drank a glass of orange juice for breakfast.
The juice cleanse is a popular diet trend.
He needed a boost of juice to get through the afternoon.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tháng bảy (năm dương lịch)
eng_explanation: Noun: The seventh month of the year.
example: July is a great time to visit the beach.
Many people celebrate Independence Day in July.
The weather in July is usually hot.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cú nhảy; sự nhảy; (tượng trưng) nhảy lên, vượt qua
eng_explanation: Verb: To leap or spring into the air.  Noun: An act of jumping.
example: The athlete jumped over the hurdle.
He took a jump start before the race.
Let's jump into this exciting project!

vn_meaning: danh từ: ngã tư; điểm giao nhau (con đường, sông)
eng_explanation: Noun: A point where two or more roads, rivers, or railways meet.
example: We arrived at the junction and turned left.
The river junction is a beautiful spot for a picnic.
The railway junction is a busy place.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tháng sáu (năm dương lịch)
eng_explanation: Noun: The sixth month of the year.
example: June is known for its long, sunny days.
Many people get married in June.
The roses are in bloom in June.

vn_meaning: tính từ: cấp dưới, trẻ tuổi; danh từ: người cấp dưới, người trẻ tuổi
eng_explanation: adjective/noun: lower in rank, age, or importance; a person lower in rank.
example: He is a junior partner in the firm.
She's a junior at the university.
The junior team played well against the seniors.

vn_meaning: danh từ: quyền tài phán, thẩm quyền; phạm vi quyền lực
eng_explanation: noun: the official power to make legal decisions and enforce them; an area of authority.
example: The court has jurisdiction over this case.
The police have no jurisdiction here.
The new law extends the company's jurisdiction.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bồi thẩm đoàn
eng_explanation: noun: a group of people sworn to decide on the facts in a legal case.
example: The jury reached a verdict after several hours of deliberation.
The defendant was chosen by a jury of his peers.
The jury foreman read the verdict to the court.

vn_meaning: tính từ: công bằng, chính trực; trạng từ: một cách công bằng
eng_explanation: adjective/adverb: based on or behaving according to what is morally right and fair; fairly.
example: It's just not fair!
He made a just decision.
She spoke just in time to prevent the argument.

vn_meaning: danh từ: công lý, sự công bằng
eng_explanation: noun: fairness in the way people are dealt with; the administration of law.
example: He dedicated his life to the pursuit of justice.
The court system aims to deliver justice to all.
She fought for social justice.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự biện minh, lý do chính đáng
eng_explanation: noun: an explanation of why you did something or why something happened.
example: He offered a justification for his actions.
There was no justification for her behavior.
The company provided a detailed justification for the investment.

vn_meaning: động từ: biện minh, làm cho có lý do; chứng minh
eng_explanation: verb: to show or prove that something is reasonable or correct; to defend an action.
example: He tried to justify his mistake.
Can you justify your decision?
The report justifies the need for more funding.

vn_meaning: tính từ: nhiệt tình, hăng hái; sắc nét
eng_explanation: adjective: very enthusiastic or interested in something; sharp.
example: She's a keen gardener.
He has a keen interest in history.
The knife has a keen edge.

vn_meaning: động từ: giữ, bảo quản; duy trì
eng_explanation: verb: to hold something; to maintain or continue something.
example: Please keep the change.
Keep your room tidy.
Keep in touch!

vn_meaning: danh từ: chìa khóa; giải pháp; từ khóa; tính từ: quan trọng
eng_explanation: noun: a device used to open a lock; a solution; a keyword; adjective: important.
example: I lost my key.
The key to success is hard work.
What's the key word in this document?

vn_meaning: danh từ: vương quốc; quốc gia (của vua chúa)
eng_explanation: n. The territory ruled by a king or queen. (Also: a realm or domain.)
example: The kingdom was prosperous under the new king.
She dreamed of ruling her own kingdom.
Animal kingdom refers to all animals.

vn_meaning: động từ: hôn; danh từ: nụ hôn
eng_explanation: v. To touch with the lips as a sign of affection. n. A touch with the lips.
example: He gave her a gentle kiss on the cheek.
The prince kissed the sleeping princess.
A quick kiss goodbye.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bộ dụng cụ; bộ đồ nghề; (thể thao) bộ quần áo; động từ: trang bị (cho)
eng_explanation: n. A set of parts for making something. v. To equip with a kit. (sports)
example: She bought a first-aid kit for the camping trip.
The football team needs a new kit.
He kitted out his workshop with new tools.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhà bếp; phòng bếp
eng_explanation: n. The room where food is prepared. (Often contains appliances and counters.)
example: The kitchen is the heart of the home.
She spent hours cooking in the kitchen.
We renovated the kitchen last year.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đầu gối
eng_explanation: n. The joint connecting the thigh and the leg. (A bendable part of the leg.)
example: He injured his knee playing soccer.
She sat with her knees drawn up to her chest.
The doctor examined his knee.

vn_meaning: danh từ: con dao
eng_explanation: n. A tool with a blade used for cutting. (Can be used for various purposes.)
example: He used a knife to cut the bread.
Be careful when handling a sharp knife.
A pocket knife is a useful tool.

vn_meaning: động từ: gõ cửa; đập; (thể thao) ghi bàn; danh từ: tiếng gõ cửa
eng_explanation: v. To strike a surface to make a sound. n. The sound of striking.
example: He knocked on the door.
She heard a knock at the window.
The boxer knocked his opponent out.

vn_meaning: động từ: biết; quen biết

vn_meaning: danh từ: kiến thức; tri thức

vn_meaning: danh từ: phòng thí nghiệm

vn_meaning: Một phòng thí nghiệm chuyên dụng để thực hiện các thí nghiệm và phân tích.

vn_meaning: Công việc, hoạt động, sự làm việc.

vn_meaning: Thiếu hụt, không có, thiếu.

vn_meaning: Nam nữ, con trai, con gái.

vn_meaning: Cột, thang, cầu thang.

vn_meaning: Nữ hoàng, người phụ nữ, người đẹp.

vn_meaning: Đê, hồ, suối.

vn_meaning: Đèn, đèn bàn, đèn đọc.

vn_meaning: Đất, đất liền, đất nước.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khu hạ cánh (của máy bay); tính từ: dễ dàng (hạ cánh); động từ: hạ cánh (máy bay)

vn_meaning: danh từ: chủ đất; chủ nhà (thuê nhà)

vn_meaning: danh từ: địa danh nổi tiếng; điểm tham quan quan trọng
eng_explanation: Noun: A prominent and recognizable feature or building; a significant place.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phong cảnh; cảnh quan; địa hình

vn_meaning: danh từ: con đường hẹp; lối đi

vn_meaning: danh từ: ngôn ngữ; tiếng nói

vn_meaning: động từ: làm (bài tập, báo cáo); đắp (đường, hồ)
eng_explanation: Verb: To create or complete (a task); to build or construct.

vn_meaning: danh từ: máy tính xách tay
eng_explanation: Noun: A portable personal computer.

vn_meaning: tính từ: lớn; to lớn; rộng lớn

vn_meaning: tính từ: quy mô lớn; rộng lớn (ở mức lớn)

vn_meaning: trạng từ: phần lớn, chủ yếu (mức độ); một cách rộng rãi (phạm vi)

eng_explanation: noun: a device emitting a narrow, intense beam of light; adjective: relating to a laser.
example: The surgeon used a laser to remove the growth.
Laser technology has revolutionized many fields.

vn_meaning: động từ: kéo dài, tồn tại đến hết; danh từ: cái cuối cùng; tính từ: cuối cùng, kế tiếp
eng_explanation: verb: to continue until the end; noun: the final one; adjective: final, last in order.
example: The show will last for two hours.

vn_meaning: tính từ: muộn (thời gian); trạng từ: muộn (đến muộn); danh từ: buổi tối
eng_explanation: adjective: after the expected or usual time; adverb: belatedly; noun: the evening.
example: I'm sorry I'm late.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: gần đây, dạo gần đây
eng_explanation: adverb: recently; in recent times.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: sau này, sau một thời gian
eng_explanation: adverb: at a later time; subsequently.
example: I'll call you later.

vn_meaning: tính từ: mới nhất; trạng từ: gần đây nhất
eng_explanation: adjective: most recent; adverb: recently.
example: This is the latest model.

vn_meaning: đại từ: cái sau (trong hai thứ được đề cập trước đó)
eng_explanation: pronoun: the second of two things mentioned.
example: I prefer coffee, but my sister prefers tea; the latter is healthier.
He considered two options: moving to the city or staying in the countryside; he chose the latter.

vn_meaning: động từ: cười; danh từ: tiếng cười
eng_explanation: verb: to make the sound of amusement; noun: the sound of amusement.

I couldn't help but laugh.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tiếng cười
eng_explanation: noun: the act or sound of laughing.
example: Their laughter was infectious.
The sound of laughter echoed through the house.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người dẫn đầu; thủ lĩnh (một nhóm, tổ chức, quốc gia); người tiên phong.
eng_explanation: n. A person who directs a group or organization. (PoS: noun)

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự lãnh đạo; tài lãnh đạo; vai trò lãnh đạo.
eng_explanation: n. The ability to guide and motivate others. (PoS: noun)
example: Effective leadership is crucial for success.

vn_meaning: tính từ: hàng đầu; chủ đạo; dẫn đầu (trong một lĩnh vực); đang dẫn đầu. ; hiện tại phân từ của động từ 'lead'.
eng_explanation: adj. Most important; in a position of command. (PoS: adjective, present participle)
example: This is the leading cause of heart disease.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lá cây; trang giấy (trong sách, tạp chí).

vn_meaning: danh từ: tờ rơi; truyền đơn; tờ quảng cáo nhỏ.
eng_explanation: n. A small sheet of paper containing information or advertising. (PoS: noun)

vn_meaning: danh từ: liên minh; hiệp hội; giải đấu (thể thao).; đơn vị đo khoảng cách (khoảng 3 dặm).
eng_explanation: n. A group of people or organizations working together; a sports competition. (PoS: noun)
example: The League of Nations was formed after World War I.
He plays in the major league baseball.

vn_meaning: động từ: rò rỉ; tiết lộ (bí mật).; danh từ: chỗ rò rỉ; sự tiết lộ (bí mật).
eng_explanation: v. To escape through a hole; to reveal secret information. (PoS: verb, noun)

vn_meaning: động từ: dựa vào; gầy (về thể chất); nghiêng về một bên. ; tính từ: gầy, thiếu nạc.
eng_explanation: v. To incline; to be thin. (PoS: verb, adjective)

vn_meaning: động từ: nhảy vọt; bước nhảy vọt; vượt qua (khó khăn).; danh từ: bước nhảy vọt.
eng_explanation: v. To jump or spring a long way. (PoS: verb, noun)

vn_meaning: động từ: học; biết được; lĩnh hội.
eng_explanation: v. To gain knowledge or skill. (PoS: verb)

vn_meaning: học tập

vn_meaning: ít nhất

vn_meaning: da thuộc

vn_meaning: bài giảng

vn_meaning: đã

vn_meaning: chân

vn_meaning: di sản

vn_meaning: pháp

vn_meaning: nghịch lý

vn_meaning: danh từ: truyền thuyết; tính từ: huyền thoại (về người hoặc sự việc)

vn_meaning: danh từ: quyền hợp pháp; tính từ: chính thống; hợp pháp; đúng đắn

vn_meaning: danh từ: thời gian rảnh; giải trí; tính từ: giải trí

vn_meaning: động từ: cho mượn; mượn
eng_explanation: v. To give something to use for a period of time; to provide credit.

vn_meaning: danh từ: độ dài; chiều dài; tính từ: dài

vn_meaning: tính từ: dài dòng; kéo dài; chi tiết
eng_explanation: adj. Long and detailed; extending over a considerable period of time.
