vn_meaning: danh từ: thấu kính (ánh sáng); danh từ: ống kính (máy ảnh); danh từ: góc nhìn (tư tưởng).

vn_meaning: tính từ: đồng tính nữ.

vn_meaning: tính từ: ít hơn; trạng từ: ít hơn; giới từ: ít hơn.

vn_meaning: tính từ: nhỏ hơn; kém hơn; ít quan trọng hơn.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bài học; bài giảng.

vn_meaning: động từ: để, cho phép; động từ: buông, thả; động từ: để yên.

vn_meaning: tính từ: chết người; gây chết người.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lá thư; chữ cái; danh từ: chương (sách).

vn_meaning: danh từ: mức độ; ngang bằng; danh từ: tầng; động từ: cân bằng.

vn_meaning: tính từ: có trách nhiệm; dễ bị; có khả năng.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cả đời; suốt đời (thời gian tồn tại)

vn_meaning: động từ: nâng lên; nhấc lên; nâng cao (tinh thần); loại bỏ (cấm vận); trộm cắp (thông tục); danh từ: sự nâng lên; chuyến đi (bằng xe); sự nâng cao (tinh thần)
eng_explanation: v. Raise to a higher position; n. Act of lifting; a ride in a vehicle. (v, n)

vn_meaning: tính từ: nhẹ; sáng; nhạt màu; động từ: thắp sáng; đốt; làm sáng; danh từ: ánh sáng; đèn; nguồn sáng
eng_explanation: adj. Not heavy or dark; v. To ignite; n. Brightness; a source of illumination. (adj, v, n)
example: The bag is very light.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hệ thống chiếu sáng; việc thắp sáng
eng_explanation: n. The system of providing light, especially artificially. (Also: the act of lighting)

vn_meaning: giới từ: giống như; như; động từ: thích; muốn; có vẻ như
eng_explanation: prep. Similar to; v. To enjoy; to want. (prep, v)

I like to read books.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khả năng xảy ra; xác suất

vn_meaning: tính từ: có khả năng; có thể xảy ra

vn_meaning: trạng từ: tương tự như vậy; cũng vậy
eng_explanation: adv. In the same way; similarly; also. (Often used as a polite response)

vn_meaning: danh từ: chi (của người hoặc động vật); cành cây
eng_explanation: n. An arm or leg; a large branch of a tree.

vn_meaning: động từ: giới hạn; hạn chế; danh từ: giới hạn; ranh giới; hạn mức
eng_explanation: v. To restrict; n. A point beyond which something cannot pass. (v, n)

vn_meaning: Một hạn chế, giới hạn; một điều hạn chế; một giới hạn.

vn_meaning: Hạn chế, giới hạn; không có khả năng hoặc nguồn lực.
eng_explanation: It means to be restricted or bound by something.

vn_meaning: Một hàng ngang; một đường thẳng; một đoạn.

vn_meaning: Một hàng dài; một danh sách.

vn_meaning: Đường thẳng; liên tục; theo một hướng cố định.
eng_explanation: It describes a path or sequence.

vn_meaning: Dài lâu, kéo dài; không dừng lại.

vn_meaning: Một kết nối; một liên kết; một đường dẫn.
eng_explanation: It signifies a connection or relationship.
example: The two websites are linked together.
A strong link between the two countries.
A link to the information was provided.

vn_meaning: Chiên chim; một con chim có vú lớn.
eng_explanation: It's a majestic animal.
example: The lion roared loudly.
The lion's mane was impressive.
He was a lion in the field.

vn_meaning: Mũi; phần đầu của miệng.
eng_explanation: It refers to the outer surface of the mouth.
example: He smiled, revealing a full lip.
The lip of the bottle was cracked.
She applied a lip balm.

vn_meaning: Một chất lỏng; một chất có thể chảy.
eng_explanation: It describes a fluid substance.
example: The liquid flowed smoothly through the pipe.
She poured a generous amount of liquid.
The liquid was used for cleaning.

vn_meaning: danh từ: danh sách; danh từ: (một danh sách) thứ tự; tính từ: liệt kê (trong danh sách)
eng_explanation: Noun: a sequence of items; Adjective: arranged in a list.
example: I need to make a shopping list.
The teacher created a list of students.
He listed his accomplishments.

vn_meaning: động từ: nghe; động từ: lắng nghe
eng_explanation: Verb: to perceive sound; to pay attention to sound.
example: Please listen carefully.
I like to listen to music.
She listened to the instructions.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người nghe; danh từ: (người nghe) thiết bị thu âm
eng_explanation: Noun: a person who listens; a device for recording sound.
example: The listener was very attentive.
He used a portable listener to record the meeting.
The radio is a popular listener.

vn_meaning: danh từ: danh sách liệt kê; danh từ: (một danh sách) quảng cáo
eng_explanation: Noun: a list of properties for sale; an advertisement listing.
example: Check the real estate listing for available properties.
The agent provided a detailed listing of the house.
He found a great listing online.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khả năng đọc viết; danh từ: trình độ đọc viết
eng_explanation: Noun: the ability to read and write; the level of reading and writing skills.
example: Literacy rates have improved significantly.
The program aims to promote literacy among children.
She struggled with literacy in her early years.

vn_meaning: phó từ: thực sự; thực sự, đúng như lời nói
eng_explanation: Adverb: in a literal manner; exactly as stated.
example: I literally jumped out of my skin!
He was literally buried in paperwork.
She was literally speechless.

vn_meaning: tính từ: văn học; liên quan đến văn học
eng_explanation: Adjective: relating to literature; of or characteristic of literature.
example: He wrote a literary novel.
The museum displays literary artifacts.
She is a literary critic.

vn_meaning: danh từ: văn học; loại văn học
eng_explanation: Noun: imaginative works; the body of written works produced in a particular language in a given period or area.
example: English literature is rich and diverse.
She studied ancient Greek literature.
The book is a classic of modern literature.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lít (đơn vị đo thể tích)
eng_explanation: Noun: a unit of volume equal to 1000 milliliters.
example: I need to buy a litre of milk.
The container holds five litres of water.
Please fill the tank with a litre of fuel.

vn_meaning: danh từ: rác thải; danh từ: (con vật) mèo hoang, chó hoang
eng_explanation: Noun: waste material; stray animal (cat or dog).
example: Please clean up the litter in the park.
The stray litter was rescued by animal control.
He found a friendly litter wandering the streets.

vn_meaning: tính từ: nhỏ, ít; danh từ: một ít, một số nhỏ; trạng từ: một chút, ít thôi
eng_explanation: adj. small in size; n. a small amount; adv. to a small extent.
example: She has a little dog.
I need to buy a little milk.
He waited a little while.

vn_meaning: động từ: sống, ở; trực tiếp (phát sóng);
eng_explanation: v. to be alive; to reside; to broadcast from a location.
example: I live in Hanoi.
They are going to live a simple life.
The concert will be live on television.

vn_meaning: tính từ: sôi nổi, náo nhiệt, tràn đầy sức sống; hoạt bát, nhanh nhẹn
eng_explanation: adj. full of life and energy; active and spirited.
example: The party was very lively.
She has a lively personality.
The town has a lively atmosphere.

vn_meaning: danh từ: gan
eng_explanation: n. a large organ in the body that filters blood and produces bile.
example: The liver is essential for good health.
He has a problem with his liver.
The doctor examined his liver.

vn_meaning: tính từ: còn sống; đang sống; danh từ: cuộc sống, sinh kế; phí sinh hoạt
eng_explanation: adj. currently alive; n. one's livelihood; the cost of living.
example: He is a living legend.
She earns a living as a teacher.
The cost of living in the city is high.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hàng hóa, tải trọng; động từ: chất hàng, chở, tải
eng_explanation: n. a quantity of goods; v. to place something heavily on a vehicle.
example: The truck was carrying a heavy load.
Please load the dishwasher.
He loaded the boxes onto the cart.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khoản vay; động từ: cho vay
eng_explanation: n. money borrowed from a bank or other lender; v. to lend money.
example: I need to take out a loan.
The bank offered him a loan.
She repaid the loan quickly.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sảnh đợi; khu vực vận động hành lang; động từ: vận động hành lang
eng_explanation: n. an entrance hall; an area for influencing policy; v. to attempt to influence legislators.
example: We waited in the hotel lobby.
The company hired a lobbyist.
They are lobbying for new legislation.

vn_meaning: tính từ: địa phương, tại chỗ; khu vực
eng_explanation: adj. relating to a particular area or community.
example: We support local businesses.
The local newspaper reported the story.
He is a local resident.

vn_meaning: động từ: tìm ra vị trí, xác định vị trí, đặt ở
eng_explanation: v. to find the position of something; to place something in a specific location.
example: Can you locate the nearest gas station?
The company is located in New York.
We need to locate the missing documents.

vn_meaning: tính từ: dài hạn (kế hoạch, mục tiêu); lâu dài (tác động, hậu quả)
eng_explanation: adj. Continuing or existing for a long time. Relating to the distant future.
example: Investing in education is a long-term benefit.
The company has long-term goals for expansion.
Smoking has long-term health consequences.

vn_meaning: tính từ: lâu năm; lâu đời (bạn bè, người quen); kéo dài (thời gian)
eng_explanation: adj. Existing for a long time; having a long history or association.
example: He is a long-time friend of my family.
She's a long-time resident of this city.
They are long-time supporters of the charity.

vn_meaning: động từ: nhìn; xem; trông; có vẻ (hình dáng, tình trạng); tìm kiếm; mong đợi; ghé thăm; xem xét (văn bản, dữ liệu). danh từ: vẻ ngoài; ánh mắt
eng_explanation: v. To turn one's eyes in a specific direction; to seem. n. Appearance; expression.
example: She gave him a worried look.
I need to look for my keys.
The weather looks promising.

vn_meaning: động từ: hiện ra mờ ảo; lờ mờ xuất hiện (trong bóng tối, sương mù); đe dọa (từ xa). danh từ: khung dệt
eng_explanation: v. To appear as a vague or shadowy form. To threaten or hang over. n. A machine for weaving.
example: A dark shape loomed in the distance.
The threat of recession loomed large.
The weaver worked at the loom.

vn_meaning: danh từ: vòng lặp; quai; nút thắt. động từ: tạo vòng lặp; lặp đi lặp lại
eng_explanation: n. A curve or coil. v. To form into a loop; to repeat.
example: The roller coaster has several loops.
The program is stuck in a loop.
He tied a loop in the rope.

vn_meaning: tính từ: lỏng lẻo; không chặt; rộng (quần áo); không bị ràng buộc (lịch trình, kế hoạch); phóng túng (tính cách).
eng_explanation: adj. Not firmly or tightly fixed in place; not restricted.
example: The screw is loose.
These pants are too loose for me.
He has a loose schedule this week.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chúa tể; lãnh chúa; quý tộc. động từ: cai trị, thống trị (một vùng đất)
eng_explanation: n. A man who rules over a territory. v. To act as a lord; to control.
example: He was a powerful lord in the kingdom.
The lord of the manor held great authority.
She lorded it over her employees.

vn_meaning: danh từ: xe tải (chủ yếu dùng ở Anh)
eng_explanation: n. (British) A large motor vehicle designed for transporting goods. (Truck in American English)
example: The goods were delivered by lorry.
A fleet of lorries blocked the highway.
He drives a lorry for a living.

vn_meaning: động từ: mất; thua; lạc; bỏ lỡ; đánh mất (cảm xúc, cơ hội)
eng_explanation: v. To be deprived of or cease to have. To suffer defeat.
example: I lost my keys.
Our team lost the game.
Don't lose hope.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự mất mát; sự thua lỗ; tổn thất (tài sản, người thân); sự lạc đường
eng_explanation: n. The act or fact of losing something or someone. The amount of something lost.
example: The company reported a significant loss.
She is grieving the loss of her mother.
There was a loss of power during the storm.

vn_meaning: mất
eng_explanation: The word 'lost' signifies a state of absence or disorientation.
example: I lost my keys.
She lost her job.
They lost their way in the forest.

vn_meaning: tích
eng_explanation: 'Lot' refers to a collection or a chance.
example: There is a large lot of land available.
He won the lottery.
She has a lot of responsibilities.

vn_meaning: trò
eng_explanation: A lottery is a game of chance where players bet on numbers to win a prize.
example: I bought a ticket for the lottery.
The lottery is very popular in many countries.
She's a dedicated lottery player.

vn_meaning: very loud; intense.
eng_explanation: 'Loud' describes a high volume of sound.
example: The concert was very loud.
The noise was loud and disruptive.
She spoke loudly.

vn_meaning: thương
eng_explanation: 'Loudly' emphasizes the intensity of a sound or expression.
example: He spoke loudly to the crowd.
She spoke loudly about her feelings.
The music was loud and energetic.

vn_meaning: cảm
eng_explanation: 'Love' is a strong emotion of affection.
example: I feel a great love for my family.
She showed her love through acts of kindness.
He showed his love through his actions.

vn_meaning: dễ thương
eng_explanation: 'Lovely' describes something that is aesthetically pleasing.
example: The garden is lovely with its flowers.
She has a lovely smile.
The painting is lovely and vibrant.

vn_meaning: below a certain level; not high.
eng_explanation: 'Low' indicates a lower position or level.
example: The temperature is low.
The lights are low.
The car is low on fuel.

vn_meaning: below; less than; situated at a lower position.
eng_explanation: 'Lower' signifies a position or level that is less than.
example: The price is lower than last year.
The building is lower than the rest of the city.
She lowered her voice.

vn_meaning: trung thành
eng_explanation: 'Loyal' describes a steadfast and trustworthy friend.
example: She is a loyal friend to her family.
He is a loyal employee.
She is loyal to her principles.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lòng trung thành; tính từ: trung thành (với ai đó)
eng_explanation: Noun: faithfulness or devotion to a person, cause, or idea. Adjective: showing faithfulness.
example: His loyalty to his friends was unwavering.
She demonstrated loyalty to the company throughout her career.
The soldiers showed loyalty to their commander.

vn_meaning: danh từ: may mắn; số phận
eng_explanation: Noun: fortune or chance; a favorable occurrence.
example: He had a lot of luck in winning the lottery.
Sometimes, luck is all you need to succeed.
Despite his best efforts, he lacked luck.

vn_meaning: tính từ: may mắn; xui xước
eng_explanation: Adjective: fortunate or having good luck.
example: She was lucky to have found such a great job.
It was lucky that he arrived just in time.
He considers himself a lucky person.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bữa trưa; bữa ăn trưa
eng_explanation: Noun: the midday meal.
example: I'm going to have lunch with my colleagues.
Let's grab lunch together sometime.
She packed a lunch for her trip.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phổi; (y học) khí quản
eng_explanation: Noun: the organ responsible for respiration; also, the trachea.
example: He suffered from a lung infection.
Doctors examined his lungs for any abnormalities.
The patient's lungs were damaged by the smoke.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hàng xa xỉ; tính từ: xa hoa, sang trọng
eng_explanation: Noun: a rich and extravagant product or service. Adjective: characterized by great comfort and elegance.
example: A yacht is a symbol of luxury.
She enjoys the luxury of a large house.
The hotel offered a range of luxury amenities.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bài hát, lời bài hát; tính từ: trữ tình
eng_explanation: Noun: a song or poem expressing emotion. Adjective: characterized by lyrical beauty.
example: The singer performed a beautiful lyric.
The song is filled with poignant lyrics.
He wrote a lyric about love and loss.

vn_meaning: danh từ: máy móc; thiết bị
eng_explanation: Noun: a device that performs a specific task automatically.
example: The machine broke down during the production process.
He repaired the old machine.
Modern machines have revolutionized many industries.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hệ thống máy móc; thiết bị, dụng cụ
eng_explanation: Noun: a system or collection of machinery.
example: The factory is equipped with advanced machinery.
The machinery was essential for the construction project.
He studied the machinery of the engine.

vn_meaning: tính từ: điên, cuồng; (cảm xúc) tức giận
eng_explanation: Adjective: mentally disturbed or irrational. Adverb: extremely.
example: He was acting mad after losing the game.
She went mad with grief.
He shouted madly at the driver.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tạp chí (xuất bản phẩm); động từ: chứa (đạn, phim)...
eng_explanation: a periodical publication containing articles and illustrations (noun); to load a weapon or film (verb).
example: She subscribes to a fashion magazine every month.
The camera magazine was full of stunning landscape photography.
He quickly magazine the shotgun before heading out to the hunting grounds.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ma thuật, ảo thuật; khả năng siêu nhiên
eng_explanation: the art of producing illusions through tricks or supernatural means.
example: The magician performed incredible feats of magic.
She believed in the magic of Christmas.
He attributed his success to a bit of luck and a lot of magic.

vn_meaning: tính từ: ma thuật, kỳ diệu; có sức mạnh huyền bí
eng_explanation: imbued with magic; wonderful and delightful.
example: The forest seemed magical, filled with ancient trees and hidden creatures.
She had a magical ability to calm crying babies.
The concert was a magical experience, filled with beautiful music.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thẩm phán (tòa án cấp thấp), quan cai trị
eng_explanation: a civil officer or judge who administers justice.
example: The magistrate presided over the minor court proceedings.
Historically, the magistrate held significant power within the local community.
He appeared before the magistrate to answer the charges.

vn_meaning: tính từ: từ tính; có sức hút, quyến rũ
eng_explanation: relating to magnets; attractive or appealing.
example: The magnetic field affected the compass needle.
She had a magnetic personality that drew people to her.
The magnetic tape recorded the audio perfectly.

vn_meaning: tính từ: lộng lẫy, tráng lệ, tuyệt đẹp
eng_explanation: extremely beautiful, elaborate, or impressive.
example: The view from the mountaintop was magnificent.
The palace was a magnificent display of wealth and power.
She wore a magnificent gown to the gala.

vn_meaning: danh từ: độ lớn, tầm quan trọng; cường độ
eng_explanation: greatness of extent or degree; a measure of the strength of something.
example: The earthquake was of considerable magnitude.
The magnitude of the problem was overwhelming.
Scientists measure the magnitude of stars.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thư tín, bưu phẩm; động từ: gửi thư
eng_explanation: a system for sending letters and packages; to send something by mail.
example: I received a letter in the mail today.
Please mail the package by Friday.
She checked her mail regularly.

vn_meaning: tính từ: chính, quan trọng; danh từ: phần chính, tuyến chính; động từ: duy trì, bảo trì
eng_explanation: most important; the principal or largest part (adj, noun); to keep in working order (verb).
example: This is the main reason for my decision.
The main course of the meal was delicious.
He is responsible for maintaining the main power supply.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đất liền (so với đảo)
eng_explanation: the main landmass of a continent or country.
example: The ferry transported passengers from the island to the mainland.
They drove from the mainland to explore the coastal towns.
The resort is located on the mainland, offering easy access to amenities.

vn_meaning: danh từ: trung tâm thương mại, khu mua sắm.
eng_explanation: n. A large enclosed shopping area with various stores. (n)
example: We went to the mall to buy new clothes.
The mall is always crowded on weekends.
A new food court opened in the mall.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người đàn ông, con người (chung); tính từ: đàn ông, của đàn ông; động từ: điều khiển, bố trí, làm đầy đủ nhân sự.
eng_explanation: n. Adult male human; v. Operate or control (a machine/situation). (n, v)
example: The man walked down the street.
They need to man the control room.
He is a man of his word.

vn_meaning: động từ: quản lý, điều hành; xoay xở, đối phó.
eng_explanation: v. Control, direct, or oversee something; succeed in doing something difficult. (v)
example: She manages a team of ten people.
Can you manage to finish the report by Friday?
He managed to escape the fire.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự quản lý, điều hành; ban quản lý.
eng_explanation: n. The process of controlling and organizing people/resources. (n)
example: Good management is essential for success.
She is studying business management.
The company's management team is very experienced.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người quản lý, giám đốc.
eng_explanation: n. A person responsible for controlling/administering a business/organization. (n)
example: He is the manager of the sales department.
The manager approved my vacation request.
She's a very effective manager.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ủy quyền, chỉ thị; động từ: ủy quyền, giao phó.
eng_explanation: n. Official authorization; v. Give an official order or instruction. (n, v)
example: The government has a clear mandate to reform the economy.
The UN Security Council mandated a ceasefire.
The voters gave the president a strong mandate.

vn_meaning: tính từ: bắt buộc, cưỡng bức.
eng_explanation: adj. Required by law or rules; compulsory. (adj)
example: Wearing a seatbelt is mandatory in most states.
Attendance at the meeting is mandatory.
The new policy makes vaccinations mandatory.

vn_meaning: tính từ: rõ ràng, hiển nhiên; danh từ: danh sách hàng hóa; động từ: biểu lộ, bộc lộ.
eng_explanation: adj. Clear or obvious; n. A list of cargo; v. Display or show. (adj, n, v)
example: His anger was manifest to everyone.
The ship's manifest listed all the goods on board.
Her talent began to manifest itself at a young age.

vn_meaning: động từ: thao túng, điều khiển (một cách khéo léo, thường là để lợi dụng).
eng_explanation: v. Control or influence skillfully, often unfairly or deceitfully. (v)
example: He was accused of manipulating the stock market.
Don't let anyone manipulate you.
The politician manipulated public opinion.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự thao túng, điều khiển (một cách khéo léo, thường là để lợi dụng).
eng_explanation: n. The skillful handling or control of something, often to deceive. (n)
example: The evidence suggested political manipulation.
His story was full of manipulation and lies.
The manipulation of data led to inaccurate results.

vn_meaning: Cách thức, phương pháp, cách làm (đặc biệt là trong văn hóa, nghệ thuật, hoặc các hoạt động); quy tắc, quy định (về cách hành động, cách thể hiện).
eng_explanation: A way of doing something; a method or technique; a rule or guideline.
example: The manner in which he conducted the meeting was formal.
The manner in which the painting was created was unique.
She adopted a new manner of speaking.

vn_meaning: Sản xuất, chế tạo (vật phẩm, sản phẩm); quá trình sản xuất (thường dùng cho sản phẩm vật chất).
eng_explanation: The process of creating or producing something.
example: The company manufactures a wide range of electronics.
The manufacturing process is complex and time-consuming.
They are manufacturing a new model of car.

vn_meaning: Sản xuất, chế tạo (vật phẩm, sản phẩm); quá trình sản xuất (thường dùng cho sản phẩm vật chất).
eng_explanation: The process of creating or producing something.
example: The global manufacturing industry is booming.
The company's manufacturing facility is located in China.
They are focusing on sustainable manufacturing practices.

vn_meaning: Sách viết bằng mực (thường là sách cổ, sách học thuật, hoặc sách có hình ảnh).
eng_explanation: A written work, typically in a manuscript format.
example: The historian examined the ancient manuscript.
The manuscript contained valuable historical information.
He was a renowned manuscript collector.

vn_meaning: Nhiều (số lượng lớn); nhiều (tính chất, cảm xúc).
eng_explanation: A large number of; many (in terms of quantity or feeling).
example: There were many people at the concert.
She felt many emotions during the movie.
The company has many employees.

vn_meaning: Bản đồ (vật lý, trực quan, hoặc số); đường đi, hướng dẫn (về vị trí, địa điểm).
eng_explanation: A visual representation of a geographical area.
example: I need a map to find my way.
The map showed the route to the mountain.
They used a map to navigate the city.

vn_meaning: Chạy marathon (một loại chạy bộ dài); cuộc đua dài.
eng_explanation: A long-distance running race.
example: She ran the marathon in a record time.
The marathon was a challenging event.
He is a marathon runner.

vn_meaning: Tháng 3; một cuộc chiến (thường dùng trong lịch sử); một sự kiện lớn.
eng_explanation: The third month of the year; a military campaign; a major event.
example: The Roman Empire marched across Europe.
The March of the Rhine is a famous battle.
The March of Independence was a pivotal moment.

vn_meaning: Đánh nhau (với người khác); một cuộc biểu tình; một sự kiện lớn.
eng_explanation: A military procession or demonstration; a major event.
example: The soldiers marched to the front lines.
The protesters marched peacefully through the city.
The March of the Soviets was a powerful movement.

vn_meaning: Lỗ hổng, khoảng cách (về bên ngoài, về mặt hình học).
eng_explanation: The space around the edge of something.
example: The margin of error was small.
The margin of the photograph was blurred.
The margin of the profit was significant.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phần rìa (của trang giấy); tính từ: nhỏ nhặt, ít quan trọng; tính từ: biên (của một vấn đề)
eng_explanation: adj./n. - small, insignificant; n. - a small area or part.
example: The author added marginal notes to the text.
He made a marginal comment about the presentation.
The marginal cost of production was surprisingly low.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hải quân; danh từ: sinh vật biển; tính từ: liên quan đến biển
eng_explanation: n./adj. - relating to the sea or oceans; a member of the naval forces.
example: The marine corps is a powerful fighting force.
Marine life thrives in the coral reefs.
He worked as a marine biologist.

vn_meaning: danh từ: dấu hiệu; vết; dấu; danh từ: (trong thương mại) giá cả; danh từ: (nghệ thuật) tác phẩm
eng_explanation: n. - a sign or symbol; a scratch or stain; a price; a work of art.
example: He left a mark on the wall.
The product has a distinctive mark of quality.
The artist’s mark is easily recognizable.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chỉ thị; dấu phân biệt; danh từ: (trong toán học) điểm đánh dấu
eng_explanation: n. - a sign or indicator; a distinguishing feature; a point in a sequence.
example: The teacher used a marker to highlight the important sentences.
The red marker indicated the boundary line.
The marker is used to identify the data points.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thị trường; (trong kinh tế) ngành; (trong quân sự) khu vực phòng thủ
eng_explanation: n. - a place where goods are bought and sold; a sector of an economy.
example: The company is expanding into new markets.
The real estate market is currently booming.
The military established a defensive market.

vn_meaning: danh từ: quảng cáo; danh từ: chiến lược tiếp thị
eng_explanation: n. - the activity of promoting and selling products or services.
example: Effective marketing is crucial for business success.
The company invested heavily in marketing campaigns.
Digital marketing is becoming increasingly important.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khu chợ; (trong mạng) không gian giao tiếp
eng_explanation: n. - a place where people buy and sell goods; a virtual community.
example: The marketplace was bustling with activity.
He found a great deal on the online marketplace.
The metaverse is a new type of marketplace.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hôn nhân; (trong toán học) phép nhân
eng_explanation: n. - the state of being married; the act of multiplying.
example: They celebrated their marriage with a lavish party.
Marriage is a lifelong commitment.
The marriage of the two companies was a strategic alliance.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đã kết hôn; tính từ: gắn bó, liên kết
eng_explanation: adj. - having been married; closely connected.
example: She is a married woman with two children.
The two companies are married by a long-term contract.
They have a married life filled with happiness.

vn_meaning: động từ: kết hôn; (trong trò chơi) kết hợp
eng_explanation: v. - to get married; to combine or join together.
example: They decided to marry in the spring.
The two teams will marry in the championship game.
The ingredients marry together to create a delicious sauce.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thuộc về chiến tranh, quân sự (liên quan đến binh lính, vũ khí); danh từ: sự luyện tập quân sự (chuẩn bị cho chiến tranh).
eng_explanation: adjective: relating to war or military affairs; noun: military training.
example: The martial arts require discipline and focus.
He underwent martial training before joining the army.
The general gave a rousing martial speech to inspire his troops.

vn_meaning: danh từ: mặt nạ (để che mặt); động từ: che đậy, làm mờ đi (cảm xúc, sự thật).
eng_explanation: noun: a covering to conceal the face; verb: to conceal or disguise something.
example: She wore a Halloween mask.
He tried to mask his sadness with a smile.
The government attempted to mask the true extent of the damage.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khối lượng, số lượng lớn (vật chất); đám đông (người); thánh lễ (tôn giáo).
eng_explanation: noun: a large quantity of something; a crowd of people; a religious ceremony.
example: The mass of the object was surprisingly light.
A large mass of people gathered in the square.
They attended mass at the local church.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thảm sát, tàn sát (số lượng lớn người).
eng_explanation: noun: the slaughter of a large number of people.
example: The massacre shocked the world.
Historical accounts detail the brutal massacre.
The survivors recounted the horrors of the massacre.

vn_meaning: tính từ: khổng lồ, to lớn, đồ sộ (kích thước, số lượng).
eng_explanation: adjective: extremely large or great; huge.
example: The building was a massive structure.
The company reported massive profits.
A massive earthquake struck the region.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chủ (người làm chủ); người thầy giỏi; bậc thầy (nghề nghiệp); động từ: làm chủ, thông thạo (kỹ năng).
eng_explanation: noun: a person who has control; a skilled expert; verb: to acquire complete control or skill.
example: He was a master craftsman.
She mastered the art of cooking.
The master directed the orchestra.

vn_meaning: danh từ: que diêm; trận đấu (thể thao); sự phù hợp; động từ: làm sáng lên (khớp, tương thích).
eng_explanation: noun: a device for creating fire; a sporting contest; a suitable or equivalent thing; verb: to be similar or compatible.
example: He struck a match to light the candle.
The football match was exciting.
These shoes don't match the dress.
Their skills match perfectly.

vn_meaning: tính từ: phù hợp, tương thích; danh từ: sự phối hợp, sự phù hợp.
eng_explanation: adjective: corresponding or fitting together; noun: the act of pairing or coordinating.
example: She wore a matching set of earrings and a necklace.
The matching colors created a harmonious effect.
Finding a matching donor for the transplant was crucial.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bạn, đồng nghiệp; bạn đời; động từ: ghép cặp, kết hợp.
eng_explanation: noun: a friend or companion; a partner; verb: to pair or combine.
example: He's a good mate to have around.
They are sailing mates.
The sailors mated the ropes together.

vn_meaning: danh từ: vật liệu (làm đồ vật); tài liệu (văn bản); nội dung (phim, sách).
eng_explanation: noun: a substance used to make things; a document; content.
example: The table is made of wood material.
Please provide the necessary materials for the project.
The film's material was based on a true story.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thị trưởng (của thành phố, thị trấn)
eng_explanation: n. The elected head of a city or town government. (PoS: noun)
example: The mayor addressed the city council.
She is running for mayor in the upcoming election.
The mayor cut the ribbon at the new park opening.

vn_meaning: đại từ: tôi, mình (tân ngữ)
eng_explanation: pron. The objective case of 'I'. (PoS: pronoun)
example: He gave the book to me.
Please help me with this problem.
They invited me to the party.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bữa ăn
eng_explanation: n. An occasion when food is eaten; a portion of food. (PoS: noun)
example: We had a delicious meal at the restaurant.
Breakfast is my favorite meal of the day.
She prepared a simple meal for her family.

vn_meaning: động từ: có ý nghĩa; có ý định; keo kiệt; xấu tính; tính từ: trung bình, tầm thường; trạng từ: tồi tệ, xấu; danh từ: giá trị trung bình
eng_explanation: v. To signify; to intend; adj. Average; n. Average value. (PoS: verb, adj, adv, noun)
example: What does this word mean?
He didn't mean to hurt her feelings.
The mean temperature for July is 85 degrees.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ý nghĩa, sự có ý nghĩa
eng_explanation: n. What is intended to be, or actually is, expressed or indicated. (PoS: noun)
example: The meaning of the poem is open to interpretation.
She searched for the deeper meaning of life.
Words have power and meaning.

vn_meaning: tính từ: có ý nghĩa, ý nghĩa sâu sắc
eng_explanation: adj. Having a serious, important, or useful quality or purpose. (PoS: adjective)
example: She led a meaningful life dedicated to helping others.
The conversation was surprisingly meaningful.
He found a meaningful connection with his work.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phương tiện, cách thức; số nhiều của mean (giá trị trung bình)
eng_explanation: n. A way of achieving something; resources. (PoS: noun)
example: She has the means to travel the world.
By any means necessary.
These are the means to an end.

vn_meaning: trạng từ/danh từ: trong lúc đó, tạm thời
eng_explanation: adv./n. In the interval; meanwhile. (PoS: adverb/noun)
example: I'll check the details; meantime, please wait here.
The repairs are underway; in the meantime, we'll use a temporary solution.
Meantime, the situation is getting worse.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: trong lúc đó, đồng thời đó
eng_explanation: adv. In the meantime; during the intervening time. (PoS: adverb)
example: I'm finishing this report; meanwhile, can you answer the phone?
She was studying; meanwhile, her brother was playing video games.
The rain continued; meanwhile, the floodwaters rose.

vn_meaning: động từ: đo đạc; đánh giá; danh từ: số đo, biện pháp
eng_explanation: v. To determine size or quantity; n. A standard of measurement. (PoS: verb, noun)
example: Please measure the length of the room.
The government took measures to reduce unemployment.
This is a crucial measure of success.

vn_meaning: Một quá trình hoặc sự đo lường, thường được xác định bằng các đơn vị đo lường.
eng_explanation: Measurement refers to the process or action of determining something by using units of measurement.
example: The temperature was measured with a thermometer.
The data was collected through various measurements.

vn_meaning: Thịt, phần của động vật được ăn.
eng_explanation: Meat is the edible part of animals, typically the muscle tissue.
example: I enjoy a delicious piece of meat.
The butcher sold a variety of cuts of meat.

vn_meaning: Một người làm việc với máy móc, thiết bị.
eng_explanation: A mechanic is a person who repairs or maintains machinery.
example: The mechanic fixed the car's engine.
She is a skilled mechanic with many years of experience.

vn_meaning: Liên quan đến hoặc sử dụng các bộ phận chuyển động, các thiết bị, hoặc các hệ thống có thể hoạt động theo các nguyên tắc vật lý.
eng_explanation: Mechanical refers to anything related to or utilizing moving parts, devices, or systems that operate according to physical laws.
example: The new appliance is a mechanical marvel.
The engineer designed a complex mechanical system.

vn_meaning: Một hệ thống hoặc bộ phận chuyển động, thường được điều khiển bởi một bộ phận khác.
eng_explanation: A mechanism is a system or component that moves or operates based on a driving force.
example: The car's engine is a complex mechanism.
The clockwork mechanism is intricate and precise.

vn_meaning: Một biểu証 bằng vàng hoặc bạc, được trao cho những người đã đạt được một thành tựu đặc biệt.
eng_explanation: A medal is a reward or recognition given for outstanding achievement.
example: He earned a gold medal for his athletic performance.
The school presented a medal to the student who excelled in the competition.

vn_meaning: Các phương tiện truyền thông, bao gồm báo chí, truyền hình, internet, và các phương tiện khác.
eng_explanation: Media refers to various communication channels, such as newspapers, television, and the internet.
example: The media is constantly reporting on current events.
Social media is a powerful form of media.

vn_meaning: Liên quan đến hoặc được sử dụng trong y học.
eng_explanation: Medical refers to the field of medicine and healthcare.
example: The doctor performed a medical examination.
She is a skilled medical professional.

vn_meaning: Một loại thuốc được dùng để điều trị bệnh.
eng_explanation: Medication is a drug used to treat or alleviate illness.
example: He took his medication to combat the cold.
The pharmacist dispensed a prescription for medication.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thời Trung Cổ; tính từ: thuộc thời Trung Cổ
eng_explanation: Relating to the Middle Ages (roughly 5th to 15th centuries).
example: Medieval castles were often built with thick stone walls.
Medieval literature is filled with knights and dragons.
The medieval period saw significant advancements in art and architecture.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thiền định; danh từ: suy tư (sâu sắc)
eng_explanation: The practice of focusing the mind for spiritual or calming effect.
example: She practiced meditation to reduce her stress levels.
Daily meditation can improve mental clarity and focus.
He engaged in deep meditation, seeking inner peace.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phương tiện; danh từ: người trung gian; tính từ: trung gian
eng_explanation: A substance or device that transmits or conducts something (e.g., light, sound).
example: Water is a good medium for heat transfer.
The journalist acted as a medium between the company and the public.
He used a digital medium to share his artwork.

vn_meaning: động từ: gặp nhau; động từ: phù hợp (với)
eng_explanation: To encounter someone or something; to be suitable or adequate.
example: I will meet you at the library tomorrow.
The new policy meets the needs of the community.
This shirt meets the requirements for the job interview.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cuộc họp; danh từ: sự hội họp
eng_explanation: An assembly of people for discussion or business.
example: We have a meeting scheduled for next week.
The meeting lasted for two hours.
A regular team meeting is essential for collaboration.

vn_meaning: danh từ: giai điệu; danh từ: âm giai
eng_explanation: A sequence of musical notes that is musically satisfying.
example: The singer's melody was haunting and beautiful.
The song is known for its simple and memorable melody.
She composed a lovely melody for the piano.

vn_meaning: động từ: tan chảy; động từ: tan biến (theo thời gian)
eng_explanation: To liquefy; to fade or disappear gradually.
example: The ice cream began to melt in the warm sun.
Memories can melt away with time.
The snow started to melt after the rain.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thành viên; danh từ: thành phần
eng_explanation: A person who is part of a group or organization.
example: She is a member of the local book club.
The team consists of several experienced members.
Each member has a responsibility to uphold the club's values.

vn_meaning: danh từ: quyền thành viên; danh từ: sự hội viên
eng_explanation: The state of being a member of a group or organization.
example: The annual membership fee is $50.
He renewed his membership at the gym.
The club offers various membership levels.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ghi nhớ; danh từ: bản ghi nhớ
eng_explanation: A brief written message or reminder.
example: Please review the memo attached to this email.
I sent a memo to the team about the upcoming deadline.
The memo outlined the new company policy.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hồi ký (sách); ký ức (cá nhân)
eng_explanation: noun: A written account of one's experiences, typically focusing on a particular theme or period.
example: She published a memoir detailing her life as a concert pianist.
The memoir offered a unique perspective on the events of that era.
Writing a memoir can be a therapeutic process.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đáng nhớ; ghi nhớ được
eng_explanation: adjective: Worth remembering; easily remembered; remarkable.
example: The concert was a truly memorable experience.
We had a memorable vacation in Italy.
It's a memorable moment I'll cherish forever.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đài tưởng niệm; kỷ niệm; sự tưởng nhớ; tính từ: có tính chất tưởng niệm
eng_explanation: noun: A monument or structure erected to commemorate a person or event; adjective: relating to remembrance.
example: A memorial was built to honor the fallen soldiers.
The museum held a memorial exhibition.
The memorial service was a moving tribute.

vn_meaning: danh từ: trí nhớ; kỷ niệm; ký ức
eng_explanation: noun: The faculty by which the mind stores and remembers information; a recollection.
example: She has a remarkable memory for names.
The photograph brought back many happy memories.
His memory of the event was hazy.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tinh thần; trí tuệ; tâm lý
eng_explanation: adjective: Relating to the mind; of or pertaining to the intellect.
example: He's undergoing mental health treatment.
She has excellent mental agility.
Mental exercise can improve cognitive function.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự nhắc đến; động từ: đề cập đến; nhắc đến
eng_explanation: noun: A brief reference to something; verb: To refer to something briefly.
example: The article made a brief mention of the new policy.
Don't forget to mention your previous experience in the interview.
She didn't mention anything about the problem.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người cố vấn; người hướng dẫn; động từ: cố vấn; hướng dẫn
eng_explanation: noun: A trusted advisor or guide; verb: To advise or train someone.
example: She found a mentor who helped her advance her career.
He mentored several young entrepreneurs.
A good mentor can provide invaluable guidance.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thực đơn
eng_explanation: noun: A list of food and drinks available in a restaurant.
example: Let's take a look at the menu.
The menu offers a variety of vegetarian options.
I'll order from the dessert menu.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người buôn bán; thương nhân
eng_explanation: noun: A person or company engaged in trade.
example: The merchant sold spices and silks from the East.
He was a successful online merchant.
The town was a thriving center for merchants.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lòng thương xót; sự khoan dung
eng_explanation: noun: Compassionate or kind treatment; forgiveness towards someone deserving punishment.
example: He pleaded for mercy from the judge.
The soldiers showed mercy to the prisoners.
Have mercy on those less fortunate than yourself.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phương pháp luận (nghiên cứu, khoa học); quy trình (thực hiện một công việc)
eng_explanation: n. A system of methods used in a particular area of study or activity. (PoS: noun)
example: The research paper clearly outlined its methodology.
A robust methodology is crucial for reliable results.
We need to review our teaching methodology.

vn_meaning: danh từ: mét (đơn vị đo độ dài); nhịp điệu (thơ, nhạc)
eng_explanation: n. The metric system unit of length; rhythmic structure in poetry. (PoS: noun)
example: The room is ten metres long.
The poem is written in iambic pentametre.
He measured the distance in metres.

vn_meaning: tính từ: giữa; trung tâm; trung bình; danh từ: phần giữa; giữa (vị trí)
eng_explanation: adj. Situated between two other points; average. n. The central part. (PoS: adj, noun)
example: The middle child often feels overlooked.
She lives in the middle of the city.
He achieved a middle score on the exam.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nửa đêm (12 giờ đêm)
eng_explanation: n. The time that is exactly halfway between evening and morning. (PoS: noun)
example: The clock struck midnight.
They were still awake at midnight.
She waited until midnight for his call.

vn_meaning: danh từ: giữa; trung tâm (của một sự việc, tình huống)
eng_explanation: n. The central part of something; surrounded by. (PoS: noun)
example: He found peace in the midst of chaos.
They were lost in the midst of the forest.
She stood in the midst of the crowd.

vn_meaning: động từ khiếm khuyết: có thể; có lẽ; sức mạnh; danh từ: sức mạnh, quyền lực
eng_explanation: v. Past tense of 'may'; power or ability. n. Strength, force. (PoS: verb, noun)
example: He might come to the party.
She has a lot of political might.
The knight displayed his might in battle.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự di cư; sự di trú (người, động vật)
eng_explanation: n. Movement of animals from one region to another; immigration. (PoS: noun)
example: Bird migration is a fascinating phenomenon.
The country experienced a large wave of migration.
Climate change is affecting migration patterns.

vn_meaning: tính từ: ôn hòa (thời tiết); dịu (tính cách); nhẹ (bệnh)
eng_explanation: adj. Moderate in temperature or severity; gentle in nature. (PoS: adjective)
example: The weather is unusually mild for November.
He has a mild temperament.
She suffered from a mild cold.

vn_meaning: danh từ: dặm (đơn vị đo độ dài)
eng_explanation: n. A unit of distance equal to 5,280 feet. (PoS: noun)
example: It's five miles to the nearest town.
She ran a marathon in under four hours.
The journey is a hundred miles long.

vn_meaning: tính từ: hiếu chiến; cực đoan; danh từ: người hiếu chiến, cực đoan
eng_explanation: adj. Combative and aggressive; n. A person who advocates or uses radical political tactics. (PoS: adj, noun)
example: The group adopted a more militant stance.
He was a militant activist.
The militant organization claimed responsibility.

vn_meaning: quân sự
eng_explanation: A military is a group of soldiers and equipment dedicated to defending a nation.
example: The military is preparing for a major operation.
The soldiers were part of the military.
The country's military is highly trained.

vn_meaning: A small, loosely organized military force, often of a militia type.
eng_explanation: A militia is a small, informal military unit, typically composed of volunteers.
example: The militia was formed to protect the community.
The militia members were armed and ready to defend.
The militia’s mission was to maintain order.

vn_meaning: A dairy product, typically produced from cow's milk.
eng_explanation: Milk is a nutritious liquid produced by mammals, primarily cows.
example: I need some milk for my cereal.
The farmer collected milk from the cows.
We enjoy drinking milk daily.

vn_meaning: A machine that grinds grain into flour.
eng_explanation: A mill is a device used to process grain into flour.
example: The millstone ground the wheat.
The factory used a large mill to produce paper.
The mill's gears were complex and precise.

vn_meaning: triệu
eng_explanation: A million is a large number, equal to one million.
example: The price of a house is millions of dollars.
The company's revenue is a million dollars.
The scientist made a million observations.

vn_meaning: tâm trí
eng_explanation: The mind is the seat of consciousness and intelligence.
example: He had a clear mind when discussing the problem.
The artist's mind was filled with creativity.
The mind is a complex and fascinating organ.

vn_meaning: của tôi
eng_explanation: A mine is a place where minerals are extracted.
example: The mine is rich in gold.
I'm looking for a mine to explore.
The miners worked tirelessly in the mine.

vn_meaning: A person who extracts minerals from the earth.
eng_explanation: A miner is a skilled worker who digs for valuable minerals.
example: The miners worked in a dark and dangerous mine.
He was a dedicated miner, known for his skill.
The mine was a complex system of tunnels and shafts.

vn_meaning: A naturally occurring inorganic solid with a definite chemical composition.
eng_explanation: A mineral is a naturally occurring substance with a specific chemical composition.
example: The mineral deposits in the region are valuable.
The geologist studied the mineral composition of the rock.
The mineral was used in many industries.

vn_meaning: động từ: làm giảm thiểu; tính từ: tối thiểu
eng_explanation: verb: to reduce to the smallest possible amount; adjective: least
example: We need to minimize our expenses this year.
The company is trying to minimize the impact of the storm.
She minimized her mistakes by practicing diligently.

vn_meaning: danh từ: mức tối thiểu; tính từ: tối thiểu
eng_explanation: noun: the lowest possible amount; adjective: least
example: The minimum wage is set by the government.
What is the minimum temperature expected today?
He received a minimum of five years in prison.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khai thác (khoáng sản, tài nguyên); danh từ: quá trình khai thác
eng_explanation: noun: the process of extracting minerals or other materials from the earth; verb: to extract.
example: Coal mining is a dangerous occupation.
The company is investing in new mining technology.
They mined for gold in the Sierra Nevada mountains.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bộ trưởng; danh từ: nhà tư vấn
eng_explanation: noun: a member of a government; a person who advises.
example: The minister announced new economic policies.
He served as a minister in several governments.
She is a trusted minister to the king.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bộ (chính phủ); danh từ: chức năng, lĩnh vực
eng_explanation: noun: a government department; a specific function or area of activity.
example: The Ministry of Education oversees the country's schools.
She works in the Ministry of Health.
The ministry is responsible for environmental protection.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người trẻ tuổi; danh từ: chi tiết nhỏ; tính từ: nhỏ, ít quan trọng
eng_explanation: noun: a young person; adjective: small, unimportant.
example: The minor was caught shoplifting.
He noticed a minor detail that everyone else missed.
A minor injury required a bandage.

vn_meaning: danh từ: số ít; danh từ: nhóm người thiểu số
eng_explanation: noun: a small group of people; a group that is outnumbered.
example: The minority group has limited rights.
She is a member of the political minority.
The minority religion faces discrimination.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phút; danh từ: chi tiết nhỏ; tính từ: rất nhỏ, tinh tế
eng_explanation: noun: a unit of time; adjective: extremely small.
example: I'll be there in a minute.
The details are minute but important.
She has a minute memory.

vn_meaning: danh từ: kỳ tích; danh từ: điều kỳ diệu
eng_explanation: noun: a remarkable event; a wonderful or astonishing thing.
example: The recovery was considered a medical miracle.
She performed a miracle of transformation.
The birth of her child was a miracle.

vn_meaning: danh từ: gương; danh từ: sự phản chiếu
eng_explanation: noun: a reflective surface; the action of reflecting.
example: She looked at herself in the mirror.
The mirror showed a distorted image.
The lake reflected the mountains.

vn_meaning: tính từ: buồn bã, khổ sở (cảm xúc); tồi tệ, đáng thương (tình trạng)
eng_explanation: adj. extremely unhappy or uncomfortable; causing unhappiness.
example: I felt miserable after failing the exam.
The weather was miserable all day.
He lived a miserable life due to poverty.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nỗi khổ, sự đau khổ; hoàn cảnh khốn cùng
eng_explanation: n. a state of great suffering or unhappiness; extreme distress.
example: She endured years of misery after losing her family.
Poverty and disease brought misery to the village.
He escaped a life of misery.

vn_meaning: tính từ: gây hiểu lầm, đánh lừa; sai lệch
eng_explanation: adj. causing someone to believe something that is not true; deceptive.
example: The advertisement was misleading and didn't mention the hidden fees.
His misleading statements caused confusion.
The map provided misleading directions.

vn_meaning: động từ: nhớ, tiếc nuối (người, vật); bỏ lỡ (cơ hội, thời gian); ước tính sai (mục tiêu)
eng_explanation: v. to feel sad because someone or something is not present; to fail to hit.
example: I miss my family very much.
I missed the bus this morning.
The archer missed the target.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tên lửa
eng_explanation: n. a weapon that is launched from the ground or sea to hit a target.
example: The missile was launched towards the enemy base.
The country is developing new missile technology.
A missile strike damaged the building.

vn_meaning: tính từ: mất tích; bị thiếu; không có
eng_explanation: adj. unable to be found; not present; absent.
example: The child is still missing after three days.
A page is missing from the report.
The key was missing from the lock.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhiệm vụ, công việc; sứ mệnh
eng_explanation: n. an important task or duty; a journey undertaken for a specific purpose.
example: The astronauts completed their mission successfully.
Our mission is to help those in need.
He was sent on a secret mission.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sai lầm; lỗi; nhầm lẫn; động từ: mắc lỗi, nhầm lẫn
eng_explanation: n. an error; a fault; v. to make a fault or error.
example: It was a simple mistake.
I made a mistake in my calculations.
Don't worry, everyone makes mistakes.

vn_meaning: động từ: trộn lẫn; pha trộn; danh từ: sự trộn lẫn
eng_explanation: v. to combine different things together; n. a mixture of different things.
example: Mix the flour and sugar together.
There's a mix of emotions in her voice.
He made a delicious mix of fruits.

vn_meaning: tính từ: trộn lẫn; pha trộn; lẫn lộn; danh từ: hỗn hợp
eng_explanation: adj. containing a mixture of different things; blended; n. a combination of different things.
example: The salad was a mixed combination of vegetables.
He has mixed feelings about the situation.
The paint was a mixed color.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự sửa đổi, thay đổi (văn bản, kế hoạch, luật lệ...); sự điều chỉnh (thiết bị, máy móc...).
eng_explanation: n. The act or process of altering something; an alteration. (noun)
example: The committee approved the modification to the proposal.
Engineers made several modifications to the design.
This is a minor modification to the existing system.

vn_meaning: động từ: sửa đổi, thay đổi (văn bản, kế hoạch, luật lệ...); điều chỉnh (thiết bị, máy móc...).
eng_explanation: v. To make partial or minor changes to something. (verb)
example: We need to modify the software to fix the bug.
The recipe can be modified to suit your taste.
He modified his behavior after receiving feedback.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khoảnh khắc, giây phút (thời gian); thời điểm (sự kiện).
eng_explanation: n. A very brief period of time; a point in time. (noun)
example: I'll be there in a moment.
It was a defining moment in her life.
Enjoy every moment of your vacation.

vn_meaning: danh từ: động lượng (vật lý); sức mạnh, đà phát triển (của phong trào, sự nghiệp...).
eng_explanation: n. The quantity of motion of a moving body; strength or force. (noun)
example: The campaign gained momentum after the debate.
The car picked up momentum as it went downhill.
The team needs to maintain its momentum to win.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thứ Hai (ngày đầu tuần).
eng_explanation: n. The first day of the week. (noun)
example: I have a meeting on Monday morning.
Many people dread Mondays.
Monday is usually a busy day at the office.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tiền (bất kỳ loại tiền tệ nào).
eng_explanation: n. A current medium of exchange in the form of coins and banknotes. (noun)
example: I need to earn more money.
He invested his money in the stock market.
Money can't buy happiness.

vn_meaning: động từ: theo dõi, giám sát (tiến trình, tình hình...); kiểm tra (máy móc, thiết bị...). danh từ: màn hình (máy tính, TV...).
eng_explanation: v. To observe and check the progress or quality of; n. A screen. (verb/noun)
example: Doctors monitor the patient's vital signs.
The security cameras monitor the building.
I have a large monitor for my computer.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tu sĩ (nam, thường sống ẩn dật hoặc trong tu viện).
eng_explanation: n. A man who has taken a vow to live a religious life in a monastery. (noun)
example: The monk spent his days in prayer and meditation.
Buddhist monks wear orange robes.
He decided to become a monk after years of searching.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khỉ (một loài động vật linh trưởng). động từ: trêu chọc, bắt chước.
eng_explanation: n. A primate mammal; v. To mimic or tease. (noun/verb)
example: The monkey swung through the trees.
Don't monkey around with that!
He was monkeying around with his friend.

vn_meaning: danh từ: độc quyền (sự kiểm soát hoàn toàn một thị trường hoặc ngành công nghiệp).
eng_explanation: n. Exclusive control of a supply or trade; a market dominated by one entity. (noun)
example: The company has a monopoly on the local cable market.
Breaking up the monopoly would benefit consumers.
He built a business empire and achieved a near monopoly.

vn_meaning: Một sinh vật kỳ dị, thường có hình dạng đáng sợ, thường là một con quái vật.
eng_explanation: A frightening creature, often a monstrous beast.
example: The monster in the forest was terrifying.
She felt a sense of fear when she saw the monster.

vn_meaning: Một tháng, thường là một khoảng thời gian trong một năm, thường là tháng 1.
eng_explanation: A period of one month.
example: We are looking at the month of July.
The month of August is known for its warm weather.

vn_meaning: Tháng 1, thường là một tháng trong một năm, thường là tháng 1.
eng_explanation: Monthly, referring to the first of the month.
example: The company releases its monthly report.
We receive the monthly sales figures.

vn_meaning: Một công trình kiến trúc lớn, thường là một công trình tôn giáo hoặc lịch sử.
eng_explanation: A large architectural structure, often religious or historical.
example: The monument stands proudly in the town square.
The monument commemorates the soldiers who died in the war.

vn_meaning: Trạng thái tâm lý, cảm xúc, hoặc trạng thái tinh thần.
eng_explanation: A state of mind or emotional state.
example: She had a gloomy mood today.
The music created a feeling of melancholy.

vn_meaning: Trăng, thường là một vật thể tự nhiên, thường là một mặt trăng.
eng_explanation: The moon, a natural celestial body.
example: The moon was shining brightly in the night sky.
She looked at the moon with a wistful expression.

vn_meaning: Đạo đức, giá trị, hoặc ý chí tốt đẹp.
eng_explanation: Moral principles or values.
example: The movie explored complex moral dilemmas.
His moral compass guided his decisions.

vn_meaning: Đạo đức, giá trị, hoặc ý chí tốt đẹp.
eng_explanation: Moral principles or values.
example: The film questioned the nature of morality.
His unwavering morality was admired.

vn_meaning: Hơn, nhiều hơn.
eng_explanation: More than.
example: I need more coffee.
She is more interested in learning about history.

vn_meaning: Hơn, nhiều hơn.
eng_explanation: Also, in addition.
example: He offered more than just a smile.
She added moreover, a detailed explanation.

vn_meaning: danh từ: buổi sáng; danh từ: thời kỳ đầu của ngày (trong một khoảng thời gian)
eng_explanation: noun: the period of time between night and noon; also, the first part of the day.
example: I enjoy a cup of coffee in the morning.
The morning air was crisp and cool.
She woke up early every morning.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khoản vay thế chấp; danh từ: tài sản thế chấp
eng_explanation: noun: a loan secured by property; the property itself serves as collateral.
example: He took out a mortgage to buy a house.
The bank foreclosed on the property due to the mortgage default.
A mortgage is a significant financial commitment.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhà thờ Hồi giáo
eng_explanation: noun: a Muslim place of worship; a building for prayer and religious gatherings.
example: They visited a beautiful mosque in Marrakech.
The mosque was decorated with intricate mosaics.
Muslims gather at the mosque for daily prayers.

vn_meaning: tính từ: nhất; tính từ: hầu hết; trạng từ: nhất
eng_explanation: adjective: greatest in degree; pronoun: the greatest number or amount.
example: This is the most delicious cake I've ever tasted.
Most people enjoy chocolate.
She is the most talented singer in the band.

vn_meaning: tính từ: chủ yếu; tính từ: phần lớn
eng_explanation: adverb/adjective: mainly; for the greater part.
example: I mostly eat vegetables.
Mostly, I prefer to read books.
The students mostly passed the exam.

vn_meaning: danh từ: mẹ; danh từ: người mẹ
eng_explanation: noun: a female parent; the person who gives birth to a child.
example: My mother is very supportive.
She is a loving mother to her children.
A mother's love is unconditional.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cử động; danh từ: đề nghị; danh từ: chuyển động
eng_explanation: noun: movement; a proposal or suggestion; the act of moving.
example: The baby made a sudden motion.
He made a motion to adjourn the meeting.
The motion passed with a majority vote.

vn_meaning: động từ: khích lệ; động từ: thúc đẩy
eng_explanation: verb: to encourage or inspire; to provide a reason for doing something.
example: The coach motivated the team to win.
Hard work can motivate you to achieve your goals.
She was motivated to study harder.

vn_meaning: danh từ: động lực; danh từ: lý do
eng_explanation: noun: the reason for doing something; the force that drives someone.
example: His motivation was to help others.
She found motivation in her passion for art.
The motivation for the project was to improve efficiency.

vn_meaning: danh từ: động cơ; danh từ: lý do
eng_explanation: noun: the reason for doing something; the underlying cause of an action.
example: The detective investigated the motive for the crime.
His motive for quitting was stress.
She had a strong motive to succeed.

vn_meaning: danh từ: động cơ (máy móc); động cơ điện; động cơ không khói; động lực; động cơ thúc đẩy; động từ: làm cho hoạt động bằng động cơ
eng_explanation: motor (n): an engine that converts electrical energy into mechanical energy; (v): to operate something using a motor.
example: The electric motor powered the fan.
He used a motor to drive the pump.
The motor of her ambition was a desire for success.

vn_meaning: danh từ: xe mô tô
eng_explanation: motorcycle (n): a two-wheeled vehicle powered by an engine.
example: He rode his motorcycle through the city.
She bought a new motorcycle for her commute.
The motorcycle club organized a charity ride.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người lái xe (ô tô)
eng_explanation: motorist (n): a person who drives a motor vehicle.
example: The police warned the motorists about the speed limit.
A careless motorist caused the accident.
The new law aims to protect vulnerable motorists.

vn_meaning: danh từ: điểm cao, đỉnh; động từ: leo lên; đặt lên; gắn lên
eng_explanation: mount (n): a point of land higher than its surroundings; (v): to climb or fix something.
example: He decided to mount the horse.
She mounted the painting on the wall.
The climbers reached the mountain's summit.

vn_meaning: danh từ: núi
eng_explanation: mountain (n): a large natural elevation of the earth's surface.
example: They hiked to the top of the mountain.
The view from the mountain was breathtaking.
The mountain range stretched for miles.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chuột (động vật); chuột máy tính
eng_explanation: mouse (n): a small rodent; a hand-held device that controls a cursor on a computer screen.
example: The cat chased the mouse across the floor.
He clicked the mouse to open the file.
The computer mouse needs new batteries.

vn_meaning: danh từ: miệng; lối vào; động từ: nói; phát biểu
eng_explanation: mouth (n): the opening in the face for eating and speaking; (v): to speak or express.
example: She had a beautiful smile and a kind mouth.
The river flows into the mouth of the bay.
He opened his mouth to protest.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự di chuyển; động từ: di chuyển; chuyển động; tác động; cảm động
eng_explanation: move (n): an act of changing position; (v): to change position; to evoke emotion.
example: The chess piece made a strategic move.
She made a sudden move to avoid the obstacle.
The film's ending was deeply moving.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự di chuyển; phong trào; chủ nghĩa
eng_explanation: movement (n): an act or process of changing position or direction; a group of people with shared beliefs.
example: The movement of the tectonic plates caused the earthquake.
The civil rights movement fought for equality.
The dancer's graceful movement captivated the audience.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phim (ảnh)
eng_explanation: movie (n): a film shown in a cinema or on television.
example: They went to the movie theater to see the latest blockbuster.
She loves watching romantic movies.
The movie was a critical and commercial success.

vn_meaning: danh từ: âm nhạc; nghệ thuật phối hợp âm thanh.
eng_explanation: n. Vocal or instrumental sounds organized in time (art form).
example: I love listening to classical music.
The concert featured a variety of musical styles.
Music can evoke strong emotions.

vn_meaning: tính từ: có liên quan đến âm nhạc; có tài năng ca hát hoặc chơi nhạc cụ.
eng_explanation: adj. Relating to music; having a good voice or skill in music.
example: She starred in a musical production of 'Hamilton'.
He has a musical ear and can play many instruments.
The play was a delightful musical comedy.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhạc công; người chơi nhạc cụ hoặc hát.
eng_explanation: n. A person who plays a musical instrument or sings.
example: He is a talented musician who plays the piano.
The band consisted of four musicians.
She aspires to become a professional musician.

vn_meaning: động từ khiếm khuyết: phải; cần phải; buộc phải. danh từ: thứ cần có, điều cần thiết.
eng_explanation: modal v. Expresses obligation or necessity; n. something essential.
example: You must finish your homework before watching TV.
It is a must to wear a seatbelt while driving.
This book is a must-read for all history buffs.

vn_meaning: tính từ: chung, lẫn nhau; có qua có lại.
eng_explanation: adj. Existing or felt by both sides; shared.
example: They have a mutual respect for each other.
The agreement was to their mutual benefit.
They share a mutual friend.

vn_meaning: tính từ sở hữu: của tôi.
eng_explanation: possessive pron. Belonging to me.
example: This is my car.
My favorite color is blue.
My family is very important to me.

vn_meaning: đại từ phản thân: bản thân tôi; chính tôi.
eng_explanation: pron. Used to refer back to the speaker (reflexive/intensive).
example: I did it myself.
He blamed himself for the mistake.
She treated herself to a spa day.

vn_meaning: tính từ: bí ẩn; khó hiểu; gây tò mò.
eng_explanation: adj. Difficult or impossible to understand, explain, or identify.
example: The old house had a mysterious atmosphere.
The disappearance of the ship remains a mystery.
She has a mysterious smile.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bí ẩn; điều bí mật; sự khó hiểu.
eng_explanation: n. Something that is difficult or impossible to understand.
example: The detective solved the mystery of the stolen jewels.
Life is full of mysteries.
The novel is a gripping mystery thriller.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thần thoại; câu chuyện truyền thuyết; niềm tin sai lầm.
eng_explanation: n. A traditional story, especially one concerning the early history of a people.
example: Greek mythology is full of fascinating stories.
The myth of the Loch Ness Monster persists.
It's just a myth; it's not true.

vn_meaning: Một loại vật liệu làm đẹp, thường dùng để làm đẹp da và tóc; một loại đồ trang sức nhỏ.
eng_explanation: A cosmetic material used for beauty and hair treatment; a small jewelry item.
example: I need a new nail polish.
She wore a beautiful nail necklace.
The nail salon offers a wide range of services.

vn_meaning: Không che chắn, không được bảo vệ; không mặc quần áo.
eng_explanation: Not covered or protected; not wearing clothing.
example: He was naked in the snow.
She was naked after the accident.
The children were naked in the garden.

vn_meaning: Tên, danh tính, tên gọi.
eng_explanation: A name, identity, or title.
example: What is your name?
I don't know her name.
The name of the company is important.

vn_meaning: Chỉ định, bao gồm.
eng_explanation: To designate or include.
example: We need to consider the following: namely, the budget.
He is a member of the nation, namely, the United States.
The company offers a range of products, namely, electronics.

vn_meaning: Một câu chuyện, một tác phẩm văn học.
eng_explanation: A story, a literary work.
example: I'm reading a captivating narrative.
The film is a complex narrative.
She wrote a beautiful narrative about her childhood.

vn_meaning: Hẹp, giới hạn, nhỏ.
eng_explanation: Narrow, limited, or small.
example: The road was narrow and winding.
The city is narrow and crowded.
He has a narrow perspective on life.

vn_meaning: Không tốt, độc hại, khó chịu.
eng_explanation: Unpleasant, harmful, or irritating.
example: The food was very nasty.
He had a nasty cold.
The situation was nasty and tense.

vn_meaning: Một quốc gia, một quốc gia.
eng_explanation: A country, a nation.
example: The nation celebrated its independence.
The country is known for its rich history.
The nation's economy is growing.

vn_meaning: Liên quan đến quốc gia, liên quan đến quốc gia.
eng_explanation: Related to a country, related to a nation.
example: The national anthem is played every year.
The national identity is important.
The national policy is controversial.

vn_meaning: toàn quốc
eng_explanation: Across the entire country.
example: The new law will be nationwide.
The company's products are nationwide.
The campaign will be nationwide.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người bản xứ; tính từ: bản xứ; (văn học) bản thảo
eng_explanation: adj. indigenous; n. a person originating from a particular place.
example: The native people of the island have a rich culture.
He wrote a native manuscript on ancient history.
She is a native speaker of English.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tự nhiên; tính từ: tự nhiên; (vật lý) thuần túy
eng_explanation: adj. occurring in nature; n. the world as it is.
example: The natural beauty of the landscape was breathtaking.
He studied the natural causes of the disease.
Natural resources are essential for economic development.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: một cách tự nhiên; (văn học) đương nhiên
eng_explanation: adv. in a normal or expected way; adv. as a matter of course.
example: She laughed naturally when he told the joke.
It is naturally occurring in the environment.
He reacted naturally to the unexpected news.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tự nhiên; bản chất; tính cách; (thơ ca) cảnh sắc
eng_explanation: n. the physical world and its phenomena; n. inherent qualities.
example: The nature of the problem is complex.
He has a kind nature.
The beauty of nature is inspiring.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hải quân; (thuộc địa) thuộc về biển
eng_explanation: adj. relating to the navy; adj. maritime.
example: The naval base is located on the coast.
He served in the naval forces.
Naval operations are crucial for national security.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hướng dẫn đường đi; (thuỷ) điều khiển tàu
eng_explanation: n. the act or process of finding one's way; n. the art of steering a ship.
example: The navigation system helped them find the shortest route.
He is an expert in maritime navigation.
Modern navigation relies on GPS technology.

vn_meaning: danh từ: vùng lân cận; tính từ: gần
eng_explanation: adj. close in space or time; adj. adjacent.
example: The house is near the park.
He arrived near midnight.
They live near each other.

vn_meaning: tính từ: gần đó; (vùng lân cận)
eng_explanation: adj. close by; in the vicinity.
example: There is a restaurant nearby.
The hotel is located nearby the airport.
We found a nearby shop to buy some snacks.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: gần; (hầu)
eng_explanation: adv. almost; nearly.
example: It was nearly finished.
He nearly missed the train.
She nearly fell down.

vn_meaning: tính từ: gọn gàng; (văn bản) rõ ràng, dễ đọc
eng_explanation: adj. tidy and orderly; adj. clear and well-organized.
example: She kept her desk neat and organized.
He wrote a neat and legible letter.
The presentation was presented in a neat and concise manner.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: tất yếu, chắc chắn (diễn tả điều không thể tránh khỏi).
eng_explanation: adverb: inevitably; certainly; without exception.
example: It is not necessarily true that all cats like fish.
You don't necessarily have to finish all your food.
The results don't necessarily reflect the overall population.

vn_meaning: tính từ: cần thiết, bắt buộc (không thể thiếu); danh từ: sự cần thiết, sự bắt buộc.
eng_explanation: adj: required; essential; needed for a purpose.
example: It's necessary to wear a seatbelt in a car.
Having a valid passport is necessary for international travel.
Clean water is a necessary component of a healthy life.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự cần thiết, sự bắt buộc (điều kiện không thể thiếu).
eng_explanation: noun: the state of being required; a crucial need or requirement.
example: Out of necessity, they learned to live off the land.
The necessity of clean water cannot be overstated.
Due to financial necessity, she took on a second job.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cổ (cổ tay, cổ áo, cổ ngỗng); động từ: kẹp, bóp cổ.
eng_explanation: noun: the part of the body connecting the head to the torso; a narrow part.
example: She wore a beautiful necklace around her neck.
He strained his neck while sleeping.
The bottle has a long, thin neck.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhu cầu, sự cần thiết (điều cần để tồn tại hoặc hoạt động); động từ: cần, đòi hỏi.
eng_explanation: noun: requirement; lack of something; verb: to require; to be necessary.
example: I have a need for a new car.
The plants need water.
We need to finish this project by Friday.

vn_meaning: danh từ: kim (may, tiêm).
eng_explanation: noun: a small, slender tool with a point, used for sewing or injecting.
example: She used a needle and thread to mend the tear.
The doctor used a needle to administer the vaccine.
Be careful not to poke yourself with the needle.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tiêu cực, phủ định (không phải là tích cực); danh từ: kết quả âm tính (xét nghiệm).
eng_explanation: adj: unfavorable; pessimistic; not positive; noun: a result indicating absence.
example: He has a negative attitude towards change.
The test result was negative.
She gave a negative response to the proposal.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự bỏ bê, sự lơ là (không quan tâm, không chăm sóc); động từ: bỏ bê, lơ là.
eng_explanation: noun: failure to care for or attend to something; verb: to fail to care for.
example: The neglect of her health led to serious problems.
He neglected his duties as a parent.
Don't neglect your studies.

vn_meaning: động từ: thương lượng, đàm phán (cố gắng đạt được thỏa thuận).
eng_explanation: verb: to discuss and bargain in order to reach an agreement.
example: They are negotiating a new contract.
The union will negotiate with management.
We need to negotiate the terms of the deal.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự thương lượng, sự đàm phán (quá trình thương lượng).
eng_explanation: noun: the process of discussing and bargaining to reach an agreement.
example: The negotiation process was long and difficult.
They reached an agreement after several rounds of negotiation.
Successful negotiation requires patience and compromise.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: không bao giờ (diễn tả sự phủ định tuyệt đối về thời gian hoặc khả năng); tính từ: không bao giờ (ít dùng)
eng_explanation: adv.: at no time; not ever. (also, as an intensifier before adjectives/adverbs)
example: I have never been to Japan.
Never have I seen such a beautiful sunset.
He is never late.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: tuy nhiên, mặc dù vậy (diễn tả sự đối lập nhẹ nhàng hơn 'however')
eng_explanation: adv.: in spite of that; however. (formal)
example: It was raining; nevertheless, we went for a walk.
The task was difficult, nevertheless she completed it successfully.
He lost the game, nevertheless he remained optimistic.

vn_meaning: tính từ: mới (chưa từng có, chưa sử dụng); đặc biệt, gần đây; danh từ: tin tức mới (ít dùng)
eng_explanation: adj.: recently made, discovered, or created; not old. (also: fresh, unfamiliar)
example: She has a new car.
I read a new book yesterday.
There's a new restaurant downtown.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: mới đây, gần đây (thường đi với tính từ hoặc động từ phân từ quá khứ)
eng_explanation: adv.: recently; not long ago. (modifies verbs/adjectives)
example: She was newly appointed as the manager.
The newly built bridge is very impressive.
He is a newly married man.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tin tức, thông tin mới (về các sự kiện gần đây)
eng_explanation: n.: current events; reports of recent happenings. (uncountable)
example: I heard the news on the radio.
What's the latest news?
The news was very upsetting.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bản tin, thông tin định kỳ (gửi đến một nhóm người)
eng_explanation: n.: a regularly distributed bulletin, typically by email. (often promotional)
example: I subscribed to their monthly newsletter.
The company sends out a weekly newsletter to its employees.
Check the newsletter for updates on the event.

vn_meaning: danh từ: báo (ấn phẩm định kỳ, chứa tin tức, bài viết)
eng_explanation: n.: a printed publication containing news, information, and advertising.
example: I read the newspaper every morning.
The newspaper reported on the election results.
He works for a national newspaper.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tiếp theo, kế tiếp; trạng từ: sau đó, kế tiếp; danh từ: lần tiếp theo
eng_explanation: adj.: following in order; adv.: immediately after. (also n.: the following occasion)
example: What's your next appointment?
Next, we will discuss the budget.
I'll see you next week.

vn_meaning: giới từ: bên cạnh, sát cạnh
eng_explanation: prep.: immediately beside; adjacent to.
example: The library is next to the park.
She sat next to me at the concert.
Our house is next to the school.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tốt, dễ chịu, lịch sự, xinh xắn, đẹp
eng_explanation: adj.: pleasant; agreeable; kind. (general positive quality)
example: She is a very nice person.
It's a nice day today.
They have a nice house.

vn_meaning: Một lĩnh vực, một khu vực nhỏ, thường được sử dụng để chỉ một phần nhỏ của một lĩnh vực rộng lớn hơn.
eng_explanation: A specialized area or small segment of a broader field.
example: The niche market for organic skincare is growing rapidly.
She found a niche for her photography in the digital age.

vn_meaning: Buổi tối, thời gian sau khi mặt trời lặn.
eng_explanation: The evening or nighttime period.
example: The night is dark and quiet.
We went out for a night walk.

vn_meaning: Một giấc mơ kinh hoàng, thường là một giấc mơ có ý nghĩa hoặc có thể gây ra sự sợ hãi.
eng_explanation: A terrifying dream, often with a symbolic or frightening meaning.
example: He was haunted by his nightmares.
The story of the princess was a nightmare for the villagers.

vn_meaning: Chín, số 9.
eng_explanation: Nine.
example: We need nine more students for the class.
He's a nine-time champion in the sport.

vn_meaning: 19, mười tám.
eng_explanation: Nineteen.
example: The company announced a 19% increase in profits.
He's a nineteen-year-old student.

vn_meaning: 90, mười lăm.
eng_explanation: Ninety.
example: The company's profits reached ninety million dollars.
He's a ninety-year-old man.

vn_meaning: Không, không có.
eng_explanation: No.
example: I don't have any money.
He said no to her invitation.

vn_meaning: Không ai, không có ai.
eng_explanation: No one.
example: The police searched for no one.
She felt no one was there to comfort her.

vn_meaning: Độc lập, cao quý, có phẩm chất tốt đẹp.
eng_explanation: Independent, noble, possessing good qualities.
example: He was a noble warrior.
The king was a noble ruler.

vn_meaning: Không ai, không có ai.
