eng_explanation: No one.
example: There was nobody left at the party.
He saw nobody in the crowd.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cái gật đầu; động từ: gật đầu
eng_explanation: Verb: To give a slight movement of the head, typically as a sign of agreement or acknowledgment.
example: He nodded in agreement.
She gave a small nod to the waiter.
I nodded politely to the passing stranger.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tiếng ồn; tính từ: ồn ào
eng_explanation: Noun: Unwanted or disruptive sound. Adjective: Loud and unpleasant.
example: The city was filled with noise.
Turn down the noise from the television.
He made a lot of noise when he fell.

vn_meaning: tính từ: ồn ào; ồn; ồn ào
eng_explanation: Adjective: Making or characterized by loud or disruptive sounds.
example: The baby was being noisy.
The noisy street was difficult to sleep in.
He had a noisy car.

vn_meaning: động từ: đề cử; đề xuất
eng_explanation: Verb: To formally propose someone as a candidate for a position or award.
example: The committee will nominate a new president.
She was nominated for the scholarship.
He nominated his friend for the role.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đề cử; ứng cử
eng_explanation: Noun: The act of nominating someone.  Also, the proposed candidate.
example: Her nomination was a surprise to everyone.
The political nomination process is complex.
He received several nominations for the award.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ứng cử viên
eng_explanation: Noun: A person nominated for an election or award.
example: She is a strong nominee for the position.
The nominee gave a speech at the convention.
He was a respected nominee for the prize.

vn_meaning: tính từ: phi lợi nhuận
eng_explanation: Adjective: Not operated for profit; organized to benefit others.
example: The organization is a non-profit charity.
They run a non-profit hospital.
Non-profit organizations rely on donations.

vn_meaning: danh từ: không có cái gì; tính từ: không
eng_explanation: Noun: The absence of something. Adjective: Not any; none at all.
example: There were none left.
I have none of your books.
None of the students passed the exam.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: dù vậy; bất chấp
eng_explanation: Adverb: Despite this; even so.
example: It was raining; nonetheless, we went for a walk.
She was tired; nonetheless, she continued to work.
The evidence was weak; nonetheless, the jury found him guilty.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lời nói vô nghĩa; sự vô nghĩa
eng_explanation: Noun: Utterance or behavior that makes no sense.  Also, a lack of sense or meaning.
example: He spoke a lot of nonsense.
The instructions were full of nonsense.
There's no sense in arguing with him; it's just nonsense.

vn_meaning: danh từ: buổi trưa (thời gian); tính từ: trưa (về thời gian)
eng_explanation: noun: midday; the middle of the day. adjective: relating to midday.
example: The sun is at its highest point at noon.
We usually eat lunch at noon.
It was a beautiful, sunny noon.

vn_meaning: liên từ: cũng không; nối tiếp sau một từ ngữ phủ định
eng_explanation: conjunction: neither; used to introduce a negative statement following a previous one.
example: I don't like coffee, nor do I like tea.
He isn't coming, nor is she.
She can't swim, nor can he.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tiêu chuẩn; mức độ bình thường; quy tắc chung
eng_explanation: noun: a standard, level, or pattern of behavior or things.
example: The new policy is a departure from the norm.
He's above average, but not significantly outside the norm.
It's the norm to tip in restaurants.

vn_meaning: tính từ: bình thường; theo tiêu chuẩn; không đặc biệt
eng_explanation: adjective: usual, typical, or expected; not abnormal.
example: Her temperature is now normal.
He has a normal appetite.
It's normal to feel nervous before a test.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: thường lệ; thông thường; bình thường
eng_explanation: adverb: usually; in a typical or usual way.
example: I normally take the bus to work.
She normally goes to bed at 10 pm.
Normally, we would be at the beach this time of year.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phía bắc; tính từ: phía bắc
eng_explanation: noun: the direction opposite to south. adjective: towards the north.
example: We drove north for several hours.
The north wind is blowing.
The North Pole is a very cold place.

vn_meaning: tính từ: phía bắc; thuộc về phía bắc
eng_explanation: adjective: located in or facing north; relating to the north.
example: The northern lights are a beautiful sight.
He grew up in a northern town.
Northern Europe is generally colder than Southern Europe.

vn_meaning: danh từ: mũi
eng_explanation: noun: the part of the face above the mouth.
example: He has a broken nose.
She sniffed the flowers with her nose.
The dog's nose was cold.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: không; phủ định
eng_explanation: adverb: used to negate or contradict.
example: I am not going to the party.
He did not finish his homework.
It is not easy to learn a new language.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đáng chú ý; đáng kể; nổi bật
eng_explanation: adjective: worthy of attention; remarkable.
example: She is a notable scientist.
The company reported notable profits.
It was a notable achievement.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tháng Mười Một
eng_explanation: n. The eleventh month of the year. (Nov)
example: Her birthday is in November.
The leaves change color beautifully in November.
November is often a cold and windy month.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: bây giờ; ngay bây giờ; lúc này; từ nay về sau
eng_explanation: adv. At the present time; immediately. (time)
example: I'm busy now, can I call you later?
Now is the time to act.
From now on, I will try my best.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: ngày nay; hiện nay; dạo này
eng_explanation: adv. In the present time; currently. (time)
example: Nowadays, many people use smartphones.
Life is much faster nowadays.
Nowadays, it's important to be adaptable.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: không ở đâu; chẳng nơi nào
eng_explanation: adv. In or to no place; not anywhere. (place)
example: I looked for my keys everywhere, but they were nowhere to be found.
Nowhere is safe from the storm.
There was nowhere to hide.

vn_meaning: tính từ: hạt nhân; thuộc về hạt nhân; liên quan đến năng lượng hạt nhân
eng_explanation: adj. Relating to the nucleus of an atom; powered by nuclear energy. (science)
example: Nuclear energy is a controversial topic.
The country has a nuclear arsenal.
Nuclear medicine is used to diagnose and treat diseases.

vn_meaning: danh từ: số; số lượng; bản tin; bài hát; số báo; tính từ: có số; đánh số
eng_explanation: n. A quantity; a mathematical value. v. To count or assign a number. (math)
example: What's your phone number?
The number of students in the class is 25.
Please number the pages of your essay.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đông đảo; nhiều; vô số
eng_explanation: adj. Very many; a large amount. (quantity)
example: There were numerous complaints about the service.
Numerous studies have shown the benefits of exercise.
The museum contains numerous artifacts.

vn_meaning: danh từ: y tá; người chăm sóc; động từ: chăm sóc, điều dưỡng
eng_explanation: n. A healthcare professional who cares for patients. v. To care for someone sick. (healthcare)
example: The nurse was very kind and helpful.
She nursed her grandmother back to health.
He is training to be a nurse.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhà trẻ; vườn ươm; phòng trẻ
eng_explanation: n. A room for babies or young children; a place where plants are grown. (childcare/gardening)
example: She decorated the nursery in pastel colors.
The nursery sells a wide variety of plants.
My daughter attends the local nursery school.

vn_meaning: tính từ: cho con bú; điều dưỡng; danh từ: việc điều dưỡng, chăm sóc
eng_explanation: adj. Relating to the care of babies or the sick. n. The profession of caring for the sick. (healthcare)
example: She is a nursing mother.
He is studying nursing at university.
The nursing home provides excellent care for the elderly.

vn_meaning: Một loại hạt dinh dưỡng, thường được ăn như một món ăn nhẹ.
eng_explanation: A small, edible seed, commonly eaten as a snack.
example: I need to eat a nut for energy.
She enjoys eating walnuts daily.

vn_meaning: Sức khỏe, sự phát triển của cơ thể, và các yếu tố ảnh hưởng đến sức khỏe.
eng_explanation: The science of how the body functions and how to maintain health.
example: Proper nutrition is essential for a healthy life.
She focuses on nutrition to improve her well-being.

vn_meaning: Thời gian, giờ.
eng_explanation: The time at which something happens or is due.
example: What time is it o'clock?
The meeting is scheduled for 3 o'clock.

vn_meaning: Béo phì, tình trạng thừa cân.
eng_explanation: A condition characterized by excessive body fat.
example: He is at risk of obesity due to a poor diet.
The government is trying to combat obesity through education.

vn_meaning: Tuân theo, làm theo mệnh lệnh.
eng_explanation: To comply with a rule or command.
example: The soldiers obeyed the orders without question.
She must obey her parents.

vn_meaning: Đối tượng, vật thể.
eng_explanation: Something that can be seen, touched, or manipulated.
example: The cat is an object of affection.
He studied the object of his interest.

vn_meaning: Phản đối, khiếu nại.
eng_explanation: A disagreement or criticism.
example: There was an objection to the new policy.
She raised an objection to the proposed changes.

vn_meaning: Mục tiêu, mục đích, quan điểm.
eng_explanation: A specific goal or aim.
example: The objective of the project is to increase sales.
He has a clear objective for his career.

vn_meaning: Nhiệm vụ, nghĩa vụ, trách nhiệm.
eng_explanation: A requirement or duty.
example: She felt an obligation to help her friend.
The company has an obligation to pay its employees.

vn_meaning: Động từ, yêu cầu, buộc.
eng_explanation: To require or compel someone to do something.
example: He obliged the waiter for a drink.
The company obliged the workers overtime.

vn_meaning: danh từ: quan sát; nhận xét (dựa trên quan sát); sự quan sát (khi có mục đích cụ thể)
eng_explanation: Noun: An act of noticing or perceiving something.  It can also refer to a recorded fact.
example: The scientist made careful observations of the plant's growth.
Her observation of the market trends helped her make a profitable investment.
Detailed observations are crucial for accurate scientific research.

vn_meaning: động từ: quan sát; chú ý; tuân theo (luật lệ, quy tắc)
eng_explanation: Verb: To watch carefully; to pay attention to something.  Can also mean to follow rules.
example: I observe the birds in my garden every morning.
Please observe the speed limit while driving.
He observed a strict code of conduct at the conference.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người quan sát; người theo dõi
eng_explanation: Noun: A person who watches or records events, often for a specific purpose.
example: The observer noted the unusual behavior of the animal.
A team of observers will monitor the election results.
She became a wildlife observer after retiring.

vn_meaning: động từ: ám ảnh; ám ảnh (về một điều gì đó)
eng_explanation: Verb: To become preoccupied with something to the point of obsession.
example: He became obsessed with completing the puzzle.
She was obsessed with losing weight.
Don't obsess over small mistakes; learn from them.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự ám ảnh; niềm đam mê (quá mức)
eng_explanation: Noun: An intense and consuming preoccupation with something.
example: His obsession with collecting stamps filled his entire house.
Her obsession with social media consumed her free time.
She had an obsession with cleanliness.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chướng ngại vật; trở ngại; rào cản
eng_explanation: Noun: Something that blocks or prevents progress.
example: The steep hill was a major obstacle to the hikers.
Lack of funding is a significant obstacle to the project.
Overcoming obstacles is key to achieving your goals.

vn_meaning: động từ: có được; thu được; nhận được
eng_explanation: Verb: To acquire or get something.
example: I need to obtain a passport before traveling abroad.
She obtained a scholarship to study at a prestigious university.
He obtained information from a confidential source.

vn_meaning: tính từ: hiển nhiên; rõ ràng; dễ thấy
eng_explanation: Adjective: Easily seen or understood; apparent.
example: It's obvious that he's tired.
The solution to the problem is obvious once you understand the rules.
The connection between the two events is obvious.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: hiển nhiên; rõ ràng; không cần phải nói
eng_explanation: Adverb: Clearly; evidently.
example: Obviously, you need to study harder.
It's obviously going to rain today.
He obviously enjoyed the party.

vn_meaning: danh từ: dịp; thời điểm; sự kiện
eng_explanation: Noun: A particular event or time.
example: We celebrated her birthday on a special occasion.
The annual conference is a valuable occasion for networking.
He had a chance encounter on a random occasion.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thỉnh thoảng (tần suất không thường xuyên); danh từ: dịp đặc biệt, sự kiện không thường xuyên.
eng_explanation: Adjective: happening sometimes but not often; infrequent. Noun: an infrequent event.
example: I enjoy the occasional cup of tea.
She has an occasional headache.
We had an occasional visitor to our house.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: thỉnh thoảng, đôi khi.
eng_explanation: Adverb: from time to time; on infrequent occasions.
example: I occasionally visit my parents.
The train occasionally runs late.
We occasionally eat out.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nghề nghiệp, công việc; sự chiếm giữ (vùng đất, tòa nhà).
eng_explanation: Noun: a person's job or profession; the activity that someone does to earn money.
example: What is your occupation?
He lost his occupation during the recession.
The occupation of the building was peaceful.

vn_meaning: động từ: chiếm giữ; ở tại, sinh sống tại.
eng_explanation: Verb: to live in or take control of a place.
example: The soldiers occupied the town.
I occupy a small apartment in the city.
The building is currently occupied by several businesses.

vn_meaning: động từ: xảy ra, diễn ra.
eng_explanation: Verb: to take place; to happen.
example: The accident occurred yesterday.
These problems often occur during the winter.
The event will occur next week.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự xảy ra, sự kiện.
eng_explanation: Noun: an event or incident that takes place.
example: The occurrence of the earthquake caused widespread damage.
This is a rare occurrence.
We documented every occurrence of the error.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đại dương.
eng_explanation: Noun: a very large expanse of sea, covering most of the earth's surface.
example: The ocean is full of life.
We sailed across the ocean.
The view of the ocean was breathtaking.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tháng Mười.
eng_explanation: Noun: the tenth month of the year.
example: My birthday is in October.
We visited the farm in October.
The leaves change color in October.

vn_meaning: tính từ: kỳ lạ, khác thường; lẻ (số).; danh từ: thứ kỳ lạ, đồ vật nhỏ.
eng_explanation: Adjective: strange or peculiar; not even. Noun: a strange or unusual thing.
example: That's an odd smell.
He has an odd number of socks.
I found an odd object in the garden.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tỷ lệ cược; khả năng (không chắc chắn).
eng_explanation: Noun: the ratio of chances of one event occurring versus another; a disadvantage.
example: The odds of winning the lottery are very low.
We were against the odds.
He bet against the odds.

vn_meaning: tính từ: chính thức, chính quyền (ví dụ: quan chức); danh từ: người có chức vụ, giấy tờ chính thức
eng_explanation: adj. relating to an authority or public body; n. a person holding a position of authority. (PoS: adj, n)
example: The company issued an official statement.
He is a high-ranking government official.
We need to see your official documents.

vn_meaning: danh từ: con cái, sản phẩm của sự sinh sản
eng_explanation: n. a person's child or children; the product of reproduction. (PoS: n)
example: The lioness protected her offspring.
They are proud of their offspring's achievements.
The care of offspring is crucial for survival.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: thường xuyên, hay
eng_explanation: adv. frequently; on many occasions. (PoS: adv)

vn_meaning: thán từ: ồ, à (diễn tả sự ngạc nhiên, hiểu ra, đau đớn)
eng_explanation: interj. expressing surprise, understanding, or pain. (PoS: interj)
example: Oh, I didn't realize that!
Oh dear, what have I done?
Oh, that feels good.

vn_meaning: danh từ: dầu (ăn, đốt, bôi trơn); động từ: bôi dầu
eng_explanation: n. a viscous liquid derived from petroleum; v. to apply oil. (PoS: n, v)
example: We need to change the oil in the car.
Olive oil is a healthy fat.
He oiled the hinges to stop the squeaking.

vn_meaning: tính từ/trạng từ/thán từ: ổn, được, đồng ý
eng_explanation: adj./adv./interj. satisfactory; acceptable; expressing agreement. (PoS: adj, adv, interj)
example: OK, let's start the meeting.
Are you OK?
That's OK, don't worry about it.

vn_meaning: tính từ: già, cũ, lâu đời
eng_explanation: adj. having lived for a long time; no longer new. (PoS: adj)

They are old friends.

vn_meaning: tính từ: lỗi thời, cổ điển
eng_explanation: adj. not modern; belonging to an earlier time. (PoS: adj)
example: She wears old-fashioned clothes.
He has some old-fashioned ideas.
The house was decorated in an old-fashioned style.

vn_meaning: giới từ: trên, về, đang (ví dụ: trên bàn, về chủ đề, đang xem); trạng từ: tiếp tục, bật (ví dụ: mở máy)
eng_explanation: prep. supported by; relating to; adv. continuing; activated. (PoS: prep, adv)
example: The book is on the table.
The meeting is on Monday.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: một lần, xưa kia
eng_explanation: adv. one time; formerly. (PoS: adv)

Once you start, it's hard to stop.

vn_meaning: một, duy nhất
eng_explanation: A single unit or instance.

vn_meaning: dài hơi, liên tục
eng_explanation: Continuing or lasting for a period of time.
example: This project is ongoing.
The discussion is ongoing.

vn_meaning: cà rốt
eng_explanation: A bulbous, red-skinned vegetable.

vn_meaning: trực tuyến, qua mạng
eng_explanation: Accessible and functioning over a network.
example: I can access the website online.
The meeting is online.

vn_meaning: chỉ, duy nhất
eng_explanation: Refers to a single instance or item.

vn_meaning: vào, lên
eng_explanation: To move or go towards.
example: Please go onto the bus.

vn_meaning: mở, cho phép
eng_explanation: To allow access or entry.
example: The door is open.

vn_meaning: cửa mở, sự mở
eng_explanation: The act of opening a door or window.
example: The sun is shining through the opening.

vn_meaning: opera, âm nhạc
eng_explanation: A musical composition with multiple vocal parts.
example: She loves to listen to opera.

vn_meaning: động từ: điều khiển; hoạt động; thực hiện (một công việc); (về y học) phẫu thuật
eng_explanation: verb (V): To control or direct; to perform an action or task; (medically) to surgically intervene.
example: The CEO will operate the company's new strategy.
The surgeon operated on the patient's broken leg.
He operates a small bakery downtown.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cuộc phẫu thuật; hoạt động; quá trình; biện pháp
eng_explanation: noun (N): A surgical procedure; an activity; a process; a measure.
example: She underwent a successful heart operation.
The company launched a marketing operation.

vn_meaning: tính từ: có chức năng; hoạt động; sẵn sàng làm việc; liên quan đến hoạt động
eng_explanation: adjective (Adj): Functioning; active; ready for use; related to operations.
example: The new system is fully operational.
The company’s operational costs are rising.
He is an operational manager.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người điều khiển; người vận hành; người làm việc (máy móc, thiết bị)
eng_explanation: noun (N): A person who controls or operates something; an employee.
example: The train operator announced a delay.
The computer operator monitored the system.
He is a radio operator.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ý kiến; quan điểm; cảm xúc; cảm nhận
eng_explanation: noun (N): A belief or judgment; a feeling; a perception.
example: It’s important to respect other people’s opinions.
She has a strong opinion about politics.
His opinion changed after hearing the evidence.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đối thủ; người phản đối; kẻ chống đối
eng_explanation: noun (N): A rival; someone who opposes; an adversary.

The opponent argued against the proposal.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cơ hội; dịp; thời cơ
eng_explanation: noun (N): A favorable occasion or circumstance; a chance.
example: This is a great opportunity for career advancement.

The company is looking for new opportunities.

vn_meaning: động từ: phản đối; chống đối; chống lại
eng_explanation: verb (V): To be against; to resist; to counteract.
example: I oppose the new law.
He opposed her decision.
The team opposed the opponent's strategy.

vn_meaning: tính từ: phản đối; chống đối; ngược lại; khác biệt
eng_explanation: adjective (Adj): Against; opposing; different.
example: He was opposed to the idea.
They have opposed each other for years.
The two sides are opposed on the issue.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đối diện; ngược; trái ngược; khác biệt
eng_explanation: adjective (Adj): Facing; contrasting; different.
example: The opposite of hot is cold.
They live on the opposite side of the street.
Their views are completely opposite.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự phản đối (chính trị, ý kiến); đối lập (tính chất); đối thủ (thể thao)
eng_explanation: noun: resistance or objection to something; an opposing group or force.
example: The opposition party criticized the government's new policy.
There's a strong opposition to the proposed development.
Our team faced fierce opposition from the defending champions.

vn_meaning: động từ: chọn (lựa chọn); quyết định
eng_explanation: verb: to choose or select something; to decide.
example: I opted for the vegetarian meal.
She decided to opt out of the project.
You can opt to receive email updates.

vn_meaning: tính từ: quang học; thuộc về mắt
eng_explanation: adjective: relating to optics or the eye; involving light and vision.
example: The optical illusion was very convincing.
He works in an optical shop.
The telescope has powerful optical lenses.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự lạc quan
eng_explanation: noun: hopefulness and confidence about the future or the success of something.

vn_meaning: tính từ: lạc quan
eng_explanation: adjective: hopeful and confident about the future.
example: She's an optimistic person who always sees the best in situations.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lựa chọn; quyền lựa chọn
eng_explanation: noun: a choice or possibility; the right to buy or sell something.
example: I have two options: stay or leave.
This contract gives me the option to renew.
Consider all your options before making a decision.

vn_meaning: liên từ: hoặc
eng_explanation: conjunction: used to present a choice between two possibilities.
example: Do you want tea or coffee?
You can pay by cash or credit card.

vn_meaning: tính từ: bằng miệng; liên quan đến miệng
eng_explanation: adjective: spoken rather than written; relating to the mouth.
example: The exam included an oral presentation.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cam (quả); màu da cam; tính từ: màu da cam
eng_explanation: noun: a citrus fruit; a color; adjective: of the color orange.
example: I bought a bag of oranges at the market.
She wore an orange dress.
The sunset was a beautiful shade of orange.

vn_meaning: danh từ: dàn nhạc
eng_explanation: noun: a large instrumental ensemble, typically including strings, woodwinds, brass, and percussion.
example: The orchestra performed a stunning rendition of Beethoven's Symphony.

The concert featured a renowned orchestra from Europe.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nguồn gốc; xuất xứ; cội nguồn (của một sự vật, hiện tượng, dòng họ).
eng_explanation: n. The point or way in which something begins; ancestry. (n)
example: The origin of the river is in the mountains.

vn_meaning: tính từ: gốc; nguyên bản; đầu tiên; độc đáo, không bắt chước. danh từ: bản gốc; bản thảo.
eng_explanation: adj. First; not a copy; unique. (adj); n. The first version of something. (n)

vn_meaning: trạng từ: ban đầu; lúc đầu; vốn là.
eng_explanation: adv. At the beginning; in the original form. (adv)

vn_meaning: động từ: bắt nguồn từ; khởi nguồn từ; nảy sinh từ.
eng_explanation: v. To come into being or existence; to start. (v)
example: The custom originates from ancient traditions.

vn_meaning: tính từ: khác; còn lại; những người khác. đại từ: những người khác. danh từ: người khác.

She cares about other people's feelings.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: nếu không; bằng không; nếu không thì.
eng_explanation: adv. In a different way; or else. (adv)

vn_meaning: động từ khiếm khuyết: nên; phải (diễn tả nghĩa vụ, lời khuyên).
eng_explanation: modal v. Used to express duty or obligation; should. (v)
example: You ought to apologize for your behavior.
We ought to help those in need.

vn_meaning: tính từ sở hữu: của chúng ta.
eng_explanation: possessive adj. Belonging to us. (adj)
example: This is our house.
Our team won the game.
What are our plans for the weekend?

vn_meaning: đại từ sở hữu: của chúng ta.
eng_explanation: possessive pron. Belonging to us. (pron)

vn_meaning: đại từ phản thân: tự chúng ta; chính chúng ta. đại từ nhấn mạnh: chính chúng ta.
eng_explanation: pron. Used to refer back to the speaker(s). (pron)
example: We made it ourselves.
Help yourselves to the food.
They found themselves in a difficult situation.

vn_meaning: ra ngoài
eng_explanation: It refers to movement or separation, often implying removal or absence.
example: The storm caused an outbreak of wildfires.
The team's performance was a major outcome of the training.

vn_meaning: bùng phát
eng_explanation: It describes a rapid and widespread occurrence of a problem, often involving illness or chaos.
example: A sudden outbreak of flu swept through the city.
The outbreak of the virus caused widespread panic.

vn_meaning: kết quả
eng_explanation: It signifies the final result or consequence of an event or action.
example: The outcome of the election was a landslide victory for the incumbent.
The outcome of the experiment was unexpected.

vn_meaning: ngoài trời
eng_explanation: It describes something that is situated or situated in an outdoor environment.
example: We enjoyed an outdoor picnic in the park.
The building is designed for outdoor use.

vn_meaning: ngoài trời
eng_explanation: It refers to a place where people can be free to move and experience the natural environment.
example: We spent the afternoon relaxing outdoors.
The children played freely outdoors.

vn_meaning: bên ngoài
eng_explanation: It describes the edge or boundary of something, often referring to its outer appearance.
example: The house had an outer wall made of brick.
The jacket was made of a durable outer fabric.

vn_meaning: trang phục
eng_explanation: It refers to the clothes a person is wearing.
example: She chose an elegant outfit for the gala.
He wore a practical outfit for the hike.

vn_meaning: đi chơi
eng_explanation: It describes a planned journey or event, often involving recreation or sports.
example: The team had an outdoor outing to the lake.
The students participated in a sporting outing.

vn_meaning: cổng ra
eng_explanation: It signifies a place where a product is sold at a reduced price.
example: The store had an outlet to offer discounts on popular items.

vn_meaning: bản phác thảo
eng_explanation: It describes a basic plan or structure, often used for visual representation.
example: The project required an outline of the key steps.
The architect created an outline of the building's design.

vn_meaning: danh từ: quan điểm; tầm nhìn; dự báo (tương lai); tính từ: có triển vọng (tốt)
eng_explanation: Noun: a prospect or viewpoint; Adjective: promising or favorable.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sản phẩm; kết quả; đầu ra; tính từ: đầu ra (trong công nghiệp)

example: The factory's output increased significantly this year.
The software program's output is highly efficient.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự phẫn nộ; sự phẫn uất; sự phẫn động
eng_explanation: Noun: intense anger or indignation; a strong expression of disapproval.
example: The public reacted with outrage to the news of the scandal.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bên ngoài; khu vực bên ngoài; tính từ: bên ngoài; ngoài
eng_explanation: Adjective/Adverb: external; Noun: the area beyond boundaries.
example: He was sitting outside, enjoying the sunshine.
The package was delivered outside the building.
She lives outside the city.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người ngoài; người không thuộc nhóm; người xa lạ
eng_explanation: Noun: a person who is not part of a group or organization.

The company welcomed new outsiders to join their team.

vn_meaning: tính từ: xuất sắc; nổi bật; đặc biệt; vượt trội
eng_explanation: Adjective: remarkably good or impressive; standing out from others.
example: She is an outstanding student in her class.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lò nướng; bếp nướng
eng_explanation: Noun: a heated enclosed chamber used for baking or roasting.

The oven temperature needs to be carefully monitored.

vn_meaning: tính từ: trên; vượt quá; hoàn toàn; tính trạng: vượt qua; tính từ: (về thời gian) sau; tính từ: (về sự kiện) đã kết thúc
eng_explanation: Adverb/Preposition: above; beyond; completely; Noun: a period of time.
example: The bird flew over the house.
The price is over $100.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tổng thể; nhìn chung; toàn bộ; tính từ: (về trang phục) rộng rãi

example: The overall result was positive.
Let's consider the overall situation.
He wore an overall suit.

vn_meaning: động từ: vượt qua; chiến thắng; khắc phục; đánh bại
eng_explanation: Verb: to succeed in surmounting an obstacle or difficulty.
example: He overcame his fear of public speaking.
The company overcame significant challenges to succeed.
She overcame the odds and won the race.

vn_meaning: động từ: bỏ qua, không để ý (một điều gì đó); danh từ: tầm nhìn bao quát (từ một vị trí cao)

vn_meaning: trạng từ: quá mức, quá đáng
eng_explanation: adverb: excessively; to a greater degree than is necessary or desirable.

vn_meaning: giới từ: qua đêm; trạng từ: trong một đêm; tính từ: diễn ra trong một đêm

example: The package arrived overnight.

He became a millionaire overnight.

vn_meaning: giới từ: ra nước ngoài
eng_explanation: preposition: in or to another country; abroad.

vn_meaning: động từ: giám sát, trông coi
eng_explanation: verb: supervise; to watch and direct the progress of something.

vn_meaning: động từ: lật đổ, đảo ngược; danh từ: sự lật đổ
eng_explanation: verb: to knock over; to reverse a decision; noun: the act of overturning.
example: The truck overturned on the icy road.

vn_meaning: động từ: áp đảo, choáng ngợp
eng_explanation: verb: to defeat or overpower; to inundate with emotion or quantity.

vn_meaning: tính từ: áp đảo, quá lớn, quá mạnh
eng_explanation: adjective: very great in amount or intensity; overpowering.
example: The evidence was overwhelming.

The crowd was overwhelming.

vn_meaning: động từ: nợ
eng_explanation: verb: to be in debt; to have an obligation.
example: I owe you money.

vn_meaning: tính từ: của mình; động từ: sở hữu
eng_explanation: adjective: belonging to one; verb: to possess.
example: It's my own business.
I own a small company.
She owns several properties.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đau đớn (thể chất); khó chịu (tinh thần); gây đau khổ (sự kiện)
eng_explanation: adj. Causing physical or emotional suffering; distressing.
example: The injury was incredibly painful.

vn_meaning: động từ: sơn, vẽ; danh từ: sơn, màu vẽ
eng_explanation: v. To cover with color; n. A colored substance used for decoration.
example: She likes to paint landscapes.
The walls need a fresh coat of paint.
Oil paint is a popular medium.

vn_meaning: danh từ: họa sĩ; thợ sơn
eng_explanation: n. A person who paints, either professionally or as a hobby.
example: The famous painter created many masterpieces.
He hired a painter to decorate his house.
She aspires to be a professional painter.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bức tranh; nghề vẽ tranh
eng_explanation: n. The art of creating pictures with paint; a picture created with paint.
example: The museum displayed a beautiful painting.
She is studying painting at art school.
He collects antique paintings.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cặp, đôi; động từ: ghép đôi, kết hợp
eng_explanation: n. Two things used together; v. To combine or match two things.
example: She bought a pair of shoes.
They make a perfect pair.
Please pair the socks together.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cung điện, lâu đài
eng_explanation: n. A large, impressive official residence, especially of a ruler.
example: Buckingham Palace is the Queen's residence.
The palace was decorated with gold and jewels.
They visited the ancient palace ruins.

vn_meaning: tính từ: nhợt nhạt (màu sắc); tái mét (sắc mặt); yếu ớt (ánh sáng); danh từ: màu nhạt
eng_explanation: adj. Light in color or lacking intensity; n. A light shade.
example: She had a pale complexion.
The moonlight was pale and silvery.
He chose a pale blue color for the walls.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bàn tay; cây cọ
eng_explanation: n. The inner surface of the hand; a tropical tree with large leaves.
example: He held her palm in his hand.
Palm trees grow well in warm climates.
She read the lines on his palm.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chảo; vung; thung lũng; động từ: quay phim
eng_explanation: n. A shallow dish for cooking; v. To move a camera during filming.
example: She fried the eggs in a pan.
The camera panned across the landscape.
Gold was discovered in the pan.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tấm ván; bảng điều khiển; ủy ban
eng_explanation: n. A flat piece of wood or other material; a group of people.
example: The door was made of wooden panels.
He operated the controls on the control panel.
A panel of experts discussed the issue.

vn_meaning: hoảng loạn
eng_explanation: Panic is a sudden and intense feeling of fear and anxiety.
example: The computer crashed, causing a panic.
She experienced a panic attack during the presentation.
The sudden news triggered a panic in the community.

vn_meaning: quần
eng_explanation: ‘Pants’ are a type of trousers.
example: He needs to buy some new pants.
She wore comfortable pants to the movie.
The children were playing with their colorful pants.

vn_meaning: giấy
eng_explanation: Paper is a common writing and printing material.
example: I need to print this paper.
The artist used a large sheet of paper for the painting.
She wrote a letter on the paper.

vn_meaning: diễu hành
eng_explanation: A parade is a public display of a group of people or vehicles.
example: The city held a grand parade to celebrate the anniversary.
The marching band performed a spectacular parade.
The parade route was carefully planned to ensure safety.

vn_meaning: đoạn văn
eng_explanation: A paragraph is a section of a text.
example: Read the paragraph carefully to understand the main point.
The paragraph discussed the history of the city.
Write a paragraph to summarize the article.

vn_meaning: song song
eng_explanation: Parallel means happening simultaneously.
example: The trains are running parallel to each other.
The two paths are parallel to the river.

vn_meaning: tham số
eng_explanation: A parameter is a value that is passed into a function.

The program uses the parameter to calculate the result.
The user input is a parameter for the application.

vn_meaning: cha mẹ
eng_explanation: ‘Parent’ is a term for a person who raises children.
example: The children are under the care of their parents.
She is a loving parent to her children.
The parents provided a warm meal for the guests.

vn_meaning: của cha mẹ
eng_explanation: ‘Parental’ describes the relationship between parents and children.
example: The parental advice was helpful.
The children were raised by loving parents.
The family's parental values are important.

vn_meaning: a small rural community.
eng_explanation: A parish is a rural community.
example: The parish church is a historic landmark.
The parish residents are known for their strong community spirit.
The parish held a religious festival.

vn_meaning: danh từ: công viên; danh từ: chỗ đỗ xe; tính từ: công cộng (về công viên)
eng_explanation: Noun: a public garden or recreation area. Adjective: publicly accessible.
example: We went for a walk in the park.
I parked my car in the park.
The park is beautiful in the springtime.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chỗ đỗ xe; danh từ: việc đỗ xe
eng_explanation: Noun: the act or process of parking a vehicle; a designated area for parking.
example: There is limited parking available at the stadium.
I need to find a parking spot downtown.
The parking fee is $5.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nghị viện; danh từ: hội đồng (của một tổ chức)
eng_explanation: Noun: a legislative assembly or council; a body of elected representatives.
example: The parliament debated the new bill.
Members of parliament represent their constituents.
The parliament building is historic.

vn_meaning: danh từ: liên quan đến nghị viện; tính từ: thuộc về nghị viện
eng_explanation: Adjective: relating to or characteristic of a parliament; governmental.
example: The parliamentary debate was lively.
He is a parliamentary advisor.
Parliamentary procedure governs the meetings.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phần; danh từ: một phần; danh từ: bộ phận; tính từ: một phần
eng_explanation: Noun: a section or portion. Adjective: representing a fraction of a whole.
example: I only ate part of the cake.
This is just a small part of the problem.
The part of the engine failed.

vn_meaning: danh từ: làm bán thời gian; tính từ: bán thời gian
eng_explanation: Adjective/Noun: working or done for fewer than full hours; a job requiring part-time work.
example: She works part-time at a coffee shop.
He’s looking for a part-time job.
Part-time students often have flexible schedules.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự thiên vị; tính từ: một phần; tính từ: hơi (về nhiệt độ, hương vị)
eng_explanation: Adjective: showing a preference or bias. Noun: a degree or amount.
example: He has a partiality for classical music.
The survey showed a partial agreement among respondents.
The wine had a partial sweetness.

vn_meaning: tính từ: một phần; tính từ: hơi (về mức độ)
eng_explanation: Adverb: to some extent; partially completed or affected.
example: The building is partially damaged.
He was partially correct in his assessment.
The road is partially blocked.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người tham gia; danh từ: người hưởng lợi
eng_explanation: Noun: a person taking part in an activity or event.
example: She was a participant in the conference.
Many participants enjoyed the workshop.
The participant's feedback was valuable.

vn_meaning: động từ: tham gia; động từ: hưởng lợi
eng_explanation: Verb: to take part in an activity or event; to benefit from something.
example: I want to participate in the volunteer program.
The company benefits from the participants' ideas.
He participated in the election.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự tham gia (hoạt động, sự kiện); sự góp mặt (trong một nhóm, tổ chức)
eng_explanation: noun: the act of taking part in something; involvement in an activity or event.
example: Her participation in the project was invaluable.
We encourage active participation from all students.
The level of public participation was surprisingly high.

vn_meaning: tính từ: cụ thể, riêng biệt; một vài (trong số nhiều); trạng từ: đặc biệt, cụ thể
eng_explanation: adj: specific; relating to one thing; adv: specifically, in a certain way.
example: I don't have any particular preference.
Can you be more particular about what you want?
This is a particular type of flower.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: đặc biệt, nhất là; cụ thể, rõ ràng
eng_explanation: adverb: especially; notably; specifically.
example: She was particularly pleased with the results.
The weather was particularly cold yesterday.
I'm particularly interested in learning more about this topic.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: một phần, bộ phận; một phần do, bởi
eng_explanation: adverb: to some extent; partially; in part.
example: The delay was partly due to bad weather.
I'm partly responsible for the mistake.
The success was partly a result of hard work.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bạn đồng hành, đối tác; người phối hợp (trong kinh doanh, thể thao); tính từ: hợp tác
eng_explanation: noun: a person who works with another; a business associate; adj: cooperative.
example: He is my business partner.
They are dance partners.
We need to find a reliable partner for this project.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự hợp tác, liên kết; mối quan hệ đối tác (kinh doanh)
eng_explanation: noun: a relationship between people or organizations; a business association.
example: They formed a successful partnership.
The partnership is based on mutual trust.
The company announced a new partnership with a local charity.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bữa tiệc; nhóm người, đảng phái; bên (trong tranh chấp)
eng_explanation: noun: a social gathering; a group of people with a common interest; a side in a dispute.
example: We're having a party on Saturday.
The political party won the election.
Both parties agreed to the terms of the contract.

vn_meaning: động từ: đi qua, vượt qua; vượt (kiểm tra, bài thi); cho phép, đồng ý; danh từ: tấm vé, giấy thông hành
eng_explanation: verb: to go through or over; to succeed in an exam; to allow; noun: a ticket or permit.
example: Please pass the salt.
She passed the driving test on her first try.
The law was passed last year.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đoạn văn, đoạn trích; hành trình, quãng đường
eng_explanation: noun: a short section of text; a journey or route.
example: I read a fascinating passage in the book.
The passage through the mountains was difficult.
The ship began its passage across the ocean.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hành khách
eng_explanation: noun: a person who is traveling in a vehicle.
example: The passenger was asleep during the flight.
All passengers are requested to fasten their seatbelts.
The train was carrying a large number of passengers.

vn_meaning: danh từ: con đường, lối đi (thường nhỏ, không trải nhựa); đường đi, hướng đi (ẩn dụ); quỹ đạo, lộ trình.
eng_explanation: n. a track or route; a course of action (fig.).
example: We followed a narrow path through the forest.
He chose a career path in medicine.
The satellite's path took it over the Pacific Ocean.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lối đi bộ, đường mòn; con đường dẫn đến (thành công, mục tiêu).
eng_explanation: n. a path or track, especially one made for walking; a means of achieving something.
example: A well-lit pathway led to the front door.
Education is the pathway to a brighter future.
The garden had a winding pathway through the roses.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự kiên nhẫn, nhẫn nại; lòng khoan dung.
eng_explanation: n. the capacity to accept or tolerate delay, trouble, or suffering without getting angry or upset.
example: Learning a new language requires patience and dedication.
Her patience with the children was remarkable.
He lost his patience and shouted.

vn_meaning: tính từ: kiên nhẫn, nhẫn nại; (y học) bệnh nhân; chịu đựng được.; danh từ: bệnh nhân.
eng_explanation: adj. able to accept or tolerate delays; n. a person receiving medical care.
example: She was a very patient teacher.
He is a patient in the hospital recovering from surgery.
The doctor examined the patient carefully.

vn_meaning: động từ: tuần tra, đi kiểm tra; danh từ: sự tuần tra, chuyến đi kiểm tra.
eng_explanation: v. to walk or ride around an area to maintain order; n. the act of patrolling.
example: The police patrol the streets at night.
A security patrol discovered the break-in.
The border patrol is responsible for controlling immigration.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người bảo trợ, người ủng hộ; khách hàng quen thuộc.
eng_explanation: n. a person who supports with money, gifts, or political influence; a regular customer.
example: The arts rely heavily on the support of patrons.
He was a loyal patron of the local theater.
The restaurant valued its regular patrons.

vn_meaning: danh từ: mẫu, kiểu; khuôn mẫu, thói quen; quy luật.; động từ: tạo mẫu, thiết kế.
eng_explanation: n. a recurring characteristic or design; v. to design or create a pattern.
example: The wallpaper has a floral pattern.
He noticed a pattern in her behavior.
The architect patterned the building after a traditional design.

vn_meaning: động từ: dừng lại, tạm ngừng; danh từ: sự dừng lại, tạm ngừng.
eng_explanation: v. to stop temporarily; n. a temporary stop or rest.
example: She paused to catch her breath.
There was a brief pause in the conversation.
He took a moment's pause before answering the question.

vn_meaning: động từ: trả tiền, thanh toán; trả giá, đền đáp; (pay attention) chú ý.
eng_explanation: v. to give money in exchange for goods or services; to give attention.
example: I need to pay the bills.
Please pay attention to what I'm saying.
He paid a high price for his mistake.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự thanh toán, khoản tiền trả.
eng_explanation: n. the act of paying; an amount of money paid.
example: The payment is due on the 15th of the month.
We received a payment for the services rendered.
She made a partial payment on her debt.

vn_meaning: Tránh chiến tranh, hòa bình; sự yên bình; sự không xung đột; sự hòa hợp; sự hợp tác; sự hợp tác.
eng_explanation: Peace refers to a state of tranquility and harmony, avoiding conflict and promoting cooperation.
example: The negotiations aimed to achieve a lasting peace.
A peaceful environment is essential for sustainable development.

vn_meaning: Có tính chất hòa bình, không có xung đột; bình yên, an toàn; không có tranh chấp.
eng_explanation: Peaceful describes a state of tranquility and harmony, free from conflict and disagreement.
example: The city is known for its peaceful atmosphere.
She felt peaceful and relaxed after the vacation.

vn_meaning: Đỉnh cao, điểm cao; đỉnh của một dãy núi, một con đường, một vật thể, hoặc một sự kiện.
eng_explanation: A peak represents the highest point or elevation of something.
example: The mountain peak was shrouded in mist.
The hikers reached a breathtaking peak of the mountain.

vn_meaning: Người nông dân; người làm việc trong nông vườn; người làm nông nghiệp.
eng_explanation: A peasant is a rural worker, typically involved in agriculture.
example: The farmer relied on the peasant for his crops.
The village was populated by a large peasant population.

vn_meaning: Đặc biệt, không bình thường; kỳ lạ; không thường thấy; không bình thường.
eng_explanation: Peculiar denotes something unusual or strange.
example: The old house had peculiar architectural features.
His behavior was peculiar and difficult to understand.

vn_meaning: Người đứng thứ hai trong một dòng dõi; người có quyền lực và ảnh hưởng trong một gia đình quý tộc.
eng_explanation: A peer is a member of a noble family, often holding a position of influence.
example: The king appointed a peer to represent the kingdom.
He was a respected peer in the community.

vn_meaning: Bút; một loại đồ dùng để viết.
eng_explanation: A pen is a writing instrument.
example: I used a pen to write my essay.
The writer used a fine pen to draw the picture.

vn_meaning: Phạt; hình phạt; hình phạt cho một hành vi vi phạm.
eng_explanation: A penalty is a punishment for breaking a rule or law.
example: The driver was fined for speeding.
The court imposed a heavy penalty on the offender.

vn_meaning: Bút chì; một loại bút viết.
eng_explanation: A pencil is a writing tool.
example: I used a pencil to draw the diagram.
The student used a pencil to take notes.

vn_meaning: Một đồng xu; một đơn vị tiền tệ nhỏ.
eng_explanation: A penny is a small coin.
example: I bought a penny for a souvenir.
The price of a penny is very low.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lương hưu; tính từ: liên quan đến lương hưu.
eng_explanation: Noun: A regular payment made to a person who is retired or elderly. Adjective: Relating to retirement benefits.
example: He receives a monthly pension from his former employer.
Many retirees rely on their pension for income.
The government is considering increasing the state pension.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người; danh từ: dân chúng.
eng_explanation: Noun: Human beings, generally considered as a group. Plural form of person.
example: The people of Vietnam are known for their hospitality.
Many people enjoy spending time outdoors.
The government needs to represent the interests of the people.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ớt; danh từ: tiêu (gia vị).
eng_explanation: Noun: A spicy fruit, often used as a seasoning. Also, black peppercorns, a spice.
example: She added some pepper to her soup for extra flavor.
Black pepper is a common ingredient in many cuisines.
He sprinkled pepper on his eggs.

vn_meaning: danh từ: quãng; danh từ: mỗi (trong đơn vị đo).
eng_explanation: Noun: A period of time or a segment. Also, a unit of measurement (e.g., per hour).
example: He worked for per hour at the restaurant.
The price is $10 per item.
They traveled per mile.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phần trăm; danh từ: tỷ lệ phần trăm.
eng_explanation: Noun: A ratio expressed as a percentage. Represents a portion of a whole.
example: The discount is 20 per cent off.
He earned a per cent increase in his salary.
The per cent of students who passed the exam was high.

vn_meaning: động từ: nhận thức; động từ: cảm nhận.
eng_explanation: Verb: To become aware of something through the senses or mind. To interpret something.
example: I perceive a faint smell of smoke.
She perceives him as a trustworthy person.
Do you perceive any changes in the data?

vn_meaning: danh từ: phần trăm; danh từ: tỷ lệ phần trăm.
eng_explanation: Noun: A ratio expressed as a percentage. Represents a portion of a whole.
example: The percentage of students who voted was very low.
The company's profit margin is 10 per cent.
She received a percentage of the profits.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhận thức; danh từ: sự cảm nhận.
eng_explanation: Noun: The ability to see, hear, or become aware of something. A mental impression.
example: His perception of the situation was inaccurate.
The artist's perception of beauty is unique.
Improved perception can lead to better decision-making.

vn_meaning: tính từ: hoàn hảo; tính từ: hoàn mĩ; động từ: hoàn hảo hóa.
eng_explanation: Adjective: Flawless or extremely good. Verb: To make something perfect.
example: The painting is absolutely perfect.
He wants to perfect his skills.
She tried to perfect the recipe.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: hoàn hảo; trạng từ: hoàn toàn.
eng_explanation: Adverb: In a perfect manner; completely.
example: He sings perfectly.
She cleaned the room perfectly.
The solution works perfectly.

vn_meaning: động từ: biểu diễn (sân khấu, âm nhạc); thực hiện (nhiệm vụ, công việc); hoạt động (máy móc); thi (khảo thí).
eng_explanation: to do or present something; to carry out a task or function (verb).
example: The actor will perform Shakespeare's Hamlet tonight.
She needs to perform her duties as a team leader.
The engine is performing well after the repairs.

vn_meaning: danh từ: màn biểu diễn; sự thực hiện; kết quả hoạt động.
eng_explanation: the act of performing; the standard or rate of productivity (noun).
example: The band gave a stunning performance.
Her job performance has improved significantly.
The car's performance was impressive on the test track.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: có lẽ, có thể.
eng_explanation: possibly; maybe; it is likely (adverb).
example: Perhaps we should go to the beach tomorrow.
Perhaps he's right about the weather.
Perhaps I'll call you later.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khoảng thời gian; giai đoạn; dấu chấm (trong ngữ pháp).
eng_explanation: a length of time; a point at the end of a sentence (noun).
example: The Renaissance was a significant period in history.
I need a break after this long period of work.
Please remember to put a period at the end of the sentence.

vn_meaning: tính từ: lâu dài, vĩnh viễn; cố định.
eng_explanation: lasting or existing for a long or indefinite time; fixed (adjective).
example: This is a permanent solution to the problem.
She has a permanent position at the company.
The tattoo is a permanent mark on his skin.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: vĩnh viễn, lâu dài; cố định.
eng_explanation: in a permanent way; forever (adverb).
example: The damage to the building was permanently repaired.
He moved to the countryside permanently.
The ink is permanently embedded in the fabric.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự cho phép.
eng_explanation: agreement or authorization to do something (noun).
example: I need to ask for permission to leave early.
She didn't give him permission to use her car.
The children were waiting for permission to go outside.

vn_meaning: động từ: cho phép; động từ: cấp phép (giấy phép). danh từ: giấy phép.
eng_explanation: to allow or authorize; an official document granting permission (verb/noun).
example: Do I need a permit to park here?
The authorities will not permit this activity.
She obtained a permit to build an extension.

vn_meaning: động từ: tiếp tục, bền bỉ; khăng khăng.
eng_explanation: to continue firmly or obstinately; to continue to exist (verb).
example: He persisted in his efforts despite the setbacks.
The rumors continued to persist.
The problem persists despite our best efforts.

vn_meaning: tính từ: bền bỉ, kiên trì; dai dẳng, đeo bám.
eng_explanation: continuing firmly or persistently; continuing to exist or occur (adjective).
example: She is a persistent and determined student.
The persistent noise was driving me crazy.
The persistent rain made travel difficult.

vn_meaning: danh từ: giai đoạn, kỳ (của sự thay đổi); pha (vật lý); tính từ: từng bước, dần dần
eng_explanation: n. a distinct period or stage; v. to introduce gradually. (n, v)
example: The project will be completed in three phases.
The moon goes through phases.
We need to phase in the new system slowly.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hiện tượng (tự nhiên, xã hội)
eng_explanation: n. a remarkable or unusual event or fact. (n)
example: The Northern Lights are a spectacular phenomenon.
Social media has become a global phenomenon.
Scientists are studying this strange phenomenon.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhà triết học
eng_explanation: n. a person who studies or develops philosophical theories. (n)
example: Plato was a famous Greek philosopher.
She is a contemporary philosopher specializing in ethics.
Many philosophers have pondered the meaning of life.

vn_meaning: tính từ: triết học; mang tính triết lý, suy tư
eng_explanation: adj. relating to philosophy; calm and rational in the face of adversity. (adj)
example: He had a philosophical discussion about the nature of reality.
She remained philosophical despite the bad news.
A philosophical approach to life can bring peace.

vn_meaning: danh từ: triết học; hệ tư tưởng, quan điểm sống
eng_explanation: n. the study of fundamental questions about existence, knowledge, and values. (n)
example: He is studying philosophy at university.
Her philosophy of life is based on kindness and compassion.
Eastern philosophy emphasizes harmony with nature.

vn_meaning: danh từ: điện thoại; động từ: gọi điện thoại
eng_explanation: n. a device for talking to someone remotely; v. to call someone. (n, v)
example: I need to buy a new phone.
Can you phone me later?
She phoned to cancel the appointment.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ảnh chụp, bức ảnh (viết tắt của photograph)
eng_explanation: n. a picture created using a camera. (n)
example: I took a photo of the sunset.
She showed me a photo of her family.
This photo brings back many memories.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bức ảnh; động từ: chụp ảnh
eng_explanation: n. an image captured by a camera; v. to take a picture. (n, v)
example: The photograph was taken in Paris.
He likes to photograph landscapes.
Can you photograph us together?

vn_meaning: danh từ: người chụp ảnh, nhiếp ảnh gia
eng_explanation: n. a person who takes photographs professionally or as a hobby. (n)
example: She is a professional photographer.
The wedding photographer captured beautiful moments.
He aspires to be a wildlife photographer.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nghệ thuật nhiếp ảnh
eng_explanation: n. the art or practice of taking and processing photographs. (n)
example: She is passionate about photography.
He studied photography at art school.
Digital photography has become very popular.

vn_meaning: Một câu, cụm từ, hoặc ý tưởng được diễn đạt một cách có ý nghĩa.
eng_explanation: A complete thought or expression.
example: The weather is beautiful; it's a lovely phrase.
I need a new phrase to express my feelings.

vn_meaning: Liên quan đến hoặc có tính chất của vật chất.
eng_explanation: Relating to or having the properties of matter.
example: The physical damage to the building was extensive.
She enjoys spending time in the physical world.

vn_meaning: Một người chữa bệnh.
eng_explanation: A medical doctor.
example: The physician performed a complex surgery.
She is a skilled physician with a long career.

vn_meaning: Khoa học vật liệu.
eng_explanation: The study of matter and its properties.
example: The physics of the universe is a fascinating field.
He is a brilliant physicist researching new theories.

vn_meaning: Một loại nhạc cụ có dây.
eng_explanation: A keyboard musical instrument.
example: The pianist played a beautiful piece on the piano.
She is a talented piano player.

vn_meaning: Một loại dao.
eng_explanation: A tool for picking up objects.
example: He used a pick to remove the stubborn stain.
The pickaxe was essential for construction.

vn_meaning: Một hình ảnh.
eng_explanation: A visual representation of something.
example: I saw a beautiful picture of the mountains.
She painted a vivid picture of her childhood.

vn_meaning: Một phần của một tác phẩm.
eng_explanation: A part of a work of art.
example: The artist created a beautiful piece of art.
She enjoyed reading a fascinating piece of literature.

vn_meaning: Một con vật có vú.
eng_explanation: A domesticated mammal with a snout.
example: The farmer raised a large pile of pigs.
He loves eating a delicious pig.

vn_meaning: Một mớ đồ vật xếp chồng lên nhau.
eng_explanation: A collection of objects piled on top of each other.
example: The forest was covered in a huge pile of leaves.
He built a tall pile of books.

vn_meaning: danh từ: viên thuốc; danh từ: viên nang (dạng thuốc)
eng_explanation: Noun: A small, compressed tablet or capsule for medicinal purposes.
example: Take one pill with water after meals.
The doctor prescribed a pain pill.
She swallowed the vitamin pill.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phi công; danh từ: người dẫn dắt, người chỉ huy
eng_explanation: Noun: A person who operates an aircraft; also, a leader or guide.
example: The pilot skillfully landed the plane.
He was a veteran pilot with many years of experience.
She served as a pilot for a humanitarian aid organization.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đinh, kẹp; danh từ: nút kim loại (để gắn quần áo)
eng_explanation: Noun: A small metal fastener; also, a button.
example: He hammered the pin into the wood.
She pinned her dress with a sparkly pin.
The boy lost a pin from his jacket.

vn_meaning: danh từ: màu hồng; tính từ: hồng (màu)
eng_explanation: Adjective: Having a pink color; Noun: The color pink.
example: She wore a pink dress to the party.
The sunset was a beautiful shade of pink.
The flamingo is a pink bird.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người mở đường; danh từ: người đi tiên phong
eng_explanation: Noun: A person who is among the first to explore or develop a new area.
example: The explorers were true pioneers of the West.
She is a pioneer in the field of artificial intelligence.
The company's founders were pioneers of sustainable business practices.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ống; danh từ: thuốc lá (ống)
eng_explanation: Noun: A tube or conduit; also, a device for smoking tobacco.
example: He inserted the pipe into his mouth.
The plumber fixed the leaky pipe.
She smoked a pipe in the garden.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hệ thống đường ống; danh từ: nguồn cung cấp ổn định
eng_explanation: Noun: A system of pipes; also, a reliable source of supply.
example: The oil pipeline transported crude oil across the country.
The company is developing a new pipeline for water distribution.
The project relies on a stable pipeline of funding.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tên cướp biển; danh từ: người vi phạm (quyền)
eng_explanation: Noun: A person who attacks and robs ships or passengers at sea; also, a lawbreaker.
example: The pirate captain led his crew in a daring raid.
He was accused of being a corporate pirate.
The story tells of a fearsome pirate and his treasure.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hố; danh từ: chuồng (cho động vật)
eng_explanation: Noun: A hole in the ground; also, a cage or enclosure.
example: The dog fell into the pit.
The miners dug a pit to extract coal.
The bear lived in a large pit in the zoo.

vn_meaning: danh từ: độ cao (âm thanh); danh từ: địa điểm (để trình diễn); danh từ: đề xuất (kinh doanh)
eng_explanation: Noun: The highness or lowness of a sound; also, a place for a performance; a business proposal.
example: The singer's pitch was slightly off-key.
The baseball team practiced their pitching skills.
She presented a compelling pitch for her new product.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lòng thương xót (cảm xúc); sự thương hại (tình huống); động từ: thương xót, cảm thấy tiếc nuối
eng_explanation: noun: a feeling of sorrow and compassion for someone; verb: feel or express sorrow or regret.
example: I feel a great pity for those who have lost their homes.
It was a pity that we couldn't go to the concert.
Don't pity him; he's stronger than he looks.

vn_meaning: danh từ: địa điểm, nơi chốn; vị trí; chỗ dành cho ai/cái gì; động từ: đặt, để vào
eng_explanation: noun: a particular position or location; verb: put (someone or something) in a particular place.
example: The restaurant is in a lovely place overlooking the sea.
Please place the vase on the table.
She found her place in the company after years of hard work.

vn_meaning: danh từ: vị trí đặt; sự sắp xếp; (tuyển dụng) việc bố trí, sắp xếp (nhân sự)
eng_explanation: noun: the action of placing something; the position where something is placed; job placement.
example: The placement of the furniture was carefully considered.
She is looking for a placement in a marketing firm.
The strategic placement of the ad increased sales.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đơn giản, không cầu kỳ; rõ ràng, dễ thấy; (màu sắc) màu trơn, không hoa văn; động từ: tuyên bố thẳng thắn
eng_explanation: adjective: not elaborate or complicated; clear and easy to understand; without decoration.
example: She wore a plain cotton dress.
The facts are plain for everyone to see.
He explained his reasons in plain language.

vn_meaning: danh từ: kế hoạch; dự định; động từ: lên kế hoạch, dự định
eng_explanation: noun: a detailed proposal for doing or achieving something; verb: decide on and arrange in advance.
example: We need to make a plan for the weekend.
The company has a five-year plan for growth.
I'm planning to travel to Europe next year.

vn_meaning: danh từ: máy bay; mặt phẳng; (toán học) mặt phẳng
eng_explanation: noun: a vehicle for air travel; a flat surface; a two-dimensional surface extending infinitely in all directions.
example: The plane took off on time.
The table has a smooth, flat plane.
In geometry, a plane is a fundamental concept.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hành tinh
eng_explanation: noun: a celestial body orbiting a star.
example: Earth is the third planet from the sun.
Scientists are searching for life on other planets.
Mars is often called the Red Planet.

vn_meaning: danh từ: việc lập kế hoạch, dự định
eng_explanation: noun: the process of thinking about and deciding the best way to achieve a goal.
example: Careful planning is essential for a successful project.
We are in the planning stages of building a new house.
The company's future planning involves expanding into new markets.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cây cối; nhà máy; động từ: trồng cây
eng_explanation: noun: a living organism that typically grows in the ground; a factory or industrial building; verb: put a plant in the ground.
example: The garden is full of beautiful plants.
The factory is a major employer in the area.
She planted a tree in her backyard.

vn_meaning: tính từ: bằng nhựa; linh hoạt, dễ uốn; danh từ: nhựa (vật liệu)
eng_explanation: adjective: made of plastic; flexible; noun: a synthetic material made from polymers.
example: This is a plastic bag.
The plastic tubing is very flexible.
Plastic pollution is a serious environmental problem.

vn_meaning: động từ: hứa, cam kết (trước công chúng hoặc người có thẩm quyền); danh từ: lời hứa, cam kết.
eng_explanation: v. to promise solemnly; n. a solemn promise or undertaking. (PoS: v, n)
example: He pledged to support the charity.
She made a pledge to finish the project on time.
The politician broke his pledge.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đầy đủ, phong phú; trạng từ: nhiều, dư dả.
eng_explanation: n. a large or sufficient amount; adv. in abundance. (PoS: n, adv)
example: There's plenty of time to finish.
We have plenty of food for everyone.
She had plenty of reasons to be happy.

vn_meaning: động từ: âm mưu, lập kế hoạch (thường là xấu); danh từ: cốt truyện, tình tiết (của phim, truyện); mảnh đất.
eng_explanation: v. to secretly plan; n. storyline; a marked area of land. (PoS: v, n)
example: The rebels plotted to overthrow the government.
The plot of the novel was very complex.
They bought a plot of land to build a house.

vn_meaning: động từ: cắm (phích cắm); bịt (lỗ); quảng cáo; danh từ: phích cắm; nút bịt.
eng_explanation: v. to insert a plug; to promote; n. a stopper or promotional item. (PoS: v, n)
example: Please unplug the iron after use.
The band is trying to plug their new album.
He used a plug to block the drain.

vn_meaning: động từ: lao xuống, nhảy xuống; chìm vào (tình trạng khó khăn); nhúng (vào chất lỏng).
eng_explanation: v. to jump or dive; to fall into a state; to immerse. (PoS: v)
example: He plunged into the icy water.
The country plunged into economic recession.
She plunged a knife into the cake.

vn_meaning: giới từ: và, thêm vào; danh từ: dấu cộng.
eng_explanation: prep. in addition to; n. the symbol + (PoS: prep, n)
example: Two plus two equals four.
She's a great singer plus a talented dancer.
The plus side is that it's very affordable.

vn_meaning: danh từ: túi (quần, áo); động từ: bỏ vào túi, kiếm được (tiền).
eng_explanation: n. a small bag sewn into clothing; v. to put into a pocket. (PoS: n, v)
example: He kept his keys in his pocket.
She pocketed the money without anyone noticing.
They managed to pocket a significant profit.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bài thơ.
eng_explanation: n. a piece of writing in verse; often expressing emotion. (PoS: n)
example: She wrote a beautiful poem about love.
The poem was published in a literary magazine.
He recited a poem from memory.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhà thơ.
eng_explanation: n. a person who writes poems. (PoS: n)
example: Shakespeare is a famous English poet.
The poet read his work to a large audience.
She aspires to be a published poet.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thơ ca, nghệ thuật làm thơ.
eng_explanation: n. the art of composing poems; literary work in verse. (PoS: n)
example: She has a deep appreciation for poetry.
He studied poetry at university.
Romantic poetry often focuses on nature.

vn_meaning: Một điểm, một sự hướng tới (đại diện cho một mục tiêu hoặc ý tưởng).
eng_explanation: A point refers to a specific direction or goal.
example: The team needs to make a crucial point in the final match.
He made a point about the importance of education.

vn_meaning: Đã được chỉ định, được hướng tới, thường mang ý nghĩa của sự rõ ràng, chính xác.
eng_explanation: Pointed means clearly defined or directed.
example: The map was pointed out for its inaccuracies.
The politician was pointed to for his controversial statements.

vn_meaning: Một chất độc, thường dùng để gây hại cho sức khỏe.
eng_explanation: Poison is a deadly substance.
example: The snake was poisoned with a deadly toxin.
The food was poisoned with mushrooms.

vn_meaning: Gây hại cho sức khỏe, chứa độc.
eng_explanation: Poisonous means harmful to health.
example: The forest was poisonous to animals.
The plants were poisonous to humans.

vn_meaning: Một thanh, một trụ cột (đại diện cho một điểm hoặc một sự hỗ trợ).
eng_explanation: A pole is a tall, sturdy support.
example: The pole was struck by lightning.
The pole was used to support the tent.

vn_meaning: Cảnh sát, lực lượng bảo vệ công cộng.
eng_explanation: Police are the government's law enforcement agency.
example: The police are investigating the crime.
He was arrested for a crime of passion.

vn_meaning: Cảnh sát, người bảo vệ luật pháp.
eng_explanation: A policeman is a police officer.
example: The policeman was patrolling the streets.
He was a dedicated policeman.

vn_meaning: Quy định, chính sách, kế hoạch.
eng_explanation: A policy is a set of rules or guidelines.
example: The government has implemented a new policy on environmental protection.
The company's policy is to provide excellent customer service.

vn_meaning: Thân thiện, lịch sự, tôn trọng.
eng_explanation: Polite is a courteous and respectful manner.
example: She was polite to the cashier.
He showed a polite demeanor.

vn_meaning: Liên quan đến chính trị, chính phủ.
eng_explanation: Political is related to politics and government.
example: The political debate was heated.
He is a prominent political figure.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chính trị gia; danh từ: người làm việc trong chính trị
eng_explanation: A person involved in politics, often holding an elected office.
example: The politician promised to lower taxes.
Many politicians face public scrutiny.
She became a politician after serving in local government.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chính trị; danh từ: các hoạt động liên quan đến chính trị
eng_explanation: The activities of governing a country or organization, often involving debate and negotiation.
example: Politics can be a dirty game.
The politician's speech focused on domestic politics.
She has a strong interest in international politics.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cuộc khảo sát dư luận; danh từ: bầu cử (thường là bầu cử nhanh)
eng_explanation: A survey of public opinion, or a quick election.
example: The poll showed a close race between the candidates.
The local government conducted a poll to gauge public support.
A snap poll revealed voter dissatisfaction.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ô nhiễm; danh từ: tác động gây ô nhiễm
eng_explanation: The presence of harmful substances in the environment.
example: Air pollution is a serious problem in many cities.
Plastic pollution threatens marine life.
The factory was fined for causing water pollution.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hồ nhỏ; danh từ: (thức ăn) sữa đặc
eng_explanation: A small body of still water.
example: The ducks swam in the pond.
Frogs live in the pond.
She added a spoonful of pond to her coffee.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hồ bơi; danh từ: nhóm người; danh từ: (kinh tế) quỹ đầu tư
eng_explanation: A collection of people or a body of water for swimming.
example: They swam in the pool after work.
The team formed a pool of talented players.
The investment pool generated significant returns.

vn_meaning: tính từ: nghèo; danh từ: người nghèo
eng_explanation: Lacking sufficient money to live comfortably; a person in poverty.
example: He is a poor student.
Many people live in poverty.
The charity helps the poor.

vn_meaning: động từ: nhảy múa; danh từ: (âm nhạc) giai điệu; danh từ: người dân
eng_explanation: To dance energetically; a short, catchy musical phrase; the general population.
example: The crowd began to pop to the music.
The pop song was a huge hit.
The pop music industry is very lucrative.

vn_meaning: tính từ: phổ biến; tính từ: được yêu thích
eng_explanation: Widely liked or enjoyed; common or prevalent.
example: That movie is very popular.
She is a popular singer.
The new trend is becoming increasingly popular.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự phổ biến; danh từ: mức độ được yêu thích
eng_explanation: The state of being well-liked or admired; the degree to which something is popular.
example: His popularity grew after the award.
The book's popularity surprised the publisher.
She enjoys the popularity of social media.

vn_meaning: danh từ: dân số (thống kê); quần thể (sinh vật học)
eng_explanation: noun: the total number of people living in a particular area.
example: The population of the city has grown significantly in recent years.
Scientists are studying the population dynamics of endangered species.
The country's population density is quite high.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bến cảng (giao thông đường thủy); cửa ngõ (tư duy, địa lý)
eng_explanation: noun: a harbor where ships can dock; a gateway or entrance.
example: The cargo ship arrived at the port after a long journey.
The city is a major port for international trade.
The internet became a new port for information.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tập tài liệu (chứng khoán, nghệ thuật); hồ sơ năng lực (cá nhân, công ty)
eng_explanation: noun: a collection of investments; a collection of work samples.
example: She manages a diverse investment portfolio.
The artist presented her portfolio to potential clients.
He updated his online portfolio with his latest projects.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phần, khẩu phần (thức ăn); tỷ lệ (của một tổng thể)
eng_explanation: noun: a part or share of something; a serving of food.
example: I'd like a larger portion of rice, please.
The company's profits represent a small portion of the total revenue.
She took a generous portion of the cake.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chân dung (hội họa, ảnh)
eng_explanation: noun: a painting or photograph of a person.
example: The museum displayed a collection of royal portraits.
He commissioned a portrait of his wife.
The artist captured her likeness perfectly in the portrait.

vn_meaning: động từ: miêu tả, khắc họa (tính cách, sự kiện)
eng_explanation: verb: to depict or represent someone or something in a particular way.
example: The actor portrayed the character with great sensitivity.
The novel portrays a vivid picture of life in the countryside.
The documentary aims to portray the challenges faced by refugees.

vn_meaning: động từ: tạo dáng (chụp ảnh); đặt câu hỏi (khó, bẫy); danh từ: dáng, tư thế
eng_explanation: verb: to assume a particular position or attitude; noun: a particular way of standing or sitting.
example: She posed for the photographer in a glamorous outfit.
The question was designed to pose a challenge to his argument.
He struck a confident pose on the stage.

vn_meaning: danh từ: vị trí, địa vị; quan điểm (chính trị, xã hội); động từ: đặt, bố trí
eng_explanation: noun: a place or location; a job or role; an opinion or attitude; verb: to place or arrange.
example: The company is looking for a position for a recent graduate.
She took a firm position on the issue.
Please position the table near the window.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tích cực; khẳng định; danh từ: điều tích cực
eng_explanation: adjective: optimistic or favorable; expressing agreement; noun: a favorable outcome.
example: She has a positive attitude towards life.
The test results were positive.
Let's focus on the positive aspects of the situation.

vn_meaning: động từ: sở hữu, có; mang (tính chất)
eng_explanation: verb: to have or own something; to have a particular quality.
example: She possesses a remarkable talent for music.
He doesn't possess the necessary skills for the job.
The house possesses a beautiful garden.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tiềm năng, khả năng (của một người, vật); tính từ: tiềm tàng, có thể xảy ra (trong tương lai)
eng_explanation: n. possibility of becoming something; adj. capable of becoming. (PoS: n/adj)
example: She has the potential to become a great artist.
This drug has the potential to cure the disease.
The company is exploring its potential for growth.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: có lẽ, có khả năng, tiềm năng
eng_explanation: adv. possibly; capable of happening or becoming. (PoS: adv)
example: The new policy could potentially benefit millions of people.
This situation is potentially dangerous.
The discovery is potentially groundbreaking.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bảng Anh (tiền tệ); cân Anh (đơn vị đo khối lượng); động từ: đập, giã, nện
eng_explanation: n. British currency; unit of weight; v. to hit repeatedly. (PoS: n/v)
example: The exchange rate is currently 1.25 pounds to the dollar.
She lost five pounds last week.
He pounded the metal into shape.

vn_meaning: động từ: đổ, rót (chất lỏng); trào dâng, tuôn chảy (cảm xúc, số lượng lớn)
eng_explanation: v. to flow rapidly; to cause to flow. (PoS: v)
example: Please pour me a glass of water.
Rain was pouring down all day.
Tears were pouring down her face.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự nghèo đói, thiếu thốn
eng_explanation: n. the state of being extremely poor. (PoS: n)
example: Poverty is a major problem in many parts of the world.
They grew up in poverty.
The government is trying to reduce poverty.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bột; động từ: phủ bột lên
eng_explanation: n. fine, dry particles; v. to cover with powder. (PoS: n/v)
example: Baking powder is used to make cakes rise.
She powdered her face.
The snow fell like powder.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sức mạnh, quyền lực; năng lượng; động từ: cung cấp năng lượng, vận hành
eng_explanation: n. ability to control; energy; v. to supply with energy. (PoS: n/v)
example: Power corrupts, and absolute power corrupts absolutely.
The car is powered by electricity.
She has a lot of power in the company.

vn_meaning: tính từ: mạnh mẽ, quyền lực, có sức ảnh hưởng lớn
eng_explanation: adj. having great power or strength; influential. (PoS: adj)
example: She is a powerful speaker.
The engine is very powerful.
He is a powerful politician.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thực tế, thiết thực, hữu ích
eng_explanation: adj. relating to real life; useful. (PoS: adj)
example: She's a very practical person.
This is a practical solution to the problem.
He gave me some practical advice.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự thực hành, luyện tập; phòng khám (y tế); động từ: thực hành, luyện tập
eng_explanation: n. repeated exercise; a doctor's office; v. to rehearse. (PoS: n/v)
example: Practice makes perfect.
She goes to the doctor's practice every week.
He practices the piano every day.

vn_meaning: thực hành
eng_explanation: To engage in repeated action to improve proficiency.
example: I need to practice my French every day.
The doctor recommended she practice yoga.
He practiced diligently to achieve his goal.

vn_meaning: người hành nghề
eng_explanation: Someone who actively engages in a specific activity.
example: She is a renowned practitioner of painting.
The expert is a skilled practitioner of medicine.
Many students seek guidance from experienced practitioners.

vn_meaning: khen ngợi
eng_explanation: To offer words of approval or commendation.
example: The audience praised the singer's performance.
He gave her a heartfelt praise for her efforts.
Let's give each other a sincere praise for our work.

vn_meaning: cầu nguyện
eng_explanation: To invoke divine assistance or protection.
example: I pray for a peaceful night.
She prayed silently for forgiveness.
The monks practiced prayer throughout the day.

vn_meaning:
chúng,
chào,
chạy,
thống,
phổ biến,
ngăn,
người,
giá,
sự,
đánh
eng_explanation: A form of communication with a divine being.
example: The congregation offered a heartfelt prayer.
He recited the prayer with reverence.
The spiritual leader led the prayer session.

vn_meaning: khích
eng_explanation: To present a religious or moral message.
example: The preacher delivered a powerful sermon.
He preached about the importance of compassion.
The students listened attentively to the preacher's message.

vn_meaning: khuyên
eng_explanation: A model or guideline for behavior.
example: The precedent of the court established a new rule.
The company followed the precedent of its previous policies.
The judge relied on the precedent to make a ruling.

vn_meaning: Of great value; valuable.
eng_explanation: Highly desirable and worth a lot.
example: The diamond was a precious jewel.
She treasured her precious memories.
The artist created a precious work of art.
