vn_meaning: Exact; exact; without any doubt or uncertainty.
eng_explanation: Clearly and accurately defined.
example: The measurements were precise.
The report was precise and detailed.
The engineer worked with precise instruments.

vn_meaning: tính từ: chính xác; trạng từ: một cách chính xác
eng_explanation: Adverb/Adjective: Exactly; describing accuracy or detail.
example: He measured the length precisely.
The instructions were given precisely.
She spoke precisely about the issue.

vn_meaning: danh từ: độ chính xác; sự tỉ mỉ; kỹ thuật; (vật lý) độ phân giải
eng_explanation: Noun: The quality of being exact or accurate; meticulousness.
example: The watch had incredible precision.
Precision is crucial in surgery.
The data requires a high level of precision.

vn_meaning: danh từ: kẻ săn mồi; (tâm lý học) người lợi dụng
eng_explanation: Noun: An animal that hunts and kills other animals for food.
example: The lion is a powerful predator.
Some people consider bullies predators.
The ecosystem relies on a balance of predator and prey.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người tiền nhiệm; người đứng trước
eng_explanation: Noun: A person who held a position before someone else.
example: His predecessor implemented many important reforms.
The current president is the successor to his predecessor.
She admired her predecessor's leadership skills.

vn_meaning: động từ: dự đoán; tiên đoán; đoán trước
eng_explanation: Verb: To say or estimate that something will happen in the future.
example: I can predict that it will rain tomorrow.
The weather forecast predicts a storm.
She tried to predict the outcome of the election.

vn_meaning: tính từ: dễ đoán; có thể dự đoán trước
eng_explanation: Adjective: Able to be predicted; routine or expected.
example: His behavior is completely predictable.
The weather is often predictable in the summer.
Routine tasks are generally predictable.

vn_meaning: danh từ: dự đoán; tiên đoán; dự báo
eng_explanation: Noun: A statement about what will happen in the future.
example: The forecast is a prediction of sunny weather.
Her prediction proved to be accurate.
The company's prediction of growth was optimistic.

vn_meaning: tính từ: chủ yếu; phần lớn; chính
eng_explanation: Adverb: Mainly; mostly; predominantly.
example: The population is predominantly young.
The report is predominantly focused on economic issues.
The landscape is predominantly green.

vn_meaning: động từ: thích hơn; ưa thích hơn
eng_explanation: Verb: To like one thing more than another.
example: I prefer coffee to tea.
She prefers to read in the morning.
Do you prefer the blue dress or the red one?

vn_meaning: danh từ: sở thích; sự ưa thích; ưu tiên
eng_explanation: Noun: A feeling of liking or disliking something.
example: His preference is for classical music.
She has a strong preference for quiet evenings.
The company takes customer preference into account.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thai kỳ (sức khỏe); tình trạng mang thai (chung chung)
eng_explanation: noun: The state of carrying a developing fetus within the uterus.
example: Her pregnancy was progressing smoothly.
She experienced morning sickness during her pregnancy.
The doctor confirmed her pregnancy after the test.

vn_meaning: tính từ: có thai; đang mang thai
eng_explanation: adjective: Carrying a developing fetus within the uterus; expecting a baby.
example: She is pregnant with her first child.
The cat appeared pregnant.
Are you pregnant, or just gaining weight?

vn_meaning: danh từ: định kiến; sự thiên vị; sự đánh giá chủ quan
eng_explanation: noun: Preconceived opinion that is not based on reason or actual experience.
example: He overcame his prejudice against people from different backgrounds.
Racial prejudice is a serious problem.
She challenged the prejudice that women are not as good as men in math.

vn_meaning: tính từ: sơ bộ; ban đầu; trước
eng_explanation: adjective: Preliminary; introductory; serving as an introduction.
example: The company released a preliminary report on the findings.
This is a preliminary assessment of the damage.
We had a preliminary discussion about the project.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đầu tiên; hàng đầu; quan trọng nhất; (chính trị) thủ tướng
eng_explanation: adjective: First; most important; leading; (politics) relating to the prime minister.
example: The premier announced new economic policies.
This is the premier league team.
The premier performance of the play was a success.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tiền đề; cơ sở; giả định; (kiến trúc) chân đế
eng_explanation: noun: A basic assumption; a starting point for a theory or argument; foundation.
example: The argument's premise was flawed.
The house is built on a solid premise.
The play's premise is intriguing.

vn_meaning: danh từ: giá cao hơn; (bảo hiểm) phí bảo hiểm cao cấp; chất lượng cao
eng_explanation: noun: An extra amount paid for a product or service; a superior grade.
example: He paid a premium for the faster shipping.
The car comes with a premium sound system.
She decided to pay the premium for the extended warranty.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự chuẩn bị; sự sẵn sàng
eng_explanation: noun: The action of preparing or getting ready for something.
example: The preparation for the exam was intense.
Careful preparation is key to success.
The chef oversaw the food preparation.

vn_meaning: động từ: chuẩn bị; sẵn sàng; dọn sẵn
eng_explanation: verb: To make something ready for use or a particular purpose.
example: Please prepare the documents for the meeting.
I need to prepare dinner.
She prepared herself for the interview.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đã chuẩn bị; sẵn sàng; được chế biến
eng_explanation: adjective: Ready; having been prepared; processed.
example: He was well-prepared for the test.
The prepared meal was delicious.
She felt prepared to face the challenge.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tổng thống; chủ tịch (của một tổ chức, công ty)
eng_explanation: n. The elected head of a country or organization. (PoS: noun)
example: The president addressed the nation last night.
She is the president of the student council.
He served two terms as president.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thuộc về tổng thống; mang tính chất tổng thống
eng_explanation: adj. Relating to the president or the office of president. (PoS: adjective)
example: The presidential election is next November.
He gave a presidential speech.
The presidential palace is a beautiful building.

vn_meaning: danh từ: báo chí; sự ép, sự đè; máy ép; tính từ: cấp bách, khẩn cấp; động từ: ép, đè, vặn, thúc giục
eng_explanation: n. Newspapers and magazines; v. To squeeze or urge. (PoS: noun, verb)
example: The press reported on the scandal.
She pressed the button to start the machine.
He pressed her for an answer.

vn_meaning: danh từ: áp lực; sức ép; sự đè nén; động từ: gây áp lực, ép buộc
eng_explanation: n. Force per unit area; v. To try to persuade someone to do something. (PoS: noun, verb)
example: He is under a lot of pressure at work.
Don't pressure me to make a decision.
The pressure of the water was immense.

vn_meaning: tính từ: uy tín; danh giá; có tiếng tăm
eng_explanation: adj. Having a high reputation; honored and respected. (PoS: adjective)
example: She attended a very prestigious university.
He received a prestigious award for his work.
It's a prestigious position within the company.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: có lẽ; có thể đoán được; phỏng chừng
eng_explanation: adv. Apparently; it is supposed but not known for certain. (PoS: adverb)
example: He is presumably at home.
Presumably, she will be late.
They presumably knew about the risks.

vn_meaning: động từ: cho rằng; đoán rằng; mặc nhiên cho rằng
eng_explanation: v. To suppose something is the case on the basis of probability. (PoS: verb)
example: I presume you've already eaten.
We can presume that he will accept the offer.
Don't presume to know what I'm thinking.

vn_meaning: động từ: giả vờ; làm bộ; tỏ ra
eng_explanation: v. To behave as if something is true when it is not. (PoS: verb)
example: The children pretended to be pirates.
She pretended not to notice him.
Don't pretend you don't know what happened.

vn_meaning: tính từ: xinh xắn; dễ thương; khá; tương đối
eng_explanation: adj. Attractive in a delicate way; fairly or somewhat. (PoS: adjective)
example: She is a very pretty girl.
It's a pretty good idea.
The garden is looking pretty in the spring.

vn_meaning: động từ: thắng lợi; chiếm ưu thế; thịnh hành
eng_explanation: v. To prove more powerful than opposing forces; to be widespread. (PoS: verb)
example: Good sense eventually prevailed.
Optimism should prevail despite the difficulties.
A sense of calm prevailed throughout the room.

vn_meaning: nguồn
eng_explanation: Prevalence refers to how often or how much something exists or is felt.
example: The prevalence of climate change is increasing globally.
The prevalence of poverty is a serious concern in many countries.

vn_meaning: To stop or avoid something from happening; to make something not occur.
eng_explanation: Prevent means to stop or avoid a negative outcome.
example: We need to prevent accidents on the road.
The company is taking steps to prevent future losses.

vn_meaning: phổ biến
eng_explanation: Prevention is the act of stopping something from occurring.
example: Public health initiatives aim to prevent the spread of diseases.
Preventive measures are crucial for long-term success.

vn_meaning: Before; preceding; earlier than.
eng_explanation: Previous indicates something that came before something else.
example: I remember the previous year's results.
The previous speaker was interrupted.

vn_meaning: Before; earlier than; previously.
eng_explanation: Previously indicates something that occurred before something else.
example: We've noticed a change in the previous data.
The previous location was a bustling city.

vn_meaning: phòng ngừa
eng_explanation: Prey is something that is hunted or killed by another.
example: The animals are prey for the foxes.
The rainforest is a rich source of prey for many species.

vn_meaning: giá
eng_explanation: Price refers to the cost of an item or service.
example: The price of the car is quite high.
The price of groceries is a concern for many families.

vn_meaning: niềm tự hào
eng_explanation: Pride is a feeling of self-esteem and accomplishment.
example: He felt a sense of pride in his accomplishments.
Her pride in her family was evident in her actions.

vn_meaning: tu sĩ
eng_explanation: A priest is a religious leader.
example: The priest led the congregation during the service.
He is a respected priest in the community.

vn_meaning: chủ yếu
eng_explanation: Primarily indicates that something is the most important or prevalent.
example: The primary goal of the project is to increase sales.
The primary reason for the delay is the weather.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thứ hạng nhất; chính; chủ yếu; (vật lý) ánh sáng trắng; tính từ: chính thức; quan trọng nhất; (thuộc) chính; (y học) sơ cấp.
eng_explanation: Most important; first; fundamental (adj. & n.)
example: The primary goal is to ensure student success.
He is a primary source of information on the topic.
The primary colors are red, yellow, and blue.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đỉnh cao; thời kỳ tốt đẹp nhất; số nguyên tố; tính từ: tốt nhất; đỉnh cao; (kinh tế) giai đoạn phát triển.
eng_explanation: Best; most excellent; a prime number (n. & adj.)
example: This is the prime of his career.
The prime minister announced new policies.
Seven is a prime number.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hoàng tử; (trong thần thoại) một vị vua hoặc lãnh chúa; (tính từ) cao quý; quan trọng.
eng_explanation: A male member of a royal family (n.) or something of high quality (adj.)
example: The prince was celebrated for his bravery.
He is a prince among men.
The prince's castle stood on a hill.

vn_meaning: danh từ: công chúa; (trong thần thoại) một vị vua hoặc lãnh chúa; (tính từ) cao quý; quan trọng.
eng_explanation: A female member of a royal family (n.) or something of high quality (adj.)
example: The princess married a handsome prince.
She is a princess in her own right.
The princess visited the local school.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người đứng đầu; người quản lý; (giáo dục) trường học chính; (kế toán) khoản chính; tính từ: chính; quan trọng.
eng_explanation: Head; main; most important (n. & adj.)
example: The principal announced the school closure.
The principal reason for the delay was the weather.
The principal amount was paid on time.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nguyên tắc; lẽ phải; phương pháp; (luật) quy tắc; tính từ: cơ bản; cốt lõi.
eng_explanation: A fundamental rule or belief (n.) or basic (adj.)
example: He lives by the principle of honesty.
The principle of gravity governs the motion of objects.
The company’s guiding principle is customer satisfaction.

vn_meaning: danh từ: in ấn; (mạng) hiển thị; tính từ: in ấn; (mạng) trực tiếp; (thư pháp) viết.
eng_explanation: To reproduce text or images (v.) or direct (adj.)
example: I need to print this document.
The website offers print-on-demand services.
He used print to express his ideas.

vn_meaning: danh từ: máy in; người làm in ấn.
eng_explanation: A machine that produces printed copies (n.) or a person who prints (n.)
example: I need to buy a new printer.
The printer worked quickly and efficiently.
She is a professional printer.

vn_meaning: danh từ: in ấn; (mạng) hiển thị; (thư pháp) viết.
eng_explanation: The process of producing printed materials (n.) or displaying information (n.)
example: The printing industry is facing challenges.
The printing of the book was delayed.
He enjoys the art of printing.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thứ tự ưu tiên; điều kiện tiên quyết; tính từ: trước; ưu tiên.
eng_explanation: Something that comes before; most important (n. & adj.)
example: It’s important to consider prior experience.
The prior agreement was not honored.
His prior knowledge helped him solve the problem.

vn_meaning: danh từ: mức độ ưu tiên (sắp xếp thứ tự quan trọng); tính từ: có ưu tiên (được ưu tiên hơn những thứ khác).
eng_explanation: noun: the state of being more important than others; adjective: having precedence or priority.
example: The priority is to ensure the safety of all passengers.
We need to give this project top priority.
Her health is her absolute priority.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhà tù, ngục giam.
eng_explanation: noun: a place of confinement for people convicted of crimes.
example: He was sentenced to five years in prison.
The prison population has been increasing.
She visited her brother in prison.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tù nhân, người bị giam giữ.
eng_explanation: noun: a person who is kept in prison.
example: The prisoner was released after serving his sentence.
The prisoners were treated with respect.
She wrote letters to her husband, a prisoner of war.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự riêng tư, sự kín đáo.
eng_explanation: noun: the state of being free from public attention or intrusion.
example: He values his privacy above all else.
She felt a loss of privacy after the incident.
The law protects people's right to privacy.

vn_meaning: tính từ: riêng tư, cá nhân; thuộc về tư nhân; không công khai; (quân sự) tư.
eng_explanation: adjective: belonging to a person; not public; not governmental; (military) not serving in the public military.
example: This is a private matter.
They own a private island.
He works for a private company.

vn_meaning: danh từ: việc tư nhân hóa (chuyển đổi doanh nghiệp nhà nước thành doanh nghiệp tư nhân).
eng_explanation: noun: the process of transferring ownership of a business or industry from public to private control.
example: Privatization of the railway system was controversial.
The government is considering privatization of the postal service.
Privatization can lead to increased efficiency.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đặc quyền, lợi thế.
eng_explanation: noun: a special advantage or benefit granted to a particular person or group.
example: He was born into a life of privilege.
They felt it was unfair to give him such a privilege.
Access to education should be a right, not a privilege.

vn_meaning: danh từ: giải thưởng, phần thưởng.
eng_explanation: noun: something given as a reward for winning a competition or achieving something.
example: She won first prize in the competition.
The prize for the best essay was a scholarship.
He received a prize for his outstanding work.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khả năng xảy ra, xác suất.
eng_explanation: noun: the chance or likelihood of something happening.
example: The probability of rain is high today.
There's a small probability of success.
Scientists calculate the probability of different outcomes.

vn_meaning: tính từ: có khả năng xảy ra, có thể xảy ra.
eng_explanation: adjective: likely to happen or be the case.
example: It's probable that it will rain later.
The cause of the accident is still probable.
The explanation seems probable.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bộ xử lý (máy tính); động từ: xử lý, chế biến (thông tin, dữ liệu)
eng_explanation: n. A device that processes data; v. To process data or information. (n, v)
example: The computer's processor is very fast.
The factory processors tons of food every day.
The software will processor the image and enhance its quality.

vn_meaning: động từ: tuyên bố, công bố (một cách trang trọng); long trọng tuyên truyền
eng_explanation: v. To announce formally or publicly. (v)
example: The king proclaimed a new law.
They proclaimed their love for each other.
The company proclaimed its commitment to sustainability.

vn_meaning: động từ: sản xuất, chế tạo; tạo ra, đem lại (kết quả)
eng_explanation: v. To make or manufacture from raw materials; to create or yield. (v)
example: The factory produces cars.
The farm produces a lot of wheat.
Stress can produce headaches.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người sản xuất; nhà sản xuất (âm nhạc, phim ảnh)
eng_explanation: n. A person or company that makes or creates something. (n)
example: He is a film producer.
The producer of the show is very talented.
The country is a major oil producer.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sản phẩm; kết quả (của quá trình)
eng_explanation: n. Something made or created; the result of a process. (n)
example: This is a high-quality product.
The product of their hard work was a successful business.
New products are launched every year.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự sản xuất; quá trình sản xuất; sản lượng
eng_explanation: n. The process of making something; the amount made. (n)
example: The production of cars increased this year.
The play was a lavish production.
Oil production is a major industry.

vn_meaning: tính từ: hiệu quả; năng suất cao; có ích
eng_explanation: adj. Producing a lot; efficient; useful. (adj)
example: She had a very productive day.
The meeting was productive and resulted in a clear plan.
He is a productive member of the team.

vn_meaning: danh từ: năng suất; hiệu suất; khả năng sinh lời
eng_explanation: n. The rate at which goods are made; efficiency. (n)
example: The company is focused on increasing productivity.
Automation can improve productivity.
High productivity leads to economic growth.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nghề nghiệp; ngành nghề (đòi hỏi trình độ chuyên môn cao)
eng_explanation: n. A job requiring specialized training and skill. (n)
example: She is in the medical profession.
He chose a profession that suited his skills.
Teaching is a rewarding profession.

vn_meaning: tính từ: chuyên nghiệp; thuộc về nghề nghiệp; chuyên môn cao; danh từ: người chuyên nghiệp
eng_explanation: adj. Relating to a job requiring skill; skilled. n. A person skilled in a job. (adj, n)
example: She is a professional athlete.
He gave a professional performance.
The company hired a professional consultant.

vn_meaning: giảng sư
eng_explanation: A professor is a highly qualified instructor.
example: The professor gave a fascinating lecture on history.
She is a renowned professor in her field.

vn_meaning: hồ sơ
eng_explanation: A profile describes an individual's strengths and background.
example: Her profile on LinkedIn showcases her professional achievements.
The company created a detailed profile for each applicant.

vn_meaning: lợi nhuận
eng_explanation: Profit represents the financial gain from a business.
example: The company's profit increased significantly this quarter.
Investing in new programs can boost the company's profit.

vn_meaning: Able to generate profit.
eng_explanation: Something is profitable if it yields a return.
example: The new product is expected to be very profitable.
The business venture is considered to be profitable.

vn_meaning: Extremely deep or intense; of great importance.
eng_explanation: A profound idea or insight often has a significant impact.
example: The professor's research on consciousness was profoundly influential.
The painting's profound symbolism captivated viewers.

vn_meaning: chương trình
eng_explanation: A program is a sequence of instructions for a computer.
example: The company is developing a new program to streamline its operations.
The software program is designed to be user-friendly.

vn_meaning: chương trình
eng_explanation: A programme is a structured set of instructions.
example: The team is working on a new programme to improve customer service.
The software programme is used for data analysis.

vn_meaning: lập trình
eng_explanation: Programming involves creating instructions for computers.
example: The software is being programmed to automatically update its features.
He is a skilled programmer working on a complex project.

vn_meaning: tiến bộ
eng_explanation: Progress indicates advancement or development.
example: The project is making significant progress towards its goals.
We are seeing positive progress in the company's sales.

vn_meaning: tiến bộ
eng_explanation: Progressive means moving forward with innovation.
example: The company is adopting a more progressive approach to sustainability.
The film explores themes of social progress.

vn_meaning: động từ: cấm đoán; tính từ: cấm đoán
eng_explanation: verb: to forbid; adjective: preventing something from happening.
example: The law prohibits smoking in public places.
The rules prohibit the use of mobile phones during exams.
It is prohibited to enter the restricted area.

vn_meaning: danh từ: dự án; (vật lý) tia; động từ: ước tính, dự báo
eng_explanation: noun: a planned undertaking; noun: a beam of light; verb: to estimate.
example: We are working on a new construction project.
The projector displayed the presentation on the screen.
The scientist projected the growth rate of the population.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hình chiếu; (kinematography) phim; (thống kê) dự báo
eng_explanation: noun: a shadow or image; noun: a film; noun: a statistical forecast.
example: The sun's projection appeared on the wall.
The movie theater showed a new film projection.
The economic projection indicated a decline in growth.

vn_meaning: tính từ: nổi bật; có địa vị cao
eng_explanation: adjective: standing out; having high status or importance.
example: She is a prominent figure in the business world.
The mountain is a prominent landmark.
He has a prominent role in the play.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lời hứa; (thị trường chứng khoán) cổ phiếu
eng_explanation: noun: a declaration assuring that something will happen; noun: a stock.
example: He made a promise to return tomorrow.
The company’s stock is a promising investment.
She kept her promise and delivered the goods on time.

vn_meaning: tính từ: hứa hẹn; đầy triển vọng
eng_explanation: adjective: showing potential; likely to be successful.
example: The new technology is very promising.
He is a promising young athlete.
The investment is promising, but risky.

vn_meaning: động từ: quảng bá; thăng chức; thúc đẩy
eng_explanation: verb: to publicize; to advance (someone); to encourage.
example: The company is promoting its new product.
He was promoted to a higher position.
The government is trying to promote economic growth.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chiến dịch quảng bá; thăng chức
eng_explanation: noun: a campaign to advertise; noun: an advancement in rank or position.
example: The company launched a successful promotion campaign.
She received a promotion to the marketing department.
The promotion was well-deserved.

vn_meaning: động từ: gợi ý; kích thích; (máy tính) nhanh chóng
eng_explanation: verb: to encourage or stimulate; adjective: acting quickly.
example: The teacher prompted the students to answer the question.
The music prompted a feeling of sadness.
The computer responded promptly to the command.

vn_meaning: động từ: phát âm; tuyên bố
eng_explanation: verb: to say something clearly; to declare officially.
example: Please pronounce the word correctly.
The president pronounced the new policy.
The judge pronounced the verdict.

vn_meaning: tính từ: rõ ràng, dễ nhận thấy (âm thanh); động từ: phát âm rõ ràng
eng_explanation: adjective: clearly noticeable; verb: to speak with a clear voice.
example: The speaker had a pronounced accent.
She pronounced the word incorrectly.
The difference in their opinions was pronounced.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bằng chứng; sự chứng minh; (in baking) chất làm rỗng bánh
eng_explanation: noun: evidence; something that demonstrates something is true; leavening agent.
example: He needed proof of her identity.
The cake recipe called for yeast as a proof.
The detective searched for proof of the suspect's guilt.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tuyên truyền (thường là thiên vị)
eng_explanation: noun: information, especially of a biased or misleading nature, used to promote a political cause.
example: The government used propaganda to influence public opinion.
The film exposed the dangers of propaganda.
During wartime, propaganda is often used to demonize the enemy.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thích hợp, phù hợp; đúng mực, chính thức; (UK) đúng cách, hợp lệ
eng_explanation: adjective: suitable; correct; formal; legitimate (UK).
example: It's not proper to wear jeans to a wedding.
She gave a proper apology.
He filed a proper claim with the insurance company.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: thích hợp, phù hợp; đúng cách, cẩn thận
eng_explanation: adverb: in a suitable or correct way; carefully.
example: The equipment needs to be maintained properly.
He handled the situation properly.
The documents were filed properly.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tài sản; đặc tính, phẩm chất
eng_explanation: noun: possessions; a quality or characteristic of something.
example: He inherited a large property from his grandfather.
The property is located in a desirable area.
The material has the property of being very strong.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tỷ lệ; phần so với toàn bộ
eng_explanation: noun: a relation between things or magnitudes as expressed numerically; a part compared to the whole.
example: The ingredients must be mixed in the correct proportion.
A small proportion of the population voted.
The building's design maintains a pleasing proportion.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đề xuất; lời đề nghị
eng_explanation: noun: a plan or suggestion, especially one offered for consideration.
example: The company submitted a proposal for the new project.
She received a marriage proposal.
The proposal was rejected by the committee.

vn_meaning: động từ: đề xuất; cầu hôn
eng_explanation: verb: to suggest an idea or plan; to ask someone to marry.
example: They propose a new strategy for marketing.
He proposed to her in a romantic setting.
The committee will propose changes to the policy.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đề xuất; mệnh đề (trong logic)
eng_explanation: noun: a statement or assertion offered for discussion or proof; a statement in logic.
example: The proposition was debated by the students.
The lawyer presented a clear proposition to the jury.
In logic, a proposition is a declarative sentence.

vn_meaning: động từ: phản đối, biểu tình (công khai); danh từ: sự phản đối, cuộc biểu tình.
eng_explanation: v./n. An expression of strong objection or disapproval. (v. - protest; n. - protest)
example: They organized a protest against the new law.
He lodged a formal protest with the embassy.
The students held a peaceful protest on campus.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người biểu tình, người phản đối.
eng_explanation: n. A person who expresses strong objection or disapproval. (protester)
example: The protesters demanded immediate action on climate change.
Police arrested several protesters during the demonstration.
She joined the ranks of the protesters.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nghi thức, quy tắc ứng xử; giao thức (trong kỹ thuật).
eng_explanation: n. A set of rules or procedures for a formal event or process. (protocol)
example: Diplomatic protocol requires a certain level of formality.
The new security protocol is very strict.
We followed the standard protocol for data transmission.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tự hào, kiêu hãnh.
eng_explanation: adj. Feeling deep pleasure or satisfaction. (proud)
example: She was very proud of her daughter's achievements.
He is a proud member of the team.
They are proud to call themselves Americans.

vn_meaning: động từ: chứng minh, chứng tỏ, tỏ ra.
eng_explanation: v. Demonstrate the truth or existence of something. (prove)
example: Can you prove your innocence?
Scientists have proven that the earth is round.
It will be difficult to prove his guilt.

vn_meaning: động từ: cung cấp, cấp cho, đảm bảo.
eng_explanation: v. Make something available to someone. (provide)
example: The hotel provides free breakfast.
The government provides healthcare for its citizens.
This course will provide you with the necessary skills.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tỉnh (đơn vị hành chính).
eng_explanation: n. A principal administrative division of a country. (province)
example: Ontario is a province of Canada.
He grew up in a rural province.
The province is known for its beautiful scenery.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thuộc tỉnh, địa phương; quê mùa, thiếu hiểu biết.
eng_explanation: adj. Relating to a province; limited in outlook. (provincial)
example: The provincial government is responsible for education.
He has a very provincial attitude.
The town has a charmingly provincial atmosphere.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự cung cấp, điều khoản; lương thực, vật tư.; động từ: cung cấp, dự trữ.
eng_explanation: n. A supply of something; a clause in a legal document. (provision); v. supply (provision)
example: The contract includes a provision for early termination.
They made provisions for the journey.
The ship was well-provisioned for the long voyage.

vn_meaning: động từ: khiêu khích, kích động, gây ra.
eng_explanation: v. Stimulate or incite someone to do or feel something. (provoke)
example: He deliberately provoked her with his comments.
The incident provoked a violent reaction.
Don't provoke the dog; it might bite.

vn_meaning: Liên quan đến sức khỏe tâm thần, có thể dùng để chỉ những vấn đề về tâm trí.
eng_explanation: Psychiatric refers to mental health issues; it can also describe mental disorders.
example: The patient presented with severe psychiatric symptoms.
We need to address the psychological factors contributing to the problem.

vn_meaning: Liên quan đến tâm trí, ý thức, hoặc cảm xúc.
eng_explanation: Psychological is related to the mind, consciousness, or emotions.
example: The study examined the psychological impact of stress.
Her psychological resilience was evident in her response to adversity.

vn_meaning: Một người có chuyên môn về tâm lý học.
eng_explanation: A psychologist is a professional trained in the study of the human mind and behavior.
example: She is a highly respected psychologist in the field.
The psychologist conducted a thorough psychological assessment.

vn_meaning: Nghiên cứu về tâm lý học, bao gồm các khía cạnh của nhận thức, cảm xúc, hành vi và tư duy.
eng_explanation: Psychology is the study of the mind and behavior.
example: The field of psychology is constantly evolving.
She is a leading expert in the field of psychology.

vn_meaning: Được công bố, được xuất bản.
eng_explanation: pub refers to being published or made available publicly.
example: The article was published in the journal.
The book was publicly available for purchase.

vn_meaning: Thường nghĩa là mở rộng, được công nhận, hoặc có sự tham gia của công chúng.
eng_explanation: public is often used to describe something that is widely known or accessible to the public.
example: The company is working to improve its public image.
The news was widely publicized.

vn_meaning: Một bản phát hành, một ấn phẩm.
eng_explanation: publication refers to the act of publishing something.
example: The newspaper published the latest headlines.
She received a prestigious publication for her research.

vn_meaning: Các hoạt động nhằm mục đích quảng bá, thu hút sự chú ý.
eng_explanation: publicity is the act of promoting something.
example: The company launched a public relations campaign.
She used publicity to raise awareness about the issue.

vn_meaning: Được xuất bản, được công bố.
eng_explanation: publish means to make something available for public reading.
example: The author plans to publish his new book next year.
The magazine published a special issue on climate change.

vn_meaning: Một quá trình xuất bản, một ấn phẩm.
eng_explanation: publishing is the process of publishing something.
example: The university is involved in publishing research papers.
She is a successful author in the publishing industry.

vn_meaning: danh động từ: kéo; tính từ: kéo (cứng);
eng_explanation: verb (pull): to exert force to move something closer; adjective (pull): difficult to move.
example: Please pull the rope to open the gate.
He pulled the suitcase along the street.
The strong wind pulled at the trees.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhịp (tim, mạch máu); danh từ: sóng (động lượng, ánh sáng); tính từ: liên tục (nhịp)
eng_explanation: noun (pulse): a rhythmic flow; noun (pulse): a wave of energy; adjective (pulse): continuous.
example: I could feel my heart pulse rapidly.
The radar detected a strong pulse signal.
The pulse of the city never stops.

vn_meaning: danh từ: máy bơm; danh từ: bình bơm; danh động từ: bơm (hơi, nước)
eng_explanation: noun (pump): a device for moving fluids; verb (pump): to force liquid into or out of something.
example: The mechanic repaired the car's fuel pump.
He pumped air into the bicycle tire.
The nurse pumped medication into his veins.

vn_meaning: danh động từ: đấm; danh từ: cú đấm; danh từ: (khẩu) thuốc
eng_explanation: verb (punch): to strike with a closed fist; noun (punch): a blow; noun (punch): a dose.
example: He delivered a powerful punch to his opponent.
She received a punch in the face.
The doctor prescribed a punch of penicillin.

vn_meaning: danh động từ: trừng phạt; xử phạt
eng_explanation: verb (punish): to inflict a penalty for wrongdoing.
example: The judge punished the criminal with a prison sentence.
The school punishes students for bad behavior.
The company punishes employees for tardiness.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hình phạt; sự trừng phạt
eng_explanation: noun (punishment): a penalty for wrongdoing; the act of punishing.
example: The punishment for stealing is severe.
He received a harsh punishment for his actions.
The punishment helped him learn his lesson.

vn_meaning: danh từ: (nghệ thuật) punk rock; danh từ: người punk; tính từ: (thường dùng để chỉ) bụi bặm, nổi loạn
eng_explanation: noun (punk): a subgenre of rock music; noun (punk): a person associated with punk culture; adjective (punk): rebellious.
example: He listened to punk rock music in his bedroom.
The punk band played a loud and energetic show.
He dressed in a punk style with ripped jeans and a leather jacket.

vn_meaning: danh từ: học sinh; danh từ: đồng tử (mắt)
eng_explanation: noun (pupil): a student; noun (pupil): the black part of the eye.
example: The teacher greeted each pupil individually.
The pupil raised his hand to ask a question.
The doctor examined the pupil's reaction.

vn_meaning: danh động từ: mua; hành động mua sắm
eng_explanation: verb (purchase): to buy something; the act of buying.
example: I want to purchase a new car.
She made a large purchase at the store.
The company's purchase order was processed.

vn_meaning: danh từ: (thường dùng để chỉ) thứ tinh khiết; tính từ: tinh khiết, nguyên bản, không lẫn tạp chất
eng_explanation: adjective (pure): unmixed; adjective (pure): innocent; adjective (pure): free from contamination.
example: She drank pure spring water.
He has a pure heart.
The scientist studied the pure form of the element.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: hoàn toàn, chỉ vì một mục đích duy nhất; một cách tinh khiết.
eng_explanation: adverb: purely - completely; solely; without anything else mixed in.
example: The scientist conducted the experiment purely for research purposes.
She purely enjoys painting landscapes in her free time.
He purely focused on finishing the project on time.

vn_meaning: tính từ: màu tím; danh từ: màu tím.
eng_explanation: adjective/noun: a color intermediate between red and blue.
example: She wore a purple dress to the party.
The sunset painted the sky in shades of purple.
Purple is often associated with royalty.

vn_meaning: danh từ: mục đích, ý định; lý do.
eng_explanation: noun: the reason for which something is done or created; an aim or intention.
example: What is the purpose of this meeting?
He dedicated his life to the purpose of helping others.
The purpose of the study was to investigate the effects of exercise.

vn_meaning: động từ: theo đuổi, truy đuổi; theo học (ngành học).
eng_explanation: verb: to follow or chase something; to try to achieve something.
example: She decided to pursue a career in medicine.
He will pursue his dream of becoming a professional athlete.
They pursued the thief through the crowded streets.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự theo đuổi, sự truy đuổi; sự tìm kiếm.
eng_explanation: noun: the act of pursuing or chasing something; an occupation or interest.
example: The pursuit of happiness is a common goal.
The police were in pursuit of the getaway car.
Her pursuit of knowledge led her to many fascinating discoveries.

vn_meaning: động từ: đẩy; thúc đẩy; kích động; danh từ: cú đẩy; sự thúc đẩy.
eng_explanation: verb/noun: to exert force on something to move it away from you; a forceful shove.
example: He gave the door a push to open it.
She felt a push from behind.
The company is pushing for new regulations.

vn_meaning: động từ: đặt, để; bỏ; đặt vào; đưa vào; để (tiền, tài sản) vào.
eng_explanation: verb: to place something in a particular position; to invest money.
example: Please put the book on the table.
She put a lot of effort into the project.
He put his savings into a new business.

vn_meaning: danh từ: câu đố, trò chơi trí tuệ; điều khó hiểu; động từ: làm bối rối, làm khó hiểu.
eng_explanation: noun/verb: a game or problem that tests ingenuity; to confuse or perplex someone.
example: She enjoys solving puzzles in her spare time.
The instructions were a puzzle to him.
The unexpected result puzzled the researchers.

vn_meaning: danh từ: trình độ, tiêu chuẩn; bằng cấp, chứng chỉ.
eng_explanation: noun: a quality or accomplishment that makes someone suitable for a job or task.
example: He has the necessary qualifications for the job.
She needs to improve her qualifications to get promoted.
The job requires specific academic qualifications.

vn_meaning: tính từ: có trình độ, có năng lực; đủ tiêu chuẩn; (y học) có giấy phép hành nghề; động từ: đủ tiêu chuẩn, có trình độ.
eng_explanation: adjective/verb: having the necessary skills or qualifications; officially recognized as competent.
example: She is a qualified teacher with ten years of experience.
He qualified for the Olympic team.
The doctor is fully qualified to perform the surgery.

vn_meaning: tính từ: nhanh chóng, nhanh nhẹn (thời gian, tốc độ); danh từ: tốc độ, sự nhanh nhẹn
eng_explanation: adj. moving or capable of moving at high speed; n. speed or pace. (PoS: adj, n)
example: He made a quick decision.
She has a quick mind.
The runner set a new personal quick.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: nhanh chóng, nhanh nhẹn (thực hiện một hành động)
eng_explanation: adv. in a fast or rapid manner. (PoS: adv)
example: Please respond quickly.
She quickly finished her work.
The dog quickly ate its food.

vn_meaning: tính từ: yên tĩnh, lặng lẽ (âm thanh, môi trường); danh từ: sự yên tĩnh, sự im lặng
eng_explanation: adj. making little or no noise; n. the state of being still or calm. (PoS: adj, n)
example: The library is a quiet place.
She spoke in a quiet voice.
He enjoyed the quiet of the countryside.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: yên tĩnh, lặng lẽ (thực hiện một hành động)
eng_explanation: adv. in a quiet manner; without making noise. (PoS: adv)
example: She quietly left the room.
He quietly closed the door.
They spoke quietly to each other.

vn_meaning: động từ: bỏ, thôi (việc làm, thói quen); chấm dứt, ngừng
eng_explanation: v. to stop doing something; to resign from a job. (PoS: v)
example: He decided to quit his job.
Please quit smoking.
She quit the race after an injury.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: khá, hơi; hoàn toàn, tuyệt đối (thường dùng với phủ định)
eng_explanation: adv. to a certain extent; completely (often with 'not'). (PoS: adv)
example: It's quite cold today.
I'm not quite ready yet.
She is quite a talented musician.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hạn ngạch, chỉ tiêu (số lượng được phép)
eng_explanation: n. a fixed, limited quantity or number. (PoS: n)
example: The factory has a production quota.
They met their sales quota.
Immigration quotas were established.

vn_meaning: danh từ: trích dẫn, câu nói (từ một nguồn khác)
eng_explanation: n. a passage quoted from a book or author. (PoS: n)
example: He used a quotation from Shakespeare.
The article included several quotations.
Verify the accuracy of the quotation.

vn_meaning: động từ: trích dẫn, dẫn chứng (từ một nguồn khác); danh từ: câu trích dẫn, báo giá
eng_explanation: v. to repeat words spoken by another; n. a price offered. (PoS: v, n)
example: She quoted a famous poem.
Can I get a quote for the repairs?
He received several quotes from contractors.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cuộc đua, chủng tộc; động từ: đua, chạy đua
eng_explanation: n. a competition of speed; n. a group of people; v. to compete. (PoS: n, v)
example: He won the race.
The human race is diverse.
They race cars professionally.

vn_meaning: được phân biệt dựa trên nguồn gốc hoặc chủng tộc; liên quan đến việc phân biệt dựa trên chủng tộc.
eng_explanation: racial refers to distinguishing based on ancestry or ethnicity.
example: The debate over racial discrimination is a complex issue.
Her understanding of racial inequality was deeply rooted in her experiences.

vn_meaning: chạy đua; thi đấu; thường xuyên.
eng_explanation: racing is a form of competitive sports.
example: The Formula 1 team is renowned for its racing prowess.
He enjoys watching racing events on television.

vn_meaning: định kiến, phân biệt đối xử dựa trên chủng tộc; sự bất công về chủng tộc.
eng_explanation: racism is prejudice and discrimination based on race.
example: The film explores the dangers of systemic racism.
She became increasingly aware of the harmful effects of racism.

vn_meaning: có định kiến, phân biệt đối xử dựa trên chủng tộc; người có định kiến về chủng tộc.
eng_explanation: a racist is someone who holds prejudiced beliefs about race.
example: He was accused of being a racist after making a disparaging comment.
The politician's rhetoric was widely criticized as racist.

vn_meaning: màn hình phát hiện sự di chuyển; hệ thống phát hiện sự di chuyển.
eng_explanation: radar is a device used to detect movement.
example: The police used a radar to track the suspect's vehicle.
The radar system provided a clear picture of the surroundings.

vn_meaning: tia sáng; năng lượng phát ra từ các hạt.
eng_explanation: radiation is a form of energy emitted by radioactive materials.
example: The scientists studied the effects of radiation exposure.
The radiation levels were dangerously high.

vn_meaning: đang theo đuổi những ý tưởng hoặc hành động mạnh mẽ, thường là những ý tưởng hoặc hành động bất hợp pháp.
eng_explanation: radical refers to a strong and often controversial opinion or action.
example: The political movement was driven by radical ideas.
He advocated for radical social change.

vn_meaning: máy phát sóng phát ra tín hiệu radio; truyền hình.
eng_explanation: radio is a device that transmits radio signals.
example: He enjoys listening to the latest radio broadcasts.
The radio station played a popular song.

vn_meaning: sự tức giận; sự phẫn nộ.
eng_explanation: rage is a strong feeling of anger and frustration.
example: He felt a wave of rage after the news broke.
The crowd erupted in a frenzy of rage.

vn_meaning: chuyến công tác; cuộc tấn công.
eng_explanation: raid is a military operation involving a surprise attack.
example: The soldiers launched a daring raid on the enemy base.
The raid was quickly suppressed by the security forces.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đường sắt; danh từ: thanh ray (địu tàu)
eng_explanation: noun: a track for trains; a bar or rod, often metal.
example: The train followed the steel rail.
The engineer inspected the rail for damage.
The rail system connects major cities.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đường sắt; danh từ: hệ thống đường sắt
eng_explanation: noun: a system of tracks for trains; a line of battle.
example: They traveled by railway to London.
The railway station was busy with travelers.
The railway network expanded rapidly during the 19th century.

vn_meaning: danh từ: mưa; danh từ: nước mưa
eng_explanation: noun: water falling from the sky; moisture from the atmosphere.
example: It's raining heavily outside.
The rain nourished the crops.
She enjoyed watching the rain fall.

vn_meaning: động từ: nâng lên; động từ: tăng giá; động từ: nuôi dạy; động từ: triệu tập
eng_explanation: verb: to lift something; to increase something; to educate; to summon.
example: Please raise your hand if you have a question.
He raised the flag to celebrate.
The company plans to raise its profits this year.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cuộc mít tinh; danh từ: sự phục hồi; danh từ: sự ủng hộ
eng_explanation: noun: a public meeting; a recovery; support or enthusiasm.
example: Thousands of people attended the political rally.
The company’s stock rallied after the announcement.
He needed a rally of support to continue his campaign.

vn_meaning: tính từ: ngẫu nhiên; tính từ: vô định
eng_explanation: adjective: occurring by chance; irregular or undefined.
example: The results were completely random.
