The pattern was random and chaotic.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phạm vi; danh từ: dãy núi; danh từ: máy đo khoảng cách
eng_explanation: noun: a distance or extent; a series of mountains; a device for measuring distance.
example: The temperature ranges from 20 to 30 degrees.
The mountains form a scenic range.
He used a rangefinder to take a picture.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thứ hạng; danh từ: sĩ quan (quân đội); danh từ: hàng (cây)
eng_explanation: noun: a position in a hierarchy; a military officer; a row of plants.
example: She achieved a high rank in the company.
He was promoted to the rank of captain.
The plants formed a beautiful rank along the border.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thứ hạng; danh từ: việc xếp hạng
eng_explanation: noun: a position in a ranking system; the process of ranking.
example: His ranking in the competition was impressive.
The ranking system is based on performance.
The ranking of schools is controversial.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cưỡng hiếp; danh từ: (thường dùng trong quân sự) tấn công
eng_explanation: noun: sexual assault; (military) an attack.
example: She was a victim of rape.
The soldiers engaged in a brutal rape of the enemy lines.
Rape is a serious crime.

vn_meaning: tính từ: nhanh chóng (tốc độ); thung lũng (địa lý).
eng_explanation: adjective: happening very quickly; steep-sided valley.
example: The river's rapid current made it dangerous to swim in.
The rapid development of technology has transformed our lives.
We hiked through a beautiful, rapid valley.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: một cách nhanh chóng.
eng_explanation: adverb: at a fast pace; quickly.
example: The company's profits are rapidly increasing.
The news spread rapidly through social media.
The patient's condition deteriorated rapidly.

vn_meaning: tính từ: hiếm có, quý hiếm; chín (trứng).; danh từ: loài quý hiếm.
eng_explanation: adjective: not often found or seen; (of an egg) cooked with a runny yolk. noun: a creature that is uncommon.
example: Rare stamps can be very valuable.
I like my eggs cooked rare.
The rainforest is home to many rare species.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: ít khi, hiếm khi.
eng_explanation: adverb: not often; infrequently.
example: I rarely eat fast food.
She rarely complains about anything.
They rarely visit their relatives.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chuột (cắn).
eng_explanation: noun: a rodent often found in sewers and known to spread disease.
example: We saw a rat scurrying across the street.
The exterminator set traps to catch the rats.
The ship was infested with rats.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tỷ lệ, tốc độ; mức giá; danh từ: đánh giá. ; động từ: đánh giá, xếp hạng.
eng_explanation: noun: a measure, ratio, or frequency. verb: to estimate the value or quality of something.
example: The interest rate on the loan is 5%.
What is the current exchange rate?
The teacher rated the students' essays.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: khá, tương đối; hơn là.
eng_explanation: adverb: considerably; instead of.
example: It's rather cold today.
I'd rather stay home than go out.
The movie was rather disappointing.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đánh giá, xếp hạng; điểm số.
eng_explanation: noun: an assessment of quality; a score or rank.
example: The movie received a high rating from critics.
What's the hotel's customer rating?
The show's rating has been declining.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tỷ lệ, tỉ số.
eng_explanation: noun: the relationship between two numbers or quantities.
example: The ratio of men to women in the class is 2:1.
The debt-to-income ratio is an important factor in loan applications.
The golden ratio is found in many works of art.

vn_meaning: tính từ: hợp lý, lý trí; có lý do.
eng_explanation: adjective: based on reason or logic; sensible.
example: It's not rational to spend all your money at once.
He made a rational decision after considering all the options.
Her behavior was completely irrational.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thật, thực tế, chân thật (không phải giả); danh từ: hiện thực, thực tế (triết học)
eng_explanation: adj. Actually existing as a thing or occurring in fact; not imagined or supposed. n. The state of things as they actually exist. (PoS: adj, n)
example: Is this a real diamond?
The real problem is a lack of funding.
He lives in a world of fantasy, far removed from reality.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thực tế, có tính khả thi, hiện thực (đánh giá đúng mức độ khả thi);
eng_explanation: adj. Having or showing a practical and accurate view of reality. (PoS: adj)
example: Her expectations were very realistic.
The movie offers a realistic portrayal of life in the city.
We need a realistic plan to solve this problem.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hiện thực, thực tế (tất cả những gì tồn tại, không phải ảo tưởng); sự thật (tính chất đúng đắn của sự việc)
eng_explanation: n. The state of things as they actually exist, as opposed to an idealistic or notional idea of them. (PoS: n)
example: Virtual reality is becoming increasingly popular.
The reality of the situation is much worse than we thought.
He was shocked by the harsh realities of war.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự nhận ra, sự ý thức (hiểu rõ điều gì đó); sự thực hiện (biến ý tưởng thành hiện thực)
eng_explanation: n. The act of becoming fully aware of something as a fact; the achievement of something desired. (PoS: n)
example: Her realization of the danger came too late.
The realization of his dream took years of hard work.
With growing horror, came the realization that she had been tricked.

vn_meaning: động từ: nhận ra, ý thức (hiểu rõ điều gì đó); thực hiện (biến ý tưởng thành hiện thực); bán (để thu lợi)
eng_explanation: v. Become fully aware of something as a fact; achieve or fulfill something. (PoS: v)
example: I didn't realize it was so late.
She finally realized her potential.
He realized a substantial profit from the sale of his shares.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: thực sự, thật sự (diễn tả mức độ cao);
eng_explanation: adv. In reality; genuinely; truly. (PoS: adv)
example: Are you really going to leave?
It was a really good movie.
I'm really tired after the long journey.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lĩnh vực, phạm vi (một lĩnh vực hoạt động hoặc kiến thức); vương quốc (lãnh thổ của vua chúa)
eng_explanation: n. A kingdom; a field or domain of activity or interest. (PoS: n)
example: The realm of science is constantly expanding.
This is a realm beyond our understanding.
The fairy tale takes place in a magical realm.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phía sau (của một vật); động từ: nuôi nấng, dạy dỗ (trẻ em, động vật); trồng (cây)
eng_explanation: n. The back part of something. v. Raise (children, animals); grow (plants). (PoS: n, v)
example: The garden is at the rear of the house.
She rears chickens in her backyard.
He was reared by his grandparents.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lý do, nguyên nhân (giải thích tại sao điều gì đó xảy ra); lý trí (khả năng suy nghĩ, phán đoán); động từ: suy luận, lý luận
eng_explanation: n. A cause, justification, or motive for an action or belief. v. Think about something in a logical way. (PoS: n, v)
example: What's the reason for your decision?
He appealed to her reason.
She reasoned that it was better to leave.

vn_meaning: tính từ: hợp lý, có lý (dựa trên lý trí, logic); phải chăng (giá cả)
eng_explanation: adj. Based on or in accordance with reason or logic; fair and sensible. (PoS: adj)
example: That's a reasonable request.
The price is very reasonable.
He offered a reasonable explanation for his absence.

vn_meaning: có lẽ; hợp lý; phù hợp; có đủ
eng_explanation: It suggests a degree of plausibility or suitability.
example: The evidence is reasonably convincing.
We need to consider the reasonably available information.

vn_meaning: lý luận; suy luận; phân tích
eng_explanation: It involves using logic and evidence to arrive at a conclusion.
example: The scientist used reasoning to explain the phenomenon.
Critical reasoning is essential for problem-solving.

vn_meaning: đảm bảo; trấn an; làm tin tưởng
eng_explanation: It provides comfort and confidence.
example: The doctor reassured the patient.
Please reassure yourself that you are safe.

vn_meaning: người nổi loạn; phản đối; chống lại
eng_explanation: It signifies a defiance of authority.
example: The rebels demanded an end to the oppressive regime.
He was a rebel against the established order.

vn_meaning: cuộc nổi loạn; phản kháng
eng_explanation: It is a violent uprising against a government or system.
example: The people launched a rebellion against the dictator.
The rebels fought for their freedom.

vn_meaning: xây dựng lại; khôi phục; sửa chữa
eng_explanation: It involves restoring something to its original state.
example: The engineers are rebuilding the bridge.
The city is rebuilding after the disaster.

vn_meaning: ghi nhớ; nhớ lại; hồi tưởng
eng_explanation: It refers to remembering something previously.
example: I recall a funny story from my childhood.
He recalled the important details of the meeting.

vn_meaning: bằng chứng; giấy xác nhận; bản sao
eng_explanation: It signifies a document confirming something.
example: The receipt confirmed the purchase.
She received a receipt for her expenses.

vn_meaning: nhận; đón tiếp; nhận được
eng_explanation: It means to get something.
example: I received an email from my friend.
The package arrived in a timely manner.

vn_meaning: người nhận; người được hưởng
eng_explanation: It refers to someone who receives something.
example: The receiver of the award was honored.
She is a receiver of the company's benefits.

vn_meaning: đại từ chỉ thời gian: gần đây; tính từ: mới đây; danh từ: sự kiện/sự việc gần đây
eng_explanation: adj. recent - occurring or done lately; n. recent - a recent event.
example: The recent storm caused widespread damage.
I had a recent conversation with my old friend.
She received a recent promotion at work.

vn_meaning: chi phủ: gần đây; trạng từ chỉ thời gian
eng_explanation: adv. recently - in the recent past; describes an action that happened lately.
example: I recently visited Paris.
He recently started a new job.
Recently, there has been a lot of rain.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tiếp tân; lễ tiếp tân; sự đón tiếp; (kinh tế) thu nhập
eng_explanation: n. reception - the act of welcoming someone; a social gathering.
example: The hotel has a beautiful reception area.
She hosted a formal reception for her guests.
The company's revenue is a key part of its reception.

vn_meaning: danh từ: suy thoái kinh tế; (vật lý) co lại
eng_explanation: n. recession - a period of economic decline; a shrinking or contracting action.
example: The country is experiencing a severe recession.
The recession led to job losses and reduced spending.
The pendulum swung back into recession.

vn_meaning: danh từ: công thức nấu ăn; phương pháp
eng_explanation: n. recipe - a set of instructions for preparing food.
example: This recipe is for chocolate cake.
I followed the recipe exactly.
She has a secret recipe for apple pie.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người nhận; đối tượng nhận
eng_explanation: n. recipient - the person or thing that receives something.
example: The recipient of the award was a deserving student.
Please write the recipient's address clearly.
The recipient will receive the package next week.

vn_meaning: động từ: ước tính; nghĩ rằng; đoán
eng_explanation: v. reckon - to estimate or suppose; to think.
example: I reckon it will rain tomorrow.
Let's reckon how much money we need.
He reckons he can finish the project by Friday.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự công nhận; nhận biết; sự hiểu biết
eng_explanation: n. recognition - the act of identifying or acknowledging; awareness.
example: She received national recognition for her achievements.
The company gained recognition for its innovative products.
He had no recognition of the danger.

vn_meaning: động từ: nhận ra; công nhận; ghi nhận
eng_explanation: v. recognize - to identify something or someone; to acknowledge.
example: I recognize her from a picture.
The judge recognized the defendant's guilt.
She recognized the symptoms of the illness.

vn_meaning: động từ: đề nghị; khuyên; giới thiệu
eng_explanation: v. recommend - to suggest something; to advise.
example: I recommend this restaurant to you.
The doctor recommended a healthy diet.
She recommended him for the promotion.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lời giới thiệu, lời khuyên (để ai đó làm gì đó); đề xuất (giải pháp, phương án).
eng_explanation: noun: an act of recommending; a suggestion or proposal for action.
example: I received a glowing recommendation from a former colleague.
The committee made a recommendation to improve the company's efficiency.
Based on the doctor's recommendation, I started taking vitamins.

vn_meaning: danh từ: việc xây dựng lại; quá trình tái thiết.
eng_explanation: noun: the process of rebuilding or restoring something to its original state.
example: The reconstruction of the city after the earthquake took several years.
Historical reconstruction helps us understand past events.
The museum features a detailed reconstruction of a Roman villa.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bản ghi; hồ sơ; kỷ lục; động từ: ghi lại.
eng_explanation: noun: a collection of data; a piece of information; a feat achieved. verb: to set down in writing or other permanent form.
example: The company has a detailed record of all transactions.
She broke the world record in the 100-meter sprint.
Please record the meeting for future reference.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bản thu âm; quá trình thu âm.
eng_explanation: noun: the act of recording sound or video; a copy of sound or video.
example: The recording of the concert was excellent.
We're making a recording of the band's new song.
The studio specializes in high-quality audio recordings.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự kể lại; động từ: kể lại; kiểm phiếu lại.
eng_explanation: noun: the act of telling a story. verb: to tell in detail; to count again.
example: She gave a detailed recount of her travels.
The election officials decided to recount the votes.
He recounted the events of the evening.

vn_meaning: động từ: hồi phục; lấy lại; thu hồi.
eng_explanation: verb: to return to a normal state of health, mind, or strength; to regain possession of.
example: He is recovering well from his surgery.
She needs time to recover from the shock.
The company hopes to recover its losses.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự hồi phục; sự phục hồi; việc thu hồi.
eng_explanation: noun: the process of returning to a normal state; regaining possession.
example: The patient is making good progress in his recovery.
The economy is showing signs of recovery.
The police are working to recover the stolen goods.

vn_meaning: động từ: tuyển dụng; chiêu mộ; danh từ: người được tuyển dụng.
eng_explanation: verb: to attract and select someone for a particular job or activity. noun: a person who is recruited.
example: The company is recruiting new staff.
They need to recruit experienced engineers.
He was a valuable recruit to the team.

vn_meaning: danh từ: việc tuyển dụng; quá trình tuyển dụng.
eng_explanation: noun: the process of finding and hiring new employees.
example: The recruitment process can be lengthy and competitive.
The company has a dedicated recruitment team.
They are focusing on diversity in their recruitment efforts.

vn_meaning: động từ: tái chế; danh từ: vật liệu tái chế.
eng_explanation: verb: to convert waste into reusable material. noun: material that can be recycled.
example: We should recycle more to protect the environment.
The bins are for paper and plastic recycling.
Recycled materials are used to make new products.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nơi ẩn náu, chốn nương tựa (tránh nguy hiểm, khó khăn); sự bảo vệ, sự che chở.
eng_explanation: n. A place of shelter, protection, or safety. (n.)
example: The mountains provided a refuge from the storm.
They found refuge in a small village.
The library is my refuge from the stresses of daily life.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người tị nạn, người di cư (do chiến tranh, thiên tai, hoặc bị đàn áp).
eng_explanation: n. A person forced to leave their country due to war, persecution, or disaster. (n.)
example: Many refugees sought asylum in neighboring countries.
The refugee camp was overcrowded and lacked basic supplies.
She is a refugee from the ongoing conflict.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự từ chối, sự khước từ; lời từ chối.
eng_explanation: n. The act of rejecting or declining something. (n.)
example: His refusal to cooperate hindered the investigation.
She received a polite refusal to her request.
The company's refusal to negotiate led to a strike.

vn_meaning: động từ: từ chối, khước từ; (ít dùng) rác thải, phế liệu. danh từ: rác thải, phế liệu.
eng_explanation: v. To decline to accept or do something. (v.) n. Waste material. (n.)
example: He refused to answer any questions.
She refused the offer of help.
The city is working to reduce its refuse output.

vn_meaning: động từ: giành lại, lấy lại (cái gì đã mất); phục hồi (sức khỏe, tinh thần).
eng_explanation: v. To get something back; to recover. (v.)
example: She is trying to regain her strength after the illness.
The team hopes to regain the lead in the championship.
He worked hard to regain his reputation.

vn_meaning: động từ: coi, xem xét; tôn trọng, kính trọng. danh từ: sự tôn trọng, sự kính trọng; sự quan tâm, sự để ý.
eng_explanation: v. To think of in a particular way; to respect. (v.) n. Respect or consideration. (n.)
example: I regard him as a close friend.
She has a high regard for her teachers.
With regard to your question, I have no comment.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: bất kể, không kể đến, dù sao đi nữa.
eng_explanation: adv. Despite everything; without considering. (adv.)
example: Regardless of the weather, the event will take place.
She continued working regardless of the pain.
Regardless of your opinion, I will proceed with my plan.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chế độ (chính trị, quân sự); chính quyền.
eng_explanation: n. A system of government; a ruling power. (n.)
example: The new regime promised economic reforms.
The country suffered under a harsh military regime.
The dictator's regime was overthrown by a revolution.

vn_meaning: danh từ: vùng, miền; khu vực.
eng_explanation: n. An area of land; a part of a country. (n.)
example: The wine region of California is famous for its vineyards.
The region was devastated by the earthquake.
This is a remote region of the country.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thuộc vùng, địa phương; khu vực.
eng_explanation: adj. Relating to a particular region. (adj.)
example: The company has regional offices across the country.
The museum features regional art and artifacts.
There is a strong regional accent in this area.

vn_meaning: đăng ký
eng_explanation: To formally join a group or organization.
example: I need to register for the program.
She registered for the university after graduation.
The company is looking for new employees to register.

vn_meaning: đăng ký
eng_explanation: The process of joining a group or organization.
example: The registration process was lengthy and complicated.
She registered her car for insurance.
The organization requires registration for new members.

vn_meaning: hối hận
eng_explanation: A feeling of sorrow or disappointment.
example: I have a great regret for not telling her the truth.
He expressed a deep regret for his mistake.
It's a painful regret to lose a loved one.

vn_meaning: thường xuyên
eng_explanation: Consistent and regular in quality, quantity, or behavior.
example: The regular schedule keeps everyone on track.
He has a regular habit of exercising.
The regular pattern of rainfall is noticeable.

vn_meaning: thường xuyên
eng_explanation: In a regular manner or time.
example: She regularly attends the meetings.
The company follows a regular reporting schedule.
They regularly check the weather forecast.

vn_meaning: điều chỉnh
eng_explanation: To control or adjust something to make it more stable or appropriate.
example: The government is trying to regulate the economy.
We need to regulate the traffic flow to prevent accidents.
The company is regulating its production process.

vn_meaning: quy định
eng_explanation: A rule or law that governs a particular activity or area.
example: The new regulation requires all businesses to comply.
The industry is facing increasing regulation.
The regulation protects consumers from unsafe products.

vn_meaning: cơ quan quản lý
eng_explanation: A person or system that controls or manages something.
example: The regulator oversaw the financial market.
The new regulator is responsible for overseeing the company.
The regulator ensured compliance with the law.

vn_meaning: quản lý
eng_explanation: Relating to the regulation of something.
example: The regulatory agency is responsible for enforcing environmental laws.
The company is subject to strict regulatory requirements.
The new regulation is designed to improve safety standards.

vn_meaning: rehabilitation
eng_explanation: The process of restoring a person or animal to a normal state of health or function.
example: The rehabilitation center provides therapy for patients with disabilities.
The program aims to rehabilitate the injured wildlife.
She is undergoing rehabilitation after the surgery.

vn_meaning: đại diện: triều đại; trạng thái: cai trị; (thời tiết) mưa to, gió lớn
eng_explanation: noun (n): a period of rule by a monarch; verb (v): to rule.
example: The queen's reign was marked by prosperity.
The storm caused widespread flooding during its reign.
He reigned supreme over the kingdom.

vn_meaning: tăng cường: củng cố; bổ sung: tăng thêm
eng_explanation: verb (v): to strengthen or support; to add to something.
example: The soldiers reinforced the border defenses.
Adding more details will reinforce your argument.
He reinforced his commitment to the project.

vn_meaning: từ chối: bác bỏ; loại bỏ: thải ra
eng_explanation: verb (v): to refuse to accept; to discard.
example: She rejected his proposal.
The committee rejected the application.
He rejected the idea as impractical.

vn_meaning: sự từ chối: sự bác bỏ; sự thải ra
eng_explanation: noun (n): the act of refusing; the state of being discarded.
example: The rejection letter was disappointing.
His rejection of the offer surprised everyone.
The company experienced high rates of rejection.

vn_meaning: liên quan: có liên hệ; kể chuyện: mô tả
eng_explanation: verb (v): to be connected; to tell a story or account.
example: This issue relates to the company's finances.
Can you relate this experience to your previous work?
He related a fascinating story about his travels.

vn_meaning: liên quan: có liên hệ; tương tự: giống nhau
eng_explanation: adjective (adj): connected or similar; having a relationship.
example: These two events are related.
They are closely related in terms of their history.
The symptoms are related to the illness.

vn_meaning: mối quan hệ: sự liên hệ; sự liên kết
eng_explanation: noun (n): a connection or association; a relationship.
example: They have a close relation.
The relation between cause and effect is important.
A strong relation is crucial for success.

vn_meaning: mối quan hệ: sự liên hệ; sự liên kết (trong các mối quan hệ xã hội, gia đình, v.v.)
eng_explanation: noun (n): a connection or bond between people; a state of being connected.
example: Their relationship is based on mutual respect.
The family relationship is very important.
A healthy relationship requires communication.

vn_meaning: gần gũi: thân thiết; tương đối: so sánh
eng_explanation: adjective (adj): close in degree or relationship; proportional.
example: She is a relative of my husband.
The temperature is relatively low.
The profit margin is relatively small.

vn_meaning: tương đối: so sánh
eng_explanation: adverb (adv): in a relatively manner; comparatively.
example: The damage was relatively minor.
It's relatively easy to learn.
The situation is relatively stable.

vn_meaning: động từ: thư giãn (thể chất, tinh thần); thả lỏng (cơ thể).
eng_explanation: verb - to become or make relaxed; to rest and feel less stressed.
example: I like to relax after a long day of work.
Try to relax and enjoy your vacation.
She needed to relax her shoulders after carrying heavy bags.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thoải mái; thư giãn; bình tĩnh.
eng_explanation: adjective - free from tension and anxiety; calm and easygoing.
example: He had a relaxed posture while waiting for the results.
The atmosphere at the party was very relaxed.
She felt relaxed after her yoga session.

vn_meaning: tính từ: giúp thư giãn; thoải mái; dễ chịu. ; động từ: đang thư giãn.
eng_explanation: adjective - causing relaxation; tranquil; verb - in the process of relaxing.
example: The relaxing music helped me fall asleep.
She found the beach to be a very relaxing place.
I'm relaxing on the sofa with a good book.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự thả ra; sự phát hành; động từ: thả ra; phát hành.
eng_explanation: noun - the act of setting someone or something free; verb - to free from captivity or restraint.
example: The release of the prisoners was a major event.
The company plans to release a new product next month.
He felt a sense of release after finishing the project.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự liên quan; tính thích hợp.
eng_explanation: noun - the quality of being closely connected or appropriate.
example: The relevance of the study to the current debate is clear.
The information has no relevance to the case.
Consider the relevance of your argument to the topic.

vn_meaning: tính từ: liên quan; thích hợp; có liên hệ.
eng_explanation: adjective - closely connected or appropriate to the matter at hand.
example: This information is highly relevant to our investigation.
The experience is relevant to the job requirements.
Are these details relevant to the discussion?

vn_meaning: danh từ: độ tin cậy; tính đáng tin.
eng_explanation: noun - the quality of being trustworthy or dependable.
example: The reliability of the data is questionable.
The car's reliability is one of its main selling points.
We need to assess the reliability of the source.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đáng tin cậy; chắc chắn; có thể tin vào.
eng_explanation: adjective - consistently good in quality or performance; able to be trusted.
example: He is a reliable friend who always keeps his promises.
The car is known for its reliable performance.
We need a reliable source of information.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự giảm nhẹ; sự cứu rỗi; cảm giác nhẹ nhõm.
eng_explanation: noun - a feeling of reassurance and relaxation following release from anxiety or distress.
example: She felt a great sense of relief when she heard the good news.
The medicine provided instant relief from the pain.
Financial relief is desperately needed.

vn_meaning: động từ: làm giảm bớt; tháo gỡ; giúp đỡ.
eng_explanation: verb - to make less intense or serious; to free from a burden or obligation.
example: The medicine helped relieve his headache.
Can you relieve me of some of my duties?
The rain relieved the drought conditions.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: một cách đáng chú ý; một cách khác thường (thường mang ý tích cực)
eng_explanation: adv. In a noteworthy or striking manner; surprisingly. (≤ 20 words)
example: She is remarkably talented for her age.
The weather has been remarkably mild this winter.
The project was remarkably successful, exceeding all expectations.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phương thuốc chữa bệnh; cách giải quyết vấn đề; biện pháp khắc phục; tính từ: có khả năng chữa trị (ít dùng)
eng_explanation: n. A medicine or treatment for a disease; a solution to a problem. (≤ 18 words)
example: This herbal tea is a traditional remedy for colds.
The only remedy for this situation is to apologize.
The judge sought a legal remedy to the dispute.

vn_meaning: động từ: nhớ; ghi nhớ; hồi tưởng lại; nhắc nhở (ai đó)
eng_explanation: v. To recall to the mind; to keep in memory. (≤ 13 words)
example: Do you remember our trip to Italy?
Please remember to lock the door when you leave.
I'll always remember her kindness.

vn_meaning: động từ: nhắc nhở; gợi nhớ; làm ai đó nhớ lại
eng_explanation: v. To cause someone to remember something; to prompt. (≤ 14 words)
example: Can you remind me to call the doctor tomorrow?
This song reminds me of my childhood.
She reminded him of their appointment.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lời nhắc nhở; vật nhắc nhở
eng_explanation: n. Something that prompts a memory or recollection. (≤ 11 words)
example: I set a reminder on my phone for the meeting.
This photo serves as a reminder of our happy times.
He needs a reminder about the deadline.

vn_meaning: tính từ: xa xôi; hẻo lánh; xa cách; khó tiếp cận; điều khiển từ xa; danh từ: vùng xa xôi; điều khiển từ xa
eng_explanation: adj. Situated far away; distant; operated from a distance. (≤ 17 words)
example: They live in a remote mountain village.
He controls the TV with a remote.
The possibility of success seems remote.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự loại bỏ; sự di dời; sự tháo gỡ
eng_explanation: n. The act of taking something away or off. (≤ 10 words)
example: The removal of the old tree was necessary.
The furniture removal was scheduled for Monday.
His removal from the team was unexpected.

vn_meaning: động từ: loại bỏ; di dời; tháo gỡ; cách chức
eng_explanation: v. To take something away or off; to dismiss from a position. (≤ 15 words)
example: Please remove your shoes before entering.
The doctor removed the bandage.
He was removed from his post due to misconduct.

vn_meaning: động từ: thể hiện; diễn tả; làm cho (ở trạng thái nào đó); trả lại (quyền sở hữu, dịch vụ,...); phán xét
eng_explanation: v. To cause to be; to provide or give; to translate. (≤ 14 words)
example: The artist rendered the landscape beautifully.
The storm rendered the road impassable.
He rendered assistance to the injured.

vn_meaning: động từ: làm mới; gia hạn; đổi mới; tái tạo
eng_explanation: v. To make like new; to extend the period of validity. (≤ 13 words)
example: I need to renew my driver's license.
The spa treatment helped to renew her energy.
The company is renewing its commitment to sustainability.

vn_meaning: được đánh giá cao, nổi tiếng, có uy tín
eng_explanation: Highly regarded and well-known.
example: The renowned artist is known for his masterpieces.
She is a renowned expert in astrophysics.

vn_meaning: thuê
eng_explanation: To rent something.
example: I need to rent a car for the weekend.
They rent apartments in the city center.

vn_meaning: thuê
eng_explanation: The act of renting.
example: The rental price is very high.
We are looking for a rental property.

vn_meaning: sửa chữa
eng_explanation: To fix something that is broken.
example: I need to repair my car engine.
The mechanic offered to repair the furniture.

vn_meaning: lặp lại
eng_explanation: To repeat something.
example: Please repeat that, please.
He repeated his answer to the question.

vn_meaning: lặp lại
eng_explanation: To repeat something.
example: The company repeated its advertising campaign.
She repeated her mistake several times.

vn_meaning: thay thế
eng_explanation: To substitute something for another.
example: We need to replace the old light bulb.
They replaced the broken window.

vn_meaning: thay thế
eng_explanation: A substitute.
example: We bought a new replacement part.
The store offered a discount on the replacement.

vn_meaning: cứu, trả lời
eng_explanation: To respond to a message or question.
example: Please reply to my email.
She gave a quick reply to my call.

vn_meaning: báo cáo
eng_explanation: A record of an event or activity.
example: The manager gave a detailed report on the sales figures.
He submitted a formal report to his boss.

vn_meaning: tính từ: theo lời đồn; theo báo cáo (không xác nhận chính thức).
eng_explanation: Adverb - According to reports or rumors, but not confirmed.
example: The company reportedly increased its profits this quarter.
He reportedly saw a UFO last night.
The news was reportedly false and spread quickly.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phóng viên; người đưa tin.
eng_explanation: Noun - A person who writes news stories for newspapers, magazines, or broadcast media.
example: The reporter interviewed the suspect at the crime scene.
She is a television reporter for CNN.
A good reporter must be objective and fair.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bản báo cáo; báo cáo (đang được trình bày).; tính từ: đang báo cáo.
eng_explanation: Noun/Adjective - A report; Currently reporting.
example: I received a detailed reporting on the project's progress.
The news is constantly reporting on the developing situation.
He was reporting live from the battlefield.

vn_meaning: động từ: đại diện; biểu diễn; thể hiện; chiếm giữ.
eng_explanation: Verb - To stand for; to symbolize; to act as a representative.
example: He represents his country at international conferences.
The painting represents a scene from nature.
The data represents a significant trend.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đại diện; biểu diễn; hình ảnh; sự đại diện.
eng_explanation: Noun - A symbolic or visual representation; a formal representation.
example: The artwork is a powerful representation of the artist's emotions.
The government's representation of the people's concerns was weak.
A photographic representation of the landscape.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đại diện; người đại diện; mẫu biểu; tiêu biểu.
eng_explanation: Noun - A person chosen to represent others; a typical example.
example: She was elected as a representative of her district.
The new product is a representative of the company's innovation.
He is a representative of the student body.

vn_meaning: động từ: tái tạo; sinh sản; sao chép; in ấn.
eng_explanation: Verb - To create a copy; to reproduce offspring; to print.
example: The printer can reproduce documents quickly and accurately.
The fish reproduce by laying eggs.
Scientists are trying to reproduce the extinct species.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sinh sản; tái tạo; sao chép; quá trình sinh sản.
eng_explanation: Noun - The process of producing offspring; replication.
example: The reproduction of plants is essential for their survival.
The study focused on animal reproduction.
The rapid reproduction of bacteria can cause infection.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nước cộng hòa; quốc cộng hòa.
eng_explanation: Noun - A state in which supreme power is held by the people and their elected representatives.
example: The United States is a republic.
The republic was founded on principles of democracy.
She is a citizen of the republic.

vn_meaning: danh từ: danh tiếng; uy tín; tiếng tăm; sự nổi tiếng.
eng_explanation: Noun - A public opinion of a person or thing; a good reputation.
example: He has a good reputation for honesty and integrity.
The company's reputation was damaged by the scandal.
Her reputation preceded her.

vn_meaning: động từ: yêu cầu, xin (một điều gì đó); danh từ: yêu cầu, đề nghị
eng_explanation: verb: to ask politely for something; noun: a polite asking for something.
example: Could you please request a meeting with the manager?
I sent a request for more information about the project.
The company received numerous requests for assistance.

vn_meaning: động từ: yêu cầu, đòi hỏi, cần thiết
eng_explanation: verb: to need or demand something; to necessitate.
example: The job requires excellent communication skills.
Students are required to submit their assignments on time.
This project requires a significant investment of resources.

vn_meaning: danh từ: yêu cầu, điều kiện, tiêu chuẩn
eng_explanation: noun: something needed or demanded; a condition or stipulation.
example: The minimum requirement for the position is a bachelor's degree.
Meeting all the safety requirements is crucial.
The new regulations impose stricter requirements on businesses.

vn_meaning: động từ: cứu hộ, giải cứu; danh từ: sự cứu hộ, sự giải cứu
eng_explanation: verb: to save someone from danger; noun: the act of saving someone.
example: The firefighters rescued the family from the burning building.
The rescue team worked tirelessly to find the missing hikers.
The successful rescue was a testament to their bravery.

vn_meaning: động từ: nghiên cứu; danh từ: nghiên cứu, cuộc nghiên cứu
eng_explanation: verb: to investigate systematically; noun: systematic investigation to discover facts.
example: Scientists are currently researching the effects of climate change.
Her research focused on renewable energy sources.
The research findings were published in a prestigious journal.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhà nghiên cứu
eng_explanation: noun: a person who carries out research.
example: The researcher presented her findings at the conference.
He is a leading researcher in the field of artificial intelligence.
The university employs many talented researchers.

vn_meaning: động từ: giống, tương tự
eng_explanation: verb: to have similarities; to look or act like.
example: She resembles her mother in both appearance and personality.
The two paintings resemble each other closely.
The new model resembles the previous version.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đặt chỗ (nhà hàng, khách sạn); sự dự định
eng_explanation: noun: an arrangement to have something kept for you; a booking.
example: We have a reservation at the Italian restaurant tonight.
I made a reservation for a hotel room.
She has a reservation about accepting the offer.

vn_meaning: động từ: giữ lại, dành chỗ; danh từ: khu vực dự trữ, sự giữ lại
eng_explanation: verb: to set aside for future use; noun: an area set aside for preservation.
example: Please reserve a table for four.
We need to reserve some funds for emergencies.
The national park is a protected reserve.

vn_meaning: động từ: ở lại, cư trú
eng_explanation: verb: to live; to have one's home.
example: She resides in a small village in the countryside.
He resides at a prestigious address in the city.
Many artists reside in this vibrant neighborhood.

vn_meaning: động từ: tìm đến (khi gặp khó khăn); danh từ: khu nghỉ dưỡng, nơi nghỉ mát.
eng_explanation: v: to turn to someone or something for help (when in difficulty); n: a place visited for pleasure/relaxation. (v, n)
example: When facing problems, you can always resort to asking for advice.
We spent our vacation at a luxurious resort by the beach.
The town is a popular resort for skiers.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nguồn lực, tài nguyên; khả năng, nguồn (để giải quyết vấn đề).
eng_explanation: n: a stock or supply of something that can be used; an ability to deal with problems. (n)
example: Water is a precious resource that we must conserve.
She is a valuable resource for the team.
The company has significant financial resources.

vn_meaning: động từ: tôn trọng; danh từ: sự tôn trọng, kính trọng.
eng_explanation: v: to admire someone/something; n: a feeling of admiration. (v, n)
example: I have great respect for her achievements.
You should always respect your elders.
He earned the respect of his colleagues.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tương ứng, mỗi người/vật một.
eng_explanation: adj: relating to each member of a group individually. (adj)
example: The students went to their respective classrooms.
They each took their respective seats.
The two companies operate in their respective markets.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: tương ứng, mỗi người/vật một.
eng_explanation: adv: in the order named; each to its own. (adv)
example: John and Mary scored 85 and 92 marks respectively.
The prices are $10, $15, and $20 respectively.
They arrived at 9 am and 10 am respectively.

vn_meaning: động từ: trả lời; phản ứng, đáp lại.
eng_explanation: v: to say something in reply; to react to something. (v)
example: Please respond to this email as soon as possible.
The patient responded well to the treatment.
He didn't respond to my question.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự trả lời; phản ứng, sự đáp lại.
eng_explanation: n: a verbal or written answer; a reaction. (n)
example: Thank you for your prompt response.
The government's response to the crisis was criticized.
Her response was immediate and positive.

vn_meaning: danh từ: trách nhiệm, bổn phận.
eng_explanation: n: the state of being accountable for something. (n)
example: She takes her responsibilities very seriously.
Parents have a responsibility to educate their children.
He accepted full responsibility for the mistake.

vn_meaning: tính từ: có trách nhiệm; đáng tin cậy, chịu trách nhiệm.
eng_explanation: adj: having an obligation to do something; reliable. (adj)
example: He is a very responsible young man.
She is responsible for managing the project.
Drivers are responsible for obeying traffic laws.

vn_meaning: động từ: nghỉ ngơi; danh từ: sự nghỉ ngơi, phần còn lại; số còn lại, phần dư.
eng_explanation: v: to cease work/movement; n: a period of relaxation. (v, n)
example: I need to rest after a long day.
The rest of the team will arrive tomorrow.
She spent the rest of her life traveling.

vn_meaning: Một nhà hàng, nơi phục vụ các món ăn và đồ uống.
eng_explanation: A restaurant offering food and drinks.
example: I'm looking for a good restaurant for dinner.
The restaurant serves delicious Italian food.

vn_meaning: Quá trình khôi phục hoặc sửa chữa.
eng_explanation: The process of repairing or restoring something.
example: The restoration team worked diligently to preserve the historical building.
Restoration efforts are crucial for protecting cultural heritage.

vn_meaning: Trở lại trạng thái cũ, thường là trạng thái ban đầu.
eng_explanation: To return to a previous state, often the original.
example: The government is trying to restore the economy after the recession.
He restored his confidence after the setback.

vn_meaning: Kiểm soát, hạn chế, hoặc tránh làm điều gì đó.
eng_explanation: Control, limitation, or avoidance of something.
example: He showed restraint when discussing the controversial issue.
The child was restrained from running in the street.

vn_meaning: Hạn chế, quy định, hoặc giới hạn.
eng_explanation: Limitation, regulation, or restriction.
example: The company implemented strict restrictions on employee hours.
The law imposed restrictions on the use of certain chemicals.

vn_meaning: Kết quả, kết quả của một sự kiện.
eng_explanation: The outcome of an event.
example: The experiment yielded a significant result.
The results of the study were surprising.

vn_meaning: Tóm tắt, lặp lại, hoặc đưa lại thông tin.
eng_explanation: To summarize, repeat, or bring back information.
example: Please resume your work immediately.
He gave a concise resume of his career.

vn_meaning: Thương mại, bán hàng trực tiếp cho người tiêu dùng.
eng_explanation: Commercial trade, selling directly to consumers.
example: The store offers a wide range of retail products.
She enjoys shopping at the local retail stores.

vn_meaning: Giữ lại, giữ lại một người hoặc một tài sản.
eng_explanation: To keep or retain.
example: The company is trying to retain its valuable employees.
He retained his position at the company.

vn_meaning: động từ: thôi công tác; nghỉ hưu (sau một thời gian làm việc lâu năm); (cổ xướng) lui quân (trong chiến tranh)
eng_explanation: verb: to stop working, typically after a long career; to withdraw from battle.
example: He decided to retire at the age of 60.
Many teachers retire after 30 years of service.
The general ordered his troops to retire.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đã thôi công tác; nghỉ hưu; (miêu tả người) đã về hưu
eng_explanation: adjective: having stopped working; having retired from a profession.
example: The retired couple enjoyed traveling the world.
She is a retired teacher who volunteers at a local school.
He was a retired military officer with many stories to tell.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chế độ hưu trí; thời gian nghỉ hưu; (tính từ) liên quan đến việc nghỉ hưu
eng_explanation: noun: the period after one stops working; relating to retirement.
example: He looked forward to his retirement.
The company offers generous retirement benefits.
Retirement planning is important for financial security.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nơi rút lui; nơi ẩn náu; (động từ) rút lui; lùi quân
eng_explanation: noun: a place for retreat; verb: to withdraw; to move backward.
example: The soldiers retreated to a nearby forest.
She found solace in a quiet retreat.
The company is planning a corporate retreat.

vn_meaning: động từ: thu hồi; tìm lại; cứu vớt
eng_explanation: verb: to get something back; to recover something lost.
example: The firefighters worked to retrieve the trapped victims.
He managed to retrieve his lost wallet.
The police are trying to retrieve the stolen goods.

vn_meaning: động từ: trở lại; trả lại; (danh từ) sự trở lại; kết quả
eng_explanation: verb: to come back; to give back; noun: a return; the result.
example: I will return the book to the library tomorrow.
He returned home after a long journey.
The company reported a significant revenue return.

vn_meaning: động từ: tiết lộ; hé lộ; (về sự thật) làm lộ ra
eng_explanation: verb: to make something known; to disclose a secret.
example: The investigation will reveal the truth about the crime.
She revealed her feelings to him.
The new technology will reveal hidden details.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự tiết lộ; sự khám phá; (sự thật) làm lộ ra; (cảm xúc) sự kinh ngạc
eng_explanation: noun: a surprising and important discovery; a moment of revelation.
example: The scientist's revelation changed the course of research.
She experienced a moment of revelation during her meditation.
The revelation of the truth shocked everyone.

vn_meaning: danh từ: báo thù; trả thù; sự trả đũa
eng_explanation: noun: the act of getting even; seeking retribution.
example: He plotted his revenge against his enemies.
The desire for revenge consumed him.
The story is about a quest for revenge.

vn_meaning: danh từ: doanh thu; thu nhập; (tính từ) liên quan đến doanh thu
eng_explanation: noun: the income received from business; relating to revenue.
example: The company's revenue increased significantly this year.
Tax revenue is essential for government funding.
He analyzed the revenue streams of the business.

vn_meaning: động từ: đảo ngược (thay đổi chiều hướng); danh từ: chiều ngược lại (hướng đối lập).
eng_explanation: verb: to go in the opposite direction; noun: the opposite direction.
example: He reversed the car out of the driveway.
The river flows in a reverse direction during the dry season.
Let's reverse the order of the items on the list.

vn_meaning: động từ: xem xét lại, đánh giá (một cách có hệ thống); danh từ: sự xem xét lại, đánh giá (báo cáo, bài phê bình).
eng_explanation: verb: to examine something carefully; noun: a critical assessment of a performance or work.
example: The manager will review your proposal next week.
The film received a positive review from the critics.
I need to review my notes before the exam.

vn_meaning: động từ: sửa đổi, chỉnh sửa (một bản thảo, kế hoạch).
eng_explanation: verb: to re-examine and make corrections to something.
example: Please revise your essay and submit it by Friday.
I need to revise my budget before the end of the month.
The company is revising its marketing strategy.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự sửa đổi, chỉnh sửa.
eng_explanation: noun: the act of revising or correcting something.
example: The latest revision of the document includes several important changes.
This revision addresses the concerns raised in the previous feedback.
The software is undergoing a major revision.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự hồi sinh, sự phục hồi (sức khỏe, kinh tế, nghệ thuật).
eng_explanation: noun: a restoration of something to a former condition; a renewed interest.
example: The revival of the economy is a welcome sign.
There has been a revival of interest in classical music.
The patient showed a remarkable revival after the surgery.

vn_meaning: động từ: hồi sinh, làm sống lại (người, vật, ý tưởng).
eng_explanation: verb: to bring back to life or activity; to restore.
example: The doctor was able to revive the patient.
The new technology helped revive the struggling industry.
Let's try to revive the old tradition.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cuộc cách mạng (chính trị, khoa học, công nghệ).
eng_explanation: noun: a fundamental and relatively sudden change in political power and organization.
example: The French Revolution had a profound impact on Europe.
The Industrial Revolution brought about significant technological advancements.
There's a revolution happening in the way we communicate.

vn_meaning: tính từ: cách mạng, mang tính cách mạng; danh từ: người cách mạng.
eng_explanation: adjective: involving or causing a complete or dramatic change; noun: a person who advocates revolutionary change.
example: The invention was a revolutionary breakthrough in the field of medicine.
He was a revolutionary leader who fought for independence.
The revolutionary ideas challenged the status quo.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phần thưởng; động từ: thưởng, ban thưởng.
eng_explanation: noun: something given in recognition of service, effort, or achievement; verb: to give someone a reward.
example: She received a reward for her bravery.
The company rewards employees for outstanding performance.
Hard work and dedication will be rewarded.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hùng biện, nghệ thuật diễn thuyết; ngôn ngữ hoa mỹ, sáo rỗng.
eng_explanation: noun: the art of effective or persuasive speaking or writing; language that is intended to impress.
example: The politician's speech was full of rhetoric.
He was criticized for using empty rhetoric to manipulate the audience.
The study of rhetoric helps improve communication skills.

vn_meaning: động từ: xé rách, rách toạc (vải, giấy); danh từ: vết rách, sự rách.
eng_explanation: v./n. tear or be torn quickly; a tear or split. (v. - rip; n. - rip)
example: He ripped the letter open in frustration.
There was a long rip in her jeans.
The fabric has a small rip near the seam.

vn_meaning: động từ: tăng lên, dâng lên, trỗi dậy (mức nước, giá cả, mặt trời); danh từ: sự tăng lên, sự dâng lên.
eng_explanation: v./n. move upwards; an increase in number, amount, or level. (v. - rise; n. - rise)
example: The sun rises in the east.
The cost of living is rising rapidly.
There was a noticeable rise in temperature.

vn_meaning: danh từ: rủi ro, nguy cơ; động từ: mạo hiểm, chấp nhận rủi ro.
eng_explanation: n./v. possibility of loss or harm; take a chance. (n. - risk; v. - risk)
example: Smoking poses a serious health risk.
He risked his life to save the child.
Investing in stocks always involves some risk.

vn_meaning: tính từ: mạo hiểm, nguy hiểm, có nhiều rủi ro.
eng_explanation: adj. involving the possibility of something bad happening; dangerous.
example: Driving without a license is a risky behavior.
It was a risky investment, but it paid off.
Climbing the mountain was a risky undertaking.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nghi lễ, nghi thức, thủ tục.
eng_explanation: n. a series of actions performed regularly and in a set order; a ceremony.
example: The wedding ceremony included several ancient rituals.
Tea ceremonies are an important ritual in Japan.
He had a morning ritual of drinking coffee and reading the news.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đối thủ cạnh tranh, kỳ phùng địch thủ; động từ: cạnh tranh với, tranh giành với.
eng_explanation: n./v. a competitor; compete with. (n. - rival; v. - rival)
example: The two companies are fierce rivals in the market.
She rivaled her sister in academic achievement.
He has a rival for her affection.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sông.
eng_explanation: n. a large natural stream of water flowing in a channel to the sea.
example: The Amazon River is the longest river in the world.
We went for a boat ride on the river.
The city is built along the banks of the river.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đường, con đường.
eng_explanation: n. a way made for traveling on by vehicles; a route.
example: The road to the beach was very crowded.
She's on the road to recovery.
They built a new road to connect the two cities.

vn_meaning: động từ: cướp, trộm cắp (của người khác).
eng_explanation: v. take something from someone illegally, usually by force.
example: The bank was robbed yesterday.
He was robbed of his wallet on the street.
Don't rob Peter to pay Paul.

vn_meaning: danh từ: vụ cướp, hành vi trộm cắp.
eng_explanation: n. the act of stealing, especially from a place or person by force.
example: The police are investigating the robbery.
The jewelry store was the target of a daring robbery.
He was arrested in connection with the robbery.

vn_meaning: Một thiết bị tự động có khả năng thực hiện các tác vụ mà con người có thể thực hiện, thường là một loại máy móc.
eng_explanation: A machine capable of performing tasks that humans can do, often a mechanical device.
example: The robot vacuum cleaner is very efficient.
Scientists are working on creating more advanced robots.

vn_meaning: Có khả năng chịu đựng được nhiều điều kiện khác nhau; mạnh mẽ, bền bỉ.
eng_explanation: Strong and durable; able to withstand various conditions.
example: The robot is designed to be robust and reliable.
A robust construction is essential for a long-lasting building.

vn_meaning: Một khối đá lớn, thường có hình dạng và kích thước khác nhau.
eng_explanation: A large stone mass, often with varied shapes and sizes.
example: The rock formation was discovered in the mountains.
He collected rocks for his collection.

vn_meaning: Một con tàu bay có khả năng bay lên cao, thường được sử dụng để đưa người hoặc hàng hóa đến các hành tinh khác.
eng_explanation: A vehicle designed to travel into space, often used for human or cargo transport.
example: The rocket launch was a spectacular event.
Scientists are working on developing more efficient rockets.

eng_explanation: Noun: someone who searches or seeks. (PoS: N)
example: He is a career seeker.
The spiritual seeker traveled the world.
A truth seeker is always curious.

vn_meaning: động từ: có vẻ; (dự đoán) có lẽ; (cảm xúc) dường như.
eng_explanation: Verb: to appear; to seem likely. (PoS: V)
example: It seems like it will rain.
He seems happy today.
The evidence seems to point to his guilt.

vn_meaning: tính từ: dường như; có vẻ như; (thể hiện sự nghi ngờ).
eng_explanation: Adjective: apparently; seemingly. (PoS: ADJ)
example: It seemingly vanished into thin air.
The situation seemingly improved.
He seemingly knew the answer.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phần; (marketing) phân đoạn; (mạch máu) đoạn mạch.
eng_explanation: Noun: a part or section; a marketing segment. (PoS: N)
example: The cake was cut into segments.
The marketing team identified a new segment.
The artery is a segment of the heart.

vn_meaning: động từ: bắt giữ; (cơ hội) nắm bắt; (nghệ thuật) vẽ tranh nhanh tay.
eng_explanation: Verb: to capture; to grasp an opportunity. (PoS: V)
example: The police seized the suspect.
He seized the opportunity to speak.
The artist seized the moment and painted a quick sketch.

vn_meaning: tính từ: hiếm khi; ít khi; (thể thơ) thể thơ (hiếm).
eng_explanation: Adjective: rarely; seldom. (PoS: ADJ)
example: I seldom go to the movies.
She seldom smiles.
The rare poet wrote in a seldom-used style.

vn_meaning: động từ: lựa chọn; (chọn lọc) chọn lọc; (tính từ) được chọn.
eng_explanation: Verb: to choose; to be chosen. (PoS: V)
example: Please select your favorite color.
The committee will select the winner.
He was selected for the team.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự lựa chọn (chung chung); lựa chọn (từ nhiều ứng viên); tuyển chọn (nhân sự).
eng_explanation: noun: the act of choosing or selecting; a group of things chosen.
example: The selection process was very competitive.
She made a careful selection of books for her trip.
The committee announced their selection for the award.

vn_meaning: tính từ: có chọn lọc; khắt khe trong việc lựa chọn.
eng_explanation: adjective: tending to choose particular things or groups; discriminating.
example: He has a selective memory, forgetting unpleasant events.
The school has a selective admissions policy.
She's very selective about the movies she watches.

vn_meaning: đại từ: bản thân; chính mình; cái tôi; tính từ: tự thân; do chính mình.
eng_explanation: pronoun: the person or thing that one is referring to; adjective: done by oneself.
example: He hurt himself while playing football.
She taught herself to play the guitar.
It was a self-made success story.

vn_meaning: động từ: bán; tiêu thụ.
eng_explanation: verb: to exchange goods or services for money; to offer something for sale.
example: They sell fresh produce at the market.
I need to sell my old car.
The company is trying to sell more products online.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hội thảo; buổi hội thảo.
eng_explanation: noun: a meeting for discussion or instruction on a particular subject.
example: She attended a seminar on marketing strategies.
The professor will lead a seminar on Shakespeare.
The company hosted a seminar for its employees.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nghị sĩ (thượng viện).
eng_explanation: noun: a member of a senate; an elected official representing a state.
example: The senator spoke out against the new legislation.
She wrote a letter to her senator expressing her concerns.
The senator is known for his integrity.

vn_meaning: động từ: gửi; điều khiển; phái.
eng_explanation: verb: to cause to go to a specific place or person; to transmit.
example: Please send the package to this address.
He sent a message to his friend.
The company sent representatives to the conference.

vn_meaning: tính từ: cao cấp; lớn tuổi; danh từ: người cao cấp; học sinh/sinh viên năm cuối.
eng_explanation: adjective: higher in rank, status, or position; noun: an older or more experienced person.
example: She is a senior manager at the company.
He is a senior citizen.
The senior class is planning a graduation party.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cảm giác; sự cảm nhận; ấn tượng mạnh.
eng_explanation: noun: a physical feeling or perception; a strong and exciting feeling.
example: She had a strange sensation in her leg.
The concert was a sensation.
The news created a sensation in the media.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ý thức; giác quan; sự hiểu biết; tính hợp lý; động từ: cảm nhận; nhận thức.
eng_explanation: noun: the ability to perceive; a feeling or awareness; common sense; verb: to feel or perceive.
example: He has a strong sense of responsibility.
She lost her sense of smell.
Does that make sense?
I sensed that something was wrong.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chuỗi, dãy, bộ (các sự kiện, phim, sách,...); loạt (các chương trình phát sóng)
eng_explanation: n. a set or sequence of related things. (PoS: noun)
example: The TV series was incredibly popular.
He won a series of tennis matches.
This is the latest in a series of books.

vn_meaning: tính từ: nghiêm trọng (vấn đề, tình hình); chân thành, nghiêm túc (tính cách, ý định); đăm chiêu, trầm ngâm (biểu hiện)
eng_explanation: adj. demanding or causing great attention; not humorous or frivolous. (PoS: adjective)
example: He suffered a serious injury during the game.
She has a very serious personality.
The situation is very serious and requires immediate action.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: nghiêm túc, chân thành; nghiêm trọng (mức độ)
eng_explanation: adv. in a serious manner; with earnest intention. (PoS: adverb)
example: Are you seriously considering moving to another country?
He was seriously injured in the accident.
I seriously doubt that he will come.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người hầu, người phục vụ
eng_explanation: n. a person employed to perform domestic tasks or services. (PoS: noun)
example: The wealthy family employed several servants.
She treated her servants with respect.
He felt like a servant to his demanding boss.

vn_meaning: động từ: phục vụ; dùng (món ăn); đáp ứng (mục đích); thi hành (án phạt); giao bóng (quần vợt)
eng_explanation: v. to perform duties or services for; to present food or drinks. (PoS: verb)
example: The waiter served us quickly.
She serves on the board of directors.
He served a prison sentence for his crime.

vn_meaning: danh từ: dịch vụ; sự phục vụ; ngành nghề (quân đội, công cộng,...); lễ tang; sửa chữa, bảo dưỡng (máy móc)
eng_explanation: n. the action of helping in some way; a system supplying a public need. (PoS: noun)
example: The hotel provides excellent service.
He is in the military service.
The car needs a service.

vn_meaning: danh từ: buổi (học, họp, làm việc,...); kỳ (quốc hội, tòa án,...)
eng_explanation: n. a period of time devoted to a particular activity. (PoS: noun)
example: The therapy session lasted for an hour.
The parliament is in session.
We had a brainstorming session to generate new ideas.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bộ (đồ dùng, dụng cụ,...); tập hợp (phần tử); bối cảnh (phim ảnh); thiết lập (cài đặt); động từ: đặt, để; cài đặt; thiết lập; hướng tới
eng_explanation: n. a collection of things; v. to put in a specified place or position. (PoS: noun, verb)
example: She bought a new set of dishes.
Please set the table for dinner.
He set a new world record.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự sắp đặt, sự chuẩn bị; sự lừa đảo, mưu đồ; cấu trúc, hệ thống
eng_explanation: n. an arrangement or plan; a deceptive scheme. (PoS: noun)
example: The concert was a complex set-up.
He suspected a set-up and refused to cooperate.
The new computer system is a complicated set-up.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bối cảnh (phim ảnh, truyện); vị trí, địa điểm; sự điều chỉnh, cài đặt (máy móc,...); sự chuẩn bị
eng_explanation: n. the place or environment where something happens; adjustments on a device. (PoS: noun)
example: The film's setting is a remote island.
Adjust the setting on the camera.
The table setting was elegant and refined.

vn_meaning: giải quyết
eng_explanation: To resolve a problem or disagreement; to establish a stable state.
example: The company needs to settle the dispute with the client.
The settlers were determined to settle into their new home.
She settled the argument with a calm and measured approach.

vn_meaning: thành phố/khu định cư
eng_explanation: A formal agreement or arrangement; a place where people live or work.
example: The settlement of the land dispute was a long and difficult process.
The settlement offered a peaceful and stable environment.
The settlement of the conflict involved negotiations and compromises.

vn_meaning: người định cư
eng_explanation: A person who lives or works in a foreign country.
example: The settlers were eager to build a new life in the countryside.
He is a skilled settler in the agricultural sector.
The settlers established a thriving community.

vn_meaning: bảy
eng_explanation: The number seven is often associated with completeness, perfection, and divinity.
example: There are seven days in a week.
She wore a dress with seven layers of fabric.
The seven wonders of the ancient world.

vn_meaning: mười bảy
eng_explanation: The number seventeen is a significant number in many cultures, often associated with luck, prosperity, and divine favor.
example: There are seventeen children in the family.
The company reported a profit of seventeen million dollars.
The seventh star in the constellation Orion is believed to be seventeen.

vn_meaning: bảy mươi
eng_explanation: A number between 70 and 100, often used to express a large quantity or a significant amount.
example: We need seventy more supplies for the project.
The company's profits increased by seventy percent.
He has seventy years of experience in his field.

vn_meaning: more than two but not many more than three.
eng_explanation: More than two but not many more than three.
example: There were several options for the project.
She has several friends in the area.
The company is considering several new suppliers.

vn_meaning: very serious; intense; demanding.
eng_explanation: Very serious; intense; demanding.
example: The severe weather conditions made travel difficult.
He displayed a severe demeanor.
The severe consequences of the crime were punished harshly.

vn_meaning: nghiêm trọng
eng_explanation: In a very serious or painful way.
example: The patient was severely injured in the accident.
She suffered severely from the illness.
The company faced severe financial difficulties.

vn_meaning: sexual intercourse; the act of having sexual relations.
eng_explanation: Sexual intercourse; the act of having sexual relations.
example: The study examined the effects of sex on the body.
She enjoyed a passionate affair with a stranger.
The film explores the complexities of human sexuality.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đời sống tình dục; tính từ: liên quan đến tình dục
eng_explanation: Relating to or involving sexual activity; adjective describing something sexually attractive.
example: The sexual harassment lawsuit caused a scandal.
He has a healthy sexual drive.
She enjoys reading erotic novels.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bản năng tình dục; tính từ: liên quan đến bản năng tình dục
eng_explanation: The quality of being sexual; adjective describing something related to sexuality.
example: Her sexuality is complex and multifaceted.
The film explores themes of sexuality and identity.
He is openly discussing his sexuality.

vn_meaning: tính từ: quyến rũ; gợi cảm
eng_explanation: Attractive in a sexy way; adjective describing someone or something that is alluring.
example: She wore a sexy red dress to the party.
He has a sexy smile.
The advertisement featured a sexy model.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sắc thái; màu sắc nhạt; tính từ: bóng râm; sự che giấu
eng_explanation: A subtle difference in color or meaning; shadow; concealment or deception.
example: There's a slight shade of blue in the painting.
He used shade to protect his eyes from the sun.
The politician was accused of using shade to avoid answering questions.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bóng tối; bóng hình; tính từ: mờ nhạt; ám ảnh
eng_explanation: Darkness; a dark shape cast by an object; something that haunts or troubles.
example: The shadow of the tree fell across the path.
He was haunted by the shadow of his past.
The shadow of doubt lingered in her mind.

vn_meaning: động từ: rung; lắc; xáo trộn; (thực hiện) làm rung, lắc
eng_explanation: To move back and forth rapidly; to disturb or upset; to perform an action of shaking.
example: Shake the bottle to mix the contents.
He shook his head in disagreement.
The earthquake caused buildings to shake.

vn_meaning: động từ: (thì của 'will') sẽ; (thì của 'should') nên
eng_explanation: Auxiliary verb expressing future tense or obligation; modal verb expressing polite requests.
example: I shall go to the store tomorrow.
You shall not pass!
Shall we dance?

vn_meaning: tính từ: nông; mỏng; hời hợt; không sâu sắc
eng_explanation: Not deep; superficial; lacking in depth or seriousness.
example: The lake is quite shallow.
She had shallow conversations.
His understanding of the issue was shallow.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hổ thẹn; xấu hổ; sự xấu hổ
eng_explanation: A painful feeling of guilt or embarrassment; the state of being ashamed.
example: He felt shame for his actions.
The scandal brought shame upon the family.
She tried to hide her shame.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hình dạng; hình dáng; tính từ: hình dạng; (thực hiện) tạo hình
eng_explanation: The form or outline of something; adjective describing a particular form; to mold or sculpt.
example: The shape of the mountain is impressive.
He is a talented sculptor.
The company is trying to shape its brand image.

vn_meaning: tính từ: có hình dạng (vật lý); động từ: tạo hình, làm cho có hình dạng (tạo tác).
eng_explanation: shaped (adj/verb) - Having a particular form; to form or mold something.
example: The clay was shaped into a bowl.
The cookie cutters shaped the dough into stars.
The mountain's shaped was impressive.

vn_meaning: động từ: chia sẻ; danh từ: phần, sự chia sẻ.
eng_explanation: share (verb/noun) - To have or use something jointly; a portion or part of something.
example: Can I share your umbrella?
They decided to share the cost of the trip.
She offered to share her dessert.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cổ đông (công ty).
eng_explanation: shareholder (noun) - A person who owns shares in a company.
example: The shareholder voted in favor of the merger.
As a shareholder, he had a say in the company's decisions.
The company's success benefited all its shareholders.

vn_meaning: tính từ: sắc bén; tính từ: nhanh nhạy, tỉnh táo; trạng từ: sắc sảo.
eng_explanation: sharp (adj/adv) - Having a fine edge or point; quick to understand; keenly intelligent.
example: The knife was very sharp.
She has a sharp mind.
He made a sharp observation about the situation.

vn_meaning: động từ: làm vỡ tan tành.
eng_explanation: shatter (verb) - To break or smash violently into pieces.
example: The glass shattered when it hit the floor.
The news shattered her hopes.
The explosion shattered the windows.

vn_meaning: đại từ: cô ấy, nàng.
eng_explanation: she (pronoun) - The female counterpart of 'he'.
example: She is a talented musician.
She went to the store yesterday.
She enjoys reading novels.

vn_meaning: động từ: làm đổ, rụng; danh từ: nhà kho, lều.
eng_explanation: shed (verb/noun) - To lose something, such as hair or leaves; a small, often simple, building.
example: The tree shed its leaves.
He went to the shed to get the tools.
The snake shed its skin.

vn_meaning: danh từ: con cừu.
eng_explanation: sheep (noun) - A domesticated animal raised for wool and meat.
example: The farmer counted his sheep.
A flock of sheep grazed in the field.
She knitted a sweater from sheep's wool.

vn_meaning: tính từ: mỏng manh, trong suốt; tính từ: tuyệt đối, hoàn toàn.
eng_explanation: sheer (adj) - Transparent or translucent; absolute or complete.
example: She wore a sheer silk dress.
It was a sheer coincidence.
The cliff dropped sheer to the sea.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tờ giấy, tấm vải.
eng_explanation: sheet (noun) - A flat piece of paper or fabric.
example: He wrote his notes on a sheet of paper.
She spread a sheet on the grass.
The baker took a sheet of dough.

vn_meaning: tính từ: kinh ngạc, chấn động (do tin tức bất ngờ); bất ngờ, sửng sốt (về cảm xúc).
eng_explanation: adj. Feeling or showing surprise and dismay. (Past tense of 'shock').
example: She was shocked to hear the news.
He looked utterly shocked by the announcement.
I was shocked at his rude behavior.

vn_meaning: tính từ: gây sốc, gây chấn động; kinh hoàng, ghê rợn (về mức độ nghiêm trọng).
eng_explanation: adj. Causing great surprise, distress, or outrage; extremely upsetting.
example: The report contained shocking details about the abuse.
It was a shocking waste of money.
The violence in the film was shocking.

vn_meaning: danh từ: giày dép (để đi chân); động từ: đóng giày cho (ngựa).
eng_explanation: n. A covering for the foot, typically made of leather. v. To fit a horse with shoes.
example: She bought a new pair of shoes.
He needed to polish his shoes.
The farrier came to shoe the horses.

vn_meaning: động từ: bắn (súng, tên); quay phim; chụp ảnh; di chuyển nhanh chóng; nổ (bọt khí, tia nước).
eng_explanation: v. To fire a gun; to film; to move quickly; to photograph.
example: Don't shoot!
They are shooting a movie in the park.
The price of gas continues to shoot up.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự bắn súng; sự quay phim; hoạt động săn bắn; trò chơi ném bóng rổ.
eng_explanation: n. The act of firing a gun; filmmaking; hunting; basketball game.
example: There was a shooting at the mall.
The shooting of the film took six months.
He enjoys going shooting with his friends.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cửa hàng; động từ: mua sắm (tại cửa hàng).
eng_explanation: n. A store where goods are sold. v. To buy goods from a store.
example: She went to the shop to buy some milk.
I need to shop for a new dress.
They opened a new shop in town.

vn_meaning: danh từ: việc mua sắm; hoạt động đi mua sắm.
eng_explanation: n. The activity of buying goods from stores.
example: Shopping is her favorite hobby.
We went shopping for Christmas presents.
Online shopping is becoming increasingly popular.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bờ biển, bờ hồ; bờ sông.
eng_explanation: n. The land along the edge of a sea, lake, or river.
example: We walked along the shore.
The ship sailed close to the shore.
They built a house on the shore.

vn_meaning: tính từ: ngắn (chiều dài, thời gian); thấp (người); thiếu (số lượng); ngắn gọn (văn bản).
eng_explanation: adj. Having little length or duration; of small height; insufficient.
example: He is a short man.
The movie was too short.
We are short of time.

vn_meaning: tính từ: ngắn hạn (thời gian, kế hoạch).
eng_explanation: adj. Lasting for a short time; immediate, not long-lasting.
example: They are looking for short-term solutions.
He took out a short-term loan.
This is a short-term project.

vn_meaning: Khi nguồn cung cấp bị hạn chế hoặc thiếu hụt.
eng_explanation: A shortage occurs when there is a limited supply of something.
example: There is a shortage of fresh produce this summer.
The shortage of raw materials is impacting production.

vn_meaning: trong một khoảng thời gian ngắn.
eng_explanation: ‘Shortly’ means in a short time.
example: I’ll see you shortly.
The meeting will be short.

vn_meaning: một phát bắn, một lần bắn.
eng_explanation: A shot is a single shot fired.
example: He took a shot at the target.
The soldiers fired a volley of shots.

vn_meaning: nên, nên.
eng_explanation: ‘Should’ expresses a recommendation or obligation.
example: You should study for the exam.
We should take care of the environment.

vn_meaning: đầu vai.
eng_explanation: The shoulder is the upper part of the body between the shoulder and the hip.
example: He leaned on his shoulder for support.
She adjusted her shoulder strap.

vn_meaning: gào thét, hét.
eng_explanation: ‘Shout’ is to make a loud shout or yell.
example: He shouted at the police officer.
She shouted for help.

vn_meaning: hiển thị, trình bày.
eng_explanation: ‘Show’ means to display or present something.
example: Please show me the picture.
The artist showed us his latest work.

vn_meaning: một lần tắm.
eng_explanation: A shower is a bath.
example: She took a long shower to relax.
He enjoyed a relaxing shower after a long day.

vn_meaning: giảm kích thước.
eng_explanation: ‘Shrink’ means to reduce in size.
example: The product shrank after being exposed to the sun.
The room shrank a little during the renovation.

vn_meaning: đứng hình, không phản ứng.
eng_explanation: ‘Shrug’ means to turn your shoulders away, often indicating indifference or denial.
example: He shrugged when asked about his past.
She shrugged her shoulders in silence.

vn_meaning: động từ: đóng (cửa, cửa sổ); tắt (đèn, máy); ngừng (hành động); (chửi) quát, mắng; (thành ngữ) im lặng (sau khi nói)
eng_explanation: Verb: To close; to stop; to scold (informal).
example: Please shut the door.
She shut off the lights.
He shut his mouth in surprise.

vn_meaning: tính từ: nhút nhát; e thẹn; kín đáo; (về ngoại hình) có vẻ ngoài thanh lịch, tinh tế
eng_explanation: Adjective: Reserved or timid; subtly elegant.
example: He was a shy child.
She blushed shyly when complimented.
The mansion had a shy elegance.

vn_meaning: danh từ: anh chị em; người em/anh ruột
eng_explanation: Noun: A brother or sister.
example: They are siblings.
She has a loving sibling.
My sibling and I grew up together.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bệnh; (cảm giác) khó chịu, say đắng; (về đồ ăn) hết hạn
eng_explanation: Noun: Illness; feeling unwell; expired food.
example: He is sick in bed.
I feel sick after eating that.
This milk is sick.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bên; mặt; chỗ; (đồ uống) kèm theo; (đồ chơi) đồ chơi có hình dạng bên
eng_explanation: Noun: Side; face; accompaniment; a toy.
example: He sat on the side of the road.
The side of the building is damaged.
He always drinks his coffee with milk on the side.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tiếng thở dài; (về biểu cảm) thở dài, than thở
eng_explanation: Noun: A deep, audible breath expressing sadness or relief.
example: She let out a sigh of relief.
He sighed deeply after hearing the news.
A long sigh escaped her lips.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tầm nhìn; cảnh vật; (về cảm xúc) ấn tượng, dấu vết
eng_explanation: Noun: Vision; a scene; an impression.
example: The sight of the ocean was beautiful.
He had a clear sight of the mountain.
The event left a haunting sight in her memory.

vn_meaning: danh từ: dấu hiệu; biểu tượng; chữ viết; (về hành vi) hành động, cử chỉ; (về thời tiết) thời tiết
eng_explanation: Noun: A mark; a symbol; an action; weather.
example: The sign said ‘Caution’.
He gave a sign of approval.
The weather sign predicted rain.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tín hiệu; hiệu lệnh; (về giao thông) đèn tín hiệu giao thông; (về truyền thông) sóng truyền thông
eng_explanation: Noun: A signal; a command; a broadcast signal.
example: He gave a hand signal to the driver.
The traffic signal turned red.
The radio signal was weak.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chữ ký; dấu hiệu nhận dạng; (về đồ vật) kiểu dáng, phong cách
eng_explanation: Noun: A signature; a distinctive style; a mark.
example: Please sign the document.
The artist’s signature is unique.
The building has a distinctive signature.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tầm quan trọng; ý nghĩa; sự có ý nghĩa (thường dùng để chỉ điều gì đó quan trọng, có ảnh hưởng lớn).
eng_explanation: noun: The importance or consequence of something; the quality of being important.
example: The significance of the discovery cannot be overstated.
The historical significance of the event is widely recognized.
Understanding the significance of context is crucial for accurate interpretation.

vn_meaning: tính từ: quan trọng; đáng kể; có ý nghĩa (thể hiện điều gì đó có giá trị, ảnh hưởng hoặc khác biệt).
eng_explanation: adjective: Sufficiently great or important to be worthy of attention; notable.
example: The results showed a significant improvement in patient health.
This is a significant development in the field of renewable energy.
Her contribution was significant to the success of the project.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: đáng kể; rõ rệt; một cách quan trọng (mức độ hoặc số lượng lớn).
eng_explanation: adverb: To a significant extent or degree; considerably.
example: The company's profits increased significantly last year.
The new policy significantly impacted the workforce.
Temperatures have significantly dropped overnight.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự im lặng; tĩnh lặng (không có âm thanh).; động từ: giữ im lặng; im bặt.
eng_explanation: noun: The complete absence of sound; verb: To be or become silent.
example: The silence in the room was deafening.
She maintained a silence throughout the meeting.
Please silence your phone during the performance.

vn_meaning: tính từ: im lặng; câm lặng (không nói hoặc không có âm thanh).
eng_explanation: adjective: Not making or accompanied by any sound; quiet.
example: The house was eerily silent.
He gave a silent nod of agreement.
A silent film is a movie without spoken dialogue.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lụa (vải dệt từ tơ tằm).
eng_explanation: noun: A fine, strong fabric made from the cocoons of silkworms.
example: She wore a beautiful silk dress.
Silk scarves are a popular souvenir.
The fabric felt smooth and luxurious like silk.

vn_meaning: tính từ: ngốc nghếch; lố bịch; ngớ ngẩn (vui vẻ một cách vô nghĩa).
eng_explanation: adjective: Foolish or lacking in good sense; absurd.
example: He was being silly and making funny faces.
Don't be silly, you know that's not true.
The movie was a silly comedy.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bạc (kim loại).; màu bạc (màu trắng ánh kim).
eng_explanation: noun: A precious white metal; a pale grey color.
example: She wore a silver necklace.
The moon shone with a silver light.
The silverware was tarnished with silver.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tương tự; giống nhau (có những điểm chung).
eng_explanation: adjective: Resembling without being identical; alike.
example: The two houses are very similar in design.
They have similar interests and hobbies.
The products are similar but not exactly the same.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự tương đồng; sự giống nhau (những điểm chung).
eng_explanation: noun: The state of being similar; resemblance.
example: There is a striking similarity between the two paintings.
The similarity in their opinions was surprising.
We found many similarities between the two cultures.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ca sĩ (người hát)
eng_explanation: n. A person who sings; vocalist. (PoS: noun)
example: She is a famous singer known for her powerful voice.
The singer performed a beautiful ballad.
He aspires to be a professional singer.
