vn_meaning: danh từ: sự hát; động từ phân từ hiện tại: đang hát
eng_explanation: n. The act of singing; gerund. (PoS: noun, verb-ing)
example: Her singing is truly captivating.
He enjoys singing in the shower.
The children were singing a Christmas carol.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đơn, một; độc thân; duy nhất; danh từ: vé đơn; bài hát đơn; động từ: chọn ra, tách ra
eng_explanation: adj. One; alone; unmarried. n. A single item. v. To select. (PoS: adj, n, v)
example: She is a single mother.
He bought a single ticket to the concert.
The company is focusing on single-use plastics.

vn_meaning: động từ: chìm, lặn, hạ thấp; danh từ: bồn rửa
eng_explanation: v. To descend below the surface; to fail. n. A basin for washing. (PoS: v, n)
example: The ship began to sink rapidly.
He washed the dishes in the sink.
Her hopes began to sink when she heard the news.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ông (dùng để xưng hô lịch sự với nam)
eng_explanation: n. A polite term of address for a man. (PoS: noun)
example: “Yes, sir,” he replied respectfully.
May I help you, sir?
The waiter addressed the customer as 'sir'.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chị gái, em gái (người cùng cha mẹ)
eng_explanation: n. A female sibling; a close female friend. (PoS: noun)
example: She has a younger sister.
My sister is my best friend.
They consider each other like sisters.

vn_meaning: động từ: ngồi
eng_explanation: v. To rest with one's weight supported by one's buttocks. (PoS: verb)
example: Please sit down.
She sat quietly reading a book.
The cat likes to sit in the sun.

vn_meaning: danh từ: địa điểm, vị trí
eng_explanation: n. A place or location; a website. (PoS: noun)
example: The construction site is very busy.
This is a historical site.
I found the information on a reliable website.

vn_meaning: tính từ: nằm ở, đặt ở, tọa lạc tại
eng_explanation: adj. Located in a particular place. (PoS: adjective)
example: The hotel is situated near the beach.
The village is situated in a valley.
The office is conveniently situated in the city center.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tình huống, hoàn cảnh
eng_explanation: n. A set of circumstances; a state of affairs. (PoS: noun)
example: The situation is under control.
He found himself in a difficult situation.
We need to assess the current situation.

vn_meaning: Số vô số, số lớn hơn 1; thường dùng để chỉ số lượng, số lượng, hoặc số lượng vật.
eng_explanation: Six refers to a quantity greater than one, often used to indicate a large number.
example: There are six people in the room.
He has six months to complete the project.

vn_meaning: Số vô số, số lớn hơn 10; thường dùng để chỉ số lượng, số lượng, hoặc số lượng vật.
eng_explanation: Sixteen is a number greater than ten, often used to represent a large quantity.
example: There are sixteen students in the class.
He has sixteen years of experience.

vn_meaning: Số 60; thường dùng để chỉ số lượng, số lượng, hoặc số lượng vật.
eng_explanation: Sixty is a number equal to 60, used to denote a quantity.
example: There are sixty dollars in the wallet.
He has sixty years of experience.

vn_meaning: Kích thước, quy mô; thường dùng để chỉ số lượng, số lượng, hoặc diện tích.
eng_explanation: Size refers to the dimensions or extent of something.
example: The house is a small size.
The company's size is growing rapidly.

vn_meaning: Bản phác thảo, bản vẽ đơn giản; thường dùng để chỉ một hình ảnh đơn giản, thường được vẽ bằng bút chì.
eng_explanation: A sketch is a preliminary drawing or design.
example: I need a sketch of the building.
She made a quick sketch of the landscape.

vn_meaning: Đạp snow; hoạt động thể thao trên núi.
eng_explanation: Ski is a winter sport involving sliding down a slope.
example: I love to ski in the mountains.
He's a skilled ski instructor.

vn_meaning: Hoạt động thể thao trên núi với dụng cụ đi lại có hình dáng giống con chim (thường là con lợn rừng).
eng_explanation: Skiing is a winter sport involving downhill skiing.
example: She enjoys skiing in the snow.
The family went skiing for a weekend.

vn_meaning: Kỹ năng, khả năng; thường dùng để chỉ một kỹ năng cụ thể.
eng_explanation: Skill refers to the ability to perform a task effectively.
example: He has a great skill in playing the piano.
She's a skilled programmer.

vn_meaning: Có kỹ năng, có trình độ; thường dùng để chỉ một người có kỹ năng cao.
eng_explanation: Skilled means having a high level of proficiency.
example: The skilled carpenter built the house.
She's a skilled artist.

vn_meaning: Lớp da; thường dùng để chỉ bề mặt ngoài của một vật.
eng_explanation: Skin refers to the outer layer of the body.
example: He has a pale skin.
The doctor examined the patient's skin.

vn_meaning: danh động từ: bỏ qua; danh động từ: nhảy nhanh; danh động từ: lướt qua (đường); tính từ: dễ dàng (không gặp khó khăn)
eng_explanation: Verb: to omit or pass over; verb: to jump quickly; verb: to glide over.
example: Please skip the introduction and go straight to the main point.
He skipped over the puddles in the rain.
The children skipped rope in the park.

vn_meaning: danh từ: váy; danh từ: (vật) vòng cung; danh từ: (người) người hầu gái
eng_explanation: Noun: a female garment; noun: a curve; noun: a female servant.
example: She wore a beautiful blue skirt to the party.
The river formed a gentle skirt around the valley.
In the old days, women often worked as skirls.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sọ (côn trùng, động vật); danh từ: sọ (người chết)
eng_explanation: Noun: the bony skeleton of the head; noun: the skull of a deceased person.
example: The paleontologist examined the dinosaur skull.
The thief stole the skull from the museum.
The skull was bleached white by the sun.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bầu trời; danh từ: không gian (vĩ mô)
eng_explanation: Noun: the atmosphere above the earth; noun: the vast expanse of space.
example: The sky is blue today.
Birds fly in the sky.
The stars twinkle in the night sky.

vn_meaning: động từ: đập mạnh; động từ: đóng sầm (cửa, cửa sổ)
eng_explanation: Verb: to strike forcefully; verb: to shut with a loud bang.
example: He slammed the door shut.
She slammed her fist on the table.
The car slammed into a tree.

vn_meaning: động từ: tát; động từ: (vật) chạm vào nhẹ nhàng
eng_explanation: Verb: to strike with the flat of the hand; verb: to lightly touch.
example: He slapped her on the arm.
The rain slapped against the windows.
She gave the table a gentle slap.

vn_meaning: động từ: xẻ; động từ: cắt sâu; danh từ: vết cắt
eng_explanation: Verb: to cut deeply; verb: to divide with a long cut; noun: a long cut.
example: The knife was used to slash the tire.
He slashed his arm while chopping wood.
The sword created a long slash in the armor.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nô lệ; danh từ: (tản mót) người làm việc cật lực
eng_explanation: Noun: a person held in servitude; noun: someone who works extremely hard.
example: The abolitionists fought to end slavery.
He felt like a slave to his demanding boss.
The ancient civilizations used slaves to build monuments.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chế độ nô lệ; danh từ: việc làm nô lệ
eng_explanation: Noun: the condition of being owned and controlled by another person; noun: the practice of owning slaves.
example: Slavery is a terrible injustice.
The Underground Railroad helped slaves escape to freedom.
The history of slavery is a dark chapter in human history.

vn_meaning: động từ: ngủ; danh từ: giấc ngủ
eng_explanation: Verb: to rest; noun: a period of unconsciousness.
example: I need to sleep for eight hours.
She fell asleep reading a book.
The baby slept soundly in her crib.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lát, miếng (thực phẩm); động từ: cắt lát
eng_explanation: noun: a thin, flat piece cut from something; verb: to cut into thin pieces.
example: She sliced the bread into thin slices.
The cake was a delicious slice of chocolate heaven.
He used a sharp knife to slice the vegetables.

vn_meaning: danh từ: trượt; động từ: trượt, lướt
eng_explanation: noun: a smooth, controlled descent; verb: to move smoothly and effortlessly.
example: The children love to slide down the playground slide.
The stock market experienced a sudden slide.
He slid into the seat, exhausted after a long day.

vn_meaning: tính từ: nhỏ, ít, nhẹ; động từ: làm nhỏ đi, làm giảm bớt
eng_explanation: adj: small in degree; verb: to lessen or diminish something.
example: There was a slight improvement in his condition.
She felt a slight breeze on her face.
The company tried to slight the importance of the issue.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: hơi, chút xíu
eng_explanation: adverb: to a small degree; somewhat.
example: I'm slightly tired after the long journey.
The weather is slightly cooler today.
She was slightly disappointed with the results.

vn_meaning: danh từ: trượt, tuột; động từ: trượt, tuột, lỡ
eng_explanation: noun: a sudden, unintentional loss of balance; verb: to slide or fall unintentionally.
example: She felt a slip on the icy pavement.
He let the glass slip from his hand.
I slipped up and forgot to call her.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khẩu hiệu, châm ngôn
eng_explanation: noun: a short, memorable phrase used to promote a product or idea.
example: The company's new slogan is 'Think Different'.
The campaign slogan was simple and effective.
Their slogan perfectly captured the essence of their brand.

vn_meaning: danh từ: độ dốc; động từ: dốc, nghiêng
eng_explanation: noun: an inclined surface; verb: to decline or slant.
example: The slope of the hill was quite steep.
The ground slopes gently towards the river.
The road began to slope downwards.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khe, rãnh; vị trí, chỗ
eng_explanation: noun: a narrow opening; a designated space or position.
example: Insert the card into the slot.
He found a slot in the schedule for a meeting.
The machine has a slot for coins.

vn_meaning: tính từ: chậm; động từ: làm chậm lại
eng_explanation: adj: moving or operating in a leisurely manner; verb: to reduce speed.
example: The turtle is a slow animal.
Please slow down while driving.
The rain slowed to a drizzle.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: chậm rãi, từ từ
eng_explanation: adverb: at a slow pace; gradually.
example: He walked slowly through the park.
The music played slowly and softly.
The plants grew slowly in the shade.

vn_meaning: động từ: bẻ gãy (cành cây, ngón tay); chụp (ảnh); cắn (vào); phản ứng nhanh chóng (với sự khó chịu); danh từ: tiếng búng tay; ảnh chụp nhanh
eng_explanation: v: break quickly; take a photo. n: a snapping sound; a quick photo. (adj: quick, sudden)
example: She snapped a picture of the sunset.
He snapped at me when I asked a question.
The branch snapped in the wind.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tuyết; động từ: (tuyết) rơi
eng_explanation: n: frozen precipitation. v: to fall as snow. (adj: relating to snow)
example: The snow was falling heavily last night.
We built a snowman in the snow.
Snow tires are essential in winter.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: vậy, như vậy; để (mà); liên từ: vì vậy, nên; thán từ: vậy à
eng_explanation: adv: to a great extent. conj: therefore. (interj: used to express agreement)
example: It was so cold yesterday.
I was tired, so I went to bed early.
“Are you coming?” “So am I.”

vn_meaning: tính từ: tự xưng là, được gọi là (thường mang ý mỉa mai hoặc nghi ngờ)
eng_explanation: adj: supposedly; referred to as, often with doubt. (used before a noun)
example: The so-called expert was completely wrong.
He's a so-called friend, but I don't trust him.
Their so-called solution didn't work.

vn_meaning: động từ: ngâm, nhúng; thấm đẫm; làm ướt sũng
eng_explanation: v: to immerse; to become thoroughly wet. (adj: saturated)
example: She soaked the cloth in water.
I got completely soaked in the rain.
The sponge was soaked with soap.

vn_meaning: danh từ: xà phòng; động từ: xà phòng hóa
eng_explanation: n: a cleaning agent. v: to clean with soap. (adj: relating to soap)
example: Wash your hands with soap and water.
She likes the smell of lavender soap.
The oil was saponified to make soap.

vn_meaning: động từ: bay vút lên, bay cao; tăng vọt (về giá cả, số lượng)
eng_explanation: v: to fly high; to rise rapidly. (adj: relating to soaring)
example: The eagle soared above the mountains.
Temperatures are expected to soar this week.
His spirits soared when he heard the news.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bóng đá (chủ yếu ở Mỹ và Canada)
eng_explanation: n: football (played with a round ball, primarily in US/Canada).
example: He plays soccer for the school team.
Soccer is a popular sport worldwide.
She's a talented soccer player.

vn_meaning: tính từ: xã hội; thuộc về xã hội; giao tiếp; danh từ: buổi giao lưu xã hội
eng_explanation: adj: relating to society. n: a gathering of people. (adv: in a social manner)
example: Social media has changed the way we communicate.
We went to a social event last night.
She has a very active social life.

vn_meaning: tính từ: xã hội chủ nghĩa; danh từ: người xã hội chủ nghĩa
eng_explanation: adj: relating to socialism. n: a person who supports socialism.
example: He has socialist views on economics.
The socialist party won the election.
She is a committed socialist.

vn_meaning: xã hội
eng_explanation: A society is a complex social structure with shared values, customs, and institutions.
example: The society is known for its vibrant arts scene.
The new laws aim to improve the overall society.

vn_meaning: tất
eng_explanation: A sock is a foot covering, often made of cotton or wool.
example: I need a new pair of socks to wear to the party.
She wore a cozy pair of socks to the cold weather.

vn_meaning: gentle, yielding, or easily affected; also, having a delicate or subdued quality.
eng_explanation: ‘Soft’ describes something that is gentle and easily influenced.
example: The music was very soft and calming.
She has a soft voice and a gentle demeanor.

vn_meaning: phần mềm
eng_explanation: Software is a collection of programs that enable computers to perform tasks.
example: We need to update the software on our computers.
The software company is launching a new product.

vn_meaning: the ground beneath plants; the earth's surface.
eng_explanation: Soil is the foundation of plant life and provides nutrients.
example: The farmer carefully examined the soil before planting the seeds.
Poor soil quality can hinder crop growth.

vn_meaning: mặt trời
eng_explanation: Solar energy is derived from the sun's rays.
example: Solar panels are becoming increasingly popular for generating electricity.
The solar farm provides clean energy for the community.

vn_meaning: người lính
eng_explanation: A soldier is a military person who serves in armed conflict.
example: The soldiers were bravely defending the country.
The soldier's bravery was widely praised.

vn_meaning: chính
eng_explanation: ‘Sole’ signifies the most important or unique.
example: He wore a single shoe.
The sole of the boat was damaged.

vn_meaning: completely; entirely.
eng_explanation: ‘Solely’ indicates complete or undivided.
example: She made her decision solely on her own judgment.
He acted solely on his own principles.

vn_meaning: người giám sát
eng_explanation: A solicitor is a legal professional who represents clients in legal matters.
example: The solicitor helped the client with their divorce proceedings.
The solicitor is a highly respected figure in the legal profession.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tảng đá; tính từ: vững chắc; (về tình cảm) sâu sắc, bền chặt.
eng_explanation: adj. firm; substantiál; n. a large block of rock or ice.
example: The bridge was built with solid concrete.
He had a solid reputation for honesty.
The solid ground offered a stable surface.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự đoàn kết; sự đồng lòng.
eng_explanation: n. a sense of unity and mutual support among individuals.
example: The workers demonstrated their solidarity with a strike.
Solidarity between nations is crucial for peace.
She showed solidarity by volunteering her time.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tiết mục độc tấu; tính từ: đơn độc; riêng lẻ.
eng_explanation: adj. alone; individual; n. a performance by one musician.
example: The pianist performed a beautiful solo.
He enjoyed a solo vacation.
She took a solo hike in the mountains.

vn_meaning: danh từ: giải pháp; phương án; (văn hóa) rượu thuốc.
eng_explanation: n. a way to solve a problem; a medicinal drink.
example: The solution to the problem was simple.
He offered a creative solution to the conflict.
The ancient cultures used herbal solutions for healing.

vn_meaning: động từ: giải quyết; tìm ra lời giải; (văn hóa) pha rượu thuốc.
eng_explanation: v. to find an answer or solution; to prepare a medicinal drink.
example: Can you solve this math problem?
She is trying to solve the mystery.
He solved the complex equation.

vn_meaning: tính từ: một ít; một phần; đôi khi.
eng_explanation: ind. some; a portion of something.
example: I want some water.
Some people prefer coffee.
He has some experience in the field.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ai đó; người nào đó.
eng_explanation: pron. a person or people (unknown or unspecified).
example: Somebody called the police.
Do you know somebody who can help?
I saw somebody walking down the street.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: một cách nào đó; dù sao đi nữa.
eng_explanation: adv. in some way; despite difficulties.
example: I managed to finish the project somehow.
He arrived late, somehow.
She succeeded somehow, despite the odds.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ai đó; người nào đó.
eng_explanation: pron. a person (unknown or unspecified).
example: Someone left their keys here.
Is there someone I can talk to?
I saw someone sitting at the table.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thứ gì đó; cái gì đó.
eng_explanation: n. a thing or things (unspecified).
example: I need something to eat.
He found something interesting.
Is there anything I can do for you?

vn_meaning: trạng từ: một lúc nào đó, vào một thời điểm nào đó (thể hiện sự không rõ ràng về thời gian); danh từ: một thời điểm, một lần nào đó.
eng_explanation: adverb: at some unspecified time; noun: a point in time.
example: Let's meet sometime next week.
I'll call you sometime tomorrow.
I have a meeting sometime this afternoon.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: thỉnh thoảng, đôi khi.
eng_explanation: adverb: occasionally; from time to time.
example: I sometimes go to the cinema.
She sometimes forgets my name.
Sometimes it's good to just relax.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: phần nào, hơi, một chút.
eng_explanation: adverb: to a certain extent; slightly.
example: He was somewhat disappointed with the results.
The food was somewhat bland.
I'm somewhat tired after the long journey.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: ở đâu đó, tại một nơi nào đó (không rõ ràng).
eng_explanation: adverb: in or to an unspecified place.
example: I left my keys somewhere in the house.
Let's go somewhere for dinner.
I heard a noise coming from somewhere.

vn_meaning: danh từ: con trai.
eng_explanation: noun: a male child.
example: He is my only son.
The son inherited the family business.
She loves her son very much.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bài hát.
eng_explanation: noun: a musical composition with lyrics.
example: She sang a beautiful song.
The band played a popular song.
I love listening to old songs.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: sớm, không lâu sau.
eng_explanation: adverb: in a short time; shortly.
example: I'll be there soon.
We'll finish the project soon.
Summer will be here soon.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tinh tế, phức tạp, khéo léo; (về người) sành điệu, có hiểu biết.
eng_explanation: adjective: refined, cultured, and complex; having advanced taste.
example: She has a sophisticated sense of style.
The system uses sophisticated technology.
He's a sophisticated traveler.

vn_meaning: tính từ: xin lỗi, tiếc nuối; trạng từ: xin lỗi.
eng_explanation: adjective: regretful; adverb: expressing regret.
example: I'm sorry for the mistake.
I'm sorry to hear that.
He said sorry for being late.

vn_meaning: danh từ: loại, hạng; động từ: sắp xếp, phân loại.
eng_explanation: noun: a category or group; verb: to arrange systematically.
example: What sort of music do you like?
Please sort these papers alphabetically.
I need to sort out my finances.

vn_meaning: tính từ: dự trữ, thừa; động từ: dành, tiết kiệm, tha mạng (cho ai đó).
eng_explanation: adj/v: available beyond what is needed; to refrain from harming. (PoS: adj, v)
example: Do you have a spare tire in your car?
She managed to spare some time to help me.
The police decided to spare the thief a jail sentence.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tia lửa; động từ: gây ra, khơi gợi.
eng_explanation: n/v: a small fiery particle; to ignite or cause something to begin. (PoS: n, v)
example: A spark from the fire landed on the dry grass.
His speech sparked a lively debate.
The idea sparked her imagination.

vn_meaning: động từ: nói, phát biểu, giao tiếp bằng lời.
eng_explanation: v: to say words aloud; to communicate verbally. (PoS: v)
example: Can you speak English?
She spoke eloquently about the importance of education.
He refused to speak to the police.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người nói, diễn giả; loa (âm thanh).
eng_explanation: n: a person who delivers a speech; a device that reproduces sound. (PoS: n)
example: The speaker captivated the audience with her powerful message.
The conference featured several prominent speakers.
We need to buy a new speaker for the stereo.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đặc biệt, riêng biệt, xuất sắc.
eng_explanation: adj: distinct or different from what is usual; of a particular kind. (PoS: adj)
example: This is a special occasion.
She has a special talent for music.
We made a special effort to decorate the room.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chuyên gia, người có chuyên môn cao trong một lĩnh vực nào đó.
eng_explanation: n: a person with detailed knowledge or skill in a particular area. (PoS: n)
example: She is a heart specialist.
I need to consult a tax specialist.
The hospital has a team of medical specialists.

vn_meaning: động từ: chuyên môn hóa, tập trung vào một lĩnh vực cụ thể.
eng_explanation: v: to concentrate on a particular subject or activity; to become an expert. (PoS: v)
example: He decided to specialize in cardiology.
The company specializes in software development.
Many doctors specialize after completing medical school.

vn_meaning: tính từ: chuyên biệt, chuyên sâu, dành cho một đối tượng cụ thể.
eng_explanation: adj: requiring or involving detailed and specific knowledge or training. (PoS: adj)
example: This is a highly specialized field of study.
The magazine caters to a specialized audience.
He received specialized training in computer programming.

vn_meaning: danh từ: loài (động vật, thực vật).
eng_explanation: n: a group of living organisms consisting of similar individuals. (PoS: n)
example: The panda is an endangered species.
There are many different species of birds in the rainforest.
Scientists are studying the genetic diversity within the species.

vn_meaning: tính từ: cụ thể, rõ ràng, chính xác.
eng_explanation: adj: clearly defined or identified; relating to a particular thing. (PoS: adj)
example: Can you give me a specific example?
The instructions were very specific.
She had a specific reason for leaving.

vn_meaning: cụ thể
eng_explanation: It indicates a precise and detailed reference.
example: The report provides a specifically detailed analysis of the data.
She specifically requested a revised version of the document.

vn_meaning: điều kiện
eng_explanation: It defines the necessary features and characteristics.
example: The specification outlined the technical requirements for the new engine.
The client provided a detailed specification for the design.

vn_meaning: to state clearly; to indicate something exactly.
eng_explanation: It conveys a clear and precise indication.
example: Please specify the date and time.
The company needs to specify the exact specifications for the product.

vn_meaning: hàm cụ thể
eng_explanation: It's a representative example.
example: The scientist collected a specimen for further analysis.
The specimen was examined closely for signs of damage.

vn_meaning: hạt mẫu
eng_explanation: It refers to a visual event.
example: The opera was a spectacular performance by the renowned conductor.
The spectacle of the fireworks was breathtaking.

vn_meaning: extremely impressive; remarkable.
eng_explanation: It describes something that is visually stunning.
example: The landscape was a spectacular vista of mountains and valleys.
The performance was a spectacular display of artistry.

vn_meaning: hội diễn
eng_explanation: It's someone who observes.
example: The audience was a large spectator at the sporting event.
The spectator provided valuable feedback on the film.

vn_meaning: người xem
eng_explanation: It represents a wide range of possibilities.
example: The spectrum of light shows a vast range of colors.
The spectrum of radio waves is used for communication.

vn_meaning: phạm vi
eng_explanation: It involves making an educated guess.
example: The economist made a speculation about the future of the economy.
The company's speculation about market trends is controversial.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lời nói; bài phát biểu; diễn thuyết; (tâm lý) sự suy nghĩ (không được diễn đạt ra lời)
eng_explanation: Noun: spoken communication; verb: to deliver a talk or lecture.
example: He gave a moving speech at the ceremony.
The politician’s speech focused on economic reform.
She struggled to find the words for her speech.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tốc độ; vận tốc; (thể thao) tốc độ chạy; (tính chất) nhanh chóng
eng_explanation: Noun: rate of motion; verb: to move quickly.
example: The car’s speed was dangerously high.
He increased his speed to win the race.
The internet speed is improving rapidly.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cách viết; phép thuật; (thời gian) thời kỳ; (âm thanh) âm tiết
eng_explanation: Verb: to write correctly; noun: a magical incantation; noun: a period of time.
example: Can you spell your name?
The wizard cast a powerful spell.
The 18th century was a fascinating spell.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cách viết; quy tắc viết
eng_explanation: Noun: the way words are spelled; the rules of spelling.
example: Check your spelling carefully before submitting the essay.
The spelling of the word is often difficult to remember.
He studied the spelling rules diligently.

vn_meaning: động từ: tiêu tiền; dành thời gian; sử dụng
eng_explanation: Verb: to use money; to devote time to something.
example: I need to spend less money on unnecessary things.
She spends her weekends reading and hiking.
He spends a lot of time working on his research.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chi tiêu; việc chi tiêu; (thời gian) thời gian dành cho việc gì đó
eng_explanation: Noun: the act of spending money; the amount spent.
example: His spending habits are unsustainable.
The government is monitoring consumer spending.
She enjoys spending time with her family.

vn_meaning: danh từ: quả cầu; lĩnh vực; phạm vi
eng_explanation: Noun: a ball-shaped object; a field of activity or knowledge.
example: The planet Earth is a sphere.
She works in the sphere of international law.
The sphere of his influence extended throughout the company.

vn_meaning: danh từ: gia vị; (tính chất) làm cho trở nên hấp dẫn
eng_explanation: Noun: a flavoring substance; an ingredient that adds interest.
example: He added spices to the curry to make it more flavorful.
The spice trade was a major part of the economy.
A little spice can make a dish more exciting.

vn_meaning: tính từ: cay; (về người) hấp dẫn, quyến rũ
eng_explanation: Adjective: having a hot, pungent flavor; attractive and alluring.
example: This chili is very spicy.
She wore a spicy red dress.
He has a spicy personality.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhện; (tính từ) có mạng nhện
eng_explanation: Noun: an eight-legged arachnid; having a web.
example: The spider spun a web in the corner.
She was afraid of spiders.
The spider caught a fly in its web.

vn_meaning: động từ: làm đổ (chất lỏng); vô tình tiết lộ (bí mật); danh từ: sự đổ, sự tràn ra
eng_explanation: verb: to cause (liquid) to flow over the edge; verb: to reveal carelessly; noun: an accidental outflow.
example: He accidentally spilled his coffee on the report.
The journalist spilled the secret about the merger.
There was a spill of oil into the river.

vn_meaning: động từ: xoay, quay; làm quay; bóp xoắn; nói quanh co, nói vòng vo; danh từ: sự xoay, sự quay; một câu chuyện bịa đặt
eng_explanation: verb: to rotate rapidly; verb: to twist or wind; noun: a rotation; noun: a fabricated story.
example: The ballerina began to spin gracefully.
He tried to spin the story to make himself look better.
The top was spinning rapidly on the table.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cột sống; sườn sách; xương sống (của một vật)
eng_explanation: noun: the backbone; noun: the ridge of a book's pages; noun: the central supporting structure.
example: He felt a sharp pain in his spine.
The spine of the book was damaged.
The bridge's spine was reinforced for safety.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tinh thần; linh hồn; tâm hồn; rượu mạnh; ý chí; tinh khí
eng_explanation: noun: the nonphysical part of a person; noun: the mood or atmosphere; noun: distilled alcoholic drink.
example: She has a strong spirit and never gives up.
The spirit of the party was festive and joyful.
He ordered a glass of whiskey, a strong spirit.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thuộc về tinh thần; thuộc về tâm linh; cao thượng về tinh thần
eng_explanation: adjective: relating to the spirit; relating to sacred matters; elevated in character.
example: She sought spiritual guidance from a monk.
The painting had a spiritual quality.
He led a simple, spiritual life.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự ganh ghét, sự đố kỵ; lòng mưu đồ xấu xa; động từ: làm điều gì đó để làm tổn thương ai đó vì ganh ghét
eng_explanation: noun: a desire to hurt or annoy someone; verb: to do something to hurt someone out of spite.
example: He acted out of spite after their argument.
She made the comment purely out of spite.
Don't let spite control your actions.

vn_meaning: động từ: chia cắt, rẽ; tách đôi; nứt; danh từ: sự chia cắt, vết nứt
eng_explanation: verb: to divide into two or more parts; noun: a crack or division.
example: The group decided to split the profits equally.
There was a split in the road.
The vase had a large split down the side.

vn_meaning: động từ: làm hỏng, làm thối rữa; làm mất giá trị; hư hỏng; danh từ: thức ăn thừa, đồ ăn hỏng
eng_explanation: verb: to damage or ruin something; verb: to pamper excessively; noun: food that has gone bad.
example: The milk has spoiled and smells bad.
Don't spoil your children with too many gifts.
We had to throw away the spoiled food.

vn_meaning: tính từ: được nói ra; bằng lời nói; động từ: nói, phát biểu
eng_explanation: adjective: expressed verbally; verb: to utter or express verbally.
example: The spoken word is more powerful than the written.
He spoke eloquently about his vision.
The spoken instructions were difficult to understand.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người phát ngôn; người đại diện phát ngôn
eng_explanation: noun: a person who speaks on behalf of an organization.
example: The company appointed a spokesman to address the media.
The senator served as a spokesman for the bill.
She is the designated spokesman for the campaign.

vn_meaning: động từ: lan rộng, trải ra, phết (bơ, mứt); danh từ: sự lan rộng, phạm vi; tính từ: rộng, trải dài
eng_explanation: v: to extend over an area; n: the extent of something. (various PoS)
example: The fire quickly spread throughout the building.
She spread jam on her toast.
The news spread like wildfire.

vn_meaning: động từ: nhảy, bật lên, xuất hiện bất ngờ; danh từ: mùa xuân, lò xo, nguồn nước; tính từ: thuộc mùa xuân
eng_explanation: v: to jump or move suddenly; n: the season after winter. (various PoS)
example: The cat sprang onto the table.
Spring is my favorite season.
The spring in the mattress was broken.

vn_meaning: động từ: do thám, gián điệp; danh từ: gián điệp, người do thám
eng_explanation: v: to secretly observe; n: a person who secretly gathers information. (v, n)
example: He was accused of spying for the enemy.
The spy infiltrated the organization.
She felt like she was under constant surveillance.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đội, nhóm (thường là nhỏ, có tổ chức)
eng_explanation: n: a small group of people with a specific task. (n)
example: The police sent a squad to investigate the scene.
The soccer team has a talented squad.
A rescue squad arrived quickly.

vn_meaning: tính từ: vuông; danh từ: quảng trường, hình vuông; động từ: làm cho vuông, tính bình phương
eng_explanation: adj: having four equal sides; n: a public open space. (adj, n, v)
example: The table is square.
We met in the town square.
Square the number to find its value.

vn_meaning: động từ: bóp, nén, ép; danh từ: sự bóp, ép
eng_explanation: v: to firmly press something; n: an act of pressing. (v, n)
example: She squeezed the lemon into the juice.
He gave her a tight squeeze.
There was a squeeze on the bus.

vn_meaning: động từ: đâm, chọc; danh từ: vết đâm
eng_explanation: v: to pierce with a sharp object; n: a wound made by stabbing. (v, n)
example: He was stabbed in the back.
The stab wound was serious.
She felt a stab of pain.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự ổn định, vững chắc
eng_explanation: n: the state of being stable; firmness. (n)
example: The country needs political stability.
Financial stability is important.
The building lacked structural stability.

vn_meaning: động từ: ổn định, làm vững chắc
eng_explanation: v: to make something stable; to become stable. (v)
example: The government is trying to stabilize the economy.
The patient's condition has stabilized.
Braces help to stabilize the jaw.

vn_meaning: tính từ: ổn định, vững chắc, bền vững; danh từ: chuồng ngựa
eng_explanation: adj: not likely to change or fail; n: a building for horses. (adj, n)
example: The situation is now stable.
He has a stable job.
The horses were kept in a stable.

vn_meaning: sân vận động
eng_explanation: A stadium is a large, enclosed area used for sports and entertainment.
example: The football team played their match in the magnificent stadium.
The concert was held on the impressive stadium stage.

vn_meaning: nhân viên
eng_explanation: Staff refers to the workers or employees of a company or organization.
example: The staff assisted the manager with the project.
We need more staff to handle the increased workload.

vn_meaning: bậc
eng_explanation: A stage is a platform used for presentations, performances, or exhibitions.
example: The actors performed on the grand stage.
The music was played on the brightly lit stage.

vn_meaning: bậc thang
eng_explanation: A stair is a vertical step or set of steps.
example: We climbed the stairs to the top of the building.
The old house had many wooden stairs.

vn_meaning: lợi ích
eng_explanation: A stake is a point of support or a piece of equipment used to hold something.
example: The fisherman used a stake to secure the fish.
The company is staking its claim on the new territory.

vn_meaning: bo sỉ
eng_explanation: A stall is a temporary display or stand for selling goods or services.
example: The farmer set up a stall at the market.
The vendor had a stall selling his wares.

vn_meaning: dấu
eng_explanation: A stamp is a mark or impression made on a surface.
example: The postal worker applied a stamp to the envelope.
The document was stamped with a unique identifier.

vn_meaning: tư thế
eng_explanation: Stance refers to the position of the body or limbs.
example: The athlete took a strong stance before the race.
She adjusted her stance to avoid tripping.

vn_meaning: đứng
eng_explanation: Stand means to be in a fixed position.
example: The building stands tall and proud.
He stood firm in his belief.

vn_meaning: tiêu chuẩn
eng_explanation: A standard is a measure or benchmark for quality or accuracy.
example: The company uses a standard for measuring the product.
The technician checked the equipment against the standard.

vn_meaning: danh từ: vị trí; địa điểm (đứng); tính từ: đứng (về tình trạng); tính từ: vững chắc (về vật chất)
eng_explanation: adj./n.: in a vertical position; firm or robust (physical or figurative).
example: The museum is located in a standing building.
He gave a standing ovation to the performer.
The standing desk promotes better posture.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ngôi sao (thiên văn); danh từ: diễn viên nổi tiếng; danh từ: điểm số (trong thể thao); tính từ: nổi tiếng; tính từ: lấp lánh
eng_explanation: n./adj.: a celestial body; a famous actor; a high score; brilliantly shining.
example: She dreams of becoming a movie star.
The star twinkled brightly in the night sky.
He scored a star performance in the play.

vn_meaning: động từ: nhìn chằm chằm; nhìn với vẻ dò xét
eng_explanation: v.: to look intently and steadily, often with surprise or curiosity.
example: He stared at the painting for a long time.
She stared at him suspiciously.
The child stared out the window.

vn_meaning: tính từ: lạnh lẽo; khắc nghiệt; trắng xóa; rõ ràng; dữ dội
eng_explanation: adj.: extremely cold or severe; strikingly white; very clear or obvious.
example: The winter landscape was stark and barren.
He gave a stark warning about the dangers.
The stark contrast between the two colors was noticeable.

vn_meaning: động từ: bắt đầu; khởi đầu; điểm xuất phát; cảm thấy (về cảm xúc)
eng_explanation: v.: to begin; to initiate; the beginning of a race.
example: Let's start the meeting now.
He started a new business.
The race started with a loud horn.

vn_meaning: động từ: đói; bị đói; làm cho ai đó đói
eng_explanation: v.: to suffer or be deprived of food; to cause someone to be hungry.
example: The refugees were starving due to the war.
Don't starve yourself during a diet.
He starved his enemies of supplies.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tình trạng; bang (quốc gia); tuyên bố; trạng thái (của vật thể)
eng_explanation: n.: condition; a country; a formal declaration; the physical condition of something.
example: The patient's condition is critical.
The United States is a state.
He made a formal state apology.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tuyên bố; bài tuyên bố; bản ghi chép (về tài chính)
eng_explanation: n.: a formal declaration; a written account; a financial record.
example: He made a controversial statement.
The company released a new statement.
Review your bank statement carefully.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhà ga; trạm; vị trí; địa điểm
eng_explanation: n.: a railway station; a base or point; a location.
example: We arrived at the train station.
The military station is located in the countryside.
That's a strategic station for trade.

vn_meaning: danh từ: số liệu thống kê; con số thống kê
eng_explanation: n.: a piece of statistical data.
example: The statistic showed a significant increase.
He analyzed the latest statistics.
The statistic was disputed by experts.

vn_meaning: tính từ: liên quan đến thống kê (khoa học, kinh tế); thuộc về số liệu thống kê (nghiên cứu).
eng_explanation: adjective: Relating to or involving statistics; based on statistical data.
example: The statistical analysis revealed a significant correlation.
The company released its annual statistical report.
Statistical methods are used in many scientific fields.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tượng (điêu khắc).
eng_explanation: noun: A sculpted figure, often of a person or animal, used for decoration or as a memorial.
example: The park featured a beautiful statue of a famous general.
Tourists flocked to see the ancient statue in the museum.
She admired the intricate details of the marble statue.

vn_meaning: danh từ: địa vị; tình trạng; trạng thái.
eng_explanation: noun: A person's or thing's position or rank; the state of affairs.
example: What is your current relationship status?
The status of the project is under review.
He checked the status of his order online.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thời gian ở lại; sự lưu lại; chỗ ở; động từ: ở lại; dừng lại; chờ đợi.
eng_explanation: noun/verb: A period of time spent in a place; to remain in a place for a while.
example: We enjoyed a pleasant stay at the hotel.
Please stay here until I return.
I need to stay focused on my goals.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: một cách vững chắc; một cách đều đặn; một cách kiên định.
eng_explanation: adverb: In a steady or unwavering manner; consistently.
example: The patient's heart rate was steadily decreasing.
She steadily climbed the steep hill.
He steadily improved his skills over time.

vn_meaning: tính từ: vững chắc; ổn định; đều đặn; động từ: giữ vững; ổn định.
eng_explanation: adjective/verb: Firm and not moving or likely to move; to stabilize or keep steady.
example: He has a steady job with good benefits.
She needed a steady hand to perform the surgery.
The ship sailed steadily through the rough seas.

vn_meaning: danh từ: vụ trộm; động từ: ăn cắp; đánh cắp.
eng_explanation: noun/verb: The act of taking something without permission; to take something secretly or dishonestly.
example: The museum suffered a major art steal.
Don't steal anything from the store.
He felt guilty after he stole the candy.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hơi nước; động từ: bốc hơi; tạo ra hơi nước.
eng_explanation: noun/verb: Water in gaseous form; to emit steam; to be filled with steam.
example: The kettle was filled with steam.
The engine runs on steam power.
The hot springs were filled with rising steam.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thép; động từ: làm cứng (bằng thép); kiên quyết.
eng_explanation: noun/verb: A strong, hard alloy of iron; to strengthen or reinforce with steel; to be determined.
example: The bridge is made of steel.
He used steel to reinforce the frame.
She stood her ground and steel her resolve.

vn_meaning: tính từ: dốc; крутой; крутой; động từ: làm dốc; ngâm trong chất lỏng.
eng_explanation: adjective/verb: Having a sharp incline; to soak something in a liquid to extract a flavor or color.
example: The road was too steep to climb.
She steeped the tea for five minutes.
The prices of houses are steep in that area.

vn_meaning: động từ: khuấy, trộn; gợi lên, khơi gợi (cảm xúc, ký ức); xáo trộn, gây náo động (tình hình).
eng_explanation: v. to move something around with a spoon or similar; to cause to feel an emotion (stir up).
example: She stirred sugar into her tea.
The music stirred feelings of nostalgia.
His speech stirred up a lot of controversy.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hàng tồn kho, số lượng hàng hóa; cổ phiếu, vốn góp; giống (động vật, cây trồng); nước dùng (nấu ăn).; tính từ: thuộc về hàng tồn kho, dự trữ.
eng_explanation: n. goods kept for sale; shares in a company; a supply of something. adj. available in stock.
example: The store has a large stock of books.
He invested in stock market.
We need to take stock of the situation.

vn_meaning: danh từ: dạ dày; sự chịu đựng, khả năng chịu đựng.
eng_explanation: n. the organ in the body where food is digested; the ability to tolerate something unpleasant.
example: I have a pain in my stomach.
I don't have the stomach for violence.
He ate too much and has an upset stomach.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đá; hòn đá cuội, sỏi; hạt nhân (hoa quả).
eng_explanation: n. a hard solid nonmetallic material; a small pebble. (often used figuratively for hardness).
example: The house was built of stone.
She threw a stone into the lake.
He has a stone heart.

vn_meaning: động từ: dừng lại, ngừng; chặn lại, ngăn cản; làm cho ngừng hoạt động.; danh từ: điểm dừng, trạm dừng.
eng_explanation: v. to cease movement or action; to prevent something from continuing. n. a place where transport stops.
example: Please stop talking.
The bus stop is just around the corner.
He tried to stop the bleeding.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự lưu trữ, kho chứa; không gian lưu trữ.
eng_explanation: n. the act of storing something; space where things are kept.
example: The garage is used for storage.
Cloud storage is becoming increasingly popular.
We need more storage space for our belongings.

vn_meaning: động từ: lưu trữ, cất giữ; mua sắm (tại cửa hàng).; danh từ: cửa hàng, kho hàng.
eng_explanation: v. to keep or accumulate; to shop at. n. a shop; a supply of something.
example: Where do you store your files?
I need to go to the store to buy groceries.
The store is having a sale.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bão, giông bão; cơn giận dữ, sự phẫn nộ.; động từ: bão tố, nổi giông.
eng_explanation: n. a violent disturbance of the atmosphere; a sudden outburst of anger. v. to rain or snow heavily.
example: There was a terrible storm last night.
He stormed out of the room.
The ship was caught in a storm.

vn_meaning: danh từ: câu chuyện, truyện; tin tức, thông tin.
eng_explanation: n. a narrative; an account of an event or series of events.
example: She told me a fascinating story.
I read the story in the newspaper.
It's a long story.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thẳng; trực tiếp, thẳng thắn; ngay thẳng, lương thiện.; trạng từ: thẳng, trực tiếp.
eng_explanation: adj. not curved; direct; honest. adv. directly; in a straight line.
example: The road is straight.
He gave me a straight answer.
Go straight ahead.

vn_meaning: clear, easy, and logical; uncomplicated; straightforward.
eng_explanation: It means something is easy to understand and doesn't have complications.
example: The strategy was straightforward and effective.
The report was presented in a straightforward manner.
He offered a straightforward solution to the problem.

vn_meaning: căng thẳng
eng_explanation: It refers to a particular case of a disease or condition.
example: The strain of influenza is highly contagious.
The doctor examined the patient for a strain of the virus.
The strain of cancer is rapidly spreading.

vn_meaning: mảnh
eng_explanation: It describes a line or section of something, often a rope or cable.
example: The sailor pulled on the strand of the rope.
The strand of the fabric was frayed.
The strand of the cable was broken.

vn_meaning: not ordinary or usual; unusual.
eng_explanation: It describes something that is different from what is expected or typical.
example: The weather was strange and unpredictable.
He felt strange and confused.
The painting was strange and unsettling.

vn_meaning: người lạ
eng_explanation: It describes someone who is not known to the speaker.
example: The tourist was a strange man.
I've never met a stranger like him.
The strange man seemed to be watching us.

vn_meaning: planned and thoughtful; deliberate.
eng_explanation: It describes a plan or approach that is carefully considered.
example: The company adopted a strategic plan to increase market share.
He employed a strategic approach to solve the problem.
The military employed a strategic approach to the conflict.

vn_meaning: chiến lược
eng_explanation: It refers to a plan or method for achieving a goal.
example: The company developed a strategic plan to compete with rivals.
His strategy was simple but effective.
The team created a strategy to overcome the challenge.

vn_meaning: dòng suối
eng_explanation: It describes a continuous flow of water.
example: The river flowed steadily through the valley.
The stream gurgled as it tumbled over rocks.
The stream of water was crystal clear.

vn_meaning: đường phố
eng_explanation: It refers to a road or path that is open to the public.
example: The pedestrians walked along the busy street.
The street was lined with shops and restaurants.
The street was a vibrant hub of activity.

vn_meaning: sức mạnh
eng_explanation: It describes the power or ability to move or exert force.
example: The athlete displayed incredible strength.
She had a surprising strength for her age.
The building's strength was tested by the storm.

vn_meaning: động từ: củng cố; tăng cường (sức mạnh, khả năng); làm mạnh hơn (một mối quan hệ)
eng_explanation: Verb (V): To make or become stronger; reinforce something.
example: The new regulations will strengthen the economy.
Exercise can strengthen your heart.
He strengthened his friendship with the offer of help.

vn_meaning: danh từ: áp lực; căng thẳng (tâm lý, thể chất); động từ: nhấn mạnh (một điểm)
eng_explanation: Noun (N): Mental or emotional strain. Verb (V): To emphasize a particular point.
example: She felt a lot of stress at work.
The stress of the exam caused her to fail.
The teacher stressed the importance of studying.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khoảng cách dài; sự kéo giãn; động từ: kéo dài; thử thách (khả năng)
eng_explanation: Verb (V): To extend or pull something. Noun (N): A long distance or expanse.
example: The road stretches for miles.
I stretched my muscles after the run.
The project stretched our resources to the limit.

vn_meaning: tính từ: nghiêm ngặt; khắt khe; chặt chẽ (quy tắc, kỷ luật)
eng_explanation: Adjective (Adj): Following rules closely; severe and uncompromising.
example: The teacher was strict about homework.
He has a strict diet.
The company enforces strict safety regulations.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: nghiêm ngặt; hoàn toàn; chính xác (theo quy tắc)
eng_explanation: Adverb (Adv): In a strict or precise manner; completely.
example: He follows the rules strictly.
The instructions are to be followed strictly.
She was strictly forbidden from entering.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cuộc đình công; đòn; cú đánh; động từ: đánh, tác động (một cách đột ngột)
eng_explanation: Verb (V): To hit forcefully. Noun (N): A sudden action or event.
example: The workers went on strike.
He struck the ball with power.
A strike of lightning illuminated the sky.

vn_meaning: tính từ: ấn tượng; nổi bật; đáng chú ý (ngoài mong đợi)
eng_explanation: Adjective (Adj): Remarkably impressive or noticeable; attention-grabbing.
example: The sunset was a striking sight.
She has a striking resemblance to her mother.
His performance was a striking example of talent.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sợi dây; chuỗi; bộ phim; động từ: viết (một đoạn văn)
eng_explanation: Noun (N): A thin, flexible piece of material. Verb (V): To write a short passage.
example: She tied the ribbon with a string.
The necklace was made of a string of pearls.
He stringed together a beautiful sentence.

vn_meaning: danh từ: mảnh vải; lớp; động từ: cởi; bóc (một thứ gì đó)
eng_explanation: Verb (V): To remove clothing. Noun (N): A long, narrow piece of material.
example: He stripped off his wet clothes.
The paint stripped from the wall.
She stripped the fruit carefully.

vn_meaning: động từ: nỗ lực; cố gắng; đấu tranh (đạt được một mục tiêu)
eng_explanation: Verb (V): To make great efforts to achieve something.
example: He strives to be a better person.
They strive for excellence in everything they do.
She strives to overcome her fears.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cú đánh (thể thao); đột quỵ (y học); nét vẽ; động tác vuốt; danh từ: (thường dùng số nhiều) kiểu bơi sải; tính từ: (tường, vải...) có sọc, có hoa văn.
eng_explanation: noun: a forceful hit; a medical condition; a line or mark. verb: to move a pen across a surface.
example: The swimmer completed the final stroke of the race.
He suffered a stroke last year and is recovering.
She added a delicate stroke of paint to the canvas.

vn_meaning: tính từ: khỏe, mạnh; vững chắc; mãnh liệt; có sức thuyết phục.
eng_explanation: adjective: having great power or force; physically fit; emotionally resilient.
example: She is a strong and independent woman.
The bridge was built with strong materials.
He has a strong belief in the importance of education.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: mạnh mẽ; kiên quyết; gắt gao; có sức thuyết phục.
eng_explanation: adverb: in a strong or forceful manner; with great emphasis or conviction.
example: She strongly opposed the new policy.
He feels strongly about animal rights.
The evidence strongly suggests his guilt.

vn_meaning: tính từ: liên quan đến cấu trúc; có cấu trúc.
eng_explanation: adjective: relating to the arrangement of parts or elements; concerning construction.
example: The building has a unique structural design.
Structural engineers inspected the bridge.
The structural integrity of the dam was compromised.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cấu trúc; bộ máy; tổ chức; danh từ: (kiến trúc) kết cấu; khung.
eng_explanation: noun: the way parts are arranged; a framework; an organized system.
example: The novel has a complex structure.
The company's organizational structure is hierarchical.
The building's structure is made of steel and concrete.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đấu tranh; chật vật; khó khăn; động từ: đấu tranh; vật lộn; cố gắng.
eng_explanation: noun: a forceful effort to overcome difficulty. verb: to make great efforts to overcome an obstacle.
example: They struggled to survive during the famine.
He is struggling with a difficult decision.
The country has struggled for independence for many years.

vn_meaning: danh từ: học sinh, sinh viên.
eng_explanation: noun: a person who is studying at a school or university.
example: She is a student at Harvard University.
The students are working on a group project.
He became a student to pursue his passion for science.

vn_meaning: danh từ: xưởng phim; phòng thu âm; phòng làm việc (của họa sĩ, kiến trúc sư...).
eng_explanation: noun: a room or building used for artistic or professional work; a film or recording studio.
example: The film was shot in a Hollywood studio.
The band recorded their new album in a professional studio.
She has a small studio apartment in the city.

vn_meaning: danh từ: học tập; nghiên cứu; môn học; động từ: học; nghiên cứu; xem xét.
eng_explanation: noun: the pursuit of knowledge; a field of academic study. verb: to devote time and attention to learning.
example: She is studying medicine at university.
He is conducting a study on climate change.
I need to study for my upcoming exam.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đồ vật; thứ; vật dụng; (thông tục) chuyện gì đó.
eng_explanation: noun: things; materials; items; informal: something.
example: I need to buy some stuff for the party.
He threw all his old stuff away.
That's none of your stuff!

vn_meaning: tính từ: tiếp theo, sau đó (thời gian, thứ tự); xảy ra sau (sự kiện)
eng_explanation: adj. Coming after something else in time or order. (following)
example: The subsequent chapters explore the topic in more detail.
We will discuss the subsequent events at the meeting.
Subsequent to the agreement, prices rose sharply.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: sau đó, tiếp theo (thời gian, thứ tự); do đó
eng_explanation: adv. Happening after something else; consequently. (afterward)
example: He resigned, and subsequently found a new job.
The company invested heavily in research and subsequently saw increased profits.
She failed the exam and subsequently decided to study harder.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khoản trợ cấp (từ chính phủ cho doanh nghiệp, người dân); sự hỗ trợ tài chính
eng_explanation: n. A sum of money granted by the government to support an industry or group. (financial aid)
example: Farmers receive a subsidy for growing certain crops.
The government provides subsidies to encourage renewable energy.
The airline relies heavily on government subsidies.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chất (vật chất nói chung); nội dung, bản chất (của vấn đề); chất dinh dưỡng
eng_explanation: n. The material of which something consists. (matter); importance. (content)
example: The police found an unknown substance at the crime scene.
The report lacks substance and provides no real evidence.
A balanced diet provides the necessary substances for good health.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đáng kể, lớn (về số lượng, mức độ); thực chất, cơ bản
eng_explanation: adj. Of considerable importance, size, or worth. (significant)
example: The company made a substantial profit this year.
There is substantial evidence to support the theory.
He has a substantial collection of rare books.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: đáng kể, lớn (về mức độ); về cơ bản
eng_explanation: adv. To a considerable extent; significantly. (considerably)
example: The price of oil has increased substantially in recent months.
The new regulations will substantially change the way the industry operates.
The project was substantially completed on time.

vn_meaning: động từ: thay thế (ai, cái gì); dùng thay thế; danh từ: người/vật thay thế
eng_explanation: v. To replace one thing or person with another. (replace); n. A replacement. (alternative)
example: Can you substitute milk for cream in this recipe?
She found a substitute teacher for her class.
He is a capable substitute for the injured player.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự thay thế; việc dùng vật/người thay thế
eng_explanation: n. The action or process of replacing something with something else. (replacement)
example: The substitution of sugar with artificial sweeteners is common in diet products.
The manager made a tactical substitution in the second half.
The substitution of one material for another can affect the product's quality.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tinh tế, khéo léo; nhẹ nhàng, kín đáo; khó nhận ra, mơ hồ
eng_explanation: adj. So delicate or precise as to be difficult to analyze or describe. (delicate)
example: There's a subtle difference between the two shades of blue.
She gave a subtle hint that she was unhappy.
He appreciated the subtle humor in the film.

vn_meaning: danh từ: vùng ngoại ô (thành phố); khu dân cư ở ngoại ô
eng_explanation: n. An area on the edge of a city or town. (outskirts)
example: Many people choose to live in the suburbs for a quieter lifestyle.
The suburbs are often more affordable than the city center.
She commutes to the city from a suburb twenty miles away.

vn_meaning: Một khu vực đô thị, thường có nhiều nhà ở và các tiện ích công cộng.
eng_explanation: A residential area characterized by numerous houses and public amenities.
example: The new housing development is planned for the suburban area.
She moved to the suburban neighborhood to escape the city's hustle and bustle.

vn_meaning: Đạt được thành công, thành quả.
eng_explanation: To achieve success, attain a positive outcome.
example: The company’s new product was a resounding success.
He hoped to succeed in his career as a doctor.

vn_meaning: Thành công, thành quả, sự đạt được mục tiêu.
eng_explanation: Success is the achievement of goals and objectives.
example: The team’s hard work led to a remarkable success.
She felt a great sense of success after completing the project.

vn_meaning: Đã thành công, đạt được kết quả thành công.
eng_explanation: Having achieved success.
example: The project was deemed successful by the stakeholders.
He was a successful businessman throughout his career.

vn_meaning: Thành công, đạt được kết quả thành công.
eng_explanation: Successfully completing an action or task.
example: The team completed the project successfully.
She managed to successfully navigate the difficult situation.

vn_meaning: Di sản, dòng dõi, sự kế thừa.
eng_explanation: The process of passing on a legacy or leadership.
example: The monarchy is undergoing a succession of changes.
The company is planning a succession plan for its leadership.

vn_meaning: Theo sau, tiếp theo, liên tiếp.
eng_explanation: Following one after another.
example: The two events were successive to each other.
The company's growth was successive to its initial investment.

vn_meaning: Người kế thừa, người tiếp theo.
eng_explanation: A person who takes over the position of someone else.
example: The new CEO is the successor to the previous leader.
She is a talented successor to her father.

vn_meaning: Như vậy, như vậy, như vậy.
eng_explanation: In this way, like that, in such a way.
example: The weather is such that we need to bring an umbrella.
He said such things as he felt.

vn_meaning: Hít sâu, hút, hút mạnh.
eng_explanation: To inhale deeply, to suck.
example: Don't suck on the gum!
The river sucks the water from the land.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự đột ngột; tính từ: đột ngột, bất ngờ
eng_explanation: Adjective: occurring or done quickly and unexpectedly. Noun: a sudden event or change.
example: There was a sudden downpour of rain.
He experienced a sudden pain in his chest.
A sudden change in weather is always surprising.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: đột ngột, bỗng nhiên
eng_explanation: Adverb: all at once; unexpectedly. It describes how something happens.
example: Suddenly, the lights went out.
She suddenly realized she had forgotten her keys.
He suddenly stopped running and looked around.

vn_meaning: danh từ: vụ kiện; động từ: khởi kiện
eng_explanation: Verb: to initiate a lawsuit against someone. Noun: a legal action brought before a court.
example: He decided to sue the company for negligence.
She is considering suing for breach of contract.
The lawsuit against the corporation is ongoing.

vn_meaning: động từ: chịu đựng, đau khổ; danh từ: đau khổ
eng_explanation: Verb: to experience pain, distress, or loss. Noun: great pain or suffering.
example: He suffers from chronic back pain.
The refugees suffer greatly from the war.
She is suffering through a difficult time.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đau khổ, khổ sở; tính từ: đau khổ
eng_explanation: Noun: the state of experiencing pain or distress. Adjective: characterized by pain or distress.
example: The patient is in constant suffering.
He endured years of suffering with courage.
The suffering of the victims moved everyone.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đủ, đáp ứng được; trạng từ: đủ, đáp ứng
eng_explanation: Adjective: enough; adequate. Adverb: in a sufficient amount.
example: There is sufficient food for everyone.
He is sufficient to complete the task.
The evidence was not sufficient to convict him.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: đủ, đáp ứng
eng_explanation: Adverb: in a sufficient amount or degree.
example: He is sufficiently strong to lift the box.
The medicine was taken sufficiently to relieve the pain.
The water level is sufficiently high to fill the pool.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đường; tính từ: đường (đồ ăn)
eng_explanation: Noun: a sweet crystalline substance. Adjective: relating to or containing sugar.
example: She added sugar to her coffee.
The cake is made with sugar and flour.
He has a sweet tooth and loves sugar.

vn_meaning: động từ: gợi ý, đề xuất; tính từ: gợi ý
eng_explanation: Verb: to indicate or imply something. Adjective: suggesting something.
example: He suggested going to the movies.
The evidence suggests his guilt.
The design suggests a modern aesthetic.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đề nghị, gợi ý
eng_explanation: Noun: an idea or proposal made as a possible course of action.
example: She made a suggestion for a new project.
He dismissed her suggestion without consideration.
His suggestion was well-received by the team.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tự sát (hành động tự lấy đi mạng sống); động từ: tự sát.
eng_explanation: noun/verb: The act of intentionally ending one's own life.
example: He tragically ended his life by suicide.
The number of suicide cases has increased recently.
She struggled with depression and suicidal thoughts.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bộ (quần áo); sự phù hợp; động từ: phù hợp; kiện (tòa án).
eng_explanation: noun: A set of clothes worn together; a legal case. verb: To be appropriate or compatible.
example: He bought a new suit for the interview.
Does this color suit you?
The company is facing a lawsuit.

vn_meaning: tính từ: phù hợp, thích hợp, ưng ý.
eng_explanation: adjective: Appropriate or fitting for a particular purpose or situation.
example: This job is not suitable for someone without experience.
Is this hotel suitable for families with children?
He needs to find a suitable partner.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bộ (phòng); tập hợp các thứ liên quan.
eng_explanation: noun: A set of rooms in a hotel; a collection of related items.
example: We booked a luxurious suite with a balcony.
The composer wrote a suite of piano pieces.
The software suite includes word processing and spreadsheet programs.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tổng số; số tiền; động từ: tính tổng.
eng_explanation: noun: The total or whole amount. verb: To calculate the total.
example: The sum of 2 and 3 is 5.
I don't have enough money to cover the sum.
Let's sum up the main points of the discussion.

vn_meaning: động từ: tóm tắt, nêu ngắn gọn.
eng_explanation: verb: To give a brief statement of the main points.
example: Could you summarize the article for me?
She asked him to summarize the meeting.
Please summarize your findings in a short report.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bản tóm tắt, nội dung chính.
eng_explanation: noun: A brief statement of the main points.
example: Here's a summary of the key events.
The summary provides a good overview of the book.
Please read the summary before watching the film.

vn_meaning: danh từ: mùa hè.
eng_explanation: noun: The warmest season of the year.
example: We spent the summer vacation at the beach.
Summer is my favorite time of year.
The summer heat can be intense.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đỉnh núi; cuộc gặp thượng đỉnh.
eng_explanation: noun: The highest point of a mountain; a meeting of leaders.
example: The climbers reached the summit of Mount Everest.
The summit meeting will address climate change.
The summit was a success.

vn_meaning: danh từ: mặt trời.
eng_explanation: noun: The star that provides light and warmth to Earth.
example: The sun is shining brightly today.
We need sunscreen to protect ourselves from the sun.
The sun sets over the ocean.

vn_meaning: động từ: ủng hộ, đỡ, giúp đỡ (một người, một ý kiến, một hoạt động); danh từ: sự ủng hộ, sự giúp đỡ, phương tiện hỗ trợ; sự chịu đựng (của cấu trúc)
eng_explanation: v: to give assistance; n: help, assistance (PoS: v, n).
example: The evidence supports his claim.
She needs our support during this difficult time.
The bridge supports a lot of traffic.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người ủng hộ, người hâm mộ; người đỡ đở, người bảo trợ
eng_explanation: n: a person who supports a person, group, or cause (PoS: n).
example: He is a strong supporter of the local team.
The charity relies on the support of its donors.
She has many supporters in the community.

vn_meaning: tính từ: ủng hộ, giúp đỡ; khích lệ, động viên; (cấu trúc) có khả năng chịu lực
eng_explanation: adj: providing encouragement or emotional help; able to hold weight (PoS: adj).
example: She is a very supportive friend.
The teacher was supportive of his students' efforts.
A supportive family is crucial for a child's development.

vn_meaning: động từ: cho rằng, đoán rằng; giả sử, cho phép
eng_explanation: v: to assume something is the case; to allow or permit (PoS: v).
example: I suppose it will rain tomorrow.
Suppose we take a different route.
I suppose you've already heard the news.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: theo như lời đồn, được cho là
eng_explanation: adv: allegedly; according to what is generally believed (PoS: adv).
example: He is supposedly a very good doctor.
The restaurant is supposedly very expensive.
Supposedly, the treasure is hidden on the island.

vn_meaning: động từ: đàn áp, kìm nén; ngăn chặn, tiêu diệt (cảm xúc, thông tin)
eng_explanation: v: to forcibly put an end to; to restrain or inhibit (PoS: v).
example: The government suppressed the rebellion.
She tried to suppress her anger.
The report was suppressed to avoid public panic.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tối cao, tuyệt đối; thượng đẳng, xuất sắc
eng_explanation: adj: highest in rank or authority; excellent (PoS: adj).
example: The Supreme Court is the highest court in the land.
She has a supreme talent for music.
He showed supreme confidence.

vn_meaning: tính từ: chắc chắn, tin chắc; chắn chắn (về kết quả); an toàn, không nguy hiểm
eng_explanation: adj: certain; confident; safe (PoS: adj).
example: I'm sure I locked the door.
Are you sure you want to go?
It's a sure way to fail.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: chắc chắn rồi, hẳn là
eng_explanation: adv: certainly; undoubtedly (PoS: adv).
example: Surely you're not serious!
She will pass the exam, surely.
Surely this is a mistake.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bề mặt; mặt nước; vẻ ngoài; sự xuất hiện; động từ: nổi lên, xuất hiện
eng_explanation: n: the outer layer; the top of water; v: to come to the surface (PoS: n, v).
example: The surface of the table is smooth.
The submarine surfaced after hours underwater.
New problems continue to surface.

vn_meaning: sóng lớn
eng_explanation: A surge is a sudden and rapid increase in something, often quantity or intensity.
example: The price of oil surged after the announcement.
The crowd surged with excitement during the concert.
The surge in popularity is a positive sign.

vn_meaning: bác sĩ phẫu thuật
eng_explanation: A surgeon is a medical professional who performs operations to treat illnesses and injuries.
example: The surgeon performed a complex operation on the patient.
The surgeon's expertise is highly regarded.
The surgeon was injured during the accident.

vn_meaning: phẫu thuật
eng_explanation: Surgery is a medical procedure involving the removal or repair of diseased or damaged tissues.
example: The surgeon performed a life-saving surgery.
The patient underwent a complex surgical procedure.
The surgery was successful and the patient recovered well.

vn_meaning: Relating to surgery; involving surgical procedures.
eng_explanation: This term refers to any operation performed using surgical instruments.
example: The surgical team worked diligently to complete the procedure.
The patient required a complex surgical intervention.
The surgeon's precision is essential for successful surgery.

vn_meaning: More than enough; an excess; an abundance.
eng_explanation: A surplus indicates a situation where there is more of something than is needed.
example: We have a surplus of food at the local market.
The company experienced a surplus of profits.
The surplus of resources could be used for development.

vn_meaning: bất ngờ
eng_explanation: A surprise is an unexpected event or occurrence.
example: I was surprised by the unexpected gift.
The news of the surprise arrival shocked everyone.
She was surprised by his unexpected kindness.

vn_meaning: bất ngờ
eng_explanation: Surprised is a feeling of shock or amazement.
example: I was surprised by his reaction.
She looked surprised by the news.
He was surprised by the unexpected event.

vn_meaning: Causing astonishment or surprise.
eng_explanation: Something surprising is unexpected and creates a feeling of amazement.
example: The magician's trick was surprising.
The news of the surprise event was shocking.
The unexpected outcome was surprising.

vn_meaning: bao quanh
eng_explanation: Surround means to enclose or contain something.
example: The children were surrounded by toys.
The building was surrounded by a protective fence.
The animals were surrounded by a thick forest.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khu vực xung quanh; tính từ: lân cận
eng_explanation: Adjective: relating to or situated around something; noun: the area around something.
example: The hotel is located in a quiet surrounding.
The surrounding area is known for its beautiful scenery.
He felt surrounded by enemies.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hệ thống giám sát; danh từ: việc giám sát
eng_explanation: Noun: the observation and monitoring of activities, often by recording devices.
example: The police increased surveillance after the robbery.
Surveillance cameras are installed throughout the building.
He was under surveillance for suspected espionage.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khảo sát; danh từ: bản đồ; động từ: khảo sát
eng_explanation: Noun: an investigation or study of a subject or area; Verb: to examine or assess something.
example: We conducted a survey to understand customer preferences.
The survey revealed a decline in sales.
The team will survey the land before building.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự tồn tại; danh từ: khả năng sống sót
eng_explanation: Noun: the state of being alive; the ability to stay alive.
example: The survival of the species depends on conservation efforts.
His survival was remarkable considering the circumstances.
The book explores themes of human survival.

vn_meaning: động từ: sống sót; động từ: tồn tại
eng_explanation: Verb: to remain alive; to continue to exist despite difficulties.
example: Despite the injury, he managed to survive.
The company is struggling to survive the economic downturn.
Plants can survive in harsh environments.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người sống sót
eng_explanation: Noun: a person who survives a dangerous event or situation.
example: The survivors of the shipwreck were rescued by the coast guard.
She was a survivor of a terrible fire.
Many survivors shared their stories of resilience.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nghi phạm; danh từ: nghi ngờ
eng_explanation: Noun: a person believed to have committed a crime; Verb: to believe something to be true.
example: The police are questioning a suspect in the case.
I suspect it will rain later today.
He was a suspect in the robbery investigation.

vn_meaning: động từ: đình chỉ; động từ: treo
eng_explanation: Verb: to temporarily stop an activity or process; to hang something from above.
example: The school suspended him for disciplinary reasons.
They suspended the game due to bad weather.
She hung her coat on the hook to suspend it.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự đình chỉ; danh từ: dây treo
eng_explanation: Noun: the act of suspending something; a device for suspending something.
example: The suspension of the project was announced yesterday.
The car's suspension is worn out.
He used a rope for suspension.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nghi ngờ; danh từ: sự cảnh giác
eng_explanation: Noun: a feeling that someone may be guilty of something; a state of being watchful and alert.
example: He had a suspicion that something was wrong.
The police launched an investigation based on suspicion.
A feeling of suspicion lingered in the air.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đáng ngờ (về hành vi, thái độ); danh từ: sự nghi ngờ (về điều gì đó).
eng_explanation: adjective: causing doubt or distrust; suggesting something may be wrong.
example: He looked suspicious when I asked about his whereabouts.
There's a suspicious package left unattended near the entrance.
Her suspicious silence made me wonder what she was hiding.

vn_meaning: động từ: duy trì, hỗ trợ (sự sống, hoạt động); chịu đựng (thiệt hại, tổn thất).
eng_explanation: verb: to maintain or support; to endure or bear (something difficult).
example: The charity aims to sustain vulnerable families.
The bridge sustained heavy damage during the storm.
He can sustain a conversation on almost any topic.

vn_meaning: tính từ: bền vững (về môi trường, kinh tế).
eng_explanation: adjective: able to be maintained at a certain rate or level; environmentally friendly.
example: Sustainable farming practices protect the soil.
The company is committed to sustainable development.
We need to find sustainable solutions to climate change.

vn_meaning: động từ: nuốt; danh từ: chim én.
eng_explanation: verb: to move (something) down the throat; noun: a migratory bird with a forked tail.
example: He tried to swallow the large pill.
The swallows were building nests under the eaves.
She watched a swallow dart across the sky.

vn_meaning: động từ: thề; chửi thề.
eng_explanation: verb: to solemnly declare; to use offensive language.
example: He swore he was innocent.
She swore under her breath when she dropped her phone.
I swear I'll never do that again.

vn_meaning: danh từ: áo len.
eng_explanation: noun: a knitted garment worn on the upper body, typically for warmth.
example: She wore a cozy sweater to keep warm.
He bought a new sweater for the winter.
The sweater is made of soft wool.

vn_meaning: động từ: quét; danh từ: lượt quét; sự quét.
eng_explanation: verb: to clean by pushing a brush across a surface; noun: a wide movement or glance.
example: She swept the floor with a broom.
There was a sweep of the camera across the crowd.
The company launched a sweep of the area for survivors.

vn_meaning: tính từ: ngọt; dễ thương; danh từ: đồ ngọt.
eng_explanation: adjective: having a sugary taste; pleasant or agreeable; noun: a confection containing sugar.
example: The cake was very sweet.
She has a sweet smile.
He bought her a box of sweets.

vn_meaning: động từ: bơi.
eng_explanation: verb: to move through water by using your limbs.
example: I love to swim in the ocean.
The children are learning to swim.
He can swim very well.

vn_meaning: danh từ: môn bơi; hành động bơi.
eng_explanation: noun: the sport of swimming; the act of moving through water.
example: Swimming is a great form of exercise.
She enjoys swimming laps in the pool.
The swimming competition was exciting to watch.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hệ thống (một tập hợp các bộ phận phối hợp với nhau); phương pháp, cách thức (có tổ chức).
eng_explanation: n. A set of interacting parts forming a complex whole; a method or arrangement (PoS: n).
example: The solar system consists of the sun and the planets.
The company has a new computer system.
She developed a system for organizing her files.

vn_meaning: tính từ: có hệ thống, có phương pháp; ngăn nắp, tỉ mỉ.
eng_explanation: adj. Done or acting according to a fixed plan or system; methodical (PoS: adj).
example: A systematic approach to problem-solving is essential.
The research involved a systematic review of the literature.
He made a systematic effort to improve his grades.

vn_meaning: danh từ: áo phông (áo ngắn tay, không cổ, thường làm bằng cotton).
eng_explanation: n. A casual shirt with short sleeves and no collar (PoS: n).
example: He was wearing a blue T-shirt and jeans.
I bought a new T-shirt with a funny slogan.
T-shirts are a popular souvenir.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bàn; bảng (danh sách, số liệu); sự sắp xếp (trong văn bản).; động từ: trình bày dưới dạng bảng.
eng_explanation: n. A piece of furniture with a flat top; an arrangement of data in rows/columns (PoS: n, v).
example: We ate dinner at the table.
The table shows the sales figures for the last quarter.
Please table the motion for discussion next week.

vn_meaning: danh từ: máy tính bảng; viên nén (thuốc).
eng_explanation: n. A portable computer with a touchscreen; a small, flat piece of medicine (PoS: n).
example: She uses a tablet to read e-books.
He takes a tablet for his headache.
The doctor prescribed a new tablet to lower his blood pressure.

vn_meaning: động từ: giải quyết (vấn đề); vật lộn, đấu tranh; chặn (trong thể thao).; danh từ: sự giải quyết, cách giải quyết.
eng_explanation: v. To deal with a problem; to physically attack (in sports); n. an attempt to stop someone (PoS: v, n).
example: We need to tackle the issue of climate change.
The defender tried to tackle the striker.
He made a strong tackle to win the ball.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chiến thuật (trong quân sự, thể thao, kinh doanh).
eng_explanation: n. A plan or method used to achieve a goal, especially in war or sports (PoS: n).
example: The team employed a new tactic to win the game.
His business tactics were very aggressive.
The general developed a clever tactic to outmaneuver the enemy.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thuộc về chiến thuật; mang tính chiến thuật.
eng_explanation: adj. Relating to tactics; designed for achieving a specific short-term goal (PoS: adj).
example: The company made a tactical decision to lower its prices.
He is a tactical genius on the chess board.
A tactical retreat was necessary to regroup the troops.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thẻ, nhãn; trò chơi đuổi bắt.; động từ: gắn thẻ, dán nhãn; đánh dấu (trong mạng xã hội).
eng_explanation: n. A label attached to something; a game of chase; v. to attach a label (PoS: n, v).
example: The price tag was missing from the shirt.
The children were playing tag in the park.
She tagged me in a photo on Facebook.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đuôi (của động vật); phần cuối (của máy bay, đoàn tàu); sự theo dõi bí mật.; động từ: theo dõi bí mật.
eng_explanation: n. The hindmost part of an animal; the end of something; v. to follow secretly (PoS: n, v).
example: The dog wagged its tail.
The tail of the airplane was damaged in the storm.
Detectives were tailing the suspect.

vn_meaning: lấy
eng_explanation: To receive or obtain something, often with a request or obligation.
example: I need to take the book.
She took the umbrella.
Please take the trash out.

vn_meaning: truyện kể
eng_explanation: A story, often with a moral or lesson.
example: The old tale of Cinderella is famous.
I enjoyed reading the captivating tale.
Let's share a tale of our adventures.

vn_meaning: tài năng
eng_explanation: A natural aptitude or skill that someone possesses.
example: He has a great talent for music.
She possesses a remarkable talent for art.
