Everyone has a talent to contribute.

vn_meaning: có tài
eng_explanation: Having a natural skill or ability, often implying exceptional ability.
example: She is a talented artist.
The team is composed of talented players.
He's a talented musician.

vn_meaning: nói chuyện
eng_explanation: To express oneself verbally, usually to communicate.
example: Let's talk about the project.
He talked to his friend about his problems.
I need to talk to my boss.

vn_meaning: cao
eng_explanation: Having a high height.
example: The building is very tall.
She is a tall woman.
The trees are tall in the forest.

vn_meaning: máy tăng
eng_explanation: A container for storing fuel, often used in vehicles.
example: The tank holds the gasoline.
The tank is leaking.
He filled the tank with fuel.

vn_meaning: vòi
eng_explanation: A device for dispensing water, typically a container with a spout.
example: I need a new tap for the kitchen.
The tap is dripping.
She used a tap to fill the bucket.

vn_meaning: băng dính
eng_explanation: A flexible material used for covering or fastening, often used in recording and printing.
example: I need some tape to fix the broken window.
He used tape to bind the documents.
The tape was stuck to the wall.

vn_meaning: mục tiêu
eng_explanation: A specific point or goal that is pursued.
example: The company set a target to increase sales by 10%.
He aimed for the target score.
The sniper aimed for the target.

vn_meaning: danh từ: công việc; nhiệm vụ; bài tập (học tập); (công việc) sắp xếp; (thường là công việc) được giao (đến ai đó)
eng_explanation: noun: a piece of work or duty; a specific assignment to be done.
example: I have a lot of tasks to complete today.
The teacher assigned a challenging task to the students.
He was given the task of organizing the event.

vn_meaning: danh từ: vị; hương vị; (sở thích) gu; (khả năng) cảm nhận; (sự) thích nghi
eng_explanation: noun: the sensation of flavor; a preference or liking.
example: The soup has a rich, savory taste.
I have a particular taste for chocolate.
He quickly gained a taste for the local cuisine.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thuế; phí; (thuế) đánh vào tài sản; (thuế) thu để chi trả cho các dịch vụ công
eng_explanation: noun: a compulsory payment to the government; a levy on income or property.
example: The government increased the tax rate.
He paid his annual tax on time.
Property taxes are a significant expense for homeowners.

vn_meaning: danh từ: xe taxi; (nghề) lái xe taxi
eng_explanation: noun: a motor vehicle for hire; a person who drives a taxi.
example: We hailed a taxi to the airport.
The taxi driver was very friendly.
He earns a good living driving a taxi.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người nộp thuế; công dân trả thuế
eng_explanation: noun: a person who pays taxes; a citizen who contributes to government revenue.
example: Every taxpayer has a responsibility to pay their dues.
The government needs to ensure fair taxation for all taxpayers.
As a taxpayer, I want to see my money used wisely.

vn_meaning: danh từ: trà; (thói quen) uống trà; (cà phê) trà
eng_explanation: noun: a beverage made from the processed leaves of the tea plant; the habit of drinking tea.
example: I enjoy a cup of tea in the afternoon.
She always has tea with her biscuits.
The tea ceremony is an important part of Japanese culture.

vn_meaning: động từ: giảng dạy; hướng dẫn; (dạy) truyền đạt kiến thức; (dạy) làm cho ai đó trở nên giỏi hơn
eng_explanation: verb: to impart knowledge or skills; to instruct someone.
example: The teacher teaches history to high school students.
I want to teach my children the importance of kindness.
He taught himself to play the guitar.

vn_meaning: danh từ: giáo viên; người dạy; (nghề) nghề giáo viên
eng_explanation: noun: a person who teaches; an instructor.
example: She is a dedicated teacher.
The teacher praised the student's efforts.
He chose to become a teacher because he loves children.

vn_meaning: danh từ: giảng dạy; (nghề) nghề dạy; (quá trình) dạy dỗ; (khả năng) khả năng dạy
eng_explanation: noun: the act of teaching; the profession of teaching.
example: Teaching is a rewarding profession.
The teaching methods were innovative.
She has a natural talent for teaching.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đội; nhóm; (nhóm) đồng đội; (cùng) làm việc nhóm
eng_explanation: noun: a group of people working together; a sports team.
example: The team won the championship.
We need to work as a team to achieve our goals.
She is a valuable member of the team.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nước mắt (cảm xúc); sự rách (vật dụng); động từ: làm rách; khóc.
eng_explanation: tear (n/v): a drop of liquid from the eye due to emotion; to rip or pull apart.
example: She wiped away a tear from her eye.
The paper tore easily.
He was tearing the letter into pieces.

vn_meaning: tính từ: kỹ thuật; thuộc về kỹ thuật.
eng_explanation: technical (adj): relating to practical or scientific matters; of a specialized nature.
example: He has a technical background.
The report contains technical jargon.
This is a technical issue that requires expert help.

vn_meaning: danh từ: kỹ thuật; phương pháp; thủ thuật.
eng_explanation: technique (n): a way of doing something using skill; a specialized procedure.
example: She used a new painting technique.
The chef demonstrated a cooking technique.
Good communication techniques are essential.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thuộc về công nghệ; liên quan đến công nghệ.
eng_explanation: technological (adj): relating to technology or the application of scientific knowledge.
example: Technological advancements are changing our lives.
The company invested in technological innovation.
This is a technological solution to an old problem.

vn_meaning: danh từ: công nghệ; kỹ thuật.
eng_explanation: technology (n): the application of scientific knowledge for practical purposes; machinery.
example: Technology has transformed the way we communicate.
The company specializes in medical technology.
New technology is constantly being developed.

vn_meaning: tính từ: vị thành niên; thuộc về tuổi thiếu niên.
eng_explanation: teenage (adj): relating to the period between 13 and 19 years old.
example: She's a teenage girl.
Teenage rebellion is a common phase.
The store caters to teenage fashion.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thiếu niên; người ở độ tuổi thiếu niên.
eng_explanation: teenager (n): a person between the ages of 13 and 19.
example: He's a typical teenager.
Teenagers often enjoy spending time with friends.
The teenager was studying for his exams.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tuổi thiếu niên (số nhiều).
eng_explanation: teens (n): the period between 13 and 19 years old (plural).
example: Many teens are interested in social media.
The teens enjoyed the concert.
The study focused on the behavior of teens.

vn_meaning: danh từ: điện thoại; động từ: gọi điện thoại.
eng_explanation: telephone (n/v): a device for talking to someone far away; to communicate by phone.
example: She answered the telephone.
Please telephone me later.
I need to buy a new telephone.

vn_meaning: danh từ: truyền hình; ti vi.
eng_explanation: television (n): a system of broadcasting images and sound; a TV set.
example: He enjoys watching television in the evening.
The news was broadcast on television.
We bought a new television for the living room.

vn_meaning: tính từ: mềm mại, dịu dàng (cảm xúc, xúc giác); danh từ: lời mời thầu, sự dịu dàng; động từ: đưa ra lời mời thầu, chăm sóc dịu dàng.
eng_explanation: adj. Gentle, delicate; n. Offer (for something); v. To offer or care for gently. (PoS: adj, n, v)
example: She has a tender heart.
The company submitted a tender for the contract.
He tenderly cared for his sick mother.

vn_meaning: danh từ: quần vợt.
eng_explanation: n. A ball game played with rackets on a divided court. (PoS: n)
example: He enjoys playing tennis on the weekends.
She is a professional tennis player.
The tennis tournament was very exciting.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự căng thẳng, áp lực; sự kéo căng (vật lý).
eng_explanation: n. Mental or emotional strain; the state of being stretched tight. (PoS: n)
example: There was a lot of tension in the room.
The rope was under tension.
He could feel the tension building up.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lều.
eng_explanation: n. A portable shelter made of fabric stretched over a frame. (PoS: n)
example: We slept in a tent during our camping trip.
The circus had a large tent.
They pitched their tent near the river.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thời hạn giữ chức, quyền lợi được hưởng khi giữ chức lâu năm (đặc biệt trong giáo dục).
eng_explanation: n. The period for which someone holds a position; job security. (PoS: n)
example: He has tenure at the university.
The professor is seeking tenure.
Tenure provides job security for academics.

vn_meaning: danh từ: kỳ hạn, học kỳ, thuật ngữ; động từ: gọi tên, định nghĩa.
eng_explanation: n. A fixed period; a word or phrase; v. To name or define. (PoS: n, v)
example: The loan has a term of five years.
What is the term for this medical condition?
She termed his behavior unacceptable.

vn_meaning: tính từ: cuối cùng, kết thúc; danh từ: nhà ga, trạm xe.
eng_explanation: adj. Relating to the end; n. A building where transport departs/arrives. (PoS: adj, n)
example: The airport terminal was very busy.
He was diagnosed with a terminal illness.
The bus terminal is located downtown.

vn_meaning: động từ: chấm dứt, kết thúc.
eng_explanation: v. To bring to an end; to stop. (PoS: v)
example: The company decided to terminate his contract.
The meeting will terminate at 5 pm.
They terminated the agreement.

vn_meaning: danh từ: điều khoản, điều kiện.
eng_explanation: n. Conditions of an agreement; words used for a particular purpose. (PoS: n)
example: Please read the terms and conditions carefully.
They negotiated the terms of the deal.
He accepted the offer on her terms.

vn_meaning: danh từ: địa hình.
eng_explanation: n. The surface features of land. (PoS: n)
example: The terrain was very rugged and mountainous.
The soldiers navigated the difficult terrain.
The terrain is ideal for hiking.

vn_meaning: rất xấu, đáng sợ; rất tệ
eng_explanation: It describes something extremely bad or unpleasant.
example: The weather was terrible; we had to stay inside.
That was a terrible experience; I don't want to go back.

vn_meaning: rất, rất nhiều; một cách rất khó khăn
eng_explanation: It emphasizes the degree of something, often with a negative connotation.
example: He spoke terribly; his pronunciation was unclear.
She wrote terribly; the grammar was flawed.

vn_meaning: rất tuyệt vời, rất tốt; rất đáng khen
eng_explanation: It conveys a high level of approval or admiration.
example: That's a terrific movie; I loved it!
He's a terrific teacher; he's very knowledgeable.

vn_meaning: đánh terror, khiến sợ hãi
eng_explanation: It describes something that causes extreme fear or anxiety.
example: The monster terrified the children.
The loud noise terrified the animals.

vn_meaning: khu lãnh thổ, vùng đất
eng_explanation: Refers to the land or area controlled by a person or group.
example: The company controls a vast territory in Africa.
The conflict over the territory is a major issue.

vn_meaning: sợ hãi, sợ hãi, sợ hãi
eng_explanation: It refers to the feeling of fear or panic caused by a threat.
example: The terrorist launched a bomb.
He experienced intense terror during the attack.

vn_meaning: lực lượng khủng bố, chủ nghĩa khủng bố
eng_explanation: It describes the use of violence and intimidation for political aims.
example: The government is fighting against terrorism.
Terrorists are responsible for numerous attacks.

vn_meaning: người thực hiện hành động khủng bố, kẻ khủng bố
eng_explanation: It refers to a person who engages in acts of violence for political reasons.
example: The terrorist group is suspected of planning attacks.
The government is taking steps to combat the terrorist threat.

vn_meaning: đánh giá, kiểm tra
eng_explanation: It refers to a process of evaluating or examining something.
example: The exam was a difficult test.
He passed the test with flying colors.

vn_meaning: nhân chứng, cung cấp lời khai
eng_explanation: It means to give evidence or make a statement.
example: The witness testified before the court.
He emphatically tested his innocence.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lời khai (của người chứng nhân); chứng cứ (trong tòa án); sự khẳng định (về điều gì đó).
eng_explanation: Noun: A statement given under oath; evidence presented in court.
example: The witness gave his testimony about the accident.
Her testimony proved crucial to the case.
The judge relied on the testimony of several experts.

vn_meaning: danh từ: quá trình kiểm tra; thí nghiệm; thử nghiệm; tính từ: đang được kiểm tra.
eng_explanation: Verb (present participle): The process of evaluating something; adjective: currently being tested.
example: We are conducting testing to ensure the product's safety.
The engineers are testing the new engine design.
This is a testing phase before the final release.

vn_meaning: danh từ: văn bản; bài viết; đoạn văn; chữ viết; tính từ: liên quan đến văn bản.
eng_explanation: Noun: Written words; adjective: relating to written material.
example: I read a fascinating text about ancient history.
The text message arrived just as I was about to leave.
He is a specialist in literary text analysis.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sách giáo khoa; sách tham khảo.
eng_explanation: Noun: A book used for teaching a subject in schools.
example: The student relied on his textbook for help with the assignment.
She used a textbook to prepare for the exam.
A comprehensive textbook covers all the necessary topics.

vn_meaning: danh từ: kết cấu; bề mặt; chất liệu; tính từ: có kết cấu đặc biệt.
eng_explanation: Noun: The feel or appearance of a surface; adjective: having a distinctive texture.
example: The fabric has a soft texture.
The artist paid close attention to the texture of the painting.
The rough texture of the stone was fascinating.

vn_meaning: gLiên từ: hơn; so sánh.
eng_explanation: Conjunction: Used to make comparisons (e.g., 'He is taller than me').
example: He is older than his brother.
This car is faster than that one.
She earns more than he does.

vn_meaning: động từ: cảm ơn; bày tỏ lòng biết ơn; tính từ: cảm ơn.
eng_explanation: Verb: To express gratitude; adjective: expressing gratitude.
example: I want to thank you for your help.
She thanked him for the gift.
He is a very thankful person.

vn_meaning: tính từ: may mắn; vui mừng; cảm ơn.
eng_explanation: Adverb: Fortuitously; expressing gratitude.
example: Thankfully, the rain stopped.
I thankfully received a promotion.
Thankfully, we found a solution to the problem.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lời cảm ơn; sự cảm ơn; tính từ: cảm ơn.
eng_explanation: Noun: An expression of gratitude; adjective: expressing gratitude.
example: Thanks for your help!
I owe you thanks for everything.
He expressed his thanks to the organizers.

vn_meaning: đại từ: đó; cái đó; mốc thời gian; mệnh đề quan hệ.
eng_explanation: Pronoun/Demonstrative: That; referring to something previously mentioned.
example: I want that book.
That was a great movie.
The man that helped me was very kind.

vn_meaning: giới từ/trạng từ: này, đó (xác định một đối tượng cụ thể)
eng_explanation: definite article (used to specify a particular noun).
example: I saw the dog in the park.
The weather is beautiful today.
Please pass me the salt.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhà hát
eng_explanation: a building or venue where performances take place.
example: We went to the theatre to see a play.
The theatre was packed with enthusiastic fans.
She works at a local theatre.

vn_meaning: tính từ: mang tính sân khấu; kịch tính
eng_explanation: relating to or characteristic of the theatre; dramatic.
example: The performance was full of theatrical flair.
He gave a theatrical sigh.
Her theatrical gestures amused the audience.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hành vi trộm cắp
eng_explanation: the act of stealing something.
example: The shop suffered a theft last night.
Police are investigating the theft of valuable artwork.
He was arrested for theft.

vn_meaning: đại từ sở hữu: của họ
eng_explanation: possessive form of 'they', indicating ownership.
example: Their house is very large.
They enjoyed their vacation.
Their children are well-behaved.

vn_meaning: dại từ sở hữu: của họ (dùng sau giới từ hoặc thay thế danh từ)
eng_explanation: possessive pronoun referring to 'they'.
example: The car is theirs.
The decision is entirely theirs.
I gave the books to them and theirs.

vn_meaning: đại từ: họ (đối tượng)
eng_explanation: objective form of 'they', used as the object of a verb or preposition.
example: I saw them at the store.
Please help them with their homework.
Give this to them.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chủ đề; đề tài
eng_explanation: a central idea or topic in a work of art, literature, or music.
example: The theme of the book is love and loss.
The party had a tropical theme.
What is the main theme of the movie?

vn_meaning: dại từ phản thân: tự họ
eng_explanation: reflexive pronoun referring to 'they'.
example: They did it themselves.
She taught herself to play the guitar.
They blamed themselves for the mistake.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: lúc đó; sau đó
eng_explanation: at that time; after that.
example: I went to the store, then I went home.
If you finish your homework, then you can play.
It was a long time ago, but I still remember then.

vn_meaning: đại từ nhân xưng: họ, bọn họ (dùng để chỉ người)
eng_explanation: Pronoun: used to refer to people or things previously mentioned or easily identified. (pron.)
example: They are going to the park.
I saw them yesterday.
They said it would rain.

vn_meaning: tính từ: dày, đậm, đặc; (thân mật) ngốc nghếch, chậm hiểu; danh từ: phần dày nhất, sự dày đặc
eng_explanation: Adj: having a large distance between opposite surfaces; dense. (adj.)
example: The book is very thick.
The soup was thick and creamy.
He's a bit thick, isn't he?

vn_meaning: danh từ: kẻ trộm, tên trộm
eng_explanation: Noun: a person who steals things. (n.)
example: The thief stole my wallet.
Police are looking for the thief.
He was caught as a thief.

vn_meaning: tính từ: mỏng, gầy, yếu; (chất lỏng) loãng; danh từ: sự mỏng manh
eng_explanation: Adj: having a small distance between opposite surfaces; slender. (adj.)
example: She is very thin.
The ice was thin and dangerous.
He drank a thin soup.

vn_meaning: danh từ: vật, đồ vật; việc, sự kiện; điều gì đó
eng_explanation: Noun: a material object; an event or situation. (n.)
example: What is that thing?
It's a strange thing to say.
I have a thing for chocolate.

vn_meaning: động từ: nghĩ, suy nghĩ; tin tưởng, cho rằng
eng_explanation: Verb: have a particular belief or idea; consider. (v.)
example: I think it will rain.
What do you think of the movie?
I need to think about it.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự suy nghĩ, tư duy; động từ phân từ hiện tại: đang nghĩ, đang suy nghĩ
eng_explanation: Noun: the process of using your mind; Verb (present participle): considering. (n./v.)
example: Critical thinking is important.
I'm thinking about my future.
She is thinking deeply.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thứ ba; số thứ ba; danh từ: một phần ba
eng_explanation: Adj: coming after second; Ordinal number 3. (adj./n.)
example: He came in third place.
This is the third time I've called.
A third of the cake is gone.

vn_meaning: tính từ: khát
eng_explanation: Adj: feeling a need to drink. (adj.)
example: I'm very thirsty after the run.
The plants are thirsty and need water.

vn_meaning: số thứ tự: mười ba; số đếm: mười ba
eng_explanation: Number: the number 13. (num.)
example: She is thirteen years old.
There were thirteen people at the party.
Room thirteen is on the second floor.

eng_explanation: A number representing a quantity of thirty.
example: I need to buy thirty pencils.
The company reported a thirty percent increase in sales.

vn_meaning: this
eng_explanation: A demonstrative pronoun indicating something present or known.
example: Look at this beautiful picture.
This is the most important document.

vn_meaning: completely or carefully examining or investigating something.
eng_explanation: To examine or investigate something completely and carefully.
example: A thorough investigation is needed to solve the case.
She performed a thorough check of the equipment.

vn_meaning: completely or carefully examining or investigating something.
eng_explanation: To examine or investigate something completely and carefully.
example: She completed the task thoroughly.
The report was thoroughly reviewed by the team.

vn_meaning: although or even though
eng_explanation: Used to introduce a contrast or concession.
example: It will rain though the sun is shining.
I thought it would be a pleasant day, though.

vn_meaning: suy nghĩ
eng_explanation: A mental process or consideration.
example: I had a thought about the problem.

vn_meaning: causing someone to think deeply about a subject.
eng_explanation: Stimulating thought and contemplation.
example: The play was thought-provoking and left me pondering its themes.
The lecture was thought-provoking and challenged my assumptions.

vn_meaning: showing consideration for others.
eng_explanation: Showing care and consideration for others.
example: She was a thoughtful and compassionate person.
He was a thoughtful and considerate friend.

vn_meaning: thousand
eng_explanation: A thousand.
example: There are a thousand people in the crowd.
I have a thousand dollars to spend.

vn_meaning: sợi chỉ
eng_explanation: A single strand of fabric or yarn.
example: The weaver created a beautiful thread.
She used a fine thread to stitch the fabric.

vn_meaning: danh từ: mối đe dọa; nguy hiểm; (tính từ): đe dọa (nguy hiểm)
eng_explanation: Noun: A potential cause of harm or damage. Adjective: posing a risk or danger.
example: The rising crime rate is a serious threat to the city.

vn_meaning: động từ: đe dọa; có nguy cơ (làm gì đó); đe dọa (ai đó)
eng_explanation: Verb: To express a hostile intention or pose a risk; to indicate a possibility of something bad happening.
example: Don't threaten me, or I'll tell your mother.
The storm threatens to flood the coastal areas.
He threatened to quit his job if he didn't get a raise.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ba (số); (số thứ tự) thứ ba
eng_explanation: Numeral adjective: The number three. Ordinal number: Third.
example: I have three cats.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ngưỡng; giới hạn; điểm giới hạn; (tính từ): ngưỡng
eng_explanation: Noun: A level or point beyond which something happens. Adjective: Relating to a limit.
example: The threshold for acceptance is 70% approval.
He crossed the threshold into the dark forest.

vn_meaning: tính từ: vô cùng thích thú; phấn khích; vui mừng
eng_explanation: Adjective: Feeling great excitement and pleasure.
example: She was thrilled to receive the award.
He was thrilled with the news of his promotion.
The children were thrilled with the roller coaster ride.

vn_meaning: động từ: phát triển mạnh; thịnh vượng; sống tốt
eng_explanation: Verb: To grow or develop vigorously; to flourish.
example: Plants thrive in sunny locations.
The company is thriving in the new market.
The business thrived despite the economic downturn.

vn_meaning: danh từ: họng; cổ họng; (vị trí) cổ
eng_explanation: Noun: The passage in the neck that leads to the trachea. Also, the back of the neck.
example: He cleared his throat before speaking.
She had a sore throat.
The singer's throat was hoarse.

vn_meaning: chiếu phụ: xuyên qua; qua; thông qua; (cách thức) dọc theo
eng_explanation: Preposition/Adverb: Moving or passing entirely across or through. Also, indicating a route or method.
example: The river flows through the valley.
He walked through the park.
We can contact him through email.

vn_meaning: chiếu phụ: khắp nơi; trên khắp mọi nơi; trong suốt
eng_explanation: Preposition: Everywhere or across a whole area or period of time.

vn_meaning: động từ: ném; vứt; tung; (về sự kiện) tổ chức (sự kiện)
eng_explanation: Verb: To propel something with force. Also, to organize or host an event.
example: He threw the ball to his friend.
She threw away the old newspaper.
The company will throw a party to celebrate its anniversary.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ngón tay cái; động từ: dùng ngón tay cái để ấn, gạt
eng_explanation: thumb (n) - the short, thick end of the hand; (v) - to press or turn with the thumb.
example: He hurt his thumb while playing baseball.
She used her thumb to scroll through the photos.
Give me a thumbs-up if you agree.

vn_meaning: danh từ: Thứ Năm
eng_explanation: Thursday (n) - the fourth day of the week, following Wednesday and preceding Friday.
example: I have a meeting on Thursday afternoon.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: do đó, vì vậy, bằng cách đó
eng_explanation: thus (adv) - therefore; in this way; consequently.

vn_meaning: danh từ: vé (xem phim, tàu xe,...)
eng_explanation: ticket (n) - a small piece of paper that allows admission to an event or transportation.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thủy triều; động từ: bị ảnh hưởng bởi thủy triều
eng_explanation: tide (n) - the rise and fall of the sea levels caused by the gravitational effects of the moon and sun; (v) - to be affected by the tides.
example: The tide is coming in.

The boat was tied to the dock to avoid being swept away by the tide.

vn_meaning: tính từ: ngăn nắp, gọn gàng; động từ: dọn dẹp, sắp xếp
eng_explanation: tidy (adj) - neat and organized; (v) - to put in order; to clean and organize.
example: Her room is always very tidy.
Please tidy up your toys.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cà vạt; sự hòa, sự cân bằng; động từ: buộc, thắt; hòa, cân bằng
eng_explanation: tie (n) - a strip of cloth worn around the neck; a draw or equal score; (v) - to fasten with a tie; to end in a draw.
example: He wore a blue tie to the interview.
The game ended in a tie.
Can you tie my shoelaces?

vn_meaning: tính từ: chặt, chật; trạng từ: chặt chẽ
eng_explanation: tight (adj) - firmly or closely fixed in place; (adv) - closely or firmly.

vn_meaning: động từ: siết chặt hơn
eng_explanation: tighten (v) - to make something tighter or more secure.
example: Please tighten the screws on the table.

vn_meaning: tiền tố: cho đến, cho đến khi; danh từ: cho đến khi (thường dùng trong tiếng Anh cổ)
eng_explanation: till (prep) - until; up to a certain time.
example: Wait here till I return.

vn_meaning: giới từ: đến, tới, cho, với; động từ nguyên mẫu (để chỉ hành động vô định)
eng_explanation: prep. expressing direction or recipient; inf. before a verb (to run).
example: I am going to the store.
She wants to learn French.
He gave the book to her.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thuốc lá; cây thuốc lá
eng_explanation: n. dried leaves of a plant, used for smoking or chewing.

She grew up on a tobacco farm.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: hôm nay; ngày nay
eng_explanation: adv. on this day; n. the present day.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ngón chân

vn_meaning: trạng từ: cùng nhau; tính từ: chung, đồng thời

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhà vệ sinh, bồn cầu
eng_explanation: n. a fixture for defecation and urination.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự khoan dung; khả năng chịu đựng
eng_explanation: n. acceptance of others' differences; ability to endure hardship.

The drug builds up tolerance with repeated use.
Religious tolerance is essential for a peaceful society.

vn_meaning: động từ: chịu đựng, khoan dung
eng_explanation: v. to allow the existence of something disliked; to endure.
example: I can't tolerate his rude behavior.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lệ phí; tiếng chuông; số người chết, bị thương; động từ: đánh (chuông)
eng_explanation: n. a fee; sound of a bell; casualty count; v. to ring a bell.
example: There is a toll to cross the bridge.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cà chua
eng_explanation: n. a red, edible fruit often used as a vegetable.

He grows tomatoes in his garden.

vn_meaning: The day after today; the day following today.
eng_explanation: It refers to the next day.
example: I’m looking forward to tomorrow’s meeting.

vn_meaning: tấn
eng_explanation: It's a common unit of measurement.
example: I need a ton of coffee to make a latte.

vn_meaning: âm điệu
eng_explanation: It describes the emotional impact of something.
example: The music had a beautiful tone.

vn_meaning: lưỡi
eng_explanation: It's a vital part of communication.
example: He used his tongue to express his frustration.

vn_meaning: tối nay
eng_explanation: It signifies the end of the day.
example: We’re having a lovely night tonight.

vn_meaning: tấn
eng_explanation: It's a standard unit of weight.
example: We need to buy a ton of apples.

vn_meaning: More than enough; excessively.
eng_explanation: It indicates an excess.
example: I’m too tired to go out.

vn_meaning: công cụ
eng_explanation: It’s a useful item.
example: He used a hammer to fix the door.

vn_meaning: tật
eng_explanation: It’s essential for eating.
example: He lost his tooth in the accident.

vn_meaning: trên
eng_explanation: It signifies the peak.
example: The eagle soared to the top of the mountain.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chủ đề; vấn đề; đề tài (của cuộc trò chuyện, bài viết, nghiên cứu).

example: The main topic of the meeting was climate change.
Let's discuss the topic of education.
What is your favorite topic to read about?

vn_meaning: danh từ: hành hình; tra tấn; đau khổ (cả về thể xác và tinh thần).

vn_meaning: danh từ: cái vung; lần ném; lần tung (đồ vật, đồng xu).
eng_explanation: verb: to throw lightly; to randomly distribute or offer.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tổng cộng; số lượng (cuối cùng).; tính từ: hoàn toàn; tuyệt đối.

example: The total cost was $100.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: hoàn toàn; tuyệt đối; hoàn toàn là.
eng_explanation: adverb: completely; entirely; absolutely.
example: I am totally exhausted.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự tiếp xúc; cảm xúc; sự chạm vào; tác động (lạ, thú vị).

example: There was a slight touch of rain.

The movie had a touching ending.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người cứng rắn; tình huống khó khăn; đồ vật cứng; tính từ: khó khăn; bền bỉ; mạnh mẽ.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chuyến tham quan; vòng quanh; (về một địa điểm, quốc gia).
eng_explanation: noun: a journey for pleasure or sightseeing; a route or circuit.
example: We went on a tour of Europe.

vn_meaning: danh từ: du lịch; ngành du lịch.
eng_explanation: noun: the activity of traveling for pleasure; the industry of providing travel services.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khách du lịch; người tham quan.
eng_explanation: noun: a person who travels for pleasure; a visitor.

He is a tourist from Canada.
The tourist center provided information about local attractions.

vn_meaning: danh từ: giải đấu (thể thao, cờ bạc); sự tranh tài.
eng_explanation: a competition involving several teams or individuals; a contest.
example: The tennis tournament was exciting to watch.
He won the chess tournament after a long battle.
Our school held a spelling tournament last week.

vn_meaning: tiền tố: về phía; đối với; hướng tới; có xu hướng.
eng_explanation: in the direction of; approaching; relating to.
example: She walked towards the park.
His attitude towards the project changed.
The economy is moving towards recovery.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khăn tắm; tính từ: liên quan đến khăn tắm.
eng_explanation: a piece of absorbent cloth used for drying.
example: I used a towel to dry my hair.
Please put the towel back on the rack.
The hotel provided fluffy towels.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tháp; sự uy quyền; động từ: vươn cao.
eng_explanation: a tall, narrow building; a position of power or authority.
example: The Eiffel Tower is a famous landmark.
He rose to a tower of influence in the company.
The trees tower over the village.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thị trấn; thị nơi.
eng_explanation: a populated area smaller than a city.
example: We spent the weekend in a small town.
The town is known for its friendly people.
She grew up in a quiet town in the countryside.

vn_meaning: tính từ: độc hại; gây hại; danh từ: chất độc.
eng_explanation: poisonous; harmful; containing or relating to toxins.
example: The fumes were toxic and dangerous.
Avoid contact with toxic chemicals.
The spill released toxic waste into the river.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đồ chơi.
eng_explanation: an object designed for children's play.
example: The child was playing with a toy car.
He received many toys for his birthday.

vn_meaning: danh từ: dấu vết; một lượng nhỏ; động từ: theo dõi; tìm thấy một chút.
eng_explanation: a mark left by something; a very small amount; to find something after searching.
example: The detective followed every trace of evidence.
There was a trace of salt in the soup.
Scientists are trying to trace the source of the pollution.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đường đua; băng ghi âm; dấu vết; động từ: theo dõi; ghi lại.
eng_explanation: a path or route; a recorded performance; to follow or monitor.
example: The runners were on the track.
I bought a new track on my favorite album.
We tracked the animal's movements through the forest.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thương mại; sự trao đổi; nghề nghiệp; động từ: buôn bán; trao đổi.
eng_explanation: the buying and selling of goods or services; an occupation.
example: International trade is important for the economy.
He works in the trade of electronics.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người huấn luyện (thể thao, nghề nghiệp); người đào tạo (kỹ năng)
eng_explanation: n. Someone whose job is to teach or coach (people or animals).
example: He is a personal fitness trainer.
The company provides trainers for new employees.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự huấn luyện; sự đào tạo; quá trình tập luyện; tính từ: (thuộc) quá trình huấn luyện, đào tạo
eng_explanation: n. The process of learning a skill; adj. relating to skills development.
example: She is undergoing intensive training for the marathon.
The training program improved employee productivity.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đặc điểm; tính cách (bẩm sinh)
eng_explanation: n. A distinguishing quality or characteristic, typically one belonging to a person.
example: Honesty is an important trait.
She inherited her mother's artistic traits.
Patience is a valuable trait to have.

vn_meaning: danh từ: giao dịch; sự trao đổi
eng_explanation: n. An instance of buying or selling something; a business deal.
example: The bank confirmed the transaction.

The real estate transaction took several weeks to complete.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bản sao; bảng điểm (học tập)
eng_explanation: n. A written copy of spoken words or an official record of academic performance.
example: She requested a transcript of her college courses.
The police released a transcript of the interview.
He needed an official transcript to apply for graduate school.

vn_meaning: động từ: chuyển giao; chuyển nhượng; chuyển tiền; danh từ: sự chuyển giao; sự chuyển nhượng
eng_explanation: v. To move something from one place to another; n. the act of moving.
example: She transferred money to her savings account.
The company decided to transfer him to a new department.
He completed a transfer to a university in California.

vn_meaning: động từ: biến đổi; thay đổi hoàn toàn
eng_explanation: v. To make a thorough or dramatic change in the form, appearance, or character of.
example: The caterpillar transformed into a butterfly.
The city underwent a major transformation.
New technology can transform the way we work.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự biến đổi; sự thay đổi hoàn toàn
eng_explanation: n. A marked change in form, nature, or appearance.
example: The transformation of the old building was remarkable.
She experienced a personal transformation after her travels.
Digital transformation is crucial for business success.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự vận chuyển; quá cảnh; phương tiện giao thông công cộng
eng_explanation: n. The carrying of people or goods; the state of passing through.
example: The goods are in transit.
He uses public transit to get to work.
The airport is a major hub for international transit.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự chuyển đổi; giai đoạn chuyển tiếp; động từ: chuyển đổi
eng_explanation: n. The process or a period of changing from one state to another; v. to change.
example: The transition to a new job was difficult.
The country is undergoing a political transition.
She transitioned from full-time work to retirement.

vn_meaning: Chuyển đổi từ một ngôn ngữ sang ngôn ngữ khác.
eng_explanation: To convert from one language to another.
example: The software can translate the text into multiple languages.
We need to translate this document into Spanish.

vn_meaning: Chuyển đổi từ một ngôn ngữ sang ngôn ngữ khác.
eng_explanation: The process of converting text or speech from one language to another.
example: The translation service provides instant translations.
I’m learning to translate from English to Vietnamese.

vn_meaning: Giao tiếp qua đường dây điện.
eng_explanation: The act of sending or receiving information over a wire.
example: The signal was transmitted through the satellite.

vn_meaning: Giao tiếp qua đường dây điện.
eng_explanation: To send or broadcast information over a wire.
example: The signal was transmitted to the receiver.

vn_meaning: Sự rõ ràng, tính minh bạch.
eng_explanation: The quality of being open and honest.
example: The company is committed to transparency in its operations.

vn_meaning: Rõ ràng, không che giấu.
eng_explanation: Being open and honest, without hiding information.
example: The product is made of transparent materials.

vn_meaning: Di chuyển, vận chuyển.
eng_explanation: The act of moving something from one place to another.
example: The truck is transporting goods across the country.

vn_meaning: Di chuyển, vận chuyển.
eng_explanation: The movement of people or goods using vehicles or other means.
example: The transportation system is improving rapidly.

vn_meaning: Bẫy, bẫy.
eng_explanation: A method of catching or ensnaring someone or something.
example: The hunter set a trap to catch the deer.

vn_meaning: Đau đớn, tổn thương.
eng_explanation: A severe physical or emotional injury.
example: The patient experienced a traumatic accident.

vn_meaning: động từ: đi lại; hành trình (du lịch); di chuyển (hàng hóa)
eng_explanation: verb: to move from one place to another; to journey or vacation.
example: I enjoy traveling to new countries.
They planned a long travel across Europe.
The train travel was very comfortable.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người đi du lịch; hành khách
eng_explanation: noun: a person who travels; a tourist or passenger.
example: The traveller arrived late due to the storm.

Many travellers visit the ancient ruins every year.

vn_meaning: danh từ: kho báu; giá trị (vật chất hoặc tinh thần)
eng_explanation: noun: something valuable; a precious object or a cherished memory.
example: The pirates searched for buried treasure.
Time is a treasure that should not be wasted.
She considered her family her greatest treasure.

vn_meaning: danh từ: món ăn; cách đối xử; thỏa thuận (hợp đồng)
eng_explanation: noun: a dish; a way of dealing with someone; an agreement or contract.
example: Let's have a chocolate treat.
He treated her with kindness and respect.
They signed a trade treaty with another country.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phương pháp điều trị; cách đối xử; sự đối xử
eng_explanation: noun: a method of medical care; a way of dealing with someone; behavior.
example: The doctor prescribed a new treatment for her illness.
He received a rude treatment from his boss.
The patient needed immediate treatment.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hiệp ước; thỏa thuận (hợp đồng chính thức)
eng_explanation: noun: a formal agreement between countries; a contract.
example: The treaty was signed after years of negotiations.
The treaty established peace between the two nations.
They discussed the terms of the new treaty.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cây; rừng cây
eng_explanation: noun: a perennial woody plant; a forest.
example: The tree was tall and strong.
The children played under the tree.

vn_meaning: tính từ: rất lớn; đáng kinh ngạc; to lớn
eng_explanation: adjective: extremely large or great; remarkably impressive.
example: He has a tremendous amount of experience.

vn_meaning: danh từ: xu hướng; dòng chảy; diễn biến
eng_explanation: noun: a general direction in which something is developing or changing.
example: Fashion trends change quickly.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phiên tòa; thử nghiệm; sự thử thách
eng_explanation: noun: a legal examination of a criminal charge; an experiment; a difficult experience.
example: He faced a criminal trial.
The company conducted a product trial.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thuộc về bộ lạc; liên quan đến bộ lạc (xã hội học).

example: The tribal leaders met to discuss the treaty.
Tribal customs vary greatly from region to region.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tòa án; hội đồng xét xử (thường là quốc tế).
eng_explanation: Noun: A court or body of people convened to make judicial decisions.
example: The international tribunal investigated war crimes.
He appealed the decision to a higher tribunal.
The tribunal ruled in favor of the plaintiff.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự ca ngợi; sự tôn kính; sự đóng góp (tiền bạc, hàng hóa) để thể hiện sự phục tùng.
eng_explanation: Noun: An expression of respect or admiration; a payment made to a ruler or country.
example: She paid tribute to her mentor's achievements.
The kingdom sent a yearly tribute to the emperor.

vn_meaning: danh từ: mánh khóe; trò lừa bịp; hành động khéo léo để đạt được điều mình muốn; động từ: lừa bịp; đánh lừa.
eng_explanation: Noun: A clever or deceptive action; Verb: To deceive or cheat someone.
example: He played a trick on his friend.
The magician performed a stunning trick.
Don't try to trick me into doing something I don't want to do.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bộ phận kích hoạt (súng, máy móc); yếu tố gây ra (sự kiện, phản ứng); động từ: kích hoạt; gây ra.
eng_explanation: Noun: A mechanism that initiates an action; Verb: To cause something to happen.
example: The trigger released the mechanism.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nghìn tỷ (số 1.000.000.000.000).
eng_explanation: Noun: One million millions (1,000,000,000,000).

vn_meaning: danh từ: bộ ba; ba người hoặc vật kết hợp với nhau.
eng_explanation: Noun: A group of three people or things.

A trio of kittens played in the garden.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chuyến đi; động từ: đi lại; du lịch.
eng_explanation: Noun: A journey or excursion; Verb: To go somewhere for a short period.
example: We're planning a trip to Europe.
I tripped over a rock.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chiến thắng vẻ vang; sự thành công rực rỡ; động từ: giành chiến thắng; đạt được thành công lớn.
eng_explanation: Noun: A great victory or achievement; Verb: To achieve success after a struggle.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người ủy thác; người quản lý quỹ

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự thật; chân lý
eng_explanation: n. The quality or state of being true; reality.

vn_meaning: động từ: cố gắng; thử; thử nghiệm; xét xử (pháp luật); danh từ: sự cố gắng; sự thử nghiệm
eng_explanation: v. To make an effort; to attempt. n. An attempt; effort.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sóng thần

vn_meaning: danh từ: ống; tuýp (kem đánh răng, thuốc mỡ); tàu điện ngầm (London); động từ: đi bằng ống
eng_explanation: n. A hollow cylinder; underground railway. v. To travel through a tube.
example: He squeezed the toothpaste from the tube.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thứ Ba
eng_explanation: n. The day of the week between Monday and Wednesday.

vn_meaning: danh từ: học phí
eng_explanation: n. The money paid for instruction, especially at a school or university.

vn_meaning: danh từ: giai điệu; bài hát; động từ: điều chỉnh (nhạc cụ); hát theo giai điệu
eng_explanation: n. A melody. v. To adjust a musical instrument; to sing a melody.
example: The song had a catchy tune.
He tuned his guitar before the concert.
She began to hum a familiar tune.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đường hầm; động từ: đào hầm
eng_explanation: n. An underground passage. v. To create an underground passage.
example: The train traveled through a long tunnel.
They are building a tunnel under the river.

vn_meaning: động từ: xoay; rẽ; đến lượt; trở nên; danh từ: lượt; sự xoay; sự thay đổi
eng_explanation: v. To rotate; to change direction. n. A rotation; an opportunity.
example: Please turn the page.
It's your turn to speak.

vn_meaning: Số lượng sản phẩm được bán ra (đặc biệt là trong ngành ô tô).

example: The car dealership had a high turnout on Saturday.

vn_meaning: Số lượng sản phẩm hoặc khách hàng được bán ra trong một khoảng thời gian nhất định.
eng_explanation: Turnover measures how much of a product or customer is sold over a period.
example: The company's turnover increased due to new sales.
The turnover rate is crucial for assessing profitability.

vn_meaning: Th aparel hư름 (đài truyền hình).
eng_explanation: TV stands for television.
example: We watched the latest episode of TV.

vn_meaning: Mười hai (số lượng).
eng_explanation: Twelve is a number representing a quantity of twelve.
example: There are twelve students in the class.
He has twelve years of experience.

vn_meaning: Hai mươi (số lượng).
eng_explanation: Twenty is a number representing a quantity of twenty.
example: I need twenty more books.
The company is making a profit of twenty percent.

vn_meaning: Hai lần (số lượng).
eng_explanation: Twice means twice the amount.
example: I need twice the amount of food.
She made twice as many mistakes.

vn_meaning: Hai con (đồ vật).
eng_explanation: Twin refers to two identical creatures.
example: They have two identical twins.
The twins were inseparable.

vn_meaning: Vặn (đồ vật).
eng_explanation: Twist means to turn or rotate something.
example: The dancer performed a dramatic twist.
The car's steering wheel has a twist grip.

vn_meaning: Hai (số lượng).
eng_explanation: Two is a number representing a quantity of two.
example: I have two apples.
There are two people at the party.

vn_meaning: Loại (đồ vật).
eng_explanation: Type refers to a category or kind of thing.
example: This is a type of car.
The product comes in different types.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người thông thường; tính từ: điển hình; đặc trưng (cho một nhóm); thông thường
eng_explanation: Adjective: characteristic of a type; noun: a regular person.
example: He is a typical student, always studying hard.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: thường; điển hình; đặc trưng (cho một nhóm)
eng_explanation: Adverb: in a usual or characteristic manner; often; typically.
example: He typically arrives at work by 9 am.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lốp xe (ô tô, xe máy, xe đạp)
eng_explanation: Noun: a rubber covering for a wheel.
example: Check the tyre pressure regularly.

vn_meaning: tính từ: xấu; kinh tởm; khó coi
eng_explanation: Adjective: unpleasant to look at; unattractive.

vn_meaning: danh từ: kết quả cuối cùng; đỉnh cao; mục tiêu cuối cùng; tính từ: cuối cùng; tối thượng
eng_explanation: Noun: the final outcome; adjective: most extreme or highest degree.
example: The ultimate goal is to win the championship.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: cuối cùng; về cơ bản; trong những trường hợp cuối cùng
eng_explanation: Adverb: in the final result; ultimately; in the end.
example: Ultimately, the decision is yours.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ô (mưa); nón (mưa)
eng_explanation: Noun: a portable canopy used for protection from rain or sun.
example: I took an umbrella because it was raining.

He carried an umbrella to protect himself from the sun.

vn_meaning: tính từ: không thể; không có khả năng
eng_explanation: Adjective: not able; incapable.
example: I am unable to attend the meeting.

vn_meaning: tính từ: không chấp nhận được; không được phép
eng_explanation: Adjective: not acceptable; not permitted.
example: His behavior was completely unacceptable.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự không chắc chắn; sự không rõ ràng
eng_explanation: Noun: the state of being unsure or doubtful.
example: There is a great deal of uncertainty about the future.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chú, bác, cậu, bác ruột, bác họ, bác vợ; danh từ: người họ hàng nam lớn tuổi hơn cha hoặc mẹ.
eng_explanation: noun: A man who is your father's or mother's brother, or the husband of your aunt.
example: My uncle always brings the best presents at Christmas.
She's staying with her uncle while she looks for an apartment.
He's a great uncle to my children.

vn_meaning: tính từ: khó chịu; cảm thấy không thoải mái; danh từ: sự khó chịu.
eng_explanation: adj: Feeling or causing slight pain or discomfort; awkward or uneasy.
example: The chair was very uncomfortable.
I felt uncomfortable answering the question.
The room was filled with an uncomfortable silence.

vn_meaning: tính từ: bất tỉnh; không ý thức được; danh từ: trạng thái bất tỉnh.
eng_explanation: adj: Not awake or aware; not conscious. n: A state of being unaware.
example: He fell and became unconscious.
The patient was unconscious after the accident.
She slipped into an unconscious state.

vn_meaning: giới từ: dưới; bên dưới; trong sự kiểm soát của; ít hơn.
eng_explanation: prep: In a lower position than; subject to the authority or control of.
example: The cat is hiding under the bed.
The company is under new management.
The temperature is under 30 degrees.

vn_meaning: động từ: trải qua; chịu đựng; phẫu thuật.
eng_explanation: verb: To experience or be subjected to something, often something unpleasant or difficult.
example: The patient will undergo surgery next week.
They had to undergo a rigorous training program.
The country is undergoing significant political changes.

vn_meaning: tính từ: sinh viên đại học (chưa tốt nghiệp); danh từ: sinh viên đại học (chưa tốt nghiệp).
eng_explanation: adj: Relating to or characteristic of university students who have not yet graduated. n: A university student who has not yet graduated.
example: She is an undergraduate student at Harvard.
The undergraduate program is designed to prepare students for careers in engineering.
He's writing a thesis for his undergraduate degree.

vn_meaning: tính từ: ngầm; dưới lòng đất; bí mật; danh từ: đường hầm ngầm; hệ thống tàu điện ngầm.
eng_explanation: adj: Situated or occurring below the surface of the earth; secret or hidden. n: A tunnel or system of tunnels beneath the ground.
example: The train runs on an underground line.
They built a secret underground base.
The city has an extensive underground railway system.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tiềm ẩn; cơ bản; nền tảng.
eng_explanation: adj: Existing beneath the surface; fundamental or basic.
example: There were underlying issues in their relationship.
The underlying cause of the problem is a lack of funding.
The underlying principles of democracy are fairness and equality.

vn_meaning: động từ: làm suy yếu; phá hoại; làm mất uy tín.
eng_explanation: verb: To weaken or damage something gradually; to erode the foundations of.
example: His actions undermined her confidence.
The scandal undermined the company's reputation.
Constant criticism can undermine a person's self-esteem.

vn_meaning: động từ: hiểu; thông cảm; nhận thức được.
eng_explanation: verb: To perceive the intended meaning of words, language, or a speaker; to grasp mentally.
example: I don't understand what you're saying.
Do you understand the instructions?
I understand your frustration.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: không may; đáng tiếc
eng_explanation: Adverb: regrettably; sadly; by bad luck. (adv.)
example: Unfortunately, the flight was delayed due to bad weather.
Unfortunately, I don't have the answer to your question.
Unfortunately, she wasn't selected for the team.

vn_meaning: tính từ: không hạnh phúc; buồn bã; chán nản
eng_explanation: Adjective: not happy; sad or dissatisfied. (adj.)
example: She seemed very unhappy about the news.
He was unhappy with his job and decided to quit.
The children looked unhappy when their parents left.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đồng nhất; giống nhau; (quân sự) đồng phục; danh từ: đồng phục
eng_explanation: Adjective: not changing in form or character. Noun: a specific set of clothes. (adj./n.)
example: All the students wore a school uniform.
The building had a uniform appearance.
Soldiers are required to wear a uniform.

vn_meaning: động từ: thống nhất; đoàn kết; làm cho một thể
eng_explanation: Verb: to make into a whole; to bring together. (v.)
example: The goal is to unify the country after years of conflict.
We need to unify our efforts to achieve success.
The new law aims to unify the legal system.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự liên hiệp; sự thống nhất; công đoàn
eng_explanation: Noun: the act of joining; a group of workers. (n.)
example: The union represents the interests of its members.
The union of the two companies created a powerful corporation.
They celebrated their union with a grand wedding.

vn_meaning: tính từ: độc nhất vô nhị; duy nhất; khác biệt
eng_explanation: Adjective: being the only one of its kind. (adj.)
example: She has a unique talent for painting.
This is a unique opportunity that you shouldn't miss.
Each snowflake is unique.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đơn vị; bộ phận; lực lượng; động từ: hợp nhất; chia thành đơn vị
eng_explanation: Noun: a single thing or a group. Verb: to form a unit. (n./v.)
example: The army is divided into several units.
This apartment is a two-bedroom unit.
We need to unit our resources to solve this problem.

vn_meaning: động từ: đoàn kết; hợp nhất; liên kết
eng_explanation: Verb: to come together; to form a union. (v.)
example: We must unite to overcome this challenge.
The different groups united to fight for their rights.
Let's unite in our efforts to help those in need.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đoàn kết; thống nhất; hợp nhất
eng_explanation: Adjective: joined together; in agreement. (adj.)
example: The united front showed their strength.
The country remained united despite the political divisions.
They are a united family.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự thống nhất; sự đoàn kết; sự hòa hợp
eng_explanation: Noun: the state of being united; harmony. (n.)
example: The team showed great unity in their efforts.
National unity is essential for a strong country.
They worked towards a sense of unity within the community.

vn_meaning: đại diện cho tất cả mọi thứ; toàn cầu
eng_explanation: It refers to something that applies to everyone or everything globally.
example: The universal healthcare system provides access to healthcare for all citizens.
The universal laws protect all individuals equally.

vn_meaning: tất cả mọi thứ; vũ trụ
eng_explanation: It signifies the entirety of existence, encompassing everything that exists.
example: The universe is vast and full of mysteries.
The universe is constantly expanding.

vn_meaning: trường đại học
eng_explanation: It denotes an institution dedicated to the academic study of a particular subject.
example: She earned her degree from a prestigious university.
The university offers a wide range of programs.

vn_meaning: không biết; không rõ
eng_explanation: It signifies a lack of information or knowledge about something.
example: I don't know the answer to that question.
The unknown factor is a significant challenge.

vn_meaning: trừ khi; ngoại trừ
eng_explanation: It indicates a condition that is not the case.
example: Unless you study, you won't pass the exam.
He's not unless he's feeling well.

vn_meaning: khác biệt; không giống
eng_explanation: It signifies a difference or contrast between two things.
example: This product is unlike anything else on the market.
She is unlike her brother in her personality.

vn_meaning: không thể xảy ra; hiếm gặp
eng_explanation: It indicates a low probability of something occurring.
example: It's unlikely that he will be able to attend the meeting.
Unlikely, the project will be completed on time.

vn_meaning: không cần thiết; không cần thiết
eng_explanation: It signifies something that is superfluous or not required.
example: We can eliminate the unnecessary paperwork.
That service is unnecessary for our needs.

vn_meaning: không thoải mái; khó chịu
eng_explanation: It describes something that causes discomfort or irritation.
example: The weather was unpleasant this summer.
The smell of the food was unpleasant.

vn_meaning: không từng có trước; chưa từng xảy ra
eng_explanation: It signifies a situation or event that is unique and unprecedented.
example: The unprecedented rainfall caused widespread flooding.
This is the first unprecedented event in the history of the company.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cho đến khi; trạng từ: cho đến khi
eng_explanation: expressing a time limit or condition: used in expressing a duration or condition.
example: I'll call you until tomorrow.
She waited until he arrived.
The project will continue until completion.

vn_meaning: tính từ: bất thường; không giống ai đó hoặc điều gì đó
eng_explanation: not ordinary or usual; strange or different.
example: That was an unusual experience.
She has an unusual talent for singing.
The weather was unusually cold this winter.

vn_meaning: động từ: tiết lộ; hé lộ; mở ra
eng_explanation: to reveal or disclose something previously hidden or secret.
example: The company will unveil its new product next week.
The statue was unveiled to the public.
She unveiled her plans for the future.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phía trên; (chỉ vị trí) lên trên; (chỉ thời gian) đến lúc
eng_explanation: at a higher position; indicating movement upwards; or a time point.
example: The cat is up on the roof.
He climbed up the stairs.
Let's meet up at 3 pm.

vn_meaning: tính từ: sắp tới; sắp diễn ra
eng_explanation: about to happen; near in time.
example: The upcoming election is important.
We have an upcoming meeting next week.
There are many upcoming events in the city.

vn_meaning: động từ: cập nhật; (thông tin) bổ sung, mới nhất
eng_explanation: to make something more current or modern; to provide new information.
example: Please update your software.
I need to update my resume.
The news website provides daily updates.

vn_meaning: động từ: nâng cấp; (phần cứng) cải tiến, thay thế
eng_explanation: to improve or modernize something; to replace something with a newer version.
example: I'm going to upgrade my computer.
The company plans to upgrade its facilities.
She upgraded her skills through training.

vn_meaning: động từ: bảo vệ; giữ vững; thực thi
eng_explanation: to support or defend; to maintain a principle or law.
example: The police uphold the law.
She upholds family values.
The judge upheld the verdict.

vn_meaning: giao điểm: dựa trên; trạng từ: dựa trên, lên
eng_explanation: depending on; resting on; or indicating a point in space.
example: The decision is based upon evidence.
He sat upon the bench.
The statue was placed upon the pedestal.

vn_meaning: tính từ: trên cùng; (vị trí) phía trên; danh từ: tầng trên
eng_explanation: at the highest part; or referring to a higher level or floor.
example: The upper floor of the building is under construction.
He lives in the upper class.
The upper part of the river is very deep.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự bực bội, mất tinh thần (cảm xúc); động từ: làm cho bực bội, làm buồn (cảm xúc); động từ: lật úp, làm đổ (vật lý)
eng_explanation: upset (adj/n/v) – distressed, worried; a disturbance; to disturb or overturn.
example: He was upset by the news.
The storm upset the boat.
She felt a little upset after the argument.

vn_meaning: phó từ: ở tầng trên; danh từ: tầng trên
eng_explanation: upstairs (adv/n) – towards or on a higher floor of a building.
example: The bedroom is upstairs.
Let's go upstairs for a cup of tea.
He lives on the top floor, upstairs.

vn_meaning: giới từ: hướng lên trên; phó từ: đi lên, tăng lên
eng_explanation: upwards (adv/prep) – in a direction higher than the current level; increasing.
example: The balloon floated upwards.
Stock prices moved upwards.
He looked upwards at the sky.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đô thị, thành thị
eng_explanation: urban (adj) – relating to a town or city; characteristic of city life.
example: The urban landscape is constantly changing.
Urban planning is essential for sustainable development.
He prefers urban living to rural life.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thôi thúc, sự thúc giục (cảm xúc); động từ: thúc giục, thôi thúc (cảm xúc)
eng_explanation: urge (n/v) – a strong desire or impulse; to strongly encourage someone to do something.
example: She felt a strong urge to travel.
I urge you to consider my proposal.
He gave in to the urge to eat chocolate.

vn_meaning: tính từ: khẩn cấp, cấp bách
eng_explanation: urgent (adj) – requiring immediate attention; pressing.
example: It's an urgent matter.
We received an urgent request for assistance.
The situation is becoming increasingly urgent.

vn_meaning: đại từ nhân xưng: chúng tôi, chúng ta
eng_explanation: us (pron) – the objective form of 'we'.
example: Can you help us?
They gave the book to us.
We saw them, and waved to us.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cách sử dụng, thói quen sử dụng
eng_explanation: usage (n) – the way in which something is used; a habit or custom.
example: The correct usage of this word is...
His usage of social media is impressive.
Proper usage is important for clear communication.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự sử dụng, công dụng (hành động); động từ: sử dụng, dùng
eng_explanation: use (n/v) – the act of employing something; to employ something.
example: What's the use of worrying?
She found a use for the old boxes.
Please use this pen.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đã sử dụng, cũ; động từ: đã dùng, quen dùng
eng_explanation: used (adj/v) – previously owned or utilized; accustomed to something.
example: This is a used car.
I'm used to waking up early.
She used to live in Paris.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khoảng trống; sự trống rỗng; máy hút bụi; động từ: hút bụi, làm trống
eng_explanation: n./v. An empty space; to clean with a vacuum cleaner. (n, v)
example: The vacuum cleaner made the carpet spotless.
Scientists conduct experiments in a vacuum.
There's a vacuum in the market for a new product.

vn_meaning: tính từ: mơ hồ, không rõ ràng, không cụ thể
eng_explanation: adj. Not clearly expressed or defined; indistinct. (adj)
example: Her explanation was rather vague and unhelpful.
I have a vague recollection of meeting him before.
The instructions were too vague to follow easily.

vn_meaning: tính từ: hợp lệ, chính xác, có giá trị
eng_explanation: adj. Having a sound basis in logic or fact; legally acceptable. (adj)
example: The driver's license is valid for five years.
His argument is valid, but not necessarily true.
The passport must be valid for at least six months.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tính hợp lệ, tính chính xác, giá trị
eng_explanation: n. The quality of being logically or factually sound; legal effectiveness. (n)
example: The validity of the contract is questionable.
The court challenged the validity of the evidence.
The study confirmed the validity of the theory.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thung lũng, lưu vực sông
eng_explanation: n. A low area between hills or mountains; a river valley. (n)
example: They hiked through the beautiful valley.
Silicon Valley is a hub for technology companies.
The river flows through a wide valley.

vn_meaning: tính từ: quý giá, có giá trị, hữu ích
eng_explanation: adj. Worth a great deal; important and useful. (adj)
example: This antique is extremely valuable.
She gave me some very valuable advice.
Time is a valuable resource.

vn_meaning: danh từ: giá trị; giá trị đạo đức; động từ: đánh giá, định giá
eng_explanation: n./v. Worth; importance; to estimate the worth of. (n, v)
example: The value of the house has increased.
She values her family above all else.
The company values its employees.

vn_meaning: danh từ: xe tải nhỏ (thường dùng chở hàng)
eng_explanation: n. A large motor vehicle for transporting goods. (n)
example: The delivery van arrived on time.
He drives a refrigerated van for the bakery.
The company owns a fleet of vans.

vn_meaning: động từ: biến mất, tan biến, tiêu biến
eng_explanation: v. To disappear suddenly and completely. (v)
example: The fog vanished quickly in the sunshine.
The magician made the rabbit vanish.
His hopes seemed to vanish with the rain.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thay đổi, biến thiên; danh từ: biến số
eng_explanation: adj./n. Subject to change; a factor that can change. (adj, n)
example: The weather is very variable this time of year.
Age is a variable that affects health.
Scientists control the variables in an experiment.

vn_meaning: Một sự thay đổi nhỏ, không đáng kể, thường liên quan đến sự khác biệt nhỏ trong một sản phẩm hoặc dịch vụ.
eng_explanation: Variation refers to minor changes or differences, impacting a product or service.
example: The new flavor variation is very popular.
We offer a variety of different options.

vn_meaning: Có nhiều loại, đa dạng, hoặc khác nhau.
eng_explanation: Varied means diverse or numerous, encompassing multiple options.
example: The landscape is varied with different terrains.
The product comes in various colors.

vn_meaning: Một tập hợp các loại khác nhau, thường là những loại sản phẩm hoặc dịch vụ khác nhau.
eng_explanation: Variety refers to a range of different items or services.
example: The store offers a wide variety of fruits and vegetables.
We have a variety of different types of coffee.

vn_meaning: Nhiều, nhiều loại, hoặc khác nhau.
eng_explanation: Various indicates a large number of different things.
example: The weather was various throughout the day.
We need to consider various options for the project.

vn_meaning: Thay đổi, khác biệt, hoặc có sự khác biệt.
eng_explanation: To vary means to change or differ.
example: The temperature varies greatly during the summer.
The price varies depending on the location.

vn_meaning: Lớn, rộng lớn, hoặc có nhiều.
eng_explanation: Vast implies immense size or scope.
example: The country is vast and beautiful.
The ocean is vast and unexplored.

vn_meaning: Rau củ, cây ăn quả.
eng_explanation: A vegetable is a plant that is consumed as food.
example: I ate a delicious vegetable for lunch.
The garden is full of various vegetables.

vn_meaning: Phương tiện di chuyển, thường là ô tô, xe máy, hoặc tàu.
eng_explanation: A vehicle is a means of transportation.
example: He drove a new vehicle to work.
The company invested in a new vehicle fleet.

vn_meaning: Túi rỗng, một đường nhỏ trên da.
eng_explanation: A vein is a small channel in the skin.
example: The patient had a vein in her arm.
The doctor examined the vein in his hand.

vn_meaning: Đưa vào rủi ro, thử nghiệm, hoặc thực hiện một việc mới.
eng_explanation: A venture is a risky undertaking.
example: We should take a venture into a new market.
The company is undertaking a major venture.

vn_meaning: danh từ: địa điểm tổ chức; địa điểm diễn ra sự kiện; nơi diễn ra (sự kiện)
eng_explanation: Noun: A place where an event or performance takes place. (n)
example: The concert will be held at a large venue.
They booked a beautiful venue for their wedding.
The stadium is a popular venue for sporting events.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lời nói; lời lẽ; tính từ: liên quan đến lời nói; bằng lời
eng_explanation: Adjective: Relating to or using words; spoken. (adj)
example: He gave a verbal agreement to the terms.
The verbal abuse was shocking and hurtful.
She prefers verbal communication to email.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phán quyết; bản án; quyết định (của tòa)
eng_explanation: Noun: A formal decision given by a judge or jury. (n)
example: The jury reached a unanimous verdict.
The judge delivered a surprising verdict.
The company received a favorable verdict in the lawsuit.

vn_meaning: động từ: xác minh; kiểm chứng; chứng minh; xác thực
eng_explanation: Verb: To confirm the accuracy or truth of something. (v)
example: Please verify your information before submitting the form.
I need to verify the details of the transaction.
The police are verifying the suspect's alibi.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khổ thơ; bài thơ; (trong Kinh Phật) chương, phần
eng_explanation: Noun: A stanza of a poem. (n)
example: The poem is composed of several verses.
He recited a beautiful verse from the Bible.
Each verse tells a different part of the story.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phiên bản; bản sao; (của một cuốn sách) tái bản
eng_explanation: Noun: A particular form or adaptation of something. (n)
example: This is the latest version of the software.
I prefer the original version of the book.
There are many different versions of the fairy tale.

vn_meaning: từ liên kết: chống lại; đối đầu với; (trong thể thao) thi đấu giữa
eng_explanation: Conjunction: Used to indicate opposition or comparison. (conj)
example: The two teams are versus each other in the championship game.
He versus his rival in a fierce debate.
The company versus its competitors in the market.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chiều dọc; tính từ: đứng thẳng; dọc
eng_explanation: Adjective: Relating to a vertical direction. (adj)
example: The painting is a vertical landscape.
He climbed the vertical wall with ease.
A vertical line on the graph represents a constant value.

vn_meaning: tính từ: rất; cực kỳ; thật sự
eng_explanation: Adverb: Used to intensify adjectives or adverbs. (adv)
example: She is very happy today.
It was very difficult to solve the problem.
He is a very talented musician.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thùng; bình; tàu; (trong tôn giáo) dụng cụ nghi lễ
eng_explanation: Noun: A container. (n)
example: They transported the oil in a large vessel.
The priest held the sacred vessel during the ceremony.
The ship is a cargo vessel.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người cựu chiến binh (quân sự); tính từ: có kinh nghiệm (trong một lĩnh vực nào đó)
eng_explanation: noun: a person who has served in the military; adjective: experienced or skilled in a particular activity.
example: The veteran soldier shared stories of his time in the war.
She is a veteran teacher with over 30 years of experience.
He's a veteran gamer, known for his exceptional skills.

vn_meaning: tiền tố: thông qua; bằng đường
eng_explanation: preposition: through or by way of.
example: We traveled to Paris via London.
You can access the document via the company website.
Please send the package via express mail.

vn_meaning: tính từ: khả thi (kế hoạch, ý tưởng); sống được (sinh vật)
eng_explanation: adjective: capable of working successfully; feasible; able to live or develop.
example: The business plan seemed viable after some revisions.
The doctor confirmed the fetus was viable.
Is this a viable solution to the problem?

vn_meaning: tính từ: sôi động, tràn đầy sức sống (màu sắc, âm thanh, bầu không khí); mạnh mẽ (cảm xúc)
eng_explanation: adjective: full of energy and enthusiasm; bright and striking.
example: The city has a vibrant nightlife.
The painting features vibrant colors.
She has a vibrant personality.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chức vị phó (trong một tổ chức); thói xấu, tệ nạn
eng_explanation: noun: a subordinate position; a bad habit or vice.
example: He served as vice president of the company.
Smoking is a terrible vice.
She struggled to overcome her vices.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tàn nhẫn, độc ác; hung dữ (động vật)
eng_explanation: adjective: deliberately cruel or violent; fierce or savage.
example: The dog had a vicious bite.
He made a vicious attack on his opponent.
The villain was known for his vicious deeds.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nạn nhân
eng_explanation: noun: a person harmed or killed as a result of a crime or accident.
example: She was a victim of the robbery.
The victims of the earthquake received aid.
He felt like a victim of circumstance.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chiến thắng
eng_explanation: noun: a triumph or success; the defeat of an enemy.
example: The team celebrated their victory.
It was a hard-fought victory.
The victory brought joy to the entire nation.

vn_meaning: danh từ: video (hình ảnh, phim); bản ghi video
eng_explanation: noun: a recording of moving images and sound.
example: I watched a funny video online.
She posted a video of her vacation.
The security camera recorded a video of the incident.

vn_meaning: danh từ: quan điểm, ý kiến; cảnh quan; chỗ nhìn
eng_explanation: noun: a particular attitude or way of considering something; a vista.
example: I respect your view on the matter.
The view from the top of the mountain was breathtaking.
We have a great view of the ocean from our balcony.

vn_meaning: danh từ: vi-rút (y học); phần mềm độc hại (tin học)
eng_explanation: n. A tiny infectious agent that replicates inside living cells. (biology); malicious code (computing).
example: The flu is caused by a virus.
He ran a scan to remove the virus from his computer.
New variants of the virus are constantly emerging.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thị thực (văn bản cho phép nhập cảnh)
eng_explanation: n. An official document allowing a foreign national to enter a country. (immigration)
example: She needed a visa to travel to China.
The embassy processed his visa application quickly.
He overstayed his visa and faced deportation.

vn_meaning: tính từ: nhìn thấy được; rõ ràng (dễ nhận thấy)
eng_explanation: adj. Able to be seen; easily noticed or understood. (perception)
example: The stars were visible on a clear night.
There was a visible improvement in her health.
The damage to the car was clearly visible.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thị lực; tầm nhìn (khả năng nhìn xa); viễn cảnh (ý tưởng về tương lai)
eng_explanation: n. The ability to see; a mental image of the future. (perception/imagination)
example: He has excellent vision.
Her vision for the company was ambitious.
The artist's vision was truly unique.

vn_meaning: động từ: thăm; viếng; ghé thăm; danh từ: chuyến thăm
eng_explanation: v. To go to see someone or something; n. An act of visiting. (travel)
example: We plan to visit Paris next summer.
She paid a visit to her grandmother.
The president's visit was a great success.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khách; người đến thăm
eng_explanation: n. A person who visits someone or something. (travel/social)
example: We had many visitors during the holidays.
The museum receives thousands of visitors each year.
Please sign the visitor log.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thị giác; liên quan đến thị giác; trực quan (dễ thấy)
eng_explanation: adj. Relating to sight; easily understood through images. (perception/communication)
example: The presentation included many visual aids.
She is a very visual learner.
The artist's visual style is distinctive.

vn_meaning: tính từ: quan trọng; thiết yếu; sống còn
eng_explanation: adj. Absolutely necessary or important; essential for life. (importance)
example: Water is vital for survival.
He played a vital role in the project.
The information was vital to the investigation.

vn_meaning: danh từ: vitamin (chất dinh dưỡng)
eng_explanation: n. An organic compound essential for nutrition. (biology/health)
example: Oranges are a good source of vitamin C.
She takes a daily vitamin supplement.
A lack of vitamin D can cause health problems.

vn_meaning: tính từ: bằng giọng nói; phát ra tiếng; mạnh mẽ trong việc bày tỏ ý kiến
eng_explanation: adj. Relating to the voice; expressing opinions freely. (sound/expression)
example: She has a beautiful vocal range.
He was very vocal about his concerns.
The group was vocal in its support of the cause.

vn_meaning: Khả năng nói, tiếng nói (vocal ability); tiếng nói (speech); (nói chuyện); (từ ngữ).
eng_explanation: Voice refers to the ability to speak or hear, encompassing vocal expression and sound.
example: The singer had a powerful voice.
She used her voice to express her emotions.
The debate was dominated by the speaker's voice.

vn_meaning: Độ lớn, cường độ (sound/light); mức độ (tức độ).
eng_explanation: Volume describes the intensity or loudness of sound or light.
example: The orchestra played at a high volume.
The room was set to a low volume.
The volume of the music was impressive.

vn_meaning: Tự nguyện, có ý chí (tự do); tự do (tức độ).
eng_explanation: Voluntary means done willingly and without obligation.
example: The employees chose to participate in the voluntary training program.
She made a voluntary donation to charity.
The decision was made voluntarily.

vn_meaning: Hỗ trợ, tham gia (để giúp đỡ, làm việc).
eng_explanation: Volunteer means to offer one's time or skills to a cause or organization.
example: He volunteered at the local soup kitchen.
She is a dedicated volunteer for environmental protection.
Many people volunteer their time to help those in need.

vn_meaning: Bầu cử, bỏ phiếu (tức độ).
eng_explanation: Vote is the act of casting a ballot to choose a candidate or party.
example: The election was held with a large number of votes.
She cast her vote in the upcoming election.
The results of the vote were announced.

vn_meaning: Bầu cử, bỏ phiếu (tức độ).
eng_explanation: Voting refers to the process of selecting representatives or leaders through a vote.
example: The country held a democratic voting system.
The results of the election were a close voting.
The citizens participated in the voting process.

vn_meaning: Lời hứa, tuyên bố (tức độ).
eng_explanation: A vow is a solemn promise or declaration.
example: He made a solemn vow to never betray his friends.
She made a vow to succeed in her career.
The treaty was sealed with a solemn vow.

vn_meaning: Khả năng bị tổn thương, dễ bị ảnh hưởng (tức độ).
eng_explanation: Vulnerability refers to a state of being susceptible to harm or negative influence.
example: The elderly woman was vulnerable to scams.
The company needs to protect its vulnerabilities.
She displayed a vulnerable expression.

vn_meaning: Dễ bị tổn thương, dễ bị ảnh hưởng (tức độ).
eng_explanation: Vulnerability means being susceptible to harm or negative influence.
example: The homeless population is particularly vulnerable to the cold.
The company must address its vulnerabilities in cybersecurity.
She was vulnerable to manipulation.

vn_meaning: Lương, thu nhập (tức độ).
eng_explanation: Wage refers to the payment made to an employee for their work.
example: The workers are demanding a higher wage.
The company is investing in new technologies to improve its wage.
He earned a good wage for his job.

vn_meaning: động từ: đợi; chờ (một sự kiện, người).
eng_explanation: verb (intransitive): to remain in a particular place or position until something happens.
example: I will wait for you at the station.
Please wait your turn.
She waited patiently for the bus.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người phục vụ trong nhà hàng, quán ăn.
eng_explanation: noun: a person who serves food and drinks in a restaurant.
example: The waiter brought us the menu.
We tipped the waiter generously.
He worked as a waiter at a busy hotel.

vn_meaning: động từ: đánh thức; thức dậy; (cây) ra hoa.
eng_explanation: verb: to cause someone or something to stop sleeping; to become conscious.
example: Please wake me up at 7 am.
The alarm clock woke him up early.
The flowers woke after the rain.

vn_meaning: động từ: đi bộ; (vận động) bước đi.
eng_explanation: verb: to move at a pace without running, using your feet.
example: I enjoy walking in the park.
She walked to the store.
He walked his dog every morning.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bức tường; hàng rào; (tính từ) tường.
eng_explanation: noun: a vertical barrier, typically made of stone, brick, or concrete.
example: The wall is very high.
He leaned against the wall.
They built a new wall around the garden.

vn_meaning: động từ: lang thang; đi lung tung; (về tâm trí) suy nghĩ ngẫu nhiên.
eng_explanation: verb: to move about aimlessly and without a clear destination.
example: The children wandered through the forest.
He wandered around the city looking for a bookstore.
Her thoughts wandered during the lecture.

vn_meaning: động từ: muốn; cần thiết; (cảm xúc) ao ước.
eng_explanation: verb: to have a desire or need for something.
example: I want a cup of coffee.
She wants to travel the world.
He wants a new car.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chiến tranh; cuộc xung đột vũ trang.
eng_explanation: noun: a state of armed conflict between different nations.
example: The war lasted for many years.
They fought bravely in the war.
War causes immense suffering.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khoa, bệnh viện; (tính từ) thuộc khoa.
eng_explanation: noun: a division of a hospital; a room or area for a sick or injured person.
example: She is being treated in the surgical ward.
The children's ward is brightly decorated.
He was assigned to the neurology ward.

vn_meaning: danh từ: kho chứa hàng; nhà kho.
eng_explanation: noun: a large building used for storing goods.
