example: The warehouse is full of boxes.
They shipped the goods to the warehouse.
The warehouse was damaged in the storm.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chiến tranh; sự giao tranh (quân sự).
eng_explanation: n. the activity of fighting in a war; warfare.
example: The country was devastated by years of intense warfare.
Modern warfare relies heavily on technology.
Diplomacy is often preferred over warfare.

vn_meaning: tính từ: ấm áp; động từ: làm ấm.
eng_explanation: adj. having or producing a comfortable level of heat; v. make (something) warm.
example: The sun felt warm on my skin.
She wrapped herself in a warm blanket.
Please warm the milk before adding it to the baby's bottle.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự làm ấm; tính từ: làm ấm.
eng_explanation: n. the act of making something warm; adj. causing a gradual increase in temperature.
example: Global warming is a serious threat.
The warming trend is concerning scientists.
The house needed a good warming after the cold night.

vn_meaning: động từ: cảnh báo, báo trước.
eng_explanation: v. to notify (someone) of a potential danger or problem.
example: I warned him not to go near the edge.
The weather forecast warned of heavy rain.
Please warn your colleagues about the meeting.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lời cảnh báo, cảnh báo.
eng_explanation: n. a statement or action intended to indicate a potential danger or problem.
example: The sign gave a clear warning about the slippery road.
He ignored the warning signs.
The doctor gave her a warning about her health.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lệnh, giấy phép; động từ: bảo đảm, chứng thực.
eng_explanation: n. an official document giving the right to do something; v. guarantee or assure.
example: The police obtained a warrant to search the house.
The company warrants its products for one year.
His actions do not warrant such a harsh punishment.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chiến binh, người chiến đấu.
eng_explanation: n. a person skilled in warfare; a fighter.
example: He was a brave warrior in the ancient battles.
The warrior stood ready for the fight.
She admired the warrior's courage and strength.

vn_meaning: động từ: rửa; danh từ: lượt rửa, sự rửa.
eng_explanation: v. to clean something by using water or other liquid; n. an instance of washing.
example: I need to wash the dishes.
She took a quick wash in the sink.
The rain gave the city a good wash.

vn_meaning: danh từ: việc rửa, hành động rửa; vật để rửa.
eng_explanation: n. the act of washing something; something used for washing.
example: The washing machine is broken.
She left her clothes in the washing.
After a long day, a warm washing feels good.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lãng phí; động từ: lãng phí, bỏ phí.
eng_explanation: n. an act of using or expending something carelessly; v. use or expend carelessly.
example: Don't waste food.
We need to reduce waste in our factory.
It would be a waste of time to argue with him.

vn_meaning: danh từ: vũ khí (dùng để tấn công hoặc phòng thủ); công cụ (để đạt được mục đích)
eng_explanation: n. An instrument used for attack or defense; a means of achieving a goal. [C]
example: The soldier carried a heavy weapon.
Education is a powerful weapon against ignorance.
Nuclear weapons pose a serious threat to global security.

vn_meaning: động từ: mặc (quần áo, trang sức); hao mòn (do sử dụng); biểu lộ (cảm xúc)
eng_explanation: v. To have clothes on; to deteriorate through use; to display (an emotion). [I/T]
example: She likes to wear bright colors.
The tires will wear out quickly if you drive aggressively.
He wears a smile on his face.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thời tiết; động từ: chịu đựng, vượt qua (khó khăn)
eng_explanation: n. The state of the atmosphere; v. To endure or survive a difficult situation. [C/I]
example: The weather is beautiful today.
We weathered the storm successfully.
Farmers depend on the weather for a good harvest.

vn_meaning: động từ: dệt (vải, giỏ); đan (tóc, câu chuyện); xen vào
eng_explanation: v. To interlace threads or strands to create fabric; to create by interlacing. [T]
example: She can weave beautiful baskets.
The storyteller wove a captivating tale.
He wove his way through the crowd.

vn_meaning: danh từ: mạng nhện; mạng lưới (internet, thông tin)
eng_explanation: n. A network of threads made by a spider; the World Wide Web. [C]
example: The spider spun a delicate web.
I found the information on the web.
The company has a strong online web presence.

vn_meaning: danh từ: trang web (trên internet)
eng_explanation: n. A collection of related web pages accessible through the internet. [C]
example: This website provides useful information.
I created a website for my business.
The company redesigned its website.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đám cưới
eng_explanation: n. A ceremony celebrating the marriage of two people. [C]
example: The wedding was beautiful and romantic.
They are planning their wedding for next year.
She wore a stunning white dress at the wedding.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thứ Tư
eng_explanation: n. The fourth day of the week. [C]
example: I have a meeting on Wednesday.
Wednesday is my favorite day of the week.
The market is closed on Wednesday mornings.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cỏ dại; động từ: nhổ cỏ
eng_explanation: n. A wild plant growing where it is not wanted; v. To remove weeds. [C/T]
example: The garden is full of weeds.
I need to weed the flower beds.
She uses a special spray to kill weeds.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tuần (7 ngày)
eng_explanation: n. A period of seven days. [C]
example: I have a busy week ahead.
We go on vacation every week.
This week's weather forecast is sunny.

vn_meaning: The period of time from Friday evening to Sunday evening.
eng_explanation: A period of leisure time, typically involving recreation and relaxation.
example: I look forward to the weekend.
We had a relaxing weekend at the beach.

vn_meaning: Occurring every week.
eng_explanation: Regularly scheduled, happening on a weekly basis.
example: We receive the weekly sales report.
The company holds weekly meetings.

vn_meaning: tải
eng_explanation: To determine the mass or quantity of an object.
example: Please weigh the package before shipping.
The scale showed the weight of the car.

vn_meaning: The measure of how much something weighs.
eng_explanation: The amount of mass an object possesses.
example: The weight of the box was 5 kilograms.
The product has a high weight.

vn_meaning: thủ
eng_explanation: Distinct from the usual or expected.
example: That's a weird sight!
He has a peculiar habit of collecting rocks.

vn_meaning: hân
eng_explanation: To make someone feel comfortable and accepted.
example: We received a warm welcome to the new office.
The company is offering a welcome package.

vn_meaning: ưu
eng_explanation: The provision of support and assistance to people.
example: The government is working to improve the welfare of the elderly.
The charity provides welfare services to the homeless.

vn_meaning: A place where water flows freely.
eng_explanation: A natural or artificial channel for water.
example: The well is located in the countryside.
The water from the well is used for irrigation.

vn_meaning: tâm
eng_explanation: A state of physical, mental, and emotional health.
example: Promoting well-being is a key goal of healthcare.
The company offers wellness programs to its employees.

vn_meaning: đất
eng_explanation: The western side of a geographical area.
example: The city is located in the west of the country.
We traveled west to see the mountains.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phương Tây; tính từ: phương Tây (về văn hóa, địa lý, thời trang)
eng_explanation: adj./n.: Relating to the Western world or its culture.
example: He wore a western-style shirt.
The western part of the country is very rural.
She has a strong interest in western art.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nước; tính từ: ướt; trạng từ: ướt át
eng_explanation: adj./n./adv.: Covered or saturated with liquid; damp.
example: The floor was wet from the rain.
He had a wet towel around his neck.
The song had a wet and mournful sound.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cái gì; trạng từ: gì (hỏi)
eng_explanation: pron.: Used to ask about or identify something.
example: What is your name?
What are you doing?
I don't know what to say.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bất cứ cái gì; trạng từ: bất cứ cái gì (hỏi hoặc diễn tả)
eng_explanation: pron.: Used to express an unspecified or indifferent choice.
example: Whatever you want, I'll buy it.
I don't care what happens.
Whatever the reason, I'm leaving.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bất cứ cái gì (hỏi hoặc diễn tả, mạnh mẽ hơn 'whatever')
eng_explanation: adv.: Used to express that something does not exist or happen at all.
example: There was no whatsoever chance of him winning.
Whatsoever effort will be made to prevent the disaster.
It is not whatsoever important to me.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lúa mì
eng_explanation: n.: A cereal grain, often ground into flour for bread.
example: Wheat is a staple food in many countries.
She baked a loaf of wheat bread.
The fields were golden with wheat.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bánh xe; tính từ: bánh xe (về hình dạng)
eng_explanation: n./adj.: A circular device with an axle, used for rotating.
example: The car needs a new wheel.
The wheel of fortune.
A wheelbarrow is a useful tool.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thời gian; trạng từ: khi
eng_explanation: adv./n.: At what time; during what period.
example: When will you arrive?
I don't know when he will be here.
During when the war was fought.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: bất cứ khi nào
eng_explanation: adv.: Each time that; as soon as.
example: I'll call you whenever I have time.
Whenever it rains, I stay home.
Whenever you need help, just ask.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nơi; trạng từ: ở đâu
eng_explanation: adv./n.:  At what place; in what location.
example: Where are you going?
I don't know where to find it.
The where of the mystery remains unknown.

vn_meaning: liên từ: trong khi, còn trong khi đó (để đưa ra sự đối lập); từ nối: trong khi đó (để giới thiệu một sự kiện hoặc tình huống).
eng_explanation: Conjunction: Introducing a contrast or qualification; used to state something in contrast.
example: Whereas the company had initially projected losses, it ultimately achieved a significant profit.
Whereas some prefer coffee, others favor tea.
The contract stipulated certain conditions, whereas the agreement outlined alternative procedures.

vn_meaning: giới từ: bằng cách nào, bởi cái gì (để giới thiệu phương tiện hoặc cách thức).
eng_explanation: Preposition: By means of which; introducing the method or instrument by which something is done.
example: The law was amended whereby citizens gained greater rights.
The process is designed whereby errors are automatically detected.
He signed the document whereby he agreed to the terms.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: bất cứ nơi nào, ở đâu.
eng_explanation: Adverb: In or to whatever place; at any place.
example: Wherever you go, I’ll always remember our time together.
She travels wherever her work takes her.
Wherever there’s a need, he’s always willing to help.

vn_meaning: liên từ: liệu có hay không, dù có hay không (để đưa ra sự lựa chọn hoặc nghi ngờ).
eng_explanation: Conjunction: Expressing doubt or choice between alternatives; if or whether.
example: I’m not sure whether to accept the offer.
He questioned whether she was telling the truth.
The question is whether we have enough resources.

vn_meaning: đại từ quan hệ: cái gì, nào (để thay thế danh từ và giới thiệu thêm thông tin).
eng_explanation: Pronoun: Relating to a specific thing previously mentioned; used to single out one.
example: This is the book which I borrowed from the library.
The car, which is red, is parked outside.
Which option do you prefer?

vn_meaning: liên từ: trong khi (để chỉ thời gian đồng thời); đại từ quan hệ: trong khi đó (để đưa ra sự đối lập).
eng_explanation: Conjunction: During the time that; at the same time as. Pronoun: Despite the fact that.
example: While I was cooking, she was setting the table.
He smiled while listening to the music.
While some disagree, most support the proposal.

vn_meaning: liên từ: trong khi (tương tự như 'while').
eng_explanation: Conjunction: During the time that; at the same time as (formal).
example: Whilst I appreciate your efforts, the results are disappointing.
She continued reading whilst waiting for the bus.
Whilst the weather was cold, the atmosphere was warm.

vn_meaning: động từ: quất, đánh (bằng roi); động từ: đánh bại (trong cuộc thi); danh từ: roi, quất.
eng_explanation: Verb: To strike with a lash; to defeat decisively. Noun: A long, flexible strap used for striking.
example: The cowboy used a whip to control the horses.
The team whipped them in the final game.
He carried a whip to herd the sheep.

vn_meaning: động từ: thì thầm, nói khẽ; danh từ: tiếng thì thầm.
eng_explanation: Verb: To speak very softly using one's breath. Noun: A soft, hushed utterance.
example: She whispered a secret in his ear.
I heard a whisper in the dark.
The wind made a whispering sound through the trees.

vn_meaning: tính từ: trắng; danh từ: màu trắng.
eng_explanation: Adjective: Of the color of snow; lacking color. Noun: The color white.
example: The snow was white and sparkling.
She wore a white dress.
He painted the walls white.

vn_meaning: tính từ: phổ biến rộng rãi (một vấn đề, ý tưởng, bệnh tật); lan rộng (phạm vi)
eng_explanation: adj. Existing or occurring in many places; prevalent. (Also: extensive)
example: The use of smartphones is now widespread.
Widespread flooding caused significant damage.
There is widespread concern about climate change.

vn_meaning: danh từ: góa phụ (người vợ mất chồng)
eng_explanation: n. A woman who has lost her husband by death. (Also: a female whose spouse is deceased)
example: She became a widow at a young age.
The charity supports widows and orphans.
He left everything to his widow in his will.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chiều rộng (của một vật)
eng_explanation: n. The measurement or extent of something from side to side. (Also: breadth)
example: The width of the road is ten meters.
Measure the width and length of the room.
The table's width is not enough for my needs.

vn_meaning: danh từ: vợ (người phụ nữ đã kết hôn)
eng_explanation: n. A woman united to another in marriage. (Also: a married woman)
example: He is a loving husband and father.
She is my wife and best friend.
They celebrated their 50th wedding anniversary with their wife and family.

vn_meaning: tính từ: hoang dã (động vật, thiên nhiên); không được kiểm soát (hành vi); dại (mắt); mạnh mẽ (cảm xúc); sôi nổi (tiệc tùng).
eng_explanation: adj. Living or growing in a natural state; not tamed or cultivated. (Also: uncontrolled)
example: The lion is a wild animal.
He had a wild imagination.
They had a wild party last night.

vn_meaning: danh từ: động vật hoang dã (tập hợp các loài động vật sống tự do trong tự nhiên)
eng_explanation: n. Animals living in their natural environment; undomesticated animals. (Also: fauna)
example: We went on a safari to see the wildlife.
Protecting wildlife is crucial for biodiversity.
The documentary showcased the beauty of African wildlife.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ý chí, quyết tâm; di chúc; ý muốn; ; động từ: quyết định, mong muốn; để lại tài sản bằng di chúc.
eng_explanation: n. The faculty of conscious and deliberate action; a legal document. v. To decide or determine.
example: She has a strong will to succeed.
He left his fortune to charity in his will.
I will always remember our time together.

vn_meaning: tính từ: sẵn lòng, tình nguyện (làm điều gì đó)
eng_explanation: adj. Ready, eager, or prepared to do something. (Also: agreeable)
example: She was willing to help with the project.
Are you willing to give it another try?
He is a willing participant in the experiment.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự sẵn lòng, sự tình nguyện (làm điều gì đó)
eng_explanation: n. The quality of being prepared to do something; readiness. (Also: consent)
example: Her willingness to compromise was admirable.
The company showed a willingness to negotiate.
He expressed his willingness to accept the challenge.

vn_meaning: động từ: thắng (trong cuộc thi, trò chơi); giành được (phần thưởng, sự ủng hộ)
eng_explanation: v. To achieve victory; to gain something desired. (Also: succeed)
example: Our team managed to win the game.
She won a scholarship to study abroad.
He hopes to win the election.

vn_meaning: sương
eng_explanation: A wind is a moving air mass.
example: The wind blew through the trees.
I felt a strong wind on my face.

vn_meaning: cửa sổ
eng_explanation: A window is a pane in a wall or door that allows light and air.
example: I need to clean the window.
The window is broken and needs repair.

vn_meaning: A fermented drink made from grapes.
eng_explanation: Wine is a drink made from grapes, typically fermented.
example: I enjoy a glass of red wine with dinner.
The vineyard produced a bountiful harvest of wine.

vn_meaning: cánh
eng_explanation: The wing is a part of an insect or bird used for flight.
example: The bird had a damaged wing.
The airplane needed a new wing for its design.

vn_meaning: người chiến thắng
eng_explanation: A winner is the person or team who has achieved the highest level of success.
example: The team won the championship.
She was the winner of the contest.

vn_meaning: mùa đông
eng_explanation: Winter is the season of cold weather and shorter days.
example: The winter is coming quickly.
We enjoy the snow in the winter.

vn_meaning: lau
eng_explanation: Wiping is a method of cleaning a surface with a cloth.
example: I wiped the table after dinner.
She wiped her hands after handling the food.

vn_meaning: A thin, flexible metal cable.
eng_explanation: Wire is a thin, flexible metal cable used for electrical connections.
example: The electrician used a lot of wire to connect the lights.
The speaker had a damaged wire.

vn_meaning: Knowledge and experience that leads to good judgment.
eng_explanation: Wisdom is the ability to understand and apply knowledge effectively.
example: He sought wisdom from his elders.
Her wisdom was evident in her calm demeanor.

vn_meaning: Having or showing experience, knowledge, and good judgment.
eng_explanation: Wisdom is the quality of being wise and knowledgeable.
example: He was a wise and respected leader.
She is a wise and thoughtful person.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ước muốn; tính từ: mong muốn (rất)
eng_explanation: Noun: a desire or hope. Adjective: wishing or desiring intensely.
example: I wish you a happy birthday.
She has a strong wish to travel the world.
He wished he had studied harder.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự thông minh nhanh nhẹn; tính từ: hài hước, tinh nghịch
eng_explanation: Noun: cleverness and humor. Adjective: amusingly clever or quick-witted.
example: He had a sharp wit and could always make people laugh.
Her wit was admired by all who knew her.
The comedian's wit was the highlight of the show.

vn_meaning: giới từ: cùng, với; trạng từ: cùng, với
eng_explanation: Preposition: together with. Adverb: in or along with.
example: I went to the store with my friend.
She painted the picture with bright colors.
He worked with a team of experts.

vn_meaning: động từ: rút, lui; (về tài chính) rút tiền
eng_explanation: Verb: to remove or take back. (Finance) to remove money from an account.
example: Please withdraw your money from the ATM.
The company decided to withdraw its investment.
He withdrew from the competition.

vn_meaning: danh từ: việc rút, việc lui; (về tài chính) tiền rút ra
eng_explanation: Noun: the act of withdrawing. (Finance) money withdrawn from an account.
example: The bank reported a large withdrawal from the account.
She made a sudden withdrawal of her savings.
The withdrawal process was quick and easy.

vn_meaning: chi giới từ: trong, bên trong; (về thời gian) trong, trong khoảng
eng_explanation: Preposition: inside or within a limit. (Time) within a period of time.
example: The package is within the box.
The deadline is within a week.
He lives within walking distance of the school.

vn_meaning: chi giới từ: không, mà không; trạng từ: không, mà không
eng_explanation: Preposition: not having. Adverb: without.
example: I went to the party without an invitation.
She wrote the book without any help.
He traveled the world without a map.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người chứng kiến; động từ: làm chứng
eng_explanation: Noun: a person who sees something happen. Verb: to testify in court.
example: He was a witness to the crime.
The police need a reliable witness.
She will witness the signing of the treaty.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người phụ nữ
eng_explanation: Noun: an adult female human being.
example: She is a strong and independent woman.
The woman smiled warmly.
Women's rights are important.

vn_meaning: danh từ: điều kỳ diệu; (cảm xúc) ngạc nhiên, thắc mắc
eng_explanation: Noun: something surprising or marvelous. Verb: to be astonished. Emotion: surprise or amazement.
example: It was a medical wonder.
I wonder why he is late.
She looked at the stars in wonder.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tuyệt vời, diệu kỳ (thể hiện sự thích thú cao); trạng từ: tuyệt vời, thật là tuyệt vời.
eng_explanation: adjective/adverb: inspiring delight, pleasure, or admiration; extremely good.
example: The sunset over the ocean was absolutely wonderful.
She gave a wonderful performance in the play.
It was a wonderful opportunity to meet him.

vn_meaning: danh từ: gỗ (vật liệu); rừng (khu vực có nhiều cây); (từ lóng) khu vực nghèo khó.
eng_explanation: noun: material; hard fibrous substance from trees; a small area of wooded land.
example: The table is made of oak wood.
We went for a walk in the wood.
He grew up in a tough wood.

vn_meaning: tính từ: làm bằng gỗ; thuộc về gỗ.
eng_explanation: adjective: made or consisting of wood; relating to wood.
example: She bought a wooden chair for the garden.
The house had wooden floors.
He carved a small wooden bird.

vn_meaning: danh từ: len (sợi); áo len.
eng_explanation: noun: a soft fibrous substance obtained from sheep; clothing made of wool.
example: She knitted a sweater from wool.
The sheep's wool was very soft.
He wore a warm wool hat.

vn_meaning: danh từ: từ; lời nói; hứa hẹn; tin đồn; (từ lóng) lời khuyên, lời cảnh báo.
eng_explanation: noun: a unit of language; a promise or assurance; a rumor.
example: I don't know the word for that in English.
He gave her his word that he would be there.
A word of advice: be careful.

vn_meaning: danh từ: công việc; sự làm việc; xưởng; tác phẩm nghệ thuật; (từ lóng) hiệu quả, tác dụng.
eng_explanation: noun/verb: activity involving mental or physical effort; to perform a task.
example: She loves her work as a teacher.
He needs to work harder to pass the exam.
The painting is a work of art.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người lao động; công nhân.
eng_explanation: noun: a person who performs manual or mental labor, especially for wages.
example: The factory employs hundreds of workers.
He is a skilled worker in the construction industry.
The workers went on strike for better pay.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lực lượng lao động.
eng_explanation: noun: the body of people available for work in a particular industry or area.
example: The company is expanding its workforce.
The region has a skilled workforce.
The workforce is becoming increasingly diverse.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đang làm việc; hoạt động; có hiệu lực; (từ lóng) có tác dụng.
eng_explanation: adjective/verb: engaged in work; operating or functioning; in effect.
example: She has a working computer.
He is working on a new project.
The agreement is now working.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bài tập thể dục; buổi tập thể dục; (từ lóng) sự luyện tập, rèn luyện.
eng_explanation: noun: a period of vigorous exercise; training or practice.
example: She does a workout at the gym every morning.
He had a good workout after work.
It takes a lot of workout to improve your skills.

vn_meaning: danh từ: giá trị (của vật, người); tính từ: xứng đáng (với)
eng_explanation: n/adj: having value or importance; deserving. (worth, adj)
example: The painting is worth a lot of money.
It's not worth the risk.
He is worth my trust.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đáng làm, có ý nghĩa, bổ ích (việc gì đó)
eng_explanation: adj: providing satisfaction or benefit; valuable enough to be done. (worthwhile, adj)
example: It was a worthwhile experience.
The project proved to be worthwhile.
Is it worthwhile to continue?

vn_meaning: tính từ: xứng đáng, đáng trọng, có giá trị (để được nhận)
eng_explanation: adj: having qualities or attributes that deserve recognition. (worthy, adj)
example: He is a worthy opponent.
She is worthy of our respect.
A worthy cause.

vn_meaning: động từ khiếm khuyết: sẽ, thường dùng trong câu điều kiện, lời đề nghị lịch sự, hoặc diễn tả thói quen trong quá khứ
eng_explanation: v.aux: used to express a conditional mood or polite request. (would, v.aux)
example: I would like a cup of coffee, please.
If I had the money, I would travel.
He would often visit his grandmother.

vn_meaning: danh từ: vết thương; động từ: làm bị thương, quấn
eng_explanation: n: injury; v: to injure; to coil or turn around. (wound, n/v)
example: He suffered a serious wound in the battle.
She wound the bandage around his arm.
The clock needs to be wound.

vn_meaning: thán từ: ồ, tuyệt vời!
eng_explanation: interj: an expression of surprise or admiration. (wow, interj)
example: Wow, that's amazing!
"Wow!" she exclaimed.
The performance was a real 'wow' moment.

vn_meaning: động từ: gói, bọc, quấn
eng_explanation: v: to cover or enclose in something. (wrap, v)
example: Please wrap the gift.
She wrapped her arms around him.
Wrap a scarf around your neck.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cổ tay
eng_explanation: n: the part of the arm between the hand and the elbow. (wrist, n)
example: He broke his wrist.
She wore a bracelet on her wrist.
A wrist watch.

vn_meaning: động từ: viết
eng_explanation: v: to mark letters or symbols on a surface. (write, v)
example: I need to write a letter.
She writes novels.
Can you write your name here?

vn_meaning: danh từ: người viết, nhà văn
eng_explanation: n: a person who writes books, articles, or other texts. (writer, n)
example: He is a famous writer.
She aspires to be a writer.
The writer's latest novel is a bestseller.

vn_meaning: Việc viết, sáng tác, hoặc sử dụng ngôn ngữ để tạo ra các tác phẩm.
eng_explanation: Writing involves creating works using language.
example: I enjoy writing stories.
The writer is struggling with the deadline.
She’s a talented writer.

vn_meaning: Đã viết, thường dùng để chỉ một tác phẩm đã hoàn thành.
eng_explanation: Written means completed and published.
example: The article was written by a renowned journalist.
I wrote a letter to my friend.
The manuscript is ready to be submitted.

vn_meaning: Không đúng, sai, hoặc không phù hợp.
eng_explanation: Wrong means incorrect or inappropriate.
example: That's a wrong answer.
He made a wrong decision.
The report contains several errors.

vn_meaning: Một khu đất, thường dùng để chỉ một khu vực rộng lớn.
eng_explanation: A yard is a large plot of land.
example: We spent the afternoon in the yard.
The gardener trimmed the hedges in the yard.
The yard is perfect for a barbecue.

vn_meaning: Đúng, đồng ý, hoặc một cách thể hiện sự đồng tình.
eng_explanation: Yeah means 'okay' or 'right'.
example: Yeah, that's a great idea!
He said 'yeah' when asked about the problem.
I'm feeling good, yeah.

vn_meaning: Năm, một đơn vị thời gian.
eng_explanation: Year is a year.
example: In 2023, we will celebrate our birthday.
The year is ending quickly.
I'm looking forward to next year.

vn_meaning: Gào, phát ra tiếng lớn.
eng_explanation: To yell means to shout loudly.
example: The children yelled for help.
He yelled at the driver.
The loudspeaker yelled instructions.

vn_meaning: Vàng, màu cam.
eng_explanation: Yellow is a color.
example: The leaves are turning yellow.
She wore a yellow dress.
The sun is a bright shade of yellow.

vn_meaning: Có, đồng ý.
eng_explanation: Yes means 'yes'.
example: Do you want to go?
He said 'yes' to my invitation.
I'm happy to hear you say yes.

vn_meaning: Hôm qua, một ngày hôm qua.
eng_explanation: Yesterday is a day before today.
example: I went to the market yesterday.
We had a wonderful day yesterday.
He's been working hard all day yesterday.

vn_meaning: động từ (thường): vẫn còn; trạng từ: dù vậy; liên từ: nhưng
eng_explanation: conjunction/adverb: still; adverb: nevertheless; verb: continue to exist
example: I haven't finished my work, yet I'm going out.
Despite the rain, yet we enjoyed the picnic.
She still lives in that house, yet it needs repair.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sản lượng; kết quả; tính từ: cho ra; động từ: cho ra, mang lại
eng_explanation: verb: produce; noun: output; adjective: produce
example: The farm yielded a large harvest this year.
The experiment yielded valuable data.
The engine yielded a powerful roar.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người bạn; (cách cũ) người yêu; đại từ nhân xưng: bạn, anh, em, ông, bà, cô, chú
eng_explanation: pronoun: you (singular); noun: sweetheart (archaic)
example: Hello, you! How are you today?
I'm talking to you, not him.
She called him 'you' affectionately.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người trẻ tuổi; tính từ: trẻ, còn trẻ, mới lớn
eng_explanation: adjective: young; noun: a young person
example: The young children played in the park.
She is a young and talented artist.
He is a young man with a bright future.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người trẻ tuổi, tuổi trẻ; cậu bé, cậu bé
eng_explanation: noun: a young person; a young boy
example: The youngster was eager to learn.
He is a promising youngster in the team.
The youngster enjoyed playing with his friends.

vn_meaning: tính từ: của bạn, của anh, của em, của ông, của bà, của cô, của chú
eng_explanation: possessive pronoun: your
example: Is this your book?
Your car is parked outside.
I love your smile.

vn_meaning: tính từ: của bạn, của anh, của em, của ông, của bà, của cô, của chú (dạng sở hữu)
eng_explanation: possessive pronoun: yours
example: That is your pen, not mine.
This house is yours now.
I believe that decision is yours to make.

vn_meaning: đại từ phản thân: bản thân, chính mình
eng_explanation: reflexive pronoun: yourself
example: Be careful not to hurt yourself.
You should take care of yourself.
Help yourself to some cake.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tuổi trẻ, thời trẻ; thanh niên
eng_explanation: noun: youth; adolescence
example: The youth of today are very different.
He spent his youth traveling the world.
Youth is a time of great energy and enthusiasm.

vn_meaning: danh từ: số không; tính từ: bằng không, không
eng_explanation: noun: zero; adjective: zero
example: The temperature is zero degrees Celsius.
The balance is set to zero.
He scored zero points in the game.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khu vực (địa lý); vùng (không gian); cấp bậc (quân sự, thể thao); vùng nguy hiểm; vùng cấm; động từ: chia thành khu vực; phân vùng
eng_explanation: noun: an area or region with a particular characteristic; verb: to divide into zones.
example: The coastal zone is particularly vulnerable to rising sea levels.
The city is divided into several zones for traffic management.
He was placed in a high-performance training zone to improve his skills.

vn_meaning: điều tra
eng_explanation: To admit someone into a group or situation.
example: The university offered an admission to all qualified applicants.
She admitted she was nervous about the interview.
The company is seeking admission to the market.

vn_meaning: chấp nhận
eng_explanation: To formally allow someone to enter or participate.
example: The school admitted him to the team.
She admitted she had made a mistake.
The company admitted the error.

vn_meaning: lập trường thanh niên
eng_explanation: A young person in the transition period between childhood and adulthood.
example: The school counselor recommended an adolescent assessment.
She was an adolescent student in her class.
He is an adolescent with a bright future.

vn_meaning: To take on as one's own; to accept as one's own.
eng_explanation: To formally or secretly take on a responsibility or role.
example: The company decided to adopt a new strategy.
She adopted a new lifestyle.
He adopted the idea of volunteering.

vn_meaning: chuyển nhận
eng_explanation: The process of legally or informally placing a child with a new family.
example: The couple adopted a baby from a foster care system.
She adopted a child with a special need.
The adoption process can be lengthy and complex.

vn_meaning: người lớn
eng_explanation: An individual who is considered to be fully capable of making their own decisions and responsible for their actions.
example: He is an adult volunteer at the local charity.
She is an adult student at the university.
The company is looking for adult employees.

vn_meaning: tiến bộ
eng_explanation: To move forward in time or progress.
example: The project is advancing quickly.
She is advancing in her career.
The company is advancing its technology.

vn_meaning: More recent or superior; having improved.
eng_explanation: Showing a greater degree of skill or quality.
example: The new model is significantly advanced.
Her research is advanced in the field.
The technology is advanced in its capabilities.

vn_meaning: A benefit or advantage; a quality that helps someone succeed.
eng_explanation: A positive quality that gives someone an advantage.
example: The company has an advantage due to its strong brand.
He has an advantage in the competition.
The new policy offers an advantage to employees.

vn_meaning: phiêu lưu
eng_explanation: A thrilling and often dangerous journey or experience.
example: She embarked on an adventurous trip to Europe.
He enjoys adventures in the wilderness.
The story is an adventure filled with suspense.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hãng hàng không (giao thông); hàng không (lĩnh vực).
eng_explanation: airline (n.) - a company providing air transport services.
example: I booked my flight with a major airline.
The airline announced a delay due to bad weather.
She works for an airline as a flight attendant.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sân bay.
eng_explanation: airport (n.) - a place where aircraft take off and land.
example: We arrived at the airport three hours before our flight.
The airport is located just outside the city.
She works at the airport as a security officer.

vn_meaning: danh từ: báo động; chuông báo thức; (y học) tình trạng nguy hiểm; động từ: báo động.
eng_explanation: alarm (n./v.) - a warning signal; to warn of danger.
example: I set an alarm for 7:00 AM.
The fire alarm went off suddenly.
The doctor sounded an alarm about the patient's condition.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: mặc dù; dù cho.
eng_explanation: albeit (adv.) - although; even though.
example: She was tired, albeit happy to see her friends.
The project was successful, albeit challenging.
He accepted the offer, albeit reluctantly.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tuyển tập (ảnh, nhạc); đĩa nhạc.
eng_explanation: album (n.) - a collection of photographs or recordings.
example: She bought a new album by her favorite band.
He created a photo album of his vacation.
The album received critical acclaim.

vn_meaning: danh từ: rượu (chung); chất cồn.
eng_explanation: alcohol (n.) - a general term for intoxicating substances.
example: He drank too much alcohol at the party.
The police warned against drinking and driving.
Alcohol can have negative effects on your health.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người nghiện rượu; tính từ: có cồn; thuộc về rượu.
eng_explanation: alcoholic (n./adj.) - addicted to alcohol; containing alcohol.
example: He is an alcoholic and is seeking treatment.
This beverage is an alcoholic drink.
The alcoholic content of the beer is 5%.

vn_meaning: tính từ: cảnh giác; tỉnh táo; động từ: báo động; cảnh báo.
eng_explanation: alert (adj./v.) - watchful and quick to notice danger; to warn.
example: Stay alert for any suspicious activity.
The security system alerted them to the break-in.
She was alert and ready for the challenge.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người ngoài hành tinh; người nước ngoài; tính từ: thuộc về nước ngoài; xa lạ.
eng_explanation: alien (n./adj.) - a being from another planet; foreign; unfamiliar.
example: The movie featured an alien invasion.
He felt like an alien in a new country.
The concept was completely alien to her.

vn_meaning: động từ: căn chỉnh; sắp xếp thẳng hàng; phù hợp; thống nhất.
eng_explanation: align (v.) - to arrange things in a straight line; to be in agreement.
example: Please align the pictures on the wall.
Their goals are aligned with the company's vision.
The text needs to be aligned to the left margin.

vn_meaning: danh từ: quả táo (một loại trái cây)
eng_explanation: n. A round fruit with red, green, or yellow skin and white flesh. (botany)
example: She ate a red apple.
An apple a day keeps the doctor away.
Apple pie is my favorite dessert.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thích hợp; có thể áp dụng (cho một tình huống cụ thể)
eng_explanation: adj. Relevant or appropriate; able to be applied. (adjective)
example: The rules are applicable to all students.
This discount is not applicable to sale items.
The theory is applicable in many different contexts.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người nộp đơn; người ứng tuyển (cho một công việc, học bổng, v.v.)
eng_explanation: n. A person who formally requests something, such as a job or admission. (noun)
example: The company received many applications from qualified applicants.
Each applicant must submit a resume and cover letter.
The selection committee will interview the top applicants.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đơn xin việc; sự ứng dụng (của một lý thuyết, phương pháp); ứng dụng (phần mềm)
eng_explanation: n. A formal request; the act of putting something to a specific use. (noun)
example: She submitted her application for the scholarship.
This principle has a wide range of applications.
He downloaded a new mobile application.

vn_meaning: động từ: nộp đơn; áp dụng; sử dụng (một phương pháp, lý thuyết)
eng_explanation: v. To make a formal request; to put to a specific use. (verb)
example: She will apply for a visa.
Apply the cream to the affected area.
This rule applies to everyone.

vn_meaning: động từ: bổ nhiệm; chỉ định (ai đó vào một chức vụ)
eng_explanation: v. To officially choose someone for a job or position. (verb)
example: The president will appoint a new judge.
She was appointed head of the department.
He appointed a committee to investigate the matter.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cuộc hẹn; sự bổ nhiệm (vào một chức vụ)
eng_explanation: n. A scheduled meeting; the act of being appointed to a position. (noun)
example: I have a doctor's appointment tomorrow.
She received a prestigious appointment.
He kept his appointment with the lawyer.

vn_meaning: động từ: đánh giá cao; biết ơn; tăng giá trị (tài sản)
eng_explanation: v. To value highly; to be grateful for; to increase in value. (verb)
example: I appreciate your help.
She appreciates good music.
The value of the house has appreciated significantly.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự đánh giá cao; lòng biết ơn; sự tăng giá trị (tài sản)
eng_explanation: n. Gratitude; recognition of value; an increase in value. (noun)
example: He expressed his appreciation for their support.
The painting is growing in appreciation.
Show your appreciation by saying thank you.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cách tiếp cận; sự tiếp cận; lối vào; gần đến (thời gian, địa điểm); động từ: tiếp cận; đến gần; bắt đầu (một vấn đề)
eng_explanation: n. A way to deal with something; v. To come near; to begin to deal with. (noun/verb)
example: We need a new approach to this problem.
The car approached the intersection.
She approached me for help.

vn_meaning: hỏi
eng_explanation: To ask for something; to seek assistance.
example: I need to ask him if he's going to be late.
She asked me to help her with her homework.

vn_meaning: sleeping; unconscious.
eng_explanation: Resting in a state of unconsciousness.
example: The baby is asleep peacefully in his crib.
He fell asleep quickly after finishing his work.

vn_meaning: khía cạnh
eng_explanation: A characteristic or element of something.
example: The film has a complex aspect of storytelling.
The product's aspect is its durability.

vn_meaning: khát vọng
eng_explanation: A strong ambition or desire to succeed.
example: He has an unwavering aspiration to become a doctor.
Her aspiration was to travel the world.

vn_meaning: phấn đấu
eng_explanation: To desire something with great intensity.
example: He aspired to be a famous artist.
She aspired to a better life.

vn_meaning: vụ ám sát
eng_explanation: The deliberate killing of someone with the intention of causing harm.
example: The assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand sparked the war.
The assassin was apprehended at the scene.

vn_meaning: tấn công
eng_explanation: A violent attack or intrusion.
example: The police responded to a violent assault on the street.
He was subjected to a brutal assault.

vn_meaning: tập hợp
eng_explanation: To gather and arrange things together.
example: Let's assemble the furniture now.
The team assembled the report quickly.

vn_meaning: hội nghị
eng_explanation: The act of creating something by joining parts.
example: The factory's assembly line produced thousands of cars daily.
The assembly of the new computer was a complex process.

vn_meaning: khẳng định
eng_explanation: To make a statement or declaration.
example: He asserted his position on the issue.
She asserted her confidence in her abilities.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tháng Tám; tính từ: thuộc tháng Tám
eng_explanation: August (noun): The eighth month of the year; (adj): Relating to or occurring in August.
example: We plan to visit her in August.
The August heat can be intense.
He was born in August of 1985.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cô, dì, chú bác (nữ giới, chị hoặc em của bố mẹ)
eng_explanation: Aunt (noun): The sister of one's father or mother; or the wife of one's uncle.
example: I love spending time with my aunt.
My aunt gave me a lovely birthday present.
She's my mother's older sister, my aunt.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đích thực, xác thực, không giả mạo
eng_explanation: Authentic (adj): Genuine; real; not copied or false.
example: The restaurant serves authentic Italian cuisine.
Is this a genuine antique or a reproduction?
She wanted to experience the authentic culture of the region.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tác giả; động từ: viết, sáng tác
eng_explanation: Author (noun): The writer of a book, article, or text; (verb): To write or create.
example: She is the author of several bestselling novels.
Who is the author of this poem?
He authored a groundbreaking study on climate change.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thẩm quyền, quyền lực, uy quyền
eng_explanation: Authority (noun): The power or right to give orders and make decisions; expertise.
example: He has the authority to make that decision.
She is an authority on ancient history.
The police have no authority here.

vn_meaning: động từ: cho phép, ủy quyền
eng_explanation: Authorize (verb): To give official permission for something.
example: The manager authorized the purchase.
I need to authorize the payment.
The government authorized the construction of the new road.

vn_meaning: tiền tố: tự, chính nó (thường dùng trong các từ ghép)
eng_explanation: Prefix: Self; relating to or done by oneself or itself.
example: The car has an automatic transmission.
He wrote an autobiographical novel.
The system is designed to operate automatically.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tự động, máy móc, không cần điều khiển trực tiếp
eng_explanation: Automatic (adj): Operating without direct human control; done naturally.
example: The doors opened automatically.
She has an automatic response to stressful situations.
The coffee machine is fully automatic.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: tự động, một cách tự nhiên, không cần suy nghĩ
eng_explanation: Automatically (adv): Without conscious thought or effort; by itself.
example: The lights turned off automatically when we left.
He automatically assumed she was right.
The system updates automatically.

vn_meaning: danh từ: quyền tự chủ, quyền tự quyết
eng_explanation: Autonomy (noun): The right or condition of self-government; independence.
example: The region was granted a degree of autonomy.
She values her personal autonomy.
The company strives for operational autonomy.

vn_meaning: danh từ: quái vật, thú dữ (thường có kích thước lớn và hung dữ); người tàn bạo, kẻ xấu xa.
eng_explanation: n. A dangerous or frightening animal; a cruel or savage person. (n.)
example: The lion is a majestic beast.
He was described as a beast for his violent actions.
Stories of mythical beasts have been told for centuries.

vn_meaning: giới từ: bên dưới, thấp hơn; dưới mức; kém hơn; (vị trí địa lý) phía nam.
eng_explanation: prep. In or to a lower place or level; less than. (prep.)
example: The temperature is below freezing.
Her name is listed below his on the roster.
The basement is below the ground floor.

vn_meaning: danh từ: dây đai (để thắt lưng, máy móc); vùng, khu vực; đai truyền (máy móc).; động từ: thắt đai.
eng_explanation: n. A band of material around the waist; an area or region. (n./v.)
example: He wore a leather belt with his jeans.
The factory workers tightened their belts for safety.
The agricultural belt is vital to the economy.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ghế dài; ghế dự bị (thể thao); bàn làm việc của thợ thủ công.
eng_explanation: n. A long seat for several people; a group of judges in a court. (n.)
example: We sat on a park bench and enjoyed the sunshine.
The basketball player warmed up on the bench.
The judge presided over the case from the bench.

vn_meaning: danh từ: mốc chuẩn, tiêu chuẩn so sánh; động từ: đánh giá theo tiêu chuẩn.
eng_explanation: n. A standard or point of reference against which things may be compared. (n./v.)
example: This new product sets a benchmark for quality.
We need to benchmark our performance against competitors.
The company uses customer satisfaction as a benchmark.

vn_meaning: động từ: uốn cong, khuỵu; rẽ; cúi (người).; danh từ: chỗ ngoặt, khúc cua.
eng_explanation: v. To curve or angle; to lower the body from the waist. (v./n.)
example: The road bends sharply to the left.
He bent down to pick up the dropped coin.
The river makes a bend near the village.

vn_meaning: giới từ: bên dưới, phía dưới; thấp kém hơn; không đáng.
eng_explanation: prep. Under or below; less important than. (prep.)
example: The treasure was buried beneath the old oak tree.
She felt beneath her dignity to accept the apology.
The roots of the tree lie beneath the surface.

vn_meaning: tính từ: có lợi, có ích.
eng_explanation: adj. Advantageous; resulting in good. (adj.)
example: Exercise is beneficial to your health.
The new policy will be beneficial to small businesses.
A good night's sleep is beneficial for concentration.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người hưởng lợi, người thụ hưởng.
eng_explanation: n. A person who receives benefits, especially from an insurance policy. (n.)
example: She is the beneficiary of her grandfather's will.
The charity's beneficiaries are children in need.
He named his wife as the beneficiary of his life insurance.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lợi ích, sự hưởng lợi; tiền trợ cấp; phúc lợi.; động từ: được hưởng lợi, có lợi cho.
eng_explanation: n. An advantage or profit; financial assistance. (n./v.)
example: The benefits of exercise are numerous.
She receives unemployment benefits.
The new law will benefit the entire community.

vn_meaning: uốn cong, nghiêng
eng_explanation: To curve or bend; to turn awkwardly.
example: The tree bent under the wind.
He bent over to pick up the fallen leaf.

vn_meaning: đối tượng, khối lượng, hoặc một phần của nó
eng_explanation: A unit of something, often a physical object or a group of objects.
example: The block of wood was heavy.
The block of ice was difficult to move.

vn_meaning: trang web cá nhân, blog
eng_explanation: A website primarily used for publishing diary-like entries.
example: She wrote a blog about her travels.
He's a popular blogger on social media.

vn_meaning: màu tóc vàng
eng_explanation: Having blonde hair.
example: She has beautiful blonde hair.
The blonde girl was laughing.

vn_meaning: máu
eng_explanation: The fluid that carries oxygen to the body.
example: The doctor drew blood from him.
She spilled a lot of blood when she cried.

vn_meaning: hát, thổi, hoặc tạo ra gió
eng_explanation: To blow, to create a gust of wind.
example: The wind blew hard.
He blew a kiss to her.

vn_meaning: xanh
eng_explanation: A color that represents calmness and peace.
example: The sky is blue.
She wore a blue dress.

vn_meaning: bảng, tấm ván
eng_explanation: A flat surface, often used for games or writing.
example: He placed the board on the table.
The board game was very popular.

vn_meaning: tự hào, ca ngợi
eng_explanation: To boast about something, to show pride.
example: He boasted about his new car.
She boasted about her success.

vn_meaning: tàu
eng_explanation: A vessel used for transportation on water.
example: We sailed on the boat.
He bought a new boat.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thân thể (cơ thể con người); danh từ: cơ quan (của một tổ chức); danh từ: khối vật chất (chung chung); động từ: cung cấp tài chính cho (một dự án)
eng_explanation: noun: the physical form of a person; noun: the main part of something; verb: to finance.
example: The doctor examined the patient's body.
The company's body of work is impressive.
The project will body the new research initiative.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ngực (của phụ nữ); danh từ: ngực (của nam giới, ít dùng)
eng_explanation: noun: the front part of the chest, especially of a woman.
example: She wore a dress that accentuated her breasts.
The surgeon examined the patient's breast for any abnormalities.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hơi thở
eng_explanation: noun: the air inhaled or exhaled with each respiration.
example: He took a deep breath before speaking.
The patient's breath was shallow and rapid.
Hold your breath.

vn_meaning: động từ: thở
eng_explanation: verb: to inhale and exhale air.
example: Remember to breathe deeply during yoga.
I can barely breathe in this polluted air.
She stopped breathing for a moment.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự thở; tính từ: liên quan đến sự thở
eng_explanation: noun: the process of inhaling and exhaling; adjective: relating to respiration.
example: Breathing exercises can help reduce stress.
The breathing apparatus allowed him to work underwater.
The breathing rate increased with exertion.

vn_meaning: động từ: sinh sản; danh từ: giống (động vật, cây trồng)
eng_explanation: verb: to produce offspring; noun: a category of animals or plants.
example: Farmers breed cows for milk and meat.
This breed of dog is known for its loyalty.
They are trying to breed a new variety of tomato.

vn_meaning: danh từ: viên gạch
eng_explanation: noun: a rectangular block of baked clay used for building.
example: The house was built of red brick.
He laid the bricks carefully.
They needed to buy more bricks for the wall.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cô dâu
eng_explanation: noun: a woman who is about to be married or is newly married.
example: The bride looked beautiful in her white dress.
The bride and groom exchanged vows.
She was escorted down the aisle by her father.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cây cầu; động từ: bắc cầu; động từ: kết nối (giữa hai thứ)
eng_explanation: noun: a structure carrying a road, path, or railway across a river, road, or other obstacle; verb: to connect or link.
example: The bridge spans the river.
They plan to bridge the gap between the two departments.
The new technology will bridge the digital divide.

vn_meaning: tính từ: ngắn gọn; danh từ: bản tóm tắt; động từ: tóm tắt
eng_explanation: adjective: lasting for a short time; noun: a concise statement of facts; verb: to summarize.
example: He gave a brief explanation.
The lawyer prepared a brief for the judge.
Let me briefly outline the plan.

vn_meaning: động từ: gọi; danh từ: tiếng gọi, sự kêu gọi; sự ghé thăm nhanh chóng
eng_explanation: v: to summon; n: a shout (or phone call).
example: Please call me when you arrive.
She received a call from her boss.
He paid a quick call on his friend.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sòng bạc, nơi đánh bạc
eng_explanation: n: a public room or building for gambling.
example: They spent the evening at the casino.
Las Vegas is famous for its casinos.
He lost a lot of money at the casino.

vn_meaning: động từ: ném, đúc; danh từ: dàn diễn viên, việc ném; sự đúc
eng_explanation: v: to throw; n: the actors in a play/film.
example: She cast a stone into the lake.
The director announced the cast for the new movie.
The metal was cast into a mold.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lâu đài, thành lũy
eng_explanation: n: a large fortified building with thick walls.
example: They visited Edinburgh Castle.
The princess lived in a beautiful castle.
The castle was built in the 11th century.

vn_meaning: tính từ: bình thường, không trang trọng; ngẫu nhiên
eng_explanation: adj: informal; happening by chance.
example: We had a casual conversation.
He wore casual clothes to the party.
It was just a casual meeting.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nạn nhân, người bị thương hoặc thiệt mạng
eng_explanation: n: a person injured or killed in an accident/war.
example: The accident resulted in several casualties.
The war had a high number of casualties.
Medical teams are treating the casualties.

vn_meaning: danh từ: mèo
eng_explanation: n: a small domesticated carnivorous mammal.
example: She has a black cat.
The cat is sleeping on the sofa.
Cats are known for their independence.

vn_meaning: danh từ: danh mục, bảng kê; động từ: liệt kê, lập danh mục
eng_explanation: n: a list of items; v: to list items.
example: The museum has a catalogue of its collection.
He catalogued his books alphabetically.
The online store has a detailed catalogue.

vn_meaning: động từ: bắt, tóm; bắt được (máy bay, xe); hiểu (ý); bị bắt gặp; mắc (bệnh)
eng_explanation: v: to seize; to understand; to become infected.
example: He tried to catch the ball.
I didn't catch what you said.
She caught a cold.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hạng mục, loại, phạm trù
eng_explanation: n: a group of things with similar characteristics.
example: This book belongs to the fiction category.
The products are divided into several categories.
Age is an important category in marketing.

vn_meaning: lên kế hoạch
eng_explanation: To offer meals and refreshments.
example: The restaurant caters to a wide range of tastes.
She catered the party with delicious food.

vn_meaning: duyên dáng
eng_explanation: To possess a captivating quality that attracts people.
example: His charming smile made everyone feel welcome.
The house had a charming, old-fashioned feel.

vn_meaning: Pleasing and attractive; delightful.
eng_explanation: A quality that is pleasing and enjoyable.
example: The novel was charming and full of vivid descriptions.
She was a charming and friendly person.

vn_meaning: đuổi theo
eng_explanation: To try to catch or overtake someone or something.
example: The police are chasing the thief through the city.
She chased after her lost kitten.

vn_meaning: trò chuyện
eng_explanation: To have a conversation.
example: Let's chat about the project.
They chatted for hours about their lives.

vn_meaning: rẻ
eng_explanation: Having a low cost.
example: The price of the item is quite cheap.
He's looking for a cheap and reliable car.

vn_meaning: gian lận
eng_explanation: To do something wrong or dishonest.
example: The students were caught cheating on the exam.
He cheated on his wife with another woman.

vn_meaning: kiểm tra
eng_explanation: To ensure something is correct.
example: Please check your work before submitting it.
The mechanic checked the engine to see if it was working.

vn_meaning: danh từ: má (bộ phận cơ thể); sự táo bạo, láo lếu (tính từ); má giả (trang điểm); danh từ: sự trêu chọc, chọc ghẹo (ai đó).
eng_explanation: noun: the side of the face from the eye to the chin; boldness, impudence.
example: She blushed with embarrassment when he pinched her cheek.
He had the cheek to ask for a raise after being late every day.
The clown applied bright red makeup to his cheeks.

vn_meaning: tính từ: cổ điển, kinh điển; danh từ: kiệt tác, tác phẩm kinh điển.
eng_explanation: adj: of the highest quality and style; timeless and representative of a genre. noun: a work of art or literature of great merit.
example: This is a classic example of a romantic comedy.
The Beatles are considered a classic band.
She wore a classic little black dress.

vn_meaning: tính từ: cổ điển (văn hóa, nghệ thuật, âm nhạc); mang phong cách cổ điển.
eng_explanation: adj: relating to the art, architecture, or literature of ancient Greece or Rome; of a traditional and formal style.
example: He enjoys listening to classical music.
The museum displayed a collection of classical sculptures.
The building has a classical design with columns and arches.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phân loại, sự phân loại.
eng_explanation: noun: the act of arranging things into groups based on shared characteristics.
example: The classification of animals is based on their evolutionary relationships.
The librarian helped me with the classification of the books.
A detailed classification system is needed for the data.

vn_meaning: động từ: phân loại, xếp loại.
eng_explanation: verb: to arrange into classes or categories; to assign to a particular group.
example: Scientists classify stars based on their temperature and brightness.
The documents were classified according to their importance.
Can you classify these plants into different species?

vn_meaning: danh từ: lớp học.
eng_explanation: noun: a room where students are taught.
example: The students were quiet in the classroom.
She decorated her classroom with colorful posters.
The classroom was filled with the sound of laughter.

vn_meaning: danh từ: điều khoản (hợp đồng); mệnh đề (ngữ pháp).
eng_explanation: noun: a part of a contract or law; a group of words containing a subject and a verb.
example: The contract included a clause about termination.
The sentence contained an independent clause and a dependent clause.
Read the fine print and pay attention to each clause.

vn_meaning: tính từ: sạch sẽ; động từ: làm sạch, dọn dẹp.
eng_explanation: adj: free from dirt, marks, or stains. verb: to remove dirt, marks, or stains.
example: The kitchen was clean and tidy.
Please clean your room before dinner.
She cleaned the windows with soap and water.

vn_meaning: danh từ: việc dọn dẹp, làm sạch; động từ: dọn dẹp, làm sạch (gerund).
eng_explanation: noun: the act of making something clean. verb: the act of cleaning something (gerund).
example: Cleaning the house is a chore I dislike.
She's good at cleaning.
The cleaning products are stored in the cupboard.

vn_meaning: tính từ: rõ ràng, trong sáng; không có chướng ngại vật; động từ: làm cho rõ ràng, vạch trần; gỡ bỏ.
eng_explanation: adj: easy to perceive, understand, or interpret; unobstructed. verb: to make understandable; to remove obstacles.
example: The water was clear and blue.
The instructions were very clear.
He cleared his throat before speaking.

vn_meaning: danh từ: màu sắc (vật thể); động từ: tô màu, nhuộm màu (vật gì)
eng_explanation: n. The perception of light wavelengths by the eye; v. To apply pigment to (a surface).
example: The artist used vibrant colours in her painting.
She coloured the picture with crayons.
His face lost all colour when he heard the news.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thuộc về thương mại, có mục đích kinh doanh; liên quan đến quảng cáo (truyền thông).
eng_explanation: adj. Relating to or characteristic of commerce; intended to make a profit. (adj)
example: The city centre is a commercial district.
The film was a commercial success.
Commercial breaks interrupt the television program.

vn_meaning: tính từ: hấp dẫn, lôi cuốn, thuyết phục (rất khó cưỡng lại).
eng_explanation: adj. Evoking interest, attention, or admiration in a powerfully irresistible way.
example: She gave a compelling argument for her proposal.
The novel's characters are incredibly compelling.
The evidence was compelling and led to a conviction.

vn_meaning: động từ: bồi thường, đền bù (thiệt hại, mất mát); trả công, trả lương.
eng_explanation: v. To make up for (a loss, injury, or wrongdoing) with something of equal value. (v)
example: The company will compensate you for your travel expenses.
The insurance policy will compensate for any damage.
She was compensated generously for her work.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự bồi thường, đền bù (thiệt hại, mất mát); tiền lương, tiền công.
eng_explanation: n. Something, typically money, awarded to someone as recompense for loss, injury, or suffering. (n)
example: He received compensation for his injuries.
She is seeking compensation for unfair dismissal.
Salary and benefits form part of the overall compensation package.

vn_meaning: động từ: cạnh tranh, thi đấu (với ai đó để giành chiến thắng).
eng_explanation: v. To strive to gain something by defeating or surpassing others. (v)
example: They will compete for the championship title.
Several companies are competing for the contract.
She competes in long-distance running.

vn_meaning: danh từ: năng lực, khả năng (để làm một việc gì đó); trình độ chuyên môn.
eng_explanation: n. The ability to do something successfully or efficiently. (n)
example: She demonstrated a high level of competence in her field.
The training program aims to improve employee competence.
He questioned the doctor's competence.

vn_meaning: tính từ: có năng lực, có khả năng (để làm một việc gì đó); đủ trình độ.
eng_explanation: adj. Having the necessary ability, knowledge, or skill to do something successfully. (adj)
example: She is a very competent lawyer.
He is a competent driver.
The staff are all highly competent and professional.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự cạnh tranh, thi đấu; cuộc thi.
eng_explanation: n. The activity or condition of competing; a contest or rivalry. (n)
example: The market is characterized by intense competition.
She won first prize in the singing competition.
He enjoys the thrill of competition.

vn_meaning: tính từ: cạnh tranh; có tính cạnh tranh cao; năng động, hăng hái.
eng_explanation: adj. Relating to or characterized by competition; able to compete successfully. (adj)
example: The job market is highly competitive.
She is a very competitive athlete.
The company offers competitive salaries and benefits.

vn_meaning: Một người cạnh tranh, người có khả năng cạnh tranh với người khác trong một lĩnh vực nào đó.
eng_explanation: A competitor is someone who competes with others in a particular field.
example: The company is trying to gain a larger market share by attracting more competitors.
The new software is designed to be a competitive advantage for users.

vn_meaning: Chế tạo, trình bày, hoặc làm cho một thứ gì đó thành một dạng hoàn chỉnh.
eng_explanation: To compile means to put together or arrange something into a complete form.
example: The programmers need to compile the code before submitting it for testing.
The company is compiling a new product line to meet growing demand.

vn_meaning: Thảo luận, trao đổi thông tin với người khác.
eng_explanation: To confer means to discuss or exchange information with someone.
example: Let's confer about the best way to improve our marketing strategy.
The two experts conferred extensively on the project's challenges.

vn_meaning: Một sự kiện, hội nghị, hoặc cuộc họp.
eng_explanation: A conference is a gathering of people for discussion or decision-making.
example: The company is holding a major conference to showcase its new products.
The attendees attended the conference to learn about industry trends.

vn_meaning: thừa nhận, thừa thừa, hoặc thừa nhận một sự việc.
eng_explanation: To confess means to admit something wrong or to reveal a secret.
example: The suspect confessed to the crime.
She confessed her feelings to her friend.

vn_meaning: Một lời thừa nhận, một sự thừa nhận về một sự việc hoặc cảm xúc.
eng_explanation: A confession is a statement of admission or revelation of a secret.
example: The author's confession offered a glimpse into his troubled past.
The couple shared a heartfelt confession of their love.

vn_meaning: Sự tin tưởng, sự chắc chắn, hoặc khả năng.
eng_explanation: Confidence is a feeling of trust and assurance.
example: She has a high level of confidence in her abilities.
The company's confidence in its products is growing.

vn_meaning: Có sự tự tin, có khả năng, hoặc có niềm tin.
eng_explanation: Confident means to feel sure of oneself and one's abilities.
example: He is a confident leader who inspires his team.
She is a confident speaker who delivers clear and persuasive presentations.

vn_meaning: động từ: xác nhận (một điều gì đó); khẳng định (sự thật); xác thực (giấy tờ, thông tin).
eng_explanation: to verify or corroborate something; to state that something is definitely true (verb).
example: Please confirm your attendance at the meeting.
The witness confirmed the suspect's presence at the scene.
I need to confirm the details of our reservation.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự xác nhận; sự khẳng định; xác nhận (ví dụ: xác nhận đơn đặt hàng).
eng_explanation: the act of confirming; verification or validation (noun).
example: I received a confirmation email for my flight.
The confirmation of his appointment was announced yesterday.
She sent a written confirmation of the agreement.

vn_meaning: tính từ: liên quan đến hiến pháp; thuộc về thể trạng (cơ thể).
eng_explanation: relating to a constitution (especially of a country) or relating to physical condition (adjective).
example: The constitutional amendment was approved by the voters.
He has a constitutional weakness that prevents him from exercising.
The constitutional rights of citizens are protected by law.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự hạn chế; sự ràng buộc; sự kiềm chế.
eng_explanation: a limitation or restriction; a restraint on freedom of action (noun).

vn_meaning: động từ: xây dựng; tạo ra; hình thành.
eng_explanation: to build or create something; to form or develop (verb).

vn_meaning: danh từ: việc xây dựng; công trình xây dựng.
eng_explanation: the process of building or assembling something; a building or structure (noun).

vn_meaning: động từ: tham khảo ý kiến; hỏi ý kiến.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chuyên gia tư vấn.
eng_explanation: a person who provides expert advice or services (noun).

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự tham khảo ý kiến; buổi tư vấn.
eng_explanation: the act of consulting; a meeting to discuss something (noun).

vn_meaning: động từ: tiêu thụ; sử dụng; ăn/uống.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người điều phối, người phối hợp (công việc, dự án); động từ: điều phối, phối hợp (hoạt động, sự kiện)
eng_explanation: n. someone who organizes events/activities; v. to organize and manage (events). [NOUN; VERB]

vn_meaning: danh từ: cảnh sát (thông tục)

vn_meaning: danh từ: khóa học, môn học; đường đi, lộ trình; món ăn (trong bữa ăn); đường đua; hướng đi; (thực vật học) thân cây; lớp (gạch, đá); động từ: đi theo đường, chạy theo lộ trình
eng_explanation: n. a series of lessons; a direction; part of a meal. v. to proceed along a route. [NOUN; VERB]

vn_meaning: danh từ: tòa án; sân (tennis, bóng rổ,...); triều đình, hoàng gia; sự tán tỉnh, làm quen
eng_explanation: n. a place where legal cases are heard; an area for playing sports. [NOUN]

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự lịch sự, nhã nhặn, phép tắc; sự ưu ái, giúp đỡ
eng_explanation: n. politeness; a respectful act. [NOUN]

vn_meaning: danh từ: anh/chị/em họ

We spent the summer with our cousins.

vn_meaning: động từ: che phủ, bao phủ; đề cập đến, đưa tin; trang bìa; lớp vỏ; chi phí; (bảo hiểm) chi trả; danh từ: vỏ, nắp, lớp phủ
eng_explanation: v. to protect/hide; to report on; n. a protective layer. [VERB; NOUN]

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự bao phủ, phạm vi (báo chí, truyền hình,...); sự bảo hiểm (bảo hiểm)

vn_meaning: tính từ: được bao phủ, được che đậy; (nghĩa bóng) được đề cập đến, được đưa tin
eng_explanation: adj. protected/hidden; dealt with in reporting. [ADJ]
example: The ground was covered in snow.

vn_meaning: danh từ: con bò cái
eng_explanation: n. a female bovine animal. [NOUN]

vn_meaning: nứt
eng_explanation: To separate or damage something; to open something with a sharp object.

The vase cracked on the floor.

vn_meaning: thủ công
eng_explanation: To make something skillfully and with care; a skilled art form.
example: The artisan crafted a beautiful wooden sculpture.

The team worked hard to complete the project.

vn_meaning: văn hóa
eng_explanation: Relating to the customs, traditions, and achievements of a particular group or nation; the beliefs, values, and practices of a society.
example: The museum showcases a rich cultural heritage.

Traditional music and dance are integral to the culture.

vn_meaning: văn hóa
eng_explanation: The way of life of a particular group of people; the shared beliefs, customs, and traditions.
example: The local culture is vibrant and diverse.

The study of culture is essential for understanding society.

vn_meaning: cốc
eng_explanation: A container for drinking; a small bowl or cup.

vn_meaning: tủ đựng đồ
eng_explanation: A cupboard for storing food and other items; a room for storing things.
example: The cupboard was full of vegetables and fruits.

The cupboard was old and dusty.

vn_meaning: chữa trị
eng_explanation: To restore someone to health; to treat a disease or illness.
example: The doctor prescribed a cure for the fever.

The medicine helped to cure the illness.

vn_meaning: sự tò mò
eng_explanation: A feeling of interest or inquiry; a desire to know something.
example: He was filled with curiosity about the ancient ruins.

vn_meaning: showing interest or inquiry; full of curiosity.
eng_explanation: Showing interest or inquiry; full of curiosity.
example: He was a curious and inquisitive person.

vn_meaning: having or resembling curls; having a wavy or curly shape.
eng_explanation: Having or resembling curls; having a wavy or curly shape.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tiền tệ (kinh tế); động từ: lưu hành (tiền tệ)

vn_meaning: tính từ: hiện tại; dòng chảy (nước, điện); danh từ: dòng điện; dòng nước

vn_meaning: danh từ: cuộc tranh luận; động từ: tranh luận

vn_meaning: danh từ: mảnh vỡ, rác thải

vn_meaning: danh từ: nợ; động từ: nợ

vn_meaning: danh từ: buổi ra mắt, lần đầu xuất hiện; động từ: ra mắt, lần đầu xuất hiện
eng_explanation: debut (n./v.) - A person's first appearance or performance in a particular field.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự phủ nhận, chối bỏ (một điều gì đó); sự bác bỏ (một yêu cầu, lời đề nghị).

vn_meaning: danh từ: chi tiết, chi tiết nhỏ; sự tỉ mỉ, cẩn thận.; động từ: kể chi tiết, mô tả tỉ mỉ.

vn_meaning: tính từ: chi tiết, tỉ mỉ, đầy đủ thông tin.

vn_meaning: động từ: giữ lại, tạm giữ (người, vật); làm chậm trễ (ai đó, cái gì đó).

vn_meaning: danh từ: thám tử, người điều tra.

vn_meaning: động từ: lái xe; thúc đẩy, xúi giục; đập (đinh, cọc); động từ: lái (xe); sự thúc đẩy, động lực; danh từ: đường lái xe.

vn_meaning: danh từ: biên tập viên, người biên tập.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bài xã luận; tính từ: thuộc về biên tập, biên tập.

vn_meaning: giáo dục

vn_meaning: having received education; knowledgeable.

vn_meaning: giáo dục
eng_explanation: The system of learning and teaching.

vn_meaning: ngượng ngùng
eng_explanation: A feeling of awkwardness or shame.

vn_meaning: đại sứ quán
eng_explanation: A diplomatic representation of a country.

vn_meaning: chứa

vn_meaning: bổ phận

vn_meaning: gắn kết
eng_explanation: To welcome or accept someone or something.

vn_meaning: động từ: xuất hiện (từ nơi ẩn náu); ra đời; nổi lên (trong hoàn cảnh nào đó)

vn_meaning: động từ: thích thú; tận hưởng; vui vẻ
