He bought some hardware to fix the leaky faucet.
The blacksmith crafted beautiful hardware for the doors.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự hại; thiệt hại; động từ: gây hại; làm tổn thương
eng_explanation: harm (n/v): damage or injury; to cause damage or injury.
example: Smoking can cause serious harm to your health.
He didn't intend to harm anyone.
The storm did little harm to the town.

vn_meaning: tính từ: có hại; gây hại
eng_explanation: harmful (adj): causing or capable of causing harm.
example: Exposure to the sun can be harmful.
The chemicals are harmful if ingested.
Smoking is harmful to your lungs.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự hòa hợp; sự đồng thuận; sự hòa âm (âm nhạc)
eng_explanation: harmony (n): agreement or concord; pleasing combination of sounds.
example: They lived in perfect harmony.
The choir sang in beautiful harmony.
We need to find a way to live in harmony with nature.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tàn khốc; khắc nghiệt; gay gắt; thô ráp
eng_explanation: harsh (adj): severe or strict; rough or abrasive.
example: The winter was unusually harsh this year.
He received harsh criticism for his performance.
The desert landscape is harsh and unforgiving.

vn_meaning: danh từ: vụ mùa; việc thu hoạch; động từ: thu hoạch
eng_explanation: harvest (n/v): the gathering of crops; to gather crops.
example: The farmers are preparing for the harvest.
They harvested the wheat last week.
It was a bountiful harvest this year.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: rất, cực kỳ (mức độ); cao (về chất lượng, địa vị).
eng_explanation: adv. To a great degree; at a high level. (Also, adj. - of high quality)
example: The project is highly ambitious.
She is highly respected in her field.
Highly sensitive information should be protected.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đường cao tốc, quốc lộ.
eng_explanation: n. A main public road, especially one connecting major cities; a major road (US).
example: We drove along the highway for hours.
The highway was congested with traffic.
Construction is underway on the new highway bypass.

vn_meaning: tính từ: rất hài hước, buồn cười.
eng_explanation: adj. Extremely amusing; causing loud laughter. (informal)
example: The comedian's performance was hilarious.
We had a hilarious evening at the party.
His stories are always hilarious.

vn_meaning: tính từ: nóng; cay (đồ ăn); hấp dẫn (người); thịnh hành (xu hướng); mới (tin tức).
eng_explanation: adj. Having a high temperature; spicy; attractive; popular; recent.
example: It's very hot today.
The curry was too hot for me.
She's a hot actress right now.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khách sạn.
eng_explanation: n. An establishment providing accommodation, meals, and other services to travelers.
example: We stayed at a luxury hotel.
The hotel is located near the airport.
She works at a hotel as a receptionist.

vn_meaning: danh từ: giờ (đơn vị thời gian).
eng_explanation: n. A period of sixty minutes; a specific point in time.
example: The meeting lasted for an hour.
I'll be there in an hour.
He works eight hours a day.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhà ở; công ty, hãng (thường dùng trong tên).; động từ: chứa đựng, cất giữ.
eng_explanation: n. A building for human habitation; a firm (in names). v. To shelter or contain.
example: They live in a beautiful house.
The fashion house is famous for its designs.
This museum houses a valuable collection of art.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hộ gia đình; vật dụng trong nhà.
eng_explanation: n. A family living together; the people in a home; domestic supplies.
example: The average household income is rising.
She's responsible for all the household chores.
We need to buy some household cleaning products.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhà ở, việc cung cấp nhà ở.
eng_explanation: n. The provision of shelter; buildings for living in.
example: There is a shortage of affordable housing.
The government is investing in new housing projects.
Student housing is often located near the campus.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: như thế nào; bằng cách nào.
eng_explanation: adv. In what way or manner; to what extent.
example: How are you?
How does this work?
I don't know how to swim.

vn_meaning: Tuy nhiên, ngược lại; nhưng
eng_explanation: It presents a contrast or opposition; a point of difference.
example: However, the results were inconclusive.
He expressed his disappointment however.

vn_meaning: lớn; to a great extent; rất lớn
eng_explanation: Indicates a significant size or extent.
example: The house is huge.
That’s a huge problem.

vn_meaning: người; con người
eng_explanation: Refers to the biological species that possesses the capacity for thought, feeling, and action.
example: The study examined the human brain.
He is a remarkable human being.

vn_meaning: hình ảnh; hình ảnh trí tưởng tượng
eng_explanation: Refers to visual representations of something that are not actually present.
example: The painting evoked strong imagery.
She enjoyed looking at the beautiful imagery.

vn_meaning: tưởng tượng; trí tưởng tượng
eng_explanation: The ability to form new ideas or concepts in the mind.
example: Imagination is essential for creativity.
He had a vivid imagination of the future.

vn_meaning: đặt ra; tưởng tượng
eng_explanation: To form a mental picture of something.
example: I imagine a beautiful sunset.
He imagined the future with optimism.

vn_meaning: ngắn hạn; ngay lập tức
eng_explanation: Suggests something happens or is done without delay.
example: The service is immediate.
The response was immediate.

vn_meaning: ngay lập tức; ngay lập tức
eng_explanation: Happens or is done without delay.
example: The medicine took immediately.
He responded immediately to the call.

vn_meaning: lớn; to a great extent
eng_explanation: Describes something that is very large or expansive.
example: The mountain was immense.
The vastness of the ocean was immense.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người nhập cư; danh từ: người di cư (từ nước ngoài đến một quốc gia khác)
eng_explanation: noun: a person who comes to live permanently in a foreign country. (n)
example: Many immigrants contribute significantly to the economy.
She was an immigrant from Italy.
The government provides support for new immigrants.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhập cư; danh từ: việc nhập cư
eng_explanation: noun: the act of immigrating or coming to live in a foreign country. (n)
example: Immigration rates have increased in recent years.
The immigration policy is a complex issue.
He applied for immigration to the United States.

vn_meaning: tính từ: sắp xảy ra; sắp đến; không tránh khỏi
eng_explanation: adjective: about to happen; impending. (adj)
example: A storm is imminent.
The deadline is imminent, so finish the project.
The company's failure was imminent.

vn_meaning: động từ: gây ra; chịu phải; gánh chịu (nợ, phạt)
eng_explanation: verb: to cause something to happen or to take on a particular state. (v)
example: He incurred a large debt.
The company incurred significant losses.
You will incur a penalty if you are late.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thực ra; quả thật; thật sự; thêm nữa
eng_explanation: adverb: used to express agreement or confirmation; in fact. (adv)
example: Indeed, it is a difficult task.
He is, indeed, a talented musician.
Indeed, I agree with you.

vn_meaning: danh từ: độc lập; tự do; tự chủ
eng_explanation: noun: the state of being independent; freedom from control or influence. (n)
example: The country gained its independence in 1945.
She values her independence.
The movement for independence was long and difficult.

vn_meaning: tính từ: độc lập; tự chủ; không phụ thuộc
eng_explanation: adjective: not depending on anyone for support or direction. (adj)
example: She is an independent journalist.
The company is an independent contractor.
He is an independent thinker.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chỉ mục; chỉ số; số thứ tự
eng_explanation: noun: a list of words or phrases with references to the pages where they appear. (n)
example: Use the index to find information on a specific topic.
The stock market index rose sharply.
The index of the book is at the back.

vn_meaning: động từ: chỉ ra; cho thấy; báo hiệu
eng_explanation: verb: to point out or show something; to suggest. (v)
example: The map indicates the location of the town.
The results indicate a positive trend.
The flashing light indicates a problem.

vn_meaning: danh từ: dấu hiệu; biểu hiện; sự chỉ ra
eng_explanation: noun: a sign or indication of something. (n)
example: The rising temperature is an indication of climate change.
His silence was an indication of his disapproval.
The report provides an indication of the company's performance.

vn_meaning: danh từ: dấu hiệu, tín hiệu (thể hiện điều gì đó); động từ: biểu thị, cho thấy
eng_explanation: indicator (n.) - a sign or thing that shows the state or condition of something.
example: The rising stock prices are a positive indicator of economic growth.
The red light serves as an indicator to stop.
The gauge is an indicator of the engine's temperature.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bản cáo trạng, tội danh (trong luật)
eng_explanation: indictment (n.) - a formal charge or accusation of a serious crime.
example: The grand jury issued an indictment against the suspect.
The indictment alleges fraud and conspiracy.
He pleaded not guilty to the indictment.

vn_meaning: tính từ: bản địa, bản xứ; danh từ: người bản địa
eng_explanation: indigenous (adj.) - originating or occurring naturally in a particular place; native.
example: The indigenous people of the Amazon rainforest have a unique culture.
Many indigenous plants are used in traditional medicine.
The study focused on the indigenous flora and fauna of the region.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sáng kiến, sự chủ động; động từ: khởi xướng, bắt đầu
eng_explanation: initiative (n.) - the ability to assess and initiate things independently.
example: She took the initiative to organize the fundraising event.
The company launched a new initiative to reduce waste.
He showed great initiative in solving the problem.

vn_meaning: danh từ: mực; động từ: viết bằng mực, làm mực
eng_explanation: ink (n.) - a colored fluid used for writing or printing.
example: He used black ink to write the letter.
The printer ran out of ink.
She dipped her quill in the ink.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tù nhân, người ở trong trại (tù, trẻ mồ côi, bệnh nhân tâm thần)
eng_explanation: inmate (n.) - a person confined in a prison or other institution.
example: The prison held over 100 inmates.
The inmates were allowed to exercise in the yard.
She worked as a volunteer at the inmates' rehabilitation program.

vn_meaning: tính từ: bên trong, nội tâm; danh từ: khu vực bên trong
eng_explanation: inner (adj.) - situated or occurring within; relating to one's thoughts or feelings.
example: He felt a sense of peace in his inner self.
The inner workings of the machine were complex.
She explored her inner emotions.

vn_meaning: tính từ: vô tội; danh từ: người vô tội
eng_explanation: innocent (adj.) - not guilty of a crime or wrongdoing.
example: He was declared innocent after the trial.
She maintained her innocence throughout the investigation.
The innocent bystander was caught in the crossfire.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự đổi mới, sáng tạo
eng_explanation: innovation (n.) - the introduction of something new; a new idea, method, or device.
example: The company is known for its innovation in technology.
The innovation led to increased efficiency.
Sustainable innovation is crucial for the future.

vn_meaning: tính từ: sáng tạo, đổi mới
eng_explanation: innovative (adj.) - featuring new methods; advanced and original.
example: The company developed an innovative new product.
Her innovative approach to problem-solving was impressive.
The innovative design was a major success.

vn_meaning: động từ: tương tác, tác động qua lại (với ai/cái gì đó); giao tiếp, giao lưu.
eng_explanation: v. to act upon each other; communicate or engage. (verb)
example: The children interact well with each other.
Users can interact with the software through a graphical interface.
She interacts with her fans on social media.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự tương tác, sự tác động qua lại; sự giao tiếp, giao lưu.
eng_explanation: n. the action of acting on each other; communication. (noun)
example: The study examined the interaction between genes and environment.
There was a lively interaction between the speaker and the audience.
Social interaction is important for mental health.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tương tác, có tính chất tác động qua lại; cho phép người dùng tham gia.
eng_explanation: adj. allowing two-way communication; responsive to user input. (adjective)
example: The museum has several interactive exhibits.
This is an interactive learning experience.
The software features an interactive map.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự quan tâm, sở thích; lợi ích, quyền lợi; tiền lãi (trong ngân hàng); sự hấp dẫn; động cơ, nguyên nhân.; động từ: làm cho ai đó quan tâm, thu hút sự chú ý.
eng_explanation: n. feeling of wanting to know more; benefit. v. to arouse curiosity. (noun/verb)
example: She has a strong interest in history.
The interest rate on the loan is 5%.
The story failed to interest me.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sắt; bàn là; vật dụng để là quần áo.; tính từ: làm bằng sắt; kiên cường, cứng rắn.
eng_explanation: n. a strong, hard, metallic element. v. to smooth with a heated iron. (noun/verb)
example: Iron is a vital mineral for the body.
She used an iron to press her shirt.
He has an iron will.

vn_meaning: tính từ: mỉa mai, châm biếm; trớ trêu, nghịch lý.
eng_explanation: adj. expressing the opposite of what is literally said; humorously incongruous. (adjective)
example: It was ironic that he failed the driving test.
The situation was darkly ironic.
He made an ironic comment about the weather.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: một cách mỉa mai, châm biếm; một cách trớ trêu.
eng_explanation: adv. in a way that expresses irony; surprisingly. (adverb)
example: Ironically, the fire station burned down.
He ironically praised her cooking, knowing it was terrible.
She ironically found herself agreeing with him.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự mỉa mai, châm biếm; sự trớ trêu, nghịch lý.
eng_explanation: n. the use of words to convey a meaning opposite to their literal meaning. (noun)
example: The irony of the situation was not lost on him.
Dramatic irony creates suspense in the play.
He spoke with a touch of irony.

vn_meaning: tính từ: không liên quan, không thích hợp, không đáng kể.
eng_explanation: adj. not connected with or relevant to something. (adjective)
example: The details are irrelevant to the main issue.
His past is irrelevant to his current job.
Please stick to the point and avoid irrelevant information.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đảo; một vùng đất nhỏ hơn nhiều so với lục địa, được bao quanh bởi nước.
eng_explanation: n. a piece of land surrounded by water. (noun)
example: Hawaii is a beautiful island in the Pacific Ocean.
They live on a small, remote island.
The island is a popular tourist destination.

vn_meaning: giáp lề
eng_explanation: To separate or exclude from a group or system.
example: The experiment required isolating the sensitive data.
The government is trying to isolate the country from international influence.
She isolated herself from the stressful situation.

vn_meaning: separate; distinct; alone; not connected; not part of a group.
eng_explanation: To be separate or distinct from others.
example: The hikers were isolated in the mountains.
The patient is isolated due to his illness.
They are isolated from the rest of the world.

vn_meaning: Cô lập
eng_explanation: The act of removing or separating from a group or system.
example: The company is implementing isolation measures to improve security.
The government is attempting to isolate the region from economic hardship.
The process of isolation is a common concern in healthcare.

vn_meaning: Vấn đề
eng_explanation: A problem or difficulty that requires attention.
example: There are several issues with the new software.
The company is facing several key issues with its operations.
The issue of climate change is a pressing issue.

vn_meaning: Bàn phím
eng_explanation: A device used for typing on a computer.
example: I need to find a new keyboard for my laptop.
The keyboard is broken and needs to be replaced.
She uses a wireless keyboard to type.

vn_meaning: Đe, đá
eng_explanation: To hit or push forcefully.
example: The dog kicked the ball.
He kicked the door open.
The sudden kick startled the cat.

vn_meaning: Trẻ con
eng_explanation: A young boy or child.
example: He has a young child.
They are raising a new baby.
The child was kidnapped from the street.

vn_meaning: to forcibly take someone away from their home or place of safety.
eng_explanation: To forcibly take someone away from their home or place of safety.
example: The kidnappers kidnapped the hostages.
They were arrested for kidnapping a child.
The police are investigating the case of the missing child.

vn_meaning: the organ that filters waste from the blood.
eng_explanation: The organ that filters waste from the blood.
example: The kidneys are important for maintaining healthy blood.
Kidney failure can be a serious condition.
She has a kidney disease.

vn_meaning: Giết
eng_explanation: To cause death or destruction.
example: The soldiers killed the enemy.
The fire killed the house.
He killed his brother in a fit of rage.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cái chết, sự giết hại (bạo lực); động từ: giết, làm chết; tính từ: chết người (gây tử vong)
eng_explanation: killing (n/v/adj) - The act of causing death; to cause death; something causing death.
example: The killing of endangered species is illegal.
He was responsible for the killing of his rival.
The movie contained scenes of graphic killing.

vn_meaning: danh từ: kilômét (đơn vị đo khoảng cách)
eng_explanation: kilometre (n) - A unit of length equal to 1000 meters; approximately 0.62 miles.
example: The distance to the city is about 50 kilometres.
We drove 300 kilometres today.
The marathon is 42.2 kilometres long.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tốt bụng, nhân hậu; loại, giống; danh từ: lòng tốt, sự tử tế; loại, giống
eng_explanation: kind (adj/n) - Having or showing a friendly, generous, and considerate nature; a type or category.
example: She is a very kind and compassionate person.
It was kind of you to help me with my homework.
What kind of music do you like?

vn_meaning: danh từ: vua; (trong cờ vua) quân vua
eng_explanation: king (n) - A male ruler of a kingdom; the most powerful piece in chess.
example: The king ruled the land with wisdom and justice.
The king's son was next in line to the throne.
He sacrificed his queen to checkmate the king.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhãn, mác; nhãn hiệu; động từ: dán nhãn, gắn nhãn
eng_explanation: label (n/v) - A piece of paper attached to something with identifying information; to attach a label to something.
example: The label on the bottle lists the ingredients.
He labeled the boxes with their contents.
This brand is known for its high-quality label.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự phóng, sự ra mắt; động từ: phóng, ra mắt
eng_explanation: launch (n/v) - To set in motion; to introduce or release a new product or service.
example: The rocket will launch tomorrow morning.
The company plans to launch a new smartphone next month.
They launched a campaign to raise awareness.

vn_meaning: danh từ: luật, quy định; động từ: tuân theo luật
eng_explanation: law (n/v) - A rule established by a government; to obey the law.
example: He studied law at university.
It is important to obey the law.
The new law will come into effect next year.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bãi cỏ (trước nhà)
eng_explanation: lawn (n) - A carefully maintained area of grass, typically in front of a house.
example: They spent the afternoon mowing the lawn.
The children were playing on the lawn.
The lawn needed watering.

vn_meaning: danh từ: vụ kiện, vụ tụng
eng_explanation: lawsuit (n) - A legal action brought before a court of law.
example: He is involved in a lengthy lawsuit.
The company faced a class-action lawsuit.
The lawsuit resulted in a settlement.

vn_meaning: danh từ: luật sư
eng_explanation: lawyer (n) - A person who is trained in law and advises people about legal matters.
example: She hired a lawyer to represent her in court.
He is a successful lawyer with years of experience.
The lawyer reviewed the contract carefully.

vn_meaning: danh từ: giấy phép (hoạt động, kinh doanh); động từ: cấp phép, cho phép.
eng_explanation: n./v. Official permission to do something; to grant such permission. (n, v)
example: You need a driver's license to operate a vehicle.
The company was licensed to sell alcohol.
They license their technology to other firms.

vn_meaning: động từ: nói dối; nằm (tư thế); nằm (vị trí).
eng_explanation: v. Intentionally tell an untruth; be in/assume a horizontal position. (v)
example: He told a lie to avoid getting in trouble.
I need to lie down for a few minutes.
The village lies in a valley.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cuộc sống; sự sống; đời sống.
eng_explanation: n. The condition of being alive; the course of existence. (n)
example: She dedicated her life to helping others.
What is the meaning of life?
He has a busy life with work and family.

vn_meaning: tính từ: suốt đời; kéo dài suốt đời.
eng_explanation: adj. Lasting or existing for a whole lifetime. (adj)
example: He was a lifelong fan of the team.
She has a lifelong commitment to education.
They formed a lifelong friendship.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lối sống; phong cách sống.
eng_explanation: n. The way in which a person lives. (n)
example: She leads a healthy lifestyle.
His lifestyle is very extravagant.
Modern lifestyles are often fast-paced.

vn_meaning: tính từ: được đặt tại; nằm ở.
eng_explanation: adj. Situated in a particular place. (adj)
example: The museum is located in the city center.
The lost keys were located under the sofa.
The company is located in several countries.

vn_meaning: danh từ: vị trí; địa điểm.
eng_explanation: n. A particular place or position. (n)
example: The location of the meeting will be sent to you.
This is a beautiful location for a picnic.
The store has a prime location.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ổ khóa; động từ: khóa lại.
eng_explanation: n./v. A device for fastening; to fasten with a lock. (n, v)
example: He used a lock to secure the door.
Don't forget to lock the car.
The safe was locked with a combination.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhật ký; khúc gỗ; bản ghi; động từ: ghi lại.
eng_explanation: n./v. A record of events; a tree trunk; to record in a log. (n, v)
example: The captain kept a log of the voyage.
The lumberjack cut down a large log.
We need to log all customer complaints.

vn_meaning: danh từ: logic; lý luận; sự hợp lý.
eng_explanation: n. The science of reasoning; the principles of correct thinking. (n)
example: His argument lacked logic.
She used logic to solve the problem.
There is a certain logic to his plan.

vn_meaning: đáp ứng, phù hợp, hợp lý
eng_explanation: It refers to a logical approach or reasoning.
example: The logical solution is the most effective.
He presented a logical argument for his position.

vn_meaning: tiêu đề, biểu tượng, dấu hiệu
eng_explanation: A logo is a visual symbol representing a brand.
example: The company's logo is a simple, iconic design.
The logo is a crucial part of the brand's identity.

vn_meaning: độc lập, một mình, cô đơn
eng_explanation: It describes someone or something feeling alone.
example: He felt lonely after moving to a new city.
The old house was lonely and abandoned.

vn_meaning: dài, kéo dài
eng_explanation: It signifies a long duration or length of time.
example: The river flowed long and steadily.
He spent a long time studying the history of Vietnam.

vn_meaning: dài ngày, kéo dài lâu, có lịch sử
eng_explanation: It indicates a long-established and enduring tradition.
example: The company has been a long-standing member of the community.
The tradition of tea ceremonies is a long-standing custom.

vn_meaning: trung bình, chủ yếu, chính
eng_explanation: It signifies that something is the most important or prevalent.
example: The sales figures mainly reflect the performance of the marketing campaign.
He mainly relies on his experience for decision-making.

vn_meaning: thông thường, phổ biến, phổ biến
eng_explanation: It refers to a widely accepted or popular trend.
example: The new product is a mainstream offering in the market.
The music of the mainstream is often pop and rock.

vn_meaning: cứu, bảo vệ, duy trì
eng_explanation: It means to keep something in good condition or working.
example: We need to maintain our infrastructure to ensure its reliability.
The company is committed to maintaining its quality standards.

vn_meaning: cải tạo, bảo trì, sửa chữa
eng_explanation: It refers to the process of repairing or improving equipment or facilities.
example: Regular maintenance is essential for preventing breakdowns.

vn_meaning: lớn, quan trọng, lớn

example: The major project will have a significant impact on the region.

vn_meaning: danh từ: công lao, giá trị, phẩm chất tốt đẹp (của một người hoặc việc gì đó); động từ: đáng được khen thưởng, xứng đáng.
eng_explanation: merit (n.) - quality or feature deserving praise; (v.) - deserve or be worthy of.
example: The candidate's merit was quickly recognized by the hiring manager.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự lộn xộn, tình trạng bừa bộn; động từ: làm bừa bộn, làm rối tung, gây ra rắc rối.
eng_explanation: mess (n.) - dirty or untidy state; (v.) - make dirty or untidy; create problems.
example: The kitchen was a complete mess after the party.
Don't mess with my things!

vn_meaning: danh từ: tin nhắn, thông điệp, lời nhắn; động từ: nhắn tin, gửi thông điệp.
eng_explanation: message (n.) - piece of information communicated; (v.) - send a message to someone.
example: I received a message from my friend this morning.
The politician's message resonated with voters.

vn_meaning: danh từ: kim loại.
eng_explanation: metal (n.) - a shiny, hard substance like iron, gold, or silver.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phép ẩn dụ, hình ảnh ẩn dụ.
eng_explanation: metaphor (n.) - figure of speech comparing things without using 'like' or 'as'.

He used a powerful metaphor to describe the situation.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phương pháp, cách thức, quy trình.

She has a unique method of teaching.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tối thiểu, nhỏ nhất, hạn chế.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hỗn hợp, sự pha trộn.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đám đông, bọn người (thường có thái độ hung hăng).

The police dispersed the mob quickly.
He was caught up in the mob during the protest.

vn_meaning: tính từ: di động, dễ di chuyển; danh từ: điện thoại di động.

example: A mobile phone allows you to stay connected on the go.
The army used mobile units to respond to the crisis.
She has a new mobile with a great camera.

vn_meaning: Khả năng di chuyển, sự di chuyển (thường là bằng phương tiện công cộng hoặc xe hơi)
eng_explanation: Mobility refers to the ability to move freely and easily.
example: The new bus system improves mobility in the city.
She enjoys the freedom of mobile travel.

vn_meaning: Tạo sự vận động, kích động, hoặc thúc đẩy (những người hoặc thứ tự) hành động

vn_meaning: Cách thức, phương tiện, hoặc giai đoạn (ví dụ: phương tiện giao thông)

vn_meaning: Một mẫu, một hình mẫu (thường dùng để chỉ một thiết kế hoặc sản phẩm)

vn_meaning: Trung bình, cân bằng, không quá cao hoặc quá thấp

vn_meaning: Hiện đại, mới, tiên tiến

vn_meaning: Di chuyển, di chuyển (thường dùng để chỉ vật chất hoặc người)

vn_meaning: tính từ: đang bay; bay (dạng hiện tại phân từ của động từ 'fly').
eng_explanation: adj. In the process of flying. (adjective)
example: We saw flying birds overhead.
He enjoys flying kites.
Flying is a convenient way to travel.

vn_meaning: động từ: tập trung; danh từ: điểm trọng tâm, tiêu điểm.
eng_explanation: v. To concentrate; n. The center of interest or activity. (v, noun)
example: Please focus on your work.
The focus of the meeting was the budget.
He lost focus and made a mistake.

vn_meaning: động từ: nuôi dưỡng, nạp nuôi; khuyến khích, thúc đẩy.
eng_explanation: v. To raise or nurture; to encourage the development of. (verb)
example: They fostered a child who needed a loving home.
The company fosters innovation among its employees.
She fostered a love of reading in her children.

vn_meaning: động từ: thành lập, sáng lập; tìm thấy (quá khứ của 'find').
eng_explanation: v. To establish; to discover. (verb)
example: She founded a new charity organization.
He found his keys under the sofa.
The city was found on the banks of the river.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nền móng, cơ sở; quỹ, tổ chức.
eng_explanation: n. The base of something; an organization established for a charitable purpose. (noun)
example: The foundation of the building is strong.
The Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation supports global health initiatives.
A good education is the foundation for success.

vn_meaning: Một người hoặc một nhóm người lãnh đạo một công ty hoặc tổ chức.
eng_explanation: A person or group leading a company or organization.
example: The company's founder, John Smith, built it from scratch.
She is the founder of the renowned fashion house.

vn_meaning: Số lượng bốn.
eng_explanation: Four
example: We need four more people to complete the team.
The company is expanding its operations by four locations.

vn_meaning: Số lượng bốn mươi.
eng_explanation: Fourteen
example: The project is expected to take fourteen weeks.
He has a fourteen-year-old dog.

vn_meaning: Đã có bốn lần, hoặc thứ tư.
eng_explanation: Fourth
example: The fourth season of the show is about to begin.
She is the fourth generation of this family.

vn_meaning: Thêm nhiều hơn, hoặc tiếp tục.
eng_explanation: More, or to continue.
example: We need to investigate further into the cause of the problem.
She is looking for further information about the event.

vn_meaning: Một loại đồ trang phục, thường có hình dạng hình trụ.
eng_explanation: A type of clothing, often with a cylindrical shape.
example: He wore a hat to protect himself from the sun.
She is a talented hat designer.

vn_meaning: Tình yêu thương, hoặc sự ghét bỏ.
eng_explanation: Hate
example: He hates injustice and inequality.
She has a deep hatred for her enemies.

vn_meaning: Tình yêu thương, hoặc sự ghét bỏ, thường là một cảm xúc tiêu cực.
eng_explanation: Hate
example: He was consumed by hatred for his former colleagues.
The film explores the destructive power of hatred.

vn_meaning: Một sự kiện, một điều kiện, hoặc một sự thật.
eng_explanation: An event, condition, or fact.
example: The company's success is a significant hi.
He had a high score on the test.

vn_meaning: Bí mật, hoặc không được tiết lộ.
eng_explanation: Secret, or not revealed.
example: The treasure was hidden in the old house.
She discovered a hidden talent for painting.

vn_meaning: động từ: trốn, ẩn nấp (để tránh bị phát hiện); che giấu (cái gì đó); danh từ: nơi ẩn náu; tấm da thú.
eng_explanation: verb: to conceal oneself; noun: a place to conceal oneself; animal skin.
example: The child hid behind the curtains.
She tried to hide her disappointment.
He wore a coat made of animal hide.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hệ thống thứ bậc; thứ tự ưu tiên.
eng_explanation: noun: a system of ranking people or things; a ranked order.
example: The company has a strict hierarchy of management.
The website uses a visual hierarchy to guide users.
Understanding the hierarchy is crucial for navigating the organization.

vn_meaning: tính từ: cao; lớn; nhiều; trạng từ: cao, ở trên cao; động từ: nâng cao.
eng_explanation: adj: tall; great in degree; adv: at a great height; verb: to raise.
example: The mountain is very high.
She has a high opinion of him.
The plane flew high above the clouds.

vn_meaning: tính từ: nổi bật, được nhiều người biết đến; quan trọng.
eng_explanation: adj: attracting a lot of public attention; important.
example: The trial was a high-profile case.
He secured a high-profile position in the company.
The politician gave a high-profile speech.

vn_meaning: động từ: làm nổi bật; làm sáng; danh từ: điểm nhấn; phần quan trọng.
eng_explanation: verb: to emphasize; noun: a striking feature; a key point.
example: The speaker highlighted the main points of the presentation.
The yellow marker highlighted the important information.
The trip to Paris was a highlight of her vacation.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tưởng tượng; không có thật.
eng_explanation: adj: existing only in the imagination; not real.
example: He has an imaginary friend.
The story is filled with imaginary creatures.
She created an imaginary world in her mind.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đầu vào; thông tin đưa vào; động từ: đưa vào, nhập vào.
eng_explanation: noun: data or information fed into a system; verb: to enter data or information.
example: The system requires user input.
Please input your name and address.
The data input was carefully checked for errors.

vn_meaning: danh từ: yêu cầu; thắc mắc; điều tra.
eng_explanation: noun: a request for information; an investigation.
example: We received several inquiries about the product.
The police are conducting an inquiry into the incident.
She made an inquiry at the reception desk.

vn_meaning: danh từ: côn trùng.
eng_explanation: noun: a small animal with a hard body, six legs, and often wings.
example: There are many different types of insects in the garden.
The insect landed on the flower.
Bees are insects that produce honey.

vn_meaning: động từ: chèn vào; nhét vào.
eng_explanation: verb: to place something into something else; to add something.
example: Please insert the key into the lock.
She inserted a picture into the document.
He inserted himself into the conversation.

vn_meaning: động từ: dẫn dắt, chỉ huy, đi trước; danh từ: sự dẫn dắt, vai trò dẫn đầu; tính từ: chính, hàng đầu (trong một nhóm)
eng_explanation: v: guide or direct (v); n: position of leadership (n); adj: most important (adj).
example: She will lead the team.
The lead actor gave a stunning performance.
Lead poisoning is a serious health concern.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tự do, phóng khoáng; khoan dung; cởi mở; (chính trị) tự do chủ nghĩa
eng_explanation: adj: open to new behavior/opinions (adj); relating to political freedom (adj).
example: He has a very liberal outlook on life.
The party adopted a more liberal stance on immigration.
A liberal education broadens the mind.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự giải phóng, sự tự do; sự thoát khỏi sự ràng buộc
eng_explanation: n: the act of setting someone free (n); gaining freedom from control (n).
example: The liberation of the city was a major victory.
The movement fought for the liberation of women.
National liberation was their ultimate goal.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự tự do; quyền tự do
eng_explanation: n: the state of being free (n); the right to do something (n).
example: They fought for liberty and justice.
He was denied his liberty.
Civil liberties are essential for a free society.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thư viện
eng_explanation: n: a place where books are kept (n).
example: I borrowed a book from the library.
The library has a vast collection of books.
She works as a librarian at the local library.

vn_meaning: danh từ: giấy phép; bằng lái; động từ: cấp phép, cho phép
eng_explanation: n: official permission (n); v: grant permission (v).
example: He has a driving licence.
You need a licence to sell alcohol.
The government licensed the new casino.

vn_meaning: danh từ: số đông, đa số
eng_explanation: n: the greater part (n); more than half (n).
example: The majority of students voted for the proposal.
She won the election by a large majority.
A simple majority is enough to pass the bill.

vn_meaning: động từ: làm, chế tạo, tạo ra; khiến, bắt buộc; trở thành
eng_explanation: v: create or construct (v); cause to be (v); become (v).
example: She made a cake for his birthday.
The news made her very sad.
He will make a good teacher.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đồ trang điểm; thành phần, cấu tạo
eng_explanation: n: cosmetics (n); composition or structure (n).
example: She wore a lot of make-up to the party.
The make-up of the team has changed.
The soil's make-up is crucial for plant growth.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự chế tạo, sự tạo ra; động từ (hiện tại phân từ): đang làm, đang chế tạo
eng_explanation: n: the act of creating (n); gerund of 'make' (v).
example: The making of the film was a long process.
He is making progress with his studies.
She is making a cake for the party.

vn_meaning: nam giới, nam tính
eng_explanation: A male person; typically refers to a man.
example: He is a male doctor.
The male student is struggling with the homework.

vn_meaning: liên quan đến toán học, liên quan đến số học
eng_explanation: Related to mathematics; involving numbers and calculations.
example: The mathematical problem is complex.
She enjoys studying mathematics.

vn_meaning: to study mathematics, toán học
eng_explanation: The act of learning and practicing mathematics.
example: He is a mathematics professor.
The mathematics department offers many courses.

vn_meaning: tương tự như mathematical, liên quan đến toán học
eng_explanation: A shortened form of 'mathematical', often used informally.
example: Let's talk about math problems.
He's a math enthusiast.

vn_meaning: vấn đề, sự vật, sự việc
eng_explanation: Something that is in question or concern.
example: What is the matter with the car?
The matter of the contract is unclear.

vn_meaning: đã trưởng thành, đã đạt đến độ tuổi trưởng thành
eng_explanation: Having reached a state of maturity and experience.
example: She is a mature woman.
The company is looking for mature employees.

vn_meaning: tối đa hóa, làm tối đa
eng_explanation: To make something as large as possible.
example: We need to maximize our profits.
The company is trying to maximize its market share.

vn_meaning: lớn nhất, lớn nhất
eng_explanation: The greatest or most significant of its kind.
example: The maximum temperature today is 30 degrees.
The maximum score was achieved.

vn_meaning: có thể, có khả năng
eng_explanation: Suggesting possibility or likelihood.
example: It may rain tomorrow.
I may be late for the meeting.

vn_meaning: có thể, có khả năng
eng_explanation: Suggesting possibility or likelihood.
example: The weather may be bad.
He may be coming to the party.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: có lẽ, biết đâu (diễn tả sự không chắc chắn)
eng_explanation: adverb - possibly; expressing uncertainty.
example: Maybe we should go to the beach tomorrow.
I'll call you maybe later this week.
Maybe it will rain later today.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thuốc men; y học (nghĩa rộng); sự chữa bệnh
eng_explanation: noun - substance used to treat or prevent disease; the science of healing.
example: She took the medicine to relieve her headache.
Modern medicine has made great advances.
He is studying medicine at university.

vn_meaning: tính từ: chỉ; đơn thuần; hẹp hòi (thể hiện sự nhỏ bé, tầm thường); danh từ: chút ít, cái gì đó nhỏ bé
eng_explanation: adj - little; insignificant; noun - a small amount or thing.
example: It was a mere coincidence that we met.
He is a mere boy.
She saved a mere $10 from her allowance.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: chỉ; đơn thuần; chỉ là (nhấn mạnh sự đơn giản, không có gì đặc biệt)
eng_explanation: adverb - simply; only; nothing more than.
example: He merely smiled when I asked him the question.
The delay was merely a technical glitch.
She was merely expressing her opinion.

vn_meaning: động từ: hợp nhất; trộn lẫn; dung hòa
eng_explanation: verb - to combine or blend into one.
example: The two rivers merge into a single stream.
Please merge your changes with the main document.
The company decided to merge with a competitor.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự hợp nhất (của các công ty, tổ chức)
eng_explanation: noun - the combination of two or more companies.
example: The merger created a new global corporation.
The merger was completed last month.
The announcement of the merger surprised the market.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: rất nhiều; nhiều; đáng kể; đại lượng; phụ từ: nhiều (thường đi với danh từ không đếm được)
eng_explanation: adverb - very much; a lot; adjective - a large amount.
example: I like you much.
She doesn't have much time.
He ate much food.

vn_meaning: đại từ: không cái này, không cái kia; liên từ: không… cũng không…
eng_explanation: pronoun - not one nor the other; conjunction - not… nor…
example: Neither of them wanted to go.
I neither like nor dislike the movie.
He spoke neither English nor French.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thần kinh; lòng dũng cảm; sự kiên nhẫn; sự nhạy cảm
eng_explanation: noun - a bundle of fibers transmitting signals; courage; patience; sensitivity.
example: The doctor examined his nerves.
She has a lot of nerve to say that.
He has a good nerve for dealing with difficult situations.

vn_meaning: tính từ: bồn chồn; lo lắng; căng thẳng; dễ bị xúc động
eng_explanation: adjective - anxious; worried; uneasy.
example: I was nervous before the exam.
She gets nervous when she speaks in public.
He felt nervous about the interview.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ý nghĩ; quan niệm; khái niệm (chung chung, chưa chắc chắn).
eng_explanation: n. A belief or idea (often vague or ill-defined).
example: I have a notion that it might rain later.
The notion of equality is central to our society.
He dismissed the idea as a silly notion.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tai tiếng; khét tiếng; xấu tiếng (vì điều gì đó tồi tệ).
eng_explanation: adj. Famous for something bad or negative; widely known for undesirable qualities.
example: The city is notorious for its high crime rate.
He was a notorious gambler.
The restaurant is notorious for its slow service.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tiểu thuyết; sự mới lạ; điều chưa từng có. tính từ: mới lạ; độc đáo.
eng_explanation: n. A long fictional narrative; adj. New and original.
example: She is reading a historical novel.
The company introduced a novel approach to marketing.
This is a novel idea that could revolutionize the industry.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhà văn tiểu thuyết.
eng_explanation: n. A writer of novels.
example: Jane Austen is a famous novelist.
He aspires to be a successful novelist.
The novelist signed copies of her latest book.

vn_meaning: giới từ: của; về; do; bởi.
eng_explanation: prep. Expressing belonging, origin, or relationship.
example: This is a picture of my family.
She is a citizen of France.
He died of a heart attack.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: tắt; rời khỏi; không làm việc. tính từ: không còn tốt; hỏng; thối. giới từ: cách xa.
eng_explanation: adv. Away from; not working; prep. Separated by distance.
example: Please turn off the lights.
The milk is off.
The beach is just off the highway.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tội lỗi; hành vi phạm tội; sự xúc phạm.
eng_explanation: n. An illegal act; a cause for complaint or disapproval.
example: He was charged with a serious offence.
It was a grave offence to steal from the church.
She took no offence at his comments.

vn_meaning: động từ: xúc phạm; gây khó chịu cho.
eng_explanation: v. To cause someone to feel upset, annoyed, or resentful.
example: I didn't mean to offend you.
His rude behavior offended everyone.
She was offended by his insensitive remarks.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người phạm tội; kẻ xúc phạm.
eng_explanation: n. A person who commits a crime or offense.
example: The offender was sentenced to five years in prison.
He is a repeat offender.
The police are searching for the offender.

vn_meaning: tính từ: xúc phạm; gây khó chịu; tấn công (quân sự).
eng_explanation: adj. Causing offense; unpleasant; relating to attack.
example: His comments were deeply offensive.
The offensive operation began at dawn.
She found his behavior offensive and unacceptable.

vn_meaning: đề nghị
eng_explanation: To present a product or service for purchase.
example: The company is offering a discount on its products.
He made an offer to help me with the project.
She offered to take the children to the park.

vn_meaning: sở hữu
eng_explanation: A specific proposal or plan.
example: The company is launching a new offering to attract customers.
She’s considering an offering to expand her business.
The team presented an offering to the investors.

vn_meaning: văn phòng
eng_explanation: A place for work or business operations.
example: I work in the office every day.
The new office building is modern and spacious.
She's a dedicated office worker.

vn_meaning: cán bộ
eng_explanation: A person with a formal job title.
example: He is an officer in the police force.
She is a skilled officer with excellent judgment.
The officer conducted a thorough investigation.

vn_meaning: cởi mở
eng_explanation: Clearly and readily available.
example: The company announced its plans openly.
She spoke openly about her concerns.
The news was open to the public.

vn_meaning: lệnh
eng_explanation: A request to perform a task.
example: I placed an order for groceries.
The customer placed an order for a new product.
He gave an order to follow the rules.

vn_meaning: common; usual; typical.
eng_explanation: Something that is typical or usual.
example: This is an ordinary coffee.
She has an ordinary life.
The ordinary house is small and simple.

vn_meaning: tổ chức
eng_explanation: To structure or organize something.
example: The team needs to organize the meeting.
She is an organizer of events.
The organist played a beautiful melody.

vn_meaning: relating to nature; occurring naturally.
eng_explanation: Based on natural processes.
example: Organic farming is a sustainable practice.
The product is organic and free from pesticides.
She has an organic lifestyle.

vn_meaning: tổ chức
eng_explanation: A structured group with a defined purpose.
example: The company needs to improve its organization.
She is a skilled organizer.
The organization is efficient and effective.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tổ chức; tính từ: liên quan đến tổ chức (hành chính, quản lý)
eng_explanation: Adjective: Relating to an organization or its structure; relating to administration.
example: The organizational structure of the company was recently changed.
She has an organizational skill that helps her manage projects effectively.
Organizational meetings are held every week.

vn_meaning: danh động từ: tổ chức; tính từ: được tổ chức sẵn
eng_explanation: Verb: To arrange or systematize; to form or create an organization.
example: Please organize your desk before you start working.
The volunteers organized a charity event to raise money.
The data was organized chronologically.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự tổ chức; tính từ: được tổ chức sẵn, có trật tự
eng_explanation: Adjective: Arranged or systematized; orderly and well-structured.
example: The conference was very well organized.
She is an organized person and always keeps things tidy.
The event had an organized schedule of activities.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người tổ chức; dụng cụ tổ chức
eng_explanation: Noun: A person who organizes events or activities; a tool for organizing.
example: He is the event organizer for the festival.
I use an organizer to keep track of my appointments.
The organizer provided refreshments for the meeting.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hướng; định hướng; buổi giới thiệu, hướng dẫn
eng_explanation: Noun: A direction or point in space; a process of introducing someone to a new job or environment.
example: The compass shows the orientation of the north.
The company offered new employees an orientation program.
He had a difficult time adjusting to the cultural orientation.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chủ sở hữu; người sở hữu
eng_explanation: Noun: A person who possesses or controls something; the proprietor.
example: The owner of the store is very friendly.
The company's owner announced a new expansion plan.
He is the owner of a successful restaurant.

vn_meaning: danh từ: quyền sở hữu; sự sở hữu
eng_explanation: Noun: The state of being the owner; the right to possess or control something.
example: The ownership of the property is disputed.
She took pride in her family's ownership of the business.
The law protects intellectual property ownership.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khí oxy
eng_explanation: Noun: A colorless, odorless gas essential for respiration.
example: Oxygen is vital for human survival.
The scuba diver needed supplemental oxygen.
Plants produce oxygen during photosynthesis.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tốc độ; nhịp điệu; đường đua; hành động nhanh chóng
eng_explanation: Noun: Speed or rate of movement; a rhythmic pattern; a race track.
example: The runner increased his pace during the final lap.
The music had a steady pace.
He set a fast pace in the negotiations.

vn_meaning: danh từ: gói, thùng; nhóm người; (thú) bầy
eng_explanation: Noun: A bundle or container; a group of people; a group of animals.
example: Please pack your bags for the trip.
The hikers traveled in small packs.
A pack of wolves hunted in the forest.

vn_meaning: danh từ: gói hàng (vận chuyển); danh từ: một bộ, một chương trình (bao gồm nhiều thứ liên quan); động từ: đóng gói (hàng hóa)
eng_explanation: noun: a wrapped bundle; a set of related items; verb: to wrap securely for shipping.
example: I received a package from my aunt yesterday.
The software comes as a package with all necessary tools.
Please package the fragile items carefully.

vn_meaning: danh từ: một gói nhỏ (thường là thư từ, dữ liệu); danh từ: một phần nhỏ của một thứ gì đó
eng_explanation: noun: a small bundle or parcel; a small amount of something.
example: She received a small packet of seeds in the mail.
The data was transmitted in packets.
He opened a packet of biscuits.

vn_meaning: danh từ: miếng đệm; danh từ: bản nháp; động từ: lót, đệm
eng_explanation: noun: a cushion or protective layer; verb: to cushion or line something.
example: She put a pad under the vase to protect the table.
I wrote a rough pad of the letter before typing it.
He padded the box with newspaper.

vn_meaning: danh từ: trang (sách, báo); động từ: lật trang; danh từ: người hầu (lịch sử)
eng_explanation: noun: a sheet of paper in a book; verb: to turn the pages of a book; noun: a young attendant (historical).
example: Please turn to page 25.
She was paging through the magazine.
The queen had a page to attend her.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đau đớn; danh từ: nỗi khổ, sự đau buồn
eng_explanation: noun: physical suffering or discomfort; emotional distress or sorrow.
example: I felt a sharp pain in my leg.
She was in pain after the accident.
The loss of her dog caused her great pain.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự đi qua, sự vượt qua; tính từ: thoáng qua, nhất thời
eng_explanation: noun: the act of passing by; adjective: brief or temporary.
example: He gave her a passing glance.
It was just a passing thought.
The passing of time makes everything change.

vn_meaning: danh từ: niềm đam mê, tình yêu mãnh liệt
eng_explanation: noun: strong and barely controllable emotion; intense enthusiasm.
example: She has a passion for music.
He pursued his passion for photography.
Their passion for each other was evident.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đầy đam mê, nhiệt tình
eng_explanation: adjective: showing or caused by strong feelings or a strong belief.
example: She gave a passionate speech.

Their passionate love affair captivated everyone.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thụ động, bị động
eng_explanation: adjective: accepting or allowing what happens or what others do, without active response or resistance.
example: He took a passive role in the project.

She was a passive observer of the events.

vn_meaning: danh từ: hộ chiếu
eng_explanation: noun: an official document identifying a person and entitling them to travel to foreign countries.
example: Don't forget to bring your passport on the trip.
She applied for a new passport.
You need a valid passport to enter the country.

vn_meaning: danh từ: điểm nhìn, góc nhìn, quan điểm (về một vấn đề); khả năng nhìn nhận, đánh giá (một tình huống).
eng_explanation: n. a particular attitude toward or way of regarding something; a point of view. (n)
example: From my perspective, the situation is quite clear.
The artist's perspective on life is unique.
We need to consider all perspectives before making a decision.

vn_meaning: động từ: thuyết phục, lay động, khiến ai đó làm điều gì đó.
eng_explanation: v. to cause (someone) to do something through reasoning or argument. (v)
example: He tried to persuade her to go with him.
I persuaded my boss to give me a raise.
Nothing could persuade him to change his mind.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thú cưng; động từ: vuốt ve, âu yếm.
eng_explanation: n. a domesticated animal kept for companionship; v. touch gently and lovingly. (n, v)
example: She has a pet cat named Whiskers.
He likes to pet his dog behind the ears.
Don't pet a strange animal without asking.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bản kiến nghị, đơn thỉnh cầu; động từ: thỉnh cầu, kiến nghị.
eng_explanation: n. a formal written request; v. to make a formal request. (n, v)
example: They started a petition to save the park.
The students petitioned the administration for better facilities.
We will petition the government to address the issue.

vn_meaning: danh từ: xăng (chất đốt cho xe cộ).
eng_explanation: n. gasoline, a fuel used in internal combustion engines. (n)
example: We need to fill up the car with petrol.
Petrol prices are rising rapidly.
The car runs on petrol.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đĩa (để ăn); tấm, phiến (kim loại, nhựa...).
eng_explanation: n. a flat dish for food; a flat piece of material. (n)
example: She put a slice of cake on a plate.
The car has a license plate.
He dropped the plate and it shattered.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sân ga, bục, nền tảng, diễn đàn, cương lĩnh.
eng_explanation: n. a raised level surface; a political or ideological base. (n)
example: The train arrived at platform 5.
The speaker stood on a platform to address the crowd.
The party's platform includes environmental protection.

vn_meaning: động từ: chơi, đánh (thể thao); biểu diễn (kịch, nhạc); đóng (vai).; danh từ: vở kịch, trò chơi.
eng_explanation: v. to engage in recreation; n. a theatrical performance; a game. (v, n)
example: The children love to play in the park.
She is playing the piano beautifully.
We saw a wonderful play at the theater.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người chơi (thể thao, trò chơi); người đóng vai (trong phim, kịch).
eng_explanation: n. a person who plays a game or sport; an actor. (n)
example: He is a talented football player.
She is a key player in the team.
The movie features a brilliant cast of players.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lời van xin, thỉnh cầu; động từ: van xin, thỉnh cầu.
eng_explanation: n. a request for help; v. to make a serious request. (n, v)
example: He made a desperate plea for mercy.
The lawyer entered a plea of not guilty.
She pleaded with him to stay.

vn_meaning: khẩn cầu
eng_explanation: To make a formal request for assistance or forgiveness.
example: The police officer pleaded with the suspect to confess.
She pleaded with her parents to let her go to college.

vn_meaning: dễ chịu
eng_explanation: Describes something that brings joy and comfort.
example: The weather was pleasant this summer.
She found the room to be a pleasant place to spend time.

vn_meaning: làm ơn
eng_explanation: A courteous request for something.
example: Please pass the salt.
Can you please help me with this?

vn_meaning: hân hạnh
eng_explanation: Expressing gratitude or enjoyment.
example: I am pleased with your progress.
She was pleased to receive the gift.

vn_meaning: niềm vui
eng_explanation: A feeling of enjoyment and satisfaction.
example: I enjoy reading books and watching movies.
The pleasure of music is a wonderful thing.

vn_meaning: sở hữu
eng_explanation: Having or relating to something.
example: He possesses a valuable antique.
She possesses a beautiful smile.

vn_meaning: khả năng
eng_explanation: The likelihood of something occurring.
example: There is a possibility of rain tomorrow.
It's a possibility that he will come.

vn_meaning: có thể
eng_explanation: Capable of occurring.
example: It's possible that he will arrive on time.
The weather is possible, but not guaranteed.

vn_meaning: having a reasonable chance of something happening.
eng_explanation: Having a good chance of something.
example: It's possibly that we will have a good time.
She might possibly be able to help.

vn_meaning: bài đăng
eng_explanation: A written communication sent by mail.
example: I will post a letter to my friend.
The post office is closed on Sundays.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thời kỳ hậu chiến tranh; tính từ: liên quan đến hậu chiến tranh.
eng_explanation: Noun: The period following a war. Adjective: Relating to or characteristic of the post-war era.
example: The post-war economy experienced significant growth.
Post-war literature often explored themes of trauma and rebuilding.
He studied the post-war social changes in Europe.

vn_meaning: danh từ: áp phích; danh từ: người quảng cáo (tiêu đề)
eng_explanation: Noun: A piece of printed paper promoting an event or product. Noun: A salesperson.
example: He hung a poster advertising the concert on the bulletin board.
The poster featured a striking image of the new car.
She worked as a poster girl for the fashion brand.

vn_meaning: động từ: hoãn; hoãn lại.
eng_explanation: Verb: To delay or postpone an event or action.  To put off until a later time.
example: We had to postpone the meeting due to the storm.
They postponed their vacation until next year.
Don't postpone your health check-up.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nồi; danh từ: chậu (trồng cây); danh từ: (vật) thùng, bình.
eng_explanation: Noun: A container for cooking. Noun: A small pot for growing plants. Noun: A container.
example: She cooked soup in a large pot.
He planted flowers in a decorative pot.
The farmer used a large pot to store water.

vn_meaning: danh từ: khoai tây.
eng_explanation: Noun: A starchy tuberous vegetable, often cooked as food.
example: She mashed the potatoes for dinner.
French fries are made from potatoes.
Potatoes are a good source of vitamins.

vn_meaning: động từ: đi trước; dẫn đầu; xảy ra trước.
eng_explanation: Verb: To come before in time or order. To be a precursor to something.
example: The introduction of the new law preceded the implementation.
His success preceded his hard work.
The symptoms precede the diagnosis in some diseases.

vn_meaning: động từ: kê đơn; chỉ dẫn; quy định.
eng_explanation: Verb: To recommend a medicine or treatment. To specify or prescribe rules.
example: The doctor prescribed antibiotics for the infection.
The manual prescribes a specific procedure for assembly.
She prescribed a quiet evening to relax.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đơn thuốc; quy định; lệnh.
eng_explanation: Noun: A written order for medicine. Noun: A rule or regulation.
example: The pharmacist filled the doctor's prescription.
The law includes a prescription for environmental protection.
He followed the prescription carefully.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự hiện diện; sự có mặt; sự tồn tại.
eng_explanation: Noun: The state of being present. The fact of existing.
example: His presence brightened the room.
The police investigated the presence of illegal drugs.
The presence of evidence was crucial to the case.

vn_meaning: động từ: trình bày; giới thiệu; hiện tại (thời gian).  danh từ: quà tặng; người tham dự.
eng_explanation: Verb: To introduce or display.  Adjective: Existing now. Noun: A gift; a participant.
example: She presented her research findings to the committee.
The current situation is challenging.
He received a present for his birthday.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bài trình bày (trong hội nghị, lớp học); sự giới thiệu (một sản phẩm, ý tưởng); hình thức trình bày (một vấn đề).
eng_explanation: noun: an act of presenting information; a formal talk or lecture.
example: She gave a compelling presentation on climate change.
The company's new product presentation was very well received.
The presentation slides were clear and concise.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: hiện tại; sớm thôi; hiện đang (làm gì đó).
eng_explanation: adverb: currently; at the present time; soon.
example: I am presently working on a new project.
She will arrive presently.
Presently, we are experiencing some technical difficulties.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự bảo tồn (thiên nhiên, di sản văn hóa).
eng_explanation: noun: the action of keeping something safe from harm or decay.
example: The preservation of historical landmarks is crucial.
Wildlife preservation efforts are essential.
Museums play a vital role in the preservation of art.

vn_meaning: động từ: bảo tồn; giữ gìn; đóng hộp (thực phẩm). danh từ: thực phẩm đóng hộp.
eng_explanation: verb: to keep something safe from harm or decay; to maintain.
example: We must preserve our natural resources.
She preserves fruits and vegetables in jars.
He opened a jar of preserves for breakfast.

vn_meaning: động từ: chủ tọa (cuộc họp, buổi lễ).
eng_explanation: verb: to be in the position of authority over an event or meeting.
example: The mayor will preside over the ceremony.
She presided over the meeting with skill and diplomacy.
He presided as chairman of the board.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thời kỳ làm tổng thống; chức tổng thống.
eng_explanation: noun: the office or term of a president.
example: His presidency was marked by significant reforms.
She is seeking the presidency.
The presidency is a demanding role.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: có lẽ; có khả năng.
eng_explanation: adverb: likely; with high probability.
example: It will probably rain tomorrow.
He is probably at home.

vn_meaning: động từ: điều tra; thăm dò. danh từ: cuộc điều tra; đầu dò.
eng_explanation: verb: to investigate or examine something thoroughly; noun: an investigation.
example: The police are probing the cause of the accident.
Scientists used a probe to explore the ocean floor.
The investigation is still underway, and more probes are planned.

vn_meaning: danh từ: vấn đề; rắc rối.
eng_explanation: noun: a matter or situation regarded as unwelcome or needing to be dealt with.
example: We need to solve this problem quickly.
The company is facing a financial problem.
He is having a problem with his car.

vn_meaning: tính từ: gây ra vấn đề; khó giải quyết.
eng_explanation: adjective: causing or likely to cause problems; difficult to deal with.
example: The situation is becoming increasingly problematic.
His behavior was problematic.
The new policy is considered problematic by many.

vn_meaning: tính từ: tiềm năng (có triển vọng); sắp tới (dự kiến)
eng_explanation: adj. Likely to happen or succeed; relating to the future. (18 words)
example: The company is looking for prospective buyers.
She is a prospective student for the university.
Prospective changes to the law are being discussed.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự thịnh vượng; sự thành công (về tài chính)
eng_explanation: n. The state of being successful and flourishing; good fortune. (14 words)
example: The country enjoyed a period of great prosperity.
Hard work is often the key to prosperity.
They wished him health and prosperity.

vn_meaning: động từ: bảo vệ; che chở; giữ gìn
eng_explanation: v. Keep safe from harm or injury; defend. (10 words)
example: We must protect our children from danger.
The helmet will protect your head.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự bảo vệ; sự che chở; sự giữ gìn
eng_explanation: n. The action of defending from harm; security. (11 words)
example: The police provided protection for the witness.
Sunscreen offers protection against harmful UV rays.
He sought protection from the rain under a tree.

vn_meaning: tính từ: bảo vệ; phòng thủ; có tính bảo vệ
eng_explanation: adj. Designed to protect; showing care and concern. (12 words)
example: She is very protective of her children.
Protective clothing is essential in this environment.
The castle had strong protective walls.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chất đạm; protein (trong sinh học)
eng_explanation: n. A vital nutrient for building and repairing tissues. (11 words)
example: Meat, fish, and eggs are good sources of protein.
A protein deficiency can lead to health problems.
She adds protein powder to her smoothies.

vn_meaning: động từ: đủ điều kiện; đạt tiêu chuẩn; chứng minh đủ tư cách
eng_explanation: v. Be eligible for something; become certified. (9 words)

vn_meaning: danh từ: chất lượng; phẩm chất; giá trị
eng_explanation: n. The standard of something as measured against other things. (13 words)
example: The quality of the food was excellent.
This is a product of high quality.
She is a person of great quality.

vn_meaning: danh từ: số lượng; lượng
eng_explanation: n. The amount or number of something. (8 words)

We need to increase the quantity of products.
He measured the quantity of water carefully.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phần tư; khu vực; quý (trong năm); nơi đóng quân; đồng đô la 25 xu; ; động từ: chia thành bốn phần
eng_explanation: n. One of four equal parts; a three-month period. (13 words)
example: He spent a quarter of his salary on rent.
The soldiers were stationed in the old quarter.
The company reported strong earnings for the last quarter.

vn_meaning: Một vị vua, người phụ nữ có quyền lực và danh vọng.
eng_explanation: A female ruler or head of a family.
example: The queen announced a new policy.
She is the queen of England.

vn_meaning: Một câu hỏi, một yêu cầu.
eng_explanation: A request or inquiry.
example: Can you please provide a query?
The query was unclear and needed clarification.

vn_meaning: Một cuộc tìm kiếm, một nhiệm vụ.
eng_explanation: A journey or undertaking with a specific goal.
example: He embarked on a perilous quest for the lost treasure.
The quest for the mythical creature was a long and difficult one.

vn_meaning: Một câu hỏi, một câu hỏi mở.
eng_explanation: A question that requires an answer.
example: What is your question?

vn_meaning: Một bảng hỏi, một bộ sưu tập các câu hỏi.

vn_meaning: Một hàng đợi, một danh sách chờ.
eng_explanation: A line of people waiting their turn.

vn_meaning: Không được xử lý, chưa được chế biến.

vn_meaning: Một tia sáng, một đường thẳng.
eng_explanation: A beam of light.
example: The ray of sunlight illuminated the forest.
The ray of light bounced off the water.

vn_meaning: Đạt được, tiếp cận.
eng_explanation: To get to or reach something.
example: He reached the top of the mountain.
The children reached for the balloons.

vn_meaning: Phản ứng, phản ứng với một điều gì đó.
eng_explanation: To respond to something.

vn_meaning: danh từ: phản ứng (hóa học, sinh học); phản ứng, thái độ (tinh thần); sự đáp lại (yêu cầu, đề nghị)
eng_explanation: noun: a response to a stimulus; a feeling caused by something.
example: The chemical reaction produced a bright light.
Her reaction to the news was one of shock.
He gave a quick reaction to the question.

vn_meaning: động từ: đọc (văn bản, chữ)
eng_explanation: verb: to look at and understand the meaning of written or printed matter.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người đọc
eng_explanation: noun: someone who reads books, newspapers, etc.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: sẵn lòng, dễ dàng, thường xuyên
eng_explanation: adverb: without hesitation or difficulty; frequently.

vn_meaning: danh từ: việc đọc; tài liệu đọc; chỉ số (đồng hồ đo)
eng_explanation: noun: the act of reading; material to be read; a measurement on a scale.
example: I enjoy reading in the evenings.
The reading was challenging but rewarding.

vn_meaning: tính từ: sẵn sàng; đã sẵn có; đã làm xong; đã chuẩn bị
eng_explanation: adjective: prepared for something; available for use.

The food is ready to eat.
He kept a ready supply of paper clips.

vn_meaning: tính từ: màu đỏ; nguy hiểm, báo động; thua (thể thao)
eng_explanation: adjective: the color of blood; indicating danger or warning; losing (in sports).
example: She wore a beautiful red dress.
The traffic light turned red.
Our team was red in the final game.

vn_meaning: động từ: giảm, bớt, làm nhỏ đi
eng_explanation: verb: to make smaller or less in amount, degree, or size.
example: We need to reduce our expenses.
The company is trying to reduce pollution.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự giảm, sự bớt
eng_explanation: noun: the act of making something smaller or less.

The price reduction made the product more attractive.
A reduction in working hours was proposed.

vn_meaning: động từ: giới thiệu, đưa ra (tên, tài liệu); tham khảo
eng_explanation: verb: to mention or allude to; to direct someone to a source of information.
example: I would refer you to the expert on the subject.
The article refers to several studies.
Please refer to the manual for instructions.

vn_meaning: động từ: dựa vào, tin cậy (ai, cái gì) để đạt được điều gì đó; nương tựa, phụ thuộc.
eng_explanation: v. to depend on or trust someone/something. (v.)
example: You can rely on me to keep your secret.
The company relies heavily on its online sales.
Don't rely solely on luck; work hard too.

vn_meaning: động từ: ở lại, còn lại; tiếp tục (ở trạng thái nào đó); giữ nguyên (nguyên trạng).
eng_explanation: v. to stay; to continue to be in a particular state or place. (v.)

vn_meaning: danh từ: phần còn lại; số còn lại (sau khi trừ đi một phần).
eng_explanation: n. the part that is left after other parts have been taken away. (n.)

vn_meaning: danh từ: hài cốt, di cốt; dấu vết còn sót lại; phế tích.

example: The archaeologists discovered the remains of an ancient city.
The remains of the fire were still smoldering.
They scattered his remains at sea.

vn_meaning: động từ: nhận xét, bình luận; nói một cách tình cờ; chú ý; ghi nhớ.; danh từ: lời nhận xét, bình luận.
eng_explanation: v. to say something as a comment; n. a comment or observation. (v./n.)
example: She made a clever remark about the situation.
He remarked on the beautiful scenery.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đáng chú ý, nổi bật; phi thường, xuất sắc.
eng_explanation: adj. worthy of attention; striking; extraordinary. (adj.)
example: She achieved a remarkable success in her career.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nơi cư trú, nơi ở; sự cư trú.
eng_explanation: n. the place where someone lives. (n.)

vn_meaning: danh từ: cư dân, người dân; người thường trú.; tính từ: thường trú, cư ngụ.
eng_explanation: n. a person who lives in a particular place; adj. living in a place. (n./adj.)
example: The town has a population of 10,000 residents.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thuộc khu dân cư; dùng cho việc ở.
eng_explanation: adj. relating to a place where people live; used for housing. (adj.)
example: This is a quiet residential area.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cặn, bã; dấu vết còn sót lại.
eng_explanation: n. a small amount of something that remains after the main part has been removed. (n.)
example: There was a residue of oil in the tank.
The residue of the cleaning product was harmful.
The pesticide left a residue on the fruit.

vn_meaning: từ chức
eng_explanation: To relinquish a position or activity.
example: I had to resign from my job due to health reasons.
She resigned her position after years of service.

vn_meaning: sự từ chức
eng_explanation: A formal withdrawal from a job or position.
example: The company offered a generous resignation package to attract talent.
He accepted the resignation with grace.

vn_meaning: chống lại
eng_explanation: To oppose or fight against.
example: The protesters resisted the police's arrest.

vn_meaning: sự kháng cự
eng_explanation: Opposition to a force or idea.
example: The resistance to the new policy was strong.
The group fought against the government's policies.

vn_meaning: quyết tâm
eng_explanation: A solution to a conflict or problem.
example: The committee reached a resolution to address the issue.
The conflict was resolved through a compromise.

vn_meaning: chấp nhận
eng_explanation: To find a solution to a problem.
example: We need to resolve this issue quickly.
He resolved to study harder.

vn_meaning: hạn chế
eng_explanation: To limit or control.
example: The government is trying to restrict freedom of speech.
The rules restrict the amount of time you can spend at the gym.

vn_meaning: nhịp điệu
eng_explanation: A regular pattern of sounds.
example: The music had a complex rhythm.
He was a master of the rhythmic beat.

vn_meaning: bún
eng_explanation: A type of grain.
example: I love eating rice with my dinner.

vn_meaning: hữu
eng_explanation: Having a large amount of wealth.
example: He is a wealthy man.
She has a rich family history.

vn_meaning: động từ: giải thoát, tống khứ (ai, cái gì đó); làm cho hết (cái gì đó xấu, khó chịu).
eng_explanation: to free someone or something from something undesirable (verb).
example: He tried to rid himself of the persistent cough.

vn_meaning: danh từ: công tắc (điện); động từ: chuyển đổi, đổi; tính từ: có thể thay đổi

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự tổng hợp, sự kết hợp

vn_meaning: tính từ: thuộc về lý thuyết; dựa trên lý thuyết, không thực tế.

eng_explanation: N. A system of ideas intended to explain something; a proposed explanation. (≤ 18 words)

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhà trị liệu; chuyên gia tâm lý.
eng_explanation: N. A trained professional who provides therapy, typically for mental health issues. (≤ 17 words)

vn_meaning: danh từ: liệu pháp; trị liệu; phương pháp điều trị.
eng_explanation: N. Treatment intended to relieve or heal a disorder; psychological treatment. (≤ 16 words)

vn_meaning: trạng từ: ở đó; tại đó; ở nơi đó; (dùng để chỉ sự có mặt).
eng_explanation: Adv. In or at that place; used to introduce a sentence with an existential clause. (≤ 19 words)
