We need to conduct a thorough evaluation of the data.
The annual performance evaluation is coming up.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: duy nhất; chỉ có (một thứ)
eng_explanation: adverb: only; to the exclusion of all others.
example: The store sells handmade jewelry exclusively.
The event is exclusively for members.
She speaks French exclusively.

vn_meaning: danh từ: cách sắp xếp, bố cục (của trang báo, sách, phòng ốc...); động từ: sắp xếp, bố trí
eng_explanation: n. arrangement; v. arrange or plan the format of something (e.g., a page).
example: The layout of the website is very user-friendly.
She carefully planned the layout of her garden.
The magazine's layout has been completely redesigned.

vn_meaning: tính từ: lười biếng, uể oải; không chịu làm việc, không năng nổ
eng_explanation: adj. unwilling to work or use energy; slow-moving or inactive.
example: He was accused of being lazy and unproductive.
It's a lazy summer afternoon, perfect for relaxing.
The cat lay in a lazy heap on the sofa.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tổ (chim, côn trùng...); động từ: làm tổ, lồng vào nhau
eng_explanation: n. a structure built by birds for laying eggs; v. build a nest.
example: The bird built its nest in the old oak tree.
She nestled into the warm blankets.
The rabbits had a nest of baby bunnies.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lưới; mạng lưới; thu nhập ròng; động từ: bắt (bằng lưới)
eng_explanation: n. a meshed fabric used for catching things; income after expenses.
example: The fisherman cast his net into the sea.
The company reported a net profit of $1 million.
She used a net to catch butterflies.

vn_meaning: danh từ: mạng lưới (máy tính, giao thông, quan hệ...); động từ: kết nối, xây dựng mạng lưới
eng_explanation: n. interconnected system; v. connect as or operate with a network.
example: The company has a global network of offices.
She is networking with professionals in her field.
The internet is a vast network of information.

vn_meaning: tính từ: trung lập, không thiên vị; không có màu sắc nổi bật
eng_explanation: adj. not supporting or favoring either side; lacking strong features.
example: Switzerland has a long tradition of neutrality.
The room was decorated in neutral colors.
The referee remained neutral throughout the game.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: đặc biệt là, nổi bật là, đáng chú ý là
eng_explanation: adv. especially; in a noteworthy manner.
example: The economy has improved notably in recent months.
She is a notably talented musician.
The weather was cold, notably colder than usual.

vn_meaning: danh từ: ghi chú, lời nhắn; âm thanh; tiền giấy; động từ: ghi chú, để ý
eng_explanation: n. a brief written record; musical tone; v. write down briefly.
example: She left a note on the door for her roommate.
The singer hit a high note.
Please note that the meeting has been cancelled.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sổ tay, vở ghi chép
eng_explanation: n. a small book for writing notes in.
example: She always carries a notebook to jot down ideas.
He filled several notebooks with his research.
I use a notebook to keep track of my daily tasks.

vn_meaning: đại từ, trạng từ: không có gì, chẳng gì
eng_explanation: pron. not anything; no thing.
example: There is nothing to worry about.
He said nothing about the incident.
Nothing can stop her from achieving her goals.

vn_meaning: thông báo
eng_explanation: To inform or draw attention to something; to show awareness.
example: The notice warned of the impending storm.
She noticed a small detail in the painting.
The company issued a notice about the new policy.

vn_meaning: báo cho
eng_explanation: To inform someone of something; to signal or announce.
example: The system will notify you of important updates.
The police officer notified the driver of the accident.
The email notified me of the meeting.

vn_meaning: mật khẩu
eng_explanation: A secret word or phrase used to authenticate access.
example: I need a strong password to protect my account.
The security system requires a complex password.
He used a password to log into the server.

vn_meaning: quá khứ
eng_explanation: A period of time in the past; a previous time.
example: I have a lot of memories of my childhood.
The historian examined the past records.
The past is full of interesting stories.

vn_meaning: a person who tends to animals, especially livestock.
eng_explanation: A person who tends to animals, especially livestock.
example: The shepherd was a skilled pastor of the flock.
She is a passionate pastorer of sheep.
The village had a dedicated pastor for the animals.

vn_meaning: vá
eng_explanation: A small repair or alteration made to something.
example: The software patch fixed the bug.
He made a small patch to the website.
The mechanic repaired the car's patch.

vn_meaning: bằng sáng chế
eng_explanation: A document that grants the right to an inventor to exclude others from making, using, or selling an invention.
example: The company sought a patent for its new technology.
She received a patent for her invention.
The patent protects the inventor's creation.

vn_meaning: người
eng_explanation: A human being.
example: The doctor examined the patient.
She is a kind and helpful person.
The company hired many people.

vn_meaning: cá nhân
eng_explanation: Relating to or concerning a person.
example: Her personal belongings were in the closet.
He had a personal opinion on the matter.
The company is focused on personal growth.

vn_meaning: tính cách
eng_explanation: A person's character or disposition.
example: Her personality was very outgoing.
He has a strong personality.
The detective studied the suspect's personality.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: một cách cá nhân; theo sự tự mình làm; riêng mình.
eng_explanation: adverb: done by oneself; in a personal way; by oneself.
example: I will personally handle this matter.
She felt personally responsible for the project's success.
He assured me he would look into it personally.

vn_meaning: danh từ: nhân sự; những người làm việc trong một tổ chức.
eng_explanation: noun: the employees of an organization; staff.
example: The company is expanding its personnel department.
We need to review the personnel files.
The personnel manager is responsible for hiring.

vn_meaning: danh từ: quy trình; cách thức thực hiện; thủ tục.
eng_explanation: noun: a set of actions taken to achieve a particular end; a process.
example: Follow the standard procedure for reporting errors.
The doctor explained the surgical procedure.
We need to establish a clear procedure for handling complaints.

vn_meaning: động từ: tiếp tục; tiến lên; diễn ra.
eng_explanation: verb: to continue; to move forward; to take place.
example: Let's proceed with the meeting.
The investigation will proceed as planned.
The concert will proceed as scheduled despite the rain.

vn_meaning: danh từ: diễn biến; thủ tục pháp lý; phiên tòa.
eng_explanation: noun: a process or course of action; a legal case.
example: The court proceedings were lengthy and complex.
The committee is reviewing the proceedings of the meeting.
All legal proceedings must be conducted fairly.

vn_meaning: danh từ: lợi nhuận; số tiền thu được.
eng_explanation: noun: money received from a sale or other transaction.
example: The proceeds from the charity auction will go to a good cause.
The company reported record proceeds this quarter.
He invested the proceeds from the sale of his house.

vn_meaning: danh từ: quá trình; phương pháp; cách thức.
eng_explanation: noun: a series of actions or steps taken in order to achieve a particular end.
example: The manufacturing process involves several stages.
We need to streamline the application process.
The legal process can be slow and frustrating.

vn_meaning: danh từ: xử lý; chế biến.
eng_explanation: noun: the action of processing something, typically data.
example: Data processing is essential for modern businesses.
The food is undergoing a preservation processing.
The computer is busy processing the request.

vn_meaning: động từ: truy tố; đưa ra xét xử.
eng_explanation: verb: to take legal action against someone.
example: The authorities decided not to prosecute him.
He was prosecuted for fraud.
The prosecutor presented the evidence to the jury.

vn_meaning: danh từ: vụ truy tố; hành động truy tố.
eng_explanation: noun: the act of prosecuting someone; the legal case itself.
example: The prosecution presented a strong case against the defendant.
The defense argued that there was insufficient evidence for a successful prosecution.
The outcome of the prosecution remains uncertain.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thuộc về tôn giáo; có tính chất tôn giáo; sùng đạo (người)
eng_explanation: adj. Relating to or believing in religion; devout.
example: She comes from a very religious family.
The school is a religious institution.
He has strong religious beliefs.

vn_meaning: tính từ: miễn cưỡng; không tình nguyện (làm việc gì đó)
eng_explanation: adj. Unwilling and hesitant; showing unwillingness.
example: He was reluctant to give me any details.
She was reluctant to try the new food.
I am reluctant to accept your offer.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người chạy bộ; người giao hàng; vật trượt (trong dệt may)
eng_explanation: n. A person who runs; a person who delivers items.
example: He is a marathon runner.
The delivery runner arrived with the package.
A loose runner in the fabric caused the tear.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đang chạy; hoạt động; đang tiến hành; danh từ: sự chạy bộ; hoạt động (của máy móc)
eng_explanation: adj. Moving at a fast pace; operating. n. The act of running.
example: The engine is running smoothly.
She enjoys running in the park.

vn_meaning: tính từ: nông thôn; thuộc về nông thôn
eng_explanation: adj. Relating to the countryside; not urban.
example: They live in a rural area.
Rural life is often slower paced.
The rural landscape is beautiful.

vn_meaning: động từ: vội vã; xông tới; thúc đẩy; danh từ: sự vội vã; dòng chảy mạnh
eng_explanation: v. To move quickly; to hurry. n. A hurried movement.
example: Don't rush your decision.
There was a rush to get tickets.
The river was in a rush after the rain.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bao tải; túi lớn; động từ: sa thải; cướp bóc
eng_explanation: n. A large bag. v. To dismiss from employment.
example: He carried the potatoes in a sack.
She was sacked from her job.
The city was sacked by the invaders.

vn_meaning: tính từ: thiêng liêng; linh thiêng; đáng kính trọng
eng_explanation: adj. Connected with God or a deity; holy.
example: This temple is a sacred place.
The scriptures are considered sacred.
They have a sacred duty to protect the environment.

vn_meaning: động từ: hy sinh; từ bỏ; danh từ: sự hy sinh; vật hiến tế
eng_explanation: v. To give up something valuable. n. An act of giving up.
example: He sacrificed his career for his family.
The sacrifice was made in the name of peace.
Animals were offered as a sacrifice to the gods.

vn_meaning: danh từ: học bổng; sự học vấn
eng_explanation: n. Financial aid for education; academic study.
example: She received a scholarship to study abroad.
He is a scholar of great learning.
The scholarship program supports talented students.

vn_meaning: trường học (đại học, trung học); nơi học tập và giảng dạy)
eng_explanation: A place for education and learning.
example: I am going to school tomorrow.
She is a student at the school.
The school offers many courses.

vn_meaning: khoa học (tất cả các lĩnh vực nghiên cứu); kiến thức khoa học
eng_explanation: The study of the natural world.
example: He is a scientist studying biology.
The science of medicine is complex.
She enjoys reading science books.

vn_meaning: mô phỏng (một quá trình); mô phỏng một hệ thống, quá trình hoặc tình huống
eng_explanation: To imitate or represent something.
example: The simulation is used to test the model.
Scientists use simulation to study climate change.
The simulation is running smoothly.

vn_meaning: mô phỏng (một quá trình); mô phỏng một hệ thống, quá trình hoặc tình huống
eng_explanation: A process of imitation or representation.
example: The simulation is used to test the model.
The simulation is running smoothly.
We need a better simulation for this project.

vn_meaning: đồng thời; cùng lúc
eng_explanation: Happening at the same time.
example: They were simultaneously working on the project.
The event was simulated simultaneously.
The two processes are running simultaneously.

vn_meaning: lỗi (tính); sai lầm, tội lỗi
eng_explanation: A moral wrong.
example: He committed a sin of pride.
The sin of greed is a common problem.

vn_meaning: bắt đầu từ khi; kể từ khi
eng_explanation: Starting from a particular time or condition.
example: I have lived here since 2010.
She started studying since she was a child.
The project began since the initial proposal.

vn_meaning: tincere; trung thực; chân thành
eng_explanation: Honest and genuine.
example: He was sincere in his apology.
She showed sincere gratitude.
His words were sincere and heartfelt.

vn_meaning: nhún; hát; ca
eng_explanation: To produce a musical sound.
example: The birds are singing in the morning.
She sings beautifully.
Let's sing a song together.

vn_meaning: nhỏ; bé
eng_explanation: Of a small size.
example: The house is small.
He is a small child.
The flower is small and delicate.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người thông minh; tính từ: thông minh; (mạng) thông minh, nhanh chóng
eng_explanation: Adjective: intelligent or clever; Noun: a smart person or device.
example: She is a very smart student.
The new phone is incredibly smart.
He used his smarts to solve the puzzle.

vn_meaning: điện thoại thông minh
eng_explanation: Noun: A mobile phone with advanced computing capabilities and internet access.
example: He always has his smartphone with him.
The smartphone allows you to take photos and videos.
She uses her smartphone for navigation.

vn_meaning: bước; (vận động) bước; (trong bài nhảy) bước
eng_explanation: Noun: A single movement of the foot; Verb: To move with steps.
example: Take a step forward.
He took a step back in fear.
The dancer took a graceful step.

vn_meaning: khuôn mẫu; định kiến; (trong phim) nhân vật khuôn mẫu
eng_explanation: Noun: A fixed, oversimplified image or idea of a person or thing.
example: Don't rely on stereotypes when judging people.
The movie features a classic hero stereotype.

vn_meaning: cây gậy; (dính) dính; (bám) bám
eng_explanation: Noun: A long, thin piece of wood; Verb: To adhere or cling.

The glue is very sticky.

vn_meaning: dính; (đồ ăn) ngọt ngào
eng_explanation: Adjective: Adhering or clinging; (of food) sweet.
example: The honey was very sticky.
The children loved the sticky candy.
The mud was sticky and difficult to remove.

vn_meaning: cứng; (người) thẳng tắp; (vẻ ngoài) trang trọng
eng_explanation: Adjective: Firm and unyielding; (of a person) standing up straight and formally.
example: The bed was very stiff.
She wore a stiff dress to the party.

vn_meaning: vẫn; (tỉnh) tỉnh; (đất) đất trống
eng_explanation: Adjective: Not moving; Verb: To continue to be.
example: He is still waiting for the bus.
The water is still.

vn_meaning: khuyến khích; kích thích; (thúc đẩy) thúc đẩy
eng_explanation: Verb: To encourage or excite; to provoke a response.
example: Exercise can stimulate the brain.
The music stimulated his creativity.
The new policy will stimulate economic growth.

vn_meaning: khuyến khích; kích thích; (gây ra) gây ra
eng_explanation: Noun: Something that causes a reaction or change; an incentive.
example: The economic stimulus package helped the economy.
His words were a powerful stimulus to action.

vn_meaning: danh từ: xu hướng, khuynh hướng (chung); tính hướng (tâm lý, hành vi).
eng_explanation: n. A leaning or inclination towards a particular characteristic or type of behavior. (n.)
example: There is a tendency for house prices to rise in the spring.

vn_meaning: danh từ: thần học, học thuyết về Thượng đế và tôn giáo.
eng_explanation: n. The study of the nature of God and religious belief. (n.)
example: He is a professor of theology at the university.
Theology explores questions about faith and existence.
Different branches of theology focus on various aspects of religious thought.

vn_meaning: danh từ: đoàn quân, đội (quân sự); bầy (động vật); đoàn (người).; động từ: tập trung, tụ tập.
eng_explanation: n. A group of soldiers or scouts; v. To gather or move together in large numbers. (n, v)
example: A troop of soldiers arrived to reinforce the base.
A troop of monkeys scampered through the trees.

vn_meaning: danh từ: chiến lợi phẩm; giải thưởng, huy chương.
eng_explanation: n. A prize or symbol of victory; something awarded for achievement. (n.)

He kept his trophies on a shelf in his bedroom.
The hunter displayed the trophy head of the lion.

vn_meaning: tính từ: nhiệt đới, thuộc vùng nhiệt đới.
eng_explanation: adj. Relating to or characteristic of the tropics; warm and humid. (adj.)
example: The island has a tropical climate with warm temperatures year-round.
She wore a brightly colored tropical shirt.
The rainforest is home to a wide variety of tropical plants and animals.

vn_meaning: danh từ: rắc rối, phiền phức; sự khó khăn, vấn đề.; động từ: làm phiền, gây rắc rối.
eng_explanation: n. Difficulty or problems; v. To bother or cause difficulty. (n, v)
example: I'm having trouble understanding this math problem.

The company is in financial trouble.

vn_meaning: tính từ: bận tâm, lo lắng; gặp rắc rối, khó khăn.
eng_explanation: adj. Worried, unhappy, or having problems. (adj.)
example: She seemed troubled by the news.
He is a troubled young man with a difficult past.
The company is facing troubled times.

vn_meaning: danh từ: quần dài (nam).
eng_explanation: n. An item of clothing covering the legs, typically worn by men. (n.)
example: He was wearing blue trousers and a white shirt.
She preferred jeans to trousers.
The trousers were too long and needed to be hemmed.

vn_meaning: danh từ: xe tải, xe chở hàng.
eng_explanation: n. A large motor vehicle designed for transporting goods. (n.)
example: The delivery truck arrived with our new furniture.
He drives a pickup truck for his work.
The truck was loaded with boxes.

vn_meaning: tính từ: đúng, thật; chân thật, trung thực; thật lòng, chân thành.
eng_explanation: adj. In accordance with fact or reality; genuine or sincere. (adj.)
example: Is this statement true?
He is a true friend.
She told him her true feelings.

vn_meaning: genuine, real, authentic; truly
eng_explanation: It means something is actually true and not a fake or deceptive appearance.
example: The truth is truly remarkable.
I trust your words to be truly sincere.

vn_meaning: confidence, faith, reliability; trust
eng_explanation: It signifies belief in someone or something, implying reliability and dependability.
example: I trust his judgment.
She has a deep trust in her friends.

vn_meaning: xem
eng_explanation: To maintain attention to something, often through a device.
example: Please watch out for the children.
I watch the news every morning.

vn_meaning: liquid water; water
eng_explanation: A clear, colorless, odorless, and tasteless liquid essential for life.
example: The river is filled with water.
I need water to drink.

vn_meaning: sóng
eng_explanation: A rhythmic movement of water, often large and powerful.
example: The ocean waves crashed against the shore.
She watched the wave with fascination.

vn_meaning: đường
eng_explanation: A route or path used to travel or move.
example: Take the way home.
There's a long way to go.

vn_meaning: we
eng_explanation: A group of people or animals.
example: Let's go for a walk.
We are happy to help.

vn_meaning: lacking strength, power, or resilience; weak
eng_explanation: Having a lack of physical or mental strength.
example: The patient is weak and needs rest.
He showed a weak stomach.

vn_meaning: to become less strong or powerful; weaken
eng_explanation: To gradually reduce strength or power.
example: The storm weakened the trees.
We need to weaken our defenses.

vn_meaning: điểm yếu
eng_explanation: A state of being physically or mentally frail.
example: She felt a weakness in her legs.
The soldiers suffered from a severe weakness.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tài sản, giàu có (về vật chất); tính từ: giàu có (về tài chính)
eng_explanation: Noun: possessions and assets; Adjective: having great wealth or fortune.
example: He inherited a great deal of wealth.
The country's wealth is based on its natural resources.
She used her wealth to support charitable causes.

vn_meaning: tính từ: giàu có (về tài chính)
eng_explanation: Adjective: possessing a great deal of money or wealth.
example: He is a wealthy businessman.
They live a wealthy and comfortable life.
The wealthy often donate to museums.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người (ai đó); trạng từ: người nào (hỏi)
eng_explanation: Pronoun: a person or people; Interrogative: who?
example: Who is at the door?
I don't know who she is.
Tell me who you were talking to.

vn_meaning: danh từ: bất kỳ ai; trạng từ: người nào (hỏi)
eng_explanation: Pronoun: anyone; Interrogative: whoever?

Whoever wants to join can come along.

vn_meaning: danh từ: toàn bộ; tính từ: hoàn chỉnh; tính từ: đầy đủ
eng_explanation: Noun: the entirety; Adjective: complete; Adjective: entire.
example: I ate the whole pizza.
The whole family went on vacation.
He is a whole person, not just a stereotype.

vn_meaning: tính từ: hoàn toàn; hoàn toàn là
eng_explanation: Adverb/Adjective: entirely; completely.
example: He was wholly devoted to his work.
The room was wholly dark.
She felt wholly exhausted after the journey.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người (được dùng trong câu tường thuật hoặc mệnh đề quan hệ)
eng_explanation: Pronoun: used as the object of a verb or preposition (formal).
example: To whom did you give the book?
The man whom I saw was very tall.
She spoke to the woman whom he loved.

vn_meaning: tính từ: của ai (dùng trong câu tường thuật hoặc mệnh đề quan hệ)
eng_explanation: Pronoun: belonging to whom (relative pronoun).
example: Whose car is this?
The book whose cover is torn is mine.
It's not clear whose responsibility it is.

vn_meaning: từ để hỏi: tại sao; tính từ: vì, bởi vì
eng_explanation: Adverb/Interjection: reason; Adjective: because.
example: Why are you crying?
I'm late because why I didn't set my alarm.
Why do you always wear blue?

vn_meaning: tính từ: rộng; tính từ: phổ biến; tính từ: rộng lớn
eng_explanation: Adjective: broad; Adjective: widespread; Adjective: extensive.
example: The river is very wide.
The internet has become very wide.
He has a wide circle of friends.

vn_meaning: trạng từ: rộng rãi; phổ biến (về phạm vi, mức độ); thường xuyên (về thời gian).
eng_explanation: adverb: occurring or spreading over a large area or number of people; common.
example: The news was widely reported in the media.
His views are not widely shared.
The disease is widely distributed throughout the region.

vn_meaning: động từ: mở rộng; làm rộng hơn; làm cho rộng hơn (về chiều ngang, chiều cao).
eng_explanation: verb: to make or become wider; to expand the width of something.
example: They plan to widen the road to ease traffic congestion.
The river widens as it flows towards the sea.
He widened his eyes in surprise.

vn_meaning: Xin lỗi; để xin phép; để tránh làm hỏng; một cách để xin phép; một lời xin lỗi
eng_explanation: To apologize; to request permission; to avoid causing damage; a way to ask for permission; a formal apology.
example: I apologize for being late.
Please excuse me for a moment.
He offered an excuse for his absence.

vn_meaning: Thực hiện; thực hiện một nhiệm vụ; thực hiện một lệnh; thực hiện một công việc
eng_explanation: To carry out; to perform; to follow instructions; to complete a task.
example: Please execute the instructions carefully.
Let's execute the project plan.
The programmer needs to execute the code.

vn_meaning: Mạnh mẽ; mạnh; có năng lượng cao; khẩn cấp; nghiêm trọng
eng_explanation: Strong; powerful; energetic; urgent; serious.
example: The movie had an intense atmosphere.
The situation was intense and dangerous.
He felt an intense desire for change.

vn_meaning: Tăng cường; làm tăng; làm mạnh hơn; làm rõ hơn
eng_explanation: To make something more intense; to increase; to clarify.
example: The rain intensified as the storm approached.
We need to intensify our efforts.
The investigation intensified after new evidence was discovered.

vn_meaning: Mức độ; cường độ; mức độ nghiêm trọng
eng_explanation: Degree; intensity; severity.
example: The intensity of the storm was remarkable.
The intensity of the research is significant.
The intensity of his anger was palpable.

vn_meaning: Tăng cường; mạnh mẽ; có năng lượng cao; khẩn cấp; nghiêm trọng
eng_explanation: Strong; energetic; demanding; urgent; serious.
example: The movie had an intense storyline.
He felt an intense focus on his work.
The project required an intense level of planning.

vn_meaning: danh từ: luật sư truy tố; danh từ: người truy tố (trong tòa án)
eng_explanation: A lawyer who represents the government in criminal cases. (n.)
example: The prosecutor presented a strong case against the defendant.
A skilled prosecutor is crucial for a successful prosecution.
The prosecutor argued that the evidence was insufficient.

vn_meaning: danh từ: triển vọng; danh từ: người đến dự; danh từ: tiềm năng
eng_explanation: A person who attends an event or a favorable future possibility. (n.)
example: The new technology offers a promising prospect for the future.
Many young people see a prospect of a better life abroad.
The company is exploring new markets as a prospect for growth.

vn_meaning: danh từ: trọng tài; danh từ: người điều khiển (trò chơi)
eng_explanation: An official who oversees a game or contest to ensure fair play. (n.)
example: The referee blew the whistle to stop the game.
A good referee is impartial and knowledgeable.
The soccer match was officiated by a respected referee.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tài liệu tham khảo; danh từ: sự tham chiếu; danh từ: chỉ dẫn
eng_explanation: A source of information or a link to something. (n.)
example: Please provide a reference for your claims.
The article cited several important references.
I found a helpful reference online for this topic.

vn_meaning: danh từ: trưng cầu dân ý
eng_explanation: A vote in which people express their opinion on a particular issue. (n.)
example: A referendum will be held next month to decide on the new law.
The government called for a referendum on the constitutional amendment.
The results of the referendum were a clear victory for the opposition.

vn_meaning: động từ: phản chiếu; động từ: thể hiện; động từ: suy ngẫm
eng_explanation: To mirror or show something back. Also, to express or represent. (v.)
example: The mirror reflects my image.
The lake reflects the surrounding mountains.
His words reflected his deep sadness.

vn_meaning: danh từ: sự phản chiếu; danh từ: suy ngẫm; danh từ: hình ảnh phản chiếu
eng_explanation: The act of reflecting or a mirrored image. (n.)
example: The sunlight created a beautiful reflection on the water.
She took time for quiet reflection after the difficult day.
His face showed a thoughtful reflection.

vn_meaning: động từ: cải cách; danh từ: cải cách
eng_explanation: To improve or change something, especially by making important changes. (v.)
example: The government is implementing reforms to the healthcare system.
Social reforms are needed to address inequality.
He advocated for political reform.

vn_meaning: adjective: bớt lo lắng; adjective: đã được giải tỏa (cảm xúc)
eng_explanation: Feeling or expressing relief; no longer worried or anxious. (adj.)
example: She was relieved to hear that her friend was safe.
The patient felt relieved after the surgery.
He was relieved to receive the good news.

vn_meaning: danh từ: tôn giáo
eng_explanation: A set of beliefs and practices relating to the supernatural. (n.)
example: Many people find comfort in their religion.
Religious freedom is a fundamental human right.
The religion has a long and complex history.

vn_meaning: Mục đích, ý định, ý định (đối với một hành động hoặc sự kiện)
eng_explanation: To intend, to have a purpose, or a goal.
example: The user's intent was to purchase a new phone.
We need to understand the user's intent before proceeding.

vn_meaning: Ý định, mục đích, ý định (đối với hành động hoặc sự kiện)
eng_explanation: A planned action or goal.
example: She had a clear intention to complete the project.
The company's intention was to expand its market share.

vn_meaning: Đặt, trình bày, đặt (đối với vật thể, đồ vật), đặt (đối với sự kiện, hành động)
eng_explanation: To place, to arrange, or to set.
example: The artist laid the painting on the easel.
Let's lay out the table for dinner.

vn_meaning: Lớp, lớp phủ, lớp (đối với vật chất, vật lý), lớp (đối với sự kiện, hành động)
eng_explanation: A layer of something.
example: The computer has multiple layers of protection.
She laid the foundation for the building.

vn_meaning: Bumble, ngã, lộn xộn, ngã (đối với người), ngã (đối với vật thể)
eng_explanation: To fall awkwardly.
example: He stumbled over the uneven pavement.
She stumbled while walking down the street.

vn_meaning: Đánh thức, làm cho người mất trí nhớ, làm cho người ngây thơ
eng_explanation: To make someone unconscious or confused.
example: The sudden loud noise stunned him.
The sudden shock stunned her.

vn_meaning: Nhiệt độ, nhiệt độ (đối với môi trường), nhiệt độ (đối với vật chất)
eng_explanation: The degree of hotness or coldness.
example: The temperature outside is 25 degrees Celsius.
The temperature of the water is 30 degrees Celsius.

vn_meaning: Nhà thờ, đền thờ, nơi thờ phụờn
eng_explanation: A place of worship.
example: The ancient temple was covered in vines.
She visited the temple to pray.

vn_meaning: Đôi khi, tạm thời, tạm thời
eng_explanation: For a short time.
example: We'll be temporarily unavailable.
This is a temporary solution.

vn_meaning: động từ: lôi kéo, dụ dỗ (ai đó làm điều gì đó); tính từ: gây cám dỗ, hấp dẫn (quá khứ)
eng_explanation: verb: to entice or persuade someone to do something; adjective: alluring or seductive (archaic).
example: The advertisement was designed to tempt customers to buy the product.
He was tempted by the promise of wealth and power.
The beautiful scenery tempted us to take a long hike.

vn_meaning: danh từ: số, tên; tính từ: mười; động từ: (hiếm dùng) gọi tên
eng_explanation: noun: number, name; adjective: ten; verb: (rare) to name.
example: What is the ten percent discount?
Her name is Mary Ten.
Please ten this document for me.

vn_meaning: danh từ: người thuê nhà; (kinh tế) người cho thuê và người thuê
eng_explanation: noun: a person who rents property; (economics) a landlord and tenant.
example: The tenant signed a new lease agreement.
He is a responsible tenant who always pays his rent on time.
The landlord and tenant discussed the terms of the rental.

vn_meaning: động từ: chăm sóc, nuôi dưỡng; (thời tiết) xu hướng, có khả năng; (y học) co giật
eng_explanation: verb: to care for; (weather) to trend; (medicine) to spasm.
example: She tends her garden with great care.
The stock market tends to rise during economic growth.
He experienced a sudden tend of his muscles.

vn_meaning: dài ngày, tạm thời (tình huống, sự kiện, hoặc trạng thái)
eng_explanation: Temporary means lasting for a short period; not permanent.
example: The temporary office closure was due to the storm.
We need a temporary solution to this problem.
